links_Review_Text: Beautiful silky smooth fabric with whimsical pattern and flattering fit. Great neckline too - deep enough to look sexy but (even for small chested women like me) not self conscious. Love the pussy bow tie detail too. Got so many compliments.
Fits like a glove! So flattering through the hips and waist! Just found a new favorite designer!!!

This is a dress with a sense of humor for when you feel like being noticed. Pattern aside, it fit beautifully on my curves, the material was high quality and the whole dress felt expensive. I wore it to work, but I think it's intended for more formal occasions. Will rent again when the mood hits!

I've worn this dress twice now - once to a concert and once to a gallery opening. Both instances resulted in compliments galore. It is so beautiful and well-made. I'm considering purchasing it, even at $800ish, but will just hold onto it for now....
Loved this so much, would rent again. Just size up!
A very beautiful dress with a unique print but fit more like a bias cut dress on the hips. It did not fit like an a-line which is what I expected from the picture.

links_Review_Title: Proportion better for a tall body - but very pretty
links_Review_Text: A great dress to make you feel and look like a professional adult, but not matronly or corporate. Beautiful print, high quality lines. But sizing was a bit difficult. The waist and hips fit me perfectly, snug like a glove. The top, however, was a bit roomy - it was either a bit too long or a bit too large or a bit of both. I think anyone who is small cheated or shorter (or both) would have this same fit issue, and because of how fitted the mid-section of the dress is, it can't simply hang lower to make up for it. I might try a size down if I rented again to see if the top would fit better but then the waist might be too tight - or I might try the size up so that it could hang lower and allow the length of the top to hang lower too but then maybe the whole thing would be too big. You seen the conundrum. Ultimately I think a more-padded bra made the top fit acceptably well.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress- but beware gloved hand pattern all over it
links_Review_Text: Comfortable easy to wear even though I needed a cami so that I didn't flash my bra - but it has gloved hands on the skirt and body (didn't worry me particularly but they are a bit odd). I sized up 2 sizes - May have got away with sizing up once but it was comfortable to walk and eat! I picked up the pink with shoes Nice vibrant colors on black satin finish heavier weight fabric.
This dress is fitted up top and drapes To a nice skirt. I wore with cropped black cardigan. Love it!
I found this dress to be incredibly flattering. I loved that it was something a bit different and I just felt great wearing it. Highly recommend.
Such a unique fun print. Great material and easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: Abracadabra! Great dress for a magic show.
links_Review_Text: Okay. So I got this dress and quickly realized it was NOT my steeze. It looks like something that you might wear to a magic show or if you were an accountant at the Bunny Ranch. The combination of arrows, shapes, black on black stripes, and strange lace Victorian gloves everywhere was a bit much. That said, I still wore it to work one day. Here's what I thought: 1. The slit under the pussy bow is very revealing. Even with the bow hanging down untied in the middle I'm pretty sure I flashed a lot of people. 2. The midsection of the dress has no structure and even though it's a looser fit, due to the fabric it is sort-of clingy. Not the MOST attractive. I like more structure in my waistline. 3. No one knew what to make of the dress so they just ignored it and didn't say anything. It's not that it's ugly per se...It's just really strange.

The details... it's all in the gorgeous details. The fabric is exceptional. The cut is unique. It fit me like a glove. Wore this to a Facebook event and then out on a date. It was a little dressy for daytime; but I enjoy standing out in a crowd.

Wow, this is the must luxurious material against my skin. The length was perfect for dancing and jumping around at an outdoor wedding. Traveled well, without wrinkles on the train and in a car for a few hours. It was seriously stunning and my favorite RTR to wear, yet. Tied the neck ties in the back. Want to keep forever because it's so gorgeous, yet edgy. Will absolutely rent again in the future.

The fabric is so unique and beautiful. And dress fits your body like a glove and flows beautifully. It does run fairly small I'm usually a size 6 normally, and wore for the 10 r, probably could have even gone one size up and had a little more room to breeze in the rib cage. At five or six, I loved the midi length, but a friend who is a little shorter did not like how long it was on her.
The whole reason to rent high end clothes is this dress! It feels so good on and is beautiful!

I rented this for several public speaking events I had to lead at work over the course of 2 weeks. I wanted to look posh and feel comfortable - this dress did both these things for me! It was such a flattering cut and I adore the unique print. The neck tie can we worn multiple ways and I ended up tying it behind my neck to make my outfit look the way I wanted. The fabric is quite heavy and travels really well with no wrinkles! A win win. Will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Unique print and looks great & professional on
links_Review_Text: Great if you're tall
Love the fit and style.
Amazing!!! I am trying to find another event to wear this dress to. Went BraLess not sure if a bra would have fit but the dress still looked smashing. Comfortable Unique

links_Review_Title: Comfortable, good quality and really beautiful
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress for a Broadway opening night party I had recently. Not only is the quality of the dress really wonderful (fabric, zippers, etc.) but the shape is flattering, forgiving AND form fitting. I wore the 16 R which is a US 12 and I loved the fit overall. I wish the top was a little tighter on me, but that would be my one complaint. I tied the neck tie in the back, rather than the front. The pattern was cute and was something different than the all black I usually wear. I'm pretty tall, and loved the length too.

This was one of my favorite rentals. Yes British sizing runs small size up. I normally wear a 0/2 weigh 110 and the 8 fit with little room to spare. If you are tall and not large in the chest, this runs long, this will work well for you. After a long bridal shower - no wrinkles!

This is one of my favorite rentals from RTR! I wore it to a luncheon and got tons of compliments. As others mentioned, the neckline is a bit low, but the tie at the neck did a good job of hiding that. Fabric is insanely gorgeous and so unique. Length was perfect for my height, but I'm on the taller side.
Sophisticated, beautiful fabric blended prints. Tight on torso. small bust, low cut. Thin fabric. Quality, trendy.

This dress is luscious top to bottom. The print is playful and unexpected and creates just gorgeous lines for your figure. Fitted through the bodice and waist and then more loosely falls along the bottom half. If you carry in your mid section I would recommend sizing up, no give to this glorious fabric. More cleavage than the model showed and could not wear for my intended work event, but luckily I had a more formal event I could transition it to because it would have been DEVASTATING to send back without wearing. Other dresses I've rented in this price point have never come close to feeling this lux, rent this if you want to feel like a million bucks!
This dress is beautiful. The material is amazing and the fit perfect. I'm 5'9 and the length is a perfect midi. I'd watch out for that if you're more on the petite side but 0 complaints here!
Bow was adorable
It fit perfectly!
A little risky in the chest area for a DD size cup

I love this dress. Gorgeous fabric and fully lined. It is fitted through the torso with no stretch. It really flattered my figure. I would also recommend for those who are taller. I got a ton of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Really sim. It fit but I would have been more comfortable a size up.
links_Review_Text: Size up or 2

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but way too tight
links_Review_Text: So tight it felt like a corset and I couldn't breathe, wore it for 5 minutes only.
Fit like a glove, lovely material and soooo many compliments!
This dress was beautiful! But could not stop it from gaping at the bust. The tie front didn't help either. Sadly, had to send back after one dinner.
more fitted in the waist
I actually wore this on a movie date and got so many compliments.
This dress was so gorgeous but it was just way too tight around my ribs. If one size up was available i would have loved to try it

I am a consistent US designer 14/ British 18, and this dress fit PERFECTLY. The pattern is very avant garde (typical Temperley), the fabric is ultra luxe (also typical Temperley), and I swear I looked 10 pounds thinner. Compliments all day long, can't wait to rent this again.

This dress fits narrow in the bodice and the keyhole showed too much cleavage. I am going to rent again in a size up to accommodate my bust. I put it on to wear to a date after work but ended up at the doctor's with a back injury. I sent my date a photo of me in the dress because I had to cancel. He loved the dress. (I was on pain meds and had to wait for my child to get home to unzip me. I spent the day like sleeping beauty.)
This dress was evwrything. I felt secure even with the low cut busy and no bra. So many compliments. I felt beautiful and classy.

I wore the size 8 (true size) with 1" heels. You would need long if you wore any higher heels. The fabric is very high quality and thick enough that it doesn't wrinkle and I didn't need a bra. I did use fashion tape in the front just to make sure it didn't move. I would definitely rent again!!

I really expected this to be a stunner with my shape unfortunately my boobs were falling out because the top is so large (which never happens to me!) and the waist was stretched not fitted or stretchy as it appeared on others. So I think this might be best with a more slender and long shape body.

links_Review_Title: This dress has definite WOW factor
links_Review_Text: Material is heavy and quality, fits comfortably, stunner with the neckline, but modest otherwise. Body tape would be helpful to avoid slips

I rented this for a black tie wedding in October. I wore a size 6R and it fit perfectly. I am barely 5'1" and the dress hit the floor perfectly with 3inch heels. The front dips very low so if you're concerned about cleavage, this dress probably isn't for you. I used some fashion tap to keep the straps closer to my chest in case I bent over. The straps are very wide so I did pin them in a bit to make them more narrow. This dress was very form fitting but accentuates in all the right places.
If fit very well. Good stretchy material. No need to wear "spanx" underneath. It's very low cut but as long as the dress is tight enough it stays put. I got a lot of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Head turning dress for a pregnant mama!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove. The heavy material was slightly stretchy but provided excellent structure to the gown and top. It stretched perfectly over my 14 week baby bump (third child so definitely showing). I'm a 34B/C and the top was not too big. I did use fashion tape to feel a bit more secure from gaping. My only con was that it was the perfect length barefoot (5'4"). I would have preferred it had been an inch or two longer for my heels.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a black tie wedding and was very happy with the fit!
links_Review_Text: Loved how this fit like a glove! Got a ton of compliments on this one.

This dress has a very sturdy material but still has a lot of give. It was easy to move in as well as comfortable indoors and outdoors. There is definitely a lot of cleavage shown with this dress-so if you are larger up top you have to be comfortable showing a little. I used fashion tape to make sure I didn't fall out the sides and pasties to use as a cover. Overall very cute dress and pretty function despite it being kind of revealing.

links_Review_Title: It was perfect for a wedding! I received lots of compliments! I would highly recommend!
links_Review_Text: Now for the deets....;) I ordered a size 10R which is equivalent to a US 6 ...I could've probably went a size down and I wouldn't have needed breast tape. I am a size 34D and I had full coverage on the sides and felt very secure! Yes its a deep plunge but I really felt comfortable overall. I danced all night and nothing came out of place! lol The fabric was great and comfortable, I didn't need extra undergarments, it was really a solid dress to wear.

This dress was amazing! Sexy but very sophisticated. I had multiple random guests stop me and compliment the dress. It did run big in the top as i am small in the chest. I couldn't find my double sided tape but that would've helped to keep it in place.

This dress was fantastic! Rented it for a black tie gala and I got so many compliments by random people. It's thicker material like others mentioned but it fit like a glove and was so flattering. I'm 5'6 and 140 lbs and the 10R was perfect! I felt so confident and beautiful all night! Another RTR win!!!!

links_Review_Title: FELT LIKE A MILLION BUCKS. Did not disappoint.
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a black tie wedding and it was a total showstopper. It's surprisingly full coverage aside from the plunge (not an inch of side boob!) The dress was super stretchy and comfortable. Length was totally fine with a 4 inch heel (I'm 5'1). Would absolutely rent again!!

I ordered two sizes: 12R and 10R as back up. I normally wear an 8/28 in denim. I first tried on the 12R and it felt good, but I noticed it was heavy. The material is very thick. I put the 10R to see the difference and wow what did it make. Because the material is thick it is best if the dress is snug. I went with the 10R, it felt great on all night. I really loved the dress. It is simple and a little risky with the deep V, but it's also elegant and a statement. The color of blue was beautiful and looked great with my partner's suit. The event was his holiday party, formal attire. This was my first time using Rent the Runway!

This dress was stunning. The V is deep but I didn't have any issues and felt secure. I normally wear a 4-6 so this definitely runs small. The length was great for me at 5'7. I would totally rent again for a black tie event!

links_Review_Title: A little too big to wear
links_Review_Text: I rented this as an option for a wedding. I wasn't familiar with the designer, so I ordered two sizes. This dress was too big on me and not so summery, so I went with a different option. I would rent this in the smaller siZe in the future for a fall/winter event m.

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: This was my first RTR purchase! The dress was snug in all the right places and super comfortable to eat and dance in. Wore this for a 007-themed event and couldn't stop getting compliments. Thanks, guys!

I wore this for a black tie wedding and loved it! The material is comfortable and stretchy. I am normally a 2 or 4 so ordered the 6 and 8. I probably could have went down a size for it to be tighter in the torso and waist areas, but some extra room for sitting and dancing never hurts. The deep V was sexy, but not overly revealing (34D w implants). I paired it with the Mika Lariat Set necklace from RTR and it looked so nice with it. I am only 5 feet tall and the dress JUST hit the floor with 3-4 inch heels, so I would definitely recommend getting the L if you are on the taller side. Was so sad to return this one!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments. Comfortable dress, sexy.
links_Review_Text: So glad I listened to the reviews and ordered size up!

I normally get a size 2 & 4, which correlated to 6 & 8... 6 fit well but hugged a little tight & was about an inch too short for the heels I wanted to wear. The 8R was the perfect length with a little more room for dancing comfort & confidence! Lots of compliments and was very comfortable, especially without even needing a bra, always a plus! I still felt classy, even with the sexiness of it!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments in this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful, comfortable, and makes you feel like a million bucks. Fits like a glove.

links_Review_Title: Fit was superb! Tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I wear a 8-10 usually, this 12R (UK Sizing) was perfect. I am a 36DD as well and was worried about my boobs being secure, they were perfect. The dress has enough flex/elasticity to keep them high and tight. Loooved this dress. It was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable, sexy and fit well.
links_Review_Text: I actually didn't wear this dress to the event but should have. I wore another one and I didn't realize the hock and eye was broke so the zipper kept coming down. Plus the seam was split too. I should have picked this one. Fit just as well.

I initially was not sure about this dress but I ended up being very happy with it. I felt at first that it overemphasized my hips. I did realize that the material is so thick that you have to almost stretch it down so that it lays appropriately. I did not have any difficulty with it staying in place on top and received a ton of compliments on it. I did wear roughly 3-4 inch heels and the Long was perfect for that.

I wore this to a black tie wedding and it actually ended up being one of my favorite rentals. The fabric is stretchy and thick, making it perfect for early spring weather. Ladies who are taller should definitely get the long, because I found the "regular" to be perfect even in baby heels. I also went bra-less, but did use fashion tape keep everything "secure" ;)

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress for a stunning winter wedding
links_Review_Text: Sexy yet classy and perfect when paired with a drop necklace. I have a smaller chest so it made feel like I had a figure without feeling self conscious that it was too revealing. Just needed a little bit of tape and it stayed in place all night even while tearing up the dance floor. The thick material is super flattering and was ideal for a winter wedding. Go with an L if you plan on wearing heels.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress and it was a hit!!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. It hide any imperfections that I had!

Love this dress. It's so comfortable for a long night. The plunging v is a great way to make a statement in a black and blue dress. The back is also really different. Overall it was great and I would recommend. Used a little tape but didn't have issues with the chest.
Beautiful dress fit like a glove.

This dress was absolutely stunning! I was a little nervous because of my bust size but the material is thick and hugs your body perfectly. I did use some fashion tape to hold everything in place and I had no issues with the dress or the material. It was the perfect length with 3 inch heels and fit perfectly everywhere else. It was very comfortable and easy to move around in and dance. Would highly recommend this dress!
If you don't have big boobs the cut is not too low. I wore this at a work event. No boob tag needed!

I just recently had a baby so when other reviewers mentioned the material is thick and holds you in and it wasn’t a full on gown (I am 5’1”) I went for it. I am always scared of length but the reviews helped. The material really smooths you out and is easy and classic with the plunge adding some sexiness to it! Felt so good to feel dolled up again!
The fit was great, the fabric was very comfortable but thick enough to not show everything.
This dress was perfect for a winter black tie wedding. The fabric is really thick and the whole dress was great quality.

links_Review_Title: Attending a Police Ball: Spending the night with my Officer! I am so proud.
links_Review_Text: 1. I felt so confident and sexy in this dress! 2. Beware of the European sizing, I really researched what I needed via reviews. 4. I am very flat and not busty. I barely filled out the top and with the deep-v I was a little concerned about a nip slip. But I just stayed aware and careful when leaning forward, etc. 5. Overall this was the perfect dress for my event. So happy it worked.

I wanted to wear this SO BADLY, but I thought it showed a little much for a wedding. I will definitely rent this again for a different event. It was sooo sleek and daring! I love the blue/black color combo. I'm 5'9" 145 and 32C and the 6 fit perfectly. I didn't mind that my heels would show either. It looks good at the floor or up by the ankles. Great sexy dress!

The dress material is thick and somewhat stretchy which makes it really comfortable! As others mentioned it does gape a bit in the front but just have to be careful to keep your shoulders back and won't have any problems :)
I felt like a million bucks in this dress! Sexy yet classy. I got sooo many compliments! Great dress, rent it!

This dress could not have been more perfect for a formal gala. It was so comfortable and the material was thick and had give, so I think it would compliment many body types. It fit true to size for me. The top was wide enough that I think it would cover most people. I could not wear a because it dipped too low, but I felt secure anyway. Would definitely recommend this dress to anyone.

links_Review_Title: Definite show stopper..Got compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. Unfortunately I had more side boob than I had hoped, but some fashion tape solved that problem. It didn't move all night, with some light dancing. I wore 4" heels, which I thought were too tall for the regular dress, I would order a long for those heels next time. It was definitely sexier than what I usually go for and I was worried it would be too much given my chest size (36DD). But it worked! At some point I just embraced the cleavage. It never killed anyone!! I gave it a 4 because the packaging was sloppy. I expected more from RTR. I've never seen such sloppiness with them before. The dresses came in a larger than necessary box thrown around the place. There were no directions or return shipping label. And someone had left an empty box of something in there (I can't remember if it was hosiery or not) but some item that shouldn't of been included was included.
Unique and fun styling, I loved everything about this dress!

links_Review_Title: Unique color blocking, great for fall
links_Review_Text: I really thought this piece was cute and unique, I decided to wear with a black T-shirt as the top fit a little weird (boob gap) and didn't want it to be baggy during work. the skirt is in two pieces that overlap in the front, if you're not careful you'll have a slit going up the center front. Still with all of these notes, I really enjoyed this dress for a fall day and received compliments from my coworkers

Previous renter had tied the straps in knots to shorten them so that's how I received the item. With or without the knots though, the dress fit strangely. Too open in the chest coupled with an elastic band at the waist and just too much fabric resulted in said fabric hanging over my midsection.

Not sure if the dress was broken or it's meant to be super low, but a little revealing in the front. The belt on the side is kind of weird and there is only a pocket on the left part of the dress. But it's nice?

links_Review_Title: Unique and comfortable alternative to a regular sundress
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit of this stylish dress! It did fit larger than expected and I should have sized down. The mixed patterns are eye catching and this dress is easy to go from work to evening. I didn't wear a bra but you could wear a strapless if needed. The belt didn't adjust as tight as I wanted (it was very loose) however this added to the comfort factor. I would rent this again.

links_Review_Title: UGH - so wanted this one to work
links_Review_Text: The style is incredible, but the fit falls flat - not flattering in the least as the bottom portion billows in the wrong way. Such a missed opportunity with this dress unfortunately.

I love the cut of this dress except for the gathering right around the upper thigh, I can't imagine that being a flattering area for anyone to accentuate. The top part is a great cut for someone who is more narrow like me and i love the length and the color blocking. I would definitely aiE down. I am in an 8 and typically between a 6 or 8 and should have gotten the 6.

links_Review_Title: Keeping this one for the whole summer
links_Review_Text: I'm not one to write RTR reviews unless I really love something, and I am totally obsessed with this Tibi dress. So far I've worn it drinking rosé on a rooftop and to my boyfriends mothers house for a family event. Got showered with compliments both times. Planning on wearing it when I go to France later this summer, and holding on to this for awhile with fingers crossed the buy price goes down!
Loved this dress, it was too big in the waist, even with the cinch.
Wore it to a nautical summer soirée and couldn't have felt prettier in it. It was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Worn for a welcome party for a friends wedding.
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress but the drop waistline did not particularly work with my body type. The top of the dress bloused up a little bit causing it to look bulky. This would be great on a taller person.

links_Review_Title: Ill fitting at the top of the dress.
links_Review_Text: The top part gapes.
Looooved this dress and got so many compliments! It's casual but still dressy so perfect for all types of occasions . Was sad to return!
This dress was super fashionable and comfortable. I received lots of compliments. Paired well with a blazer at work too.
I really wanted this to work. It was too big on the midsection but too tight for my bust. Bra can be tricky with this one. Heads up.
I wore this dress to everything I possibly could before returning it, date night, venue walk through for our wedding, work with a blazer. This dress can do it all. Can't wait to rent it again!
I've rented this dress twice and enjoyed it both times. Comfortable and chic! Great on a hot day.

links_Review_Title: super unique look. fit really well!
links_Review_Text: was a little tight around the armpits but worked well for bigger chest.

links_Review_Title: Easy to wear, easy to clean
links_Review_Text: Wore this as casual everyday dress. Any spills on skirt magically removed with little scrub of water because material polyester, and doesn't wrinkle. Fun and felt put together. Didn't show too much cleavage since not wearing a bra.

links_Review_Title: Light weight and funky for occasions
links_Review_Text: Light weight and funky for occasions

amazing work to night dress. looks fantastic w a blazer. lightweight, flows beautifully, doesn't wrinkle, striking. go at least 1 size down. i was worried about the V neck, but it wasn't too deep. pass on the bra or go strapless. i'm typically a 2 and the 2 was fine, but the 0 wldve been better. even at my height it looked fine w flats.

links_Review_Title: Gathering of friends and family for dinner.
links_Review_Text: Super easy to wear, great details that set it apart, great fabric, modern and fit well, little tight in bust.

This dress is super cute! It is unique and easy to dress up or down. I am pretty flat chested and the top worked well for me but may be tricky if you are more well endowed. The belt is adjustable which is nice but the top straps are not.

What a gorgeous comfortable dress! So trendy and stylish and soooo adorable! A lot of room to stay comfortable no matter how much you eat. The style is right up my alley and the dress is a silky material that is comfortable and so fun to wear.

I wore this got my high school reunion and got so many compliments! I absolutely loved it but I wish I got a size up as it was a little tight around my hips and I will say if you have to use the restriction a lot this is not the easiest outfit to put on and off.

I love anything long sleeve and bright, so this romper was made for me. It fits pretty tight though and has no give. It is also a little sheer. I wore it as a coverup over a swimsuit for a boat ride on vacation. Super chic.

The fit is true to size and the open back is classy and beautiful. Nice for a MN June day where it's too chilly for short sleeves, too warm for pants. This is a statement item and will get lots of second looks.
Very soft, comfy, but still dressed up romper. Loved the frill details and partially open back. Wish I could have rented it for a more special occasion because it was a big hit!

I'm short so this worked very well for me. I have to say even as I raised both arms above my head it got a little tight so I can't imagine how it would be for someone average height. I loved it overall and would definitely rent it again.

links_Review_Title: A colorful addition to any summer wardrobe!
links_Review_Text: This is such a bright, cute romper! It's flattering and cute. It's admittedly cut a bit short from the waist to the inner leg lining, so could be snug if you have a longer torso. This wasn't a big deal though; if anything, it helped keep the fit in the waist and kept the shorts from being too flowy and overpowering me (as a short girl, this romper was perfect and hit about 3/4 of the way down my thigh). Would definitely rent again!
I'm an apple shaped and this was liiitle too tight around waist but it's just my body type. It's bright and cute and definitely stands out

This romper is adorable! Great high waist line for a slimming effect. The shorts didn't ride up at all! Loved the tie in the back right across the bra line so I could still wear a bra. Very comfortable too!

links_Review_Title: PERFECT! This romper is so fun and cute
links_Review_Text: I loved this romper. It fit really well and was super fun and perfect for warmer days. While it had sleeves, they were very thin and didn't make the outfit too warm at all. I got a ton of compliments in this outfit.

I wore this to my best friends rehearsal dinner. It was perfect because the long sleeves matched the fall season while the short bottoms kept me comfy in the southern heat. Plus the open back was super flattering. I'm 5'6 and 140lbs and wore a size 6. I would say maybe it runs a little small, but not alot.
Very cute and stylish romper for a fun night out. The yellow is very bright and is attention grabbing.

links_Review_Title: Got a ton of compliments on it!
links_Review_Text: Fit great!
Too short

Fit - It's super cute, but super short. I did like it, but I might order in a bigger size to have it longer. Pros - It's really so cute and easy to go to do day-to-day tasks Cons - Short. Like super short Hightlight helpful tips - I would order a bigger size if you want more length.
Wore this to my bff's rehearsal dinner and got compliments all night. Fits very true to size and color is amazing!
Runs really small. I could barely zip up

links_Review_Title: The color is so striking it really stood out. The style is also very flattering.
links_Review_Text: The romper fit very true to size. I got a TON of compliments on it. I'm 5'4 and the length was perfect but if you're a bit taller it might be too short.

I rented these dresses for my twin daughters for my wedding. The fit was perfect for their 5'2 /115lb frame. The gold detail in the dress is so pretty it gave the dresses just the perfect touch of glamour for the wedding They wore an XS so I say it runs tru to size since they are usually a size 0. They looked beautiful! I was very happy with the rental and They received lots of compliments! Thanks RTR!

Rented this dress for a friends wedding. Loved the fit and style, this dress is exactly the look I was going for - simple but fun. The color was darker thank i thought it was going to be and It was a tad bit longer than I would have liked (it came down to my ankle and I would have preferred mid calf but i'm also very short so I expected it to be a little longer than it was on the model). I also loved the fact I didn't have to wear a bra. there's also subtle gold stitching which I liked :)

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on the this dress!! It was so beautiful to wear!
links_Review_Text: Fit snug in the chest and bust area but overall it was a great fit. Definitely wear a low cut bra or tape. I used tape for this dress.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but color was not rose petal
links_Review_Text: The cut of the dress was super-flattering, but the color was nothing like the photo. It was true peach.

links_Review_Title: Sizing is odd, but still beautiful!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a summer wedding in WY. The medium was too tight on me, so I ended up wearing the large, which was slightly large on me, but kind of my only option at that point. Despite it being a little big, I still found it to be flattering and super comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, just not what I expected
links_Review_Text: The two dresses they sent me were two different colors. The dress in the color I was expecting was too small. The size up was slightly too big in the chest area but i made it work.

links_Review_Title: This was the dress I wore to my mother's wedding and I felt fabulous!
links_Review_Text: Great color for spring and summer, and very complementary for fair skin kissed with rosiness. I have a tall frame with broad shoulders for a woman (I'm trans). The cut and shape in the way it drapes was very complimentary to my figure. My only caution with this dress is that the color may be faded. I ordered a medium as a backup and it was obvious that it had been worn several times simply due to the fact that it was sun bleached and the color was terribly faded. Had I not ordered the large that arrived in 'like new' condition then I would have been upset.
Fit great! I'm only 5'2" so I was a little concerned about my height with the dress but it worked out!
Unfortunately, a large for me did not work out. I'm a big girl! I just don't have the proportions right, so the top was way too big.

Wore this dress to an outdoor wedding at 100 degrees and it worked. It has the most incredible gold stitching. I am small in the bust and I was able to wear it without a bra (too hot to wear one) I am not sure if bigger bust would fit comfortably.

links_Review_Title: This was my back up dress & I ended up liking it more than my first choice. Wish I could keep it!
links_Review_Text: The dress was a smidge tight around my ribs, but not to a point that I was uncomfortable. I didn’t need to wear a bra & it gave me some good cleavage. There is beautiful gold threading throughout the lace of the dress. I just loved it.
Wore this to a wedding, looked great, classy but fun style. True to size.
The dress fit perfectly, and looked great. I got a lot of compliments!

Lovely color with gold accents, looks especially nice on darker skin tones. I didn't have to wear a bra, which was a plus in the heat. Cons: The inner lining is a bit tight and the dress runs small. I wear a M and even the L was a little tight around the rib cage.

links_Review_Title: The dress was super flattering and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I can see how for some people who have a large chest this dress could be too booby but I found it perfect. Not too much! Super comfortable, super flattering and perfect for the wedding I attended!

Wore this for a wedding rehearsal dinner. The color is a little more nude than the pink it appears in the photo, but I was also a bit sunburnt when wearing the dress so I may have washed it out a bit. Be warned, the underskirt layer is very tight. I wasn't expecting this since the bottom of the dress appears very flowy. It still fit, it was just a bit tight. There is gorgeous gold threading throughout the pink lace which gives it a bit of color and shimmer. A beautiful dress for a summer wedding or any occasion.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments, lining too tight
links_Review_Text: Dress was very pretty, I got a lot of compliments on it, but if you're debating between two sizes I would suggest the larger one, as the inside of the dress has a lining that doesn't have much give. Typically a medium would fit me perfectly but I felt restricted because the lining was a bit uncomfortable. Overall I'm glad I rented it- I would size up if i we're renting again.

I loved the shape and color of this dress! I couldn’t wear a bra with it, tried to wear the sticky bra but even that showed. It didn’t look too bad without a bra but I felt a bit unsupported. Definitely a booby dress if you’re larger chested, but overall gorgeous! I’m 5’2” and liked the length with heels. 118 lbs and the XS was snug but the S was too big on top. I went with the XS and it was comfortable all night!

links_Review_Title: Nice but kind of a meh
links_Review_Text: This dress was cute but wasn't a show stopper. Most things I get from RTR are unbelievably different in some way that always make me feel like a star- the style, the quality, the fit. This dress does not belong in that category. Much more of a blend-in-the-background type. I didn't love the color with the gold threads. It kind of looked tinsel-like and contrasting to me. Fit was great; maybe a little big in the chest, but that's not unusual for me. Overall, it matched the barn wedding I wore it to perfectly but is not something I'd order again. If you want something safe and pretty, this is your dress.

links_Review_Title: This dress was darling for graduation!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my college graduation and it was simply perfect. The small hugged all the right places and tea length made it sweet for a more formal occasion. The rose gold sparkle woven into the overlay also added something special! The only issue I encountered was with the bust -- it gaped slightly (but I'm small on top, this might have been inevitable). Highly recommend this dress -- I would definitely rent again :)

links_Review_Title: I LOVED THIS DRESS. I wore it to an outdoor California wedding and got a ton of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress is one of my favorites I've rented from RTR to date. It fits true to size, is open through the hips and hits at the knee, so it's super comfortable and easy to dance in (a huge plus!). I rented the XS and S, and the sheath on the XS was too snug on my hips. The S fit me perfectly. I wore this without a bra or dress tape (I'm a B cup) and had no concerns about falling out - fit was great through the torso, which I sometimes have trouble with because I'm so petite. The v-neck is sexy and classy, and I got compliments on the dress all night. As others have mentioned in their reviews, there's pretty gold detailing on the dress that doesn't show up in pictures.
I ordered a small and medium and wore the small even though it squished my boobs and was pretty tight in the waist. I easily could have gone up in size but the top on the medium was WAY too loose.
Loved the dress, fit true to size

To start, I am very flat-chested, so an XS fit my top half perfectly. Would recommend your normal shirt size because the bottom is flow-y enough. Length was pretty, the midi look is very "in", but I wasn't wowed by the look and ended wearing a different dress. Other reviews mention gold shimmer and maybe if I got a spray tan it would have been perfect and stuck out more, but the sparkles were minimal for me.

links_Review_Title: Great dress to mix up my wardrobe and not wear blue again
links_Review_Text: Definitely a bit revealing in the front if you're busty like me, but I say rock it! I was able to wear this with no bra was partied all night. I'm 5'6, ~160 and the Large was a good fit. Perfect dress to wear to a wedding. The length was a bit longer than I was anticipating, but if you wear heels you get those long legs you're looking for.
Fit comfortably. Easy to dance in. Love the cut of the neckline - very flattering! I didn’t need to wear a bra for this dress, with a B/C cup size. Gold details on lace visible in third photo.
I received so many compliments all night. The dress is beautiful and fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit perfectly! It was so comfortable and perfect for dancing! I didn't (couldn't) wear a bra and it gave me the perfect amount of support. The gold detailing was beautiful and I got compliments all night! I wore gold open-toed heels but it also looked great with flat gold sandals.

This dress was my first choice for my sister-in-law's wedding which was a very small, intimate affair (16 people) where even the guests were asked to wear wedding colors. Fortunately, this dress was well within the required color family. After reading previous reviews stating the the dress ran small, I decided to rent the medium (I'm usually a size 10 in dresses) and the large as a backup. The medium was a better fit. I will echo the other reviews that the zipper sticks at the center of the back, and fit is a little odd; it runs a little tight in the waist, and roomy in the bust. I did have to do a little smoothing and adjusting to get my 'girls' in position and to lay the upper fabric flat on the top of the chest and under the arms (you can see it in the photo). Despite all of the above it was quite comfortable, even after hours of eating an drinking, sitting, standing and moving I didn't have to pull or re-adjust it at all and it can be worn without a bra, though if I were to wear again, I would probably pad under the breasts. I would also note that the color is a little warmer than seen on the model, maybe closer to an apricot, especially with the gold accents on the lace. I styled it with simple gold and pearl jewelry and a pair of strappy block-healed shoes which were a fun white snake-skin with gold accents.

links_Review_Title: I got a lot of compliments. This was actually my backup dress, but I liked it too much.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit really well! I was able to wear it without a bra, no problem. Never felt like I was going to give a free show, even when dancing around like a crazy person. The skirt was so much fun to dance with too, swishing it about to Beyonce and The Jonas Brothers. If I had to change something it would be the length. It did hit at a sort of awkward place on my leg for my height, but overall would highly recommend this dress for a beautiful spring wedding.

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner for a family members wedding. The color and detailing are GORGEOUS but I have a bit of a short torso and the V fell below where the bottom of my bra strap would normally land. Super inappropriate for a family affair. I loved it so much I was able to finagle the straps to be about half their length and wear it anyway. It is a beautiful color with great detailing but be aware the V!
Wore this dress to a wedding in New Hampshire. Really great fit. Got a lot of compliments

links_Review_Title: Beautiful paired with a leather motorcycle jacket!
links_Review_Text: I had the medium and large sizes, and they both fit, but the medium was very snug. I am 34A, 30 inch waist, 40 inch hips. Great dress! As others have said, it has gold detailing throughout that doesn't show in the photos. I wore it to a fancy awards dinner that wasn't formal / black tie, the event was a notch below that. Do they call that semi-formal? Anyway. The dress alone would have felt too wedding-y for me at this event, but I paired it with a leather motorcycle jacket and loved the soft + edgy combination. Really good at showing off shoulder muscles, if you've been working on those!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stunning dress! Very comfortable and well made. Perfect for a spring or summer wedding.
links_Review_Text: I ordered a small and a medium -- both fit very well and could have easily worn either one. I wore the medium as it was slightly more brown vs rosey pink and a little more comfortable around my ribs. I'm pretty small in the bust area & didn't have to wear a bra (plus!). If you're a bit bigger in the bust, order a size up. I received many compliments and wish I owned this dress.

links_Review_Title: This dress looks much better on that the pics would suggest. Very flattering and classy fabric!
links_Review_Text: The bust is slightly loose, and there isn’t really room for a bra so support tape helps.

Loved this dress, especially the gold threading weaved throughout it. I ordered the Small and Medium. The Small fit like an Extra-Small and was too tight. The Medium was roomy on me but I had to wear it since the Small didn't fit. I received so many compliments at the wedding and definitely recommend it!

links_Review_Title: What a perfect dress for an outdoor wedding!
links_Review_Text: I was so surprised when the M fit since a lot of reviews said the dress ran smaller than usual! I would say it’s true to size. The pink color and gold detail were perfect and the fabric was so light and breezy! Definitely felt comfortable and cool. If you don’t like showing skin up top, you have been warned!
Perfect fit! Lots of compliments. Beautiful color and romantic lace. Would rent again!

This was a back up dress, so I didn’t end up wearing it. The midsection of the dress was much tighter than the rest of the dress, so I suggest going a size up if you want to breathe easy :) the lace was pretty but a little rough, and the dress flattened the little chest I do have so the same problem may be experienced by similarly small-chested women.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Very cute and flirty!
links_Review_Text: This dress runs small! I'm usually a 2/4 and rented the 8. I loved the exaggerated ruffles in the sleeve and received a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: This was such a statement dress. The sleeves really made it and the waist was extremely flattering.
links_Review_Text: This bust is very tight. I got a size higher than I normally get and it was still tight. For bigger chested gals go up especially since it does show cleavage.
Very trendy dress and worked for a black tie wedding. I received lots of compliments. The material is super thick so it can get hot. Materials also moved upward but it works!

Loved this dress and added it as a back up number in case my original didn't work. The skirt fit very nice, which indicated to me the size was on point but sadly, I could not fill out the top. The back was open so I couldn't wear a strapless padded bra and stickies didn't do the job. Definitely would recommend this if you have a larger chest to fill it out. It would have been a nice piece for a fall wedding.

Wore this to a winter wedding. Loved the floral and the texture of the dress. Waist was snug, tho I did have to keep adjusting the shoulders so they stayed in place. Bonus - didn't have to wear a bra!

links_Review_Title: That deep V in the back!
links_Review_Text: Does run a tad small, and you can not wear a bra. Not that it was necessary! But oh the compliments! It was a hit!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a formal event
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Glad I read the reviews that said to size up. I’m a 6/8 and ended up wearing the 10. It was a TAD roomie but the 8 was just too tight. Would rent again.
This runs very tight on top. I'm usually a 00 on top so it worked for me but for anyone bigger on top would be too tight. Rode up a bit throughout the night but got a ton of compliments.
This dress is exactly what I was expecting! The material was elegant and fit wonderfully. Very happy with this rental
Very flattering! A little darker in color than expected but cute. It was a tad big in the shoulders but fit overall. I am usually between sizes - I went with the bigger size ordered for length.

Perfect dress for my husband's residency graduation ceremony! The Size 4 fit great in the chest & shoulders so I didn't have to wear a bra, slightly tight in the tummy, but the seam along the neckline was wonky so I'm glad I had the size 6 for backup! Size 6 fit fine, but wasn't form fitting enough for me to get away with no bra, and I did have to adjust frequently through the night because it kept showing with the deep V but no big deal. This dress was absolutely SHOWSTOPPING. I don't think I've ever received more compliments before!

I loved this cute little number. Zips up the side and is mostly comfortable. I found the length to be perfect when standing but when sitting the whole dress did not have a lot of give and rode up a bit. The fabric is quite thick. My torso is average but I found that since the dress was not stretchy I would often have space between my shoulders and the shoulders of the dress when sitting and the straps would occasionally want to slip down off my shoulders. I got a ton of compliments though as this is a turkey unique dress

links_Review_Title: I loved the dress. It was so classy and perfect for a wedding. Dress was a perfect length.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a size 6, but size 4 worked perfect. I am 5’2, 120 lbs.

links_Review_Title: Loved it! So unique and fun!!
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress! It definitely runs small so size up. (Wore the 6 normally a true 4) I received so many compliments - there's just enough flare to make this little black dress stand out!

links_Review_Title: the fabric is thick so no bra required!!
links_Review_Text: Loved this. It fit perfectly for my body type. Size 8
Great dress for Kentucky derby party. Form fitting under the bust but fit well overall. Fun and flirty. Would definitely rent again.
Fits like all reviews say. A little tight on top so probably best to size up to be safe. Got a lot of compliments and was comfortable!
Very cute and sexy dress. I had to remove my bra so that I wasn't all cleavage. Dress was perfectly short, and tailored beautifully.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for an April garden wedding.
links_Review_Text: It was fun and flirty and I got tons of compliments. The fabric was stretchy so it was really comfortable to wear and great on the dance floor.

links_Review_Title: GREAT Dress... Runs small so size up. I typically wear a 6, glad I ordered an 8
links_Review_Text: So many compliments.
Dress runs true to size! I received so many compliments in this dress. One of my favorites!

I rented this dress for a friend's wedding. I'm 5'7", 150lbs and ordered my normal size 10 and then a 12 as backup based on other reviews saying it runs small. The 10 was actually perfect! The dress was on the shorter side, but not inappropriate for a wedding in a church. I wear a DD and I didn't have to wear a bra because the dress was rather snug in the chest (which I prefer). Overall, I loved the dress, received tons of compliments, and even considered purchasing it.

I wore this Gorgeous dress with thick material for my birthday dinner. Definitely go up one size, as if fits small. You will need body tape if you are small chested like I am. Got tons of compliments!!

Everyone said this dress runs small so I got a 16 when I normally wear a 10 or 12, and I'm glad I did! It was very flattering but kind of short. VERY booby so wear a cami or dress watch out lol loved it for a vacation wear but probably won't rent again

links_Review_Title: 1000+ gals and no one had THIS dress!
links_Review_Text: I went larger for length and to ensure I could dance the night away. Length made shoulder looser, fair trade. Was concerned I wouldn't have "enough" to fill out the low cut front and it worked out beautifully- compliments all night. Ruffles flip up which is a pain and I've seen it in other reviews. Wasn't horrible though. I initially ordered a 16 (I'm a size 14) and needed to go up. The dress was super flattering and I felt amazing in it. Definitely a unique cute dress!

links_Review_Title: Wore it to a Grammy Week party, and received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me perfectly. It made me feel slim and sexy. The unique fabric flair does an excellent job of drawing attention away from my mommy tummy! Extremely flattering.

links_Review_Title: Cute with an edge of sexy. Shows off cleavage nicely
links_Review_Text: Wanted to rent a dress for date night. This one is perfect. My top rental so far. I am usually a 2 but rented a 4. Boy sure glad I did. Even at 4 I could barely get the zipper up. If you have anything like a C cup I would size up. The material is super nice and thick. The dress is really feminine and flirty. The front and back are low enough to be sexy but not in your face
I had so much fun wearing this dress to a cocktail party. I felt like a wicked forest queen.

I ordered this for my birthday, it was my first RTR. Normally I'd order a size 6, and an 8 as a backup but after reading the reviews that it ran small, I ordered an 8 and ended up wearing the 10. I honestly think the sizing is just weird on this dress, because although the waist fit, the shoulders were way too big for me -- not surprisingly bc I don't wear a size 10. I'd say pass on this one.

links_Review_Title: never have received so many compliments
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress it was so flattering, but runs super small in chest and waist. Definitely order up one if not two sizes. I got so many compliments and it was a perfect dress that once it was zipped felt great and comfortable
This is the shortest dress I've ever tried on. The top was very baggy and the mid-section was extremely tight.

links_Review_Title: This is one of the most beautiful dresses I have ever worn!!
links_Review_Text: I was excited to receive this dress brand new with the tags still on and rock it for the iHeartRadio Festival in Vegas in September. I was a little warm when I was outside, but once inside for the concert, it was perfect. The stunning detail material, front and back plunges...colors -- just a knockout dress. I was stopped by at least 15 women during the course of the evening. It's a one-of-a-kind dress that I don't think I could pull off again, but I will cherish the memories it created. It is super short so I wore with a smaller heel.
It does run a bit small but I ended up being able to wear my true size. So much fun and comfortable!
Loved this dress! Super comfy, super flattering - didn't even need to wear a bra!

I wore this for a fall wedding and it worked great! As other reviewers mentioned-it does run very small! I sized up a size from my usual 6 and the 8 worked great although it was a bit constricting in the rib cage. Very pretty and well made dress, my only complaint was even after steaming, the ruffles on the bottom and sleeves kept flipping up to show the underside of the fabric but it really was not a big deal

links_Review_Title: Rent the Runway helped me clean up real good :)
links_Review_Text: This was my alternate, but tried it on and took pix. Fit great everywhere. Super cute and fun. Appropriate for fancy or just a fun night out. The best part of it is the "wings" on the shoulders. It would have been lame if they didn't stay structured but the material is very sturdy and kept it's shape. Would have chosen a size down if available for it to be perfect-perfect, but the 6 looked great. If you're smaller on top, maybe size down. Had to keep pulling the shoulders back up due to a lack of boob to hold them tight. :)

I loved everything about this dress. The unique shoulders flare, the kimono fabric and the flirty mini length. The waist is quite fitted. I normally wear a size 14 but this is a size 16 and it just barely zipped at the waist.

This dress does run a little tight at the bust like other reviewers have shared so definitely get one size up. You'll need help with the zipper! The material is thick and gorgeous. And there are so many colors to Choose from. Worn with LIZZIE FORTUNATO Burgundy Parrot Earrings

links_Review_Title: Fun, different dress, compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful and so different, but it is SHORT! If you are curvier it rides up a little bit. The ruffles kept flipping up as well. I'm not sure if it's a dress flaw or intentional, but if you have hips and a backend you don't need the extra ruffles.

Usually between a size 6-8 but since I saw it ran small I got an 8 and 10.(definitely recommend) The 8 for this dress was very tight especially around the stomach. I'm 5'4 and more pear shaped so the size 10 I got as a back up was just too big on my upper body so I wore the size 8. The side zipper takes a little to zip all the way since it is tight. Other than it being snug, I loved wearing it and got a lot of complements. Perfect for that summer to fall transition weddings.
Great to wear for a festive and elegant look around the holidays. The back is sheer so depending on the setting you might want to wear a cami underneath or sticky bra to avoid bra showing.
Not overly soft, a little stiff. Fits true to size, just an FYI the back is sheer but the front hides your bra.

I loved wearing this shirt, it felt special and sexy and my husband loved the keyhole back. You'll need to wear it with a strapless backless bra, and it's a little itchy as other reviews have mentioned. But if neither of those things matter to you, it's a wonderful top for a date night or night out with your friends.
Don’t like the materials, too stiff. And fabric is itchy
It is a bit boxy and awkward fitting. Runs on the short side

Very beautiful top. True to size but has no stretch to it. It is thick lace over some sort of organza material that doesn't stretch at all. I am usually size small and 34D and it fit me just right. It is not very breathable so you might get hot in it . I woke it for a dinner gathering and got tons of compliments.
The shirt is a gorgeous red... but the lace is a little stiff and somewhat uncomfortable....but then again beauty is pain LOL
Not the most comfortable but def an impressive top for work
Elegant classy and good for most events or work

links_Review_Title: Not a great fit, fantastic color
links_Review_Text: Baggy in the stomach and neck detail didn't stay up. Color is outstanding, though. Back is completely sheer so you can't wear a normal or strapless bra with it.

I was skeptical from the other reviews saying how the top was "itchy". It was a little rough but after a minute of wearing it the feeling went away and wasn't noticeable. I also don't usually wear anything that goes up to my neck because I am a (32D) busty for my frame 5'3" @ 115lbs and was afraid the top would fall or lay funny on me but it didn't! There is no stretch but plenty of "room" to move. I wore the XS, the only difference between the small and x-small was the sleeve length. High waisted bottoms or skirt worked best for me, I ended up wearing the dark denim jeans. Will rent again!
This top was absolutely stunning. Tons of complements! I ended up wearing a small but could have even gone to an XS. Top definitely runs big in the arms.
Wore this top for a holiday party and it was perfect! The back is lace with no lining, so it wouldn't be work appropriate without an additional undershirt.

The sleeves are long which is great because I'm tall (5'11"). The lace, the keyhole cutout in the back and all of the details are lovely! Highly recommend. Received tons of compliments! See more on my page at @WithLoveAndStyle on Instagram!
Lace is a little scratchy. Looked great on, but needed another person to help me take the item off because the fabric has zero give.

Really like this top. Feels nice on. Kind of stiff but the fit is right for my body. It is short in length so when i raise my arms, like to put on a coat, my stomach showed...which my seven year old daughter liked to point out. Ha! Lots of compliments.
This top is very pretty. But super itchy! Couldn't take it. Had to send back.
The back is see-through, so in order to wear it to work, you need to wear an undershirt
Too itchy and too stiff of fabric
The shoulders were really wide and way too big, and the blouse itself was boxy and itchy. Not good for my petite frame.

links_Review_Title: Very cute top, pretty and thick lace. A little oldish and dated looking once on.
links_Review_Text: A little grandama'ish but beautiful material
As others have said, it's itchy. But it's pretty. I tried it on and never wore it out of the house because I wasn't comfortable.
Sheer back, couldn't wear to work. Wouldn't want to as it's thick and itchy.

I'm 6 feet tall, so it was pretty short on me. I paired it with some high waisted black pants, and people loved it. Big hit! Even my hubs commented, and that's a win (for all you married women out there).
Material is really rough I couldn't wear it but it was really cute.

This is a shirt that is worth the discomfort - for a little while, at least. The pattern is gorgeous and the back cutout is a fun touch. However, it doesn't have any stretch and the fabric was a little itchy to me. I wore a nude bra and it worked fine with with the sheer back.

links_Review_Title: Pretty lace, not a great fit
links_Review_Text: The color and lace is very pretty but the top was pretty boxy and the sleeves were puffed so overall it was not figure flattering. Maybe if I sized down it would be better but the back is also not lined so I didn't love that it would show my bra.

links_Review_Title: I'm a sucker for lace, and the red lace on this top is beautiful!
links_Review_Text: I feel the top fit true to size. I didn't realize that the back of the top does not have a liner/cami to go with it, so a nude bra is necessary.
The blouse is very classy. It's somewhat hard to take off. If you don't want the sheerness in the back, a cami is a great asset to this blouse .
Great for everyday wear or for work paired with a jacket or for a fun night out.

You definitely will want to size up for this blouse to feel comfortable. The lace is a tad itchy, especially under the arms. Also, long wasted girls beware, as it runs short. The other issue with the blouse is that the collar is a bit floppy and doesn't stay up. It's a minor issue, but one I want to point out, if that would be bothersome. But, all of that aside, it is a beautiful blouse! The color, lace detail, and opening in the back make this a fabulous/classy/sexy rental for a special occasion. I wore pasties because of the open detail in the back of the blouse. Multiple compliments!
runs true to size through shoulders but fit boxy through the waist
Fit true to size. Basic pretty top for work or a date!
This top looked great in pictures but the material was a bit stiff in real life and not very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: It was in New York City and I didn't feel frumpy
links_Review_Text: I have small shoulders and a narrow back so this was loose in the body the rest fit very nicely

it's designed for taller women with curvier build. It looked boxy on my straight & narrow build. I have long limbs for someone who's 5'3'' and the sleeves were still way too long. Sadly, I returned it without wearing. But if you can bring the shape and you're tall enough, it's a great top for a holiday party!
itchy

links_Review_Title: Lovely top! Was perfect for a holiday date night out!
links_Review_Text: Fit well, great for holiday party or date night. Paired with jeans and heels.

links_Review_Title: Great color--size up for larger chest
links_Review_Text: I recommend sizing up if you are well endowed in the chest area and/or if you require a bra for support. The color is great and vibrant, I got lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Cute, but was a little scratchy....
links_Review_Text: This is a cute & versatile top. Easy to dress up or take casual & fun! For me it was a little scratchy & seemed slightly faded. I only wore it once, even though I kept thinking I would wear it for a few more things. It always seemed to be my last choice so sent back.

links_Review_Title: I received so many looks and compliments and 1 proposal. lol
links_Review_Text: fit Great all PRO no CON

I didn't get to wear this out as the event was cancelled but I enjoyed getting to wear it for a night in. I was between the two sizes and wore the larger for comfort. I didn't want to take it off, it was very flattering.

links_Review_Title: all the compliments on the dress
links_Review_Text: comfortable, fit perfectly, great material,

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, loved it! Highly recommend. Forgiving fit and very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Loved wearing this dress, great fit, beautiful dress!

This was the perfect dress for a formal gala! I ordered the LR and am typically a size 8, on the curvy side. This fit me like a glove Even without shapewear! I love the red color and I received so many compliments! The slit hits about mid thigh, so sexy but not too crazy. Would definitely recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous and comfortable! I loved the way the skirt moved when I walked. Glamorous dress.
links_Review_Text: As other reviews have mentioned, the color isn’t red. It is more like a burnt orange. I thought it was really pretty, but had some trouble finding nail polish and lip color to complement it.
I normally wear size 2-4 and the Small Petite fit perfectly. Great color - not bright red, has a little orange undertone which makes it stand out more. I received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: I received several compliments on this dress & it was perfect for my formal gala! Very classy!
links_Review_Text: Someone described it as "Jessica Rabbit"-Definitely! It fits like a glove. I wore a strapless bra and then high-waisted Spanx shorts to make things smooth out, so there were no lines showing (especially on the booty). I then paired it with some leopard accessories & it was a hit! This dress made for a beautiful evening of memories!

The dress is gorgeous - I got so many compliments. I'm 5'7" and wore comfortable 1.5" heels, and it was the perfect length. It gives you enough room to dance, and the detail of the one shoulder with the draping in the back made it incredibly unique. The red was perfect for a holiday party, and thick enough that I didn't need to wear leggings or anything underneath for the cold weather, besides a coat on top. Highly recommend!

The dress is so beautiful. The way the fabric crosses in front and sways in the back is gorgeous. The slit is high and adds drama but makes it challenging to wear spanx if you feel like you want them.

links_Review_Title: Fabulously made dress; would rent it again for a different occasion.
links_Review_Text: The dress was comfortable and ran true to size or maybe even just a bit small. If you normally wear a size 10 you likely need to get the next size up.

This dress is so beautiful. It's really high quality and is very forgiving- didn't need to wear Spanx. It did wrinkle around the tummy area after sitting for a couple hours, which is why I only gave it 4 stars. I have large breasts and wore a strapless bra with no problem with it showing. Great rental!

I'm 5'6" and about 160lbs, the L was a tiny bit large on me but perfectly comfortable. I didn't order a M so I don't know if it would have fit or looked better but I was so happy with the dress all night, it kept up with me and was secure, and was super flattering!

The bright but elegant red color is a show stopper. Fabric feels just like cotton linen in the best way - I kept touching the dress because the material is so soft and luxurious! I danced all night in this dress with no issues. It's snug but not too snug, you'll need to wear spanx/thong underneath. I also did not have to wear a bra! Perfect for holidays or any other kind of party.

links_Review_Title: You need to be REALLY tall to wear this, I am 5'8" and it was REALLY long.
links_Review_Text: It's more orange-y than red, but it was fine, everyone complimented me for a Red Tie event. I wouldn't buy it, but it was worth the rental price.
Size 8/ height 5'8" /36C - fit like a glove, got so many compliments, easy to dance in.

links_Review_Title: The dress was comfortable and I felt beautiful.
links_Review_Text: Great fit. I wear a 2 or a 4. I went with the 4 and it was perfect. Super comfortable. A little long but with heels it was not an issue. I'm 5'2 and weigh 112.

links_Review_Title: Not red - more like a hue of sunburnt orange.
links_Review_Text: Didn't even try it on all the way because of the color.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! I received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit absolutely perfectly. Definitely needed tiny heels though with the regular length being 5'7".
Super flattering, really loved it, glad I ordered it!!

links_Review_Title: Bright like green perfect for MIAMI!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a work event on south beach, it was in the sand so couldn't wear heels, the dress was the perfect length and looked super chic with the bright color, but so comfortable !
I got sooooo many compliments on this dress. The color is fantastic!

links_Review_Title: Bright like a jogging shirt but fun
links_Review_Text: I'm between a size 0 and two. size 2 there is no stretch in the legs and the top big on me. Used stick on nipple covers and very low profile underwear. I move the tie from the back of the neck to the side of my neck so I could wear a cute Jean jacket with it and still see the bow. The brown stretchy belt help to give me a waist since the dress was a little large on me. If you are curvy in the hips and thighs you'll want to do the size up like I did. My girlfriends thought it was cute dress
Loved this dress ! Fit great and a perfect length !
Much less formal than I imagined. Works for a fun date or a cute night out in the town. Love the bright color. Follow me @americatravels on IG for more!

Perfect in every way. The color, length, fit. Great for a leggy girl like myself who has a short torso. Although, The material can be a little unforgiving, nothing black spandex shorts didn't fix. Will rent again in the future.

Perfect for a weekend in Miami. The 8 justtt fit, and I'm usually a 6/8, so I'd say this runs a little on the small side. The color is a bright yellow/lime. Would rent again or get the longer style from Halston for another event!

links_Review_Title: Holiday dress for your inner Grinch
links_Review_Text: Obsessed with this look. Wore it for a holiday party and the neon green was a perfect contract to the sea of black and sequins. Wore with velvet booties and a massive faux fur coat. Can't wait to rent for something in summer as well!

The fit was spot on. It was comfy, cute and classy. You can dress this up or down. The color is awesome! It's a little brighter than in the picture but it can be work for day or an evening outing. No jewelry is really necessary with this dress. Made me feel like I could move around but it was still fitted. Would definitely rent again!
Love this designer. Wore this with a longer black blazer to balance it out for business formal office. Long enough for my short stature for work.
So cute and fun! Size up if you have even a little bit larger than average booty/thighs it's fairly slim cut in that area with no stretch

links_Review_Title: Felt terrific in dress. Received many compliments
links_Review_Text: Fits perfectly. I am 5. ' 9" perfect fit
I LOVE this dress. The color is everything! The 2 was the slightest bit big, but I'm not sure the zero would've fit - May have been to snug! So it worked out great.

This dress fit true to size and was comfortable. I'd recommend getting a spray tan if you plan on wearing this dress and are light complected. I felt like the color of the dress made me look even more pale than I was (I have a spray tan in the pic). So this is nothing against the dress but hopefully this advice helps someone!
One of my most favorite rentals! Endless compliments.

links_Review_Title: The most comfortable! Got so many compliments on the color
links_Review_Text: Love the color, received many compliments and loved the high neckline and lightweight fabric. Made it easy to dance all night at a wedding.

links_Review_Title: Such a fun dress for a bachelorette party in Mexico!
links_Review_Text: Got so many compliments on this neon dress - was perfect for our night out in Mexico celebrating the bride. Was super comfortable to dance in and not too short. Would definitely rent again.
This was easy to wear, light material and fun! The draping is flattering. Probably could have sized down one, but overall a good fit.

links_Review_Title: Fit like a glove, perfect party dress!
links_Review_Text: This Halston dress was the perfect party dress! I wore the 8, fit like a glove! No bra necessary (and I always wear a bra!). Beautiful material, lined. Just gorgeous.

links_Review_Title: Perfect rehearsal dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress for my brother's rehearsal and rehearsal dinner by the ocean. It was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Perfect color and cut for a summer outing!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to my best friend's rehearsal dinner and received many compliments! The neon color photos well (thank goodness I had a tan!) I think I could have squeezed myself into a size 8, but didn't want to wear Spanx the entire night. The only thing I didn't love was the hanging part in the front of the dress, but apparently it's supposed to hang loose like that. Would definitely recommend!

This dress was the perfect summertime dress! The color popped and the dress was light and breezy. Definitely true to size. I received so many compliments on the color and style all night. Gorgeous dress!!

links_Review_Title: I wish I didn't have to return it!!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for and outdoor/indoor wedding. I rented a 4 and 2 as my additional size. I usually wear a 4 and the 4 fit perfectly. I have a larger size chest but there was plenty of room and fit just right. It was a really hot 90 degree day so the material was perfect for how hot it was. If I could have kept this dress I would have. I received so many compliments on it and would most likely rent it again!

links_Review_Title: This dress definitely made a statement
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for a destination wedding in Jamaica and I got tons of complements. I rented the 6 and the 8 bc I would normally wear the 6, but after a week of resort eating was much more comfortable in the 8 . Lol
What a great dress to rent for a summer wedding on the beach! The color was fun, and the material was lightweight. Works nicely with a strapless bra. I would definitely rent this dress again!
Fit was a little tight in the midsection so wore the 2. Great color very flattering!

Great dress for a petite, athletic figure. I fluctuate between size 0 and 2, went with the 2 because there is no stretch to this fabric. It was comfortable, flattering, and that COLOR though! I was able to eat, dance, and sit comfortably in this dress without having to fuss with it. I did not wear a bra with it (32C) and, even though the fabric is light, I felt comfortable. You could easily wear a strapless bra though, if you need the support or want the coverage.

Loved this dress and got a TON of compliments from guys and gals! I fit into the size 2 just fine but I'm in my late 40s so the size 4 gave me a little more length. The fabric is a lovely weight (not too thin but lightweight for summer) and the green is bright but not 80s neon. I felt like it was just the right amount of sexy and fun without trying too hard - and comfy too!

I'm 5'2" with a petite frame and usually wear a size 2-3, but ended up wearing the size 0. Cup size 32B. Not much give in the waist or chest area for the curvier and bustier women btw. Wore this to a wedding and received compliments all day and night long. I wore a 3" heel and had no issues moving around in the dress. Just remember to pull the back side down when sitting because it hikes up when you bend down. Loved the color - bright inbetween a green and yellow. Would def rent this again!
I wore the size 8. I'm 5'2 and 145lbs. The dress is very forgiving in the tummy area. I was comfortable all night!

links_Review_Title: A bit boxy, but great color
links_Review_Text: Not the most flattering dress on if you have a small waist- it creates a boxy illusion. But still a cute dress and would wear again!

I would call this dress the pistachio perfection! A total head turner even in Las Vegas! Classy and dressy and extremely flattering. Make sure you have spanks on as it's very short and shows every curve. Would highly recommend

links_Review_Title: LOOOOVE this dress! color is fab, its lined and super flattering!
links_Review_Text: fits great everywhere. it is a little thin so im going to wear a spanx half slip with it.
It was such a fun dress to wear and it fit incredibly well. I received tons of compliments and didn't have to adjust myself once! Highly recommend but it looks even better with a spray tan.

links_Review_Title: Great for salsa dancing. Lots of room to move and covered all the right places.
links_Review_Text: Great pop of color and easy to put on. Nice for warm weather nights.

I rented this to wear to a concert and this dress was a showstopper! The color was generally something I don't consider but I wanted to try something new and was not disappointed. The dress runs true to size with no stretch to the fabric, and due to the zipper being in the back, I needed assistance. If you're looking for something new to spice up your wardrobe, I recommend this dress!
This dress is so nice! Unfortunately it was too big in the waist. I'm defiantly going to get it down 1 size.

links_Review_Title: Pretty Color Runs Big in the Waist
links_Review_Text: I love the design of this dress. But it didn't flatter my figure as it ran big in the waist.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic color. Material was thicker than it appears so covers nicely.
links_Review_Text: Fits wonderfully and I didn't need any jewelry. It was perfect as is.
Loved it, wore it twice! I usually wear a size small for tops and it fit well. You can't see it as much in this photo but helloooo cleavage!

links_Review_Title: Loved it but used safety pins for extra support!
links_Review_Text: I loved how this paired with a long skirt to elevate the look! I ended up having to safety pin it because I was worked it was too revealing otherwise. Fashion tape would have worked as well
Super cute top but I can't wear it without fashion tape or my bra is completely showing.
It was a little too cropped for me but I still loved this shirt. Easy to dress up jeans.

I really loved this shirt, however, the fit is a little strange. It's more of a crop than the picture makes it seems and a bit baggy in the bust, so I would recommend it more for larger chests. I loved the color and it's comfortable and in good condition.
Great option to have in wardrobe! I pinned the center to keep it from showing my bra.

Wore this as the top of an Indian outfit with a printed skirt. The velvet was beautiful and it had the perfect amount of cleavage with a necklace. The only downside is that the fit was a bit weird and in order to make it lay flat, I had to use a couple of safety pins instead of just wrapping it like it should fit. But they held all night and my outfit got a lot of compliments!

The top part of the shirt fit fine but I felt like the bottom of the shirt was a little bigger so when I went to tie the top there was too much overlap. Top looks a little darker in person but still super cute!
