Beautiful deep midnight blue velvet top, condition was brand new when arrived. Wore with black lace bra and black leather pants. Bought top immediately to open up new return bag/ item from RTR unlimited, was hoping for more items like this in Unlimited, but unfortunately, this was the only one that turned out like this. Only $21 to purchase, so great value.
Not a huge fan. I have a slim torso and this is meant for someone that's a little wider.
Runs a little big so I had to toe it really tight but then the bow was sort of bulky.

links_Review_Title: Love the material! Wish my boobs stayed tucked in.
links_Review_Text: I absolutely love this shirt. It is so cute. The wrap allows for some adjustment in the high hip area, but the chest area is not forgiving. I have a large chest, so I needed to pin this shut. Double sided tape wasn't working for me. After safety pinning it, I felt confident and comfortable. My s/o couldn't keep their hands off it either! Will wear again. Might possible buy when it goes on sale.

I was so disappointed in the fit of this top. It's huge in the bust area and I couldn't wear it without my bust being almost completely out. Even with a bralette, I don't feel like it fit well. It seems like it was made for someone with a much larger bust, even though I rented an XS and have a C cup. The tie straps were also a little strange and I couldn't figure out how to get it tied to look like it does on the model. I did like the fabric, but the color is much darker navy (almost black) than shown in the photo.
While the velvet is very pretty, I could find no way to wear this that would even come close to to covering my bust!

links_Review_Title: Wish I had more places to wear to
links_Review_Text: Def a low cut shirt but small breasts = not a problem for me. Would rent again
I rented a medium and it was definitely on the smaller side. Get a size up, if your shoulders are on the broader side, this top may not be for you.
The fit is a bit small, but overall I loved this top. I'm smaller chested so I'm not sure how a large chested woman could wear this.
Fit well but did not end up wearing
This was a little large so I had to pin the center together a bit to keep from falling out. It is a bit short but so am I do it totally worked out and came to just the top of my jeans. So soft!

The material and color of this top is awesome but it was absolutely massive on top for me. The shirt gaped so badly and there was honestly no way to remedy it. I ended up wearing my jacket all night to keep it covered up.

links_Review_Title: Okay, arm holes were very small and tight but the shirt is cute
links_Review_Text: It hits in a flattering place on the waist
The fit was fine but not super flattering. You definitely need a bandeau or something underneath. I ended up not wearing it; the tie makes it difficult to layer with a jacket in the winter

I didn't end up wearing this because it was lower cut and more cropped than I thought from the pictures. I thought it'd be cute for work but it wasn't appropriate. It was nice and I'd probably wear it if I was going out somewhere. I just dont have any occasion for it currently so I returned it.

links_Review_Title: Great Cut! More of a Midriff
links_Review_Text: Loved the cut of it, unfortunately it came just below my rib cage. Might be cute with ultra high-rise.

The top is cute, but definitely more like a crop as other folks mentioned - I ended up not wearing it because it showed a bit too much stomach for my taste. But the feel & color were great, it was a bummer to not wear it.
This looked awesome!! Will purchase. Runs a little big.

links_Review_Title: It can be revealing if you don't use tape.
links_Review_Text: Good fit overall. Nice rich color.
This shirt is tiny.
Great top but maybe better for bustier gals? I needed to pin it so it didn't gap open and even then if I leaned over it kinda flops open.

links_Review_Title: Great top, I'm pairing it with black satin pants, but it would also be great with jeans.
links_Review_Text: I'm smaller chested, and have to pin it closed. Someone with a fuller chest might not have to pin it. Be prepared for cleavage showing.

links_Review_Title: Cute top but its a crop top, not regular fit.
links_Review_Text: Cute top but its a crop top, not regular fit.

The fit of this dress is great, it truly shows off the best parts of your physique and slims you down at the same time. I wore this to an awards ceremony and felt like a rock star. Rent this for that "bad girl" vibe
Fit perfect! It was soft, comfortable, and edgy. First item that I rented and purchased to keep!
High quality and perfect for any occasion

I wore this dress for an award luncheon. It was perfect. It was conservative but with style. The dress is black lace with black leather accents. More of a fit and flair style. The zipper was strong and easy to zip. Super comfortable and stylish. One of my favorites...

links_Review_Title: Great upgrade from a basic work dress
links_Review_Text: Fit right in the arms. A bit loose in the waist and hips, and was on the longer side (not necessarily a bad thing for work). Loved the lace and leather combo -- made it subtly unique for a black dress.
Nice fit. The leather stripes are cool.
I loved everything about this dress and my boyfriend loved it too. When he saw me he said it looked like something one of the Starks would wear on GOT.
Cute dress! Nice fit. Lots of compliments. Not my standard attire but what's great about RTR is you can try something edgy...and then send it back.
This dress fits loose on my torso, but I'm afraid if I size down, I won't be able to move in the shoulders. Regardless, the dress is super cute and I'll still wear it to work or on date night!
I dont have a small waist therefore it was little too tight there but still ok
Wore a few times, with heels and also tights and boots. Dress is on the heavy side, def more appropriate for cold weather. It fit me well and was comfortable to wear.
Wore this for my sisters bday dinner. It was so cute! Also wore this work and it was the perfect transition outfit. The dress was comfortable and cute.

Absolutely loved this dress for work to going out. It received compliments from my male and female coworkers. I'm typically a 6/8 and I ordered up based upon other recommendations. I was happy I did, as it definitely seemed like it could've squished my chest otherwise. Would definitely consider renting again.

This was a fun cool piece. I normally wear 8/10 but I wasn't sure the fit so I got the 42. Which was too big around the waist but was fine. I however was glad I did get the larger size because the sleeves were a little snug, but I don't have skinny arms. Overall thought it's a fun cool piece to wear with fish net stockings or bold shoes!
This dress is everything. It's fun, sexy, well made, and a complete joy to wear. Highly recommend. TTS
The dress was perfect for the cool weather. It did puff out weird around the waist, but not enough to be extremely noticeable. Got lots of compliments all night!
Loved this rock style dress, very comfy & perfect for work, a date & a party! @PriscilleCanivet
Thought this was kind of odd at first since the leather "bands"cause the lace to pucker a bit, but ended up really liking it. Has a forgiving fit and a cool vibe.
This dress fit like a glove, perfect for pear shape!! The details of the leather strips was gorgeous!! I would like to keep this one!

links_Review_Title: Date night dress trying to keep the sexy factor for the hubby!
links_Review_Text: This dress's unique details lies in the leather straps that are stitched across the chest. Although sexy they also "flatten" the chest area a little bit, nothing a padded bra can't help solve. The A-line was flattering and the half sleeves also different. A nice dress for a fall or spring event.
Loved it!
This is so different form what I️ normally wear but it's such a fun flattering dress, I️ love it

links_Review_Title: Best for a tall, not busty body.
links_Review_Text: After reading all the other reviews I ordered a size up and was still tight in the chest & arms, but loose in the waist. I did wear it & it was cute, just not as good as I wanted it to be.

links_Review_Title: Unflattering and stiff - not bust friendly.
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love this dress. It's work appropriate and still a bit edgy with the leather trim. The dress is thick and heavy - terrible for the heatwave we're currently in but perfect for a crisp fall day. Unfortunately, the leather trim is much tighter than the rest of the dress leaving me looking like I was bulging between leather stripes when really it was just the material bunching up. The leather trim around the hips hit me a bit too low and caused the dress to bunch up into a sort of muffin top. The arms are incredibly tight though I do play softball so maybe I just have larger arms? I couldn't reach up to put my hair into a ponytail. The worst part was the leather across the chest dug in so much that it gave me two boobs per side - half a boob above the leather and the other half below - and flattened me into an unflattering, lumpy, uniboob.

links_Review_Title: If you're short-waisted at all, this won't work.
links_Review_Text: I have long legs and short torso (also known as petite). If you're even a little bit short-wasted, this dress gaps and doesn't flow. It buckles and looks horrid.

links_Review_Title: Rented for work, did not wear
links_Review_Text: I did not wear this. The waist was huge but the leather bands cut awkwardly into my bust.
Torso is long so if you have a short torso, it will bunch up

links_Review_Title: Cute and edgy style. Tight fitting arms
links_Review_Text: Really fun style. Structured and flattering. But very tight Fitting arms, no stretch because of the leather bands, it doesn't move well because of that also, so limited range of motion, cute for dinner, but not for dancing.
Pretty dress but way to tight.
I ended up not wearing it to the event but I tried it on and looked beautiful. It is elegant and go well with boots
Tight in the chest, big through the midsection and very long skirt.
Cute Dress. Tight through the chest. Didn't get to wear it.
This dress fits tight in the shoulders and the lowest leather stripe hits well below the natural waist in a style seen in 1920's shift dresses. Not flattering

links_Review_Title: Cut is not all that flattering
links_Review_Text: Didn't love the cut of the waist. Wasn't unflattering, just wasn't flattering.
This dress is a perfect mix of sassy and conservative. You can wear a standard bra and Spanx. Lots of compliments!
Very pretty dress but thick material. Would be better for fall
Arms were a little snug but all in all darling!
Did not wear. Fabric scrunched in a weird way where it met the leather. not flattering.

links_Review_Title: I wore the other dress I rented
links_Review_Text: I rented two dresses because there was only one size of the other dress I was renting (i.e. no back up size). There was nothing wrong with the dress. It just wasn't my favorite. I didn't love the other dress either, but since I rented two dresses, I was going to wear one!

Based on the reviews I sized up, but while it fit perfectly in the bust and arms, it was loose in the waist. Also, I saw some reviews where shorter women said the waist was too long. I'm 5'4", and the waist was too long. It didn't hit me right, even though I've never considered myself short-waisted (just short). If I lose a couple of sizes, I'm coming back to this dress, but for now it doesn't work for me.

links_Review_Title: Already rented this skirt several times. Love it!
links_Review_Text: Fit is a little small, and material isn't super breathable, but overall I still love this skirt. I rented it a few times - vacation, worn to work, and just out with friends. Highly recommend!
Fits so well and can dress up or down

links_Review_Title: Perfect for mix & match in Thailand
links_Review_Text: Based on other reviews went with size S vs XS. My waist is about 26in, hips 36in. I rented both the top and bottom to take Thailand and over the 2 weeks I was there I was able to mix and match both with shorts and tanks tops, dress up/down. Loved it so much I considered purchasing both!
I rented this for vacation but it ended up coming late, so I wore it with a sweater and tennis shoes. It was comfortable and added something fun to rainy day weather outfit.

It was a little tight at the waist but overall a perfect fit and so cute! I received a lot of compliments. I highly recommend wearing a slip or biker shorts underneath for an added layer of protection.
Wore to a baby shower, the medium fitme wonderfully. It is such a pretty floral skirt. Couldn’t have been happier

Lightweight, on trend, casual or dressy, runs small. I wasn't even close to getting this zipped over my hips but like a lot of people, hiked it up and it was fine. Very cute. Worth a rent but size up. Note - there is a tiny strip of elastic near the top which helps but most of it does not have any give.
This skirt runs a little small but I just wore it higher on my waist. It is absolutely Cornelia. Highly recommend for an evening on the town

Although it fits me ok, I'd admit it's running slightly small so recommend to size up. Material is very soft and comfortable. I rent for vacation but it's a very versatile one to create different types of looks
Very pretty and comfortable.
Awesome fit and so fun for summer wedding

Loved this skirt and received so many compliments. The colors and print are better in person. I did feel like it was a bit smaller than expected. I typically wear a size 4/6 in dresses, but I wish I had sized up to a medium (I had to wear it really high on my waist). Highly recommend!
Wore this to work and a party, got lots of compliments
This skirt was high quality, silky material. The length is great and it can be dressed up or down.

links_Review_Title: Satin skirt with a funky pattern and summer color palette
links_Review_Text: Fit TTS and was a lot of fun to style! Loved the pattern and colors of this satin skirt.

This fit great, the side zipper was a little weird when zipping but not a big deal. Slim in the waist and high waisted so perfect for an hourglass figure. Super flowy and perfect for hot desert weather. Will definitely rent again
a little tight in the waist
Very small; more like a size 6
Usually a s/m had to reorder a large. That being said the large fit and looked awesome.
Could be dressed up or down easily, the fabric is high quality and the pattern is beautiful. I wore with a simple white tank top and jean jacket to work.

links_Review_Title: Cute print, ok construction, runs small
links_Review_Text: i wear are 29 jean and 8 dress--the Large did not fit over my hips at all

I fell head over heels for this gown. The fabric had enough stretch that the garment hugged my every single curve. But it was also thick enough that I didn't need shape wear underneath. Didn't want to take it off.

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel beautiful!
links_Review_Text: It fit like a glove. It was true to size and one of my favorite gowns.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but a little too Snug
links_Review_Text: Beautiful gown, nice quality. Looked super on the top but given the seaming around the midsection it accented what I didn't want accented (my tummy)! A larger size would have been too big in the top. I have that trouble w other clothes as well so don't think it's any mis-sizing of the gown. I'm 5'8", def needed the long. Even with the long Might have been able to wear a small heel but prob would have gone w a flat.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous gown, received compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: This gown is an absolute stunner, but be prepared to wear Spanx if you're concerned about your midsection. The boning also is difficult to deal with, they shift somewhat and can look odd (especially when you're wearing Spanx, it's hard to tuck it underneath.) The hanger straps pop out really easily, and the plastic on the sleeves meant to hold them on your arms are also falling off the dress, so fashion tape would be helpful as well.
It runs pretty true to size. I received so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Stunning red dress and fit great!
links_Review_Text: I’m 5’2 and with 3 inch heels this was the perfect length. The dress is a stunning red, hugs your curves in all the right places, and is a great quality. Form fitting but there is stretch which is great! The only negative thing about this dress is the hanger loops in the back popped out a lot, but at least they’re in the back. Would definitely rent this dress again!
I really like this dress but my Spanx panty line showed. So I wore a different dress. Maybe if I had ordered one size larger it would have been perfect.

links_Review_Title: Great pop of color for the holiday!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove. I would order a size up if you are a little unsure of your belly. I got tons of compliments in this dress!
Amazing dress for a formal event. It's beautiful on and hugs you in all the right places. Only con about the dress is it's pretty tight in the torso area but otherwise loved it. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress! A perfect fit for me including the hem length. I will rent again
links_Review_Text: A classic silhouette, a beautiful rich red, substantial fabric which draped beautifully..J'adore!!

This dress was fantastic! It fit very tight but wasn't too uncomfortable to move in and it's well structured. It just brushed the ground in 4" heels, though I had to use temporary hem tape on the slip to keep it from getting caught on my shoes.

I'm very hourglass and although it fit perfectly everywhere else it pulled at the hip causing the boning to not lay flat. Wish it had a bit more give in the hip as it truly is gorgeous. If I sized up it would be to loose in bust/waist.
Nice dress, I just ordered too small of size.

links_Review_Title: Simple and elegant and a flattering fit
links_Review_Text: Slim through the torso, wonderfully accentuated my waist and hips. I am 5'1" and even with heels it was still a couple inches too long for me.

links_Review_Title: Wasn't expecting to love this beautiful gown!
links_Review_Text: I received this dress as a replacement for dresses that didn't fit in my original order. I wasn't planning on falling in love but it fit so well and it was gorgeous! Length was a bit long for me, even with heels, so I used some temporary hem tape on it. Beautiful silhouette and color!
Was perfect to wear to work and an after work event!
The fabric is amazing, very comfortable to wear. I wore XS and it was still large for me. However I could control a little bit with a belt. I'd def rent it again!

links_Review_Title: A little too fiesta for every day wear...
links_Review_Text: My motto for RTR Unlimited is "if it fits, I will rock it" - even though i felt this skirt was a little too party for every day wear I styled it for work and went with it. Runs true to size. The fabric is like satiny with a bit of a sheen. I wouldn't suggest everyone try it as office wear, but no one laughed so I guess it was a style success! Cute for a night out dancing for sure!
I wore this skirt both to work and weekend wear. It pairs well with lots of tops. The fabric is soft and silky so sometimes the skirt twists a bit when walking but it's not a big deal overall.

I liked the shape and fit of this skirt! It was fun and flattering. The only thing I was surprised by was how shiny it was. It wasn't a silky shine, but more like a costume shine... I wish it was more matte. But other than that, I really liked wearing this!!
Loved this outfit - pretty and very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Cute, but didn't care for the fabric
links_Review_Text: The fabric has this weird satin-ish shine that I didn't really care for, but it fit fine and made for a decent outfit.
This skirt is adorable! Fit is true to size, just a little snug around the hips. Pencil skirts tend to ride up during the day, but this stayed in place.
Didn't wear. I felt like it was too big and didn't quite flatter my figure. May have been different if I sized down.

Definitely needed a medium, but even if I had sized correctly the fabric felt a little cheap and had a shine to it that I wasn't expecting - thought it would be more of a casual daytime skirt for summer Fridays.

links_Review_Title: Cute skirt but not my favorite fabric
links_Review_Text: The silk fabric wasn't very forgiving or comfortable. But a cute skirt nonetheless. Great when standing or walking... I have curves and the sitting down part was a bit uncomfortable bc the fabric doesn't stretch much
This was cute and fit well, however I rented in September and was out of season. Great for a summer look!
Such a cute dress, wore out to a dinner in the city with friends

links_Review_Title: Fit's great, tailored but not too tight, and it's lined!
links_Review_Text: This skirt was great, I ended up buying it. It is lined and I could wear a black body suit top under it and you couldn't see it. I wear an 8/10 in pants (waist 8, legs 8/10) and this large fit perfectly. If you're a solid 10 or bigger, Large would be too small. Plus: co-worker said I looked like a model! :-)

links_Review_Title: I work this to work with a long sleeved black shirt and then changed top for a date. Both worked.
links_Review_Text: fun, flirty, but long enough to wear to work. light material, fully lined though. pretty, material only good for summer
This fit me and my curvy hips like a glove. I felt sexy and flirty, yet still modest enough to wear it to work
Wore it to the US Open with a polo shirt and was perfect and so comfortable. I may buy it :)
It was to small throughout the waist and I wasn't able to wear it.
Too small, not long enough. No show stopper.

links_Review_Title: Great summer staple for the office to evening
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. Flowy, comfy. Paired well with blouses and jean jacket.
Ran a little big - but certainly fit.
Got a lot of compliments wore with short sleeve t-shirt and black open toe pumps. The slit made the details more interesting. Light material and felt flowy
I couldn't wear this as fit was too small. Size up.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear, a little too small.
links_Review_Text: So cute, but a little too small.
Doesn't fit well too much material. Didn't end up wearing

links_Review_Title: Cute skirt, but too big around the waist
links_Review_Text: Adorable skirt, but too big around the waist so I couldn't wear it

I am currently 129 lbs 5'5. I thought I would be a small with the designers, but I seem to be a medium. I had ordered a small in this beautiful, flattering skirt, but I would have been more comfortable in a medium.

links_Review_Title: Cute skirt, good form-fitting fit. A little weird at the waste
links_Review_Text: The skirt is very cute and a lot of compliments. Good for work or going out. The one downside is that the front has a gathered look that seems strange. But a cute skirt and would rent again!
No give at all in the material, which made it uncomfortably tight

links_Review_Title: It's fine but a little frilly
links_Review_Text: The fabric and ruffle are a little More swishy than imagined
fit well & flattering
I loved the way my body looked in this skirt! It was a little tight, so I would go one size up. If I were to rent again, I would want a bigger size so I could comfortably sit.
Wasn't expecting the satiny material.

links_Review_Title: I actually didn't end up wearing this.
links_Review_Text: It was a whole lot shinier than I expected — I thought it would be too much for my boyfriend's graduation from law school. Medium is also a tad big around the waist if you're more of a pear/hour glass shape.

links_Review_Title: Very cute - just not my style!
links_Review_Text: The bunching was over the stomach which made me feel like I looked larger than am I, so I opted not to wear it. Would be very cute on more slender gals

links_Review_Title: Could not zip it up. Too small.
links_Review_Text: Could not zip it up. Too small.
Easy to style. Black sleeveless top, black dress flats. Wore to work but would have also worn to brunch with friends.

links_Review_Title: Very cute skirt, just runs large!
links_Review_Text: Pros -Perfect for day drinking and work Cons -Runs large, size down!

Such a cute skirt that you can wear for daytime with a t-shirt and flats or night time with a strappy top and sandals. The material is polyester but it flows nicely, is light and made me happy to wear. I paired it with a white bodysuit, red flats and the red Gia Quinto bucket bag.
This was great for a girls night and would be perfect for a date! Only thing is the bottom is very tight so I'll have to try it in a Small.

links_Review_Title: Great piece for a night out!
links_Review_Text: Wore this for New Year's Eve. It is true to size, but I probably should've sized up. I couldn't lift my arms very much. Also the zipper on the side was incredibly hard to zip up/down. But loved the neckline and the fabric was really great, received tons of compliments!
Very cute top. Perfect for a night out
Great fit. Comfortable and felt great wearing it
Beautiful top! It fit well and was super structured, so it was really flattering. Great way to transition the square-neck trend into fall!

links_Review_Title: Fun and classic! Perfeft for a day/night out.
links_Review_Text: Loved this top. Paired with faux leather gaucho pants and booties. Definitely fits on the smaller size. I still wore my TTS small, but probably could have also worn a medium. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Bold and fun! Can't be missed.
links_Review_Text: This top was so much fun to have in my closet! Everyone absolutely loved it. I mainly wore it for nights out, with black high-waisted jeans. The only negative things I can say about it are that it is VERY cropped (more than I expected) and is slightly tight in the bust. This is definitely a great statement piece to rent for a night out, or just a casual daytime look.
LOVE LOVE LOVE this top. Fits perfectly true to size and hugs you in all of the right places. It can be worn with a basic jean or dressed up with a skirt! Debating on keeping this one.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved it, will rent again and again
links_Review_Text: Wore with light jeans during the day and leather pants at night. Received so many compliments. Runs a little small, size up if you have boobs.

links_Review_Title: THIS SHIRT IS AMAZING. I fell in love
links_Review_Text: This shirt fits true to size and I don't have a single regret of renting it. This was my first rtr experience and I'm happy to say that I'm so pleased!
Love the sweetheart neckline and the puffy sleeves! A fun crop top to wear out. It runs a little small - I was able to wear my size but it was on the tighter side. But overall cute top!
Wore this out to dinner at beach. Can be dressed up or down but super cute with black miniskirt.

I adored this shirt. I didn't want to return. Wore this during the day/for happy hour/ on a night out. Such a fun and easy top & earned many compliments. Downfall is it was a bit tight in the shoulders and a bit too short for my liking (but great with a high waist bottom). I was still pretty impressed with the fit of the large though I did struggle to keep the sleeves up (they have elastic on shoulder). 10/10 would rent again.

Loved this top! It was a little big on me but overall I have no complaints! I paired it with a black jean skirt and in this outfit it was barely a crop top on me. Loved the puffy sleeves and the fabric was thick enough where I didn't need to worry about a bra!

Worn this shirt over 12 times in 3 weeks. Be warned that this cut is v sexy and exposing lots of clev.pairing it with high waisted jeans or a high waisted skirt loots great. I also paid it with a long duster to class it up and hide sweetheart neckline. Fit is smaller than average and low level of stretch. Definitely worth a rent!
Adorable. Supper fitted, figure flattering.
Great look with jeans. If you're between two sizes maybe go for the larger one. I found that I fit me JUST right. Love the puffy sleeves and the cropped length.

I probably could have come up a size since this top zippers to close but it's a super flattering top. I rented this top because the one I wanted to rent was unavailable in my size but I was looking for a fun long sleeve going out top. I wasn't expecting much to be honest but was pleasantly surprised when I tried it on!
Absolutely adorable, I loved it. I am 5'11 and found the shoulders to be tight
Cute but was a little tight zipping up, which is strange because I have a pretty small rib cage in comparison to the rest of my body proportions.
Super flattering but not a very comfortable too. The quality of this shirt is really beautiful and really accentuated my neckline. Highly recommend :)
Love a glove

links_Review_Title: Snake it til you make it
links_Review_Text: Surprised by how much I loved this dress! Sexy but not too short at 5'6" and not low cut. Great for a fun party-wore for NYE.
Fits snugly to the body but cinches in the right places to look flattering on any body. I weigh 150 and the size 6 was right but comfortable

links_Review_Title: Loved the fabric and great fit!
links_Review_Text: The material was awesome and the color yellow was just perfect .. will rent again! Fit perfect
Wore this on NYE with a leather jacket and heels and received so many complements! Comfortable and breathable for a faux leather dress. Would definitely rent again!

This dress is so pretty- the lace detailing makes it super feminine. The fabric doesn't wrinkle easily which is nice. The band around the ribs has no give. It comes with pads, so you don't need to wear a bra. My only complaint would be that the lace in the back didn't always lay flat.
Dress was so beautiful and fit me well, got a lot of compliments! I'm definitely not skinny, and this dress was flattering to my body.

links_Review_Title: Did not wear. Very matronly on my figure.
links_Review_Text: The material is gorgeous. There is a black belt sewn in. The lace on the top is a bronze color and the dress is FUSCIA. Not red like the pics show. This dress did NOT work with my body-type. I'm not in shape after 2 c-sections so it just made me look like I was pregnant still and on the chubbier side. Would definitely work for some people, it just didn't for me.

This dress feels incredibly luxurious. The silky fabric falls perfectly and I found the dress to be slimming and comfortable. Although the waist band was quite tight on my natural waist - I'd suggest sizing up to avoid discomfort. The lace details are pretty and delicate, but there were a few rips on one side of the lace. I used a safety pin to secure the other side to match. This dress was absolutely perfect for a black tie wedding in Nantucket.
Dress fit perfectly. The support in the cups allowed me to not have to wear a bra. Extremely comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Old Hollywood glam that never will go out of style.
links_Review_Text: Very flattering for most body types. Quality silky fabric that flows beautifully on the body. Color is rich and the lace detailing is is what you would expect for the retail price of this dress ($$$).

I ordered the 2r and 0r, ended up wearing the 2r because the black band that runs under the chest on the 0r was sooo tight in my rib cage it made it hard to breathe. The dress was gorgeous and so flattering. I've never received so many compliments in my life. The only thing was on the 2r the chest area was not as fitted/tight as the 0r was so it didn't hold my boobs up very well (I wear a size 32/34 DD). So I ended up wearing a combo of one of those front only, super plunge stick on bras and some boob tape to hold them in place. Worked it fine, other than that the dress was perfect. I really didn't want to part with it <3

links_Review_Title: Okay but not great size up
links_Review_Text: Dress was okay and I got compliments but the gold lace looked a little odd and the place where the waist hit was also a little weird. I made it work but would not rent again.

This dress is crazy gorgeous, but we have to talk about the fit. The chest was huge on me and I'm a 36DD. It also flared oddly at the armpit, which I was able to mitigate by bending the super light underwire in the padding. Still, the color and fabric are just delicious and it's so unique. Love!

links_Review_Title: Endless compliments on this gorgeous dress.
links_Review_Text: The fit is amazing. You will feel classy, elegant and fun all at the same time. People crossed a crowded room to pay a compliment to a stranger.
This dress fit very well and complimented me. I did have to use fashion tape to keep the lace down in the back. Very elegant.
I love it very feminine and fun sexy . But the high waist it's unbelievable tight at the rib cage and it make it uncomfortable to wear and it . Shame ! Because l love it

Top was ever so slightly big but I'm a pear shape. Got so many compliments. I was worried about the pleats but dressed was very flowy and reminded me of Marilyn Monroe. Color was amazing. Zipper was a little hard to work up and down.

links_Review_Title: Never received more compliments in my life!
links_Review_Text: I'm glad I ordered a size up because it runs small but it fit like a dream. It was extremely flattering and comfortable. The color is absolutely gorgeous and the lace detail makes the dress. I've rented a few other times but this is my far my favorite dress ever. I got complimented too many times to count all night and I felt amazing!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a very special dinner
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. Too low in the back for a bra but the built in cups were enough support. May be a difficult dress if you have a smaller chest. It fit my chest really well (32DDD). Much longer on me than the model. My husband loved it and it added a really special feeling to our date. The lace is more of a gold color but a fun accent. The skirt was super fun to twirl in walking down the street.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, but difficult to love.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a black tie optional party. The color was beautiful but it felt like I was wearing glorified lingerie. The top was too big yet the empire waist closure was so small and tight. It also appeared in the picture to be tea length but given my short stature (5'4) it was awkwardly long and instead looked like i had a short long dress on. I felt like the dress was meant for a real-life Barbie that had a large chest, tiny tiny midline, and was very tall. I typically adore my RTR rentals but this one was a true disappointment, especially with how expensive the rental was. Would not recommend sadly.

I am truly obsessed with this dress, and if it weren't for the price tag I'd buy it in every colour. I received so many compliments and I felt like a queen all night. It does run a bit small. I am usually very comfortable in a 10 and this was just a tad too tight. No need for a bra and it fits well for my large chest. If I were to purchase it I would certainly hem the dress, but for the purpose of rentals it was fine on my 5'7" frame. 10/10 would rent again.

This dress runs smaller in the waist/ribcage area due to the ribbon belt. It took some work to zip up and I'm a typical sz 2-4. Fit perfectly everywhere else. Color is dark pink with brownish lace and black belt. Loved this rental.
The material feels so rich, and the lace is tasteful. Strikes the perfect balance between sexy and sophisticated.

links_Review_Title: "Best dress in the room" was heard more than once
links_Review_Text: Such a beautiful and glamorous dress. I received endless compliments and everyone wanted to know where I purchased the dress. I was happy to fill them in on all the joys of RTR. I've never rented from this designer previously, so not sure if it's common that the dresses run a little small. The black band at the waist was the tight spot, as it has no stretch. Everywhere else was flowy and lots of room. The upper part of the dress has padding, so if you did decide to go braless, the silky material isn't going to reveal everything! Only strange comment that was made to me over and over( besides it being the most lovely dress), was that from a distance, the lace on my arms, back and chest looked like tattoos. Could have been the poor lighting at the venue.

links_Review_Title: Classy and fun, this dress made a statement Perfect for winter wedding
links_Review_Text: So dress hugged the center rather than order size down I might recommend going up. I was fine till I had dinner and drinks, then it was tight. I’m 5’6 , 147 pounds

The back is low cut; I had to wear a bra so top part was visible. The bottom is really long. It is very comfortable to wear. Made of only polyester so I was paranoid about eating in it. Nice for Valentine's Day!

links_Review_Title: Looked like a formal night gown
links_Review_Text: The color of the dress is amazing, but with the lace in the middle and on the arms, it felt like it looked like a formal night gown. I loved the movement of the skirt but couldn't bring myself to wear this one.

This dress is so lovely, it's just not for me. The fabric is lovely, the cut is lovely, along with the lace detail. But it didn't spark that joy that most rentals do! I think it will for someone else! Enjoy!

links_Review_Title: My dress made my night when several people (at different time) were asking where I had bought it.
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly. I loved it.

The colors were gorgeous and the skirt is a dream. I wanted to twirl in it all night. The fit was challenging. The black strap at the waist has NO give. I had to wear the bigger back up size which was fine for the waist down, but it made the top kind of billow-y, which wasn't the greatest fit for my top. I held it together with double stick tape. Oddly I had numerous people at the party approach me from across the room to tell me that they had mistaken the beautiful lace detail for tattoos.

links_Review_Title: Your waist and rib cage will hate this dress
links_Review_Text: This dress is stunning---accept the measurements are way off. The dress ran very big on me in every area accept the high waist abs rib cage area. I couldn't get it zipped! It was sad because it was lovely.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous gown maybe too fancy for a wedding
links_Review_Text: The dress is absolutely gorgeous but it seemed too much like a ball gown so I didn't end up wearing it for the wedding. Maybe it's a little too long for me so it felt that way. The color is stunning and I could see this working well for a fancy holiday party too.

This dress is absolutely beautiful. It is a little more pink than it looks in the pictures but the lace and dress itself are stunning. I kept getting compliments all night from friends and strangers alike! The only things were that the black band around the rib cage was super tight, so if that isnt a slim area for you, size up. Also, as previous reviews mentioned, it didnt require a bra, but I was surprised at how much cleavage I had in it. I still ended up wearing the dress, but it was a little bustier than I would have thought/preferred. Overall, absolutely gorgeous dress I would 100% rent again.
Good fit, with built-in padding and support so a bra isn't necessary. Tons of compliments all night!

. The lining in the breast area was crumbled and I could not straighten it . So it was lumpy. The black band that went around the waist was not flat like the pic it was twisted . Overall a very pretty dress and I received lots of compliments .

links_Review_Title: Too look back for anybody who needs to Wear a bra
links_Review_Text: Too look back for anybody who needs to Wear a bra. Beautiful otherwise

This dress is gorgeous! The red is a standout and the lace is very delicate and feminine. I loved that the fabric didn't wrinkle, and really loved the built-in bra. I do agree with other reviews...the size was pretty true to size for me but extremely fitted through the rib cage. I have a 25" waist and the size 6 was still snug around the waist and rib cage. This is one I'd consider purchasing!
n/a

The fabric of this dress is high quality, flowy and silky, beautiful. It runs a bit small in the bodice, once passed my waist I could not get it zipped. i wore A strapless bra and it perfect, I will order again in a larger size I am a 36dd so it fits the larger bust size.
Flowers

links_Review_Title: I got compliments from nearly everyone I came in contact with! I felt great.
links_Review_Text: Fit my 34DDD chest, which isn't always easy to do, and got compliments all night.
Couldn't zip up around bust / mid back

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress that won't fit most people
links_Review_Text: This was a truly beautiful item. The color was gorgeous and the fabric and flow were great. However, I did not wear it due to sizing, and I suspect the fit of this will only work for a very few body shapes. As others noted, it runs tight at the waist, with no give or stretch. So I ordered one size up. Unfortunately, while it fit in the waist, it was way oversized and ill-fitted then on the top. The shoulders drooped, there were gaps at the armpit and cleavage lines, and the bust had a ton of extra material that made it look lumpy. Overall, maybe good for those with very large busts (I am DD, so I mean big) and broad shoulders to fill out the top.

After some weight gain and on the cusp between a 2 and a 4, I ordered the 2 that was available (there was no backup). It ran small and I could barely pull it on. Honestly, it's my mistake for ordering too small! The silk felt amazing. I'd order it again - once my size is actually available.

Ok I might end up buying this one. Beautiful flowy dress, professional but with fun details. Also I am self conscious about my large ribcage and the waist on this perfectly hits where it hides that. I was a little worried about renting the 1 b/c I am usually a 4-6 in dresses but it worked out perfect! Literally have been strutting around my office in it all day. Paired with moto boots and a leather jacket to give it edge. Def will be wearing again before I return it, if I do at all.

This is a very thoughtfully cut dress with a slightly cinched waist and generous room for a bigger chest, but I think it would work well on someone with a smaller bust too ... I could see dressing it up or dressing it down.

Slimming cut - side zipper a bit challenging. Change up from all black with pretty green and gold print. Wore with cami (too revealing w/o for me) tights, over knee boots and black moto jacket to give more casual vibe.

links_Review_Title: I love this brand for a curvy figure!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress. So many compliments. It was a little dressy for my office but I wore it out several times. It is just slightly low cut but the fit of the dress is super flattering. Love the print and the fabric quality too.
It could have been a little tighter on the top to hold everything in. Thin material so great for summer. Unique print and cut, which I loved.
Flattering fit. I would have given this a 5, but the fabric wrinkled by the end of the day. Style and fit-wise -a 5.
I loved this dress. Wore it twice. It was perfect for work but would also work to wear out. I'd love to own this one.
I'm a b cup, the chest was roomy on me, would work better on a larger cup size. Dress looks and feels very expensive. My husband (and I) adored the shape and flow of this dress.

links_Review_Title: great for my business profile pic! beansprouts.com
links_Review_Text: I'm not big-busted and it fit just right, so probably not for the more curvacious on top.
Great style, fun to wear, and moves nicely. Since I'm short I always have to be conscious of these uneven hemlines but this was perfect.
Nice spring weight, great print with pops of green, fun detail at the hem with highs and lows. It does have a deep plunge so caution. Fit fine for a 32 DD in the bust.

Wore this on vacation! It's gorgeous - I love BA&SH. I'm 5'2 and the high/low height was perfect. It's snug around the rib cage and a bit low cut so I wore a tank underneath to feel comfortable. Such a pretty dress!

links_Review_Title: Flowy and fabulous & The print is amazing too! A great dress for a gals night or date night!
links_Review_Text: I rented the 1R and 2R to be safe and the 1R fit me perfectly! I loved the print on this dress and the cut in the front shows off your legs! It also cinches in your waist and makes you look tiny! I would rent this for sure again!!!

I wore this dress with sheer black hose and suede stilettos -- yes, I still wear hose, even in the heights of Dallas summers. I was super-happy with the cut and flow of this dress. It is elegant, classy, and the fit was fabulous. I felt it made me look taller and thinner than I really am. The fit around the bodice was a bit snug, but hiking up the blouse a bit alleviated the tightness. I'm fairly thin up top, so this may just be an issue of a narrow cut. I paired this with burnished gold jewelry, and wore a black cami underneath since some said that the dress might be a bit revealing. I had a hard time sending this one back -- I loved it and would rent again!!
This dress made getting ready for my work conference super easy. A very flattering cut. There is a bit of a gap in the front so I wore a black leotard underneath.

links_Review_Title: Wore to a party and to work as cameraperson/presenter at event
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit and style for me (petite, curvy.) Print is chic and flattering.

Loved the fit and pattern of this dress. I was worried about the empire waist making me look pregnant but it did not, whew. Wore with black semi opaque tights and black high heel boots and a black leather jacket to a double date in February. Could probably wear to work but the asymmetrical hemline is a little avant- garde for my office. Even though the material is synthetic it is a nicer synthetic not too cheap looking. Still the dress is not lined and overall probably not "nice" enough for a semi-formal event. Recommend for a date, or dressier dinner type event. Would rent again.

Wore this dress to work with boots and a blazer. I thought it might be too "Stevie Nicks" for my office but it turned out fine and I felt stylish all day. I thought the pattern was teal but it is definitely Kelly green and gold.
Love the length! Great fit.
Hit high almost empire and the style of the length was cool.

links_Review_Title: versatile, romantic, retro look i loved wearing!
links_Review_Text: This beauty arrived unworn with tags on. I wore it out to a concert on New Year's eve with lace up combat boots for a 90s look, and paired with black ankle booties for work later in the week. The dress hits at the mid-low calf, but drapes beautifully. it shows a bit of cleavage but otherwise is conservatively cut. I loved this one. Well made, artfully tailored, gorgeous fabric. Will certainly seek out this designer for more looks!
perfect & flattering
This is a beautiful unique looking dress. I loved it! It does show off a bit of cleavage, but was still very classy.

I rented this as a backup for a November wedding, and I loved how unique the cut and print of this dress was. Something to be aware of 1. the front v is cut pretty deep, so a tank top or cami is probably necessary and 2. I have a very narrow ribcage, but it was very tight to zipper. I'm usually a 4/6 and ordered the 1R, but next time I would get the 2R.
Love this dress! The cut is different and the green is beautiful! Little low cut in the bust. I opted to wear a bando beneath due to wearing it to a family dinner
This dress is easy to wear, true to size, and the fabric is very pretty. It is light weight. I enjoyed it and wore it a few times for work.
Cute dress and fit well on the ribcage. But the top was super low cut and bra would show in the front. Super cute, just not for busty gals.

links_Review_Title: The print! The hemline! It's so unique, classy but still a bit sexy.
links_Review_Text: If you have a large chest or muscular arms, I recommend going up a size in this dress. The pattern and the cut is sooooo cute, but I couldn't zip it and will re-rent in a larger size.
The rib cage runs a bit small - wasn't able to zip and wear comfortably.
Runs small through the ribs & bust area

This dress is gorgeous; it fit my hourglass body perfectly. It has a very slight opening in the front, but a black bra underneath blended with the dress. This felt more like a party dress than a work dress because of the cut.
This dress is very comfortable and chic. It cinches you at the smallest part of the waist and makes it super flattering. Definitely recommend.

The pattern of this dress is really pretty and the fabric is thick and high quality. It was comfortable and easy to wear. It was a bit tight around my rib cage and the neckline comes down pretty low (it may have been stretched out as there were fabric fasteners but they were spread apart pretty far) such that I couldn't wear a regular bra. I ended up wearing a black sports bra which turned out fine but I was glad I tried it on first before taking it out of town with me so I was prepared.

links_Review_Title: Loved it in the photo; didn't work on me
links_Review_Text: The fit of this was odd. I'm short, so this may be right for a taller girl.
Very slimming. Easy wear!

links_Review_Title: Love the flow of this dress and the colors.
links_Review_Text: Very tight around chest and rib cage.
Fits true to size. Loved hem.
Very flattering on my figure - wise hips and narrow chest. Good length for work but also flirty.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous print; gorgeous neckline and cut.
links_Review_Text: The pattern is beautiful and the neckline and cut are super-flattering. I wasn't crazy about the hemline and the bottom of the dress wrinkles fairly easily, but I'd still rent it again.
Kind of a 60s mod mini style. Cute with turtle neck and tights for cold weather.
Wore to a cocktail / fundraising event. Received many compliments and felt great in it. Im 5'3 and it hit mid/thigh which felt a bit short but still enjoyed wearing it.
Great pattern, great colors, easy fit. It's very short so I wore leggings.

links_Review_Title: Elegant dress that's very easy to wear
links_Review_Text: It's snug on the chest area, and I am not too heavy. Don't have a tiny waist and the dress was loose in that area so that was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Super cute but super short if you're 5'5"+
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress, well made and lined. Super cute with tights and booties but WAY too short for work or honestly anything. This should most likely be classified as petite. I am 5'6" on a good day and I couldn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a cocktail party. Fun pattern and great fit!
links_Review_Text: This dress fits very true to size. It is a bit short, but I am 5'5" and it was long enough to be comfortable. Although the cut is simple, the pattern makes it a unique and memorable option. Would definitely recommend renting!

links_Review_Title: Sooooo short! Tunic, not a dress
links_Review_Text: Awkward length - needs pants under. Colors aren't as vibrant as in the pics. Meh.
I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and received a lot of compliments. It's short yet comfortable.
Really liked wearing this dress. Loved that it's a short mini

Just like the rest of the reviews said, this dress is short :) I am 5'2'' and it was very mini, even on me. That said, I always rent minis for this reason- everything else is usually too long. Loved the dress overall - super comfortable, slight stretch, great lined fabric.

I wore this dress for opening night at the MN Opera. I really liked the pattern and fit, but it is VERY short. I am 5'8" and would not have felt comfortable wearing this without tights. Overall, I was really pleased with the dress, but would have liked for it to be about 2 inches longer to make it more comfortable to sit in, etc.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for any type of fiesta!
links_Review_Text: Glad I ordered the 2 and 4. Typically Im a size in between, but the 4 was defintely too boxy on me. I actually couldve gone with a size 0 but the 2 was comfortable. The dress's embroidery was perfect for a fiesta themed 25th birthday party! This dress has no form at all and the 2 was a great length on a short person like me.
Ran a bit small and was very short! But super cute dress loved it!!!

This dress is so comfy, I could dance the whole night! Loved the embroidered pattern on it! Unique, but simple cut so it wasn't too crazy. I got so many compliments and felt confident. Would wear it again if I could!!

links_Review_Title: Cute pattern, quality fabric. Not too heavy, even during hot summer.
links_Review_Text: Standard shift dress. Great pattern detail. A bit on the short side for the office (I am 5'7"), but got away with is.
Great quality short dress. At 5 ft. Tall the size 2 was a perfect length. This could be worn to work or wedding. I may by this one as its versatility would get me a lot of wear.

links_Review_Title: Pretty detail! Great for winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a barn wedding in Northern Michigan. Loved the colors & embroidery. Looked more interesting for a fall winter wedding than other dresses I tried. A little tight on the hips, but I didn't have the same problems as other women with the arm holes being a bit too tight. Overall very comfortable and a great dress!

links_Review_Title: Great dress--it was comfortable, I felt good, and I got compliments.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress--I wish it were mine. The embroidery is beautiful, and it has a subtle '70s vibe. The only con was that the neck and sleeve holes were a bit tight (I don't have big shoulders or arms). I thought about wearing the 2 instead. I'm glad I didn't, though, because I forgot about the tightness once I got to the party. I wore it to an outdoor wedding.

embroidered perfection! The detail was gorgeous in this dress. I was worried from the model pictures that it may be a little short but thankfully it was perfect! Taller girls may have an issue with the length. Would look cute paired with a jacket. Can be dressed up or down.

links_Review_Title: Very different...festive but not over the top...back is plain black... so not too much pattern!
links_Review_Text: Only 5-2 so not too short...just right! Hides all the "sins"....so comfortable ... don't have to wear Spanx to hide the belly....
It was a bit short but not horrible. The pattern was super cute!

loved this dress ! i loved how it fit and it was so comfortable to dance in! i also loved the length .i have a large chest (36 DDD)so it's hard to find things that fit me there that i do t bust out of , i was so happy it fit since they don't have a search for chest sizes like that !

links_Review_Title: Great pattern & detail - typical shift dress
links_Review_Text: Great colors , but just a typical shift dress - not as exciting as I had hoped . Snug at the arms
The fit was great but it was really short. I wore the size 12, and then hem was sort of wonky the lining seemed off.
Loved this shift dress! Arrived like brand new and quality is top notch. Beware- it is short! I would pair with flat sandals. Super cute and so easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: felt comfortable and elegant in this dress
links_Review_Text: beautiful fabric. Classic. Comfortable fit. Loved it
It was great, wore it with opaque tights. Super cute. If you have a large chest, this is not for you.
This dress was SO SHORT on me, and I'm only 5'3! Even had I gone up a size, it would have been uncomfortably short. The embroidery was beautiful though!
This dress was not flattering and didn't do anything for me. I'd say it's not for busty ladies. I returned without wearing.
The design is so much prettier in real life than on the website! The dress is short and was a little tight in the breast area. Might size up and try again.
Small through chest. I am small boned and chested and the fit was smog through the chest. Short. 2-3" above my knees and I'm 5' tall. Funky hem.

links_Review_Title: Overall was a good fit and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: This dress is SHORT but very flattering. I am not very tall (5'4") so it wasn't a huge deal but I could see this being an issue for taller ladies. Overall was a good fit and comfortable.
A little on the short side, but a really fun dress.
This not a flattering dress at all! I was hoping it would be a shift style, but instead it is stiff and looked like a tent. So it does not I did not end up wearing it.
I bought this dress to wear to a party but it was much thicker and stiffer than I thought it would be. I ended up wearing it with a jacket to work.

links_Review_Title: Cute, but extremely short. I worn as a tunic with pants
links_Review_Text: Great layering piece for all seasons. If you are tall, it is very short, so plan to wear a skirt or pants under it. I layered with a purple cardigan.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful colors and embroidery makes for a subtle standout.
links_Review_Text: Nice quality. I wore it with black skinny jeans for an all ladies birthday party, but great on it's own for date night. I was totally unable to zip or unzip without help, although it wasn't too tight around my rib cage. It just doesn't glide easily for having such a small zipper pull. It was a little tight in the armholes, but not noticeable. Lots of compliments.
Great embroidery detail, but I could never wear without tights or leggings--extremely short!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, worked well for Christmas
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for Christmas and it was great! It's a bit short even on me (I'm 5' 3") but with opaque black tights it was fine. I wore a thin long-sleeved black shirt underneath to stay warm and it worked well. The pattern on the front is beautiful and I got a lot of compliments!

The dress was insanely short- even if it hadn't been too tight for my comfort level (wearing to a work party), I wouldn't have been able to wear it. The colors were kind of blah in person and the dress didn't feel exciting. Would be perfect with someone without curves.

Wore this to a December wedding and felt amazing in it. The fabric is thin enough to be comfortable but also smoothes out your figure. The color is a little more emerald than the original photos make it look, which was perfect with my blonde hair and gold jewelry. I did wear a small black coverup for the ceremony because it is a sexy dress. But once dinner and dancing started I took it off and got tons of compliments. Loved this dress and I was sad to give it back.
This color was gorgeous! Truly eye catching!
Perfect fit. Simple lines. Bright Kelly green color. If you're not afraid of color - you must rent this dress.
Love the fit and color. Sexy but also understated. Fit me like a glove. Very comfortable, beautiful shade of green

Great dress for a wedding! The fabric was quality and a little thicker, and the dress hugged in all the right places. Definitely a little constructing at the bottom because it's narrow, but that didn't bother me. As other mentioned, darts in the chest are more pronounced

links_Review_Title: The dress was beautiful but not too formal!
links_Review_Text: This dress was great but it seemed to run a little big on top and a little tight on bottom. I am naturally a little smaller on top but this was much bigger than expected. I actually ended up rigging the straps to sit more appropriately. The bottom was a good snug fit, and my only comment is that the slit does come up pretty far. I ended up wearing some shorts underneath just in case. Overall the dress was comfy and stylish and I wore with an oversized sweater to dress it down a bit since it was not a formal affair.
This dress hugs all the curves. There is a bit of a stretch to the material so there is room to move and breath. Great color and style for a spring gala
This dress fit like a glove! The material is thick with a good amount of stretch. It hid any imperfection or lines. The color is bright and vibrant and I received compliments all night!
Great fit and surprisingly did not require a bra. The lining makes the dress forgiving. Awesome color and photographs well.
Loved it

links_Review_Title: LOVE the color and the dress but runs SMALL! Not true to size!
links_Review_Text: After ordering a 14 and 16, I had to send those back and get the 18 and a back up Derek Lam dress that I never received but was sent an entirely different dress in pink. The 14 & 16 in this dress were extremely tight in the bust area and I couldn't even zip it up. I'm a 14 in Tadashi Shoji and this dress was not even close to fitting me. The 18 was better in the bust and back area but it did fit me big at the waist and hips. I didn't mind it as much because I was just happy to have a dress and I just love the style and color. Not the best first experience with RTR.

links_Review_Title: Loved the color. I got many compliments.
links_Review_Text: The material of the dress was very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is tight and feels like it sucks everything into place - in the best way possible. Was still able to comfortably dance around! Obsessed with the color.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! The color is unbelievable and the fit is incredibly flattering.
links_Review_Text: So flattering (I wore Spanx to be safe). No bra needed, the fit was perfect. I didn't want to return it!

Received so many compliments and def was an eye catching dress at a summer wedding. There are a few seams/darts that were more visible than expected (down the middle), but overall was super comfy and a great fabric. Would rent this brand again!

links_Review_Title: Bright color, perfect for a summer wedding. I got so many compliments on the color and fit!
links_Review_Text: It's a thick material so it helps to keep everything in!(although beware certain spanx were visible through it) I was a little but on the warmer side in it for a summer wedding/dancing but it was doable/ and no sweat marks showed up. True to size, but definitely a fitted dress!

links_Review_Title: I would probably not spend the money on a green dress, too memorable to wear over and over. Loved!
links_Review_Text: Tons of compliments. Fit was fabulous due to the high quality fabric. Color is beautiful, if on the fence just RENT this dress! Amazing!

I received a size 14 as the 12 was not in stock. It was a little big, but the 12 may of been to tight...who knows. I'm obsessed with green so I loved this dress and felt great wearing it to a wedding.
This was a perfect fit for a wedding party was in. I got lots of compliments on the color, etc.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely love and gorgeous color and fit
links_Review_Text: Super classy, sexy, gorgeous color, runs a little small. Perfect dress
I liked this dress but wish it was a little shorter. Length was a little bit nowhere on me, but it was great otherwise, and comfy.
Tight fitting with some stretch. Length was fine with heels but wouldn't recommend if you are really short. Awesome color.
The straps were long and not adjustable, so I was constantly pulling up the dress. Other than that, it was a gorgeous color and fun to wear!
Loved this green dress and how it shows off my figure
Such a flattering dress!
Fit like a glove. Wonderful color. Nice strong comfortable material. Will definitely rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Dress! Great color and hugs your curves-- super sexy!
links_Review_Text: I would say runs true to size, if you like your dresses very form fitting, but for a looser fit, especially if you have a bigger bust, you may want to size up. Overall great dress, got lots of compliments on it and the color.
Love it!
I received sooooo many compliments and felt very classy

Fit true to size. Longer than I expected. Hits midway down calf. Fitted and flattering. Ample Room in chest. Fabric is thick enough you could skip spanx but they did make the dress feel smoother. I loved it
Loved the dress and material. It was very flattering

links_Review_Title: Stand out of the crowd with this bold color
links_Review_Text: This was a super classy cut in a beautiful green. It was fun yet still professional for a company holiday party.

links_Review_Title: The most beautiful green I've ever seen!
links_Review_Text: Legit my favorite item I've ever rented from RTR. This is the most comfortable and beautiful dress. The green is such a unique color. I wore for a friend's rehearsal dinner and received so many compliments and felt like a million bucks. I recommend a million times over!

Fabric was divine, but I'm not sure if the dress was just too big or if it was designed for someone taller/with a longer torso. I'm in between a 14 and 16, so I think I may have been better off with the 14. Note that I was not wearing any shape wear in the photo. I had a little too much room in the hips and chest, but it fit well around my thighs and waist. I am not very curvy, and have very thick thighs, so I just don't think it was cut for my shape.

links_Review_Title: Felt so good in this. A+ quality.
links_Review_Text: I loved this one so much I bought it. Then I became pregnant and it still fit and looked amazing with an additional 15 pounds on me. The inside is lined with smooth silky fabric and it just glides right on. It really looks amazing and the color is awesome in person.

links_Review_Title: This dress is absolutely gorgeous and the color was stunning!
links_Review_Text: I have swimmer shoulders and rarely wear such thin straps. Cannot say enough good things about this dress.

links_Review_Title: Such a great fit! Loved the dress and almost bought it!
links_Review_Text: Such a great fit and got a ton of compliments!! Was obsessed with this dress! Would totally rent again!!
Loved this dress. Fits true to size and was so comfortable. There is a silky lining in the dress that makes it so comfortable. Color is fun and stands out in a sea of black dresses!
Christian knows how to make a dress for women. I felt amazing in this- no need to even wear a bra the fit was perfect. So happy I found his little number.
This dress is amazing. I did not want to return it!! The color is so gorgeous and the cut was very flattering.

links_Review_Title: I got lots of compliments on this dress.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable and flattering. It fit really well, however kinda snug in the hips when I sat down. I could tell it’s been worn before due to some pilling around the sleeve cuffs. I loved the long sleeves for a cold winter formal wedding, classic black is always great and the neckline and slit made it sexy. The detail in the front helped hide my mom belly which made me feel more comfortable. Would definitely rent again. I received lots of compliments.

The overall effect of this dress is very sophisticated with a figure flattering shape. The fabric is beautiful. I found the thigh slit just the right height, without being too revealing. I did have to fashion tape the top closed as it showed my bra without.

DO IT! This dress is stunning. Covers all the parts we ladies are insecure about (arms, tummy). Gorgeous feminine details (deep V, shoulders ruching, slit), modest, chic, comfortable, yet sexy simultaneously. Fits true to size. I would rent this again.

This dress was so flattering. It was a little big on me but I assumed it would be based on size. Still wore and got loads of compliments. Fashion tape would have helpful but it was fine. Would rent again.
Chic and sexy, but still professional

links_Review_Title: Nice dress for formal work event/cocktail party:wedding
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a friend's wedding. It was cut nicely to accentuate my curves yet cover up my stomach. It wasn't tight around waist or arms which I liked. The V neck and slit made it feel a bit younger and fun. Would rent again.

Very flattering on curvaceous, well endowed women! Wore it to my brother's wedding and I got so many compliments and it looked great in the photos. It's looked great all day and did not wrinkle. Would rent it again in a heart beat!

Adored this dress! I was coordinating a friends wedding, so I wanted to look nice, but needed to be able to move easily around and this dress was perfect for that. It was just a touch large; I think the 14 would have fit, but I was digging the comfort level of the 16. The top part is kind of wrap dress style, so I was worried about how deep the V neck would be, but it was pretty pretty perfect overall. And the slit wasn't too high either and gave the dress a slight sexy flair.

links_Review_Title: Perfect LBD for a night out
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a bachelorette night out in Hollywood. It was very comfortable and got several complements.

links_Review_Title: This dress is for serving ready-to-wear Morticia realness 🖤
links_Review_Text: The silk is gorgeous, the ruching is stunning, the slit is perfect, and THE SLEEVES. Do yourself a favor and rent this dress. It fits very true to size, I rented a 4. I'm a pear (normally a 27 or 6 in pants, 2/4 or small in tops) so the bottom was a smidge tight on me when trying to bend or sit, but it was still perfectly wearable. Rent it. You won't regret it.
This dress was amazing! I wore it to a Fall wedding and got tons of compliments. I felt confident and beautiful.
Obsessed with the sleeves on this! Super comfy! This fits TTS and was perfect for a formal event

Loved this dress. Came with tags still on-yay! I paired this with black opaque tights and booties. You could go with nude legs, but slit goes a bit high for me. Loved the way it gave me a waist and showed off the right amount of cleavage. Would consider buying this one.

I would totally rent this number again! PROS - I love the details of this dress. It's no ordinary little black dress (LBD) -I love the split and the length of this dress. -I love the sleeves! Omg, this is probably my favorite this season - the sleeves! - I did not need a cami under to keep the bust intact. CONS -None-
a little more matronly than I expected, but still very classy.

Wore this for a work dinner party and it was a HIT. I felt professional, beautiful, fun, and glam! It covers up all the places and has length. The tiny slit made a it a little more dinner/party-ish which was perfect for the occasion. I would also wear this to a wedding or another classy affair on my calendar. This dress did not disappoint!
Hid all my flaws and accentuated all the right areas! Loved this dress! I got a 14 and also a 16 - the 14 was perfect and the 16 was way too big!
Ended up wearing it for my work holiday party. A fun take on the LBD with the puffy sleeves and slit (still work appropriate with tights). Fits true to size.

links_Review_Title: I wasn't able to wear this dress due to the fit in the skirt.
links_Review_Text: You have to be narrow through your thighs to make it work!
Rented this dress to try for an upcoming event. I was surprised when I received this dress. It is beautiful and the details are just perfect for the event. I would definitely recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely love this dress. It's a show stopper
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous. I wore it to a wedding and a company party. There are lots of ways to style it, and it really is like an escalated LBD for the cooler months. I highly recommend. One thing is that the fabric doesn't stretch and the slit can be quite high when sitting down, so I wore with tights both times and recommend you do the same or just keep an eye on that slit :)

Love this dress - very soft, comfortable and uncomplicated to wear. Can be styled in different ways very easily with belt and jewelry. Only problem was I'd never worn this brand so I took RTR's recommendation on the size. I'm usually between a 16 and 18 and It said to size up to 20 but there was no need for that so it ended up 1-2 sizes too large. Still OK and I would certainly rent again in a smaller size.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear this to the awards gala, choosing the sparkly, sexier dress I had ordered as backup.
links_Review_Text: I liked it enough to ask my hubby to take me out for cocktails to a swanky jazz bar. Comfortable & elegant. A pretty dress.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear this one, but really nice!
links_Review_Text: Really pretty in person! I chose not to wear this because the bust area was large for me. Everything else fit true to size!

links_Review_Title: Really beautiful dress that I rented for a business cocktail reception, but it was way too sexy.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a business cocktail reception, but didn't end up wearing it. The slit was too sexy and the neckline was very low. I loved it and would definitely wear it to a non-work related event. I'm between a 14 and a 16 and the 16 was way too baggy. The 14 would've been just right.
I think this dress is true to size. I had to order a size 20 when I would normally order a 16 or 18. The 20 was too large, specifically in the waist.
Very pretty dress. I love the designer. I found the whole off the shoulder thing to be a bit annoying. But the side slit was great. Made it just a touch sexy.
Loved this dress, fit really well. Was a little big over the bust (I have tiny boobs) but didn't slip down. Was a tiny bit snug in the waist for me but not uncomfortable.

This dress was a great fit and was made out of a nice stretchy material. I wore it to a cocktail event in February and thought the print was appropriate for the winter as well. Sometimes off-the-shoulder dresses can be a little fussy, but this one wasn't at all. I don't have a large chest, so the cleavage wasn't a problem either. Overall, I was very happy with it.

They just don't come any prettier than this. I'm trying to channel 1960s Mad Men for a themed Valentines event this week. It fits like a glove and is uber flattering. I wear a size 12 and this is a 14 without much room to spare. I will add white pumps and pearls.
Love this dress, I think I'm gonna buy it. No wrinkles, fit perfect, and my body look amazing in it!!

Ugh! This dress is AMAZING! I wore this for my engagement shoot. Both my fiancé and our photographer LOVED it. I considered purchasing, but I have way too many dress that I want to rent. It hugs your curves in all the right places and is incredibly flattering. Rent now!

I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS DRESS! I received so many compliments and it fit every curve perfectly. Very flattering on my body type and slimming in the waist. I think I'm going to buy it because I loved it so much! Also very comfortable. If you do have a large chest it's pretty boobalicious so if you're going to something very conservative, you may want a shawl or something to cover up!

links_Review_Title: Great dress, low-cut for a small chest
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a gala, and loved the overall look. I'm a 34b so the chest was very low-cut and loose.
Beautiful dress and lots of compliments but I wish I had some tape because many pictures throughout the night my chest was falling out

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a fall wedding!
links_Review_Text: Loved wearing this dress, super classy with just the right amount of sexy! This runs small- I typically wear a 12 but the 14 was perfect. Danced the night away and felt great the whole time!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but runs tight for curvy ladies
links_Review_Text: This is a body con dress, especially for curvier ladies. I'm bigger on bottom, but small chested, a size 8 was very tight on bottom but loose on top. Spanx and the right bra seemed to work! The only other fault was the hanging straps kept slipping out of the dress all night, as you can see in the pic. Otherwise I loved the dress, it's a really beautiful pattern!
So flattering and great for a curvy girl!

This isn't a dress I would normally wear, but was stunned the moment I put it on. The vertical floral pattern is super flattering and there's a tiny bit of stretch in the material that made it super comfortable. The neckline is gorgeous and worth the spanx!

The first time I rented it I couldn't zip it up because I ordered in my regular size, but the second go around I sized up and it was perfect. It's such a sexy dress and I love the way it hugs your body and looks so flattering. It's so beautiful. Just don't forget to size up!

I ordered a 6 and the 8 wasn't available for a free backup size -- I probably would've worn the 8 if I had the choice, but the 6 worked out. I have a smaller waist and this was still snug through the tummy on me, but once it was zipped up I was good to go. It was hard to get zipped all the way up alone, so you'll need some help. The neckline is beautiful and makes the dress! It can be somewhat revealing but I was comfortable and secure in it. Didn't have to wear a bra which was a bonus! I wore this to a Mad Men themed party and felt like it fit perfectly. It was fun to wear!
This dress was perfect for a wedding. I got a lot of compliments on it. It's event more gorgeous in person. It does run a bit small, especially if you have a large chest. I would order a size up!

links_Review_Title: Very flattering, perfect for formal event
links_Review_Text: Just enough stretch, looked great even being flat chested ;). Would definitely wear again!
The dress fit true to size and looked great on. I got so many compliments on it! It was perfect to wear to a wedding. Highly recommend!

Weighing in at 150lbs and a 36D, this dress was a little boobalicious but definitely doable and so cute! I loved having the straps up a little higher like shown in the photo. PSA, when sitting that slit is a little uncomfortable for a church ceremony unless you have something to cover it with. I listened to the other reviews and made sure to tape down the hangar straps in front and back, definitely gave me some peace of mind. Overall great, comfy dress that I was able to dance all night in and not have to wear Spanx.

links_Review_Title: Got compliments from groomsmen to little old ladies!
links_Review_Text: Pros: Sexy and classic. The dress has a little stretch and the straps are elastic so the dress stays in place all night. No worrying about adjusting or pulling it up. Cons: I have a pear shape and this dress would be more flattering on someone with more bust and less thigh. This dress is all about the girls! It also has a significant slit so while it fit standing, when I sat down I showed a lot of leg.
This gorgeous dress fit so nicely and had such a lovely silhouette. Nice material and well made. I did wear shapewear with it. Would definitely recommend this dress.

I rented this dress for a wedding. I usually go between an XS-S with RTR dresses because I am 5'2". I went with an XS for this one because I felt like the dress was a bit too long on me and the XS was tighter on my shoulders, providing more security in my bust (I knew I would be doing a lot of dancing that night, and I don't wear strapless bras too often). It ended up being just a bit too snug because of my curves, but I felt confident and sexy nonetheless. I received a ton of compliments! I highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Love but tight fit in wrong areas
links_Review_Text: Dress was a huge hit but it wasn't the most comfortable thing I've ever worn! I went with the 6, but it was extremely tight on the boobs and shoulders and butt. The 8 was more comfortable in that area but super loose and baggy in the waist. I would ABSOLUTELY order a back up size, just to be safe!
