This dress is so beautiful! I went a size up and got a 12 and it was perfect. The top is really sexy and the overall vibe is very classic, sexy and a bit pin-up. It's fitted throughout though and I'm a bit curvy so I had a friend lace me into a corset for a flatter stomach appearance and it made the whole look perfection. Received endless compliments. Love it! Would rent again!
I got many compliments on this dress. I felt great in it. It was a little big on the hips (because I have none) however the pattern made it almost unnoticeable. Overall so pleased!

links_Review_Title: Classic silhouette. Need to pin bust.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful pattern, fabric, and cut. I needed to pin the bust because there was a gap at the top even though I'm rather large chested.

links_Review_Title: Stood out in a sea of black, thought I might fall out of the top the whole night.
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress but it is very low cut. I was worrying I'd flash someone the whole night, especially sitting down or leaning over. Also, it made me look oddly flat chested (I'm a D) which I don't mind too much but found strange. I did not wear a bra (it would have showed) and I didn't feel that I needed one. Otherwise, the dress is comfortable and the slit is not too high, but I wouldn't recommend this dress for the well endowed. Also, no dancing at the event to which I wore this, but this dress would be a nightmare for dancing.
This dress was pretty true to size. Both the 4 and 6 fit me but I felt most comfortable in the 6. This dress was very flattering, especially in pictures due to the beautiful pattern!

links_Review_Title: The dress fit perfectly and was tight in all the right places!
links_Review_Text: I wore a size four and it fit beautifully ! I got compliments all night and felt so good in this dress. It was a warmer day but the fabric was very breathable and I wasn't sweating regardless of the heat. By far one of my favorite dresses I've ever rented !

links_Review_Title: Really interesting style, coloring, and I felt really sexy and comfortable wearing it.
links_Review_Text: This material had some stretch to it, so I had a full range of motion, could dance, eat and have fun without feeling restricted. The colors are pretty cool; this deep emerald green and a dusty brown are in the floral pattern. I really liked the off-the-shoulder cut and it felt sexy and edgy.

links_Review_Title: Loved how it was delivered earlier than expected so if I needed another dress, I had enough time.
links_Review_Text: This dress looked great on! It definitely ran small so I had to go with the next size up. I received tons of compliments and loved that no one else at the wedding had a dress similar to this one.

The dress was definitely true to size! I loved how comfy it felt, and the material, perfect for the outdoor wedding I attended. RTR has been my go to option for weddings and parties. Never disappointed!

The material fit perfectly on my curves. It was very flattering and comfortable. I didn't have to wear spanx because the fabric is thick and forgiving. Loved it. Contemplated purchasing. The 8 was too big around my chest but the 6 fit just right everywhere.

Fit true to size but be prepared for a very tight fit at the top, which understandably is needed to keep the dress up. As a swimmer with a broader back I would have probably fared better sizing up. However, it stayed in place all night and survived the dance floor. The pattern was fun while still elegant and many people liked it! A great summer wedding dress.

Wore this comfortable, sexy dress to the annual fundraiser Down & Derby with my Derby hat. I loved this dress, especially because it wasn't too short, it hugged all the right places, and I didn't have to wear a bra. I would definitely rent it again!

I felt great in this dress! I sized up to accommodate my bust. After I safety pinned it so that it didn’t gape open so much, it fit beautifully in the bust. It also fit nicely in the waist and wasn’t too snug or loose on the stomach. I would have loved it if it was a bit slimmer in the legs/thigh area but it still looked good. The colors and print were very pretty.

links_Review_Title: High quality dress with informal print perfect for a country wedding.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. The fabric is shiny and soft. The cut and print are unique. It is a little hard to keep the dress showing the right amount of cleavage and not too much, some double sided tape would have been helpful. Otherwise perfect. I would say it runs true to size or slightly large.
Perfect off the shoulder dress for spring wedding, does run smaller in the bust area. Wasn't an issue for myself

The dress was perfect for the wedding I wore it to. I rented both the 6 and 8 and wore the 6. Fit was tight while still being flattering. The fabric had a good amount of stretch to it making it comfortable to wear and dance in for hours. I received so many compliments it was a knockout.
Soooo many compliments. Fit perfectly and super easy to dance in!
This fit great but it's very low cut. It's classic black with flair and edge. I loved it.

links_Review_Title: I felt like an evil queen
links_Review_Text: This dress was very comfortable! I love low necklines, but did safety-pin the neckline to keep it in place a little. It was definitely shorter in the back than expected- a combo of the fun asymmetrical hem and my big butt lol. I wore opaque tights and felt totally comfortable. This was great for my pear shape, but it has so many fun draping details that I think it would flatter other bodies too.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit! Loved the fabric, comfortable and flattering
links_Review_Text: Loved the print. True to size and for those with a little extra in the waist area like me, this works wonders. The V line was low (more than I thought) but I think it worked. No issues readjusting at all. Got many compliments. I was hopping it would be a bit longer but oh well... overall, I would totally get this dress again. Fun, sexy and comfortable

links_Review_Title: Love the sleeves, subtle print but very revealing neckline
links_Review_Text: I love a good v-neck but I didn't feel comfortable without pinning it to control the V a little. Everything else I loved about the dress though, as it was perfect for a fancy date night. The sleeves, draping, and subtle print was lovely!

links_Review_Title: Dress was so comfy, and looked amazing and so flattering
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit! Loved this dress!!!!

links_Review_Title: Perfectly gawdy for a themed party
links_Review_Text: Fits really well, a little long in the sleeves, photographs nicely. Probably wouldn't wear anywhere I wasn't tying to look ridiculous, I'm very interested to see how others style it

links_Review_Title: Too big. Awkward style. Not for me

links_Review_Text: Didn't wear the dress, felt too blousy and loose. Felt like I was in the 80's, not trendy

I really liked the puff sleeves and multi length skirt, it was really flattering on and comfortable to wear. Back "keyhole" was a little low though to wear my tank dress style body shaped under it... but I did anyway and left my hair down. The leopard print woven into the tome in tone fabric is cool and adds even more style. Would rent again

links_Review_Title: Overall, very cute and unique dress!
links_Review_Text: This is a very deep v in the front. I ended up pinning it since it was for a work event. Also, the back ended up much shorter than the front so I wore tights.

Cute dress but ran big! Low cut which would have been okay if there was a clasp to close it. Small chest so it was just huge up top for me. Everywhere else fit. Could have pinned it closed but I ended up wearing a different rental.
The dress was fun and simple at the same time. Too bad it was too big for me. I usually wear a M/L so it's a crap shoot I'd get a Large
I wore this for a work event and it was great. I'm bigger in the bust so I had to use a safety pin and me tape for me to feel comfortable but overall it was great. Fit nicely and was flattering

I am an extra large in everything but couldn't get this to zip. Not sure if it runs small or if my boyfriend just isn't a pro at zipping a girl into a dress, but it wasn't happening when I tried it on. Bummer though because it's a gorgeous print and fabric.
This dress felt like an 80s throw back and it was nearly as interesting on as it is pictured.
Fit everywhere as it should but was waaaay to low cut for work!

links_Review_Title: Fit perfect in the waist, huge in the shoulders
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a 80's themed cocktail party. It worked great with the puffy sleeves and overall design of the dress. This dress fit me perfectly in the bodice, but was HUGE in the shoulder area. The shoulders/sleeves fell straight down my arm. I had to safety pin the dress to keep it up. Not sure a medium would have worked, as it would have been too small in the waist.

It is a pretty dress with a light black on black leopard pattern that is hard to see in the photo. The size 4 was a bit big on me and the v is very deep if you are petite, but I made it work and it's a great dress for a cocktail style event.
Dress was way too big on top , no stretch didn't care for the pattern . Felt very 80's
Love the dress, all it needed was a little bra tape and it was perfect!!

links_Review_Title: Wore to my friend's birthday party. Fun, with a flirty back
links_Review_Text: A bit large in the shoulders but good fit overall

Pretty dress but runs big and fits a bit boxy on top. It's open in the back so had to wear a cami. I felt it made me look a little bigger than I would have liked but overall a pretty and comfortable dress.
Fits great, if you're in between sizes I would go a size down since it has a more flowy, oversized appearance. Didn't think I needed a belt but could easily work with one.
Fit was overwhelming for my short frame
I loved this dress. I got so many compliments on it! I wore a black tank under it because the back was open and it was completely work appropriate.
Wore with black slip underneath to make it work appropriate. Got lots of compliments.
Wore to work - didn't expect to be a fan of the diagonal cut but it looked nice. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Business in the front, party in the back
links_Review_Text: Such a great holiday or party dress. Love love love the open back! Will definitely be renting this again.
The open back really made the dress feel special! The print is great and the overall fit was very flattering.

This dress is actually very forgiving for bigger hips! It sits above the waist and is very stretchy and comfortable. The sleeves are sheer so you won't be hot, especially with the flow from the open back!

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress, but did not like the large opening in the back.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress would love to own it
links_Review_Text: Such a fun flirty dress that can be dressed up or down
Really loved how it fit and hung. I received a number of compliments.
Did not like the style or fit of this dress and do not think it was a sizing issue. The irregular hem was odd, as was the elastic waist and arms. Perhaps you will have better luck!

This had a very odd fit. Additionally, if you are large chested it tends to draw the dress to the front and the slit in the back doesn't sit quite right. I thought it fit really strange and only wore it once
Very pretty print. I feel like the open back is unnecessary and makes bra wearing difficult. I wore a black shrug over it to fix that issue on a cold day. Also runs big. I could have sized down.

Very pretty cut on the bottom and lays nicely. I wore this with black tights because it's rather short on one side. I did not realize that the back is open. I rented this to wear to work so I just wore a black suit jacket. It complimented to dress nicely.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress, could use a belt
links_Review_Text: This dress was really pretty, but I tried it on twice and didn't end up wearing it. I felt like it could use a belt (which makes me realize how badly I need to buy one), but both times that I tried it on - I felt a bit like an 80s workout video. The style just didn't particularly suit me, but I would reconsider renting this for an event in the future (once I order a belt!).

I loved this dress!! I actually didn't end up wearing this one because it didn't come very well laundered, there we're spots that almost looked like white out on the front (which were hard to tell because of the detail of the dress). I bought a new one at Saks and received soooooo many compliments! It has an open back so just wore it with a nubra. plenty of space in the chest/arms. Happy it is now in my closet forever!

links_Review_Title: Got this for everyday. Didn't realize the back exposed bra. Still liked the dress overall
links_Review_Text: The fit as true to size. more relaxed and didnt hug my body too much while still giving me shape.

Super pretty dress. I was bummed that the layers just didn't sit right on my hips. It made me look bigger than I am. This dress also has an open back that does open wide with movement. I hated to send it back!

links_Review_Title: It's beautiful, but I couldn't wear it because the backs open (I have scars on my back).
links_Review_Text: Fit well.
The shoulders on this dress are enormous. Be prepared for an 80s shoulder pad look!

links_Review_Title: Wore it a general going out dress.
links_Review_Text: Would suggest sizing down, is a bit large. Otherwise great dress!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but runs big. Didn't fit quite righr
links_Review_Text: Runs big. Pretty pattern

links_Review_Title: Great dress - runs true to size
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size, I ordered up a size based on brand usually runs small. Open back is a nice touch. Work a belt to make it look less big on me. Would rent again...not too dressy or casual was a good fit for a dinner party
Very pretty dress! This was my second option. It has a really cool asymmetrical hem and the open back is very nice as well. This is better for a more casual event.

links_Review_Title: Unlike most IRO this runs TTS
links_Review_Text: I got this for a dinner but I didn't wear it. Usually, IRO runs a little small on me so I sized up to a US 6. This is a shapeless dress that absolutely requires the correct size to pull it off. I recommend going with your usual size.

I love this dress so much! It would be great for a "full bust" figure, as it's huge on top and fitted through the waist and hips (but not tight). However, I'm a pear and it still feels and looks great. The lining is so soft and comfortable. The shortest part of the dress is just above the knee, as pictured on the model. If you have broad shoulders, you're in luck, but if you're small, the sleeves will be very long on you. I'm 5'9" and they fall halfway past my fingertips. There is plenty of room in the elastic waist. I wore it with a turquoise cami to make it work appropriate in the back, as the slit drapes quite a bit and really exposes your back.

Really loved this dress. Tried it on in the flagship store in a much smaller size and went with the size the stylist recommended - which was one up from my normal. In hindsight I wish I stuck with my normal 6P - it was stunning but too big in the chest/straps. Because it was big, I needed to wear a beige strapless bra and you could see it a little in the front. Would totally rent again in a smaller size!
I chose not to wear it. The straps are very thin and I felt they would snap.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Dress But Extremely Low Cut
links_Review_Text: This dress was gorgeous and well made, but it didn't work for my body type. I am a DD/DDD and I felt extremely uncomfortable with how low cut it was. (So uncomfortable I was reticent to take any pictures.) I normally wear a 8/10 in jeans, but with my chest ended up needing a 16 in this dress. Fashion tape is a must, because when I leaned over my breasts fell out. I wish I was more confident for a low cut dress, but I just don't like that look on me. Definitely made for a smaller chest.
I absolutely loved this stunning dress but I had to keep adjusting it all night to make sure my boobs were secured - definitely no jumping around on the dance floor in this one

I was going for a steampunk look and I wasn't sure if this dress would do it. It killed it. The cons of this dress is that it's much more low cut than it looks on the model. I'm not one to EVER put my boobs out there, so it was a lot for me. Buy tape and be prepared for at least one person to tell you they like your dress while staring at the goods.

I rented this dress for a winter wedding. I'm a size 4 petite and the regular length fit just fine with heels. I really wish this dress was a racer back because it's so low cut, I had to keep fidgeting with the dress all night. It was pretty bump friendly, I wore it at 18 weeks and it fit just perfect on my rib cage

I usually wear a 6, and the size 8 fit me perfectly. Although low cut, I didn't need to use any bras or body tape. I think it's in part because I am not very busty. My husband was surprised by how much he liked this dress. I felt great all night.

I'm a 38D and wear 14/16. I wore the 16R and it was great except like others mentioned, the straps were long. I couldn't figure out how to cross straps in the back so I just wore as-is. Showed a bit more cleavage than I would usually be ok with, but I got a ton of compliments and felt great in it!

links_Review_Title: The gown was perfect for a black tie event
links_Review_Text: The straps were a bit too long and the front gaped, but a little clothes tape solved the issue. Loved that this dress had pockets and was very comfortable. I usually wear an 8R in most clothes, but the gown ran a bit small and I ended up with a 12R.

I'm not normally one to enjoy getting dressed up, but I LOVED this dress!! It fit perfectly and had pockets!!! The straps in the back were a little loose, but I didnt do anything to adjust them and had no issues. I received so many compliments on this dress all night. This will probably become me go-to dress for events!!

This dress was actually selected for me when the dress I originally ordered was unavailable for my event. As is typical of RTR's superlative customer service, I actually received 3 different dress options overnighted to me when I wasn't a fan of the replacement option that arrived in lieu of my original dress, with no additional charge to me: amazing! The size 2 was a bit big for me, though the dress is true to size (0 not available), but I wasn't deterred from wearing this gorgeous dress!
Sized down and it fit great. Wore chicken cutlets and showed off more cleavage than I wanted but overall was great.

This dress was stunning and fit perfectly. Well it was long but that's my fault because I'm only 5' tall but with high heels it just missed the floor. The fabric is beautiful and thick enough to give good shape without overdoing it. I ended up wearing my backup dress because this was a little too fancy for my actual event (work holiday party) but I would definitely wear it for something a little more formal. Also it has pockets that you can't tell are there which is always a bonus.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and great for curvy women!
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful in fit and quality but I didn't wear as it I liked my other option better. I agree with other reviewers that the straps are long.
I've worn this dress in every print and it's always a perfect fit. I'm 5'10 and definitely needed the long length even with 2inch heels
Love this dress and it moved beautifully
Wore this to a wedding and sized up one size since I'm 20 weeks pregnant. It was perfect!

It was so comfortable to wear and the pockets are a definite bonus. I was debating between the 6 and the 4 due to a few extra summer pounds around the belly but the 4 fit perfectly. The straps are a little longer than I would have liked and with the low back, I wasn’t able to wear a real bra. Luckily the fabric is sturdy enough that it held itself in place and I wasn’t worried about popping out even with dancing.

I wore this to a formal wedding and got so many compliments! It is a little big, so I'd order a size down. Like others have said, the straps are a little long, but that just made this more of a plunge neckline for me and people loved it! 100% would wear again.

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress and I got so many compliments! Perfect dress for a back tie weeding!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit great with some heels. I'm 5 foot 2 so heels were a must. The low cut wasn't too bad for me but I did have to pull it up a few times. Overall, loved it!
Perfect for black tie wedding at 7 mos pregnant. Size up two sizes from your pre-pregnancy size, and the fit should work!

links_Review_Title: Had a great time at the wedding!
links_Review_Text: I did end up wearing this dress. It was beautiful and I got many compliments. The pockets are always the best part! I felt it was a good material and although the material was quality/think it did not feel heavy. My only complaint is the same as every other review for this dress: The straps are way too long and it causes issues particularly with a large chest. Because it was loose the girls were definitely going to fall out and wearing a bra with the low cut was not an option (double whammy) so I wish they had been adjustable. We had tried to pin them and when that didn't work (the pins would pop open). We used some thread to get them to cinch in the back. I probably wouldn't rent this one again, but it was pretty and received many compliments. It was also easy to dance in. I would have liked a little more leg to show (for my own preference since it is my only/best asset), but the little peek that it had was nice as is too. For info I have been described as an inverted triangle/top heavy. I call myself apple shape, my friends say inverted triangle. So use that info how you will!

This is a beautiful dress but many of the reviews are correct in that its straps are way too long. It also it too stiff and formal for my taste. It doesn't flow well and let's just say I love to dance and this was too heavy for my taste.

links_Review_Title: This dress fit me like it was made for my body!
links_Review_Text: I am so, So, SO in love with this dress. The straps are a liiiiitle too long but I didn't make any alterations and never had any issues with nip slips or anything like that. It's light, comfortable, HAS POCKETS, and I felt like a million dollars and I never wanted to return this dress. I'm 5'7 and I'm all legs, short torso. I would rent this again in a heartbeat

links_Review_Title: Perfect for an evening black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: A bit tight at the top and the straps were loose but overall absolutely gorgeous dress!! Highly recommend.
Loved it

links_Review_Title: Beautiful material, comfy fit, and pockets!
links_Review_Text: This runs a little big. I usually wear a 4 but the 2 fit with no problem. It's a little large in the chest. I wore with a strapless bra, but you could also go braless. Overall I was very happy with the dress - comfortable yet formal enough for a black tie wedding.

links_Review_Title: I rented this for a black-tie optional wedding in Palm Beach and it couldn't have been more perfect!
links_Review_Text: The colours fit in the rest of the wedding guests nicely without standing out too much and the blue fabric is so luxurious. Just like everyone else mentions, the straps are long and need to be tied in the back but a simple safety pin and some fashion tape was all I needed. I would warn those with larger breasts to be cautious though, it is quite low cut! The pockets were perfection and I felt classier than I've ever felt before in my life. I would own this dress if I could!

Beautiful dress! I'm very short and was worried about length, but it wasn't an issue! Very flattering on small chested/waisted ladies. Definitely loved the pockets too! Paired nicely with black/navy and silver or gold accessories. Only complaint is the breast area lacks structure. Would be great to have a thin breast shaper in there. Also, the straps are quite long as other reviewers mentioned.

The pictures don't do this dress justice. It is stunning in person. I would definitely recommend renting a side down. Also, the straps are incredibly long. I actually had to tie them together with a piece of string to be able to wear the dress.

I got tons of compliments on this dress and felt so great wearing it! I found it to be very flattering. As other reviewers said, the straps are very long. In order to make it fit properly, I had to secure the straps together in the back (so they were more crisscrossed) with some black fabric that I tied into a knot. It was a bit noticeable in the back but not too bad. I'm 5'1" and the dress did trail on the ground in the back, but since it was a high low bottom it worked. I'm in between a size 10 and 12, and I probably could have made either size work, but the 12 was very comfortable on. Due to the straps, I probably wouldn't rent again unless I was already prepared with something to keep the straps together that was a bit more sophisticated than what I did at the last minute. The dress does definitely show some cleavage, but because of the full length I thought it was tasteful.

The straps are too long. I bought a heart shaped strap shortener to hold the straps together in the back forming a X after I read other reviews saying that is what they did to fix the problem. It worked really well and helped keep mt beasts lifted so I didn't need a bra.

This dress is beautiful! My husband's jaw dropped when he saw me in it for the first time. I ordered the 4L and the 6R and the 4L fit perfectly. I wore this to a cocktail party/private dinner in Vegas. It was elegant, sophisticated and comfortable. And it has pockets! I did not have an issue with the straps being too long as described by others, but as the night went on, I felt like they stretched out a little and I kept pulling them up. You do not need to wear a bra, but you might want to wear petals and definitely make sure you have Hollywood Tape!
This dress is so beautiful and super comfy! The straps were long and I had to pin them but otherwise it was great. The pockets were an added bonus.

I felt beautiful in this dress, although the girls were out on full showcase showdown. I did have to adjust myself a few times but have zero regrets. Oh, and it HAS POCKETS. It was also very flattering on my apple-shaped figure.

links_Review_Title: My entire RTR outfit was everything I wanted for this event.
links_Review_Text: My dress, clutch and neckless are all from RTR. The dress was a perfect fit and so comfortable for the entire night. The straps were a bit long, but the overall feel was luxurious, unique and beautiful.
be careful if you have large chest as this is cut low. Its stunning though and I got many compliments!

After 4 failed dresses, I called desperate to find a dress for the NEXT night. The girl stayed on the phone with me giving advice about size and length. When the dress came, it was PERFECT!! I received so many complements all night. I felt comfortable and beautiful. I will definitely use RTR again.
True to size with room up top, straps are long.

links_Review_Title: This dress was so elegant and sexy!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfectly except the straps were too long so I had to rig a strap in the back, otherwise it plunged far too low. I received sooo many compliments on this dress!

links_Review_Title: Great skirt!!!! Wear fancy or casual!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my bachelorette party in Vegas for the day that all of the girls were wearing their tribe T-shirts and I was wearing my Bride T-shirt! We decided to wear sequins on the bottom with crazy sunglasses and cute tennis shoes as a daytime glam-casual look. I was obsessed with it! I definitely think it would also look very cute with a tucked in black top and high heels of course! Good rental and easy to travel with :)

links_Review_Title: People stopped me in the streets
links_Review_Text: Amazing skirt. Had to safety pin the waist, but otherwise the skirt was perfect for a NOLA night out. People stopped me in the streets to compliment me

links_Review_Title: The most compliments I have ever received.
links_Review_Text: I rented the 2 and the 0. The 2 was a little big in the hips and too long, but my size down was unavailable. I loved the skirt, but couldn't style it in a flattering way until a friend said to wear it with a basic white tee. Bingo! Instant Carrie Bradshaw party outfit. It was so much fun to wear!

A great, colorful skirt! I ordered a bigger size thinking it'd be a little snug, but it actually was super roomy, so probably could have gotten my normal size. The color and the sequins are so vibrant and it looks awesome in pictures. I opted to wear it with sneaks and go casual, but the beauty of this skirt is that it can be dressed up or down.
Wore to a charity party. It was a great way to be dressed up but feel very comfortable. Would rent again. I wore it with a black bodysuit

links_Review_Title: I am determined to make sequins daytime appropriate.
links_Review_Text: This skirt gave me life. It is beautiful in every way. I like to think it runs true to size and that I am a true size 12, but alas I must admit I am a 14 who squeezed into the 12. I wanted to buy this I loved it so much. I got compliments alllllll day from every walk of life. LOVE LOVE LOVE.
I went out of my comfort zone with this one; color and sequins. But it looked fabulous and I got so many compliments! I would rent again.

I adore this skirt! I had stranger on the street compliment the skirt. Throw a blazer over and you can wear it in the office too. The skirt does run slightly larger so if you're looking for that like a glove fit then size down.

Loved this skirt! Wore it for evening and daytime for a long weekend in Las Vegas. Just the right amount of sparkle for it to be sophisticated and whimsical. Out of the bag, the seat area was a bit rumpled so I had to lay the sequins back down by hand, but other than that, no issues. I'd definitely rent again.
So fun, beautiful, everyone loved it. Showstopper. I would also wear in the winter with a black turtleneck!

links_Review_Title: Had to size down, perfect for bachelorette
links_Review_Text: I originally ordered a 6 which fit but it was boxy so I tried a 4. I would normally call myself a 8, maybe a 6 in sizes. So definitely size down for a slinkier look. The skirt is stretchy but the waistband is not.
Fits true to size, perhaps a bit on the larger side. Very comfortable, a real showstopper… Complements complements complements!

With black top, tights and boots, it made this skirt easy for me to wear to work as a bold fashion statement. I felt confident and also had fun wearing it all day. I went out with my hubby and babies for impromptu dinner because I wanted to wear it out in the evening too!
Super sparkly!
This skirt is everything!! Such eye candy, and the sight of it makes people happy. It runs a little wide in the hips but true to size in waist.
Wore this out for my birthday and it was everything! Great quality and fit perfectly. I got so many compliments and it made me feel like a queen all night!

Sequin stripes done right! Runs surprisingly large for this style, which doesn't have a lot of give. Would size down next time so the skirt fits more on the waist than hips. Overall though, still a fantastic skirt. Tons of compliments!

This skirt runs a little large. Form fitting so I was surprised the 4 fit even around the hips and tush. Fun sparkle and colors for a New Year's Eve Party. I was a little worried at first because it does seem fragile and I did not want the sequins to snag. Ended up feeling comfortable throughout the night and danced without a problem.
I wore this for a date night and received FIVE compliments from both women and men. It was SO FUN to wear. The fit was great and it wanted itchy like some skirts can be. LOVE.

The fit of this was perfect for anyone with a booty!! It hits at the sweet spot of the waist and is so flattering!! I got tons of compliments, but the fact that I could sit, walk, and dance in this skirt is what made it perfect!! It was my second time renting it, it will probably remain in the rotation!!
I love this skirt. Wore for a night out and received so many compliments. It is beautiful.
I rented this skirt to wear to Vegas. I wanted something flashy but not too skimpy. I loved the colors in this skirt. Stood out in the sea of black. Felt classy but sexy.

This skirt definitely got a lot of attention. It was perfect for a night out. I dressed it down with a cropped sweater. I wore a size 6 and it was a bit too big. Would definitely size down to a 4 if you're between sizes.
Stretchy, comfortable, chic

When I tried this on, I did not love it and I was considering wearing something else. The sequins in the back were very ruffled from being worn and cleaned. But- I am so glad I did wear it. Every person at the party I attended stopped me to tell me how much they liked the skirt. It felt great! I may rent again if the right event comes up, hoping that I get one a little less worn.

Rented this for my Birthday celebration and it was fun to wear, but it didn't exactly fit the way I had hoped. The sequins were raised in the back and I'm sure it's from being sat on so often. Not as much give as I thought it had...still fun, but not a fave.

links_Review_Title: I wore this skirt to a Taylor Swift concert and ended up loving it! The sequins were a hit.
links_Review_Text: I am typically a size 2 and wore a 0 in this skirt. I would say it runs a little big.
Be prepared to say thank you because you will receive compliments the entire time. Skirt is structured but with room to breath. I plan to buy !!p
Great signature piece for a night out. Loved the fit and sparkle.
So fun - people stopped in their tracks to comment and compliment the skirt! Such a fun outfit.

links_Review_Title: Female Positivity! Compliments all night long!!
links_Review_Text: I'm between a 4/6, the 4 fit perfect. Very comfortable to wear, wore it to a concert and it was such a fun night.
I rented this for work to be on trend w "anytime sequins " & got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: I received SO MANY compliments on this skirt. It was comfortable and fun to wear.
links_Review_Text: I wore this with a simple black body suit.

links_Review_Title: A compliment from every person who sees it.
links_Review_Text: Fits like a dream. Very stretchy. A little long, so if you are short, it will be boxy past the knee, so definitely don't wear flats or it will look dumpy. Wear with a tucked in or cropped top. I wish it were fitted past the knee, but....we can't have it all ;-) The colors were vibrant and amazing. Runs 1/2 size large.
Loved this skirt so much and received so many compliments!
I love this skirt! I wish I could wear it every day. It fits great and is the perfect addition to add some sparkle to your outfit!

links_Review_Title: Great skirt!! Loved it and very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: It fit perfect.
This skirt was a little hard to combine with top but going with a simple black or simple white top both worked. I received so many compliments and people stopped me in the streets.

links_Review_Title: Everything was on time & fit good.
links_Review_Text: This skirt is gorgeous!!! It runs large. I am normally a 4 but I wore the size 2 because the skirt was large in the hips. The sequins in the butt area of the skirt were sticking out on different areas instead of laying flat because of sitting on them. So I manually went over the areas and flattened the sequins out. Overall I would rent it again because I received more compliments from MEN than WOMEN about how beautiful the skirt was. This was by far another successful rental.

Yes, rent it!!!!! I wore this in vegas and it was perfect. The colors and fun sequins made it so sexy (without being revealing) and I had the best time wearing this skirt. The 4 was a smidge larger than I expected but I liked it bc i could wear a thin layering turtleneck underneath and still breathe and enjoy dinner.

I wore this post-baby to hide my pooch. I'm currently 150 lbs and have a 34 bust and large behind. This dress more than complimented my curves while making me feel gorgeous and glamorous. I got endless compliments. This dress is so comfortable with stretchy fabric. I wish I could keep it.

links_Review_Title: Gots lots of love on the dress and the color, especially from the fellas
links_Review_Text: Shifts alot when you sit

I LOVED this dress. It fit like a glove - I rented size SP, and with 4-inch heels it was perfect for my 5'0" frame. The color has a tint of magenta, which I loved, and it was quite stretchy. I have no complaints about this dress. I even forgot to tape it and it still stayed put all night. I loved it and would recommend to anyone!

links_Review_Title: Who can go wrong with a fabulous pink dress
links_Review_Text: Easy to move around in but a little shorter than I expected. I had to pin it in the back to sit right on my hips. Fabric not as high of quality as it looked in pictures but still came and looked stunning

This dress was SO comfortable, sleek and sexy. I'm 5'11 and it was plenty long. The only thing I would flag is that I'm a 32 D and I wish I had some form of fashion tape - the top is definitely made for a bigger chest! I think next time I would have ordered a small rather than a medium.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a fancy night out
links_Review_Text: Beautiful, comfortable, perfect length so it didn't drag with like 3 inch heels. Definitely showy so I wouldn't recommend it if you're going to be around ppl who are easily scandalized. I definitely would say it's a classy dress though.

The deep V on top made it tricky to keep my C-cups chest in, even with fashion/body tape. I ended up safety pinning the top up a bit higher just so they wouldn't pop out. But the heavy jersey fabric draped beautifully and hid all problem areas! Rent if you're smaller cheated or if you're really good at doing the no-bra thing.

Great dress! Hugs in all the right places! Great for hourglass figures and very forgiving due to the ruching in the tummy area. The color is as described. Other reviews made me think the dress was possibly more red. Upon receiving I was happy to see it had a more fuchsia color. It does run large up top. I kept having to make sure my sleeves weren't falling while sitting. But standing it was fine.

links_Review_Title: Love the color! So stretchy and comfortable

links_Review_Text: The fit drew attention to my love handles, which was a me thing not a dress thing. The drape happened to fall just south of my side fat and seemed to draw attention to it! Id rent this number again after going to the gym for a bit :) all my kiddos thought I should've worn this over the stunning green one i rented.

I absolutely LOVED this dress. It was incredibly comfortable and perfectly complimented my curves. I'm small-chested so the front was a tad big on me but other than that, this dress was perfect. Hugged me in all the right places! Perfect for the outdoor wedding I attended in Miami.

I rented this gown for NYE, alongside the brown fur coat. The dress, I found to be true to fit and really has that elegant, glamorous look I was hoping for my NYE bash. It is one of those dresses that looks more geared towards an older crowd, so it shouldn't probably be listed in the 20s category. But a few accessories and hairstyling helped make it look youthful enough.
Not as flattering as I thought it would be. The shoulders kept wanting to fall every time I moved around. You definitely need boob tape with this one!

This dress is very pretty in person. The material is a little heavy but is also forgiving thanks to stretch and draping. My only complaints are that without tape the top would've fallen down, and my heels kept getting caught in the material at the bottom. Still, it's a great dress.

A very beautiful gown for the New Year's Eve gala that I attended. Received many compliments, as the dress was stunning on! Fabric was stretchy and fit true to size. The slit in the front was a bit longer than expected, but still very beautiful. Would rent again!
This dress was pretty tts and very comfortable. Had to use fabric tape because dress was slightly big on top. Other than that absolutely loved this dress!

links_Review_Title: Got lots of compliments on the dress
links_Review_Text: Fits well. Not sure why it has that extra layer of fabric on the left side. But other than that it’s a great dress

links_Review_Title: This dress fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: I loved how this dress hugged all of my curves in the most perfect way. I used fashion tap around my chest to prevent any slips! I wish I could keep this dress, it was so comfortable and so so flattering.

links_Review_Title: So flattering, but couldn't find a bra that worked with it :(
links_Review_Text: It just went too low in the back and my boobs just pop out of those stick-on bras. Also, this dress is not red like I had expected it to be. It was more of a dark fuchsia.

links_Review_Title: Dress fit great. Perfect for James Bond Themed formal Holiday Party
links_Review_Text: I am 5'5" and 115 lb. Both the small and x-small fit. I ended up wearing the x-small. Flattering dress that has some stretch to it.

Loved this dress, wore for a wedding. Very comfortable and the front knot hides any tummy insecurities. Hard to wear a bra with it so I didn't wear one, but had to be careful of no slip nips! Got lots of compliments. The color is between a red and hot pink.

Even tho I wasn't happy by having to pick a dress last minute due to problems with my other choices this dress was so comfortable. Felt so light and I received multiple compliments all day. Mostly stayed in place with the help of a little tape

Loved this dress for a wedding I went to. Im between a 8/10. The size 8 was available so I went with the 10. I did need to use fashion tape for close the front a bit because the top portion of the dress was a little loose for me. Overall I loved it! Super comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on the color and style.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. Stretchy material, very comfortable.
A low cut gown that allowed attention to the girls while hiding my trouble area in my midsection. Felt like an awards show dress, and added a fanciness to our engagement photos. Perfect!

Nice red dress that runs TTS. I gave it 4/5 stars because there is a little extra material on the one side that drapes back. To me it makes it look off balance and a little wider! Still a very nice dress

links_Review_Title: 10th wedding anniversary in, still felt special in this dress
links_Review_Text: Hugs in all the right places, and my husband couldnt stop complimenting me.
It was a beautiful color, but was a little too low cut for the engagement I was going to.
Couldn't wear because I got the flu. Nice fit but the sash thing just too weird. Where do you put it?
Looked elegant and classy. I wore it for more than 8 hours and it moved well and was very comfortable. Recommend highly

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but tough for large chest.
links_Review_Text: The material shows everything - I would have had to go commando. The straps continue to beg to be pulled down. I would have been able to wear this with my Misses Kisses bra (large chested ladies you MUST check it out) but I would have needed fashion tape from the middle of my breast to my shoulder. Beautiful dress thought, the draping is flattering and lovely.

links_Review_Title: Not for us smaller chested gals
links_Review_Text: This dress had potential with its beautiful color and draping but the top part was waaay too big on me, not sure it would've made a difference if I had at least a D cup though

I wore this to a winter black tie wedding and absolutely loved it. The fabric is quite stretch and comfortable, so didn't feel suffocating. Because of this, there were areas where it was a bit loose - especially with the plunging neckline. Would also note that this dress is a bit more pinkish red than the photo shows. Still a beautiful and flattering color.

links_Review_Title: Feeling confident in how I looked in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress! I felt so beautiful and sexy in this, and got so many compliments on it. The XLR ran a little big on me up top, but I ended up using body tape to make sure nothing popped out on front. I'm 5'7" and had a small heel on and it was the perfect length. Would absolutely recommend this dress for a special occasion!

links_Review_Title: This dress helped my night be absolutely amazing!
links_Review_Text: The fit is true to size, made me feel sexy and comfortable. Very flattering cut and gorgeous color that stood out!

This dress is for those who aren't afraid to be daring! Word of caution for those with a larger bust size, this is a bit hard to manage. I did pin the extra fabric at the shoulders to try and provide more coverage in the bust. I loved the draping of the gown and it was a good length for my tall frame, even with heels. I was disappointed in the color. It has a pink tone, not a deep red like it looks in the picture. It was fun for a James Bond themed fundraiser!
I’m a 32A and couldn’t fill it out at all. Also thought it was more pink than it seemed online, beautiful dress though!
Perfect for an afternoon wedding

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress, it was comfortable, fit perfectly, and was a fun color!
links_Review_Text: Fit is definitely tight but all Ref dresses run small. I would not recommend for shorter people. I liked that the slit didn't go too high.
This was one of my fave dresses I've ever rented! The color is stunning and the fit was perfect for me. It was really comfy and simple yet sexy.

links_Review_Title: I needed a grand Piano and a Spotlight
links_Review_Text: This dress was really comfortable, I got so many compliments and I felt so confident in it. It's just fitted enough to show off the bod without being tight. If you don't have a flat stomach it will show so if you're self-conscious about that be aware. The only thing I didn't like is that the tightest part of the dress hit slightly above my natural waist because I had to tighten the straps. so I had to wear the size up because my ribs are wider than my waist. Overall great fit and great dress.

I wore this to a nice dinner with my boyfriend's colleagues in Boston. Got lots of compliments but I didn't feel like it was a wow. It was perfect for the occasion however. After sitting for drinks at our hotel I had to go back up and steam the dress again! It wrinkles very easily! Also it is unforgiving in the mid section. I wore a spanx and still felt that it revealed a slight pudge! Beautiful but probably looks best on tall women (of which I am not!)
Simple and comfortable. Got lots of complements. Only problem I had was zipping it up. Runs small.
Amazing dress - it's very fitting

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love, just not for me
links_Review_Text: Based on reviews, and the fact that I am usually either a size 4 or 6 (5'8", 150 lbs), I ordered those two sizes specifically and never would have fit in the 4 so 6 it was! While it did "fit" on top (still a bit tight with a bra), the bottom made me feel incredibly self conscious of any belly that I might have. I wore Spanx which helped but, again, not super comfortable. Reformation is definitely a narrow-fitting brand so if you have even the slightest notion that you may need more room on bottom than top, size up an extra size. Also, the wrinkling of this fabric was not ideal. If ever chose to rent Reformation again, I will size up to an 8 and go with a patterned fabric to remedy those two main issues.

links_Review_Title: Easy to dance in, but you may need some spanx
links_Review_Text: The dress was great! It wrinkled easily, so be careful how you sit. It was also much tighter in the waist than anticipated so that picture you see is with spanx (they will show through the side slit, but just roll the one leg) I would say it runs small due to how it fits at the waist. The length was great, the fabric was great, everything was great. My only issues were the tightness and that the straps couldn't really get to a comfortable fit, but it ended up fine. I wore them with some Chinese Laundry nude wedges.

links_Review_Title: Super Comfortable and Loved the Color
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a wedding rehearsal dinner. I found it super comfortable and loved the adjustable straps. I did wear a spanx-like slip underneath to smooth out my stomach and provide a bra as there is not structured support in the dress. I normally wear a size 8 pants and non-gown dress. I got the 10 to be safe as I didn't have a backup. Due to the elastic in the back, I think I could have also worn the 8, but I was really happy with the way the 10 wore as well.
This dress was lightweight, comfortable and easy all while being bold and fun. The adjustable straps were a huge plus as were the length/slit combo.

This dress was perfect for dancing and the color is stunning. Very comfortable, simple yet sexy. I'm almost always a size 2 but needed to size up to a 4. I'm 5'11'' and it was a great midi length. Highly recommend!

This dress got soo many compliments. It was fun to dance in, and was relatively comfortable. It doesn't get five stars because it was thin and not overly forgiving, it wrinkled easily, and even though I wanted to go bra-less, the fabric showed everything and I needed a sticky bra just to protect in case of cold weather. But it was such a knockout that my boyfriend talked about buying it for me if I find an occasion to wear it again. Also, runs a little small. If you move between two sizes and are curvy, pick the higher size or even size up.

It’s a simple skinny strap sundress, but the solid vibrant red color makes it such a great dress! It can be dressed up or down easily. I went with the 10R for more chest space. Overall, I’d recommend this for any day or night date or event- all year round.

Good, basic reformation dress. It fit a bit small for me, especially around the waist (usually not a problem with other reformation 4s). I could have easily worn a 6. Otherwise a great go-to and easy for summer.

links_Review_Title: Love Rent The Runway! This dress was perfect for my college graduation.
links_Review_Text: I wore size 4R. I am 5'5'' and 122 pounds. The dress fit perfectly.

Got a ton of compliments! Usually wear a 4 or 6 and wore a 6 in this dress.. Fits true to size. The upper back portion has a stretchy material for some give and the straps are adjustable. Wrinkles very easily when you sit down and the ruffles on the top don't stay upright.
Beautiful color and super flattering.
#vacation
Great fit, so comfortable, got so many compliments

Wore this dress in Buenos Aires and it was perfect. Such a bold vibrant red, and simple yet elegant cut. It also has a high slit which was unexpected but super hot! It runs true to size. It usually wear a 4, but only 2 was available so I made it work- but would have been more comfortable in a 4!
This dress is sexy without being too sexy and just perfect. I’m 5’2” and 125 lbs 34/36A and the 4R fit perfectly. It’s easily dressed up/down and super comfy for dancing.

links_Review_Title: I didn't get a chance to wear this
links_Review_Text: Pretty but I didn't get a chance to wear this

Ordered a size 8, which I normally fit into but when I received it, it didn't fit from the middle of my back. So, I ordered the same dress but one size up. They didn't have a size 10 so I had to go with a size 12, which I thought was gonna be way too big but actually it fit just right.
The dress fit almost perfectly, I'm curvy so it was a gamble. It fit better than expected. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner and it was great. It has a slit in the side, which I hadn't noticed.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress but it is a little small in the bust and stomach area. It was a bit snug for me but still loved wearing it. The strap did end up snapping towards the end of the night (yikes!) so I think I should have been in a 12 for my bust size. I easily fixed it with a pin for the rest of the night and RTR didn't charge me for it (thank you RTR). Size up if your busty!

links_Review_Title: The dress was a beautiful, vibrant red that was easy to move in.
links_Review_Text: Fit me perfectly! I am short with a small bust and large hips, and this dress perfectly hugged my curves without being inappropriate. This dress was very easy to move/dance in and I felt beautiful in it!

Simple, yet reasonably sexy red dress! I usually wear a 4 or 6 in dresses and for this, I wore a 4, but a 6 would probably have fit better since the dress runs a tad small. I wore nude Spanx underneath because the torso is snug and it shows every little curve and dimple (make sure to get Spanx that end high up on your leg because of the slit). The straps are adjustable and I didn't have to wear a bra with it, which I love! The upper back part has a stretchy section, but that's the only part of the dress with any give/stretch to it. Cons - The material wrinkles and creases the second you sit down and the ruffle detail does not stay in place. But neither of those things really bothered me on the day of the event!
didn't wind up wearing it because it was a little snug. Reformation seems to run a little small so definitely get a back up size! Overall really cute dress and maybe I'll try again with the brand :)

I rented this for a wedding. I'm typically a size 4 but could barely zip the dress. There's also a large slit up the side which I didn't notice in any pictures. I had rented this for a family wedding and didn't feel that it would be appropriate even if it had fit.

links_Review_Title: Tight on all the wrong areas
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a wedding. I sized up as that was what was recommended. I loved the style of the dress, it wasn't snug and was great color. However, the material is thin and showed details i would want people to see (the outline of my belly button of one). The material does have a lot of stretch to it, though. If I were to rent again, I would go two sizes up.
Unfortunately for some reason I didn't order a back up size! So mad at myself because this dress is darling!!!!! Sad I got a 6 rather than an 8! Go a size up!
I have a slim upper body and this dress fits perfect.

I was not able to wear this dress because it unfortunately is more fitted in the hips than I expected. The top fits more like a 2 and the hips fit like a true 4 while I was expecting them to be forgiving to curvier hips :( Size up if you are pear shaped!

A classic knockout dress. Unfortunately I got sick for the event that I planned to wear this, but I will be reserving it again in the future! Reformation does run small, so I'm glad I ordered a backup size one larger than normal.

links_Review_Title: Looks nice, got a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: A little tight in the rib cage. I liked the adjustable straps so they don’t slide off.

I rented this as a backup and didn't end up wearing it. It fit true to size and was pretty. I just didn't feel there was anything super exceptional about the dress. I rented another reformation dress with a floral pattern that stood out more. It's definitely a solid choice and I would rent again as a backup with a riskier primary choice.

Ordered my size and a size larger. My normal size did not fit at all and the size larger was too tight. If you're interested in renting this dress and have any feminine curves, I would get a size larger than your normal size and the next size up from that as a back up.

links_Review_Title: A bit snug in the chest, and I sized up. Wrinkles easily.
links_Review_Text: I sent back without wearing. Great color though. Just not for me.

links_Review_Title: Super sexy dress for date night!
links_Review_Text: I totally forgot to take a photo but I felt super hot in this dress. It hugged everything perfectly. I didn't even have to wear a bra. I took one star off because it was a little long. It hit me mid-calf, maybe even a bit longer. It would have been perfect if it was a little shorter.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely Comfortable Dress for Vegas Birthday!
links_Review_Text: I wore this gown for my birthday celebration in Vegas, and it was perfect! I wanted to look fabulous during my trip, but I also didn't want to be uncomfortable. This dress was so comfy and so beautiful. I wanted a simple black dress with a bit of character (off the shoulder, high/low), but room for accessorizing. I would definitely rent this again!

I was really nervous about using RTR because clothes are really hard to find that fit. I went with the 12 to be comfortable but could have fit the 10. The length with my 2" heels was perfect. I got so many comments on this dress and felt like a queen!
Beautiful dress. Was sad to return. Material was heavy and flattering. Travels well

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my Christmas party
links_Review_Text: Very elegant fits like a glove and very comfortable.
Classic, comfortable option for a black tie event. Received compliments all night! Would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: The fit was perfect and it hugged in all the right places. Beautiful and comfortable!

links_Review_Text: It fits great. Very elegant.

This dress was beautiful! I wore it to my friends black tie wedding and it was perfect. It is on the larger side and stretchy. Normally I wear a 2 but the 0 was even a little big. It is hard to lift your arms...but it was fine :) I'm 4'11 and it was a little long so people stepped on the train. I would rent again !!!
Very forgiving , thick material and you dance the night away

This dress was super comfy..soft material. The only thing is there shoulda been was a little stitch or something to hold the fold over flap, along the top of the dress down...bec it didn't stay at all all night. Other then that, no complaints!!!

I wore this dress to a charity gala. I ordered the 8 and the 10 and both fit. I went with the larger size for comfort. Received many compliments. I am 5'6" and wore four inch heels and the back of the dress still had a small train
The dress fit perfect. Would get again. Got many compliments

I wore this as a bridesmaid dress. I liked it a lot and it was very comfortable. The only thing that bothered me was that the fabric that folded across your arms and chest kept flapping up so I was constantly adjusting the dress on the dance floor. Not a huge problem if you are standing still or sitting but was annoying on the dance floor!

The dress fit true to my size. I was worried about the length since I’m 5’8’’ but with the regular, wearing high heels made the dress fit perfectly. The fabric is flexible so dancing was comfortable and great.

I love a high-drama black dress and for an off-the-shoulder number, this surprisingly didn't need constant adjustments. It was easy to move around in and the material felt great even after sitting for hours. I would absolutely rent again!
It was a tiny bit big, but overall great and comfortable
The dress was extremely comfortable and stretchy. I wore it to a black tie wedding. The back was a bit long even with extremely high heels. It dragged on the floor.

links_Review_Title: Old Hollywood look for a black tie wedding - got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was a fantastic fit. I am 5’2” and needed an exchange for another dress that was too long. Pros - fabric was great - sturdy, but flexible for dancing, the cut itself is flirty but classic, I felt great in it. Con - trailed a bit but honestly, I kind of liked that as well.

The fabric is great but with a little stretch and rather wrinkle-resistant. Love to show-off my neckline, but I admit the side straps limit my arm movement. There is some boning around the bust to add shape if you want to go braless.

links_Review_Title: Not impressed. The dress makes me look 10 years older. Returned without wearing it!!!!
links_Review_Text: Don't fit. Too large. The tail is too long given high low design.

links_Review_Title: This black dress was exactly what I was looking for and complimented my body type. It was perfect!
links_Review_Text: I love how this dress fit and it was also very comfortable. The material had a bit of stretch to it so it wasn't too tight. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone attending a formal event. I'm 5'9 and the dress was the perfect length from the ground with heels and was not dragging.

I wore this to the Barnstable brown gala in Kentucky the night before the derby. Overall fit is true to size - it was a slight bit big in the chest and waist but I also have 34B bust size. I felt like absolutely amazing in this dress and got so many compliments. I will definitely be renting again.
Super comfy and gorgeous. My only slight complaint was that the hanger straps occasionally needed to be put back

It was perfect for the event. I'm 5'5, 120 pounds and work 4 inch heels. The dress length was absolutely perfect. I normally wear a size 4/6 so the dress definitely runs big (as I work a 2). The picture is my significant other and I laughing.
When the original dress I rented looked awful, I ordered this as an emergency replacement. It looked fantastic and fit really well!

links_Review_Title: This dress was so great for a black tie evening!
links_Review_Text: This dress was fabulous for a 20 week baby bump on a 5" tall short chick.

links_Review_Title: Very fun work gala with the significant other, I fit right in!
links_Review_Text: I am a bit on the curvy side, 5'3 and about 160 lbs, and loved wearing this dress! It had a thick material that honestly reminded me of scuba gear, but that helped it glow over any imperfections and keep everything tucked in. I might have gone down a size had I know the material was so forgiving, but overall it was very comfy and a pretty, simply black dress. I would say for shorter girls be prepared for the step (hi-low) hem to not hit like the photo of the model does...
I usually wear a 10 but decided to size up. The 12 fit perfect. I was able to wear a regular strapless bra. The quality of the dress was amazing. I received lots of compliments.

Stretchy fit- I went with my back-up size which was one size smaller than my usual dress size. The high-low hem was great for my petite frame. I had a hard time keeping the top folded over and the long back is attached with an awkward seam straight across in the calf area. Overall, it was a sophisticated, timeless look I paired with winged, pack liner and red lips. Happy with the choice!

Wore this for a black tie gala and got a million compliments. The fabric is not to thin, which is fantastic. Definitely glad I sized up, the 8 would have been very snug. I was able to move and eat in size 10!

The dress was for a gala event. The night was incredible. The fit was perfect. It's a great length of my 5’6 stance. Would recommend for anyone. The material is tick enough to give it sway but it stands up alone on the flow down the legs if that makes sense.

The dress was pretty, but nothing spectacular. I wore it for a black tie suggested event. The sleeves stayed put all night, I was surprised! The material is nice and thick to hide any imperfections, but overall i wasn't terribly impressed with the dress.
28 weeks pregnant... this dress was so comfortable and fit so nicely. Very stretchy and was not restricting on my belly. Received tons of compliments and truly felt beautiful!

I rented this dress for formal affair at work. It is conservative enough to wear around colleagues yet it's still formfitting and sexy. I liked the dress because it was a very thick stretchy fabric. It held you in and hugged your body. The high-low was a nice feature. The cons are that it ran big. I am a true size 6 and it was definitely big on me and the four would have been better. Also, the neckline rides up and you have to pull it down throughout the night and keep folding it over. If you want a safe option this would be a great dress.
The only negative about this dress is that you can't raise your arms almost at all. It does run big, so opt for the smaller size. I got so many compliments!

What do you do when you're 8 months pregnant and have a a black tie optional wedding? You visit a RTR store if you can. Hannah reviewed my account & short list and pulled this show stopper out. It's a stretchy material (believe it or not!) and worked perfect in more ways than one. I am 5'2" and was not going to wear tall heels (these are very short heels). It is snug around my baby bump but not to the point where you can't breath or uncomfortable for the baby. Easily can sit down in it. Black is always flattering and received so many compliments. With this baby weight, I was about 150 lbs. I also didn't wear a bra. Thick enough for coverage there and wasn't spilling out.

links_Review_Title: Great option for black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: Shoulders were a little annoying, but fit great and loved the material

links_Review_Title: I love RTR! RTR sent my dresses several days earlier than when I actually needed them! A huge plus!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely beautiful!!!

links_Review_Title: Amazing NYE wedding! Fanciest wedding I've ever been to. Food was great and ambiance was perfect.
links_Review_Text: Pros: The dress is a comfortable, stretchy material but still looks very classy. Cons: The train was too long on me so I had to hold the train all night so it wouldn't drag on the floor and get ruined. I think this dress runs a little big, because I think the 2 would've fit me just fine. Overall, I am glad I rented this dress and would recommend it for a black tie wedding.
Stunning dress. Showed all curves. Got so many compliments. Very classy dress
Great statement piece. Perfectly placed and a gorgeous fabric! Plenty of fabric of coverage for someone with a slightly larger chest to still feel secure.

links_Review_Title: Different take on a simple black top...
links_Review_Text: I loved this top! Ended up wearing it twice. Contemplated buying it. It's completely open in the back and cropped so definitely need high waisted paints for this one.
Obsessed with this!!! I will for sure rent again just so I can buy it !

links_Review_Title: Flattering, goes with everything, looks more $$ than it is
links_Review_Text: I wore this 3x before returning it and will likely rent again. It's a pretty perfect date top in that it shows skin without looking sleazy or try-hard. I wore it once with those plaid Monse pants and didn't get a photo, but THAT was an amazing outfit.

links_Review_Title: So flattering and easy to wear!
links_Review_Text: This shirt is awesome--so flattering and so easy to wear. I would recommend it to anyone. I wore it to a college football game and got tons of compliments! The cut is just right.
This top is so cute and comfortable that I ended up buying it. I wore it out for a night on the town and plan on wearing it a bunch more

links_Review_Title: Works great with high waisted pants
links_Review_Text: Great dressy halter top. Wore strapless bra once but found I could get away without bra at all.

links_Review_Title: I didn't like the way that it fit at the bottom.
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear.
This looks like it is much longer than what it is in real life. If you have a long torso it will look more like a bra than a crop top.

links_Review_Title: loved the halter look and super comfy but sexy!
links_Review_Text: fit great ! super flattering!
I like the top, from the bottoms at the halter to the tie back, but I have a shorter torso and this was just not long enough!

links_Review_Title: Kind of hard to wear, but cute and sexy if you can figure out how to make it work for you.
links_Review_Text: This is a very sexy shirt but a little baggy for my smaller breast size. Someone with larger breast might need to use some clothes tape to keep is pulled together in the front though. My husband really liked it on me. The back is super sexy and felt sexy in it.
Sophisticated but with a hint of sexy. The medium crop top hit right at the top of my high waisted jeans. Really enjoyed this top. Considered buying it.
Great fit, super comfy and flattering
Super short dress! A little itchy with all the sequins. Definitely a show stopper!

Loved this fun dress! Wore it to a bachelorette party in Miami. It's loose and comfortable to wear. Beware that it is short (I'm 5'2) and the sequins got a little itchy after a while on the lining at the back of the dress.

This dress was so cute for my Mardi Gras date party! It really stands out and I got so many compliments. The dress is pretty short (but I knew that when I ordered it because of the brand) and the sparkles were itchy. It was great for the event and I would order it again! Lots of compliments and a great statement
Adjustable straps made it a perfect fit! Got tons of compliments
My daughter looked super cute in this sequin number but dang it was short!!! Loved the open back

Loved the loose fit! There's a lot of space in the stomach/chest area and you can tell where it hangs in the back. This was the flowy look I was going for tho! Loved this dress but a tinge itchy in the boobs and underarms areas! Photographs super well!!
Very flattering & comfy for NYE with a faux fur jacket! My only criticism is that the sequins were very itchy... but the jacket helped with that!
Loved this dress. Definitely could've gone one size smaller. The straps tend to fall. And the sequins are scratchy.

Meant to be a looser, slip type fit but still flattering! Lose enough to comfortably dance in but the sequins under the armpits are pretty scratchy. Got lots of compliments and really loved to colors!

I absolutely loved this dress!!! The sparkles, the fit, the back of it...so dang pretty!!!! The sequins don't tend to poke your arms a bit but I worked past that. I'm bigger in the busy area and it felt like had a bit of extra fabric near my arm pits but it wasn't terrible. It definitely is short so if you aren't comfortable with that, this dress is not for you. But I absolutely loved it!!!
Rented this for a concert. I loved the fun print and flirty length. Such a fun dress!
Wore this for my birthday for a night out in Miami! Received so many compliments ! Rented both the medium and large, both fit but liked the looser slip dress fit!

links_Review_Title: I got various compliments wearing this
links_Review_Text: It was a little scratchy near the armpits, so sizing up is a good idea.

Rented this for Miami and absolutely loved it. I was between the small and medium and ended up getting the medium because people said it was short. I'm glad I got the medium for length but it was a little boxy but still loved it.
Runs big for certain, and the bagginess makes it itchy underarms and back. But was fun and perfect for the occasion. Just prepare for discomfort as the night continues.

I rented this for the Pride parade. It was the perfect mix of sequins and color. I got compliments all night. I'm a size 4 and the small fit perfectly and I still had room. The straps are adjustable which was a big help. The only downfall is the sequins will scratch your skin.
I had such a fun birthday in this dress. It runs big, so I got an XS. Felt comfortable and glam all night. Would def rent again!

links_Review_Title: Short colorful sequin mini! Be prepared to look like a colorful disco ball in the best way.
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a nightclub. Good stretch and no bra necessary. Just a heads up it's very short. No bending. Definitely a stand and look cute dress.

links_Review_Title: Fun after party dress but wished photographed better
links_Review_Text: I'm 125lbs, 5'5". This dress was for the reception/after party for a wedding in which I was the maid of honor. I got so many compliments, was told it "stole the show"! It's a great dancing dress. Would recommend wearing booty shorts with it. My one con is it looks frumpy in pictures but in person it's so sexy and flirty!!

I wore this for my husband's birthday party at a swanky night club. As other's have mentioned, it is not a form-fitting dress. It was fantastic at any rate. I was literally stopped/complimented about 20 times. This was a stand-out piece that I loved!
Rented this for my birthday dinner - got compliments and overall loved it! The straps are super long and I had to tighten them all the way but otherwise it was good! Definitely true to size.

I loved this dress! It was very forgiving in your mid-section, but super short which still made me feel sexy. I normally wear a M but the S fit perfectly. The straps are adjustable. I wore a sticky bra, it was perfect for the dress since the back is low cut. The only con for me was the scratching under the armpits from the sequins. After a few drinks, it stopped bothering me ;) I got a million compliments on it, it really stands out. VERY FUN!
So fun! Has mesh between the sequins. So well made. Felt great wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Loves this for my bachelorette in Mexico! Got so many compliments and I shined like a disco ball!
links_Review_Text: I am 34B, small waist and bigger butt/hips so pear shaped. I was able to wear no bra with this, and was also extremely comfortable. These style dresses usually aren't flattering on me b/c it doesn't show off my waist, but i felt beautiful in it. Loved the look and will definitely rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a fun 70's themed party!
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress. A tad short. May be a problem for others but wasn't for me! Also a bit itchy since this is a sequin dress. Very comfortable though and worked perfectly.

links_Review_Title: So fun and comfortable, I danced all night
links_Review_Text: The fit is so fun and comfortable, it's not skin tight so you can relax. It's a little short so beware of that but so much fun
Greet dress. Only had large to rent ... sequins in the armpit area ... not the nicest feeling. Overall FUN dress!

I listed this dress as TTS but would say it runs just a touch big. I vacillate between xs/s depending on style, brand, fit preference etc. however with this dress I could not have worn the s it would have been too big. With that said, I loved it! I wore it to a Vegas themed charity party. It was so comfy and easy to wear. No itchy sparkles under the arms and stay put straps!

links_Review_Title: I wore this out in Miami for a bachelorette and got compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: True to size but meant to be worn loose. Great color.

I wore this for my bachelorette party- we were going to a disco club so it felt perfect for the occassion. I am tall (5'9) so when I first received it in the mail I was on the fence on wearing it because of how short it is. I wore it with biker shorts underneath and that made me much more comfortable. The sequins do rub up on the arm pit area, too. Overall, I am so happy with my experience. I felt great in the dress and had the best time wearing it!
It was a fab party dress, it was only uncomfortable on the lining (sequins rubbed against my skin). Fit great, and great price!
It's definitely a little itchy but worth it!!!

This dress was super comfortable- the sequins weren't scratchy at all and the inside of the dress is lined with a soft jersey cotton so, it was like wearing a t shirt! It's a little low in the back so, I'd recommend a backless bra but, I chose not to wear one and the dress was still very flattering. I got SO many compliments!!

Wore this to a concert and got sooo many compliments. It runs very big, I think I could have wore a small, but I also think it doesn't really make a difference because it's supposed to fit loose. The straps are adjustable which helps a lot. But if you have sensitive skin beware because these sequins on the top will rub against your skin. I was fine overall but it was kind of annoying.

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for a brunch party and I loved this sequins mini
links_Review_Text: I'm 5 foot so I adjusted the straps to make this dress a true mini! Super fun, easy to move around in and most importantly, due to great quality, I did not leave a sequins trail while dancing hand having a good time! Would definitely rent again!
I wore this out with friends in Miami. It's flowy, which made it really comfortable to wear all night. It was the perfect length for me and the low back is sexy.

This dress was so, so fun! I adored it and felt like it was the perfect Vegas dress. I typically wear a small in smymm and felt like this was true to their sizing. It was a little itchy on the sequins by the arm, but nothing but a minor annoyance. Strangers were stopping to compliment me. I can't recommend it enough
I loved this dress. It's definitely short and is a little scratchy. It was super flattering and I received a lot of compliments.

This dress was really comfortable. The straps were a bit big and the sequins under the arm were uncomfortable at first but then I got used to it. Lots of compliments the dress is really short too so wear spanx if you're worried about it. Will rent again!
I am 5'6" 120 lbs and xs fit perfectly. So many compliments on this dress. My husband wants to buy this for me now. It really is the perfect going out dress.

I loved this top so much.. although as you can see it was a big large in the chest area. I rented the XS and usually don't have this problem, but this seemed to run a bit big! Still wore it and got lots of compliments. Another issue was the shirt clasps unhooked quite a few times but not enough where I felt like I had to change.

links_Review_Title: This top was very flattering, however when I received it there was a light red stain on the top.
links_Review_Text: I would recommend.
so cute. fits perfectly.
Absolutely love this top. Very flattering.
This top is so cute and fit perfectly. Wore it to a concert and received lots of compliments.
I am a 34 C and the medium fit perfect! Was very cute and flattering, received many compliments.
loved this top with jeans. The shoulders tie which isn't that comfortable and it's cropped.
If you naturally have an hourglass figure this does the opposite of flatter it. Great material and would def be worth a try!

This was the backup dress I received for my first order and I had a really difficult time choosing between this and my first choice dress because it was so gorgeous. The color was rich, the fabric was comfortable. I'm bustier and strapless doesn't usually work for me, but this one stayed in place. I didn't end up wearing it for the intended occasion but my boyfriend took me out for a nice dinner so that I had a reason to wear this one too. HIGHLY recommend.

links_Review_Title: It was a beautiful dress, classic and simple.
links_Review_Text: I usually am a 6/8 Medium but I ordered a large and it fit perfect. It does have wiring on sides, mine was a little pokey uber my arm. But overall beautiful and got lots of compliments

links_Review_Title: Great color but dress was not in the best quality
links_Review_Text: Great color and fit- however the wires on the side were either broken or crooked and did not sit on my waist and side comfortable- the small felt fine so I knew it was just the medium dress that had a small malfunction
