This fit is a true 0 through and through. Although I had to safety pin the side because it was an inch too big (I'm a 32B), the dress was so comfortable. Classy look!
Loved the way this fit. The material was nice and thick and fit nicely. Got lots of compliments!

Rented this for my office work party and I loved it! It was so simple and easy to wear and I felt so elegant all night. I'm a true medium and it fit TTS but was a little big on top. Wish I had a padded strapless bra to wear underneath to keep it up a little better. Overall, great rental and would wear it again!

I loved the color and fit of this dress. Great for a shorty like me to have a longer dress (since I can't ever wear floor length without alterations). I rented this for a black tie optional wedding in November. I didn't end up wearing it because the material was a bit thinner and not as structured for such a formal event. I would definitely rent again for a spring or summer wedding.
Fit perfectly!! I got so many compliments from this dress and I really did love it.
Gorgeous, comfortable dress. Simple yet elegant, perfect for a wedding. Tons of compliments. I wore the smaller size, but needed to pad the top a bit to fill it out.

I loved this dress so much, great for short girls. I'm normally a small to medium, but wore the extra small because the small wasn't available. But it was so perfect. It was a little tight, but it it was a normal extra small it wouldn't have fit me. I'm a 4 normally.

I am 5"1 and 126 lbs and I wore a size SR. I am a 32D and the dress was tight on me. I wish I had a Medium to try on but I ordered an Extra Small and a Small based on other reviews. It was a cute dress, but not my favorite. It fit like a full length dress for me with a high low cut in the front. I switched to flats after the ceremony and I was still ok (not stepping on the dress or anything).

If you're small chested, small waisted and have hips this is perfect for your figure. I so loved this dress. My legs could move. I didn't have to pull the top up like others stated. I paired it with nude-ish gold-silver shoes, gold and pink earrings and bracelets. It made this deep green look summery. The fabric was not too thick and hot for a warm Mississippi August night.

I loved this dress. I have small boobs so strapless is always hard for me because I usually have to keep pulling up the dress. This dress was really (but not too) tight around my chest which was great. Loved it! Saw another girl at the wedding wearing it and she looked great too lol. Also, my friend in the middle of this photo is wearing a RTR dress too and it was really cute.

Definitely not what I thought I'd love, but that's what RTR is for! Making you try things outside of your comfort zone. The dress hugs all the right curves and isn't too long for short girls like me (5'2). The ruffles are flattering and despite it being slightly stretched at the top I didn't have any problems with the dress slipping down. The color is just beautiful too to couple with some jewelry I've had forever and some Louboutins for a country club rehearsal dinner.

links_Review_Title: I've never felt more elegant in my life
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous. The perfect choice for a black tie optional wedding! I originally ordered a small but because it is strapless I worried about pulling it up all night so the extra small was perfect! I would suggest sizing down just so the bust fits nice and snug. I received so many compliments in this dress and felt like a movie star.

links_Review_Title: I absolutely loved this dress! It fit like a glove and I got many compliments on it. Great dress!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit me perfectly. I'm 5'8", 135 lbs with a 34B bra size. It had a little extra room in the beginning of the night which was great because after drinking and eating it was snug. It was the right type of snug though, sucked me in and didn't feel like it was going to fall down while dancing. The material is really nice and kept me warm when the temperature started to cool off near the end of the night. The color of the dress is beautiful-deep forestry green. I did not want to return this dress! I would wear it again in a heartbeat.

links_Review_Title: The dress was perfect for a black tie optional wedding.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove. Received a ton of compliments!
A bit tight around waist and bust area

links_Review_Title: Perfect black tie optional wedding dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful. It hugs all of your curves and is very flattering!

links_Review_Title: Very elegant and fit perfectly! I got a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: The dress was longer on me than the model shown, I'm 5'0 but with heels it didn't hit ground in the back and still opened up nicely in the front. I didn't need to wear a bra because the top is thick with some slight padding. Very comfortable all night, I loved it!

This dress is gorgeous and so comfortable! Overall, I was very pleased. The top did seem disproportionately larger than the rest of the dress and I’m a busty gal, lol. I tried a strapless bra and the top didn’t lay correctly. I ended up wearing a strapless corset-type bra which looked much better.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dark green doesn't look like much on the hanger but it made me feel like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: THIS WAS SUCH A COOL DRESS! The color was very dark green and very dramatic. I wasn't sure if this dress would be flattering and then I put it on and it looked great. True to other reviews it smoothed out my stomach nicely, but still gave my hips and butt dancing room (dancing is very important) The one thing I didn't love about this dress was that because it was strapless, I did have to hike it up several times throughout the night, this is less about the dress and more a general complaint to the universe about the incompatibility of big boobs and strapless dresses.

Gorgeous dress. A little loose at top so I kept having to pull it up. Hanger strings kept coming out - i would have cut them out if I owned the dress. The color was beautiful and it was super comfortable to wear.

links_Review_Title: I received a lot of compliments on the dress.
links_Review_Text: This dress was one of my favorites - I didn't want to return it! The color is a beautiful green, and the fabric was lightweight and very flattering. The bodice was a bit tight (I had to have two girls help me zip it up, and I couldn't eat too much throughout the night), but I think the larger size would have been too big.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a black tie-optional event. Loved the length!
links_Review_Text: I felt so pretty in this dress! The tea length was perfect for a black tie-optional event (where I didn't want to go floor length, but knee length seemed inappropriate). As other reviews have mentioned, the color is very close to black but still quite attractive. My only caution is that the dress is not designed for smaller chested consumers like myself. The dress still stayed up because of a thin rubber lining, which was great, but it did stress me out a bit throughout the night. Overall I'd definitely wear it again.

links_Review_Title: A little snug, but tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I was worried when I tried this dress on because the medium was snug from the waist down and the large was loose from the waist up. I ended up going with the 8 and let my Spanx work their magic! I ended up receiving TONS of compliments all night! I loved the beautiful deep green color -- like a LBD but with a twist. This dress is perfect for an hourglass shape, but just be mindful that if you are too bottom-heavy you could run into the same problem as I did. There is no give whatsoever, so if I were an inch wider at the hips I would have been out of luck. Overall, such a beautiful dress!

links_Review_Title: Great fit for a curvy lady
links_Review_Text: The dress was perfect for my cousin's January wedding. I'm a curvy lady, especially in the tummy area - and this dress complimented my shape perfectly. I decided to pair it with a black strap-y heel and a bold necklace. I felt like a million bucks for a fraction of the price.
Great for wedding!

links_Review_Title: Perfect color green for a Christmas wedding! Great fit! Very forgiving through the waist and hips!
links_Review_Text: Only complaints were with the zipper seemed a bit cheap hard to zip up over the seam and also with the flat boning around the top it kept flipping out the whole night they should fix this before renting it out again. Also I was promised two different sizes in this dress and I only received one size good thing it was the right fit. Overall great experience!

Great fit and very flattering! Hugged curves in all the right ways and super fun to dance in. I got many compliments. I could see it being a little snug for someone who has bigger bust than I do, but all around great fit!
This dress is so flattering, I love the sweetheart neckline, length was perfect, and the dress helps accentuate your curves. Highly recommend!

This dress was perfect for an evening wedding in December. Great for an hourglass figure. I was worried about the dress being too long, but with heels, it came right above ankles. Perfect amount of formal and fun.
The fit of this dress was perfect! The color is a beautiful dark emerald green. I got so many compliments! For me the dress fit true to size.

links_Review_Title: Snug fit worked in my favor
links_Review_Text: The 6/medium was way too big while the 4/small was quite snug but worked (without a bra only). After excessively eating and drinking this dress became even tighter but, on the plus side, was too tight to show stomach bloat. That's a win in my book! Also, the color was perfect for a winter wedding.

Dress fit perfectly and flowed well. The top has wires on the sides to hold it up so I didn't have to worry about it falling even though I was dancing all night. The color definitely looks black but is more green in person. Overall a great fit and would recommend!

links_Review_Title: My friend held an outdoor wedding in November (brr!) and this dress kept my legs nice and warm.
links_Review_Text: The fit is great - I usually wear size 2 pretty well and size 4s are loose on me - this dress was snug enough to stay up comfortably. The ribs in the sides of the dress were great, hugging me almost like a comfortable bodice. The only con I noticed is the zipper on the dress is extremely long, so if I had it unzipped to the bottom, I actually couldn't get it to stay up around my hips in order to zip it up. I left it about one quarter zipped up to step into it and was able to get it the rest of the way afterwards on my own.

I love the color and cut of this dress. I wore my usual RTR size (XSR). It was a little long for me as I'm only 5' 1" but it felt classy and elegant for a November wedding. The only issue I had was the boning popped out under my arm and irritated the whole night. Eventually I put a piece of fashion tape over it but it was annoying all night. Overall I like this dress and would recommend it!

links_Review_Title: It was for a banquet. Needed something formal but not over the top.
links_Review_Text: The dress was really nice. The top was a bit too big but fit in all the right places otherwise. Would def rent again!

This was a little more form fitting in the midsection than I wanted but when I tried on the large it was way too big around the bust. (I'm a 32D) The straps for the hanger kept coming out the front and I was constantly adjusting them. It was also a corset at the top so with me choosing the smaller size I sometimes felt the wire digging into my side. Loved the color

links_Review_Title: I wish I could've bought this!!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was AMAZING! I wore it to a fall wedding and it was stunning. I received so many compliments throughout the night and it was so comfortable! The only thing was I'm small chested and large in the rear, it fit perfectly and i almost would have gotten a smaller size because I kept having to pull it up with the dancing but other than that it was perfect and true to size.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, very comfortable and fit very well. Lots of compliments, loved it!
links_Review_Text: Wore to Black tie masquerade ball and it was perfect! Very forgiving fit and comfortable!

links_Review_Title: I felt like a celebrity at the oscars!
links_Review_Text: This dress was a hit!!! It fit great and was very flattering! I got so many compliments! I would rent this one again!

This was actually my back up option and the first dress I ordered did not fit well. I LOVED This one. The shoulder detail is very on trend. Tons of compliments. Very flattering even with a little mom pooch. I’m glad I ordered a medium though based on other reviews. I’m typically a 4-6 and definitely would not have fit in a small. It was gorgeous. Highly recommend. Just be ready to be stared at all night 😉

Wore this dress to a formal gala. I panicked when I initially tried it on because it fit weird/baggy in the chest area. I have a short torso so when I pulled the dress down it fit perfectly. It is very flattering and thick scuba material is very forgiving. I received many compliments. I wear an 8 in dresses and chose a large in this item. I can't recommend this dress highly enough!

This was my back up safe choice and I fell in love!! I really didn't want to wear a black dress to my event but once I tried this one on, I loved it!! So stunning and glamorous! You'll feel like a movie star!

links_Review_Title: This dress is stunning! It was comfortable and the fabric was very flattering.
links_Review_Text: Loved it! No cons I’m 5’4, 150lbs, curvy body style
Loved the dress, looks awkward on Hanger but once I slipped it on, it fit so well.
Great dress! I thought it ran a bit small. I'm usually a 4 in RTR dresses. Great fit though. I'm 5'1 and it was a little too long.

links_Review_Title: My favorite dress from RTR so far
links_Review_Text: This is probably one of my favorite dresses, if not my favorite dress from RTR. It is super fun and unique! The shoulder and the slit give it a very cool twist to a classic black dress. I got complimented a lot during the night on it. It does run long, so if you're short like me, keep that fashion tape handy, or go with the XSP if available. I'd also suggest, if you're small chested, to wear a strapless push-up so the dress fits you more comfortably in that area. Overall, great dress!

links_Review_Title: The dress was comfortable and stunning, fit well and had non stop compliments throughout the night!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'3 and 118 lbs. This dress fit perfect! Perfect in the waist and bust area. I am a 34D and the dress fit perfect, not too tight or baggy in the bust area. The dress length was perfectly draped-to floor wearing a 4" heel. So many compliments on this dress!

Super chic and classy. Love the silhouette. The fit is great and the dress is comfy. I was really feeling it until I saw 2 other women who were wearing the same dress. Would be super awesome for RTR to have wearers somehow register a zip code and event if they wish to prevent renting the same dress. Just an idea.
Rented for a masquerade-themed Christmas party and felt great in it all night. I was worried about the xtra small being the only size available but it fit great.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress- it fit perfectly and looked so elegant for my formal party. I got so many compliments on the dress and I was able to dance in it too!

links_Review_Title: This dress was gorgeous but was very snug on me.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit well but was very snug in the hips.

Holy buckets, this dress makes you feel like a million bucks! Its thick fabric hugs your curves, and the shoulder makes a statement — and saying it that simply undersells it! I wore this to a black tie gala, and this dress was hands down the winner. There is simply no comparison. Rent this now!!
I rented this dress for a black tie wedding. It fit perfectly and was absolutely stunning. I had so many compliments. I usually wear a size 8 and I went with the large.
This dress speaks for itself. One of the nicer pieces I have worn. Looks way more expensive than the actual price and it's very elegant. Wore for an Aladdin Themed work Ball.

I wore this dress to officiate a wedding, and received complements all night. Definitely appropriate for a formal affair. The dress fits true to size. The fabric is thick enough to smooth your lines and also has a little bit of stretch. I wore a bra, but really didn't have to. As a pear/almost hourglass shape it flattered me very well and cinched the waist beautifully. The length was appropriate for my height.

Wanted to love this dress and maybe I needed to double up on spanks but something about the fabric made the midsection (and backside) so unflattering. Ended up not wearing it but almost a great dress!
Incredibly comfortable and gorgeous! Tons of compliments.

I am a first time renter and was nervous! I needed a last minute dress for a charity ball and this was perfect! The material and fit were forgiving and I felt great in it. I am tempted to find a reason to rent it again!
High quality material with a beautiful shape. I got compliments from everyone.

Loved this edgy yet classy dress! I received so many compliments on how beautiful it was. The nice thick scuba material along with the ruched midsection made it very flattering and hid everything. I'm usually a size 2-4, but this fit perfectly giving me a little extra room. Would definitely rent this one again!

links_Review_Title: Unique, comfortable & perfect for black tie event
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this gown. I did find that the sizing ran a bit small- I usually wear a 6 long for reference & opted for the Large Long in this dress (Australian designer, so not typical American sizing...) I am 5'10" and with heels, this dress came up off the floor a bit. The hem just touched the floor when I was barefoot. I thought this was a contemporary and different choice, while still staying tasteful & elegant... also felt very comfortable. I would rent this again in a heartbeat.
Wore this stunning dress for a gala dinner. Not only gorgeous but also the stretchy fabric made it extremely comfortable even with my second trimester baby bump.
It's all about the sleeve!!! Gorgeous dress. Very comfortable. So many compliments!
I'm usually always a 2/4 in all dresses I rent. However, this dress was more snug than I imagined. I would definitely size up! Overall beautiful dress, just wish the size worked out.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments. It really is a statement dress with its shoulder accent.
links_Review_Text: I would say it runs a tad small. I'm normally a medium, but since dresses tend to run small anyway, I got a large. It was still a little tight, but not uncomfortably so. I was able to sit, eat a full dinner, dance, etc.

links_Review_Title: I received lots of compliments on my dress! Definitely stood out as a classy, but eye-catching dress
links_Review_Text: I am a 32G with a curvy figure and this fit well over my bust. I tried the large and the top was just too large for me.
Fit like a glove! Very comfortable and got compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: Rented for formal wedding but didn't wear
links_Review_Text: The fit was too small--thankfully I ordered this as a backup. It is a beautiful dress, though, and I think would've been great if I had gone next size up.
This was comfortable and flattering. The big sleeve made a beautiful statement. The length on the long was great with short heels.
Unfortunately, the dress did not fit well

Unfortunately, I didn't get to wear it. It was VERY short. I am 5'9" and it came to my ankles...in flats. They did not have the long option available otherwise I would have ordered that one. If you are tall, get a long. 100%. Otherwise, the dress was STUNNING on. Amazing material that made you feel nice and snug.

links_Review_Title: This is truly my favorite thing I've ever worn!
links_Review_Text: When I was trying this dress on, I fully expected to not like it on my body. But wow was I wrong! The fabric and the fit smoothed every unwanted bump and lump. The regular length was perfect with a 3.5 inch heel. Pictures don't do the accent shoulder detail justice. It is beautifully structured and I got several complements on it all night. Despite being rather form-fitting, I was still able to lit my arms up and dance the night away! If you're thinking about renting this for an upcoming event, just do it!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress and really unique sleeve
links_Review_Text: Size four was pretty snug on me but looked good, fit like a glove. There are seams down the dress to give it the hourglass fit, but some people might not like the look of the seams coming down.

I wore this dress for a work event (ball) and it was a hit! I received so many compliments throughout the night. I am 5'2 and 150 lbs (with hips) and I wore the XLR. I wore a small shaper underneath just to smooth out my stomach and I was comfortable the whole night. I wore 3 inch heels and that was perfect to where the dress didn't drag on the floor. I am a D cup and surprisingly enough, I didn't wear a bra with this dress. The dramatic shoulder was a show stopper and I wore big statement earrings to complete the look. The ruching on the top of the dress camouflaged all of that! The only CON is that the dress was shifting a little bit, but I think my shaper was to blame for that. Other than that, I highly recommend this dress.

AMAZINGGGGGGG. I had people telling me how much they loved my dress and then coming back to tell me how much they loved this dress! It’s stunning. I felt beautiful. Thank you RTR. My bf said “Wow. Can I touch you?” Haha. Rent it. If you’re 5’3 and under.... I recommend the Petite.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a gala that I didn’t want to be over or under dressed for.
links_Review_Text: Dress was perfect. Simple yet structured and beautiful.
Wish additional size was available for comfort. Loved the style and exaggeration of the sleeve. Received many compliments throughout the night.

links_Review_Title: So perfect comfortable and sexy I couldn't keep the men off me.
If you want one sassy red dress, this is it.

links_Review_Text: Neckline was adjustable size you could determine the amount of cleavage/side boob you wanted to display ;) Slit was conservative enough. Great dress!

links_Review_Title: Perfect color and over the top sexy!
links_Review_Text: Definitely ran large...wish I had gotten the smaller size as backup. Still worked. Loved the fit, color, and back of the dress. Don't be scared to rent-beautiful dress and made me feel amazing!! Best decision for this wedding

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, very sexy and comfortable
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a photo shoot for my birthday. It was perfect. The open back is super sexy, but tasteful. My only complain is that the dress the way it has rouching in the front kind of creates a lot of fabric around the mid section area.
Wore to a Tuscan wedding. Loved the color and open back, also tulip style in the front makes it very forgiving!

This dress was perfect for a fall winery wedding! The open back is sexy while remaining classy, and the color is so fun! My only critique was that it fit loosely around my low back, so there was a little gap-- would have preferred it a little more snug. Otherwise, it was perfect. I felt great wearing it.
This dress was easy to wear. Beautiful and comfortable.
Pretty red color and absolutely loved the back of this dress! Definitely recommend! The fit was true to size.

I LOVED this dress and seriously debated keeping it but couldn't justify the price when there's so many other dresses to be rented. I felt really comfortable (no potential wardrobe malfunctions and the folds perfect hide any overindulgence) and sexy and got so many compliments. I wore nipple covers only and felt comfortable. The top could have worked for a slightly larger chest but probably not much over a small C since it doesn't stretch. If you're on the fence I'd say RENT IT!

Rented for a wedding and it was fabulous! Absolute best dress, so many compliments and just overall gorgeous. It fit like a glove! I am a pretty standard 6 and I wouldn't change a thing. Super sexy! Just note that I thought it was fire red, but in the natural light it was definitely fuschia. Would absolutely rent again, go for it!

Very sexy, it's hides my tummy very well. I didn't wear a bra and it didn't show anything at any time. I didn't get a picture of the back but that and the front opening are the best part of this dress.
Wore this to an engagement party. Showed more skin than anyone else there and this dress does it the right way! I felt luxurious and sexy. Adored everything about it.
I wore this in Vegas and I loved it!!! Super sexy and bright. The color was great and it fit nice, great quality. I wore the size 4 and about 136 pounds and it fit me great.

This dress is beautiful, its red red out in sunny areas, otherwise it looks a little pink/red. An absolutely gorgeous dress, I got compliments from everyone I saw. The fit was great, the straps are adjustable, and the length was perfect (esp for me since I'm 5'3) I didn't worry about it even hitting the floor. Would rent again!

This dress was so beautiful and comfortable. I got so many compliments on the color and the fit. The back is completely open, so you cannot wear a bra, but you are fully covered. I would def rent again.
Easy to wear, fit perfectly, flattering and just gorgeous.

Disclaimer: I'm obsessed with backless stuff, so I'm biased. But... this dress ROCKS! It's so sexy, so va-va-voom! Yes it bunches up a bit on the hips if you have them (I have really big hips and it was still fine!) Otherwise I thought it was a good fit. Wore it without a bra, but can do cuppies and it would look good. I don't know why the reviews are so bad, but I'm glad I took a risk on it.

links_Review_Title: The color and freedom of movement!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to 2 weddings and the dress was perfect for dancing while also being that formal/sophisticated, but with flair. The straps rode up to the top of my back frequently, rather than nicely crossing mid-back as on the model. Big issue was the front slit when sitting, as it would be very revealing. I just wrapped the tail around to cover my lap.

This dress is a total showstopper. Loved wearing it and got compliments all night. Comfortable, easy to dance in, photographs great. I'd say it fits true to size. No stretch but you can adjust strap length to get the fit you want in front, and that also changes where it hits in back. It is VERY backless, I didn't need any fashion tape but did wear an invisible sticky bra. I'm 5'2" and it was floor length at the longest point with 4 inch heels.

Normally a 6 but the fit of this dress was slightly large. The draping in the front and the open back design made it work without looking like I was swimming in the dress. Felt surprisingly secure with no concern for showing too much on the side of my body with the great construction of the dress. Felt sexy in a fun evening dress. Would rent again!
You need fashion tape on the top to make it hang correctly which was kind of annoying! Lots of adjusting all night.

This hot pink number definitely turned heads and was perfect for a night in Jamaica. This brand - Haney- is also an eco conscious brand - killer dress that doesn't kill the environment - imagine that! It fit fabulously - I used double sided tape since I went braless - to keep everything in place. It's a gorgeous dress.
Recommend
Gorgeous dress runs slightly big in the waist area but you couldn't tell. I felt beautiful in it!

links_Review_Title: such a fun and flattering dress!
links_Review_Text: This was not the original dress I ordered and it came as a backup. However, I am so glad it did! I have a very large chest and was worried that the back would not work. You can use fashion tape to make sure there is no side boob. It is also so comfortable! I would highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love it, but it just didn't work for me.
links_Review_Text: I really wanted this dress to work, but it just showed more leg than I was comfortable with, so I didn't wear it.
Comfortable to wear, loved the adjustable straps so you could somewhat control how open and low the back was. Fabric easily wrinkles
Pretty color odd fit. Too much room in the butt area

Actually rented this as a surprise for my daughter (28) as she was coming into town for a wedding and didn't want to buy yet another dress. The cut was incredibly flattering, and the adjustable straps allow for you to make it as modest (or not) as you want. Despite a completely open back, the rest of the dress is cut in a way that it isn't too revealing overall. She said she would've bought it if she could have! The dress is definitely pink in person, not red, but it's a bright color without being neon/too flashy. Great for a late summer wedding.
Beautiful dress!! Sexy but classy
It was too chest large so never worn it

Wore this dress for dinner and drinks in Mexico. The dress is casually glamorous. The straps don't slip at all and the dress is sexy without being too revealing. Wish it came in more colors. Love the hemline and the back.

links_Review_Title: GORGEOUS. SHOWSTOPPER. ADJUSTABLE STRAPS FOR THE WIN.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'3" and this is the date night dress I've been looking for for a long time. The adjustable straps make the length perfect for a petite girl. The color is beautiful and the cut is so flattering/forgiving. When I first put this on, I thought it made my tummy area look poochy, but after significantly tightening the straps, everything lifted into place and it was actually very flattering. Didn't need a bra and felt totally secure. Packed it for vacation and the wrinkles fell out quickly once I put it on.

links_Review_Title: Perfect Cocktail Dress for a Wedding or other special event!
links_Review_Text: I rented a size 0 and size 2 of this dress, but ended up wearing the 0 as the 2 was overall too big (mostly in the waist/bust). Due to being backless, you cannot wear a bra but I did not have any issues or slip-ups; had it been looser on the side then tape would have probably been useful. I will say that for a wedding, it was a bit risky (high slit, backless, and some side exposure on the bust) so just be sure to know the formality level of the wedding, audience, etc. I received a ton of compliments on the dress though and would 100% wear it again. It photographed well, although some lighting did make it seem more red than it is pink.
This dress fits beautifully. It’s all about the back which makes the dress. Comfortable for dancing and dressy enough for black tie affair.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! And I got a ton of compliments the whole night
links_Review_Text: This dress fits beautifully, double sided tape can definitely help if you are particular about the way the top drapes. The straps are adjustable so you can be in control of how much sideboob you are willing to show. I loved the color, not quite a fuschia but not red or pink either, very unique. This dress waas a bit out of my comfort zone but I felt like a glam goddess in this dress and would totally rent again.
Beautiful deep color. Somewhere between red and pink, yet better than fuchsia. If you have a great back, everything else falls into place. Great fit. Adjustable straps prevent side boob.

links_Review_Title: Felt so beautiful in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress! I wore it to a really nice dinner on my anniversary with my boyfriend. Super comfy. Works for tall girls
Did not fit my body well as far as how the sides rested. Too bad because otherwise this dress was super cute!

Received tons of compliments on this dress for a small afternoon wedding. All reviews were very accurate on fit and form. Slightly oddly large in belly, but hugged curves in best way. Very flattering in person and in photos

I love the concept of this dress and was very exited to order it. Since 0s were unavailable I went with the 2, which normally fits. However, I was absolutely swimming in this dress. The waist was huge and it made for an unflattering moment^. I think it would be really cute and elegant if it fit correctly. Love the butterfly details. Make sure you order your correct size!
Gorgeous fabric and fit. I wore it for valentines day and it was absolutely perfect! Love it!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, but don't order down if you have hips
links_Review_Text: Such a beautiful dress. Unfortunately, the 4 was the only size available and was just a little too tight for me to wear it. The embroidery is so beautiful and I will definitely be renting the 6 for an event in the future.

links_Review_Title: fun and whimsical, this dress is great for someone who's not afraid to be noticed
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress for a vintage garden themed wedding. I got is as a back-up option for another dress I ordered and ended up not wearing this one. The fit was true to size. It was a bit long for me (hit at the ankle), so it looked a little off, but was still pretty. The colors are quite bright and the print is pretty busy, so the wearer should not be afraid to be noticed :). The dress was comfortable, even though it was fitted.
The dress fit perfectly and I have received many compliments on it. It wasn't a dress I would normally choose or colors I would normally wear but I loved it.
Marchesa Notte NEVER fails me ! This dress was a hit and the colors were amazing ! The detail, how the fit accentuates every curve. Just gorgeous. I'd rent again !

such a fun dress. was perfect for a 2:30pm wedding and a 6pm reception. runs about true to size. i'm a 34F, and the 12 fit perfectly through the bust, and a little big in the waist and hips (i'm pretty hipless). you do need a racerback (or strapless) bra b/c the dress comes in a little bit on the shoulders and the straps of a regular bra would stick out. the lace did tend to get caught on things — jewelry, chairs, etc. — but wouldn't sway me from renting again. just choose not-pointy jewelry. ( :

links_Review_Title: Great dress and different from anything I've ever worn! Got a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: The dress was great to wear for my friends wedding - the only downside is the area/material around the thigh area was tight so getting / stepping into a car was kind of tough. But overall I really liked this dress for my body type! Especially since I have a bigger chest, it held up that area really well.
Lots of compliments! Simply beautiful.

links_Review_Title: This dress is meant to stand out- I felt confidant and like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for my 10 year college reunion. It was beautiful, the details were amazing and the color was stunning! I'm usually in between a 6 and 8 and was able to do the 6. An unforgettable dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, Comfortable, a treat to wear.
links_Review_Text: This dress has a little stretch which made dancing and corralling two young boys at a wedding a breeze! I am shorter, but the dress was fine with 2in heels. I wore neutral wedge heels and a nude bra underneath. I loved this dress and received a lot of compliments.
Fits really well! The lining makes it a little hot (but also means no need for spanx.) Received so many compliments
My daughter wore this-- she's 26, 5.8 and identifies as curvy. Her review: Such a unique, fabulous dress. Looks like it could be tight, but isn't. True to size, easy to dance in.

Loved this dress! Received many compliments. Pros: Stunning fabric. Pop of color. Unique. Cons: The only areas that were uncomfortable were the neck and lace around the arms. Not a dress to expect to move around in too much. Worth it though!!

I wanted to cheese it up in full on pink and red for VDay this year and this was the perfect dress for the occasion. This dress was also so flattering. I'm usually scared to do something so form fitting, but this was perfect.
This dress was beautiful. Got a ton of compliments. Fit like a glove. Loved the length. Love the detail. Amazing design and fit.

Dress was beautiful and very comfortable. The material allows a lot of movement. I have relatively smaller hips and bum, so there was extra fabric in the 4 that added weight, but it fit my broader shoulders well and the space gave me room to move and dance.

Not as loud as it appears in the photo. Very comfortable and aesthetically pleasing. Plenty of room for a large bust. Length was perfect for me even with out heals. Some of the mesh was frayed and ripped but not noticeable.

I got compliments on this all night when I wore it to a wedding. It was easy to dance in... unless you wanted to do a split on the dance floor. ;) I'd definitely recommend! I'm more so a 2, so the waist was actually a little big on me, but you couldn't really tell.

The prettiest and simultaneously most comfortable dress I've ever worn! The 6 was a little big because I usually wear a 4, but the 6 was the only one available and I REALLY wanted to wear this dress but overall true to size.
Great quality and fit. Very comfortable. Bright colors were perfect for an Indian wedding.

I'm 5'10, athletic build, 140lbs, and 34C/D. This dress fit perfectly! I wore it to a bridal shower and on Valentines Day. Every single woman I passed stopped to tell me how stunning the dress was. The intricate design paired with the bright red and pink is eye-catching!

links_Review_Title: Valentine's Date at the legendary Tonga Room.
links_Review_Text: Such a fun dress! I left my Valentine's RTR order until the 11th hour, so in these photos I'm wearing a size 4 (normally size 0 or 2 depending on the brand.) Oversized fit wasn't a big issue with this dress- it has enough structure to hold its own. Difficult to pair matching shoes with... these are a bit casual- glove shoes from Everlane. Lace likes to catch on anything pokey... not normally a problem on a date, but I did get caught a few times on my tripod :)

links_Review_Title: This was a Show Stopper Dress !
links_Review_Text: This Dress was amazing and I felt very Glamorous in it. Fit was true to size but under sheath does not stretch at all. Wore a nude strapless bra . Gave 4 star due to it being itchy in the neck area . Received tons of compliments at the Wedding Ceremony and the Reception. My sister-in-law even asked if she could borrow it and then I revealed where I got it from! So glad I rented it since this is a once only dress due to everyone would remember this if you ever wore it again . Gold jewelry and heels complimented it very well .

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, but best for women with short torso and flatter chest. Very scratchy :-(
links_Review_Text: The color and embroidery of this dress is absolutely gorgeous, but I am bummed that I could not wear this dress for the following reasons: * the material around the neck and armholes (and waist) is super scratchy (and I am usually not one who is bothered by materials that other reviewers describe as scratchy); no way that I could wear this for many hours; * the material going all the way up the neck and the embroidery at the chest makes one look even chestier (not good for someone already well endowed) and the waist of the dress falls about 1 inch above my natural waist --> this dress made me look like a box; I think this dress would be amazing on a flatter-chested woman with a short torso. In terms of sizing, I was surprised to read reviews that thought this dress ran large. If anything, I think it runs small at the hips and thighs. I am a 10 at the chest and 8 at the waist and hips (5'8"; 156 lbs, 36C). This dress in size 10 fit perfectly on top and tight at the hips and thighs (it's the double lining that fits tight, not the actual dress material). It's possible that the lining has shrunk from all the dry cleaning, making the fit tighter than it was when new.

Beautiful color, I styled it with fluffy pink velvet heels. It was a bit long on me, it hit mid calf which isn't the most flattering unless you're really tall and thin. The fabric was delicate and there were a few loose strings on the dress I received.

I loveee this dress I would probably buy it if it didn't take soooo many good pictures in it lol. It fits a little loose around the stomach, a problem I have with most of my dresses, but the lace overlay didn't make it obvious. The hips and chest were just right. Bra or no bra doesn't matter! Came to my ankles, but a lot of shoes work with this dress. Gorgeous colors, a lot of compliments. Really nice if your going to somewhere formal (black tie) and don't want to wear a usual looking gown.

Love this dress - wore it for a black tie wedding & got lots of complements. Very comfortable and easy to move in but it doesn't have any stretch. I'd absolutely wear this again - the colors and the detail in the lace are fun and unexpected.
It fit really well, had some trouble dancing but who cares I looked amazing! Lol

This dress was beautiful and surprisingly comfortable. Despite the weight of the dress, it was nice for an outdoor California wedding. The embroidery and color was vibrant. I'm 5'4" and the hem hit at the bottom of my ankle . FYI for you shorter gals.

Intricate details and embroidery. Vibrant colors. Lots of compliments. Dress was true to size I wore the 4 when I can usually wear a 4 or 6 I am 5"3/135 Dress runs a little long Has 2 under linings that make it difficult when you use the ladies You must step into the dress rather then put it on over your head as the 2 linings need to be adjusted and pulled down all the way Or it bunches up in the back zipper area. Was heavy but comfortable Really loved it
Comfortable and fun. Lots of complements. I'm usually a size 12 but had to wear a 14.
So flattering and many complements. The fabric is a bit stiff and sorta thick but I loved it for the summer wedding I went to.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Color and very well made
links_Review_Text: Wore for a black tie optional wedding, lots of compliments. I am 5 5 and hit right at calf. Little heavier due to silk lining.

links_Review_Title: Colors of this dress POP, beautiful lace details
links_Review_Text: Rented the 4R and 2R. The 4 was huge everywhere. While the 2 was slightly too big in the waist it was snug under the armpits. Would def recommend renting 2sizes as the fit is different. The dress photographs beautifully and was perfect for a formal summer wedding. Stand up straight and let the colors of this dress help you shine!
A beautiful dress, however the top layer felt a bit stretched out. Still, loved the dress

The dress is absolutely gorgeous. The fit is ok, tight around the thighs and lose around the waist which makes it less form fitting but still looks great on because of the lace pattern. Loved the colors, great for a formal Summer wedding.
Beautiful color and material. Wish it fits better, runs big. Size 0 might fit better

links_Review_Title: More forgiving and beautiful than expected!
links_Review_Text: I was worried that this might not fit after reading the reviews saying it was tight, but because of the stretchy underdress/slip and the flexibility of the embroidered/crocheted overlay (with a fine mesh under the whole thing), I can see how this could fit MANY different body types! SUCH a huge fan of this dress and so stunned by how gorgeous and brilliantly colored this is in person. Do note that the slip does go low in the back and it was too low in front for my nude bras, but SHOCKINGLY, my red bra with straps was perfect and totally unnoticeable (see close-up pics--you can hardly see it, even in person!). Was easy enough to zip up and even button (3 at the neck) and was comfortable all night. Got TONS of compliments :)
Great dress but the top smashes your boobs in if you are full chested. Comfortable and great fabric

i'm warning you: this is SHINY AS HECK. like, lurex ad glitter to the max. you can embrace it and pair it with glitter boots and a bright yellow puffa jacket by bacon, or you can just not rent it. i would totally rent this again in the sprint to wear with a black leather jacket. loved. plenty of stretch but it doesn't flare out at the stomach *too much* so i did wear bike shorts for a lil compression there so the pleats weren't clingy.
This dress is a dream. Fit perfectly (I had to pin up the straps but only a bit and I could have just left them). Fabric is not itchy and the length was perfect (I'm 5'3").
Loved the sparkle in this dress was great for a party! The straps were a little long but wasn't too bad. It was also very flattering!

links_Review_Title: Unique dress for anytime of year
links_Review_Text: Generous stretch and so comfortable. The straps are a bit long and not adjustable but conceal bra straps for easy wearing. I loved it so much and don't want to send it back!
Loved it

links_Review_Title: Liked a lot but didn't love- great skirt but long shoulder straps
links_Review_Text: Nice material and metallic/shimmer effect. Straps were way too long (wear something over it!) Really pleased with how the dress hung and the feel of the fabric. The shoulder straps were so long- I pinned them over and the chest still fell so low. The top part of my bra cups kept showing by the armpits. I layered with a leather jacket and then with a sweater- both worked well, pretty versatile piece.

links_Review_Title: More shimmery than expected, so not for work but great for date night
links_Review_Text: I was originally thinking of wearing this for work, but the material is quite shimmery, so better for a date night. I didn't find the straps too long like some other reviewers, but they are in a position that is unlikely to perfectly align with your standard bra straps. So if you rent, be prepared to go with a strapless bra, or have a plan to style it with a jacket or sweater or something. I wish I had a white jean jacket, but I made do with a white button down shirt, and I paired with some fun Cole Haan sneakers that have silver flowers to give it a casual summer date vibe.

links_Review_Title: This was the perfect outfit to moderate an casual work panel event
links_Review_Text: #werkflow

I ended up keeping this two months with my Update subscription and wore it every chance I got. And yet somehow never managed to take any great pictures of it, sorry about that! Hopefully this at least gets across the fun shimmery-ness of the dress. Yeah, it sparkles a bit so you gotta be up for that. I didn't feel like it necessarily did me any favors in terms of magically making my body look better the way some dresses do, but I got a ton of compliments whenever I wore it and it felt like a special dress and wish I had the funds to buy it.

Love love love this dress! Form fitting and super flattering! Want to buy it but love I can rent it. Wore it to work on a warm day and felt like a million bucks. Wanted to go for dinner afterwards I felt so fabulous :)

links_Review_Title: Works better with something under it
links_Review_Text: Like a lot of derek lam items, this dress runs large. I wore it to a couple of events and friends urged me to buy it, but I found it only worked on me when I wore something dark and long sleeved under it. When I wore it alone, the neckline fell too low and the waist line disappeared.

I rented this thinking it was more of a casual knit dress but it is very shiny. It's pretty but the shine makes it much more formal looking than you would think from the photos (even the one I'm posting doesn't make it look as shiny as it is). It would be super cute for a more formal occasion. It also started to slip down in the chest area which would've been a little risqué had I not had a T-shirt on!

LOVE this dress! If it wasn't so expensive at the used price, I would totally buy it. I wore it every single time I could be this fancy the entire month I had it. In person the fabric is metallic and quite shiny so it definitely ups the wow factor. Straps are long but a simple safety pin in the back fixed it for me. Super comfortable because it's stretchy but tight enough that it cups the body just right!

links_Review_Title: Glam but a little hard to wear!
links_Review_Text: Loved the colors & most importantly, the gorgeous pleats! I thought this dress was hard to style. Didn't look quite right with tops over or under it. The straps are long & narrowly placed. Can't wear a normal bra--even my strapless cup showed (see evidence in pic). Very nice to rent, but I wouldn't own/rent again.
So cute! Straps were a bit long so I probably could have sized down. Super comfortable too.
Rented for my baby shower. Very cute. Went up a size since I'm 7 minutes the pregnant. Fit great. Looked best with something layered over it. Slightly scratchy material.

I rented this for a sunny vacation. It was a bit "fancy", but I tend to over-dress, I loved it! The fabric is definitely a shiny, silver color. The material is thick and a bit raspy, my two year old didn't like it haha! The scratchy feel did not bother my body as I wore it. I read the other reviews about the long straps after I wore the dress. I was surprised to read the comments because I did not have that problem. As a point of reference, I have a short torso, height is 5.2-5.3ish. The dress was long on me, calf length. I wore a strapless bra and the fit was great. The pleats in the dress are so well constructed, they make the dress "luxe". Since the material is thick, it hugs the curves and it's forgiving at the same time. Since I am petite and have a short torso, I wore a thin belt to accentuate my waist. Without the belt, the natural waist of the dress would not have looked as flattering for my height. Overall, I loved the dress! I definitely would recommend it.

This dress was so fun! I wore it with a black T-shirt under it for winter time, and got so many compliments. The glitter and movement is so fun, and the textile is very thick. I am very petite and this was almost too big on me, but it still fit

I LOVED this dress. It's absolutely beautiful, and I got so many compliments. The first time I wore it to work with a black sweater over it (pictured), and the second time I wore it with a black leather jacket and black heels. It was super comfortable and flattering, but the fabric is a bit scratchy. It is more shimmery in person than in pictures. I didn't find the straps to be too long like other reviewers. I will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Favorite rental of all - bump friendly and gorgeous
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous, elegant fun. Wore this at 7.5 months preggo and felt amazing.

links_Review_Title: Amazing lurex dress- got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I love everything about this dress EXCEPT the strap length. I had to pin over 2” out of the length to make it fit like the photo on the left, and then I had to wear a jacket to cover up the pinned fabric. This is totally harmless if you plan to wear a layer- but problematic if you intend on wearing it alone!
This was such a sweet dress! It moves beautifully. I had to wear a sweater over it though because the straps are long and not adjustable. It's stretchy and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: great dress! super fun and beautiful
links_Review_Text: love the fit, super comfy, and formal
Straps are long and need to be pinned, but other than that, this dress is so cute and comfy. Love it.

links_Review_Title: Dress was cute. Loved the weight of the material. Sadly, it didn't fit me well.
links_Review_Text: Cute dress but did not look good on my bodytype.

links_Review_Title: Glam and versatile--much more stunning in person
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress. I wore it to work with a sweater on top and also to a NYE party. As others mentioned, the straps are oddly long, but I adjusted with a few safety pins and it looked great and was not noticeable. I usually wear a 6 and the medium was very comfortable, but a teeny bit large in the torso. Probably could have gone S or M.

links_Review_Title: Everyone commented on how beautiful I looked in this dress!

links_Review_Text: Yes, this is shiny and is heavy weight. But it's beautiful and easy to wear and smooths over any bumps. The straps are a bit long, though it is not a problem for me even though I am flat chested. The dress can be a bit scratchy. I still loved it.

links_Review_Title: Got tons of compliments. Beautiful dress.
links_Review_Text: Straps were too long, so I had to wear a black top to cover them. It looked like a beautiful skirt.
FIT IS GOOD AND THE FLOW OF THE GARMENT IS FABULOUS. I HAVE WORN IT A COUPLE OF TIME NOW.

links_Review_Title: Tons of complements, but pretty itchy
links_Review_Text: This is a great dress for work with a jacket or a more dressy occasion without. The straps were a bit long on me, and the fabric was itchy, but I was happy with it and the way it fit (I'm 8.5 mo pregnant and sized up).
love the fit on the bodice, the straps were much too big (long) for me so I had to wear it with a jacket, which still looked good

links_Review_Title: having a great dress to wear
links_Review_Text: Loved it and got tons of compliments

Cute and comfortable but the shine running through fabric is more prominent than I expected. I loved the colors for a spring transitional piece so I wore with neutral shoes and jacket. It was also a little big on me.

links_Review_Title: Wore at 34 & 36 weeks pregnant, beautiful great quality dress. Received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: As mentioned in other reviews, the straps are long and I had to pin them to make this wearable, but this wasn't a deal breaker for me. Stretchy and comfortable, though I think I would have looked better in this style if I actually had a waist for the waistband detail to highlight. More sparkle than I anticipated, so wore a denim crop jacket to dress it down for work. Wore during 3rd trimester, between 160-165 lbs, I'm 5'7" and pre pregnancy size 6/8.

I love the overall look but the straps are very long. I have long limbs and torso and even I found that the top of my bra was visible because the straps hang so low. The dress is a little scratchy and quite heavy, so not very summery.
Beautiful sparkly dress. Straps were long, but I managed to make it work.
Gorgeous, high quality dress with beautiful pleats. The straps were a tiny bit too long for perfection but still didn't show any undergarment. Lovely and worth renting again

links_Review_Title: Very fun and sparkly, the fabric is thick but very stretchy.
links_Review_Text: Its a fun dress! A bit scratchy due to the fabric.
Looser fit. Beautiful color and details. Hated sending it back! It does run short so you have to be ok with that.

I rented this for work but ended up wearing multiple times both to work and on a date with the hubs. The length is a little short for work but was fine with thick tights. Could also wear with leggings for more casual look. Had a hard time returning it but will definitely rent again!
Super comfy, a little static-y, but overall a perfect choice for a "Sunday best" wedding

I LOVE this dress. I found that it did run shorter than other Saloni dresses of the same style, usually I'm a 4 but had to swap up for the 6 in this print because the 4 was bordering on shirt-length. I wore this dress to work, dinner, then (don't tell anyone!) brought it on a business trip and wore it to dinner the next night, too. Such a fun and easy piece. I'm turning into a Saloni ruffle addict for sure :)

I wore this dress to a friend's baby shower, then out for dinner with my husband. I'm at an awkward stage of 18 weeks pregnant where I can't quite wear maternity clothes, but this was perfect. It is roomy and comfortable without being overwhelming, and it was also light and airy on a hot day. I will definitely rent again!

This dress is so darn cute!! Super versatile - I wore it to work but could easily be worn to a shower or nice dinner. The colors are beautiful and the ruffle detail adds a little interest too! It was a smidge short on me (I'm just under 5'5") so I wore it with sandals. Lightweight so easily worn throughout the warmer months!

links_Review_Title: The dress was perfect!!! I wish I could buy it! So many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Casual, but great quality. Perfect for any type of party.
Light and airy. I love this sweet dress. Such a fun and flirty silhouette. Would most definitely rent again.
Wore with Sachin and Babi purple earrings to Mardi Gras theme day at work. Runs small on top in arms and chest. Recommend sizing up

links_Review_Title: Such a great work throw on dress
links_Review_Text: Fit great! Super comfy too. Will rent again.
Cute, fun, comfortable dress. I wore this for work with black tights under since it is a bit short for my office. Doesn't have a shape to it, which worked great for me to hide my 15 week baby bump.
Forgiving style and fun colors. I paired with turquoise watch and earrings with brown flats. Definitely not long, but not too short so that i could wear to work. But i'm also not short :)

I liked this dress a lot more in person than in the photo. The print was unique and ruffles were feminine without being over the top. It fit well and was a nice transition piece for fall. Perfect for work, running errands, and going on a date.

My typical size running being a Small, I felt the 2 was perfect in both length and fit. I wore this dress twice - once to dinner with heeled sandals as well as to work with printed booties (see pictured). I cannot wait to have an excuse to wear again!

links_Review_Title: Not one of my fav Saloni dresses
links_Review_Text: Nice enough but far from my fav Saloni. First I sized up one as this brand often runs small when fitted waist...no need to with this dress except maybe for length. Does no favors for your figure except to hide everything. Second it's that rough polyester feeling silk, not silky silk. Love the colors and flounces.
Love this dress. Would rent again. Got many compliments. Was a little short, but wearable. I have a large chest so the buttons pulled a little there - just had to be careful.

links_Review_Title: Adorable fun dress but too short
links_Review_Text: Fun and adorable dress but I was so disappointed it was very short when I put it on. The fit was great otherwise!
comfortable & cute dress, but it was pretty short on my 5'6" frame. had to wear tights & tall boots to make it suitable for work.
A number of compliments on this dress. It was shorter than I anticipated, so I had to wear opaque tights under it. Otherwise I enjoyed wearing it.
Dress runs large. Didn't realize that dress was open in the back and you couldn't wear a bra.
Too short for me for work, but great to play around in
The fit is good around the bust, the shoulders are a little tight, and it is fairly loose under the bust. It is a perfect from work to dinner outfit.
Dress looks as great on as in the photos. Really colorful print but not too overwhelming. Could work for any season, depending on how you style it.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! Really loved this dress.
links_Review_Text: Flowy, comfortable dress. A little on the short side. Would definitely wear again.

links_Review_Title: Rented as a fun work piece.
links_Review_Text: Loved the light swingy fabric on this dress. The top buttons kept wanting to come undone but other than that really liked this dress. Overall a good rental.
Loved the fit. Print is lovely!
Fit me great! Fun and professional for work.
To short to wear
The dress was flowey but still fit well. I loved the ruffles - they are subtle. I loved this dress!
good for work or every day
Cute print and fit. A little short but loved the dress
Nice print and could work with tights and boots or sneakers and flats when it gets warmer. Would rent again!
The size I ordered was improperly washed I presume? As the liner was longer than overlay. Couldn't wear

The print is really fun. I think I expected this dress to be more formal and in reality it is more on the casual side. Would look good with skinny legs and sandals. The lining showed below the hemline, which was also annoying.
Beautiful colors. Great dress. Love this brand just remember its European so size up! I'm normally a 0/2 in US. I wear a UK 8.

links_Review_Title: Lots and lots of compliments on this little number! So darling! It's short, so I paired with mules.
links_Review_Text: Cutest dress! Such fun!!
Wore this for work but it could easily be styles for cocktails, a date, etc. lovely pattern and flattering fit!
A typically beautiful, flowing dress from Saloni. The colors are exquisite and the fabric drapes nicely over the body. It goes easily from day to night with minor changes in accessories.
Pattern was not nearly as cute in person. Plus it ran smaller than my other Saloni rentals. I did not wear it because it was tight in the bust and short.
Cute comfortable dress, I wore for work and work dinners.

Loved this dress. Was comfortable, fun to dance in and a great color! Would rent again. I wore a strapless bra and did put on spanx for comfort but could have gone without because of the pleats. Would rent again. The jacket is also rented and made the outfit look great. Pardon the mess on the floor. Haha

Wore this to a gala with a 20s theme. It was a nice change from the standard flapper dresses that everyone at the event wore. It coordinated perfectly with my accessories and I even rented a fur jacket to go with it. Would highly recommend.
I definitely would have sized up if I'd had the opportunity, but the 4 was still wearable as a typical 6. The emerald color was my favorite thing about the dress!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a wedding and it worked out perfectly!
links_Review_Text: The dress was absolutely stunning the second I put it on. The 4R fit like a glove and was the perfect length for me with 2-3 inch heels. It runs true to size, but there is no give in the dress. The emerald with black lace detailing is so elegant, and even though the dress feels very expensive it felt very light on. I'm sure you could wear a regular strapless bra, but I wore a sticky bra and it worked out great. I did typical wedding things (sit, eat, dance etc.) in it and it didn't feel restrictive at all and had great movement when dancing. The only suggestion I have is if you are on the shorter side like me, be careful about the lace trim on the bottom of the dress. I held my dress up a bit when I walked to avoid snagging it. The dress fit floor length on me (I'm 5'2"). If you're on the taller side, this shouldn't be an issue for you. All in all, I absolutely ADORED this dress and would rent it again in a heartbeat!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Perfect for a holiday party!
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing! It definitely runs big so I would order 1-2 sizes down. I am typically an 8 or a 10 and ordered the 8 and 6. I ended up wearing the 8 as it was more comfortable. It is so comfortable! I love that the straps are adjustable and the lining kept me warm enough all night! I having nothing bad to say about this dress, it is absolutely perfect!
Dress fit really well and I got lots of compliments!
The color was perfect for a November wedding! Lots of compliments on this classy and very comfortable dress!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and beautiful easy to wear dress!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to the opera. And easy dress to wear that's so comfortable but I felt beautiful. A GREAT dress.
Stunning! Comfortable, gorgeous color, flattering fit, and super sexy yet classy! Endless compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: BY FAR MY FAVORITE DRESS TO DATE!
links_Review_Text: This JCrew dress was a DREAM. It fit perfectly and was so comfortable. Wore it to a wedding. I'm 5'4 and it came to my ankles with block heels on. I am a 38DD and did have to wear a strapless bra with it. Highly recommend this dress to anyone!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a semi formal autumn wedding!
links_Review_Text: This was a gorgeous dress for fall. It was really comfortable and although it fit a little tight in the bust even though I sized up, it was a great choice for me. It's the perfect in-between dressy and casual so it can work for a large range of events. I'm so happy I got this as my backup dress!

This fit well and was comfortable! I could dance, sit, stand, even scooter but the back was so long!! I'm 5'5" and 125 lbs and wore the 2R and had to hold up the side to keep my heels from puncturing through the lace when I walked. However, it was beautiful!

This dress is unique with both black lace and a rich emerald green color. It's fitted at the top and pleated At The bottom. It has a slight hi-Lo effect so be careful with heels at the back- I had to keep reminding myself to pick up the back so I wouldn't get a heel caught. Overall I loved it and would wear again.

This dress fit great! I love the lace details. I received many compliments on it. I wore it for a June wedding, the fabric was very lightweight so it made it comfortable to be in the heat with it, then when it cooled down at night I was able to throw on a black blazer and it looks cute. I have larger upper thighs and this hid them perfectly. I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat.

Pro: Sooo easy to dance in Loved the material so breezy (thankful because it was a Texas wedding) Felt sexy because of the nightgown vibes but appropriate for a wedding Would definitely rent again Cons: I'm a big busy gal and it did fit tight in my chest but the rest was great

links_Review_Title: Loved the color, length, and movement of the dress
links_Review_Text: Runs big size down if possible
One of my favorite rentals so far. I love the simplicity of this dress. It runs true to size, spanx are nice and hidden, and a strapless bra worked perfect.

Really easy and comfortable dress. It was my back up dress and ended up wearing it. Many compliments. Had to wear heals so it would not drag in back. Easy to dance in. Wore in August evening wedding in mountains/woods. It was perfect.

links_Review_Title: It was a unique dress that I got for a good price.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. I love that I was able to order 2 sizes just in case the sizing of the dress was off. The dress was perfect for a summer southern wedding!

The color of this dress is so beautiful! The fit was very flattering and hid the areas of my body I'm not thrilled with :) I'm usually a 4, but the 2 fit perfectly. A strapless bra would work, but I went sans bra for comfort. The back is a bit long, but I wore 3.5 inch heels to help with that (I'm 5'6 1/2). Super fun dress to pair with vintage style accessories.
This dress fit great! Was super flattering as I'm really busty, but it didn't show too much.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, comfortable fit, great for dancing!
links_Review_Text: Worn to brother’s wedding. Could be dressed up or down! Received so many compliments on the dress and color. It was more beautiful in person even than online. Fit well, though I maybe could have worn a size 4 (a bit loose up top). Danced all night in it, and honestly wish I owned it!
Perfect cocktail dress for a Perfect Occasion!!!
Wore for a MDW wedding in Boston. The pleats were beautiful and the dress never wrinkled, between sitting, dancing & lots of wind. I usually wear an 8 but this 6 was perfect.
Beautiful dress, received a lot of compliments. Definitely worth trying if you want something to feel pretty in.

links_Review_Title: I love the way this dress made me feel!
links_Review_Text: It ran small, so I'm glad I ordered the 2, I usually wear a 4. It was very comfortable to wear for hours and easy to dance in.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! So many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Everything about this dress was great! Very comfortable but felt classy, sexy and stylish at the same time. Would definitely rent again!

I received so many compliments on this dress! I felt sexy but classy in it. It was so comfortable all night to dance in. It was a tad loose in bust area but other than that I loved the color and fit of it!

links_Review_Title: Great color, made me feel pretty!
links_Review_Text: This was a great dress! The straps are adjustable, i adjusted mine looser so i could get more cleavage haha. The pleats on bottom don't flare out, and keep a slim flattering shape. I will say, going down steps the lace on the back of the hem got caught on my heel, i miraculously didn't trip or rip the dress, but be warned! It was fun, definitely can be worn in spring. I brightened it up with gold jewelry and pink lipstick

This dress was absolutely beautiful. It was very flattering and a good length for a more formal cocktail occasion. The lace details are fun and make it a more interesting dress. It was fine with a strapless bra and was very comfortable. Would strongly recommend!

This dress was beautiful - the lace trim is so gorgeous and gives it a trendy boost. I received compliments all night long about the color and style. I was a little worried the pleating would wrinkle - but it was perfect right out of the bag. The waist drops slightly, so it's very flattering. I'm only 5'3" and without heels, the lace in the back would have hung on the ground, so shorter women, plan accordingly! It does run just a little big - if I had the size down, I probably would have worn that.

links_Review_Title: Almost too long for me but great layering
links_Review_Text: Felt comfy and cute layered with a black turtleneck
I wore this to a winter wedding in the Northeast and received numerous compliments on this dress! The color is so beautiful in person and the dress was comfortable enough to eat, drink, and dance!

I thought I would love this dress, but it didn't end up wowing me. Looked very nice and fit pretty well, but was a little big in the top and wasn't super flattering to my hips. Overall, I would probably wear to an event if I hadn't loved my other RTR dress so much.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Flattering, sexy and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'4 and 130 lbs. and wore a size 4. I wore this to a work holiday party and it was perfect. The color is a rich green, the lace added a nice touch to the bottom and the pleats are forgiving and flatter your figure. The dress was very comfortable, I wore a strapless bra and SPANX (of course)…. a nice feature was that the straps are adjustable but for shorter girls the length is bit long but worn with a nice size heel the dress did not touch the floor. Overall the dress was another win for me with Rent the Runway!
I am 5ft 4in, 36DD, 145lb and it was the perfect size and length, many compliments all night.

I rented this for a corporate holiday party. I was a little worried the lace would look lingerie-ish but it does not come across that way in person. I'm between 10-12 and usually fit into size 10 J Crew without a problem. But I wish I had rented the size 12. I have big hips and the lamp shade paneling or whatever it's called wasn't the most flattering on that area. It kind of hugged my hips too much. The ten fit fine but I think I would have felt more flattering in a bigger size.
Back is surprisingly long

links_Review_Title: Great dress- I got so many compliments. It’s unique and flattering!
links_Review_Text: I’m usually a true size 2 but it was baggy all over. The 0 fit perfectly and was fitted without being too tight on the midsection.
I was so happy with this dress. Beautiful green color, great fit, and perfect height for a tall girl. Wish I owned it!

This dress definitely runs big. I am a 4/6 and sometimes get medium or small. I am happy I went with the small here. Medium would have been huge. It's light weight but perfect for winter with tights. The arms are unique and so is the collar (which wasn't too tight) Easy throw on work dress ( no zipper )
The bottom is long and the top half fits about 2 sizes small for bigger chested women
n.a

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but not for work
links_Review_Text: Dress was lower cut than I expected and just had a lot going on: turtleneck/low cut neckline, split sleeves, and the ruffle at the wrists. I may have been able to wear it out but it just wasn't right for work.
flattering, and straightforward silhouette. received a lot of compliments. wore with black tights and black pumps. comfortable and stylish.

I thought this dress would be more structured, but it was actually very stretchy and comfortable. I definitely would say you need to wear Spanx with it as it is not forgiving on your stomach. You can wear a normal bra, but I wore a padded one to help fill out the chest area more. I would get this dress again!

I wore this dress to a gala with an 80s theme (meaning I wanted an 80s vibe but not a full costume). It was perfect and I got tons of compliments. Fortunately I had read the other reviews and was prepared for how low-cut it is (loowwww) and also it was tighter than I expected, but I had ordered a larger backup size and that worked great.

links_Review_Title: This was my girls’ meetup group. The party was a Mardi Gras Masquerade.
links_Review_Text: The fit was great! I didn’t see a discernible difference between the XS & S, but liked the little extra length that the S gave me. The colors were beautiful! It is super low cut as previously reviewed, but I never feared a wardrobe malfunction & used petals just in case.

Wore this as my costume change dress for my bands show on valentines days. Everyone was WOWED! Love the stretch, perfect V for not too much cleavage and the colors are so pretty. I do love a jewel tone!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a masquerade murder mystery party. My character was a magician’s assistant.
links_Review_Text: Stunning dress! I received so many compliments and felt great in it. I fall somewhere between a medium and large, but just went with the large. I probably could have sized down, but the dress felt a little short, so I felt like the longer size might give me a little more length.

This dress was an absolute show stopper. I received compliments all night. I'm big in the bust area and it was very low cut so you may want to pass if that concerns you. The zipper was a little tough simply because of the sequins. However, the sequins did not scratch my arms. If you want to standout ...rent this dress!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for a fun night!
links_Review_Text: Dress was comfortable for the most part. A little scratchy under the arms and very low cut. Make sure you have breast tape when wearing this dress. A traditional bra would not work.

links_Review_Title: Amazing colors! Love the plunging neck
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, didn't rub sequins on my arms like others have. The plunging neckline was amazing. I am a A cup did not wear a bra, not needed. Stunning dress.

I loved everything about this dress! I am 5'10, size 4 or 6, and also have an athletic build. I wore a S and it was perfect! The sequence and the color made me feel glamorous and I had so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: An audience came up to me after the show to ask me where I had gotten my stunning dress from!
links_Review_Text: I ordered the XS with a S as a backup. The material of the dress is stretchy, so the XS fit well. This dress has a very deep V and is pretty short. I almost wore it backwards because I was worried about pulling off such a deep neckline, but using petals and fashion tap made me feel a lot more tucked in. In the end, I just decided I had to commit to the V. This was a pretty daring silhouette and not my usual style, but I enjoyed wearing it for the show I was a part of and the afterparty.

Loved this dress! It fit snug in the thighs so I went with an XL. I didn't have a lot to fill the top so it was a hit loader than I would have liked but some fashion tape did the trick of keeping it in place! I used sports tape under neath since it was low cut. The dress got many compliments and was very comfortable!
This dress is definitely revealing, but I wore a size smaller than normal and didn't feel like I would fall out. I used a sticky bra to feel more secure. Super sexy and form fitting! Fun purple color

For a girl who’s favorite color is glitter, it doesn’t get much better than NYE and this dress was perfect! The subtle stripe pattern in the dress adds dimension and I got so many compliments all night. The fabric has some stretch, so it moves with you. The neckline was the right amount of revealing for my taste, but I could still wear a normal push-up bra, which is always nice. The length was great too - I’m 5’8” and didn’t feel like I needed to be pulling it down all night. Would love to rent it again!

This was such a fun dress for a New Year's Eve wedding! The XL was just a tad snug but very comfortable. I paired with black leggings and boots for comfort since it is a bit shorter than I would typically wear. The purple/ blue sequins are fantastic!

I LOVED this dress. I wore it for a black tie NYE party so the sequins were the perfect accessory. I couldn't believe how comfortable and stretchy it was, the sequins did not irritate my underarms or any other part of the dress. Highly recommend!
Comfortable, just the right amount of sexy, well thought out sequins didn’t scratch, non stop compliments all night on the colors! Sad to see it go!

The ONLY reason I docked a star is because I had to glue my boobs into the dress to keep them from coming out! If you've got great perky boobs, no problem, but mine are far far from perfect, and kept trying to fall out! However, I'm thinking about renting the dress again, because once I was in it, I felt like a star!

links_Review_Title: Work Christmas Party. Got compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: Wore the M and had the L as backup. The L was a little too loose and bunched up. The M was definitely more fitted but overall I think looked better. It did not ride up, the cleavage was was good without being too much.

So many compliments all night on this dress! Nice stretch which made it comfortable to sit for dinner and dance all night long. Flattering fit for large chest. Colors are gorgeous! I wanted to keep this rental for sure!!

links_Review_Title: LOVED this dress! It was so flattering and received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: I wore this for my company's holiday party. It fit wonderfully, honestly couldn't ask for a better fit. I ordered a Small and X-Small but ended up going with the XS. They fit almost exactly the same because there was a stretch to the fabric. I did use a bit of double-sided tape just to make sure there were no nip slips. My date couldn't stop telling me how much he loved this dress.

Really fun dress for my company holiday party. I'm a 14/16, but designer dresses always seem to run small so I went with the XXL which was fitted and looked nice. I'm a DD so it may have been a little too much cleavage for colleagues but wasn't inappropriate. Sequins irritated me a little but I'd definitely rent it again!
Loved this dress. Sparkles are perfect for NYE. Received the L and XL but wore the XL because it felt a little longer and more comfortable to move in.
Super cute, fit well, nice and stretchy not scratchy.
A little short but super fabulous loved it. Sequins can be a little uncomfortable if you're not used to wearing them.
Loved it! Nice and stretchy and comfortable. Quite low cut

I was attending a fun music function that just begged for a colorful sequin dress. This one was exactly right. Horrible photo but I wanted to show the length.
