I am a bit over 6 feet tall and this dress was not too short (ie I could bend over and stay decent). Obviously it would be longer on a shorter human but for we tall gals it isn't too short. I feel like it is sometimes hard for us tall ladies to get a read on dress length.

I rented this for my birthday party and loved it so much I bought it (first RTR purchase for me). The dress is structured but not tight or uncomfortable. It fit my curves perfectly. I'm 5'9 and I could dance comfortably in it with no riding up issues. Overall perfect party dress, I can't wait to find an excuse to wear it again.
Fun dress!! I don't think this would be good for people with heavier top since the low cut is very low.. No stretch so be aware. The spangles did not scratch me at all!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for making a splash but not being over the top!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful. The deep neckline and just-right length worked great. The waist was a bit high for my long torso but it worked out ok.
This dress is so comfy and stretchy! Love the purple sparkles. Definitely a show stopper!
I got lots of compliments on the mermaid sequins on this dress! I wore this to a gala with a circus theme and it was great. The dress fit perfect and wasn't too short.

Wore this for my 40th birthday and it was a showstopper! Fit perfectly, SUPER comfortable, and got compliments all night. You'll need a very low cut bra but otherwise it didn't really need anything else to make it work.
Wore this for my birthday and received compliments all night! Felt like a million bucks!

I felt amazing in this stunning dress! It turned heads all night, and I received so many compliments. It is very low cut. I needed a push up plunge bra to fill it out, and some fashion tape to hold it in place. It was comfortable enough to dance the night away. If you are looking for something fun and sexy, this is it!

Absolutely fabulous dress! I could have gone down one size. The fit is very flattering and I was comfortable dancing all night! I did use some seamstress tape, but it didn't stick and I didn't need it. 38F bust and I never felt like I was going to pop out. I received lots of compliments! If I recall, I am wearing the size 12.

I rented this dress for my 30th birthday party. The colors are vibrant, the sequins aren't uncomfortable, and the dress has a good amount of stretch. It has a very deep cut (I wasn't wearing the right bra in the photo - just trying it on) so you'll definitely need some Hollywood Tape to keep the girls in check. Highly recommend it!
Loved the dress but needed to wear a camisole to keep the ladies covered - also the dress kept riding up and the sequins irritated my underarms - but otherwise I loved it and got many compliments

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress has some stretch and give so it fit my curves just right. I was able to wear a regular bra and no shapewear. The sequins didn’t uncomfortably rub my underarms and it was super comfortable to wear several hours for a gala.
This dress was amazing! I received so many compliments and it was so comfortable! I wish I could buy it!
Loved this dress. Got a L and XL and wore the XL, which is what usually wear. Fits great, stretchy and comfy and sooo many sequined!

links_Review_Title: A bit sheer, but gorgeous and flattering dress

links_Review_Text: Great little floral wrap dress. Wore a silk cami underneath for work. I ordered a 4, which is 1-2 sizes smaller than my usual, and it fit perfectly. Elastic at the cuffs was a little tight by the end of the day.

Rented this dress for work and I received so many compliments from both men and women! The tie in the middle of the dress allows you to create a cinched waistline for any size waist. The material is silk, so definitely have static guard on hand. As others have mentioned, the neckline is a bit wide but nothing a few safety pins couldn't take care of.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress with a deep V neck
links_Review_Text: I liked the fall colors in this dress. The v neck was very deep and required a cami underneath. Nice knee length - great with fall boots.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable dress with cinched the waist
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and wore it multiple times! Follow on IG for more looks @saidbymelissa
The dress has potential to be great but the wrap feels/wears odd. Because of the pattern, it's not as flattering as it could be. Also quite sheer.

links_Review_Title: Great material -- very low cut -- awkward bow -- but cute
links_Review_Text: I wore this from work to drinks and it was great. I did have to wear a bodysuit underneath for work as it's so low cut, but I took it off for drinks afterwards. The fabric is incredibly lightweight and easy to wear, but the way the bow ties in the front is awkward and unflattering from the side. Overall though a very cute dress.

links_Review_Title: Wore it to church and on vacation
links_Review_Text: It runs HUGE! It worked for me with pinning and is lovely and flowy. But it so so big.
Such a goooorgeous dress. The sleeves are puffy and wonderful, the dress itself is super light without being see-through and it's super flattering. Love love love!

links_Review_Title: gorgeous fabric but too light weight
links_Review_Text: It's a gorgeous print and the silk fabric feels great!!! The fabric is so light that after I tie the belt, it's too billowy for my taste. I'm sad it didn't work out. Also, it has a deep V neckline- you'll probably need a cami.

links_Review_Title: Such a fun dress! Loved it
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress. Its light yet still perfect for the colder months with some tights underneath. Got endless compliments on it! And its very flattering. I wore this dress mainly on the weekends but also found it as a great work dress too! Will probably rent again.

links_Review_Title: Easy pack-able dress but nothing great
links_Review_Text: The wrap is a little imperfect and doesn't really create a true wrap effect. But was easy to pack and wear for my sisters bridal shower. Just good but nothing I would rent again
Comfy and flattering. Fits my boob too

links_Review_Title: Dear dress, It's not you, it's me.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous silk midi dress. I just felt uncomfortable with how figure hugging this was. I struggled with static cling and a slip is a must. For more slender ladies or those at peace with their curves, go for it!

I wore this dress to work in the fall. The fabric is very light and flow and can be forgiving on figures like mine that are on curvier side. Got tons of compliments on this dress and wouldn't mind renting and wearing again.

links_Review_Title: Fun and super cute for Dinner date
links_Review_Text: #supercute and light
Top and arms are very large but loved the flow of the dress. It was perfect for a Sunday afternoon fall wedding reception.

The fit is weird and made me look pregnant. It is see through so I had to grab a plain black dress I own and put it under so my undercarriage was covered. It is also very deeply cut in the boob region. I would not rent again.

links_Review_Title: Paired it with the motto jacket and booties for the perfect fall outfit.
links_Review_Text: I needed to wear a cami at work to accommodate the deep v neck and I wrapped the front tie differently around my waist as I didn't like the tie/bow at my belly. Great dress I will wear several times this month!

I am typically a size 16/18 but have picked up a few pounds. On a hunch I went ahead and got the 20(18 was sold out and I've been eying this dress for a while) so glad that I did! The top of the sleeves is very fitted despite the bottom being so full, I have big arms so it was a bit tight at the top. Otherwise the fit is great. The tie is fully adjustable so the bigger the dress to your body, the more float it will look on you. I loved this! Definitely would buy it if it was a little bit less!

Honestly this dress was so so because while it was patterned and had a bit of a bell sleeve, it still seemed somewhat forgettable. Print is simple, cut is a little long (I could see it being bad for people that are under average height). Fit was a little loose. Again easy everyday dress but nothing special.

Definitely agree that fit is larger but I thought the tie for the waist was a big short. Besides that I LOVED this dress and got so many compliments when I wore it. It does dip a bit low in the front but can be adjusted easily. Fit and fabrication are great - definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: The sleeves aren't the only part of this dress to run large
links_Review_Text: The 12 in this is more like a 16. It's huge! The sleeves were in the way much of the day and you have to wear a camisole because it's so low cut. The print is charming and the flowy skirt is lovely, but it just wasn't one of my favorites. Maybe it would have been in a smaller size.
Did run a bit large so I would suggest sizing down. Also thought it wouldn't be so low cut so I had to wear with a black tank for work.

Lovely fall dress. The sizing ran large, but the wrap made it easy to make the dress work. The weight was nice for a fall transition dress and the sleeves were a dramatic touch. The floral pattern is romantic and it was nice for a night out with my guy.
It is flowy and super easy to wear. Runs a little big but the tie-waist allows you to cinch it however you'd like.
Fit was true to size.
Wrap dresses usually work great for me but this one was very loose and with the low neckline wasn't for me.
Fabric is lightweight and flattering - does run big. Fairly deep V and didn't wrinkle

links_Review_Title: Super cute dress - way too big!
links_Review_Text: This dress absolutely swallowed me I had to send it back immediately. I ordered the 6 and probably could've gone down at least 2 sizes. There was way too much fabric it made me look much larger than I am. The dress, however, is beautiful in color and fabric and would look great if you had the time to find the right size!

links_Review_Title: Cute date night dress at the theater
links_Review_Text: Fit was definitely large. I should have sized down one or maybe even two sizes. However added a cute belt to cinch, leather jacket and booties and it looked great!

I love the sleeves on this dress and the drape, but the front is very low cut and I've been self conscious of it all day. I probably won't rent it again for that reason, but if you like a little cleavage, this is the dress for you.

This silky high low hem is a great looking workday to evening out dress. The color is fall like and the cut works on my pear shape in a good way! The sleeves have one caveat: there is a band that fits snuggly upper arm, but not a deal breaker. The elastic wrist ruffle is a pretty and feminine touch. A good go to dress - will rent again.
I didn't think just tying the in back was flattering, but the tie was long enough to bring around front.
The dress was rather large in the chest area but I was able to adjust it easily enough to be appropriate fora work party.
Runs a little big the front is a little wonky too, you have to make sure you really tie it tight otherwise it hangs weirdly.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, comfortable and best of all: compliments!
links_Review_Text: Ran a bit big but gorgeous material and will definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing this for the event I had in mind.
links_Review_Text: I wore it to work with a tank top underneath. Its VERY large and pretty low cut. It is a very pretty fabric but its also very sheer.

links_Review_Title: Ok this is the one piece in my order I did love! Nicholas can do no wrong in my book.
links_Review_Text: The only flaw was the zipper kind of sticks out on the side. The print did look as if it's faded quite a bit up close, but I truly love this brand. It was the only item I wore from my rental.
Did not wear. Had no shape.
This dress was definitely out of my comfort zone, but it was so stunning, and I received so many compliments on it! The color/pattern was absolutely show-stopping & I loved the slit in the leg!

Worn as is I found the straight hem cut my legs off at a weird place (I am 5'2") but I tied it up at the corner and loved it. The color and pattern is so vibrant and fun, definitely great for a night out or vacation. You do need to go either bra less or wear a strapless bra bc the straps are so thin. Would consider renting again for the right occasion!
Loved this easy dress. Doesn't wrinkle. Can dress up or down. Looked great with a jean jacket. Not too figure hugging. Went to mid-shin on me. Wore with flats.
Wore this for a trip in LA and loved it! Has a slit on the side so makes it more fun for daytime.
Very versatile. Will rent again :)

I loved this dress so much! I dressed it up for work, then wore it to my friend's bachelorette with platform sneakers. It's light, breathable, and the most beautiful blue color. I should have bought it!!
Love the color, length, and print. Can wear it over the weekend at night or with a denim jacket to work
nice fit nice quality

This dress is incredibly odd fitting. Very tight in the boob area, loose in the stomach and tight in the hips. It did not hang nice like a slip dress should, at least on my body. For reference I'm 5'2" and 126lbs. It's a really nice material and pattern but the fit and cut is just very weird.
Giving it two starts because it's super cute but it runs large (or at least on straight / narrow / no boobs!). Might look better on women with more curves.
The material was unfortunately a weird fit. Kinda bug and just sorta hangs there without being the type of material that moves. Great pattern but that's it.

A really sophisticated dress and gorgeous color. Very comfortable on my second trimester bump, too! Be ready with fashion tape as the top is open and low cut. Only wish the belt in the photo had come with the dress. Overall, one of my faves from RTR.

links_Review_Title: Top is open so get a safety pin.
links_Review_Text: This looked terrible on me. The cool casual drapey fit I'd hoped for ended up looking sloppy. The top is open, just wide open, so I would have had to use a pin and maybe also tape. I didn't see a belt so I would have had to find one or buy one to work with this as exposing the elastic waist isn't an option. Hard pass all around at this juncture! Measurements in pic: 31in waist, 38 bust, 41 hip.

Spent Christmas in south Florida with my inlaws. I needed a dress that would be festive but lightweight, and appropriate for both church and dinner out. This dress fit the bill! I didn't see the sash in the bag (it was in a pocket) but the dress was still great without. Careful of the faux-wrap, but no issues even in church with feeling over exposed.

Cute dress but wasn't what I was looking for. Flattering to your figure. Wear a plunging bra because the button pops and you might put on a show. Nice color and material. Also had no idea they hid the sash that goes with it in a small bag in RTR pocket. So keep an eye out for that

I wore this to a work event where I had to present. It was fine standing up but as soon as I sat down I felt exposed. The slit goes much higher and due to the structure of the dress it opens to allow for an unfortunate wardrobe malfunction. If you're not sitting down you're fine otherwise bring a sweater to cover that area.

Sleeves are not too tight. I have muscular arms and they didn't feel tight at all. I have wide shoulders and there was the teensiest tightness if I reached. The waist band was just about at my natural waist, not noticably off. The neckline is just the right amount of cleavage (I'm a 32DDD) and the button did not pop all night. The skirt silhouette is JUST GORGEOUS. I felt sexy confident and beautiful in it. Compliments from MANY people.

links_Review_Title: This dress was professional yet feminine in a way that made the perfect impression.
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size.

I rented this dress for a work event. It worked great in that setting but as others mentioned the top is fastened by a snap that's not very secure so I don't think this would be a great fit for a night of dancing. The arms were a bit snug but otherwise it fit TTS. I got several compliments on the color.
The dress is beautiful and confortable get for a bridal shower. I'm 40 DD the dress has enough cheats space.
Fit great through body, but arms and chest are tight-- had to wear a pin to keep top from busting open. I wore a 1XR but I suggest a 2x for more room.

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for cocktails and dinner for my 30th birthday, and then again for an awards show
links_Review_Text: I can't believe how incredible this dress looked on. The color is super eye-catching and flattering. I love the cut of the shoulders and the length of the sleeves. The bust fit just right for my E cups! Two strangers who were at the restaurant stopped me as I was leaving to compliment the dress and tell me how great I looked. I've never felt better in a dress!

Wore this dress to work and then happy hour and I got SO many compliments! It definitely makes you feel good when you're wearing it and I'm tempted to buy it - at the very least, I'm going to rent again! I did need to add a couple safety pins - one at the top and one at the bottom to keep it from opening up too much. Also, I forgot to put on the belt, but it still looked good!

Wore this stunner to a rehearsal dinner! Ended up wearing a medium. I am 5'9" and 180 lbs with curves and this fit perfectly. Comfortable and has a Beautiful red color. Have to be a little careful with Slit in front when sitting down and standing up. Received so many compliments and will definitely be renting again!

Button placement was strange. It would button but wouldn’t lay flat. I ended up wearing a black bralette under and left it unbuttoned. Dress was a little small in the arms but not horrible. I sized up for this due to that reason. Dress was beautiful and I got several compliments. I’m 5’3” wearing a 2x. I weigh around 210-220 and carry most of my weight in the lower half of my body.

links_Review_Title: Hard out here for a plus
links_Review_Text: This was a replacement dress. I followed the measurements, read reviews, and everything on this dress fit EXCEPT the arms, which were comically small. The picture I'm attaching shows I can't even get them in. It's terrible because it was going to look fantastic. I also did not receive the belt that comes with the dress... hopefully I get my replacements quickly.

links_Review_Title: Not as flattering as I would have liked.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful color and fabric but sat oddly on me. I didn't end up wearing it.

links_Review_Title: classic red faux wrap that stands out in a crowd
links_Review_Text: This dress is easy to wear, flattering in style, made of comfortable material, and gives you a classic look I took a star off due to the fact that the button near the bust easily pops open, so I had to pin it in place Other than that, the slit is just enough to be sexy but not high enough to make you uncomfortable The color is a vibrant red, which was perfect for Xmas when I wore it I received tons of compliments for this dress; I highly recommend it

I thought this dress was a little frumpy when I first tried it on and I almost didn't wear it, but I was glad I did because I received a lot of compliments during the evening. It is a great color- fire engine red- has plenty of give in the waist and wasn't too revealing.

I was nervous about renting this dress after reading the reviews. I was pleasantly surprised after trying on as the dress fit me well, even a bit big and I am large chested. It did come with the red belt in a separate pouch, but I had a gold belt that I thought went well with it :) Many compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: Vibrant red color, great for holidays
links_Review_Text: This dress did not fit me will in the chest area, button was to high up in the V neck and would not stay closed.

I wore this for Halloween at work (Miss Scarlet from Clue). Had to wear a tank top underneath because the snap wasn't even close to staying closed and I only have an A-Cup! The slit also goes alllll the way up. It's a very pretty and flattering dress, it's just MUCH more revealing than pictured.

links_Review_Title: Good, but the neckline could be better
links_Review_Text: I liked the overall fit and comfort with this dress. I didn't think that it was too revealing in the neckline as other reviewers thought, but it could benefit from some tit tape to make sure the snap doesn't show. I think this dress is good for large chested and for short torsoed ladies. I really liked the belt, it helped make an hourglass figure.

links_Review_Title: When I walked into the room, my boss's jaw dropped
links_Review_Text: Talk about power dressing. This dress made me feel like I could kill with one look. Like I could conquer kingdoms with the flick of my wrist. The fit was true to size, and the fabric was super soft and lightweight. You do have to steam this if you chose to travel in it because it does wrinkle easily but girl. It's worth it. Go forth and serve.

Nothing exciting about this dress. This style is usually flattering on me but this dress just did not deliver. The color is a true red. This fabric will show every mark or stain, even water. The slit is saucy yet appropriate for a work related event and overall this was a breezy and comfortable choice.

I am obsessed with this dress! The red is vibrant and definitely makes you stand out. This is true to size and works for all cup sizes. It is fitted at the waist, but stretchy fabric allows for comfortable room. This is tea length and can be worn with a standard bra. I love this style for date night and red lipstick!
The sleeves were tight on me, and a bit awkward. The chest also seemed to pop open easily, I would have needed a safety pin if I didn't want to flash anyone.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a nursing mom! Opens easy.
links_Review_Text: There was a difference in fabric from the XS to the small for some reason. But the dress was very comfortable and flattering.
Very snug on the arms.

links_Review_Title: Received so many compliments on this dress. Felt beautiful at 20 weeks pregnant.
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress to wear at a wedding where I was doing a reading. I wanted to look classy and suitable for my friend’s ceremony without breaking the bank by buying a maternity dress that I would only wear once. This was a great option! I’m 5’3” and usually wear a size 8 (pre-pregnancy). I ordered both the M and L in this dress, but wound up wearing the M. You’ll want to wear pantyhose or spanx underneath, as the dress clings and shows lines. However, I felt lovely and received many compliments on the look. The shoulder pieces/sleeves fit best on the M (they were slipping down too much in the L). Overall, I was very happy with this dress.

Would not normally rent a wrap dress because of my chest, got this because of a mix up with my order that RTR resolved. Fabric was beautiful, loved the color, flattering on my tummy area. BUT I could not stand up straight without the wrap top busting.
Very pretty, but too small. Lovely shade of red and nicely draped fabric.

links_Review_Title: Super cute but maybe not for work
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a work event #onbrand but found that the dress was possibly a little too low cut and then the slit as I walked was very revealing. Would rent again but not for work. I got a TON of compliments in the Atlanta airport while wearing it so there's that :)
The button on top kept popping open and the wrap up front was very revealing but it was a perfect date dress. I'd rent again in a heartbeat.

links_Review_Title: No give for the top heavy, bottom half runs large!
links_Review_Text: Runs small on top and large on bottom! I am an hourglass to a pear shape! Beautiful color!
Nice dress but snap at top would not stay snapped. Probably better on someone with a smaller chest.

This dress is really great and fit wonderfully .... except the snap that holds the front top together is useless. The dress was not too small and I had plenty of room (I'm a 34B). But I ended up changing before even driving off a work meeting because the snap would not stay snapped. It kept coming undone and the entire top Would flap open. A safety pin was noticeable and did not look right for me.
This was a classy dress and pretty comfortable fit. For my chest, it was a bit too small. The button wouldn't stay clasped so I had to wear a cami underneath and keep it unbuttoned.

links_Review_Title: It didn't fit me well. Maybe I should have ordered a size smaller.
links_Review_Text: It was a little too boxy and draped too much for my liking. It didn't flatter my round mid-section, it accentuated it!
Small in the chest and arms - didn't wear wouldn't stay closed

links_Review_Title: Looked great - wore it for a charity luncheon
links_Review_Text: I used a safety pin to secure the bust. Great, flattering fit.
Sexy shirt. My shape is perfect for this shirt exactly. It's short, and I'm thick around the middle, but I wore it anyways and got lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Almost impossible to wear if you live alone...
links_Review_Text: Overall I loved this -- I wore it to work and then for drinks and dinner later at night. The only issue here is that the whole back buttons up, making it almost impossible to put on by yourself. If you live with someone, make sure they're there when you're getting dressed! If you live alone, it'll take a lot of patience, but I was able to button everything in the end. Not sure if it would be worth it to wear a second time.
Dress up or down! This top has a lot of give an completely elevates a little black top. So cute I want to own.
#work #date #dinner

This blouse is so beautiful. The fabric is really great in quality. It's both sexy and elegant. You can wear it with cute jean shorts and boots or with jeans, and even with a skirt if you want to dress up! The only thing is that the sleeves are a bit shorter than I like but still spectacular. Got tons of compliments!
Loved it. A bit shorter than many tops I've wore but got tons of compliments.

I rented this for professional photos. I am an attorney and was doing photos with two other male colleagues so I didn't want to be wearing a suit between two dudes also wearing suits. I wanted to stand out a bit. So que in this shirt. It wasn't my first choice but another shirt I wanted wasn't available. I love the lace and it definitely set me apart. My only complaint and reason it didn't get 5 stars was that it is very short. It comes up to your belly button so have to wear a shirt underneath but I think it worked out!
So pretty and goes with anything -- jeans, skirt, etc. Loved!
Great date night or girls night top with dark denim! I loved the sleeves and such quality fabric.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and beautiful. You will need someone to button the back for you.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. Lots of buttons in the back needed help. Comfortable and versatile. Jeans or dressy bottoms.
Very short but cute! Had to wear a strapless bra since bra straps would show through the material, which made this sort of impractical, but it was fun for a night out.
Rented for day to day, but also wore this for a AHS Halloween costume. So pretty, don't want to send this back
cute
Loved this top. Fir great. It is rather cropped so be prepared to wear high waisted pants
Loved this top for work! It's felt a little worn when I received it but overall I loved it and got a lot of use from it!

links_Review_Title: The lace makes this something unique. You can dress it up or down and it always looks great
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. It sits a little shorter, so it can crop up and show your stomach but nothing too bad. I wore it to work with a pair of dark skinny jeans and boots. I received lots of compliments that day!

I wore this to work with a black leather mini skirt and felt like a grown-up goth. It was perfect for late summer/ early fall: light and breathable while still covering me up. I'll definitely rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Great Blouse. Can be dressed up or down!
links_Review_Text: My favorite blouse. I wore it with blue jeans for a work event and black faux leather pants for a dinner out. True to size.
Super simple and cute , an instant outfit maker !

I love a good witchy moment and thought this would be the perfect top to add a little gothy drama to my daily wardrobe. However, I could not figure out how to wear it. Too short for jeans. The top was too ruffley at the bottom for any of my skirts. I love the look, in theory, but just couldn't make it work for me.

It was a crop top. On the model it looks like a regular size shirt but even with high waisted pants it is still too small. On top of that I have a short torso so I thought it would work but it was still very short. I also thought where it bunched on me was very unflattering. It ended up just looking bad all over.

Absolutely loved this top! It goes well with a strapless bra, black skinny jeans and a sandal heel. Since it is mesh fabric, it is good to be cautious that it does not snag on to anything. The sheerness of this top works well since it's only sheer at the right places. The somewhat peplum effect the top has slims you a little bit since it kind of cinches your waist.

Was so skeptical about this but loved it. Wore this with slightly lighter wash denim jeans and black heels and felt fabulously put together without being stuffy. The tie waist gives you perfect definition and shows a tiny bit of skin in the shoulders but comes off as perfectly classy. May want to size up if you have a larger chest.
I wore these with high waisted pants and I still wish it was a little bit longer. I still loved this top.
Beautiful blouse, flattering. It’s a true waist shirt and cinches pretty high. Loved it!

I would almost label this a half shirt as I have a short torso and still found this unable to be worn. Just not as pictured as it stopped well above my belly button. The quality was good and the style cute but sadly a miss in my book

links_Review_Title: Part of pirate themed party outfit
links_Review_Text: Comfortable. True to size. Loved it!
The fit was great ! Got lots of complements! The Only thing is the sleeve had needed some fixing at the wrist due to the previous renter other then that I looked amazing
Loved this shirt but it was def short on me and looked best with a high-waisted pant
I like the lace

links_Review_Title: Cute top for fall/winter that is also a little sexy!
links_Review_Text: Cute top for fall/winter that is also a little sexy!

links_Review_Title: Cute shirt for a date or dinner out
links_Review_Text: I wore this shirt out to dinner with my husband and some friends and it was perfect for the occasion. It has a fancier feel to it but it can be dressed up or down. I wore the XS and found it ran true to size, but if you have a longer torso you might want to size up or consider a different shirt as it was definitely on the shorter side. I wore with high waisted black jeans and didn't have a problem with it riding up at all. Overall very cute and I would recommend it!

links_Review_Title: just enough details for it to pass in casual events, but make it stand out!
links_Review_Text: really awesome detailing

I usually wear a small or medium. Ordered the medium and it fit like a glove, so if you're between sizes I'd recommend ordering up. As others have mentioned, this top is short and very fitted at the natural waist. Your tummy will show when you lift your arms if you wear mid-rise jeans.
Perfect blouse for a date night with jeans

links_Review_Title: Adorable top, wish it wasn't cropped.
links_Review_Text: I had to wear a tank under this, and it kept riding up my stomach. It was not long enough for work without me adjusting it every 5 seconds. Sleeves were perfect, and I have longer arms. Love the material though.

links_Review_Title: I love love love this top
links_Review_Text: For a person with tiny upper body frame & small waist, this top is very flattering. It's good for brunch or night out. It emphasizes all my body advantages and I can't wait to rent it again if I can!

I rented this top to wear to my works Halloween party - but didn't end up wearing it. I'm normally a size medium but they only had a size XL and it would have fit fine. The waist is elastic. It's very short and I don't really like short tops so I didn't wear it.

I think it ran slightly small. I usually wear an XS, but chose to wear the S instead. It is short, so be prepared to wear something slightly high waisted. I would not recommend if concerned about belly pooch.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful sheer top, looked great with black pants and heels!
links_Review_Text: Fit well. Plenty of room for my ample bosom!
The dress was VERY HEAVY and I kept having to pull it up all night.

links_Review_Title: Very fast delivery and nice dress options.
links_Review_Text: It was a great dress for a night out. It was heavy material and bigger on top.

Like all the other reviews, I will note that the material is heavy. I wore this on a warm evening and it was hot! But totally worth it for how great I felt in the dress. Very flattering in the stomach area and didn't have to wear spanx! My dress was a little big in the boobs, but I wore a push up strapless bra and that helped.

links_Review_Title: It was so easy to rent and arrived ahead of schedule.
links_Review_Text: It runs large up top....I was pulling it up a lot in fear that I may be giving a peep show lol the zipper was hard to zip up. It is a very heavy fabric. With those few cons I still enjoyed the dress!

links_Review_Title: It was a great dress, very flattering. It was, however, heavier than expected.
links_Review_Text: Does run large, especially in the cleavage area, but I’m rather small there.

The dress is heavy! Heavy layers which can make your body look a bit thicker than it is. I’m 135 5’3” and just had a baby 7 weeks prior to this event. I felt pretty in it and it held my larger boobs in place, skimmed around the tummy (even with the heavy layers) and the length was good for a shorter gal. It was a black tie wedding on the rooftop of a hotel and thankfully the dress was heavy so I didn’t feel cold. I’ve had prettier dresses off here but would still recommend!

links_Review_Title: Not my favorite rental but still pretty
links_Review_Text: This wasn't my best ever rental but I still felt beautiful in it! A few things to note: -The material is SUPER thick and it's hard to zip by yourself -The lining is awkwardly short -I have a pretty small chest (A/B) and didn't have to wear a bra which was nice -The asymmetrical hem was beautiful and unique -The ruffle in the front hides if you ate too much :) Overall not a showstopper but a pretty good rental.

Runs a little big so wore a size smaller than usual. The top ran a little big but I am really small up top. The detail made it a bit more dressy than a typical black dress. Material quality was great. Great complements all night!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a February wedding in Kentucky! Surprisingly, very warm.
links_Review_Text: I would typically wear a 6 but ordered a 4 since the dress is strapless & I wanted the waist to be snug. The dress was tight but since it was black, it still looked flattering. Probably could’ve gotten away with a 6 though. Loved the assymetrical hem—gave it a very unique, but dressy look. Overall loved the dress!

True to size, fairly long, I'm 5'9 and wore it with 4 inch heels, not exactly sure where this would hit on someone shorter. It fit well though, aside from the top, kept having to pull it up while dancing but probably wouldn't be an issue with someone with a larger bust. Overall would recommend, good in-between of a cocktail dress and long gown. The material was stretchy so it was easy to dance in, however it is THICK. Probably a better cold weather dress. Its strapless and I was still quite warm while dancing.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress for a winter event.
links_Review_Text: This dress was great! It's a very thick material so for winter events, it's perfect. The waist nips you in very nicely and ultimately went with the smaller size because it felt more secure on my bust. While I had more wiggle room in the 6, the top was more floppy, mostly because of the weight of the fabric. Felt sexy and classy all night.

This dress was perfect for our chilly and wet celebration. Worn to a black tie awards show. I was a bit disappointed in the beginning, due to some plastic pieces poking out. Luckily, my under garments protected me. Loved the heavy fabric and structure of the dress. Would rent again!
The dress was super heavy. Perhaps the 6R would have been more comfortable.

Loved this dress. It was actually my backup dress but I ended up liking it more than the original dress I rented! Not the most comfortable- there was a wire sticking out near the rib cage, i used bandaids to help prevent it stabbing me. Not a big deal, dress looked great and very flattering!

links_Review_Title: It was a great black formal dress for a New Year's Masquerade Ball.
links_Review_Text: It was a great fit but the dress itself is very heavy so I would suggest going a size down so it's tight and doesn't ride down all night.
Fit well! Make sure to have some help with the zipper over the seam between the skirt and the top. Super comfortable and forgiving

I ordered the 10R and 12R (I'm usually a 10) and the 10R was too big. It was loose at the top (I'm a 36B) so I had to find a way to keep it from falling - tied some elastic around the waist and covered with a silk ribbon. The 8R would've worked way better but I'm still happy with how it turned out. Also the thick fabric makes it great for a winter wedding. Wore a pashmina over it.
I loved this dress! It was true to size and other than having to pull it up a few times (understandable, it is strapless!) it was very comfy! I felt gorgeous and would totally rent again!

links_Review_Title: Held the dress up all night!
links_Review_Text: The dress is gorgeous but it ran large and I had a horrible time trying to get the dress to stay up. Every time I lifted my arm I felt like the top would slide right off. I'm a 36 B and I couldn't keep the top on right.

links_Review_Title: As a mom of 4 that doesn't get dolled up much, i felt like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: I loved the dress. My husband said I looked amazing & this service is something I can not wait to use again.
Runs a size large. Very comfortable.
The material was top quality allowing for a very snug fit with great agility. No tugging at boob area, which usually never fits me. I'd rent this dress again and again!

This dress is classy and complimentary but it wasn't my favorite. I wore the size 0 and it still was a little lose at the top. I have a small rib cage and need a strapless dress to be pretty snug. I think this dress is true to size but the fabric is stretchy and that's why I had a problem with it. I put fashion tape at the top to keep it in place but the fabric was so heavy that it kept pulling on it which made the tape uncomfortable. Also, the boning on the top was poking through on the inside of the dress. I put 2 bandaids over it and that did the trick! Overall, I like how I looked in the dress I just didn't like how I felt in it. I think it would be perfect if you have a fuller figure. I'm pretty straight and narrow.

My first time renting and I was very impressed by the service and the quality of the product. I usually wear 12/14 depending on the designer and I had to go with 14 for this dress. It covers any mid- section insecurities you may have. Got many compliments at my co-worker's graduation party that called for cocktail attire.

Dress was clean and classy looking for a formal wedding. Material is thicker and feels like it's high quality, but boning and zipper were stiff. The peplum detail was perfect for hiding an early pregnancy bump!
Loved this dress. Got lots of compliments. The fabric was great.

links_Review_Title: First Time Re ting was a success!Loved everything!
links_Review_Text: Dress is classic with a twist. A little heavy but once its on you it felt fine sized larger at top, but so am I, smaller chested women may need to size down. Fabric was thick enough to hide flaws.

links_Review_Title: Dancing the night away with my life
links_Review_Text: Soooo I'm 5'10 1/2 and I wear a size 4. I'm about 137 lbs so I'm small frame. My biggest concern was the length and the asymmetrical cut of the dress made it work. The only catch was that I'm a 34a. I didn't have a padded strapless soo although it fit snug, it wasn't my preferred snug. It was a ball and I didn't feel like wearing a floor length gown. Glad I chose this.
Perfect fit. Very comfortable. Fabric has some stretch to it.
This dress had angles in all the right places!! I received so many complements on the structure of this dress! Perfect for my company Christmas Party.

Fit very well, did not need to hold the dress up all night. A little boxy, but that might just be my body type. the fabric and make of the dress was very well done - the dress was a bit heavy but the material was great feeling.

links_Review_Title: Good quality, unique design, and comfortable
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a formal Christmas party. My best friend was jealous she didn't do the same and get a dress from RTR. I'm happy it came with 2 sizes. I normally wear a 4 but got a 2 just in case. The 2 fit perfectally. The only complaint was the boning on the left side of dress was poking out a little and stuck me in the side. Easy fix was 2 band aids over it and voila fixed. I danced in the dress from 730-11 with only a couple breaks for water. The dress never faltered. Thanks, RTR! I will rent again!!

links_Review_Title: Subtle Elegance! Perfect for Rehearsal Dinner. Dressy, comfortable, stretchy!(able to actually eat)
links_Review_Text: Slightly large in top, could see it being hard to dance in?? I wore my "thicker" strapless bra and was fine. Again I wore for rehearsal dinner so not too much movement. The cut and layers makes it super flattering to all body styles!

I rented this in the 6 and the 8 and the 6 fit wonderfully. I never had any fear of it slipping down and the fabric felt expensive. It was perfect for a black tie optional because it wasn't floor length but was still formal and structured. LOVED IT!

links_Review_Title: Easy process to rent and return!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit very well over my large chest which was a pleasant surprise. Longer on me because of my height but that was fine since it was a pretty formal affair. Material is very heavy so I did have to readjust the dress some throughout the night. Long straps inside for keeping it on the hanger so I used fashion tape to keep them down so they would not slip out during the event.

I wore this dress to a formal wedding at 18 weeks pregnant. It was amazing at hiding the belly. I am over 6 feet tall so I was concerned it would be an odd length, but it was actually great. My only complaint is that I am small busted and it kept on sliding down on the top.

links_Review_Title: Fit well and was very flattering
links_Review_Text: Hard to see the details in the photos, but I loved it!! It fit well and was flattering for my mom bod!
Amazing dress! Runs big though, normally wear a 6 and ended up wearing a 4.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful style that did not fit my upper body. 34" bust, 30" waist, 40" hips.
links_Review_Text: This dress was too big and oddly ribbed on top (I wear a 34C bra) but fit my 30" waist and 40" hips well.
LOVE
Loved the jumpsuit, the crotch hung wayyyy too low but with the cut of it, it did not seem to matter. Super comfy.

links_Review_Title: The color of this jumpsuit is great! It was so comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Definitely should have sizes down due to it fitting larger. It still worked great though. I am a heavier busted girl and it made my boobs not look gigantic!! Definitely a win!!

links_Review_Title: Loved The color and fit! Stretchy and comfy!
links_Review_Text: Good fit
Loved this option for a rehearsal dinner. It was casual enough but dressy at the same time. Loved the fit. It was unique and I got tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: A jumpsuit to make this wedding about you
links_Review_Text: Not only does this fit with the ease and comfort of pajamas, this jumpsuit makes you look and feel like a million bucks. I danced all night and ate a lot of tacos and still looked great in this sassy little number. Rent immediately.
This fit great! The straps were a little big, but they're adjustable, so it wasn't an issue. Very comfortable material too. Would rent again!

This was the perfect jumpsuit for a summer outdoor party! Not only is it super cute but it is also super comfortable! I ended up buying it because I knew I could wear it to many different events! It really is the perfect jumpsuit!

Very forgiving easy to throw on jumpsuit. I'm 5'7" around 130 lbs and the Small was perfect but still has room. There's no zipper it's an elastic waist so you just pull it on. I ended up buying it because I could see getting more use out of it.
Soooo comfy and cute! Just had to buy it after wearing it!
Love it and I will rent again!
This was so much fun to wear! I felt amazing and got tons of compliments. It was a bit long for me, but I'm short. Just wear some heels, it worked out fine.
Super comfy. Legs were long enough to wear heals and I'm 5"8!

This fit true to size and it is a fun bright pink color. I am 5'3 and was able to wear with flats. The only complaint is the material is a little thin but overall I loved it and will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Super cute and comfortable. Love the color!
links_Review_Text: Great jumpsuit. Fun color!

The color is beautiful. It really does pop. However, if it hugs any part of you, you will see it! You could see every wiggle in my big behind so I ended up not wearing it. I rated it highly because it really is beautiful, just not on me.

links_Review_Title: Great for a night of dancing!!
links_Review_Text: This was so comfortable and flattering. I purchased for a pink and red themed bachelorette party and danced the night away! The material was much nicer than I thought and felt silky and soft. I'm 5'10 and was able to sport heels!

links_Review_Title: Color and overall fit was excellent but too long!
links_Review_Text: If I owned this I would have it hemmed and it would be perfect. As a rental it was impossible to make it work. Sadly I did not wear this because of the lengthy. I am 5' 5 1/2". Maybe would have worked if I had heels to shoot me up 3 inches but I did not want to kill my feet in heels.
fit was great, nice and wide in the legs/hips. fit my pear shape well. material not very forgiving so a spanx was worn under to smooth everything out.

links_Review_Title: The stylist recommended an XLR so I went with it. And it was way too big.
links_Review_Text: Pretty color, but don't size up at stylist recommends.
n/a

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing this.
links_Review_Text: It was a bit see through.
This was a personal favorite. Glamorous but unique with the hi-lo aspect. Wore it to a Hollywood-themed gala. Does tend to bunch a little in the waist when sitting but didn't bother me

links_Review_Title: Dress was gorgeous. I felt like a diva and a princess all in one! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit true to size. It was a little snug in the chest, so if you want wiggle room right around your rib cage, it couldn't hurt to size up. The inner dress went just above my knee. The longer dress behind was a 1/2 inch too long, but with heels on, it was perfect. Even though the material is rather thick, I was comfortable, even dancing around. I plan on purchasing this dress for sure, even if it a formal/black tie dress!!

The dress was gorgeous! Unfortunately, neither size fit. Ended up buying a new dress last minute to wear to the gala. Size 0: The bust fit perfectly but I could not pull the dress over my hips and butt. I have a larger butt proportionally but the underskirt had no room to budge. Size 2: The bust was huge! Any movement caused my bra to show and there was extra fabric in the armpit. The underskirt fit a bit better but was still tight. It would ride up every few steps taken.

This dress is fantastic - rented it in black (no longer available) two years ago and the blue is even better. Lots of compliments although I would have preferred the 12. It was not available at the last minute and the 14 was a little big, especially on the top but still looked great. I hope to wear again. Oh, and the back up that RTR sent didn't work for me but my daughter liked it so much that she may rent it for her Freshman Formal.

links_Review_Title: The dress was absolutely stunning! I didn't want to return it lol. It's unique, and tailored.
links_Review_Text: This dress is magical and I didn't want to return it. The texture, metallic colors and style were spot on. The bust was too large for me and I rented a 6R (and wear a 34A, small shirt and 4/6 pants). Luckily, with the cut of the dress, I was able to use a couple of straight pins to make it work... and it was perfect! Length in the back was a bit long but that just added to the dramatic effect of the dress. I love it!!!!!

I was deciding between the 0 and 2 up until the very last second. Tried each on each day leading up to the event and while the 0 for me better, the 2 had more fabric and with it being winter I thought I would be more comfortable if I was able to cover up some. As you can see in the picture, it was big enough to hide the high/low aspect completely. If I had worn the 0 that would not have been the case. Positive aspects of the dress are the sturdy fabric and color. #oldhavana
Loved the metallic look of this dress and the fun long skirt. No stretch on this fabric, so a little showy if you have a tummy. Lots of compliments on this one!
This dress is a stunner! I received SO many compliments throughout the evening and felt so beautiful. The shimmer to the fabric is gorgeous. It was the perfect dress.

links_Review_Title: I absolutely loved this dress!! It was a showstopper in the sea of black dresses.
I felt comfortable, beautiful, classy and sexy.
links_Review_Text: It's a bit tough to get the zipper up if you fill out the top. But it was excellent for a February event in California where it's not warm and it's not cold. I'd purchase this dress if I could.
Ordered dress for a black-tie event. Super cute and received lots of compliments. Fabric has a nice weight to it- perfect for chillier weather. Dress definitely ran small, glad I got a backup size.

links_Review_Title: This dress is amazing- makes you feel like a celebrity!
links_Review_Text: Dress has a structured fit and runs a bit small (generally wear a 2). The deep blue color and the muted sparkle is so unique and I received many, many compliments on this dress all night long. Was my favorite of all the dresses I have rented so far! Would absolutely wear again given a different setting with different crowd!

This dress was AMAZING! There really is no give in the top, so pay attention to the sizing. I am 5'1", 115lb, 32C and the 2R was a great option, albeit long. I had to be a bit careful with the train, but it was great for a winter party as the longer skirt acted like a blanket in the car and kept my legs warm. I felt fabulous! Only wish is that it had pockets (the style def could have accommodated it) but loved it overall!!

links_Review_Title: Stand out in a sea of black dresses
links_Review_Text: If you want a dress that shows off your legs and arms than this is your dress! I'm 5'9" and the top of the dress high right at my natural waist (which I have issues with at times). Rented a Long which was a little too long with 3" heels it just made it more dramatic but had the issue of people stepping on it occasionally. The shorter skirt did bubble in the midsection which looked unflattering so I had to constantly pull it down.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress for a black tie event!
links_Review_Text: I have a larger rib cage so I needed to go with the bigger size but it fit well. I got tons of compliments and I felt beautiful. The bottom is so unique and a real show stopper. I had on 4 inch heels and the dress didn't drag.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, runs a tad long
links_Review_Text: Wore the 6R, I am 5'3" and wore 3" heels - I figured the Reg length would be fine but it was long in the back. My husband stepped on my dress a few times. But overall, great dress!! Felt really good in it and got plenty of compliments.

My daughters named it the "Elsa" dress. The short skirt and long train back was very elegant. It's truly a beautiful fit! People told me all night how beautiful the dress was and people commented on pictures post wedding on it too. This was for a winter wedding and highly recommend.

Dress was gorgeous but they didn't have my size so I ordered the larger size and it was a bit too big. I wore my original pick. I felt this dress accentuated my hip size more than I would like. My measurements 41-33-41

links_Review_Title: It was perfect, got tons of complements
links_Review_Text: Fit me great, the only thing was I am 5’2”and the train was a bit long

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress. Received tons of compliments and was the right combination of fun and formal.
links_Review_Text: I ordered the 6 first and it was too snug in the hips so the 8 gave me just enough room to be comfortable sitting and dancing. Fit great everywhere else and got tons of compliments

This dress is gorgeous. Literally was told over and over how stunning it was. I wore 3" heels and am 5'7...there was still a small "train" that trailed behind. (A couple of times it was stepped on.) I typically am a size 6 in gowns & this was a little snug, so went with the size 8. The skirt is straight and rode up a little. I wore a strapless bra but did not feel spanx were necessary. If I had an occasion to wear this dress again, I would in a heartbeat!

This was my first time using RTR- I had a great experience from start to finish! The dress was gorgeous- I had nothing but compliments all night! It was a substantial material and fit beautifully in all the right places. I am 5'8 and wore 4+ inch heels and did not need the longer length. I am so glad I chose this gown!

links_Review_Title: I got SOOOOO many compliments on this dress! I truly felt like I was on the red carpet!
links_Review_Text: It fit well through the bust (I wear a 34DDD). The waist ran small, but I was able to make it work with help from a corset. The fabric had a good weight to it and it looked gorgeous flowing out behind me as I walked. 100% would recommend!

This dress runs small, I'm a size 10 in jeans and a M in tops. I ordered a size 14 because the original dress I ordered for this event in a size 10 and 12 fit everywhere but the bust! I am a size 34G bust but everything on this dress fit perfect and the bust area was a little big (if it was my own dress I would of had it altered). Either way the 14 fit and looked fab! Felt like a million bucks! The only con is the material is heavy consorted to others dresses but worth it!!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a NYC Gala & it was stunning.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress perfect for a NYC Gala. Fit was great and received tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a holiday winter party
links_Review_Text: Great dress, definitely a little longer due to my high (5'3) Wore 4 inch heels which helped. The the chest area was a loose so I used tape. Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for a semi-formal Christmas party. I felt so glamorous in it!! Absolutely loved i!
links_Review_Text: I am 5’3, 130 lbs with more of an athletic build and curvy hips. I usually wear a size 4 but wore the size 6 because it had a little more room in the hip area which I thought I might need for dancing. The skirt is definitely a straight skirt so if you are curvy, I would definitely size up. The dress is absolutely beautiful, and I got so many compliments on it. I would definitely rent it again.

I broke my leg and use a knee scooter. This didn't stop me from going to the ballet, tho. This dress worked well with my HC needs and was probably the best thing I could have worn given the circumstances. My one complaint is that the dress has ZERO stretch which doesn't make it very curve-friendly. I ended up wearing my backup size & it was still incredibly tight on my thighs, while very loose on top. I ended up pinning it to my bra to avoid gaps. A very elegant dress sure to win compliments.

I wore the 10R. I'm 5'2, 150lbs, 38C. The hem around the waist was a big snug but wearable. The rest of the dress fit beautifully and I received so many compliments all night from strangers on the color and style of the dress. This one is a show stopper! I felt like a queen in it!
I received so many compliments on this dress. It was not only gorgeous, it fit like a glove. I'm normally a 4 and this fit perfectly.
Felt amazing in this dress all night. I didn't want to take it off. Absolutely beautiful!!!

links_Review_Title: Masquerade ball success with lots of compliments!
Beautiful, good quality dress, but too long!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a black tie charity gala. I was so excited when I received it because of the quality. I ended up wearing it because the backup dress was cheap looking and came wrinkled. Unfortunately, even with three inch heals the back was so long it was like it had a train. The back of my dress was stepped on no less than 5 times at the event. Thankfully the front was short and was easy to walk in. I'm 5'7", 128 lbs and 32E. I would not recommend the long unless you're over 5'8".

This dress was stunning! Got it as a back up for a wedding and didn't end up wearing it, but so flattering! Material is heavy and sturdy. Train was a little long since petite was not available at the time, so I was worried people might step on it. Would definitely recommend for a formal event!

The dress is unique and the color is wonderful! I wear a size 6-8 and 8 was unavailable for backup so I wore the 6, although it was snug. I was worried I'd be uncomfortable, but it worked out way better than I thought, and I felt beautiful in it! Hope this helps someone else!
I received so many compliments on this dress when I wore it to a black tie charity event. So worth it!

This dress is amazing! I never got so many compliments. I wore it to a formal wedding. It is super comfortable even though the fabric is a bit thick. I love the asymmetrical skirt, which made it feel somewhere between a cocktail dress & a ballgown.

links_Review_Title: Thick and opulent. No spanx needed- very forgiving in tummy. Zipper sticks, you need help to zip.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'2 and this dragged but the cut made it look like a train and it didn't get in my way at all. I was able to dance without picking it up or messing with it. Fabric is thick I didn't even need nipple covers! I was worried about the cut looking funny around my knees but it worked great.

links_Review_Title: Wore for a nice dinner for my anniversary. Runs small so size up.
links_Review_Text: Runs small in the chest and waist so size up. The 2 was too small in the waist but the 4 was a little large in the chest. Beautiful blue fabric and love the shirt front but king back. Very comfortable to wear out.
I loved this dress! Very comfortable and flattering. The top of the dress stretched out as the night went on. I had to secure it with some fashion tape. Overall I would rent this again!
Fit true to size, bust was a little stretchier towards the end of the day and fell a lot but would’ve been fine with tape

I rented this dress for my baby shower and it was perfect! It fit very well around my stomach even though it's crazy huge, it was a little loose around my arms but not in a noticeable way. The fact that it fit my enormous pregnant stomach was good enough for me. Everyone loved the dress and I felt beautiful in it. The quality is really great too. Definitely recommend!
Great dress for a formal event. Definitely recommend it
True to size, the top part can slide so need to watch out for that. Otherwise, it's a very pretty and classy dress. I love the classy bubble pink. Very ladylike.
I'm 7.5 months pregnant and wore this to my baby shower! It was perfect and held me in perfectly. I had so many compliments!
I'm 5'3". My weight now at 7.5 months pregnant is 135 and my chest is about a 34D. It was a bit large up top but fit great over the hips and belly. I wore the 6R.
After reading reviews i went down two sizes. I wanted it to fit nice and snug. The dress is pure perfection and i see my self renting again !

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a formal, outdoor wedding. It is snug, but stretchy making moving easy.
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit of this dress. It is form fitting, but not restrictive. I personally loved the length, but someone with a more petite frame may find it a little long.
This dress has lots of stretch, so it fit like a glove. I'm normally a US 8 and the UK 12 fit perfectly.
Rented this gem for my baby shower and holy smokes got a lot of compliments! Extremely comfy. Could've definitely worn a smaller size even at 35 weeks pregnant.

Wore this for a family baby shower to celebrate our baby girl and was so happy with it. Fit my baby bump perfectly. A couple of small issues - it's a little tricky to get on and I needed help, the material is thick for a hot day or if you'll be spending time outside, it was a little longer than I would have liked (I'm 5'1") and I had to constantly adjust the top as the sleeves didn't want to stay put - probably something tape could have fixed. Overall, I got so many compliments and felt wonderful in it!

This is a beautiful dress but I did not feel beautiful in it. If you have any tiny bit of fat on your stomach, this dress with accentuate that and it's all you can think about. I did not wear this dress bc my boyfriend and I joked about being able to see my bellybutton.
Gorgeous dress but runs big in the chest. Was sliding off of me. Wore this for church, but wouldn't wear this to dance in. Got a lot of compliments still!

links_Review_Title: this dress is SO beautiful on. Stretchy, forgiving material. So comfortable and flattering.
links_Review_Text: Definitely on the longer side. I am 5'6 and it went down to my calves. I don't mind, it was a cute tight midi. If I were any shorter it may have looked weird. Fabric is ribbed so it is really forgiving and flattering on. Easy to sit down/ dance. Love this dress.

I am 5'4, 125lbs, usual size 4-6 in dresses. Lovely pink color. I ordered and wore the 10R. I also ordered the next size up. The 10 R was snug, but had a lot of give in it. Material is kind of heavy, but I think that's what made it fit so nice. The 12R has more room in the body (not as snug) but it was way longer (ankles) and the upper part was very loose. (Would not stay up ) Can be a little hard to walk in because it's kind of tight at the bottom but not enough to bother you . Fine to dance in. Overall I would definitely recommend this dress. Received many compliments. Wish it was mine! I would rent it again .

This dress was perfect for a summer wedding. I absolutely loved this color and length of this dress. I wore a size 6 and it fit like a glove. This dress runs pretty true to size. The material was stretchy and comfy, it hugs your body very nicely. The one complaint I have was the top started to give a little with all the dancing and picture taking. It was annoying to have to readjust every couple of minutes. Overall, I really liked this dress.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress for a formal occasion
links_Review_Text: This is a really nice dress that hugs the body! I rented it for a wedding, but ended up going with something more fun. This dress had a more serious tone to it. Spanx are a must! Well, they would've been for me (not worn in this photo).

I loved this dress! It was the perfect dress for my baby shower. It is stretchy and comfortable. I normally wear a 4, but being that I'm 30 weeks pregnant, I went with the size 6. It fit great and I got a ton of compliments!

I rented this dress at 32 weeks pregnant for a friend's wedding and it was perfect. The material is thick and high quality, but very stretchy and comfortable to accommodate the bump. For reference, I'm normally a size 4 but had gained about 15 pregnancy lbs by the time I wore the dress - the 8R was a perfect fit.
Comfy stretchy dress for a spring wedding in Nola - super comfy. This was my backup dress and I liked it more.

Beautiful and conservative but with some va-va-voom! I'm very curvy and felt comfortable showing them off without looking too inappropriate. I saw a lot of pregnant ladies wearing so o knows it was going to be stretchy. It's actually stretchy enough to walk up stairs, dance, etc with a little hike above the knees. Cons- heavy material (if you sweat easily, I wouldn't wear to anything outdoors in the summer! Must hike up to get any kind of gait in you walk. (For real you'll be walking like Betty Boop if you don't hike it up a little while walking.) All-in-all, is rent again. It was beautiful!
Classy, elegant and sexy. This dress is not for the faint of heart. It's very form fitting but the fabric is quite forgiving. Got a ton of compliments all night!
Great dress. The cut shows off all of your curves without being overtly sexy due to the midi length and color.

I wore this dress to a wedding. The pink was a great alternative to my usual boring black dresses. The dress is very stretchy and super comfortable! The shoulders/top stayed in place all night. I felt great in it!

Fit is tight through the body but ended up wearing the smaller size because the top definitely tended to fall down a bit and needed it as snug as possible. I loved the dress but was definitely sucking in all night and as shape wear is not an option due to how tight it is.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for my baby shower and loved it!
links_Review_Text: The dress runs a little on the larger size, I rented the 10R and 12R and I wore the 10R but wish I had the 8R as a backup! I usually wear a 4 in dresses but I was 31 weeks when I rented this dress. Loved the material and color of this dress and would recommend! I am 5’4 for reference and wore a medium heel.

links_Review_Title: For like a glove. Love the color
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove. I'm usually in between dress sizes and chose to size down due to the fabric. Many compliments can be dressed up for a formal wedding or down for a more casual event! The only downside was the sleeves coming up past the shoulders but that was also due to dancing. 9/10 would definitely recommend!

The dress fit great! I'm usually and 8 or 10, and the 12R fit perfect. The dress is super comfortable and great for a formal event. The pink is perfect, not too bright and obnoxious and not too pale. Perfect for spring/summer!

I rented this dress for a Bridal Shower and RTR came through again! The whole dress is stretchy, so it just slips on and stretches where it needs too. My back up was a 14, but I went with a 12 bc the top would have been too large. I went up 2 sizes. I'm 28 weeks here. The dress is also long (mid-calf) so it can be worn for more formal events. Comfy, girly, and flattering.
Everyone LOVED this dress! It has some give to it, but held tight and was very flattering ...and I felt like a million bucks!
Loved the material! Super comfortable and easy to move in. Glad I got a smaller size for the backup dress, seemed to run large. Many compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: It’s a comfortable, flattering cut and a lovely pink.
links_Review_Text: Lovely dress. Comfortable, made me look great, really stood out amidst all the little black dresses. I got a TON of compliments all night. It does run large - I wore a 6 not my usual 8. And it also runs long - it hit me below mid-shin, and I’m TALL (6’). I wore with 4” heels so I was 6’4” and felt like a million bucks.
Loved the pink shade! Perfect for a spring/summer formal event, wedding etc. Received many compliments on this dress-was sad to send it back!! Runs big-size down 1-2 sizes. Highly recommend.
I loved this dress. It was great for a work awards function. It fit so well and was very comfortable. I styled it with nude heels and a sparkly clutch.

links_Review_Title: Very flattering to a curvy figure!
links_Review_Text: I wish I had gotten a smaller size but it still fit very well! I got compliments all night and loved how it came out in pictures. Very happy with my purchase!
Wore to see the Nutcracker with a friend - and received tons of compliments. Loved how it fit without needing constant readjustment, and the length was exactly what I wanted.

This dress was amazing. Got a lot of comments. The dress is a very fitted dress with heavy fabric but it fits pretty true to size. Normally in tighter dresses, I wear the 6 because I've gained some weight in my hips and butt but the 6 was a little too big so I went with the 4. I do wish it was a little short and fell mid-calf but everything elese was great.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful bump at my Baby Shower
links_Review_Text: This fit perfect at 33 weeks pregnant! The material is super stretchy and comfortable! Everyone raved about this dress. I was hesitant with the length since it hit a weird spot but it still worked! I'm normally a size 6 dress and gained about 15lbs this pregnancy (so around 158) - would def recommend it!
Fit me great and was very comfortable. Very nice quality and has pockets!

links_Review_Title: Love the pockets and the embroidery
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 2 and I read all the reviews and sized up, the 8 fit perfectly. It's a heavy fabric so definitely meant for Fall/Winter. Very fun shift dress.

links_Review_Title: Great dress that easily converts from work to dinner.
links_Review_Text: Great dress that easily converts from work to dinner. I wore it to both but styled it differently. For the daytime I paired it with booties and detachable white collar (see the picture), and I wore it with beautiful high heels and statement earrings to dinner. For more styling tips follow ma @kasia_michaels
This dress was way too small. I would recommend taking at least one size up if not two
Loved the embroidery, clinching on sleeves, pockets, and overall class. Tight in shoulders. Fabric has no stretch. Otherwise true to size. Perfect for fall/winter.
Worked for conservative office but pockets were below/at my hips
This VB dress strikes me as something she would wear. Nice material, good fit, but I didn't love the cinching on the arms. Liked the embroidery.

links_Review_Title: Runs small. Too short for me
links_Review_Text: Too short and too small in the arms.
Beautiful fit, simple & chic!
The stitching is very gold- a bit dressier than I expected but I liked it anyway
Fabric is very thick and perfect for winter wear. I'm busty so I could not wear it as is. I wore it with a belt and it was very cute!
Beautiful high quality comfy cosy I didn't realise how short it was until I sat down

Rented with my unlimited for an afternoon party. Following other reviewers I went up a size because of the shoulders and arms. I do have athletic arms and going up a size was a must. It barely worked as it is. The embroidery is super cute and the dress (with pockets!!) was comfortable to wear all day. It felt a little like a Zara dress so I wouldn't rent again, but was fun to wear one time.

links_Review_Title: Not even sure whether it runs small or large??
links_Review_Text: The dress is beautiful. The material and design is gorgeous. But it does not fit right. The top half is huge, the sleeves are super tight, and the bottom half is small and makes the top half bunch up even more.

links_Review_Title: The fabric was very heavy and not flattering
links_Review_Text: One size down might have been better but the fabric was very thick. Not great for warm weather.

links_Review_Title: Great detail & ruched sleeves were nice - but a bit long
links_Review_Text: Bust area runs small. Right they armpit area. But great dress

winner! great fabric, perfect fit, love the gold details, and the sleeves have a neat ruching detail. hubby loved the dress on me, too. demure/sexy. FYI it was shorter on me (5'7) than it looks in the photos: if i raised my arms, i would put on a show, so i wore it over jeans, and it looked fab. comfy, too!

links_Review_Title: I didn't get to wear :(. I love the Palm leaf design & sleeve detail, perfect amount of sass.
links_Review_Text: Great fit. The dress has a sleeve that is meant to be scrunched up.

The fabric was heavier than I expected and was fully lined. It's way too hot here right now for that dress, but would rent it in a heartbeat for winter/fall. I would definitely lean toward a larger size, it was super tight across the chest and shoulders for me.
Didn't fit me well. Didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Good look but size doesn't work for me
links_Review_Text: I am usually a size 4 or 6, I rent a size 8 and still felt really tight at the chest area. The sleeves are long but the dress is short. The combination really didn't work out for me.

links_Review_Title: Stylish shift Dress with feather embroidery
links_Review_Text: I wore the size 8 and I'm usually between a size 2 and 4. I liked that the embroidery was not too much in person. It was pretty short but not an issue with tights. It was comfortable. A bit tight in arms and hips but not a big deal.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but fit of the top not great.
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a size 6/8 but reading the reviews led me to size up. Chest area was quite narrow (I'm a 34D). Sleeves were also a bit tight - this was tied to the narrow chest area.
I usually wear a six and sized up to a 10 based on reviews, fit great, and I probably could have worn a 12 for looser fit. Perfect cocktail/Party dress. Loved the pockets.

Rented this for work but could have also been a cute option for cocktail party/night out. Very easy to wear shirt dress, with pockets. There was a lot of fabric in the pocket area (between the pockets and the liner), which I could see being a bit bulky if you're more curvy in the hips/butt.

links_Review_Title: Slightly odd fit, but beautiful embroidery
links_Review_Text: The cinching on the sleeve was a little weird, and it was tight across the shoulders while too loose everywhere else - but the material and the embroidery were so gorgeous I didn't care. Honestly probably would have returned without wearing but for the embroidery, which was so beautiful I wanted to show it off even if the rest of the dress looked kinda silly on me...

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress! You won't be disappointed..
links_Review_Text: This dress has been on my list. It is a beautiful dress with so much detail that my picture doesn't do it justice. I am in search of the perfect dress for my upcoming trip to Paris. I rent and send back until I find the one. This dress is a contender. Try this dress, you won't be disappointed.
Loved this dress. Beautiful lace detail and very comfortable! No itchy material and you can move around comfortably in it. I wore it to Thanksgiving dinner and then to work.

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress for a Christmas party and got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. It’s true to size but a little snug in the hips. The back is also open which is beautiful but I brought the wrong bra to my event.

links_Review_Title: comfortable and feel good black maxi
links_Review_Text: I could picture this dress being worn to a wedding but also a dress you can wear to a get together. I dressed this one up with long pearl necklace. It was a great length and the material was pretty flowy. I'm apprehensive when I see a lace detailed dress because my first thought is that it would be restricting, but this dress wasn't that at all.

This dress is absolutely beautiful, but it is difficult to wear if you are at all curvy. The slip was so short on me that it did not even fully cover my butt, so I unfortunately could not wear. I do think sizing up could have potentially helped this, but the rest of the dress might have been too oversized.
Careful if wear for work - slits on sides so did very opaque tights and felt I could get away with it.

links_Review_Title: The details really made the dress!
links_Review_Text: The lace was beautiful

links_Review_Title: beautiful dress and the lace detailing is subtle, yet eye catching. received compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: I wear a 4-6 (definitely on the small side of a 4 right now) and the small fit. I would not recommend this dress for anyone shorter than 5'7" (I'm 5'7.5") and it was definitely tea length. Highly recommend this dress.
this dress is ladylike without being overly so -- I want to own it! SO flattering! I wore a slip bc of the exposed back, and happy I did bc the built-in slip may have been too short for me.

links_Review_Title: Runs small but also looked matronly
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear it. I'd size up if you have hips -- it tugged a bit in that area. Also looked a little matronly on a petite figure.

I rented this for Thanksgiving so I wouldn't get overheated in the kitchen! It was a stunning dress with beautiful details and was made very well. It's definitely a bit low cut depending on how you're sitting. I was definitely considering buying it and I maybe will in the future.

links_Review_Title: Way too large to be flattering
links_Review_Text: The print of this dress was pretty but it just had so much material everywhere. The length was actually fine on me at 4'11 because the waist still sat at my waist but it meant there was so much excess around the bust. Wouldn't rent again but it served me alright on a Saturday out at guide dog training!
Beautiful dress. It is very full so I'd size down if you can.
Can be dressed up or down. It's comfortable but has some structure/fit to it. An all-around great dress.

Got this dress for a work event while at the beginning of my second trimester. I wore one size up (M) and the high waist fit around my expanded belly and the flowing top and bottom made for a comfortable fit.
Loved this dress - didn't want to return it
Love this dress. It is very comfortable and cute. I got a lot of compliments on it and would rent again. I wore it for a special casual dinner and Thanksgiving

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous and comfy dress. Soft & flattering. Deep V unless you button top but I liked it this way.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful and comfortable. Nice fit and flows feeling. Good color for in between seasons. Romantic and feminine.
I liked the dress but it isn't really stunning. The pattern is very pretty up close but gets lost as you back away. The cut was nice. It was a nice quality.
On trend. I wore with adidas so it wouldn't look too 'Little House on the Prairie'. Cute print. Pretty sleeves. A little snug around waist, but I often have to size up if fitted waist.

This fit nicely surprisingly - although it was a little snug at the waist. It's the type of dress I wouldn't eat anything while wearing since it wasn't my exact size but I was able to make it work! The design is beautiful so I would definitely recommend

links_Review_Title: I need a reason to wear this again and again
