links_Review_Text: Maybe it's the romantic/vintage vibe of this, or the sweet ruffles and fabric... whatever it is, I want more reasons to wear this! It's so comfortable and cute! The dress is very true to size with absolutely no stretch. That's especially true at the waist and surprisingly in the bust area. (For reference - I'm typically a 12/38D/5'7") I can see his being a nice fall transition piece, as the black background makes the dress feel a touch less summery/more formal. You could absolutely dress this up, or wear flats for a more casual vibe. Would be great for travel, as the fabric doesn't wrinkle.
Got so many compliments. So comfy and flow!
I wore this dress to an event at work and it was a perfect color/style for that transition between summer and fall. Medium fit very true to size.

links_Review_Title: I felt so trendy in this dress. I kept it and sent my other pieces back for two cycles. So pretty!!
links_Review_Text: Great fit! Light weight for the summer. Wonderful way to try out a trendy prairie dress.
I had a hard time getting it on. The opening was too small for my head and shoulders, then, overall , the dress was much too fit. Not a flattering look.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for an elevated day at the office
links_Review_Text: Great length and print. Loved the fit around my waist; I'm smaller on top and hippy. Would wear again!

Didn't have high expectations for this, but it was a huge hit. Beautiful fabric, easy to wear, and went from a client meeting to date night to casual Saturday. I'm 5'7" and was surprised at how long it was - nearly to my ankles. It looked great, but a warning to the shorter gals out there.
Large in he bust for me, I'm a b.

links_Review_Title: Dress fits great and is very comfortable and a great option for work!
links_Review_Text: Flowy at the top and bottom, but fitted around the waist.
It was cute. A bit big but not too big to wear. Cute for work.
So so small at the waist, I stretch
I have very narrow shoulders & this dress made my shoulders look very wide.
cuts in nicely at the waist.
I'm 5 foot 3, 110lbs and the XS was still a little long (closer to ankles) but fit well in the arms and chest. I got compliments on this dress and would rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress for a daytime lunch or event
links_Review_Text: Very flattering and would also look great with a wrap belt. Lots of compliments on this one.
The dress is pretty and flowy but the top was too big for my smaller frame and didn't sit right.
Really enjoyed this rental - true to size and could be dressed up or down for work or everyday. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a winter wedding dinner - it was perfect!
links_Review_Text: Runs a little large, but because of the loose fit it worked great. The sleeve detail is so cute and the detail on the waist makes it very flattering. Would HIGHLY recommend this dress!

Fit perfectly and lays nicely. I have worn those to all different occasions. You can dress up or down. It's a nice dress because it's not as long as a maxi- so not tripping over it- but with booties you don't show much skin it can pair with leggings. I had this dress for awhile and then ended up buying it.

What a playful dress! I wore this to both a holiday party & to work. Paired it with cognac knee high boots & a brown suede jacket for a modern prairie look. Wish I wouldn't taken photos of this- so much fun to wear.
Very well made dress! The detail on it was beautiful. I rented it for Thanksgiving and it fit well, but the top was too long for someone my height.
A bit boxy and shapeless despite the waist. Think it would look better on someone skinny and tall versus apple/pear shaped.
Nice weight and good quality
too tight to zip up.

The prairie trend is not really my thing - I lived it once already, and I think it can look like obnoxious hipster sisterwives cosplay. But wow, I *loved* this dress. It was very cool looking - not costumey or twee at all. And it was so flattering. It added six inches to my height and took off twenty pounds. Just gorgeous. I freaking adored it. If my cash situation were better, I would have bought it.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! So comfortable - received lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Takes you into fall - layered and with booties. Super cute!
Pretty and feminine but did remind me of little house on the prairie.

links_Review_Title: Great dress- a lot of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress to transition from summer to fall. Many compliments and so easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a day in NYC!
links_Review_Text: Fit super well and length was great for a shorter girl my height 5'4. Paired really well with sneakers for a cute day look!
Super comfortable but thicker material.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous pattern with a hint of sparkle and unforgettable sleeves
links_Review_Text: I am absolutely obsessed with this adorable dress. I have worn it to work with heels, to a 8 year old's Princess themed birthday party, and to date night. It is easy to wear, comfortable, and elegant. Love it with a statement headband.
Wow! I had so much fun in this number. Everyone loved that I paired it with sparkly socks and heels. Long enough for church, but still sassy. Can't wait to rent again!

I rented this dress for a holiday work party. The fabric is lovely and shimmery. I normally love shift dresses but this ones neck was too high and for strange in the midsection. Arms were slightly tight- which is a frequent problem for me.

The fit was very similar to previous reviews. I received compliments all night! Everyone loved the style, especially the fabric and the fun sleeves! This would be a great option for a holiday party or anything that you need something a little fancier but not floor length.

links_Review_Title: Dress is vibrant, comfortable and dressy without being too much.
links_Review_Text: Fits comfortably and pockets! So nice to have but as others have pointed out, they do make the tummy poof out a bit.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a banquet, paired with black accessories. Very comfortable and true to size.
links_Review_Text: Pros: length hit mid thigh, would rent a similar dress like this. It was fun to wear. Cons: with the sleeves being puffy, I wasn't able to wear a jacket. However, the dress kept me warm enough I didn't need one.
Hands down most adorable dress ever. Very comfortable and several compliments.

I loved this dress! It fit me well other than on the hips where the pockets were. It make the dress seem more boxy. I added a silk sash to add more shape back into the dress and no longer dealt with the boxy issue. Super great to rent!
The photo doesn't show it well but this dress has quite a bit of metallic. It runs a little on the large side. The pockets and sleeves make the dress!
Just a fun, easy to wear dress. Very structured, which I love. Not too boxy and it isn't shapeless despite being straight cut. Thick material. Gold threading which doesn't show in the pictures well.

I wore this dress to a business Christmas party held during the late afternoon on a Sunday. It was perfect and I received several compliments. I would agree that it is a somewhat boxy fit & the pockets do gap a bit, but not enough to change my favorable opinion of this dress. I'm 5'2" and the length was ideal. I felt good wearing this dress!

links_Review_Title: I wore this the day after Thanksgiving after eating my weight in pumpkin pie. Very forgiving shape!
links_Review_Text: Fun and festive for a holiday party! Love the hint of sparkle and sleeves!
It was comfortable and loved the pockets. The fabric was heavy and the liner made it easy to wear.
I wore the dress to a cocktail reception for my company. It was fun and feminine. With just the right amount of ease. Love a dress with pockets.
Added a skirt to give it some shape loved the pattern
Great dress for bridal shower host in the colder months. Wasn't great for pictures since it has a baggier look but lots of compliments. Much prettier in person and has pockets which is a plus!
Special and professional all at the same time. Loved it!

I wore this for the daytime portion of a wedding ceremony at a Sikh temple. We had to be covered up (head covered inside the temple too). It worked perfectly with leggings underneath, in lieu of buying a tradtional Indian outfit. The material is thick and shimmery.
The dress was beautiful! It fit well and was very comfortable. The bell sleeves grabbed onto a chair once in a while but no big deal.

I ended up liking this dress much more than I thought I would. Fabric is thick and sparkly, was fun for a chilly Christmas Eve. Yes, it is a shift dress and as such isn't the most flattering. However, it was comfy and cute and I would recommend.

The print and fabric were more beautiful in person. The pockets hit at the hips, so while i loved the pockets, that is a tricky spot for extra fabric. I am wearing this for dinner and a NYE party. Its -8 degrees, so I paired it with black leggings and black ankle boots. The dress is so eye catching, no one noticed the bottom anyway.

I rented this dress in my RTR Update and wore it to a friends birthday dinner. I received quite a few compliments! I paired it with black opaque stockings and black wedges. I will say it is quite short I could not pull it off without stockings. It's super cute on and loved that it had pockets and the bell sleeves. My only con was it seems bunchy at the hem but no one seemed to notice but me! Its fun and flirty and def a great dress to try!

links_Review_Title: Pretty fabric, but thick and boxy.
links_Review_Text: Pretty fabric. Thick and boxy though. Made me feel wide. Amd sleeves a bit too bulky to wear under a winter coat, so I went with another dress for my occasion.

This was one of those dresses that were hard to send back! The pattern, colors, and texture was beautiful. This those run large as the XS was roomy on me (I usually wear Smalls). I wasn't a fan of the pockets on this shift dress as it created some bulkiness around the hips. Great piece! Will rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Slight shimmer makes you stand out
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress, but it's all about ANGLES
links_Review_Text: In a few photos, I definitely looked pregnant. The thicker material made it a bit less flattering than other shift silhouettes (bunchy), but the color and shimmer made up for it! A fun piece for a work holiday party!
Loved the material and the idea of this dress. Beautiful pattern and color. Dress ran large. Pockets made dress look even larger. I had to pull the dress in the back for pictures..

This dress was perfect for a fall wedding on an unexpectedly chilly Charleston day. Material was thick and kept me warm. Pattern and sparkle tread detail made the dress more fun and festive for this formal garden party. I️ didn't find that the dress ran large, and the pockets did stick out a bit but I️ put my phone in my pocket to count my dance steps and that helped! Lots of compliments.

Dress fit great! I am glad that I opted for the large. Wasn't as 'big' and flowy as I thought it'd be but I liked that. It was a cold day but the lining in this dress was thick and worked out well. I got so many compliments so I would definitely recommend.
Really cute and comfortable loved the pockets!

LOVED this dress. It was a cool fall day, and the sleeves and lining made it surprisingly warm. The fit was really good - a little tighter at the shoulders but the medium seemed a little too big. I'm also about 5'2 so the length was perfect. The dress is really beautiful in person - has a very elegant sheen to it. I felt comfortable the whole night and got complimented! Would rent again for sure!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for my birthday/halloween. I was going for a 60's themed look and it was great!
links_Review_Text: Fit is true to size, but with all shift dresses -if you are hippy be prepared for that, so a little less room there. It was super comfortable, I LOVED the sleeves and the patterns was nice. The pockets do stick out alittle bit, I found if I pushed the pockets backwards it flattened the sides. Overall a great pick!! Everyone loved it and it had that 60's flare with the sleeves!
Thick and shimmery. Nice colors and sleeves. Pockets may pop out a little at hips but not a huge deal.

links_Review_Title: First bummer with RTR but still cute!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a cocktail party in the fall. I wanted to love the dress but it just was not a good fit for me, the pockets add unnecessary width to the dress and are really low so overall are unflattering. It also ran large, so if you're smaller than I am I would not recommend renting because I went with the XS. The pattern was cute though and received lots of compliments. It does not have any stretch so if you're planning on dancing it would probably not be the best choice
This dress is so cute with a nice heavy fabric and a fun sparkle. I got so many compliments!
Absolute showstopper. Pockets are not super flattering for those with wide hips but what a gorgeous dress!! So many compliments. Perfect for fall winter Valentine's Day etc

This dress was way prettier than I even expected! The print and the fabric make it look very expensive and high quality. It was really comfortable and very fashionable. Perfect for Fall! At 5'5", it was longer on me than on the model and overall, it was a little loose. I'd probably try on the Medium next time I rent this. There is no stretch in this fabric, so if you're in between sizes I'd go for the larger of the two just in case.

Really loved the style and puff sleeve. It was very flattering. I wish I had sized down as it was slightly on the large size. I usually wear a 4. I wore it with black tights and suede knee high heeled boots.
Love the fabric. Shimmer in s a nice pop over the pink. Bell sleeves are great. Tons of compliments. Great winter dress!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Palm Springs photoshoot!
links_Review_Text: Ruffles were a bit long on this dress and the left front ruffle was torn (4 stars). However, with a few strategic pins, this was worth it! I ended up pinning up almost 4 inches of the ruffles on both sides on the back to bring it up a bit and had to pinned the torn ruffle together. I loved the flow and shape of the dress. It highlighted what I felt comfortable with regarding my body and camouflaged what I was uncomfortable with. It was perfect for a photoshoot with girlfriends in Palm Springs!

links_Review_Title: Was a show stopper at this beachside wedding!
links_Review_Text: So comfortable, and the color is amazing on dark brown skin tones. It's not very form-fitting, but I liked that aspect so that I could eat what I wanted for the night :)

Wore this to my boss' 60th birthday party. It was a Havana nights theme so this dress was perfect. It held up well in the Miami heat and had great movement when dancing. Love the flutter sleeve and bottom. The length was perfect! 10/10

links_Review_Title: Such a fun and flirty dress!!
links_Review_Text: This is the first time I’ve rented from RTR and I can happily say I was not disappointed! I have a pretty difficult time finding dresses because I am bigger chested and am sometimes a little self conscious about my lower tummy area. I order both a S and M and ended up going with the S. I felt like this dress held in and shaped me in all the right places! The dress was a nice heavy material and I was only slightly hot by the end of the night, but that’s expected for an outside wedding in July. I got a ton of compliments throughout the night and felt so confident! I highly recommend!

I got both a large and extra large, the large was just a smidge to tight and the extra large fit comfortably, just a bit large in the "sleeve" portion. I got many compliments because it is such a unique dress, and it was super comfortable to wear!
Instant show stopper! Wore this for a photoshoot with my girls and the colors went well with the incoming season of Fall! The XL was perfect fit well!

links_Review_Title: Compliments--- allll night longggg... alll night
links_Review_Text: Beautiful and mostly comfortable. I normally wear a 8/10 but these hips had me settle for the LG. Great for curves. Material is very soft and not too heavy. I did wear this for an indoor outdoor wedding at a vineyard & danced all night which brings me to why i rated this 4 star. The arms. Although flattering. The arms are a hard stitch, not soft or elastic when rested on your arms. Loose for mingling but tight for arm raised dancing. I did end up with bruises on both arms where the arms rested.

Well, I went through about 4 RTR unlimited orders to find this baby, but so thankful I did! The fabric was gorgeous and was great for a late summer wedding on a ranch! Very much TTS! In between a S and M usually and went with the M!
I wore this to a rehearsal dinner on the beach and it was more than perfect. Fit like a glove, very comfortable, and got a ton of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Probably the cutest thing in my closet.
links_Review_Text: The cut on this dress is perfection. The fabric is a little stretchy and very forgiving. The XS fit well but the S would have worked too. The pattern is fun without being obnoxious. Big fan.
I have a full bust and this dress was a little snug in that area but it is not noticeable because of the ruffle. I LOVED wearing this dress!
The dress fit in all the right places. I'm 5'1", and the length was perfect. I'm also very busty and I felt comfortable and secure! Def recommend

Fit was just right. The dress has a thick material, so keep that in mind if you are renting it for an outdoor affair as it can become hot quickly. I received so many compliments because of the unique pattern.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a beach wedding!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a beach wedding. It fit like a glove, and, more importantly, I was able to dance without feeling restrained at all. Loved this dress!
Super comfy and fun to wear!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a friend's bridal shower.
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a friend's bridal shower. It really made a statement and I got so many compliments on it. It fit perfectly up top, but the bottom was definitely too big. I would probably have to get it tailored because I think if it was a size smaller, it may be too tight up top. It was a great length and I loved the material as well.

Incredible and unforgettable dress. I originally got the S but it didn't zip up over my hips and butt so sized up to an M which was perfect. I'm 5 feet and usually a 4 or 6. Honestly this one of my favorite rentals from RTR. The dress is so fun, flirty, and feminine.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit, very comfortable, beautiful dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is great for a petite body type. I usually wear XS-S/0-2 in dresses. The material was good, thick quality. However, it might be a little too thick for an outside event, especially in the summer. Overall very happy with this dress and would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Stunning!! It was a complete showstopper.
links_Review_Text: For my curvier girls, the split can be a bit revealing. It was extremely windy on the beach in Montego Bay so I had to hold the split down. Other than that, it was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Great for curvy girls - I felt amazing!
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for a Saturday night convention. Although a bit "tropical" for Salt Lake City, UT, but a stunner none the less. I loved the "off the shoulder" sleeve. Dress was flattering (worn with Spanx). Would rent again!!!

I loved this dress. I am usually between a 4/6 but ordered the small. It was form fitting, but not too small on me. Dress is beautifully made, fabric is thick but breathable, and overall just a really great dress! RENT THIS!
Fits beautiful! Very comfy can be worn casual or dressy.

This dress felt a little tight but I thought it looked cute so I wore it anyways and I didn't need to wear a bra which is a huge pro since I never get to skip one. I got compliments all night long on how unique this dress was and how amazing I looked in it. It was great and my husband didn't want me to have to send it back.

This is by far one of my favorite dresses that I have ever rented! I rented it for a semi formal evening wedding on a lake. The fit is impeccable and the fabric doesn't show anything. I received compliments all night long. I know that the pattern may seem like a bit much, but if you are considering renting this dress, do it! You will not regret it!

links_Review_Title: Fabulous and fun dress for summer wedding in Chicago
links_Review_Text: I am usually a size 8-10. I ended up wearing the Large. The dress is a nice material that holds up well and doesn't easily wrinkle. It was really comfortable. Loved it

links_Review_Title: The dress made me feel so fashionable!
links_Review_Text: Wore this as guest to a wedding and definitely got lots of compliments on it. The body fit is a bit on a tighter side, really glad I was able to zip it up even though I had hot pot earlier in the day haha. I didn't actually need to wear a bra. It's a great dress for a spring/summer themed event. Fabric is a bit heavy but I didn't mind it.

I rented this dress to wear to a cocktail gala and was very happy with my choice! Pros: The color and print really stood out and I loved the ruffles! I got a lot of compliments throughout the night. As for the fit, the dress fit true to size, comfortable to wear, and the material was a very good quality. The slit comes open when you sit, but it didn't bother me too much. Cons: No cons for the dress, but I had a hard time getting in touch with customer service once I received my dress. The ruffle on the arms seemed to be stretched out by previous wearers and fell down much further than it should. I tried to contact RTR by phone to order a replacement but was unable to get in touch with anyone. I also emailed but never received a response. Since it was the day before my event, I had to temporarily tack the ruffles in place so I could wear the dress. This was my first order and I was overall very pleased. I would definitely reorder again but add an additional day on the front end to account for unforeseen problems.

links_Review_Title: Felt great in this dress at a Nigerian wedding.
links_Review_Text: Small was unavailable, so I wore Medium, which ran big in the hips. Otherwise comfortable, easy, and looked great. The material was thick, but had stretch to it.

links_Review_Title: Unique and fun but weird sizing...
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress but the fit was just weird... I ordered a medium and a large. The medium fit but in the hip/butt/leg area it was tight which made the fabric pull and bunch in weird places. Since there was a slit this also made the slit pull which left me a little overexposed. I ended up wearing the large but the large had excess fabric in the butt/hips area and was a little baggier than I would have liked. I was probably just in between sizes, but since there was little to no "give" in the fabric I just couldn't get away with the medium. Also beware: if you are wearing this to a summer wedding, the fabric is VERY heavy. All in all I got a lot of compliments and the dress is very cool, just beware if you're a larger bottomed girl like myself :)

I wore this to a farm-chic wedding, and this dress was perfect. The quality is amazing and felt great as soon as I put it on. Chest area ran a bit large, but the ruffles hide everything. Color is blush, not white with the print. As other reviewers noted, sitting presents a bit of an issue with having to drape the dress over your legs. Aside from that, I have no complaints about this dress! I would rent again!

Wore this for a rehearsal dinner in Florida and got so many compliments! The fabric is a little heavy, but good quality. I'm between a small and medium and the small was just a little tight around the stomach, but the medium fit great! Would definitely recommend.

This dress has such a fun island vibe and pattern. Cute style and very comfortable to wear. I am usually a size 4 and the Medium was a bit loose. I ended up wearing another dress to the wedding I was attending but I would have loved this for another event.
Really loved this dress for a tropical wedding. Fit well and was really comfortable. Got tons of compliments

I LOVED this dress, and so did everyone else apparently. So unique, perfect for a springtime wedding, and the fit was extremely flattering. Very hard to let this one go back, but if I bought it and rewore, people would remember because this dress is a showstopper!

links_Review_Title: Wanted this dress to work soooo bad :(
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful and fun but in the end it just didn't work for my body type. The L was too loose and made me look frumpy. But the M was too tight in the hips which made the front gap open which would've worked if I was wearing it a night out or something but it's not what I wanted for my engagement pictures. I think this dress would work for a slimmer, less curvy body type.
Well made and fit great! Ruffles are cute.

This dress was sassy and fun and perfect for a day time beach wedding. The material was a bit thicker than I anticipated but I was still very comfortable on the beach in Cabo. Colors are great and the fit is beautiful and flattering!
This dress was form flattering and so comfortable. The print and pattern made it a real stand-out. I'm very busty and wore it without a bra, but there was plenty of support. Highly recommended!

If you are an hourglass or pear shape, this dress is great! If you have narrow shoulders like I do, the ruffles will fall almost to your elbows, which is not a problem for me! Great length for a near-petite lass - I was wary of a midi-length making me look short, but it does not! The print is super flattering. A+ 10/10 Recommending it to my aunt for her daughter's beach wedding!

links_Review_Title: Super fun and comfortable dress for Latin theme wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress! It was extremely comfortable. I wore it with a strapless bra but t the bodice is thick enough and supportive enough that you could wear it without one. It's also fitted so Spanks are not required to create a beautiful silhouette. Great freedom of movement even with the arms. The slip makes it so it is sexy and easy to dance in.
Loved this top. I wore it to work and on the weekend. It's thick and chic. Lots of compliments.
I loved this sweater and the drama of the sleeves. I'd give it five stars if it wasn't so thick but over all i really liked it!
I sized up twice because this brand generally runs small on me. I would recommend going up just one size.

So comfortable for the Kentucky Derby Watch! Sleeves are as long as they look in the picture, but the slits make it functional. Obviously turn the sleeves around prior to taking a picture unlike how I posed!

Wore this for a date night. The exposed shoulder is sexy without being overt. Sleeves also add a nice detail. It felt a little stiff and worn although I believe it's relatively new, but maybe that's just the fabric. Would recommend.

links_Review_Title: The shirt was a little bit faded but would have been beautiful a little newer.
links_Review_Text: Fit was great

The sweater has nice weight and a cool style, but it needs to be fitted and mine wasn't. I should have ordered the UK size 12 (I'm usually a US 8). But even if I had sized down, the sweater is pretty baggy, with a lot of fabric sort of hanging around. I don't know if the one I got was slightly over-loved, but it felt like it was starting to get misshapen. Wore it once to a drinks party and was thinking of it for thanksgiving but it's just too floppy.

links_Review_Title: The sweater shoulders were pulled out of shape and didn't sit right. Sleeves way too long.
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear.
didn't wear it because i thought it was overworn. but really nice though.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a chilly date night!
links_Review_Text: I wore this with high rise wedgie fit jeans and white pointed western flats. The exaggerated sleeve added a really fashionable feel to this no so basic sweater! And the off the shoulder was just the right amount of sexy for a casual date night with the hubs. The material is very heavy an no super breathable so cooler nights are best if you get hot easily. It doesn't tuck into jeans but a side french tuck looked cute! It ran a little big on me and looked kind of loose so fixing down if you have a average to small chest is a good idea.
Too costum-ey for me. I wish I could chop the ends off of the sleeves. They flop around. How could anyone wear this?
I liked the off-shoulder style, it was comfortable. The sleeves got a little bit in the way but was manageable.

links_Review_Title: Cute but super thick and loose
links_Review_Text: not exceptionally flattering, super thick fabric really lose at waist

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on my sweater.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect and it paired nicely with my jeans
Wore this to a sushi bar for dinner. Sleeves are gorgeous and fun, but would be totally annoying for an actual dinner.

links_Review_Title: Shoulder element is cute - the sweater is thick and doesn't look as high quality in person.
links_Review_Text: Thick and Navy _ I wore it once, was really cute but FYI the arm slits get a little annoying if you plan to be using your hands alot!
The fit is so flattering, just keep a safety pin handy if you have a large chest. It was a little to low cut for my liking, but easily fixed by pinning it closed.
For day time wedding, Fit perfectly the color was super cute

Loved this dress- print & details are pretty! Wore for a Luncheon. RTR suggested XL size and I definitely could have gone smaller but still trying to figure out all of the sizing. Only con was that it wrinkled pretty easily.

The fit was fine, but it was not flattering for me. Made my hips and stomach look bigger than they are. The top is also super low cut and has a clip and tie to keep it together, but it was def revealing if the wind were to blow. I did not end up wearing.
Fit perfectly

links_Review_Title: Beautiful wedding!! Perfect for warm weather!!
links_Review_Text: Very low neckline. That’s why I wore the camisole. Very comfortable!! People told me dress was pretty. I wanted short sleeves because I can’t wear sleeveless. Would rent again!!

Loved it, so pretty. Great ruffles. I'm a size 16 American size and ordered 4x and was a little loose but not sure 3x would have fit. Great design, color and print. Wore a tank under so I could wear to work! Order this dress!!!

links_Review_Title: Rented for a casual wedding but did not wear it. Size 16
links_Review_Text: I liked the dress. It is very low cut! My daughters said it looked old-laddish. Everyone I asked chose my other dress option over this one. I did not end up wearing it
Wore this to my cousins wedding in Lima. Very flattering and beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: Perfect length for being 5'3 and very slimming
links_Review_Text: I would definitely wear this dress again its so fun!
This dress was beautiful but I definitely should have sized down.

This was my Easter dress and I loved it for the day. I was less than impressed with the feel of the dress though. Also, there is a clip at the chest but still leaves way too much of the dress open. I had to pin it myself on my chest.

links_Review_Title: The color and style of this dress is amazing! I received tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: The dress felt a little snug on my rib cage but otherwise was true to size. There is a hook on the front that can be undone if you really want to be more exposed. The length is great and it's nice to have a more formal dress with sleeves. I have larger arms and this worked perfectly. I wore this for a bridal shower and felt great the whole day.

Got so many compliments. Wore this to brunch then again for work! There's a little clip in the plunge that makes it a little more scandalous or conservative depending on your event! The ruffles are so pretty and the print is really eye catching! Would rent again. True to size.

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit, lovely dress, for a daytime event. I've enjoyed wearing it now and look forward to being able to wear it out and about.
I did not end up taking this on my trip as I was visiting conservative Muslim countries...too low cut.

Fit was great--formfitting but loose enough to be comfy; colors and pattern amazing! There's a hook and eye at the chest for a less revealing look. I didn't keep this dress because it was slightly too formal for my vacation. This dress would be perfect for a wedding, formal/dressy brunch, baby shower, etc.

I should have known that the midi length would basically be maxi on me, but sometimes I can get away with it so I gave it a shot. I chose not to wear this to my event, but one main reason was I would have to steam it before I wore it. It's very low cut as well, but it's super feminine and cute! Just not the right length for me.

The dress looks like it would be loose fitting in the photo/description but there is a form fitting lining inside that does make it tighter. If in between sizes I'd suggest to go up so that the hips/waist aren't too small. Dress itself was pretty and looked the same as it did in the pictures.
Top was too loose and low cut
Beautiful dress just too much for my body type
Runs a tad small--except in the chest. You'll need to invest in some safety pins like a lot of the dresses on here.
I'm 5'7, 130lbs and ended up in the xs.
got this in the small and swapped it for the xs and it was MUCH better. i recommend sizing down. (for reference, i am 5'6, 125 lbs, 34B, fluctuate between 2-4 or s/m)

links_Review_Title: Wore this to dinner on vacation
links_Review_Text: Flattering & TTS
Great, flattering fit and cute pattern for daytime wedding in French countryside. Would definitely wear again!
Waist + hips fit true to size, top/chest seemed a little oversized. Overall a beautiful dress and comfy to wear.
Fit was perfect for me, dress was perfect for hot weather, breathable gorgeous fabric, beautiful color. I love it.
Quick shipping + cute color!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color. Perfect for casual summer wedding
links_Review_Text: It is very low cut in the front. The clasp helps but still leaves an open hole. Would be hard to wear a bra but it was gorgeous. So fun and summery

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a small, low-key summer wedding in Philadelphia and loved it.
links_Review_Text: I love this dress. It is extremely flattering and comfortable. I felt just dressy enough for the wedding I wore it to and got a lot of compliments. My only minor issue is that the neckline has a tie at the base and then relies on a hook and eye to keep it closed. I am large busted and there were a few times when the closure opened just from movement.
Comfortable fit, feminine and flattering
Perfect length.
I did not love this dress. As another reviewer mentioned, it was very frumpy. The print is pretty, my the style was not for me. I ended up with a replacement.

links_Review_Title: just flowy and vibrant - i wore w a leather jacket and strappy pumps for work.
links_Review_Text: was a little big on me but I have a wide back and rib cage and it doesnt have stretch so had to size up.
My ribcage and waist were a little large for this size. Height was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Unless you have LARGE breasts and a small ribcage, skip this.
links_Review_Text: I did not end up wearing this at all and will not post a picture because it would be obscene. It zipped tight on my ribcage and then had so much room in the chest that I could not have made it work without alterations. I wear a 40 C. My chest is not small, but this made me feel like I would have needed double Ds or bigger to do it justice. Also, the dip was low and would have needed fashion tape for sure.

links_Review_Title: Fun event, but didn't use this dress.
links_Review_Text: The neckline went waaaaaaay too low. I ended up not wearing this dress to my event because I would have had to use a safety pin to fasten the dress so that it was appropriate.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful breezy dress but size up!
links_Review_Text: After reading other reviews I decided to size up significantly for this dress and I'm so glad I did! I'm a 14 and I wore the 3X. It was roomy but comfortable, the 2X probably would have been good. These are Australian sizes so the scale is different. The dress is beautiful and breezy with vibrant colors and fun ruffles. I wore it with gold flats to work and with flatforms sandals to dinner one night. Can easily be dressed up or down. The neckline was far too plunging even for my C cups but I was easily able to safety pin. Beautiful!

links_Review_Title: Super cute, but whoa.. it's low cut.
links_Review_Text: I loved the ruffles, the pattern and the fit.... except as a curvy, big busted gal, the deep v-neck was an eyeful. I don't usually like showing that much cleav... especially at a work-ish related event. I probably would have been okay wearing it to a wedding or fancy brunch with the ladies.. but not quite right for a social philanthropic event.

I'm obsessed with all things ALC. this brand is super flattering, super comfortable, super cute. I'm 5'4 for reference- definitely long for a short person; but great with booties. As with all sweater dresses, they run big, so order a size down. Usually I'm a small/medium and XS was perfect.

links_Review_Title: This dress fit like a dream as if I was cut for me. So comfortable and I loved it.
links_Review_Text: Fits tight to body. Must be confident with your shape.

links_Review_Title: Comfy and sexy for 3rd tri bump
links_Review_Text: Love the fit of this dress. The material is stretchy, thick enough to not thin out over a third trimester baby bump but thin enough to wear to a July dinner (with a one-mike walk) in Las Vegas. Husband loved it, I felt great, and it paired nicely with flats for casual shopping later in the week.
Great for maternity, super stretchy. Looked great with different dusters, sweaters, jackets, flats, or heels. 5'2 and it was a bit long but still looked great.

I liked the dress. It definitely necessitated sprucing up with a statement necklace. Also, the top half seemed disproportionately large. I felt like I was constantly tugging up the dress to hide my bra inside the armpit holes.

links_Review_Title: Nice fitting and great color with my hazel eyes!
links_Review_Text: Fits nicely and is stretchy material. However, I wasn't crazy as the material wasn't very soft. It wasn't itchy or uncomfortable, just a bit textured for my taste.

links_Review_Title: such a great fit, so versatile
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfectly and was a great length to be sexy for date night and conservative enough for the office (paired with a long sweater and booties). The shape held up and didn't stretch out. Color is great for fall and the material is on the thicker side - perfect for cooler temps!
Really flattering and comfortable

links_Review_Title: I wore it wine tasting in Napa. It was very warm that day and this material breathes.
links_Review_Text: I hugged me in all the right places and was super comfortable to wear.

links_Review_Title: Loved it! This dress can be super casual for every day errands, brunch with friends or dressed up!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Very simple dress but easy to dress up with a necklace and other accessories. Figure flattering
links_Review_Text: Extremely figure flattering. Sexy but doesn't expose a lot of skin. The material was thick so it didn't show every flaw and lump and bump! Could wear in the fall even when it gets chilly with a sweater jacket.

links_Review_Title: It was a cute dress but not a must rent.
links_Review_Text: Fit nicely, material was a bit stiff.

Overall, I really enjoyed this dress. It's sexy, it's comfy, it's easy to dress up or down. My boyfriend loved it. All great things! I found that it was hard to wear a bra- I wore a racerback cotton bralette with it and kept having to tuck the straps away- and I wonder if it might have been a bit too big since I kept having to pull it down after I walked anywhere. I might try again in one size smaller than my usual and see if that helps.
Way too large looks like it would be body fitting but not the case. Oddly in between fitted and baggy

links_Review_Title: L O V E; comfy, sexy
links_Review_Text: Got to wear to work with blazer and it's great for that. If anything may run a smidge large. I L O V E this dress. The racerback gives it that sexy edge if worn alone. Even though it's form fitting, the length when worn with jacket/sweater is appropriate for professional office.
I wore this dress to court with a blazer and heels. I also wore it with flats for a casual weekend lunch. It is simple and figure flattering. I loved the midi length.

links_Review_Title: You need to wear a racer back type bra but the neckline bugged me.
links_Review_Text: It fit nicely but I didn't like the neckline.
Only negative I can say is that the fabric shows everything you get on it. Otherwise, great!

links_Review_Title: Super Cute! But, not the ticket for a pearish shape...IMHO.
links_Review_Text: I LOVED the way this dress felt and the length - I'm 6'1''. But...I'm a pear shape, and it wasn't entirely flattering over my hip/saddle area. I'm going to go buy some shapewear specifically for this dress, though, to see if it works...I love it that much!
Wore with a denim jacket. Cute.

I ordered a medium since they were out of smalls. I was a bit nervous that it would be a bit big but it still hugged all the right places! It's a thicker/higher quality material but still breathes. I got a ton of compliments every time I wore this piece and was easily able to dress it up or down. By far my favorite rental to date.

links_Review_Title: The dress is sexy and sophisticated...paired really well with a leather jacket.
links_Review_Text: It's fitted, so you many have to wear some spanx for a smoother look. But I LOVED the racer back and the length.
Very nice dress fits perfectly. Was nice for spring outfit. Added a light sweating the evening.

When I tried on this dress my husband asked, "why did you rent that? You have a dress just like it from Marshall's." I was completely deflated. He was right, it has no real wow factor. Heavier material than a typical ribbed midi. It's still cute and a fun wear, but not sure it's worth the rent.
This dress was nice and comfy, fit was a tad looser than I expected. Not very "fitted" or Stretchy. The sweater-ish material gives it a more casual feel.
Fit super snug/ body con. I just wasn't comfortable , I have a belly so I looked not so great in it. Would be great with curves and a flat stomach
Great dress! Comfortable and flattering.
This dress is for everything...you can wear it out, you can wear it with a jacket for work, events, cocktails... I don't want to return it:)

It is a very curve-hugging fit, that's for sure, but in all the right places! The material is thick, almost like scuba material, so everything was smoothed over and held in place firmly but definitely very comfortable. I rented this for my Hollywood murder mystery themed 30th birthday party and it was a hit. It was a splurge but totally worth it since I wanted to stand out and look/feel my best and this dress delivered!!
This dress was everything. The color. The cut. The shape.

links_Review_Title: Best dress "shopping" experience ever! A favorite designer for enhancing my curves.
links_Review_Text: Felt like a queen in this dress. When I ordered this, I'd never heard of this designer, but now, I seek out their dresses first! I'm overweight, and never thought I could wear a body-conscious dress, but this one was perfect for my shape. I wore this in February 2019, and to be honest, I can't remember if I wore the 52 or the 50. The fabric was so forgiving, I could have worn either. The color was perfect. I did wear a bra and shape wear, but I could have gone without both. Thanks, RTR!!!
The dress fit like a glove and accented all of my assets 😉. I received so many unexpected compliments in this dress.
Fit was amazing. Comfortable to wear. Received too many compliments to modestly repeat. Loved this dress. May just buy it !

I'm 5'6" and usually wear 8-12 sizes. This material is definitely a stretchy thick material. I read the reviews where you had to put it on first and then do you hair and makeup since it's difficult to put on, but I did both first and was able to put it on with no problem. Hugs your curves great. The only thing that annoyed a little was how it slowly worked it's way up and my toes showed in some pics. Other than that, perfect fit and length! Received so many compliments and it deff stands out!
Great fabric and comfy! Got a ton of compliments.. super sexy, and classy dress!

22 weeks pregnant, this dress fits like a glove. The material is stretchy and the dress does not have a zipper, making it bump friendly. I received so many compliments all night long. I sized up to 40R to accommodate the bump and the length was perfect with a short heel. I would highly recommend renting if you want to stand out in the crowd and be comfortable all night long.

This gown is stunning! It's my first time renting and I couldn't be any more satisfied! Everyone complimented me! I stole the show with this gown! I'm 5'8, 140 lbs, 34DD and I ordered 40 L . It fit like a glove . I was unable to wear any underwear because the lines showed. However, the material is such great quality, none was needed ! I loved this gown! I can't believe how many compliments I received ! I highly recommend it . I was also able to dance all night in it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Ball for the American Heart Association
links_Review_Text: Snug but comfortable fit. It didn't reveal shapewear. I received tons of compliments and felt like royalty!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Classic Hollywood Glam mixed with bombshell. Ran TTS and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'9" and definitely needed the long size. I'm usually a size 4 in dresses and the 42L fit perfectly. Worn with spanx and no bra as the built in boning on the chest was enough. This dress made me feel like a Hollywood starlet. Loved every minute of wearing it and had so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Winter formal engagement party for my best friend, marrying for the first time at 55!
links_Review_Text: Menopausal ladies, you know how it it - you think "sure, I'll fit in this dress that I bought when I was 30 years old", and lo and behold, you can't get it zipped up all the way! I was panicking on what to wear to my best friend's formal engagement party, and Rent the Runway saved the day! There was only one size left of this dress (14), and it fit like a charm! Wonderful material, beautiful dress, it hugged all the good curves and held in the not-so-nice ones. So many compliments throughout the evening, I wore it with black satin gloves and gold sparkly strappy Stuart W. heels, husband wore a red matching bow tie, we looked great - and I felt great, too! Great dress if you are busty and have some curves.

links_Review_Title: This dress is amazing! If you want to stand out in a sea of black dresses this is it!
links_Review_Text: This dress is very, very formfitting. There is no zipper so you step in from the top. No need for a bra. I am 5’6” and went with the long version. I did not want my heels to show. If you are my height or greater I would definitely suggest a long.

Absolutely loved this dress - just a warning, there is no zipper (or at least, I never found it 😂), but it's pretty stretchy, so getting it on was no problem. The R was just the right length with 3" heals.
It was absolutely beautiful! It's VERY form fitting.

This is a very fitted dress. I'm a size 16 but ordered a size up (18) and it seemed perfect besides the fact it was too long and I can't wear heels because of foot problems. Looking at renting the petit now but it's a beautiful dress. I even have belly fat but with some spanx could rock it. Picture is without spanx so excuse the rolls LOL. Would rent again.
I should have ordered the long to accommodate my heels.

I usually wear between a size 6-8 and I am 5’ 4.5” tall. The dress is definitely form fitting. I knew it was Italian style so I went up a size for comfort. I like a long length with heels so I should had rented 44L instead. Just know there is no zipper or buttons. You have to slide into it. Also, the seams do enhance your curves if you like the hourglass look. Overall, this was my favorite one out of my choices.
So many compliments. I definitely stood out in the crowd. Bonus - no zippers so I needed no help getting it on.

This was the perfect dress for a red carpet affair. Received so many compliments and felt so glamorous. I went with the 42R as the 40 was a little too snug. The 42R straps were a bit too loose though. Form fitting, stretchy material and shows off your curves. Very comfortable, expect I had to keep adjusting the straps. Definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Celebrating a lovely couple with my Boyfriend.
links_Review_Text: Material was spandex like so hugs in the right places and sucks you in where you need it. No bra needed. It will show easily if you sweat. Length was perfect with 3.5 inch heels. Easily To dance it and get on and on. No zipper If that tells you how stretchy it is. There were a few small stains on the dress. My Back up dress was not the dress I ordered. However, RTW was great with customer Service on this issue. No one noticed the stains, but there were a lot of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and a great fit
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a #blacktie #wedding in December and it did not disappoint! In particular the top is very flattering and I got a lot of compliments! The dress is definitely fitted and a bit snug. It does not have a zipper so I wore the larger size because it was easier to shimmy into.
All eyes will be on you in this dress. It fit amazing and the fabric is so thick I didn't need shapewear or a bra, something us busty girls don't get to say much!

I wore this dress for a formal event for my husband's work. We had to be dressed for over 6 hours and thankfully this gown allowed me to move! I'm 26 weeks pregnant and it fit perfectly over my bump! I got so many compliments and finally felt beautiful and not just "cute pregnant"!
Everything about the dress was perfect!
This dress was amazing! It fit perfectly and was so comfortable. I would recommend it to anyone!
Amazing dress soooo many compliments
I wore this for a military ball and I absolutely loved it! Very classy

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this gown. It is stunning. Super thick material that made me feel very sucked in and controlled, even without wearing spanx. No zipper, but if you can get it over your hips it will stay in place all night. The top is lined and has cups, so you don't need to wear a bra. For the bottom, you definitely need to be careful with what underwear because it is very tight, but I wore a seamless thong and it was perfect. I got so many compliments and would recommend 1000%!
Great fit! The material is thick enough for a crisp fall wedding but not hot. Slip on dress with stretchy material fit like a glove!

I wore this for black tie and felt absolutely stunning. It's VERY form fitting on both the front and back. I did wear shape wear just to smooth everything out. To make a little va va voom I wore a strapless bra but you wouldn't have to. I ordered the size up in hopes it would be less tight but it was as tight with just extra fabric if that makes sense so I wore the smaller size. I loved this dress!
Sexy meets classic; creating stunning body hugging magic. Believe it or not still incredibly comfortable! Winner all around
The fabric material is great! It's thick and stretchy. I normally wear size 6 but wore size 4 instead. The dress is beautiful!!!

links_Review_Title: I felt totally confident in this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress gave me a warm hug in all the right places. I was hoping for that after I heard it was made of neoprene. I have another dress in that fabric and it feels the same way. The dress fit in all the right places, and I never felt like it was going to slip. I got tons of compliments!
Very form fitting and comfortable. Loads of compliments all night.
I loved everything about this dress. Perfect red! Perfect fit! It even has cups, so a bra isn't needed.

I'm 5'4" and usually rent a 2 regular but all that was available was a 38L. I was afraid it was going to be too long but it worked well with 2.5" heels. It's definitely very tight fitting so if you're between sizes, I would go up. I also rented the necklace I wore. I received compliments all night. Loved the dress!!
Fit like a glove. Perfect for a military ball. Probably would have worn the 38, but they only had it in a long and I would have been tripping in it all night.

links_Review_Title: I chose this dress for a black tie charity event in the fall. Selected it based on color and design.
links_Review_Text: I strongly recommend this dress! I am a size 4Long so I ordered the 40L and it could not have fit any better! It was my first time using RTR and I was not disappointed! Bust: I am a 36C (recently down from a 36D) so I often worry about popping out or having major saggy boob, so I have to wear sticky pads or some other creative means of bust control. This dress has a built in bra which was AMAZING. Usually "built in bras" do very little to fight gravity for anything over a B cup. This built in bra kept everything in and up securely. I moved comfortably and confidently. No need to adjust, no worrying about certain movements causing things to shift. It was great! Very well designed. Length: I am 5'10. When I first tried this dress without shoes, it rested on the floor. I was able to wear a 1" heal with it. I would have preferred the option to have a higher heal, but it worked well. Fit: This dress is stretchy and form fitting. I moved comfortably and did not feel the need to suck the tummy in after eating or drinking. One thing I would mention - this dress is easier to get on than it is to get off. There is no sexy way to do it so be forewarned! Over all it is a beautiful dress and I was very happy! If you feel bold, beautiful or just love the color red - get this dress! You won't be disappointed!

The fit was slightly too snug because of my tummy but it is meant to be body hugging. No bra needed thankfully. No zipper which was also a relief, no zipper disaster to worry about. Very stretchy and comfortable. I felt amazing and received lots of compliments. I was not confident I could pull it off but so glad I went for it anyway. Loved it!!
Wore this jumpsuit for my 50th birthday bash. I loved it! It fit perfectly, looked beautiful and was comfortable enough to dance the night away!!
I wore this to a pre-event cocktail party. It was comfortable, cute, and abundantly long. The perfect outfit to wear on a cold night because I could layer up.

Last minute rental for a party. I picked it up from the SF location. I'm usually a 10 but they only had the 8 available in the length I needed. I have a 35 inch inseam and this was perfect! The top was tight on me but If I got it in my size it would've been perfect. Great quality! Lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Not exactly petite but worth the heels
links_Review_Text: This was still long on me even being petite. I ended up wearing about 4 inches heels. Really comfortable and effortlessly chic for a company holiday party
This romper is gorgeous. Fit was great. The top I had to tie really tight and then it was perfect. I am 5'9 and ordered the long and with 2 1/2 inch heels it was still a little long.
This is beautiful in person but I'd recommend sizing down and getting the shorter length. In my case I'd try a 6S.
this was well made. very comfortable & i received many compliments. it is extremely long. i am 5'10" and it was too long for me

links_Review_Title: This was a great look for a black-tie event.
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable, as I was working a red carpet and needed to move effortlessly - and it delivered! Though it was a jumpsuit with a bow-tied in the back, I was able to get in and out with ease when nature called. I stand 5'7" which makes jumpsuits a gamble re; length as in flats the Regular was great (I did trip a couple of times in the wide-legs but I'm generally clumsy, so take that with a grain of salt) but felt that I could have used an additional 1/2-1 inch more to wear the taller heel as I'd planned. It does not have pockets so I wore a jacket with it while working to accommodate my items, but would be great for a night of dancing.
This is a great spring dress! Definitely runs big. I rented a size smaller. Full pleated skirt with pockets! Loving the pop of yellow!

links_Review_Title: Rent if you have small breasts, short torso and large waist
links_Review_Text: The idea of the dress was great but the fit was not flattering on my shape. There was a lot of extra fabric around the waist and my breasts couldn't fit in the tiny top part they were supposed to..sad.
Flattering fit although the straps may be too long for shorter gals. At 5'7" they were sliding off my shoulders. So many compliments that I will definitely rent again! Loved it!
Loved this dress. Kept getting compliments. It's so flowing and special. Really perfect.

links_Review_Title: Versatile dress for work or going out
links_Review_Text: Like the dress it is great for the office. The pleating on the skirt creates great movement and the fabric is super soft.

links_Review_Title: I didn't want to send this one back!
links_Review_Text: Wore this on vacation and also to my daughter's college graduation, I didn't want to give it back! This dress is super comfortable and retro, reminded me of the '50s. The skirt is very full, the fabric is light and soft. It's such a fun dress to wear! I would have bought it if it wasn't so expensive. You can wear a regular bra with it. The straps did fall off my shoulders at times, they're a little long. I wore ballet flats with it for practical purposes, but is is absolutely banging with heels! I loved the pockets, they're deep enough that I was able to keep my I-phone, lipstick, and glasses in them (and didn't need to carry a handbag). This dress looks much better in person than it does in this photograph, extremely flattering and makes your waist look tiny. Works well with a larger bust (36D) hourglass shape, and the length was perfect (I'm 5'8). The colors are great! I'm going to miss this one.

In theory, the colors and the style were wonderful. Everything was so lovely until the bust up. I am broad shouldered and wear a F/G cup and I could still have fit a moderately sized chihuahua in the bust of this dress. It gaps hugely and the sleeves slip constantly, so I was forced to wear a shirt over it as a skirt. It worked I guess.
Fit really well around the middle! I loved the material and it felt really sophisticated. Would rent again. Usually wear a 4/6 and the 40R was perfect.

Very 50s silhouette - something especially about the seam under the bust kind of lifts and shapes in a contrived form, even for a very flat-chested gal like me. Full circle skirt, high square neckline, wide straps all very conservative generally but fit is flattering. Material is thin and light (sort of crinkly/papery in its crispness) so it’s voluminous but not too heavy. Has pockets, oversized loop hardware on back zip is very hip and high-end looking but also practical (makes it super easy to zip).

I am in love with the material of this dress. The skirt was very full but the material was lovely and very breathable. It was comfortable on a hot day! I wasn't sure about the full skirt but I found the dress overall to be very slimming! The colors were not something I would normally pick for myself but I am so glad I tried this dress out. Only con: it was slightly large in the chest, which is a problem I generally do not have. I fixed this by wearing a cardigan but even without you couldn't really tell unless you were looking down from above me. Overall, great find!

I rented this stunner with my unlimited membership for work and also ended up wearing for play! Cotton frock has no stretch in fabric, although construction at back is highly elastic. Pros: loved the print and colors, bright yellow is my absolute favorite thing right now! The silhouette was very mad men/1950/1960s which was flattering if a bit much. Pull ring on zipper was clutch. Cons: mine came damaged with a safety pin situation that had been missed in cleaning - that always makes me wonder what's up with quality control. Shoulder straps were a little loose on me AND for a dress of this quality I was surprised the designer did not build in bra carriers. I styled for work with black suede and mesh pumps, a black bolero when it got chilly from AC and giant yellow rented earrings; for play I swapped pumps for sneakers and lost the sweater.
Lovely dress! Though it runs large on the chest. Where it's usually tight on me, it was loose on the chest (and I'm a D).
Got tons of compliments on this one! I paired it with a COMME des GARÇONS Play cardigan and Chucks for a more casual look. Adorbs!

LOVED THIS DRESS! Got so many compliments. Super comfy, only problem i ran into was that even with the zipper fully unzipped, it was hard to pull up over the butt, so over the head is a better way to take it on and off lol
Great fit. Lightweight material. Classy. Dress up or down. Good color scheme for a variety of shoe options. Go bold!

links_Review_Title: I had to keep adjusting the straps - should have pinned them.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress...the top ran really big, though, which is usually not my problem. The fabric is amazing, and it hides lots of flaws. I received lots of compliments on this dress.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress good quality fabric fun to wear
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress. You can tell it is very well made. The fabric is very good quality. The fabric feels heavy and has some structure. It is beautiful but also comfortable. I loved the pockets. I am very petite and it was probably a little longer on me than it should be, but I like long dresses. It has a 50s classic vibe. The back has stretchy ruching so I feel like it would fit a variety of sizes. It's overall a very pretty dress. I really enjoyed wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Not sure what occasion you would wear this for...
links_Review_Text: Really bizarre dress, the pattern is cute and the fabric is very sundress-y, but the silhouette is more like a gown and it came almost to my ankles (I'm 5'8)

Wanted to love this one, as I adore Marni. The straps are loose and the waist is big, which makes the skirt look bulky. The print's definitely loud, so another "sitting on the fence" thing. Will size down and see what happens.
fit great around ribcage and waist. loved the flare, but way too baggy in chest area and straps were too long

I love this dress. I think the pattern is very retro cool but not crazy. I found it very comfortable and flattering. I felt very thin because the bottom skirt is full so it makes your waist appear smaller. Great day dress or work or date I guess too...
Beautiful details on this dress. Full skirt was fun. Straps stayed on ok, a little slip.

This is a cute dress with a bit of a retro flare. The skirt is very full. I styled it with a moto leather jacket which was great and gave it a bit more of a modern touch. Some have noted that the bust doesn't have as much room, but I disagree - I think it actually was a tad large, and this is an area that typically runs small for me. This looked to be knee length from the model, but on me it was mid shin length for me. Looked great.

I probably chose a size too big, but nothing about this dress worked on my body. I have 34 DD and the chest part was extremely large. I can't imagine how big of a busy you have to have to fill up. Or you have to wear it really tight. I don't know. I do know I hated the dress. I looked like an over sized cupcake w baggage when I already have big boobs.

I wore this beautiful dress for Thanksgiving dinner in Florida. It is a gorgeous weight, has pockets, and garnered a ton of compliments. The only thing that didn't work for me very well was that I am pretty short in the torso, so the top of the dress was a bit floppy and I had to pull the straps up all the time. If I owned it, I would have to have it tailored. Otherwise, it was possibly the most wonderful dress I have ever worn for a family holiday!

links_Review_Title: Very fun but a little loose.
links_Review_Text: I liked this dress very much. The fabric is gorgeous and it's very well-designed. The straps or too long, however, and overall I could've gone down a size.
Dress is tts. Comfortable to wear all day.
If you're big busted and need a dress with thick straps to cover your bra straps, this is it. The material is lovely. I wore a short sweater with it to transition to fall and that worked well.

links_Review_Title: This dress is so amazing, wish I could keep it! It fit perfectly!
links_Review_Text: As a tall and super skinny girl it is always hard to find something that fits absolutely perfect in every way. I have no complaints about this dress. It was very waist flattering and the length was perfect for the Concert I was attending. Overall, would definitely rent again sometime soon!
full skirt

links_Review_Title: This dress was comfy retro glam. Oh, and it has pockets.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful, flattering, light fabric. Gapped a little at the neckline, which kept it from being a home run. It also runs fairly large (things are not usually loose on me in the bodice, but this was).

links_Review_Title: Great dress. It was touch too small to wear but I don't have a waistline and the zip was tight
links_Review_Text: Must have a waistline for proper fit. Or try sizing up Its not a size issue, just a cut/style thing
This is a beautiful dress but runs large. The top has elastic so you can order a smaller size
Love the fit, absolutely beautiful!
I did not wear the dress it was awkward on my body type and had a huge gap under the arms .
Beautiful color and cut. Wouldn't recommend for women with larger bust sizes.

links_Review_Title: Overall fit was great but the shoulder straps were too lose
links_Review_Text: it is a bulky fabric so bit heavy

links_Review_Title: this print and seasonal style was great for the start of warm weather
links_Review_Text: i love the detail of the singed skirt and cut of the shoulders. i received so many compliments and would order this dress again
Fit large, nice material, top cut
I did not wear this dress because it was slightly too big, however the excess of material made it look very bulky and Boxy. Not very flattering on me at least
I loved this top so much - fit was perfect, flattering, comfortable - all around a great option for a date night or night out on the town!

Love this top!! Was looking for a fun, modern and sassy top for my birthday celebration. Wore it without a bra, high waisted pants and felt comfortable. A little tight across the chest, but tolerable.
Sexy, cute, stylish, different!
I love this top. It requires someone to help zip you in, but it fits like a glove! The bottom is tulle, so super loose and flattering. The top required no bra for me (34D). Amazing silhouette!

links_Review_Title: Really great shape and unique top!
links_Review_Text: Loved this!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments and I felt beautiful. conservative even though with all the open netting

links_Review_Text: Fit right in at a nice dinner followed by a night at a dance club. I'm a straight 6 and it fit well. Beautiful details.

This was a super fun date night top! The top is sexy without being too revealing. I didn't wear a bra and it was totally fine. The bottom is slightly peplum-ish, which was great because we had a 10 course dinner so I didn't feel stuffed in a shirt at the end of the night :) true to size and super fun too!!
I loved this top! It got so many compliments. The top fits true to size, but I was not able to wear a bra with it
This with high waisted back elastic pants was the most comfortable and flattering outfit ever. The fabric did start to bother me after dancing.
I am obsessed with this top. It is the BEST top I have ever worn. It is flattering and edgy. To see more of my favorites from RTR: @jessicapaige.la

links_Review_Title: Loved!! Pic doesnt do it justice. So fun.
links_Review_Text: Yes, it was low, but I didnt wear a bra and didnt feel exposed at all.

links_Review_Title: Unique, fun too for a night out
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size, maybe a bit large. Need a low cut strapless or no bra at all. It does show some skin so keep that in mind. I loved this shirt and would definitely wear it out again. My only complaint was that the sleeves were a bit long and oversized but it was still a great rental that I would recommend!
I wore no bra with this and it was okay (34D). Pretty low cut but still classy. Looked good with black leggings and boots. Would definitely rent again.

This is by far one of my favorite rentals so far!!! Fit was perfect, I was worried it would be too short, but it was great! The only thing that would have made it better is if I didn't have to wear a strapless bra! Will definitely rent again!

This top is very unique and eye catching. I'm a small 34C and I did not fill out the top as much as I would have liked. I also wish the neck had fit tighter but overall it was a cool top and was great for my NYE festivities. #NYE #party

every single person stopped and complimented me on this shirt. can't wear with a bra. The top does go lower than i expected so be wary of nip slips! no give but it fit as expected. it was a little baggy around the shoulders/ arms/ neck. very comfortable and very high quality shirt. loved it!

Loved this - very funky and unique, lots of texture and pattern. I received lots of compliments and felt great. Needed a little help zipping it but once it was on I wouldn't have been able to size up. It's a structured top so it needs to be fitted!

links_Review_Title: Can easily be a day or night look
links_Review_Text: loved the cutouts. Looked short on model on site but is actually pretty long.

links_Review_Title: I couldn't wear it. Not flattering on my body.
links_Review_Text: If you have a short torso and don't have large breasts this could fit you well. I'm usually a size 4, which would be an Italian 40. I got the top in 42 and it had space for my boobs, but the waist was not only large but also in the wrong place, much higher than my natural waist, so I know a 40 would have been even worse.

This top is gorgeous but unfortunately I couldn't wear it. It fit great everywhere but not in the chest area. I do have a bigger chest and a more muscular back so I could only zip half way. I think this would fit true otherwise.
I wish I could have worn this. It's GORGEOUS. The details are so pretty and it's sexy without being overboard. I may try this again in a different size for a night out. It is really a stunning top.
fit was good
So glad I rented this. I have a smaller chest with big ribs and this was perfect in all ways. Fit great, flattering design, SUPER COMFORTABLE!!!! Definitely try if you are thinking about it!!

links_Review_Title: Love this top will wear again for another night out
links_Review_Text: On the hanger I didn't think it would fit me, but once I put it on it was perfect. Pro: Perfect combination of flirty, sexy but still classy Con: A little difficult to put on over my chest, but once I got through that hard part it was perfect.
Fit great. Received compliments all night !

Like other reviews the lace does go lower , but strapless bra was fine. Loved the peplum. Sometimes the zipper on peplum would not lay flat, but such a trendy top that it didn't bother me. Next time would steam to help it lay better.
I'll probably repeat order this one I loved it so much! The quality is UNREAL.
Didn't get to wear the shirt. I'm petite about 5'1 and I think you need to be over 5'6 to wear! The chest area is too big

So trendy and makes you stand out without being over the top. Not the greatest for being able to wear a bra but the top is well fitted that it won't move throughout the night. The peplum is also flattering creating a small waist. Would rent this again, even though it's a little difficult to zip up on your own.
I wear a 34 DDD and this top didn't work. The material doesn't stretch and trying to fit my "girls" into the top resulted in a unflattering "smushed" look.
Lots of compliments on this one! Very sexy but classy. Runs a little loose in the arms, and is lower cut than you would think. Was able to wear a strapless bra and was fine though.

links_Review_Title: Very cute! Fit true to size.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size.

While I thought this would be a fun date night rental the fit was odd. The shoulders and upper chest were too loose causing it to be so low cut you cannot wear a bra with it. The waist was true to size and the length was perfect. Kind of a funky style overall, but I would have given it more of a chance if it had fit better.

Size up because this has no stretch . I did not need a bra since its quite snug. It was not uncomfortable but definitely a great dinner/cocktail item and not recommended if you want to throw your hands in the air and wave like you dont care. Will rent again. Was considering keeping but it is a statement piece that I got a lot of pics in
Absolutely loved this! It was longer than it appears in the picture which was great! Fit perfectly and tons of compliments! Will definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: Lots of oohs and ahhs when I wore this—it’s a very attractive fit.
links_Review_Text: It was really pretty on, but wasn’t super comfortable. I wore my hair in a bun and the zipper up the back kept snagging. I bet I could’ve fixed it for a second wear, but I didn’t bother, I just sent it back.
really pretty, fitted, true to size. interesting looking top!

First off - I didn't get to wear this - I ordered the only size available (44) and it was waaaay too big. I knew I'm a size 4 in tops but wanted to try it anyway because this piece is just so awesome. I tried it on and I loved it (boyfriend did too, he said it was super unique). It's super high quality, and you can tell in the way it feels. Get this top!!
Loved the color for a fall wedding! Fit comfortably over my whole body and was still able to dance! Wore a strapless bra to give me extra hold since I have a very small chest. Overall, great rent!

links_Review_Title: It's fine but not for all body's.
links_Review_Text: I love wiggle dresses and as a true hourglass they usually fit amazing but I think with the fabric this is just not made for someone with extreme measurements (there's a 10 inch difference between my waist and my bust/hips) so the overall fit was terrible. I'm very busty for my size so also not great with bigger busts.

The first time I tried this dress, I thought I should've sized up. But with the help of some Spanx and tummy control under layers, it fit really nicely! It hugged my curves and I could still move around (although with restrictions!). Overall loved this dress a lot but definitely took some time getting used to the fit.
Fit very well and was extremely comfortable. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a fall rehearsal dinner!
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit of this dress. So many compliments on this!! As mentioned in other reviews stairs are very difficult in this dress. Great rental!
Such an elegant look. I have a smaller bust, so had to pull up the dress quite a bit. Very comfortable though

This dress fits very snug, but is such a flattering dress! I don't usually look like I have much good, but this dress did that for me. It's right mostly around the knees and chest area so it limits how much you can move your legs apart. If I got any bigger of a size I don't think it would've fit right. I received so many compliments on this dress and the color was beautiful. Would recommend true to size or one size up depending on your body type.
Wore to a charity event. Runs a bit small and was somewhat tough to walk/dance in, but loved the style and color!

Loved this dress for a wedding! I got compliments all night. It does run pretty small. I'm typically a 6, so I ordered a 6 and an 8. Ended up wearing the 8, but it still felt a little tight! Definitely recommend this dress though, just size up!

I was a bit concerned at first that I was overestimating the sizing after reading other reviews but they were dead on - this dress runs small! I'm 5'5, 135 and usually wear a 4 but the 6R fit me perfectly - which worked out because there was an issue with my backup size 4R and RTR was unable to get it to me for my event. The berry color is even better in person and received compliments all night. Was perfect for a mid-September wedding and would definitely consider renting again :)
Loved the fit of this dress!
Loved this dress! Great, thick material that's super flattering. I wore the Size 4 and the top fit well enough to wear a strapless bra. Cinq a Sept never disappoints, highly recommend!
Absolutely loved this dress! The color was beautiful and fit was perfect. Got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress!..but avoid the stairs...
links_Review_Text: Beautiful color and super form fitting .. I loved this dress but I would suggest to take the elevator instead of the stairs... it's tight down the legs but I was fine with sitting down.

This dress would have been great for a fall wedding as it's more of a plum color. I found the fabric very nice and high end, but doesn't have a lot of give to it. I would definitely size up if you are curvy. Overall I felt good and got a lot of compliments, but I would have probably picked something else that breathes more for a summer wedding. The top is good if you have a larger bust as it's not overly revealing and holds everything in. The length is nice if you are tall. I'm 5'9" and it was a good 3/4 length on me. I wouldn't order if you are short though.
So many compliments, I felt beautiful all night!

links_Review_Title: Perfect wedding dress. Would rent again!
links_Review_Text: Rented for a wedding and I got compliments all night! It was a bit tough to walk quickly in, but other than that it hugged in all the right places!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments wearing this dress!!
links_Review_Text: Great dress for a wedding! Such a beautiful color and easy to match with shoes & accessories! I ordered a size 8, which fit like a glove don't get me wrong, but probably should have went one size up to be more comfortable.

Color was gorgeous! Def loved the fit and the length. It fits like a glove in all the right places and leaves just enough wiggle room where needed. You cant get a full stride in this one, so be ready for baby steps, but overall - this is one of those I wish I didn't have to send back.

links_Review_Title: LOVED! it’s hard to walk in but it’s worth it I felt so beautiful in this dress!
