links_Review_Text: Very form fitting and not great for dancing or sitting but it was worth it - for a looser fit size up I had some trouble zipping!

Gorgeous material and color. I feel that this ran just a tiny bit small. My waist is a 6 but hips are an 8. If you're like me, get the 8 because there is no give in this dress. Received many compliments!
This dress was so comfortable. The color is beautiful. Definitely would size up.

Didn't end up wearing only because I went with my other rental option, but it was a tough call as I loved this one too! Obviously tight due to body con style and decided I'd be more comfortable in a flowier dress for all-day wedding celebrations in 85 degree weather. However I hope I'll have the chance to rent again and wear!! True to size.

links_Review_Title: Very easy to walk in, i’m 4’11 and it fit right above my ankles
links_Review_Text: tight fit! wore spanks so my thighs didn’t run against one another. usually a size Medium or 7/8 Rented a 6 & 8, 8 fit like a glove Sticky around top so it didn’t slip

I usually wear a 4, I chose the size 6. The 4 fit but felt snug. I'm not sure how to describe it. The dress is tighter at the bottom, so it does make it harder to walk. I walk fast and it slowed me down. Lol. I liked wearing the 6 bc I was able to get the dress up quicker when going to the bathroom plus a little extra room for dancing. Overall I received tons of compliments and would rent the dress again.

This dress was extremely faltering. I never received so many complements. The color was gorgeous and it fit just right. Just a little snug. The only thing you need to be conscious of is the dress might twist if you get out the car or from sitting down. Others it was so much fun to wear. ❤️

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color and style! But if you're curvy, keep on looking for something else!
links_Review_Text: Dress was gorgeous & loved how my lower half looked in it! However if you are curvy or bigger on the bottom & not around the waist or chest, I wouldn't recommend. Fit was baggy around my waist & felt it made me look larger in pictures & baggy around my chest too. I had to wear a size up just to fit my butt and I still had trouble dancing and taking big steps because it's so tight around your legs

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Very flattering for any formal occasion!
links_Review_Text: Definitely size up in this dress. I'm usually a 4 - The 4 fit but was too tight in the hips to sit, dance or even walk up stairs so i wore the 6. Great dress with quality fabric! Very flattering.

links_Review_Title: I felt amazing in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I wasn't sure about this dress at first (it was my third choice), but it ended up fitting so nicely! The color looks better in person and I got so many compliments. I typically wear an 8, and I ended up sizing up and wearing a 10. Although fitted, I was still able to dance the night away at the wedding I wore this dress to. If you're considering this dress, rent it!
2R fit great in hips (I don't like anything too tight) but a little big in the bust - I probably could have gone with a 0. For reference I am 5'1" and 32D
Pros: very flattering, shows off the curves Cons: runs small, but can be avoided if you size up properly
I didn't end up wearing this out but I loved it when I tried it on. Gorgeous fit on my body type...made me feel so pretty!!

I absolutely loved this dress. Got compliments throughout the evening. It was perfect for a more formal winter wedding. I felt so confident and loved the color, fit and material. I am small busted and did not wear a bra with the dress because it was a little tight in the chest and rib cage area. It was snug after all the eating and drinking, but that's to be expected. Would rent again for sure!
Beautiful color for a fall wedding! A little longer than I would have liked - it hit me in at an awkward length, but I'm only 5'1. Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Simple dress that creates a beautiful silhouette
links_Review_Text: I actually wear a 10R but that size wasn't available so I squeezed into an 8. This is very true to size because it was tight! But stretchy enough that I could still breathe. Going up stairs was pretty challenging because of the length but I had no problem dancing. I received a lot of compliments and loved the cut of the dress. Will definitely be renting again.

links_Review_Title: The color and fit were great!
links_Review_Text: Slightly tight but even as a shorter girl the length was perfect

Fit was snug but in a good way. It held you tight and it is a curve hugging dress. The fabric is thick and forgiving (in my opinion). However , panty lines will show so I wore knee length spanks and it worked out perfect for me.

links_Review_Title: Not the easiest to move around in but really loved the dress for a NYE gala!
Perfect dress for my company holiday party!
links_Review_Text: Loved the rich color, especially for the holidays. The flared bottom is more subtle in person which I liked, the dress is clearly high quality. The sizing is accurate but it is VERY form fitting per the style of the dress. I got lots of compliments on the dress and loved wearing it!

links_Review_Title: Had women I did not know come up to me to tell me how great I looked!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a Holiday cocktail gala. Perfect! I normally wear a 4R but saw that it ran small and ordered up. Glad I did. Although the 4R fit, the 6R was a bit more comfortable. Color is very nice for the holidays. Would rent again!
Nice top out of my norm but enjoyed. Wore with another Trina Turk RTR pants

links_Review_Title: I'd say get smallest size you can typically wear. This runs a bit big and is loose fit in waist.
links_Review_Text: Nice white color. Very festive without trying
Love everything about this top! Plan to wear again and will rent in the future. Wore to an outdoor work party. Cute with jeans or dress up with slacks for work.

links_Review_Title: It was a perfect summer night out!
links_Review_Text: The top was super cute and went perfectly with the fun pants. I really liked the one shoulder look as well. This top can be worn with fun pants like the photo or perfect way to dress up jeans.

I wore this for vacation and received many compliments on the top. The top did fit loose around the chest. It was quality material but the little ball decorations at the end of the blouse fringe were starting to unravel.
Loved this top. Will prob wear it once more before I return it. It did run a bit big. But it's still FAB.
Loved this top from Trina Turk. I could have used a smaller size but was able to still wear. It's really light weight but not sheer which is great for a white top. Would rent this again!
This top was super sexy and comfortable! I will probably try it again in a large as the XL was a little too big for me.

Threw this in my Unlimited order just for fun and so glad I did, it was hard to send back. Very flattering double ruffle, the "no sleeve" side is high enough that it covers that unflattering pinch of skin near your armpit. The shirt is pretty long, straight, and flowy but not like oversized. Loved it, will probably buy!

I love this top so much, and I was pleasantly surprised to see that it came new with its tags. It is extremely comfortable and though I would say it is true to size, it is on the bigger size of average. I definitely had extra room and it is a bit flowy & loose on me, which was no problem at all for me. I got so many compliments at a holiday dinner and I would keep it if it was not such a recognizable statement piece, So instead I will have to rent again in the future! I wore this with my rag and bone rental black zipper "Carley" jeans that I just had to buy, but could see this for bridal shower or rehearsal dinner, day, night, dressed up and down!

links_Review_Title: This top does not run true to size! Size down if you have small boobs.
links_Review_Text: This does NOT run true to size. Size down if you have small boobs. I am a true medium and ordered a medium based off reviews. It was too big!! Falling off my chest (bc no boobs go support it). The pompoms on the top were starting to fray as well.
For well
Just couldn't make this cute. It fits awkward and blousy, like a tent.
Cute top but too big
Definitely size down.
Nice for weekend wear. A little loose and difficult to wear a good bra with

This is a very nice top... substantial material but soft and flows... unfortunately not just big but huuuge! I am big on top, wide shoulders and I carry my weight up top....usually a 14 dress... size down!

links_Review_Title: Wish I would have sized down
links_Review_Text: Shirt came new with tags! It was stunning! Unfortunately it was too big (wide) and I didn't feel like adjusting so my bra didn't show all night. Will rent again in a smaller size!
Fit great and could be worn with a padded bandeau!
Fits true to size. Not too tight in the mid section but comfortable up top. Fun for a night out

links_Review_Title: Feels expensive, but very comfortable! loved it!
links_Review_Text: Not your typical one-shoulder shirt. You can tell this is designer. Hugs you in the right places and is so sexy yet chic. Loved it!
Really cute but the XL was too big.
Cute tassles and I loved the one bare shoulder. This top is super sassy and cute with jeans.
Loved this top. Fit true to size and didn't fit oddly even though it's one shoulder. Loved the pom pom details.

links_Review_Title: Perfect summer top, a little long
links_Review_Text: The material makes the ruffle move really well and falls nicely on the shoulder. I have a smaller bust and probably could have gotten away with the small but the medium fit well. The shirt is very long, I tucked it into high waisted jeans and it looked great.

links_Review_Title: Perfect outfit for the baptism of my nephew in January.
links_Review_Text: I was looking for a conservative but balanced outfit for my nephew's baptism. I was nervous the ruffles would be overwhelming, but they weren't, and it was nice to be covered up top, but had a short skirt that balanced the outfit. Lilly always fits me well so I was happy to find a color and print that wasn't too loud for a winter religious ceremony. Received several compliments on the dress.
This is one of my favorite items to wear! The material is comfortable and the dress is very flattering. The falls above the knee.
This dress was so comfortable and flattering. It was the perfect length too. I typically wear a 4 and this 6 fit perfectly. Glad I read the reviews before renting.
Very cute and modest! Really liked it. Ended up in the 2. Since I wore this to a wedding I had to travel for, I appreciated that I didn't have to pack a bunch of jewelry to complete the look.

This dress fit like a glove. The faux wrap detail is very complimentary and the material is nice. I received so many compliments and felt beautiful both times I wore it! (Yes, I loved it so much I wore it twice!!)
Little tight in bust but otherwise perfect
Loveeeee this dress! So pretty and flattering. Perfect for work or another day time event. Will probably wear again before returning.
Great fit, great print, true to size, got a lot of compliments, a little short…
Wore this for the 4th of July. Not totally my style but comfortable enough and did the job! Tucks in nicely in the back.
I wore this to see Michael Buble and to a ladies shopping celebration. It's a wrap dress, but stays closed because it also has a continuous skirt. The fit is perfect and flattering.

This dress is the best. It's tight in the right places while still being forgiving. And comfortable! It's definitely on the shorter side but I didn't find it too short for work with flats. (I'm 5'6") Considering buying!

links_Review_Title: This was just a fun dress to wear! It was comfortable and make me feel fantastic!
links_Review_Text: This dress is a little shorter than I am usually comfortable with, (I'm 5'6) but it was still great. The only real complaint is that it was SO hot at our event and it didn't breath well.
I wore this to the racetrack with my friend for the Belmont Stakes and it was the perfect fluttery, summery "day at the races" dress. I received so many compliments! Super flattering and super comfy.
I am in love with this dress, it is a beautiful color/pattern and the soft material makes it super comfortable. I will definitely rent again

I rented this to go to Hawaii and loved it! It's very comfortable and I love that it's a faux wrap so I never felt like I was in danger of any wardrobe malfunction. I am typically a 16 in Lilly and this fit as expected, though for me it was tight in the chest area, but again, that's what I would expect from this brand.

links_Review_Title: I wore this for my daughter's graduation .
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 12, but read the previous reviews and sized up to a 14. It fit perfectly. I received many compliments. I wish I could buy it.
Absolutely loved this dress. It was a great style (wrap style hid my tummy problem area) and the print was so bright and awesome. Got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress so many times!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress and wore it 5 times over 2 weeks. It was perfect for work and events and I loved how fun it was.

This dress was a last minute add on for me "just in case". I ended up loving it the most out of all the dresses I rented for the weekend. Taller ladies might find it on the shorter side, but it was perfect for me at 5'2".

This dress was the perfect combo of comfortable & flattering. The tie front added some curves to my athletic body and the extra fabric in front was great as I don't generally enjoy form fitting clothing. The fabric was great quality and the dress was the perfect length! I would definitely rent again.
This fit PERFECTLY and was so flattering. I've never tried anything Lily before, so I wasn't sure about the fit but I was so happy with it. I honestly might consider buying this one!

links_Review_Title: Fits great, ruffles give it a fun flare
links_Review_Text: The picture doesn't do it justice but this is a perfect summer wedding dress. I'm 5'2" and the length was great. The material is stretchy but still looks formal.

I love this dress! It's perfect to wear for spring. I wore it to work and felt confident and professional but still flirty and fun. It hugged my curves but in the right way. I got numerous compliments! I'll rent again for sure!

links_Review_Title: Rented for my partner's graduation ceremony! Got so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: it was so comfortable and flattering! The perfect fabric for a full bust girl
This dress is comfortable and even cuter in person. Runs pretty true to size but a little tight in the bust. Thought about buying this because it's so fun and easy.
Loved this dress so much. Will definitely be renting again. The tie at the waist that crosses over your midsection is also very forgiving.

links_Review_Title: I wore this for my Bridesmaid's Luncheon
links_Review_Text: I'm normally a 6/8 in dresses but I wore a 10 in this because it was quite short on me. I have a long torso. The dress is comfortable and the wrap is super flattering. The theme of my luncheon was ginger jars, so I enjoyed matching the decor!

links_Review_Title: I am usually not a fan of Lilly Pulitzer prints, but this dress is gorgeous!
links_Review_Text: This was supposed to be a backup dress and I absolutely fell in love with it after trying it on. It hugs you in all the right places and the faux wrap style is very flattering for the stomach area. I'm only 5'3, but this dress hit right above my knees and was the perfect length for a party. It is very comfortable to sit and move around in.
stretchy, comfortable, and flattering.
This dress was cute but not very comfortable. There's not much give to the fabric and fit small.
This dress was the perfect fit! It is super cute and I received many compliments. The colors are bright, the fit is flattering, and the length was great. I'll rent this one again!
Nice fit

links_Review_Title: Super comfy and great for hot days
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! True to size, super comfy and wrap tie is flattering at the waist. Nice that it isn't a true wrap dress; the wind won't show everybody your business! Busy pattern does a nice job of hiding imperfections. The lightweight fabric is perfect for the heat. Hit me right at the knee, but I could see how it might be short for taller ladies.
I really like this dress, and was able to fit into while 6 months pregnant by sizing up 2 sizes!

As a very infrequent Lilly wearer, I was a bit hesitant to rent this but thought it would be fun to wear while on vacation. Once I tried it on, however, I loved how it fit and that the side tie can make it hug your body in all the right places. I ended up wearing it on vacay and then a few times once I got home, including our 4th of July party! Was definitely a winner that I'd rent again. Fit was true to size, and the only watchout I'd say is it might be a tad short on taller girls - I felt like I was right on the edge of being too revealing at 5'8".

links_Review_Title: Fun Summer dress, on the shorter side. I couldn't wear to work but wore out to brunch.
links_Review_Text: Very forgiving in waist area! Loved that it had short sleeves and high neck line. Dress is short.
Lilly never disappoints but this print was to die for, the fit was amazing, and I rented it for a night out but even wore it to work. Very flattering and I loved the faux wrap front.
Beautiful deep blue colors, everything you'd expect with Lilly. Dress was not too short on my 5'10 frame. Lots of compliments and fun to wear.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable dress. I received many compliments on throughout the evening.
links_Review_Text: The dress is very pretty and comfortable. It was flattering and easy to wear.

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner on the 4th of July. I ordered a size 10 and 12. I'm usually between an 8-10 and ended up wearing the 12. The ten fit but I felt the 12 was a bit more comfortable. I have broad shoulders and liked the loser fee across my shoulders and bust. It was very comfortable, a light material which was perfect for a hot summer night. I got a lot of complements and would rent again!

Wore for a friend's baby shower - excellent fit! Shoulders were easy to work with and the length of the jumpsuit was great for my longer torso! I usually have trouble with getting jumpsuits to fit. The fabric was pretty thick so very forgiving! Must-rent!

The only reason why I didn't wear this was because I felt like I need to be more dressed up for the event. I really wanted to keep this to wear it to something else! I will certainly rent it again! It was very comfortable and I felt like I could move my arms around without losing my top. I'm 5'9" and ordered a M and felt like the length was great for me. I would highly suggest renting this! The blue color is very attractive and eye catching.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color and love the sleeves
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect - I'm usually a size XS or 2. Stayed up without any issues. A bit long but works with heels. Very comfortable!

I wore this is a semi-formal work event and wanted something besides a dress. After reading some of the reviews I was a little nervous to try it, but I loved it a lot. I'm heavy chested and it fit perfectly. The sleeves stay put which is great while running around. It's a great color, fitted but not too tight and has pockets! Give this a try!

links_Review_Title: Very cute, but ran big for a petite girl
links_Review_Text: I loved this jumpsuit, and still wore it, but I wish it was just slightly shorter in the torso. I feel like if I was maybe and inch taller this would've worked. My friends said they didn't notice it being big on me though, so it was really for just the feel of it. Otherwise, it worked great for a January wedding, and all that was needed was a strapless bra!

Wore this on my Birthday and it looked great! This was my first RTR rental! I went to a murder mystery dinner and looked very classy, then followed with a night on the town (including fun Razor Scooter rentals). Had flexible movement, comfortable, and still dressed up for a dinner and dressed down for out on the town drinks and fun!

links_Review_Title: Daughter's Master Degree Graduation!! Fab jumpsuit.
links_Review_Text: Great jumpsuit for tall ladies. Great fit, comfortable and better than a black dress.
Dressed it up with rhinestones!

This was a great option for a fall wedding! Got a ton of compliments on the color and overall piece. It was a bit snug in the thighs, but that's also probably an effect of just my body shape. No bra needed and withstood a night full of dancing!

This jumpsuit was perfect. Usually jumpsuits fitting me are a risk because I have a booty.... so it's often too tight around hips or won't even go over my hips. This one fit PERFECTLY and I could dance comfortably all night ◡̈

links_Review_Title: I'm in love with this jumpsuit!!
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit was so comfortable, the sleeves didn't bother me in the least bit. I was able to move freely. The top is so flattering. The boning of the top was strategically placed so there was no need for a bra. IT HAS POCKETS!! The legs were comfortable and not too tight or too loose. I was able to zip it myself. I would absolutely rent this again!!
It's fine I guess, just didn't flatter me, and it would be a pain to unzip to go to the bathroom

links_Review_Title: Great alternative to a cocktail dress
links_Review_Text: Wearer Info: 5'6", Big legs/hips, Normal everywhere else, 155 lbs.; Size 6/8 normally (annoyingly in between the two sizes) Pros: Great color; Quality of material was good; Top is structured so it stays up without tape or having to continually adjust (never slipped down during dancing) Cons: Made for a tall person – I'm 5'6" and wouldn't have been able to wear if I were any shorter (torso and legs were very long) Size: Runs large. I normally teeter between a Medium/Large (6/8) and even the Medium Regular was pretty loose on me.

links_Review_Title: Had a conservative yet sexy feel to it!!
links_Review_Text: I was nervous about this because I'm only 5'4 and not sure about how the pants would fit or how it would look on me. The SR was PERFECT!!! I do have a bigger bust area and it fit good but I don't know how it would fit with a smaller bust. I loved the feel of it and the color of it. I received so many compliments that night, I would wear it again!!!
Nice fit around the legs, nice length. Wide for me at the waist, fit great all else.
It fits nice and is very comfortable. It looked as if it was an older item I had pulled from my closet so maybe not great fro a special occasion.

links_Review_Title: not so great for hourglass figure.
links_Review_Text: the tip and bottom fit ok but it was baggy/boxy in the waist area
Love the color! The top portion fit great. But the length was a little long. Overall liked!
Wore this to a wedding and was not disappointed! I received tons of compliments. It was unique, well made, and comfortable!
I felt so fun in this jumpsuit. The shoulder straps stay exactly in place. Didn't have to worry about pulling them up all night. Great outfit for date night.

I really loved this on me, however my true size was unavailable and I had to pick an alternate dress. The alternate also did not fit right. Had I received the larger size that I wanted - it would have been great and I probably would have worn it to the party.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress!! It was perfect for an evening wedding! I received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The only negative was the neck fit a bit tight.
This dress was perfect n a show stopper , fitted like s glove , got so many complements, I would def rent again !!!!

links_Review_Title: Felt amazing! Loved it so much I bought it!
links_Review_Text: This dress is incredible. Super comfortable and forgiving. Just the right about if sexy but also modest. I can't wait to wear it again!
Wore this to Rosé Mansion for a birthday party and had a blast. Only downside is the slip rides up and is difficult to pull down underneath!
This dress was the perfect wedding dress - sexy, classy, and fun while still being comfy

links_Review_Title: Absolutely perfect for NYE wedding. Gorgeous dress!
links_Review_Text: I love this dress! Gorgeous material that was comfortable all night long. Would love to rent this dress again! I wore the medium because the skirt sheath was too short on the small but otherwise the small and medium were pretty similar fit.

links_Review_Title: Perfect, comfy, sexy yet conservative. So many compliments
links_Review_Text: I actually rented this dress twice because I loved it so much. It fits so well in the waist and hip area and makes you look slim. I usually wear a size 8 pants and a 4 in a dress because I have a small top. Perfect for any dressy occasion.
Great fit, love the lace. Classic and still sexy!!!!

Talk about a LBD that's elevated! Sophisticated yet sexy. At first I was a bit nervous it would be too tight in the hips but the fabric does have a little bit of stretch. Was a hit at the friend's wedding I wore to this holiday season!

This dress was perfect! Shows a bit of skin but modestly! I wish I owned this dress. It was so perfect, even on a shorter frame. I'm 5'1 and 126 lb and I'm pretty sure I wore the medium. All my RTR dresses seem to run small but the medium fit like a glove!
Loved this dress! It was prefect for a formal wedding and the fit was just right. Would highly recommend.
Beautiful dress, very flattering. The back is only lace but I wore a strapless nude bra and no one could see it.

Great dress. Very classy and well made. I could have worn the small for a more form fitting look, but the medium fit great and was much more comfortable on the top half for movement. Would highly recommend!!
Loved this dress and received many complements. Super comfortable except the neck was a little tight. Highly recommend!

Received so many compliments. I was asked all night where I got my dress ! I was nervous about the see through portions and lining and it worked beautifully in the one size bigger. I am a medium and I felt more comfortable in the large it was too fitted through my legs and bottom with the smaller size. Fabulous dress I recommend getting one size up
I received so many compliments on this dress. It fit really well and made me feel fantastic.

links_Review_Title: Used as part of my Halloween costume !
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit! Was comfortable the entire night !
This dress was perfection!!!!!!!

links_Review_Title: Fit like a glove - but go up a size if you're curvy
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Fit perfectly so I'm glad I went up a size since it is very fitted. Be careful as the lining is not attached to the lace part - if you're dancing the lining might hike up! Also, the back is lace so wearing any type of normal bra will show. Other than that, I received so many compliments!
Elegant but sexy. Great length. I'm 5'8" so the length was perfect. I'm busty so the chest area was very snug. Overall it was too dressy for the wedding I attended but it is quite beautiful.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a million dollars in this dress! So many compliments!

links_Review_Text: Sexy but still classy enough to wear to a church wedding and country club reception. So many compliments all day long. For fitting for sure.
This dress was the perfect mix of classy and sexy and was SO, SO comfortable.

This dress was comfortable, sleek, and just drop dead gorgeous. You don't need to see it in real life to know that. But when you put it on I promise you will feel powerful. I am pear shaped and it still for great. Not very stretchy but enough give to form to your shape. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: It fit like a glove, I received a lot of compliments
links_Review_Text: The fit was great, didn't feel like it was too tight. I was able to dance and have a great time.
Very flattering dress
Wore this dress to an awards ceremony. Received so many compliments and it fit like a glove. Usually a M, but ended up wearing the L. I would definitely rent this dress again.

The medium fit perfectly however I could see some side boob, which I wasn't a fan of. So I went with the large which had more coverage in the chest and more wiggle room for dancing. It's so beautiful, sexy but still modest enough for any event.

Loved this dress and received many compliments! It runs small(er) - I am usually a size small and the extra small was perfect for me - the top could have been a little more snug tbh; other than that it was great!! Highly recommend

We had ringside seats for the Pacquiao v Thurman fight in Vegas so I wanted something classy but still with a little bit of skin (because Vegas, duh). This fit the bill perfectly. I am 5'7" and 123lbs and it fit me like a glove. The fabric and construction are very quality and I didn't need to wear a bra with it. This dress is a head turner for sure and was very comfortable. I plan on buying this because I love it so much and the compliments were endless!

I'm usually a 6/8 and thought the Medium would fit but it was snug. The large fit perfectly. This dress is also more comfortable than it looks - did a lot of dancing at the wedding and felt very comfortable- the fabric has a bit of stretch to it. Loved this look!

links_Review_Title: My bf said I was the best dressed and asked if I could find a way to buy this dress and keep it!
links_Review_Text: This dress fits like a dream, is incredibly comfortable, elegant and sexy at the same time... and I would rent it every. single. time. As we were walking to the car at the end of the night, my boyfriend literally took my hand and told me I was the best dressed at the event - then asked if there was any way I could buy the dress to keep it! I wore a tack-on bra with it, as it is backless**
This dress was beautiful! I had compliments all night. It was very flattering for this mama of two and I would love to rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! It fits perfect and is very flattering
links_Review_Text: Lots of compliments and felt amazing in it!
Beautiful dress. Showed skin in all the right places. Opted for the medium because it was more comfortable. Got a lot of complements!

As someone that wears a 36G it is basically impossible to wear a backless dress. It is also nearly impossible to go braless in anything. Spaghetti straps, strapless, plunge necklines and anything else that feels sexy is hard to make work with my body type. Pretty sure this is the first time in my life I've ever worn a backless dress and maybe the 2nd time I've gone braless. This dress is INCREDIBLE. The lace is stretchy yet tough and holds you in place and it was perfect for dancing -- moved easily and I didn't have to worry about busting out anywhere because I was held into the dress securely. I got compliments from men, women, old, young -- you name it, people loved it. It's classy yet sexy and that is a hard line to tow. Obviously I bought this dress :)

links_Review_Title: Great night celebrating our local National Guard Troops and their spouses.
links_Review_Text: This dress felt amazing. It is classy, yet sexy and very comfortable. Definitely one that makes you feel like a million bucks! Loved this dress, did not want to return it!

I wore this dress to a wedding and it fit like a glove. I was able to wear spanx underneath even with the lace cut outs. Was comfortable and easy to wear. This dress can be worn to almost any event. The neck part was a little tight but loosened as I wore it. 10 out of 10!
Wore to a gatsby themed work event! Medium fit great usually between a 6-8. Didn't need a bra. Was comfy to dance in
Love this dress and would love to own. It's the second time I've rented. Great length, lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: More beautiful than the picture shows
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful and comfortable for an outdoor party on the beach. The colors are gorgeous. The fit is fitted but not tight. Would rent again

As other reviewers mentioned, the material is a bit sheer. I wouldn't recommend renting this for work for that reason. It worked great for a semi formal party though! Beautiful print, got several compliments. Comfortable material with a slight amount of stretch

Sorry that the picture is so bad! I rented this dress for a rooftop Shabbat dinner party. It was more delicate and evening appropriate than I was expecting, which was perfect for my use case (was worried it would look too much like a day dress). The colored part of the fabric is a very loose knit, so there's a nude layer underneath. Still slightly sheer but fine with the right undergarments. Beautiful dress and I got lots of compliments. Always fun to rent a designer dress through Unlimited just because I can!
Would not wear to work (was hoping too) as is very skimpy in coverage and fabric. It is fabulous for going out. Sexy, Missoni!

links_Review_Title: Too short and tight for work, but I wore it anyway!
links_Review_Text: I love missoni and this dress is extremely comfortable, well made. It is a bit too short for work but since I had no where else to wear it, I wore it to work anyway with flats.

Wore this to my son's high school graduation, it's extremely comfortable and flattering. The colors are beautiful. I'm 5'8 and the length was perfect. Can be dressed up or down, I paired it with wedges and a jean jacket to make it a bit more casual. It has some stretch. It doesn't have any built in structure and is somewhat sheer, so I wore a nude Spanx slip under it. I'm hanging on to this one for a while! Perfection!

Wore to a work event where I was speaking on a panel. Paired with buds pumps and a brown sweater. Beautiful detail work and loved wearing the dress. It runs a little right in the hip area - so if you're curvy you might want to size up.
Awesome dress for everyday
You can see through the mesh material, would of been awesome for beach.

Loved this dress - sizes up based on reviews and hoped that a less form fitting size would make up for the sheerness and it worked! Was able to wear this dress for a date night and to the office with a blazer. You can't really tell it's sheer if you stick w nude underwear
Great dress. Love the fabric. Pairs well with an ivory blazer for work. Many compliments.
This dress hides nothing, FYI.

links_Review_Title: Dress was see thru needed attention to proper underware if used in photos
links_Review_Text: Fit well great colors for dress up or down fabric has give
The colors work together so wonderfully. It's a great dress.

links_Review_Title: loved it. wore it with a short denim jacket.
links_Review_Text: prefect fit and length for me, honestly I cannot remember the size in European sizes. I usually get a 10

I'm not sure how anyone wore this to work, or anywhere out in public. The size 10 is completely sheer. It would be more appropriate to wear as a beach cover up than a dress for work. Very disappointed
Hugs body and lightweight for hot days

links_Review_Title: Too see thru to wear to work. It was a very sheer material. I can't imagine wearing it anywhere.
links_Review_Text: I did not wear it as it was inappropriate for work. Very sheer.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Wore to a wedding. Lots of compliments. So much better in person.
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit on hourglass shape.

links_Review_Title: nothing but compliments, and so very comfortable!
links_Review_Text: so easy to slip on, with or without light sweater
Fun, easy to wear and more flattering than it looks to be in the photo. Comfortable all evening. Would rent it again
Super beautiful but runs really small!
Fit great. Very flattering
I wish I would've listened to the other reviews! This is actually wayyy tooo small. I had to see hooks into the back and lace it up with ribbon. I ordered a 6, I wish I would've got a 10

I really like this dress. I think a 12 may have been too big on the top but perfect at the bottom. Overall, because it is so figure flattering, I give this 5 stars. I think I will need help in the ladies room though but who cares, it's a family event. :) I didn't size up because it wasn't available. Won't be eating till the event to make sure I eat at the wedding.
Beautiful, elegant and flattering. Runs small! I'm usually a size0 and the size2 fit like a glove. I would suggest going up a size! Loved this dress!
Loved this dress! BUT it is tight. Like hard to sit/walk tight It looks great on but don't expect to be dancing all night because it is so tight! So glad i ordered a size up!

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress the first time, I rented it again
links_Review_Text: This was my second time wearing this dress for a black tie wedding. This time, I actually wanted a different option and rented 5 (yes 5) other options. I didn't like them as much as good ol faithful black tie dress and came back to this one and rented it as a replacement (thanks for saving the day RTR). I am hippy, have a booty, but normally a size 4-6 dress. I wore the 10 but probably could've done the 8 mostly due to the chest (I think I wore the 8 last time). It's a keeper.

The dress fit like a glove . Recommend sizing up by 1-2 sizes. I'm normally a 8 or 10 but wore the 12 to get it over my hips. Received tons of compliments on the dress! Would rent again in another color.

Loved this dress it made me feel like a princess lol and it wasn't even my wedding! A little tight on my bust but nothing too crazy i am a size 2 and the only issue i had was the zipper seemed to be messed up
Absolutely loved this dress! Received compliments all night. Runs a little on the snug side but great fit overall!
Loved this dress it fit wonderfully

THIS DRESS. So gorgeous and made me feel beautiful! I've never felt prettier in a dress. Hugs in all the right places and I received so many compliments. It did have some cons though, not flattering when sitting due to it being very snug. I wore it to a summer formal wedding and it was definitely a little uncomfortable and hot at times. It runs small so size up and find a bathroom buddy to help with the zipper. I would wear this dress to every event if I could! And shout out to their customer service. Helpful, kind, and so efficient!! Thank you!

This dress was great - wore it to a June wedding and received so many compliments. It fit perfectly and hugged all the right places. The only issue was that the top of the dress needs new tape to stay up as it continued to roll down throughout the night. Otherwise, such a perfect dress for many events

links_Review_Title: My great date made this event so great!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for the holiday work party I attended. It is very classy and fits very well. It is form fitting and fits true to size. It was hard to take big steps in this dress and getting into my uber was uncomfortable, so be careful of the tightness in the legs. Overall a great dress that I'd rent again!

I loved this dress! A classic LBD. It was a simple and elegant style for a New York wedding. It hugged all my curves and the fabric is thick which is nice. I did opt for Spanx just to hold in and flatten the tummy area. I am also a little short (5'3") so it fell right above the ankles - I think it would have looked even better had I worn taller heels. There is not much "give" around the bottom of the dress so walking up stairs was a challenge. Add a nice statement necklace and this dress received tons of compliments!
Loved everything about this dress! Perfect for short and curvy ladies as it accentuates every curve you have in the best way. Great for a formal wedding. Only recommendation is to size up!

this dress runs small! i ordered up based on other reviews. i am a 6/8 and ordered both the 10 & 12. ended up going with the bigger size (more breathing room) but the 10 could have worked in a pinch. wore a strapless bra and spanx (def needed shape wear!). gorgeous, simple, and classic. very comfortable. would most certainly rent again!
Fit like a glove! A little hard to walk in because its tighter around the knee area, but over all awesome dress! So flattering.

links_Review_Title: Perfect black dress for a formal event!
links_Review_Text: Great fit and gives a great silhouette!
The dress runs small, I wish I had a size 8 to wear but got the 6 to zip up without wearing a bra. Overall is beautiful and form fitting, great for a special night.

links_Review_Title: Dress came in on time. I love that I can order two sized to see which fits best.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit great! I loved it. It is a little tight at the bottom, but nothing that bothered me too much. I would wear it again.

Loved this dress! Felt like a million dollars wearing it. It was elegant and sophisticated but sexy enough to show my hourglass figure. I usually wear a 6 in dresses but only the 12 was available, after reading reviews I went with the 12 anyway. I’m a 36DDD so the 12 fit my chest perfectly, it could have been more form fitting in the waist and hips if I had sized down but perhaps that would have compromised the fit around my bust. Still looked gorgeous and made me feel gorgeous!!

The dress was such a hit!! I wore the size I typically wear; however, it runs a little small in the hips. I had a hard time walking up the stairs at the party but it was so knockout that I didn't mind! I would definitely rent again!
Loved the dress. Very fitted yet flattering. Was worried about the length but it was perfect.
Wore to a spring wedding. Fabric was heavy and didn't wrinkle as the night went on. The bottom flare was very flattering and great for showing off cute shoes!

links_Review_Title: This dress was amazing. I wanted to keep it forever.
links_Review_Text: This dress needed a little shapewear, but fit beautifully, was great for dancing and was Comfortable all night.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. Elegant and classic look. I got a lot of compliments. But it runs small.
links_Review_Text: It runs small and the material doesn’t stretch. Otherwise great.

links_Review_Title: Very classic and elegant look! Got tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits like a glove. Only complaint is it is a little hard to move freely in with the tightness down to the knees. I always worry about strapless dresses staying up and I did not have an issue with this one!

links_Review_Title: Felt like the prettiest one at the party!
links_Review_Text: This dress was incredible and I will totally rent it again... because it comes in other colors! It fit super well BUT: if you are not gifted up top, you might need some help. I stuffed my fiancé's socks in my bra hahaha. And, you might need help in the bathroom. If you have hips or a butt or both, this dress ain't coming up over them so you have to take it all the way off. Going up stairs was challenging because the dress is very fitted through the legs and don't expect to take long strides. Walking slower gives people extra time to eye you up and wish they had rented this dress too. :)

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress very attractive and sexy.
links_Review_Text: I received so many compliments on this stunning dress. Gorgeous silhouette was perfect for a winter wedding. I wore with a little fur shrug to the church. A little small so order up.

This dress was amazing!!! I got so many compliments in It. After reading the reviews I was worried It was going to be hard to move/walk/ dance in but I was totally fine. I'm 5'3 114lbs with a large chest and the 4R was beyond perfect for me. There were times I was pulling up the top but I feel like that's the case for every strapless dress. It was so comfy and so slimming. I felt so amazing in it

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! Runs a bit small.
links_Review_Text: Very flattering, but runs small in the hips/legs. I normally wear a 4 in skirts/pants, but I wore the 6 because it ran small and I wanted to be able to dance.

links_Review_Title: I've never felt more beautiful in a dress before!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for my engagement pictures!! It was so slimming and made me feel incredible. Fits very small though, I could've worn an 8!

links_Review_Title: super comfortable and lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: loved this dress -- the midi length is super in right now and I felt like this dress was very flattering even for someone who is short (I'm 5'3'') . Was a little loose in the chest -- wore a strapless bra to keep it in place but could definitely be worth without a bra.

links_Review_Title: I loved the shape of the dress!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to my work holiday party and it is absolutely beautiful. It does run small! I ordered a 4R and had to wear it because there were no backup sizes available. Had it been a 6R, I think jt would have been slightly more comfortable. I got compliments throughout the night but it was somewhat difficult to walk in and stairs were particularly challenging. Great dress and well made though - makes you feel snug and secure AND beautiful! It shows off your curves in a flattering manner which really pulled it all together.

It was a beautiful dress... very tight!! I was swimming in the 6R, and felt snug in the 4R which I ended up wearing (5'6", 125, 32dd). You have to completely strip to use the restroom... I assumed other reviews were exaggerating, but they weren't! Not the worst thing I've ever had to do to wear a pretty dress. However, waddling up stairs / tackling them sideways is a bit embarrassing if you're unprepared. Eventually I learned to pull it up a bit to give my knees more room, then do stairs, then readjust. Overall a pretty dress and a lot of compliments, but I probably wouldn't get again. I like to dance freely!!

This was by far my fav rental from RTR. They did not have my size so they sent me a size 8 and 2 other back up dresses just in case. I ended up wearing the 8 and while it was snug, I felt like a million bucks all night. Hard to move but totally worth it. VERY flattering. No bra worn.

Rented this for a black tie optional wedding. I am usually a true 4 so I ordered a 4 and 6 based on the reviews. Both fit but the 6 was a little more comfortable. I am 5'5", 130lbs. I absolutely loved this dress. It fit great, was simple but classy and dressy enough for a formal event. Definitely recommend it!

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Didn't want to take it off!
links_Review_Text: Super comfy. Forgiving length for me, (I'm 5' 0"). No bra needed. Packed well, no wrinkles. Material thick enough to hold everything in but not too hot.

Loved the shape of this dress. It fit a little large around the mid section on me. Nothing too noticeable if you pulled it down a bit. Great length and fit surprisingly well around bust. It was a little difficult to sit in for a dinner. Would definitely recommend this dress! Very easy to dress up with fun shoes and jewelry.

links_Review_Title: Skin tight hug my Waze and made me look amazing!

links_Review_Text: Very tight, so as others have said, you have to be comfortable with that style, but got tons of compliments. Would rent again in a heartbeat.
The dress fit like a glove and was very flattering! The fabric is thick and does a great job holding everything together like spanx's.

Totally gorgeous. Definitely not for the body conscious. Got tons of compliments, thoroughly enjoyed, and would rent again. Like previous reviews have said, you definitely have to squeeze in a bit to fit your normal size, but I'm afraid sizing up would have ruined the look. Would rent my normal size again.
It's tight - but true to size. It cinched at the waist so I needed a friend to zip but fit awesome and easily slid up my back.
I always love wearing Herve's! This dress ran a bit small but I squeezed all my goodies into it. Got a million compliments and the plum color was perfect for a dress up Fall night.

This dress is skin tight. Any smaller and I wouldn't have been able to zip it. It wasn't uncomfortable but I only wore it for a couple hours to dinner and drinks. Pairs well with high boots. Definitely not for someone who doesn't like tight fitted dresses.
The fit is skin tight so if you’re not into that this dress isn’t for you.

I'm 5'9" about 110 lbs these days and even I couldn't zip the size S dress up-- how can anyone possibly fit into the XS size?? I'm shocked! Also, this is definitely a date night dress, but I guess no one is planning on eating on their date - if you can manage to squeeze in in the first place, that is- since this dress isn't forgiving in the belly area at all.
Super body con but the fabric pulls you in. Felt very confident and got compliments all night. <3
Love this dress. Well made. Struggled to zip but it's very flattering. I'm currently a size 8 and the large barely fit. To tight to be comfortable.
Size up at least 1 size. I'm usually a 6 and the medium was not even close to fitting. Skin tight is an understatement.
Such a comfortable skirt! The waistband was ruched and slimming on the waistline. The layers were fun and had great movement. Loved the length and fun blue floral print.
Love the skirt and everything, but the waistband goes up super high. I ended up rolling it down. Stretchy so good for fit and comfort. I'd rent again. More photos on IG sereinwu

This skirt is gorgeous and super comfortable to wear thanks to the stretchy smocked waistband. I did find the waistband to be really long, so I folded it in half (as shown in photo). Note that this skirt is very sheer. It's just sheer layers that are doubled up in some areas. You can't see your underwear or anything, but you can see your legs through the skirt, especially on the bottom tier where it's just a single layer. Could easily be dressed up or down!

links_Review_Title: Great print super high waist band
links_Review_Text: I love the lightweight material great pattern but I had to fold down the waist band.
Wore this 2x during the 3 weeks- great for wearing high or low. The one con is that it rolled up due to the top stretchy material.

Wore this with a black crop top for my vacation in mexico. Like others mentioned the top of the skirt does hit high up toward the ribs. But I just folded the top in a bit so it wasn't so high. The girly print and ruffles were super fun and this skirt was easy to pack for vacation as well as was light on a humid evening in Mexico

Beautiful print and chiffon/silk like but there is no lining. The print is busy enough that you can't see through really but it's an almost sheer fabric so you do risk a little. As others said, the top of the skirt through the crotch is fitted crumpled elastic, it doesn't flow out from waist, so if you're not comfortable with a very fitted style (although very stretchy and forgiving) then this isn't for you.

links_Review_Title: Fun skirt for everyday, weird fit
links_Review_Text: The floral pattern on the skirt is beautiful - I loved it. But the waistband is strange like other reviewers say, definitely needs to be folded over. And I had to wear a slip under it to wear the skirt to work, it really is pretty sheer.

links_Review_Title: All the reviews are accurate. Ran big and rode up; large waist band
Wasn't very impressed with the actual fit--it runs large and the band is VERY big (width)
links_Review_Text: Great color, wish the band was different because you need to fold and it makes it feel cheaper that way.
great
The colors are beautiful and the sheer light fabric is perfect for hot Missouri summers. As others have said, the waistband is really high but it didn't bother me.

Everyone is complaining about the long waist but I think that this might be meant to be a convertible piece. Pull this sucker up and you have a cute strapless number; wear short bike shorts for dignity's sake. Much preferred this as a dress than as a skirt.
As the other reviewers said, the waistline on it is really long. For me, I didn't want to fuss with rolling it down so I opted to return. Pretty skirt but not for me.
Light and airy skirt that can be worn a few ways. The waist part is long so it accentuated my stomach a bit but if work with a T-shirt it can easily be covered.
true to size but a bit long waisted. when i wore it highwaisted it came up to my bra. could have been worn as a dress
This skirt is so beautiful! I wore it to work with kitten heels, a black body suit underneath & a cropped black jean jacket. The only slightly awkward part is the very wide band.
Glamours top. Perfect for an evening out. It is warm, perfect for a chilly evening.
Such a beautiful piece, compliments galore! Fit was TTS but note, it is short - this skirt is very high waisted and barely contained the shirt + any amount of drape.
I got so many compliments on this top - it's perfect for the holidays!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful blouse that stands out in a crowd!
links_Review_Text: I rented this blouse for a Sunday brunch that I attended. It was great for the occasion and I really stood out. I paired this with burgundy leather pants and kept the accessories simple because I wanted the focus to be on the blouse. This blouse has a lot of personality and is very pretty. Another great RTR!

links_Review_Title: Size DOWN! Hard to tuck in to high waisted things!
links_Review_Text: I'm normally a 6-8 in tops but they only had a 10 and I really wanted to wear this! Totally loved it except for the fact it's really hard to tuck into anything, would rent again in a much smaller size.

Sooo fun! I got a ton of compliments! I wore this to work with black slacks, to a casual dinner date with the girls and I paired it with distressed jean shorts (so cute!), and with white jeans to the Downton Abby premier with my mom and aunt. So glamorous and unique! Absolutely loved and would highly recommend. I am typical a 6/8 and rented the 4 bc it was available and it fit perfectly.
I rented this for a 70's theme party and although I didnt end up wearing it because it was too hot outside, its super gorg and I look forward to renting again when it cools off.

If you need a confidence boost, this is the top for you! From the moment I stepped out the car, the compliment started. I was worried this top was over the top, but it really works well in any situation. It can take you from a casual night out with the girls to a night at the Met! Size down as it's pretty flowy. Also, there's a lot of material, so it may not be ideal if you're outdoors in the heat. So find a cool place to go so you can wear this and be awesome! I may just buy this one!

links_Review_Title: Love the roomy shape of this
links_Review_Text: Such a statement piece! Very versatile I styled in a few different ways

links_Review_Title: THE PIRATE QUEEN BLOUSE OF MY DREAMS
links_Review_Text: This is such a statement top. One downside was it got gold glitter everywhere, but hey, who doesn't like a little glitter? See more of my style adventures on instagram, @doremidom! Seemed a little large to me so I'd go down a size.
Beautiful crop top. Works great with high waisted pants. I have a long torso so I wouldn't wear it with anything but high waisted pants. Dramatic collar and sleeves.

The most beautiful blouse I've ever worn. The quality is spectacular and the color/shimmer is amazing! I wore it untied and it was very comfortable. Fits true to size, but on taller people I may suggest sizing up for length. If I had ordered a 6 it would have been too short on me (I'm 5'9).

links_Review_Title: A total statement piece. I love it.
links_Review_Text: It runs true to size to a little big. The style is very billowy but is it on the shorter side so will need to be paired with high waist trousers, jeans or a skirt. I wore it with a pleated skirt and got lots of compliments.
Beautiful draping and fabric. Runs quite large so size down. Received tons of compliments. Only downside, the sleeve had a 3-4" tear.

links_Review_Title: Everyone I was out to happy hour with was asking about this top! It's definitely bold.
links_Review_Text: The sleeves are very large, but it's still fun. The fabric lays heavy around the neck, which is a bit weird. Most comfortable way to wear the top is tied at the neck.

I love this piece so much I'm thinking about buying it. It looks beautiful tucked into something high waisted I'm not a fan of the cut so wouldn't wear it untucked. I received so many compliments on this piece. Definitely can go down in size since it's just overall a very loose blouse.

I am happy that I ordered this a size smaller than normal. The arms are very voluminous and on my frame, they would have been too long and far too big in my regular size. I wish that the waist tapered, but i was able to tuck it into my high waisted pants to deal with that. The only MAJOR GRIPE....there was gold glitter stuff EVERYWHERE. All over my pants and transferring on to others. But...despite all of that, i was comfortable in a hot environment and was totally memorable!

I rented this shirt for a friends Christmas party. Paired it with black jeans and it looked amazing. The fit feels a bit odd at first, as it hangs a bit heavy in the back, but you get used to it. Great for adding some glamour to your every day!
Oversized. Very elegant and edgy . Love it .

links_Review_Title: This blouse brought flare to an otherwise plain outfit.
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit. It is kind of heavy around the neck area, so if you plan on dancing, expect to sweat.

Received soooo many compliments but I thought it ran a little large. Maybe it's because I have such skinny arms but they were def drowning in seas of fabric. Or maybe that's how it's supposed to look!

I'm trying new styles in my wardrobe because my clothes are so bland. So I rented this top and it was absolutely perfect. I felt like a different woman and so confident. I would definitely rent this shirt again.

links_Review_Title: This was a lovely top. I just wanted to be bold and this but me in such a great mood all day!
links_Review_Text: It was comfortable and true to size! I am a 38 DD and wore a size 12 comfortable. I even felt like a 10 would have been sufficient too!
This top fit great and was such a fun piece to wear!
@jenuinelychi

This blouse is true to size and so fun! On most RTR items I get a 12 but I wore a 10 in this because it is over sized. It is very short (I'm 5'8" and it landed above my belly button) so plan on high waisted pants or to wear it as a crop top. The fabric is quite hot as well.

This became known as the MC Hammer Pants top with my friends -- it is a little out there, but if you wear it to the right event you can rock it! I paired it with shorts but it could also go with jeans. It's cropped but super cropped, so you can wear normal pants or shorts and not worry about skin showing.
This naturally fits large bc its flowy. I got quite a few compliments at dinner from women. My husband thought the shirt was ridiculous. Lol. It was a fun top to rent for sure.

Felt like a lion tamer in the greatest show on Earth. Not for the meek, but if you want to make a statement without showing a ton of skin, this top does this trick. I was asked 3x where I got this top when I wore it out. Flattering color, looks best with mid-rise or high-rise bottoms (cropped fit in smaller sizes). The top has volume, regardless of size. Tried the 2 on at the RTR store and went with my usual size 6 to be safe, but didn't really see a huge difference other than length.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my office christmas party
links_Review_Text: I have never recieved so many compliments on a top before like wverytime i walked into a room everyone said something right away. The shirt itself is a tiny bit cropped but long enough to wear with regular rise jeans. The fit is very boxy and loose. Material is a little constricting
Super fun but I'm pretty short and it just didn't fit quite right on my short arms

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my birthday dinner + going out and got SO many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Was a little short but not necessarily cropped, looked great with high waisted jeans. I LOVED the sleeves and the pleats. The only thing I can think of that's negative, is the collar was a bit heavy for me. It would slip down my upper back/shoulder blade area and was just a little annoying having to adjust and pull the shirt back forward now and again, but not excessively. I maybe had to 5 or 6 times, half of those being for pictures.

links_Review_Title: Everyone feel in love with this shirt and told me how pretty it was.
links_Review_Text: Love, love, love this shirt! feels good, flowy. it was a bit confusing on how to get your arms into the holes but just for a few seconds. If it's chilly out I do recommend putting another shirt underneath.
Super loose fitting which I loved! The neck ruffles can be a bit much but it's still fun. Definitely cropped!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a few holiday parties.
links_Review_Text: Fun and over the top! Def an attention getter. The sleeves are very voluminous, but the top is a bit short -- the proportions are a bit off but the overall effect is so fun.
I love this top.

I was skeptical that this would look too Shakespearian/ medieval, but was pleasantly surprised. It looks very expensive and all the measurements are perfect. I could have one one more size down because it is very billowy. Paired with black Stuart Weitzman booties, black jeans, belt, headband for a dinner party.

links_Review_Title: girls night with blue jean shorts
links_Review_Text: show stopper
Got lots of compliments

links_Review_Title: too much fabric for me it made me look fat
links_Review_Text: very pretty for a small framed person. runs big so get a smaller size

Very comfy, and pretty color but the material isn't super high quality and the fit wasn't the most flattering. Would say it runs pretty TTS. I'm a 4/6 and all they had was the medium which was a little loose but not ridiculously so.

I rented this dress for my birthday and it was very pretty. It came new with tags so it was in perfect condition. Like everything by Banjanan, the fabric is stunning and high quality. My only complaint is that at 5'4, this was a little longer on me than I like. I really prefer a midi to a maxi but I wore it with flatworm wedges and it worked just fine.
I rented this for a beach wedding, but ended up going with a different dress that was less casual. It's very cute and easy.

links_Review_Title: Cute, but know that there are 2 layers of fabric
links_Review_Text: It was surprisingly hot for a loose sleeveless dress because of the inner layer on the bottom (skirt). I'd rent again, but for cooler weather.
I love this dress. It fits well and it's a nice light, easy summer dress. The S was perfect, I typically wear a 4 in most brands.

links_Review_Title: Like a beautiful socially acceptable nightgown
links_Review_Text: So soft and comfortable. The elastic smocking makes it feel like the dress was custom sized, it just fit so perfectly. Delightful print with berries and birds.

Loved this dressed. Used it for work and everyday and it was so comfortable. Used all the way from third trimester until post partum. Had there been a better buy opportunity would have totally purchased.

links_Review_Title: great dress- super comfy and adorable on!
links_Review_Text: fit true to size!
lightweight. pretty. easy dress!

links_Review_Title: Easy breezy. Tight on large chests
links_Review_Text: This is a great dress for a hot summer day or for throwing on while you're out at the beach. It runs a bit snug on top - if you have a large chest (I'm a D) it will be tight in the chest due to the smocking. The print is very pretty and at 5'6 it hit me just at/above the ankle. It's also a little high waisted.
I wore the MR from around 25 weeks to 32 weeks pregnant. Fit was great and received so many compliments. For reference, I'm 5'3" and 110 pre-pregnancy. It still fit fine at 32 weeks 135 lbs.
This dress is SO fun. The colors and pattern are beautiful and the compliments kept coming all day long. It is a little tight on me in the armpit area, but overall a very fun dress for spring/summer.

links_Review_Title: The most cute and comfortable dress!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress and got so many compliments. Its super comfy and has pockets and is the perfect midi length. Would wear all summer if i owned it!
Fit well, nice cute dress.
Loved this dress - fabric is lovely and it's very comfortable! Perfect for breezy spring/summer weather.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but not for a woman in her 40s.
links_Review_Text: Also, if you have a larger bust, this will accentuate that. Sometimes that's OK, but I felt self conscious in this dress.

links_Review_Title: Cute but not for longer torsos.
links_Review_Text: I rented this initially in an XS which fit me like a glove but I could not sit down in it as it would choke me at the neck and give me a major wedgie. I then rented it in the S (pictured) and it didn't look as flattering but still wasn't very comfortable to sit in. I opted to wear the other two jumpsuits I rented but think this would be gorgeous on someone with a shorter torso.

I was 25 weeks and wore it for my nieces quiñce! The material was breathable and comfortable. Chest was a little big but as long as the bump had room I was happy. Got tons of compliments and was able to dance the night away.
Was very comfortable and looked great!
The bust area fits well if you have smaller boobs but it was a bit hard to sit in this jumpsuit because of the snug fit around my hips. Would wear again however!
Loved this jumpsuit. IT HAS POCKETS ladies yet. There was a BIT of waist sag but I have a smaller waist, so I fixed that up with a belt. Steppin into 2020 like !!!!
Felt very tailored ! Loved it !

links_Review_Title: Cute but Size Up if you have curves.
links_Review_Text: I have a larger booty and this was difficult to zip and not stretchy. I would recommend sizing up at least a size from your normal size if you are curvier on the bottom.

Close fitting bit not too tight. Super comfortable. The XS fit my 5’4” 115 lb frame well. Length hit just above my shoe. If you are taller it will be ankle length. Zipper in back was easy to use. I could get in and out by myself when using the ladies room! I wore this for a formal work event and it was perfect. Not too over the top but dressy. First time using RTR. So easy. The clothing was in beautiful condition. I will use again for sure.

links_Review_Title: Rented this for a work event I was in charge of, so needed something that I could comfortably move.
links_Review_Text: The top of this jumpsuit is definitely not designed for smaller-chested women, despite being a size Small. It was very gappy around the armpits and hung lower on my chest than I felt comfortable with for a work event. The backup style I rented fit even more strangely, so I had to make this one work, but it certainly was not my favorite RTR rental.

links_Review_Title: Mixed Reviews led me to order the wrong size
links_Review_Text: Mixed reviews led me to order a medium but in fact that was huge on me! Will probably re-order again in a small at some point. Pretty shape and nice fabric. But I didn't wear it because it was too big.

links_Review_Title: Very long (too long time iron on hem).
links_Review_Text: Great look! Tailored, classy but way way too long for me.

I wore this jumpsuit for a work Christmas Party. I am 6ft tall with a long torso so typically jumpsuits don't fit well. This jumpsuit fit perfectly and was very flattering. So many compliments. I am looking to purchase something similar, it was a hit!
This is a really pretty jumpsuit. It was more fitted than loose. I'm a little more long waisted than the fit allowed and therefore it pulled in all the wrong places

I haven't worn it out yet (plan to next week), but I tried it on and it fit great. Really love the way it looks and fits. It's form-fitting, yet comfy / easy to move around in. Totally great for a night on the town / party, even an evening wedding.

Purchased these right away. They are so dreamy and different--a cross between a grandma pant (very high waisted, plus the belt really screams Florida) and feminine-bohemian. Tons of compliments. Keep in mind the slit is super high so def better for a party atmosphere than, say, the office.

Wore these 3x, absolutely loved them! I originally wanted to wear them for work, but they felt just a tad too sexy for my work environment. Definitely had to wear with heels as these pants are quite long (for reference, I'm 5'7" and wore 3-in heels for a perfect length). The waist felt a bit loose for my body type, perhaps someone more straight and narrow versus curvy would fit better. But, it wasn't a dealbreaker. SO cool!!! Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Comfy, cute and so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: From the moment I put these pants on I was hooked. Not only are they super comfortable but they are cool! Got so many compliments. Was able to wear with platform sneakers because I am 5'9. Definitely sheer so keep in mind. Great alternative to jeans to dress up your life!

links_Review_Title: Loved the slit up the sides - perfect for summer!
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable, long (great for tall gals like me!), incredible shade that was perfect for a day amongst the flowers! Would rent again for work or parties/events. I wore a M, and I'm 5'10'' with a 28'' waist.

links_Review_Title: Really cute but long and waist is a little big
links_Review_Text: These are so fun and such a statement piece. However, they're pretty long (and I'm relatively tall for my size) and the waist is a bit loose. Had to pin in the waist and belt, but it didn't distort the shape of the pants. Overall, would recommend for a fun day or evening look

I rented these for my friend's bachelorette and absolutely loved them. They were so much fun to dance in and were really flattering. Highly recommend. I ended up getting a medium because some reviews said they run small. I could have been fine in the small but was able to wear the medium

This pants were amazing. I received complements all night on them. True color to the website. There are skits up the sides to about above my knees. They were surprisingly a little too big on me. There is a belt which helped. But since the belt has nothing to attach to, it slide up onto my waist multiple times. If you're in between sizes, I say order down.
Amazing feel, fit and style. Such a show stopper.

links_Review_Title: Loved the pants! So fun and so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I ordered a size 4 I thought but got a 6 which was medium. The waste was too big.

Compliments all night! Husband loved these pants! I paired them with a white body suit, wedges and gold accessories while in the Caribbean. I'm keeping these pants to wear again in Mexico! They're just super fun ...but very long! I wore super y'all wedges, I'm 5'5 and pants still grazed the floor.
These pants fit great, and I loved the flowy aspect of the slit in the pants. Color was vibrant and material was very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Fancy pants great for a day at the office & straight to happy hour
links_Review_Text: So comfortable and breathable! Belt is a little annoying which is the only reason for 4 and not 5 stars
These pants were so fun to wear! They were really comfortable and hardly wrinkled. I got so many compliments. The height was perfect for me with heels (I'm 5'7").

I LOVED these pants. So many compliments. They look at k great when you are walking or standing. They look and feel a bit awkward when seated because the slots want to open wide. I would wear them again!
Fit well, comfy and flirty

I ordered these for a bachelorette party. I got compliments on them all night! They are super comfortable and were great for the hot weather location. I'm knocking off a star for the belt- required a bit of safety pinning to make it stay. Also be warned that the fabric shows all. I'm 5'9" and the pants skimmed the ground in flat sandals. Would probably look great in heels.
the fit was great. the slits were so fun!! seriously loved these. i felt sexy and fun and great. Highly recommend.
I am almost 6 feet tall and these pants fit great! I got so many compliments and felt sexy but still comfortable. If you are tall these are a MUST RENT

These pants are so flattering, and comfortable! They are on the longer side, which was great for me-- I'm about 5'11" and wore kitten heels and the length was perfect. The fabric just flowed beautifully. However, they show absolutely all "lumps" so tucking in a blouse was challenging. You definitely want to show the waist and belt, though. Spanx didn't work for me due to the high leg slit. Figure that all out and you'll love these super cool pants!

The most fun pants I've worn to date! Super fun and I got looks all night. Wore to a Christmas play and dinner and will probably wear again for NYE with a more party top. I probably could have worn the medium, but small fit great and no issues with the belt.

I wore these to an art gallery opening in Miami. Standing still, the color is an eye catcher. But when you walk - WOW! The slits open and these become sexy pants. Very long - plan to wear heels if you're under 5'11".

Loved these pants - color is amazing & the fit is very flattering. They were a little loose in the waist & the belt does not provide any assistance. Only con was the belt really did not stay in one place so I had to safety pin one side. Overall though, very pleased with the trendy style & comfort of these pants!

Super long. I had high stacked wedges and I'm 5'7 and they were still dragging a bit. Also, the attached belt is tricky and needed both safety pins and Hollywood tape to make these pants work. All that being said, these pants are worth the hassle. They are HOT and I got eyeballed all night. So many complements and lots of fun for a night out at a concert! I would buy them (and hem the length an inch) if the waist/belt wasn't such a pain.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely AMAZING pants--flattering, comfy, and a hit everywhere I went.
links_Review_Text: These pants are the perfect shade and material to work across seasons (especially if you live in Florida like me), they're ridiculously comfortable (one of the times I wore them was for 15 straight hours of work), and everyone loved them. Sooooo many compliments. I had them for over a week on my Unlimited membership and seriously considered buying them. One thing is they are very long. Great for me since I'm tall, but shorter ladies be aware.
I normally wear a 4. I ordered a large (size 10) and they didn't make it over my quads. So disappointed. Couldn't wear.

links_Review_Title: I'm obsessed with this these. Will buy!
links_Review_Text: I am right between the Medium and Large sizes - but I prefer them a bit baggy rather than tighter on my thighs. The material is flattering when it hangs but not as much otherwise...regardless, obsessed with these.

Wore with a simple T and still was so festive. They are crazy long and I had to tack them up so as not to trip or ruin the bottom by dragging. The belt is just decorative. They were fun to wear once the length was adjusted.
Did not fit.
Great pants but never wore them bc weather changed...would tent again.
No cons. Fits perfect
These were too thin for me and showed every bump. I didn't wear. Swapped out right away.
Beautiful material but the pants were way too long, even with heels. I wasn't able to wear them.
Love this pant. It's a little long if you are 5'4" like me. I wore it with very high heels so it wouldn't drag on the floor. But the pant looks great and everyone loved it.

links_Review_Title: Big and slit is so high , but had potential
links_Review_Text: Couldn't wear these to work bc the slit was so high -- but at the right time and occasion, they'd be cute. Maybe size down?
These pants are showstoppers!
These fit in the waist fine but I couldn't wear them because the pants were too long. I am 5'7" and didn't want to wear heels. They may have worked for me if I wore platform wedges.

links_Review_Title: To die for fabric, too sexy for work
links_Review_Text: These pants were gorgeous! A little too long on me and the slit went up pretty high. That being said the quay was amazing!
The material is thin and shows everything. The slit goes up mid-thigh. Maybe good for a party, but not good for everyday wear or workwear.

I'm tall, so these weren't quite long enough for me, but they were so much fun to wear. Nothing I would ever buy, but I loved having them on. There were some unflattering angles looking straight on and the belt would ride up sometimes, but overall I liked these pants.
These pants were gorgeous but way too long

links_Review_Title: Unable to go: COVID!! But i tried it on at the store and LOVED it. Will so rent this again!!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a dream and was so flattering - just an incredible feel and it felt almost tailor made for me. Athletic build, busty and the size 8 fit perfectly!
The length was nice-- felt comfortable all night without tugging at the hemline. Sexy neck and choker detail. I wore minimal jewelry and black heels. Compliments all night!
I received a ton of compliments on this dress. Fit well without feeling too tight. I would rent again.
Stunning dress! Classy, comfortable. I would haven normally rented a 10 and based on reviews went up in size. Glad I did, especially if curvy. Compliments all night. Rent it!

I loved this dress and turned heads all night! It was comfortable and super flattering. I'm large chested (36 DDD) and no bra was needed. I didn't want the night to end because I didn't want to take the dress off. Considering buying it or renting it again ASAP. Maybe my favorite unlimited rental!

links_Review_Title: Great LBD with a little extra something
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for a work awards banquet and loved it. Much more because detail in person than in photos.
Absolutely loved this dress! Perfect for a holiday party. Countless compliments and was comfortable all night long. Very flattering for a curvier body type, too!

I absolutely love this dress! The fit was nearly perfect. I love that the sleeve weren't too tight. The perfect amount of cleavage. I received so many compliments. It had me feelin' myself. 10/10! I would definitely rent again!

This dress was so comfy, flattering, and nice. I wore it to a Christmas party, and got a lot of compliments on it. The collar was a little loose, but really that's fine. The sleeves were not itchy at all. I want to buy this dress. It's unique but still an LBD. Rent it!!
Beautiful detailing and cut. Ran true to size. No stretch to the fabric. And just enough cleavage. Great length. I'm 5'7" hit an inch or two above the knee.
Great dress. Only issue was it was too low cut in the front for me so I had to find something to wear under.

I'm 5'1, so the dress was a little longer than expected, hitting below the knee when I was standing but appropriately short when I was sitting. The dress is beautiful and was super comfortable all night. Flattering and feminine without too much cleavage. My only issue was that the sleeves were a little constricted when I tried to put my arms over my head while dancing.
Felt so classy and beautiful in this! Super comfortable and such a gorgeous pattern.
This dress was great! The size 4 fit perfect. The sleeves were not too tight on my arms (an issue I have). I wore it for an October wedding in the Midwest- kept me from freezing.
