Love the way it fits and hugs my curves in the right places and is not too short. The sleeves are not restricting and doesn't show too much cleavage. Can't wait to wear it out for a bachelorette night in Hollywood next month.

links_Review_Title: Being told that I look hot!
links_Review_Text: Comfortable dress, with pretty details, recieved lots of compliments.
This dress was just gorgeous and fit like a glove. Fully lined and comfortable. Fits true to size. Received many compliments. Definitely another Rent the Runway SUCCESS!!!
I look and feel beautiful, good quality, fit comfortable, but I zise dawn, I usually wear zise 10.
I loved this dress, but I cannot decided for the life of me if it's black or navy. I got tons of compliments. I highly recommend!

This dress fit me like a glove! I was worried about it being tight on my thighs because I'm very much hour-glass shaped, but it was perfect. I wore it to a work party, and it was both professional and fun. I got compliments all night and am now debating buying this dress! Rent it, you won't regret it!
I wore up a size so it wasn't fitted and it was perfect.
Wore this for a fancy date night- I had a hard time sitting down in it cause I'm 5'10" and it's reaaaaaaaaally short, but it was super cute!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to my white coat ceremony. It was a beautiful dress and it fit perfectly.
links_Review_Text: fit was perfect. showed a bit of cleavage but I think it was fun and glamorous at the same time.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for an event where I wanted to look cool but not inappropriate or boring.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'9 and busty (32DDDD) and that makes it hard to find dresses that fit me. For this event, I needed to be able to volunteer without showing too much cleavage or too much thigh. At the same time, I didn't want to look matronly or have the same dress as anyone else. Style-wise, this fit the bill for me and it fit very well. I got a lot of compliments and felt very comfortable all evening, whether sorting through registration packets leaned over a table with my back to people or on the dance floor at the end of the night. I wore it with gold earrings and stockings and pumps, but when the pumps got uncomfortable I ditched them and the stockings for black sandals.

links_Review_Title: I wore for a gala and it was a hit! Complements left and right! Definitely recommend!
links_Review_Text: Great fit for me and my height! Loved that it covered me up on the right places! I had so many complements!

links_Review_Title: I got a million compliments on this!
links_Review_Text: I am the person on the right (obviously)... and don't mind my stupid nametag! I never write reviews, but I am a tall girl and I rarely find dresses that aren't too short. This dress fit perfectly and was a great length. I am 5'11 (~6'2 in heels) and this was perfectly appropriate for a work function. The cutout on the top is perfect- just a little sexy, but not revealing at all. Loved this dress!

The compliments that I got from my husband when I put the stress on her unlike any other. He has not seen me dressed up in a little while but the way the stress of it was extremely flattering and made me feel amazing. I absolutely love the neckline not too much just a touch of sexiness

links_Review_Title: Felt like an ice skating princess!
links_Review_Text: I wanted something vibrant but age and length appropriate for a more conservative wedding. This is a really chic and unique piece that I would def rent again!

links_Review_Title: Loved how I felt in the dress and received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit was great, the cut out was the just the right amount of hot, and it was really gorgeous on.

links_Review_Title: More special than a typical LBD
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a movie premiere and it was perfect. It was very comfortable and flattering - I don't think you could ever see my little belly. It was great that I could wear a normal bra. The lace did not catch on anything which was a relief and it was not itchy at all (I have very sensitive skin). The length was great - right above the knee. I have long arms and the sleeves were fine. I am usually a 6 or an 8 and the 8 was perfect. I am a 34B and the cutout looked great (I think it would fit a bustier girl, too). I'm 5'6", 150 lbs.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Fits true to size. I thought it looked better in person than in pictures.
links_Review_Text: Great dress! Fits true to size. I thought it looked better in person than in pictures.

I had ordered this as a backup style to my original choice just in case and it ended up being my top pick. The dress fit perfect, was classy with a bit of sass, and enough cleavage to make hubby grin. I got lots of compliments throughout the night!
It was super comfortable, flattering, and I got compliments all night!

Loved this dress! It fit like a glove, was the perfect length and showed just the right amount of cleavage. Edgy but beautiful, it was comfortable and didn’t ride up. Would definitely rent this one again! I didn’t want to take it off! I wore it with black patent heels and gold leaf earrings.
Showed off the girls but gave enough room everywhere else to not be uncomfortable. LOVED it!! Gold underlay was beautiful & I paired it with KENDRA SCOTT Black Danielle Earrings
I liked the dress. Had no complaints. The 8 was fine, but the 10 was more comfortable.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress and felt very fancy but not overdressed
links_Review_Text: The sleeves are a little short but good if you are going to dinner because longer sleeves would have difficult. I could have worn the size 8 but it was tighter and since we were going to a broadway show I wanted to be comfortable sitting . The sleeves are an open lace so plan for that in cooler weather. There is very little stretch to the fabrics so the 10 was better. I like being able to wear a bra with fancy clothes and this was no problem. I felt perfectly dressed for the occasion.

The lace was so soft, and well-made. Definition in all the right places. Had a great keyhole front and detail around the neck. The gold yarn is incredibly subtle. Definitely recommend this for any cocktail event.
Great dress for parties. Very comfortable, elegant, and fun.
Beautiful dress that is flattering and great for a wedding. I received a ton of compliments!

Plenty of arm room for a long sleeve dress. I had no problem zipping it even though I have a bust. I wore spanx as it hugged my lumps. I got so many compliments and it was very different to the other versions of sequin dresses. It's much more colorful than it looks in the stock picture.

Well made dress that impressively changed color with the angle of lighting showing on it. With its somewhat stretchy fabric, It's forgiving in the waist (I'm in my second trimester), without making the bottom part of the dress ride up which was nice. I would def rent this again.

Wore this for a NYE party and I received so many compliments from strangers telling me that they loved this dress! The dress is a very shiny and will catch a lot of attention. My only complaint would be that the dress runs a little tight in the belly area so from the front it highlights any belly.

Fit was as expected. I had to wear a minimizing bra in order to fit (34E) which is not surprising. Maybe a 10 would have fit me better but I suspect it would not have for my waist or hips if it fit m bust Compliments all night. Comfortable, not scratchy Feels amazing
Worn this for a wedding where sparkle attire was requested. I got so many compliments and has so much fun In this dress. Everyone wanted to flip the sequins.

I rented this gorgeous dress while my husband and kid went camping. I'll be dammed if that isn't an excuse for sparkles!! I planned a ladies night out @ a local champagne bar - we were WAY overdressed and no fuqs were given. Dress looks & feels fantastic. No itching/scratching, lined w/a touch of stretch & warm enough for SF fall with no coat. I got compliments from the moment I stepped out of the house & it's just fun to touch (flip sequins). Styled with black stud heeled sandals & gold bag.

Such a fun dress! The sequins are different colored on each side, so it was a color-changing dress. It was such a fun party trick too, my friends couldn't stop petting the dress. I have broad shoulders so I had to size up to fit them, meaning the waist and hips on the dress were a little over-sized. Even then, the dress was a showstopper.

links_Review_Title: Dress was perfect for semi formal rainbow theme banquet. Definitely made a statement.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect. Fun for function. Comfy to dance in!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! This dress is guilty of breaking necks all night! I felt amazing in it! Just get it!
links_Review_Text: #bougieonabudget

links_Review_Title: "I saw you from across the room!"
links_Review_Text: ^ The number one compliment I received. This dress speaks for itself, and is also super comfortable (it's fully lined and also has a small slit at each sleeve to keep the sequins away from your wrists). Well designed...and as kinetic as they come - the mermaid sequins were a big hit! Would absolutely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Felt like the belle of the (80s metal) ball
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for an 80s metal-themed gala at an art museum, and it was absolutely perfect. I go to 10-15 formal events every year, and this was hands-down the most complimented dress I've ever worn. The sequins really are exquisite, and they stood out, even in a sea of 80s extravagance. The fit and fabric is just perfect--there's enough give to fit many figures, and the sequins smooth everything out and hide any flaw. I have a thicker midsection and heavier arms, and neither was an issue at all in terms of fit. The dress was super flattering! It's on the shorter side, which I like, but it might not be for you if you're tall and prefer something closer to knee-length. I'm also a true 12 and was glad I had the 14. I would absolutely wear this again!
I got lots of love wearing this dress! Compliments everywhere!
This dress is phenomenal!!! Best rental yet!!! I received compliments ALL night long! I would definitely rent this AGAIN!!

links_Review_Title: The dress looks beautiful super good quality, but runs too big.
links_Review_Text: Celebrating my friend's bday and the theme was sparkles.
Loved this. Went up a size so I wouldn't need to wear Spanx. Fully lined so very comfortable to wear. Everyone wanted to stroke the sequins to see them change colour.

This dress is so much fun! All the sequins flip both ways! The dress is so well made and actually very comfortable. No weird bra issues either since it has the long sleeves and regular back. I rented this for a Mardi Gras themed fundraiser and it was perfect! So many compliments. I was sad sending this one back!

links_Review_Title: This dress was absolutely amazing! Received lots of compliments-It was super fun and sexy.
links_Review_Text: True to size. Reversible sequins!!
The colors are beautiful and got so much attention and compliments from strangers. Wore it for dinner and a show in Chicago. Felt great in it all night.
This dress was incredible! The multicolor and reversible sequins made the dress unique at every angle and under different lighting. I did not want to give it back.
I'm 5'2 and felt like it was a little long.

links_Review_Title: Fabulous "grab and go" dress. It fits great, needs no adjustments and no crazy bra situation.
links_Review_Text: Expect everyone to want to touch your dress! The double-sided sequins are so fun and memorable.
What an amazing dress! I wore this for NYE and it was absolutely perfect. You can't go wrong with this designer. Highly recommended!

Some backstory: I got this a few months ago through Unlimited just to try it on as my month was ending and I felt like trying on something outrageously fancy and I didn't plan on continuing my subscription. I loved it so much, I re-upped for Unlimited (since the cost of that was cheaper than renting it for one weekend) and as soon as this dress became available again I snatched it up! I think it was hanging in my closet, taking up a slot, for over a month before New Year's but it was 100% worth it. The array of colors on this dress made me feel like I was wearing dragon scales (so. freaking. cool.) I got complimented left and right all night. The fit was perfect, it was tight, and I'm self conscious, but the dress is so thick that it didn't feel like it was clinging to every bump, instead it was like a sheet or armor, grazing my curves in the best way. Speaking of armor, the dress is heavy, and very warm. Which works for New Years Eve but not so much for a June gala if you get me. Also, it is very short, especially when you sit down, so keep that in mind (I love showing off my legs :P ). I fit anywhere from a 14-18 depending on the designer and material and this was a perfect fit at 18, my huge boobs did not feel squished at all. Highly recommend for a night when you want to make a crazy impression. A+

links_Review_Title: Dazzling! Tons of compliments! Thank you, RTR!
links_Review_Text: This is the most gorgeous dress! The sequins change color depending as you run your ha hand over them, from a rich coral to deep royal blue with gold interspersed. It is so comfortable, with a black lining throughout, no scratchiness whatsoever. I wore it both with and without a bra, as the bust is fitted in a nice way. I went to three different parties and even strangers stopped to comment on my beautiful dress. It may be a little short for some, but since it is basically a full cover up otherwise, it was just right for my events, one of which was a law firm holiday dinner. My measurements are 42-31-36 and it was not clingy at the waist, which I appreciated. Thank you RTR for this fabulous dress! I am wearing it a couple more times with completely different crowds and events, so after about four or five wearings on my unlimited membership, will happily send it back and enjoy the memories. And the photos!

links_Review_Title: Showstopper and head turner - a must rent
links_Review_Text: This was the most beautiful, rich, stunning and sexy gown. I felt like a million dollars and got so many compliments. This is a statement dress. The colors are so rich and the changing colors of the sequence makes the most unique pattern. It was comfortable, not heavy at all and fit me like a glove - not too tight, just right. You will be the star attraction in this dress.

links_Review_Title: Best Dressed at a holiday gala!
links_Review_Text: This dress is a showstopper! A member of Congress told me I was the best dressed lady at the gala! Size down 1 size for this dress. Length was perfect for me at 5'10"
It looks like a ball of flames and light. I loved it!

links_Review_Title: I lost count on the number of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Glamorous and fun dress that I wore for a large reception. Comfortable despite being all sequins, and it worked for my apple body. I could make it dominantly blue or orange (or all mixed up). I'd rent it again, except that it was so memorable.
Wore to a gala with a purple/glitter theme. This dress was perfect

links_Review_Title: This is the least scratchy sequin dress that ever existed. I could sleep in it!
links_Review_Text: The best sequin dress I've ever worn. Perfect fit for hourglass women like myself with small top and medium bottom.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! No stretch, so be prepared. Got a MILLION compliments!

links_Review_Text: Fits me perfectly
This is cute, but a little too disco queen for me. Good for winter events, NYE. I am exchanging it for a more subdued dress.

I didn't love this dress- it was good not great. It didn't flatter my figure or hug me in the right places and the color was not quite right for my complexion. I'm 5'10 wear a 6/8 and am blonde with fair skin and an hourglass shape. I liked the silver sequin dress with black zipper by Dress the population much better on- which I didn't expect.
I absolutely loved this dress. It was shimmery and perfect. I got tons of compliments
Wore this to a girls night watching Mariah Carey. Perfect for this. Had so many compliments that night.

This was my first RTR experience and everything about it was amazing. The dress arrived early and I was able to wear it twice - to a girls' trip to Vegas and to a NYE party. The dress got rave reviews at both with multiple people stopping me to say how much they loved the dress. I loved how comfortable it was, not constricting, and how I was able to change the look with the double sided colored sequins. Gorgeous!

This dress was everything! Well constructed and looks and feels like luxury. Fit perfectly the only complaint is the zipper gets stuck. I didn't take pictures the night of the event but had to get a photo.
I rented dress. Dress has some stretch but runs small. The colors are beautiful but is a little too shiny for my liking.
Not flattering to my figure and a bit too colorful for me . Not worn. Well made and would be great in cold weather.

I needed something that I could would travel well on the plane & I could wear to work when I arrived, because I had to go straight to work. My photo doesn't do it justice. I left cold weather & arrived in LA, so I paired with black leggings, ankle booties & a black long sweater. Didn't wear the sash, as I found it didn't work well in me. I got lots of compliments on the dress. It was cute but starting to show some signs of wear. Looked slightly dingy to me but friends said they didn't notice it.
Liked it...it's a bit busy so as long as you keep everything else simple it can be a good one time look. This is a perfect rental because it's kinda too much to keep on repeat.
Love the details, the fit, and the comfort. I would rent it again! I probably could have sized up or down and been able to pull off the various fits.
Got tons of compliments on this fun little embroidered dress. Very comfy & light! Loved it.

Rented this for a vacation and wore on the plane because it was very comfortable. I am usually a size 4 and really should have ordered an XS instead of a small. It was huge on me and I am not a petite height. The belt helped create shape but still felt very large. Beautiful design though! Got a few compliments

This dress was so comfy, partly because it's extremely loose and flowy. I wore it to a winery tour and it was very comfortable in the heat, lightweight but thick material. A little tent-like, so be aware if that shape isn't particularly flattering on you.

It felt a little baggy until I realized it came with a belt in a smaller bag! Wish I had realized that originally (duh!). Anyway, I got so many compliments, even from my father-in-law who would normally never comment on what I was wearing. It's such a gorgeous and special dress but still perfect for daytime.

Relaxed fit, drop waist. Gorgeous colors (deep burgundy embroidery- but still appropriate for spring/summer). All cotton so it's super breathable which is perfect for the swamp heat of Florida. You do need shorts or neutral-colored underwear bc the fabric is thin enough to see-through the fabric; enough embroidery on the chest that it doesn't matter what color bra. Would love to own this dress.
This dress fit perfectly! I wore it on vacation and got several compliments on it. The belt is detachable, so you can wear it with or without the belt. The fabric is suitable for warm weather.
Rented this for a trip to New Orleans. I wore it without the belt, but the fit is generous. Probably could have sized down

links_Review_Title: Dressy yet comfy and gets compliments
links_Review_Text: Wore multiple times. Love that it comes w a belt.

links_Review_Title: Looks very awkward for busty girls
links_Review_Text: I have a big bust and the low cut top emphasizes them in an unflattering way. There is a hook and eye closure, but of course the bust size prevents it from closing without a gap. The overall fit was boxy, even with the belt and the puffy sleeves, coupled with my overemphasized tatas made me look top heavy
Fits most body types.
Really cute dress. Not my favorite but it was cute to rent. A little longer on me than I would have liked, at 5'4" this hit just above my knee.
This dress has such amazing detail. The fabric is gorgeous.
You can wear without the belt for a loose beach dress feel or with a belt for more structured look. It went with slip on navy Vince sneakers or wedge sandals and was cute both ways
The dress was quite bulky, i recommend renting one size down. The chest lining was very deep, i had to wear it with a camisole underneath. Fabric and pattern were nice.

links_Review_Title: Unique, but prettier online than IRL.
links_Review_Text: I really like this dress. It is beautiful and unique and high quality. But the sizing is a little weird, so it's big in some places and really tight in others, like around the cuffs of the arms.
Great flowy dress that can be dressed up or down. If you are really busty the hook at the chest might gap, but I wore it unbuttoned and it was totally fine!

This dress was exactly what I expected it to be. The material was AMAZING and the for was great. I have a Coke bottle shape but am a bit smaller on top than the bottom, and prefer to belt dresses so I went with an XL which was perfect (this dress has no stretchy material but does have a slight natural give). Without the belt I could've gone with a L but even without the belt I still got many compliments.

This dress is way better in person. It is a comfortable linen blend that hangs beautifully. Can be worn with or without the belt (no belt loops so belt is optional). I wore it several times on vacation and got tons of compliments. Loved this one.
My favorite dress from RTR so far! Wear with or without the belt and its absolutely adorable. Very well made piece!

This was a really easy dress to wear. The embroidery and detailing was just gorgeous - clearly a high-quality dress. The belt was a bit odd with the dress and I chose not to wear it most times. I would definitely rent this again.

Read the reviews and decided to size down. I should have gone with my correct side. The dress was too tight around my busy, I'll try my regular size because aside from the fit the dress was very cute for the summer.

LOVED this dress!! Wish I had kept it but it was just a bit too expensive. The material was light and perfect for a summer evening. The pattern was soooo cute and I actually loved the bottom part, which I wasn't sure would be flattering on me. All in all this is definitely one of my all time fave RTR pieces.
Cute, fun dress. Wore with and without the belt on vacation and at work.

So comfortable! It was perfect to wear and still feel summery but good for travel to a move conservative country since I could button the top portion up high. It's also cotton so nice and breathable. The embroidery is nice and I love all the tassels. I would buy this one if I could afford it. It's a great dress!

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Great, easy fit and great design
I rented this dress for vacation in Scottsdale. It was adorable, lots of compliments and perfect length - would totally rent again. Does require ironing though.
Can dress up or down and can adjust length with belt - too cute!
I adore this dress. It is so comfortable and the quality of the material is amazing.
Perfect dress for vacation or spring/summer! Can dress it up or down, very comfy and true to size.
Super sweet dress! Really cute and considered buying.

I love the style of this dress, but it hardly has a shape. I ordered up a size because everything I order of RTR runs small for me. However, this one might be true-to-size, or larger. I'm a pear shaped, size 14, curvy with a booty. This dress almost made me look pregnant because of its shapelessness. It didn't work for me, but might be cute on someone else.

links_Review_Title: Perfect wedding dress for any season
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable, easy dress to wear. Could've worn it in any season, but wore it for an outdoor summer wedding. Fits great.

This was true to size (6). I liked that it was flowy and was cinched at the waist. The ruffle details at the bottom of the dress gave it a little oomph. This paired well with nude heels and fun earrings. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner last May. I would definitely get this again for any other type of event, because it's easy to dress up or down.

links_Review_Title: Felt flirty but sophisticated; A little bulky
links_Review_Text: I loved how this looked and felt, with a few caveats. It's high quality fabric, heavy construction, and a lovely pale pink. However, it was a little looser than I would have liked, and the lining tended to bunch a lot around where the waist cinches. This was actually visible at the waist and affected the draping in an awkward bulky way. That said, I did feel great in it and would consider renting again.
This dress was so comfortable and flattering. I loved its flirty look and the fabric was great. Was complimented all night long.

I received tons of complements on this beautiful blush colored dress. It was super comfortable and fits true to size. The cut is flattering, and I had no worries about looking bloated on the dance floor after dinner and drinks! I would size up for the backup--the four would have been too small for me.

I wore this dress to a wedding and if you, like me, are hesitant on renting this because some pictures show it as close to white...IT'S NOT! Thank goodness. It's a nice pinky beige. This dress fit pretty large - I wore the 10 (normal size) just because I ran out of time to change back into the 8, but the 8 fit better overall. Super comfortable and not too short either!
I always have the best luck with Halston Heritage. They fit so true to size and are always comfortable. This dress was fun and flirty and I highly recommend it to anyone.
Gorgeous dress! Didn't wash me out like I thought it might. Great quality! Definitely will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Forgiving dress...eat all you want and still look great!
links_Review_Text: Wish I had a better pic to share, but the point here is that all these pleats make this dress easy to wear. I dressed it down with a denim jacket and booties and also wore it with heels for an evening out. Loved both looks, and the soft pink goes great with the Tory Burch tote. It was a little bit of a pain to wear on a breezy day, but was long enough to wear with confidence through airport security screening. The only negative is that the armholes were larger than I would have liked, but I was also wearing at least a size larger than normal (because that's all that was available). Easily size down or up with this dress...very forgiving!
Loved this dress. Wore to work with a jean jacket and then wore again with no jacket for brunch. Really pretty, comfortable

Wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner, and must say, I wish I saved it for the wedding! Fits beautifully (true to size), and the pleats, neckline, and funky bottom make it very flattering. The blush color is perfect for spring events, and I got tons of compliments.

The quality and fit of this dress are incredible. It's just so pretty! I layered it with a demon jacket to make it more casual but it can definitely be worn to a wedding or more fancy occasion. Love it!!!!!
I should have gone down a size so it was a little loose, but I don't think it's the dress -- I just needed a size down. Extra lining added for coverage -- overall great dress!

links_Review_Title: Brunch birthday event. So comfortable didn't have to worry about anything falling down, rising up!
links_Review_Text: True to size, had to wear the stick ons for bra option (hate strapless), length was perfect I'm 5'4" - no complaints at all.

links_Review_Title: It coordinated perfectly with my hat for a Derby themed gala
links_Review_Text: It is a little low under the arms, but I loved the dress and would rent it again!

This was my first RTR experience and I can say I will definitely order for future events! I'm in between sizes right now so for this dress I ordered my "old" normal a 4 and a 6. The 4 fit great, didn't even need to try the 6. The only reason I didn't give this dress 5 stars is because I'm so short, the top of the dress hung a bit awkward and loose on my back. This could have been an easy fix if the dress came with adjustable straps but still, loved wearing this dress, I received a few compliments throughout the night and it was so comfy to wear.
Loved this dress! Perfect fit. Felt confident wearing it for a night out.

links_Review_Title: Back up dress I wore to church
links_Review_Text: This is a back up I rented for my bridal party. I ended up going with the other one I rented that was white. And wore this one to church. This one is comfy and I like that it's not extremely short. The length was great and i am both chesty and have a big butt. I typically wear a size 12/14 in dresses because my chest is a 38G. This was great I didn't even feel frumpy.
Wore this to a casual lakeside wedding and it was perfect for the occasion. Got so many compliments.
Wore this when I hosted my sister in laws baby shower! It was very comfortable. Great length as well
I loved the color, the style, the material, the cuteness.. everything about this dress! I debated keeping it. It was a good length since I'm tall and fit nicely.
Wore this dress to a baby shower. It was a great fit. I was worried it would ballon around the middle but that wasn't the case at all. Compliments from everyone. Wish it were mine.
Loved it! Wore it a few times on vacation, many compliments ... covers all the right areas...

links_Review_Title: The event was just a Gatsby-themed Christmas party. :-)
links_Review_Text: This dress is a good option for "flirty" and feminine look. It is flattering in many ways, although for some bodies and styles, it might not be the ideal look. What I loved about the dress was that it was in good condition and looked crisp/fresh. It didn't have any telltale signs of being a "rental", which concerned me after seeing other dresses on this site being reviewed as clearly worn or having been exposed to repeated dry cleanings. It wasn't fussy or difficult to wear - in fact, the blouson feature can camouflage any bloating or stomach concerns. But at the same time, it can add a little bulk when you may prefer a more fitted look. That is the style of this dress, so it's not a flaw. Overall, this would be good if you: - like your upper arms and shoulders; - don't intend to show off your six-pack (it hides your abs, for better or worse); - like softer colors, and don't want to make a big color "splash". My concern about RTR: I dislike the way the dresses are sent; they are sent in a garment bag that is mailed straight in the post, without any sort of box or protective plastic outer wrap. This results in a really dirty garment bag. Even though the garment is protected inside, that bag has been in many hands, and it seems unhygienic to put it on top of your bed or couch, etc. That specific detail surprised me. Seeing the garment bag lying on my doorstep, which could have had rain, bugs, etc - was gross to me.
I wore this in an 8 and I felt like it fitted fine but I'm a 6 so maybe the 6 would have been too small

Talk about a show-stopper! This dress has a nice elastic waist band for comfort and if you have a poochy stomach, this will cover that up. I paired it with a wide belt and matching pumps for a noon open house and it was perfect. I just put bandaids over my nipples and went bra-less due to the cut of the back. Worked just fine for me. Got tons of compliments and was very comfy.

Great fabric. The top part is a little full but if you want to look great and not be self conscious and hide a bloated tummy this is the dress. Wore with black fishnets and black moto jacket to give the feminine color an edge. I would order again but probably get an 8

links_Review_Title: Flowly & Comfortable for a Cowboy Cool Rehearsal Dinner
links_Review_Text: Loved the color & material of this dress. Worked perfectly for the occasion. My only complain is the top portion of this dress. It's almost too much material which weighs it down. I was constantly having to pull it up so that it would be flattering on me. It made my chest appear a lot bigger and saggy because of the extra material. I also wore a jacket over it to get to and from the venue and it just looked like a lot of material bunched under it. Not sure I would rent again, but I think this would look better on someone with a larger chest.
Great fit and super fun!!
I got this for vacation I actually wore this on Easter in LA for brunch. Leather jacket is also from Rent the Runway!

The dress was beautiful and just what I expected from the photos given. The fit was perfect and I loved the dress! I am 5'5 and usually wear an XS in clothing. My jean size is 25. The waist fit snug on the dress.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress worn for my engagement party'
links_Review_Text: So comfortable and moves with you this dress has so many dimensions and looks great from every angle! The color is a light blush and isn't too busy so you can wear statement jewelry to add a dressy touch! Loved everything about this dress!
Loved this dress it was girly conservative but fun! I am 5' 8", I had to be mindful when bending down or leaning over, as it was a bit short in the back.

I have a large chess at 36 J and I wear an 8 in bottoms so it makes dresses very difficult to fit. This was actually the 5th rent the runway dress I tried to this occasion. The dress is incredibly comfortable and easy to dress up or dress down.
Wore this to a denim and diamonds gala and it was perfect. For true to size and was not right anywhere, which is hard sometimes due to my chest size. Very comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Handled my emergency like a pro!
links_Review_Text: Love this dress, simple and elegant. My husband loves it too. Con: the waist band can be tight when worn for many hours. #wedding #easydressing

I fell in love with this dress on RTR. Blush pink and a halter neck? Made for me. However, I didn't love it as much in person. The neckline and hem are gorgeous. But it was a lot of extra fabric around the middle. The model in the pic is tall so it lays better. I had to pull the elastic up so it would sit on my actual waist and it looked different. I loved the shorter length. I feel like the skirt was short and the body was long. I didn't hate it, but it could have been better. Bonus- it doesn't wrinkle AT ALL. I travelled with this twisted up in my carry on and it was perfect as soon as I pulled it out of the bag.
fit perfectly, great length and super comfy. this was an absolutely perfect dress for our end of summer mountain engagement photos. will definitely rent again! i wish i owned this dress!

links_Review_Title: Wore it to dinner at a resort.
links_Review_Text: Very flattering and forgiving! Didn't want to send it back!

This is such a pretty dress. I love the color, a blush pink. There is some extra fabric around the waistline which made me feel a little frumpy, but the overall feel and look is fabulous. I received many compliments and it was comfortable to wear, although it does run short, so be prepared to show leg.

Loved the fit of this dress! The grommets gave a simple style a really cool flair! The sleeves were a little tight for me, but the fit was good overall. Definitely a dress for cooler weather due to the heavier texture of the fabric.

This dress was very comfortable and had great details! Beware there's no lining and you can see straight through it. I didn't notice till I was at work, but luckily undergarments were neutral and nothing was showing! Great dress!

I was hesitant about this dress, but with unlimited it's easy to try 'outside my normal'! I loved the two toned stretchy fabric, it was soft and still felt like it sucked me in without being tight. Length is work appropriate and fun to accessorize with gold. I wore it for work with black booties, but it could easily be dressed up with heels for a more formal event. Good rental-worth a try!

The fabric is gorgeous! As said before, it's heavy weighted. I would say that it's NOT for spring or summer. This is late summer in New England so it's not too heavy for our 60 degree weather. I'm petite at 5'1" and you can see where the length lies on me. It's a mini dress on anyone not petite.

Heavy and well-constructed dress. I didn't love it when I first saw it, as I thought the grommets were more silvery; they're more of a bronze/gold and I usually avoid those tones due to having mostly silvery jewelry and bags (chains and detail on the bags). That said, I wore it to work and got TONS of compliments! It should be clear but keep in mind that there is no lining so you definitely need to wear a slip and/or cami underneath for more professional settings. Not necessarily a work dress for everyone but an awesome piece for going out.

links_Review_Title: A little too rock and roll for my office but I loved it.
links_Review_Text: Sized up and was very comfortable. Needed a slip because dress isn't lined and can see through the metal circles.

links_Review_Title: Reminded me of carpet but not in a bad way
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress. I was a bit surprised by the fabric when it came. I saw that the bands were different shades, but I hadn't read enough reviews to see other reviewers describe them as "velvet." To me, the texture reminded me of carpet or maybe the kind of fabric you'd find on a couch. Either way, I was very happy with this dress. It felt special without being too fancy to wear to work: the fit and flare style is super cute and flattering and the fabric looks high quality. The grommets, though see-through, didn't strike me as a problem. I just wore a nude bra and underwear and I think it looked fine.

This dress is great but for winter only. The stripes alternate in texture and one is velour-ish (actually feels like carpet but in a nice way), making it cold-weather appropriate. Other reviews are correct that the top and arms run a bit a small/narrow. Did not wear due to seasonality but loved the look!
Glamorous, fabulous, soft, amazingly retro
Gorgeous detail. So flattering. A little short if you are taller than 5'8! Cute dress.

links_Review_Title: Love this very flattering high end looking dress!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful figure flattering dress with a slightly flared skirt. The material contrast is gorgeous and it looks like a high end piece! Three quarter sleeves make it very appropriate for work and can easily transition to dinner afterward. Love it!
Beautiful dress with the best fabric

So.. this dress is pretty heavy so beware. However I received LOTS of compliments who wanted to know where it was from. Perfect fit and flair to make any shape look beautiful and the gold rings are a great touch. Beware it's see through so I work a black cami underneath

links_Review_Title: Great dress...very thick and luxurious material. Definitely sets off metal detectors though!
links_Review_Text: Cute slightly flared skirt and beautiful detail. I would definitely rent again.

This dress is SO flattering. I rented it for a client presentation at work and wish I had more reasons to wear it. It's a little too dressy for my workplace's casual environment but I'm definitely going to rent it again around the hols if I can. The stripes made my waist look so narrow, which is everything I needed.
Beautiful thick, stretch material, the gold details make the dress really stand out. It looks gorgeous. True to size. Very fancy

The material is thicker, perfect for fall/winter. This dress was so comfy and the material doesn't wrinkle at all, so you can easily take it from day to night. Yes the pinholes are see-through, but not inappropriately...I work a black bra and black tights. But if wearing at work during the day I would pair with a black blazer.

Great dress! The only surprise was that the dress is made up of horizontal stripes of alternating types of fabric, which you really can't tell from the pictures. I might not have rented this if I had known (horizontal stripes are not always so flattering), but I'm so glad I did. Very cute and perfect for work, going out, etc.
This is the kind of dress that you can wear on any occasion. It's suitable for work but had amazing details that make you want to take it out on the town.

links_Review_Title: I received more compliments on this than almost anything I've worn and was encouraged to buy it.
links_Review_Text: The designs are gold metal pieces and while they may look like sparkles or sequins in the pictures, they don't appear that dressy in real life. Fitting note. - the material is very stretchy, partially in the shoulders and bust so if you run large there, you may want to size up.
I normally wear a medium so I ordered a large. Still too small all over

links_Review_Title: stunning dress, very pretty with gold grommet details.
links_Review_Text: true to size but ronny kobo runs on the small size. I am a size 4 but order the small...xs is too small

links_Review_Title: Great dress and fun to wear
links_Review_Text: Top and arms are fitted. Nice flare at waist for a great party dress look.

Wore this for a festival. The fabric is really heavy, and add the grommets, it has some weight! The grommets are of course empty in the center and the dress is unlined, so you will see a tiny bit of skin or undergarments through the holes. Flattering for pear shapes and stretchy enough to be forgiving in the tummy as well. Fun, interesting piece!
great dress and very comfortable, but material is very thick, plus with the see through grommets, i would need to wear tights and a cami. will definitely rent again once the weather gets colder.
Rented as backup- didn't wear it. Did fit but was pretty tight. Would rent a S next time probably

links_Review_Title: Fits well but I can still smell someone else's body odor...It wasn't pleasant smelling armpitsallday
links_Review_Text: Detail was very beautiful and would love to wear it more then once but the smell had got to me
I loved this dress. It fit well and was super flattering. I received many compliments on this dress and will be renting again. It's a gem!

links_Review_Title: Definitely not work appropriate. No one tells you that there are HOLES in it.
links_Review_Text: The holes in the dress allow everyone to see your skin, bra, panties, etc! BEWARE!
This dress is definitely for winter season
fabric stretches

Loved this dress! It fit like a dream and was flattering. Some other reviewers have said they thought it's more appropriate for colder weather due to the material of the alternating stripes, but I wore this on a warm day and thought it was perfectly ok. Material not too light, not too heavy. Great for spring or fall. Will definitely rent again.

This is a beautiful dress for work, night out, nice dinner, anything! Very flattering. Strongly considered buying. I do note, like other reviewers, that the grommets are actual holes, so you will need a slip underneath.

Was surprised that there was no lining with only bare skin through the grommets but overall holes were small enough to feel "covered." Nice thick material, hung very well and was very flattering. Perfect variation on the LBD.

links_Review_Title: Received so many compliments! Show stopper!
links_Review_Text: The fabric is thick, dress form fitting but the weight of the fabric takes pounds off! I loved the detailing of the dress as well. By far my favorite RTR! You can feel the quality!
I got so many compliments on this dress. It was really fun and flattering. I wore with black tights otherwise a little too short for my office. Loved it!

I loved this dress. The quality is phenomenal. You can't tell from the pictures but the little "holes" in the dress are actually not lined, meaning your skin shows thru. The holes are strategically placed and are so small you can't even tell it's your skin showing and not a lining. I wore the dress to work with black tights and heels. I received so many compliments on the quality and style of the dress. Another rtr win.

links_Review_Title: Cute, cute dress, but runs small
links_Review_Text: Ultimately, I couldn't wear this one... the XS was too small. Too short and too tight. I would try it again in another size... I liked it that much!

I'm crazy about this dress and seriously considered buying it. It fit me like a glove, felt just right for a breakfast fundraiser and subsequent meetings, and must have gotten me a dozen compliments throughout the day. Runs true to size. Rent this dress!

links_Review_Title: wore for work and church and a funeral
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly, very flattering.

This head turning gown emphasizes and smooths all the right parts with a thick luxurious material, just the right amount of side leg exposure, and a flattering (not overly revealing) neckline. You can wear a real bra under this one, which makes for a comfortable fit that lasts through long events and allows for dance moves too risky for strapless dresses (no popping out of this dress!). At 5'2", I wore my 5" wedges to bring the length to just above the floor. Loved this dress so much that I've rented it twice!

links_Review_Title: Lots of Compliments on this gown
links_Review_Text: This was my back up gown & I jazzed it up with some blue/rhinestone bling jewelry. I wore it for my Mardi Gras ball. I wore my regular bra & spanx. I am regularly a 14 on the bottom & 16 on the top ((40D). I got tons of compliments all night long & then again on my FBphotos. The fabric was heavy & stretchy, very well made. I am 5'4" & wore some 1.5" heals. I can't handle heals any higher than that. It was perfect. The ruffles & slit on the side were perfect without showing too much.

The fabric of this dress is a dream... structured, but stretchy and incredibly comfortable. The length was great with a 3 inch heel. The ruching in the mid-section and the ruffle down the side do are great job at disguising any belly fat you want to hide. My only complaint would be that the straps seemed a bit too long which caused the dress to not lie completely flat down the back.
I wore this at 23 weeks pregnant and it was awesome! Would have probably worn a 6 but liked the looser fit with my growing belly. Super comfy and lots of compliments

I loved this dress so much. It sucked me in, in all the right places and it was comfortable. I felt beautiful in this dress. I got compliments all night. I normally wear a size 2, but it was a bit long, so I felt the 0 would work better and it did. It fit like a glove and was the perfect length. I am 5'2 and wear am a smaller C cup.
A bit large on top but fit well for my bust size.

This dress was so perfect. I'm short (5'1) and can only stand to wear kitten heels, so I was worried it would be too long, but it fit great. The material is thick and stretchy, plus I was able to wear a normal bra which is great because I'm a G cup!

links_Review_Title: The dress was great. I felt very good in it.
links_Review_Text: Ran big could have gone down one size, especially since it is VERY forgiving. The fabric is heavy but holds you together without the need for Spanx. It is a plain neckline which I love because you can add a great neck accessory. Im 5 feet 3 inches so the dress ran a bit long...you will need a good high heel short girls!

Beautiful dress and really easy to wear! Fabric had a decent weight to it which helped it lay well and flatter the body. Fun for dancing as it twirls well! Really comfortable and I was able to wear a regular bra (major bonus in my book). Overall, I felt comfortable and beautiful. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments all evening!
links_Review_Text: Fits like a glove. Comfortable, simple and sexy.
Definitely runs large I'm glad I sized down. I'm normally a 12. Nice cut and fabric
Absolutely loved this dress! Received compliments all night. Very comfortable to dance in. If you're thinking about it my advise is RENT IT!

I didn't end up wearing it but only because it was a little too dressy for day. Stretchy and figure hugging in all the right places. Ruching on the tummy hides a lot of sins. Straps wide enough to wear a real bra. Would rent again for a fancier occasion.
Thick, stretchy, forgiving fabric was amazing. Super comfortable. Probably could have sizes down to a 4 if I wanted it a bit tighter but was fine with the 6! Did I say comfortable?

This dress is gorgeous! Satin fabric is thick and flattering with the perfect amount of stretch but also super breathable and soft. I'm 5'7" and wore 3" heels and length was perfect. I wore to a black tie wedding this past labor day weekend and got tons of compliments. Will definitely rent again and/or even purchase! Loved it!

This dress was great - stretchy material and very breathable. It was a bit large on me - a 14 would have been a bit better maybe even a 12. Did have to pin the back to make it fit up top, because it was big - but not so big I didn't want to wear it. Incredibly comfortable to wear all night as well. It's one of those dresses that won't wow anyone but it was really comfortable for an August wedding in sea island Georgia.

links_Review_Title: First time renting a dress and I can't wait to rent again!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress! Fit perfectly and was really comfortable! The bunched up detail on the side really hid my problem area from every angle! I have a large bust and I felt this dress showed the perfect amount of cleavage for my coworkers black tie wedding. Length of dress was perfect for me with my kitten heels. Highly recommended!
Wore for a black tie wedding and received many compliments. Was the perfect dress for the occasion and helped me to look fabulous

What a fun dress! Not my absolute favorite rental ever (just down to personal stylistic preference), but this dress fit very well. It's basically scuba fabric so a little heavy, but the sleeveless dress was very supportive. I'm 36ddd and the top was very comfortable, flattering, and did not feel tight. I wish the straps were adjustable, because that was my main gripe with the dress, it just hung a little too low (definitely emphasized my assets tho). The ruffle has fabric underneath to cover your thigh, so your whole naked leg isn't hanging out from the hip. Definitely a sexy dress for a formal affair and great for dancing!

I spent an hour getting ready. Slinked this dress on in split second and my mood completely changed, and it was perfect. The dress is stretchy and comfy. Flattering. You can wear this dress all night and feel amazing from start to finish.

Originally ordered the 8 which was fine but 6 was better I'm 5' but wore 5 inch heels and length was perfect! Fabulous dress for showing off a special shoe and hugging curves with forgiveness Comfy no shape wear needed and I wore a regular bra! May have to keep this one
So comfortable! Has a fun gathering of fabric on the right side that adds some flare. Easy to wear regular bra with.

links_Review_Title: Loved it! It was comfortable and flattering.
links_Review_Text: Long and loose. Very easy to wear.
The dress had very flattering features around the stomach. It was a bit longer than I'd like (I'm 5'3"). Overall, it was an ok dress but I was able to dance all night comfortably

links_Review_Title: This dress was comfortable and looked amazing! I was so happy with my choice.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect.

Rented for a black tie wedding and could not be happier. Fit perfectly, was incredibly flattering, recurved a million compliments. The material of the dress was thick and stretchy, I needed zero shapewear or bra. I normally am an 8 or a 10 so was very surprised that the 6 was the perfect fit. I was worried the extra material would make my already larger bottom half bigger, again it could not have been more wrong, this dress was magic.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely fabulous! I'd danced the night away.
links_Review_Text: The fit of this dress was "sized perfectly". The material was comfortable and flowed nicely. It was a red carpet affair and I'd felt "Red Carpet Ready". I was able to move and dance the night away and felt absolutely fabulous! #galaready #redcarpet #redcarpetaffair #beautiful #innerbeauty #butterfly

I am currently between sizes 8 and 10. So I would say that this runs a little large as I fit into the 8 perfectly (I'm 5'6" and about 157lbs, hourglass shape) the length was also perfect and it was snug without feeling too tight. The material is soft and forgiving. I wore spanx to smooth out the bumps and loved how the dress hugged my curves. The neckline was not too conservative but also not too low, and the shape of the straps meant I could wear a regular bra. The ruffle and ruching were ideally placed to add detail without adding bulk. I was attending an event where I was sitting a lot and then standing, the material was so comfortable to sit in and wasn't crumpled/ wrinkled when I stood up. I was attending a formal black tie event and this was perfect.
Nice forgiving thick stretchy fabric, ruched waist is flattering, could wear regular bra. It was hard to find a pic that shows the riches side so this is not the best pic...

So happy to be one of the first to review this dress! I was in a bit of a panic after my dress and backup dress both didn't work. I contacted RTR and a stylist stayed with me on the phone while we worked together to pick out different styles. She suggested this one for me and really saved the day. As a bonus, this was a brand new dress so the tags were still on! This dress is sophisticated and classy and went amazing with my accessories. I'm 5'3", 145-150, 34C and curvy. This dress is perfect for someone who's short and curvy as it wasn't too long and was very flattering on the body. If you're taller it might not be long enough for you. The fabric is stretchy yet structured and I was able to comfortably move and eat all night. The frill on the bottom was also very fun. Compared to other size 6 dresses I've tried, this one could potentially run true to size or a little large. If you're not curvy, you may need to size down. Truly was sad to send this one back and will consider purchasing. Thank you so much RTR for great customer service and choosing a great dress for me!
Comfy, easy, wrinkle-free. Nothing amazing, but it was just what I needed for a chilly, outdoor wedding.

links_Review_Title: Pretty, but not what I was looking for
links_Review_Text: This dress is nice, but not a showstopper, so I didn't end up wearing it to my event. The material feels kind of like neoprene. I think it looks better in person than in pictures, but overall it didn't do much for my figure. Fits true to size.

links_Review_Title: Felt Beautiful-easy order and return process
links_Review_Text: Order your size or one size smaller. Very comfortable, elegant and felt beautiful

links_Review_Title: Extremely comfortable dress, great stretch and runs true to size

links_Review_Text: Really pretty. Snug under the arms, but was lovely. I'd rent again.
Thicker stretch fabric to hide any imperfections drapes beautifully and is extremely comfortable. This dress is a winner all the way around.
Perfect fit. Felt amazing and glamorous.
Perfect classy gown

links_Review_Title: This was a flattering fit and a comfortable dress.
links_Review_Text: Fit was great - forgiving fabric was easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: Dress was perfect for occasion and comfortable
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! Runs large, size down one size. Very comfy and elegant.
This sade dress is perfect for an hour glass figure. Love the halter neckline! TTS but the top part is a bit fitted.

links_Review_Title: Stylish dress to enjoy the museum.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. It was comfortable and the colors are gorgeous. The only thing that prevented me from wearing it more times was that the weather was turning cold.

I am usually an 8-10 on top and a 12 through the waist and hips. This is a 10 and it was tight... but not uncomfortable. I wore a girdle and it was an all over tight. I loved the colors and found orange shoes that I loved. The earrings are also RTR and the whole thing was really fun.

links_Review_Title: A distinctive dress that will make you standout in a crowd!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a weekend in Vegas. It was the perfect dress for getting wine outside in the late afternoon and for a fancy brunch. It was both comfortable and distinctive. I loved how I looked and how it fit. It does fit snuggly in the chest so would size up if you need more room.
This dress is definitely a five out of five. The style and design are fantastic as well as the happy print. On the top I would say it does run smaller, so keep that in mind when selecting a size.
The colors were fresh and vibrant. The style was cool and flattering. The top is more fitted, so it felt a little more restrictive rather than comfortable. High quality fabric and embroidery. Unique.
Loved this summer-y look. Perfect for a date night with my hubby. I'm probably gonna keep it and wear it to work too when I get back to the states. Great rental!
This dress was stunning on! It does run a little small if your busty but definitely got so many compliments on it!
My favorite dress up be worn so far.
Unique design that got a lot of compliments! Pretty comfortable to wear too. Tempted to buy the dress!

i'm typically a small/size 2, but went w the 4 and am glad i did! fit was perfect was perfect around the bust so if you're more busty, def size up. highly recommend. love the pattern and style. very figure flattering. amazing pattern. highly recommend!

This is a super fun dress. The colors are vibrant and exciting, and a color combo you don't normally see. It has a vintage feel and fit to it that I love. I rented this for a few tropical-themed events I had this month and it worked perfectly. In a sea of typical tropical/tiki dresses, this one stands out! It fit me perfectly--I'm between a size 6-8 and I rented an 8. Size 6 would hve been too tight.

links_Review_Title: Unique dress, you will definitely stand out!
links_Review_Text: Size 2 was too small around my torso and bust (34D) so I could not zip it up. Very tight waist and bodice with no give. I will size up and rent again!
Comfortable and flattering.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for summer! Runs true to size. Great length and bright beautiful colors. No bra needed!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric and colors. The fit was perfect and I love the unique pattern and style of the dress. Very comfortable to wear and just the right length - I am 5'8 and 150 lbs. No bra needed! I would highly recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: Adorable but tight on the chest
links_Review_Text: This is such a fun dress! I wore it for a Fourth of July party and got tons of compliments. The bust area and waist is very fitted and tight.
Ordered my own size, couldn't zip. Boo!

I am so sad that a) I didn't get a picture in this dress and that b) I don't own it. The colors are vibrant and the cut is super flattering. It fell about mid-calf on me (5'1") and the bodice fit well, albeit a tad too long for my short torso. Overall, this high quality dress is a knockout, and I fully intend to rent it again.

links_Review_Title: To too tight and bottom to full / big
links_Review_Text: Odd fit so wouldn't rent again but love colors and style

I couldn't wait for this dress to show up at my door. When I tried it on, I discovered that the bodice wraps your girls up tighter than a mummy, literally binding your breasts. So sad, because I loved the design, cut and fabric. I'll be interested to see if someone with a more petite, hourglass figure feels the same way, since I'm pretty narrow and tall.

I love the colors of this dress and the light cotton material which I thought would be perfect for a summer wedding. I'm a 34C with 27 inch waist and the size 2 fit fine except that I needed to have 2 more inches in my torso. I'm 5'4" and this dress is made for someone with a longer torso. My legs are long so the length of the skirt looked fine, just below my knees. I could see this looking really good on someone taller. You could get away with not wearing a bra because the way the top criss-crosses in the front acts like a bra and hold you in. I also wish the full flouncy skirt had pockets. I had to return this one without wearing.

links_Review_Title: Cute - a nice mix of youth and maturity.
links_Review_Text: I wore this top for a photo shoot and LOVED it. The sleeves were billowy and pretty, and the zipper is long enough to make changing in/out of it really easy! Lace wasn't scratchy, which is usually my aversion to lace pieces. I felt super cute while also feeling like a grown-up. ;) Would definitely recommend, especially for "apple" ladies who are looking for some forgiveness in the waistline. Just know that the bandeau under the lace only goes across the chest area, and may not give bigger-busted ladies the coverage they'd like. I had mine all taped in, but otherwise a bra would most definitely be visible. Overall, a great top!
This top was much easier to wear than I thought. It's not stiff or itchy like some lace. The back is completely see-through. I'm usually a 10, but the 12 fit spot on.

links_Review_Title: Beautifully made, fits like a glove
links_Review_Text: This is the best top I have ever rented. It is so beautifully and intricately made. The black velvet lace trim and zipper in the back are gorgeous accents. The tops fit like a glove and there was no need to wear a bra underneath due to the stitched in panel, plus there was no room. Loved it.
I loved this! I rented a size zero... a bit tight. You can wear a thin strapless beneath

The band lining was smaller than my chest. If I lifted my hands slightly my bra would show. Didn't mind the lace see thru but would have preferred to have my chest or bra covered. Still wore it and enjoyed the blouse despite the fit
Rented for dinner with the girls. The material is great. The color is so delicate. Love this rental. There was a little armpit resistance that caused chaffing, but nothing too bad.

Large flower lace with beautiful delicate detail. Fits well. Lining is over the breasts only. Everything else is open exposed due to material. Versatile top that transitions well from day to evening. More of a powder pink then a pale pink. Beautifully made.

Such a pretty blouse. The lace is beautiful. You do need to wear a cami as it is sheer A little short so wear high waisted pants. I didn't love the black bands on the wrist part of the sleeves but I enjoyed wearing this
Loved this! Unique & girly. I'm a true size 4 & this fit pretty snug under the armpits but fine everywhere else. Would def rent again & get the same size.

links_Review_Title: Great shirt for a surprise 40th birthday party
links_Review_Text: Love this top. It was so comfortable and I got so many compliments. I can't wait to rent this again I wish I could buy it now. I feel this fits pretty true to size. You can loosen the ties on the arms if necessary slight stretch.

links_Review_Title: Colors and style fun and fabulous!
links_Review_Text: Would have purchased this. Just its see thru, so I wore a lace camisole, but still the part that covers nipples raises when you lift your arms. Otherwise I felt fabulous!

The shirt was girly and fun, and I received a few compliments on it!! I paired with a black cami, otherwise you could see my midsection, and a pair of black jeans. It was a fun top, but It wasn't a show stopper.

Super adorable – it's got a panel in the front so you don't even need to wear a bra because the fit is so snug and perfect. Romantic and such a nice flattering hem at the waist. Easy to wear; elastic (but pretty) wrists, and a sturdy, easy zip in the back.

Loved this shirt! So much detail on it and so feminine! Wore it out for my Birthday dinner and received so many compliments! I didn't wear a bra but wore little silicone petals and it worked perfectly. The arms run a little tight so I couldn't have done a lot of big movements but it was fine for the night. Also runs a little short but not too bad. Overall I was a huge fan of this shirt!!!

I loved this lace top so much that I bought it. I wore it for date night but I can see this used for a wedding look with a long skirt like a gown. The lace has a sheer netting that isn't itchy. My body isn't perfect and I feel beautiful in this top.
So many compliments. A bit on the heavy side for the material. But very flattering!
I'm in between a 2 and 4 depending on the designer. For this shirt the 4 fit perfect.

I took a risk renting this but I just kept coming back to it so made the leap of faith. I'm not one to wear pink or lace, but this top kept calling my name and I'm so glad I tried it!! It was a snug fit, so size up. But it's supposed to be a tailored fit so you don't want it too big or it won't look right. It fit like a glove and looked more amazing in person. I paired with black suede leggings and sexy black heels and I felt amazing! I was a able to wear a nude strapless bra and it didn't even show in the back. Love it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect top for my brother's rehearsal dinner!
links_Review_Text: This top is everything. Endless compliments, so unique and special. Fits great - for bigger chested girls like me, just caution that there isn't much slack in the fit so it was a little tight in the chest, but didn't bother me.
I wish I could zip it up. Too small but darling. I will order 2 sizes up to see if that fits.
Feel special. Friends and family complimented the blouse.
I could have worn a 2 but they only had a 4.

links_Review_Title: Loved it. A bit fitted and designed for small biceps.
links_Review_Text: Excellent classy top

At first glance, I would have never gravitated towards this shirt because of how girly it was! But once I tried it on, I loved how cute it was on. The color is a perfect pink and the lace is an amazing quality. Although it does run true to size, I would likely size up next time since the shirt is a bit short and exposed a little more skin than I would have felt comfortable with. This is your cute top for spring!

links_Review_Title: Lacy, fun & very unique!!! Great for a night out!!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a night out, super unique & interesting, lots of compliments! The fit runs a little small, I would recommend sizing up for backup, as the bandeau liner inside tends to ride up quite a bit. This needs to be worn with a strapless bra. It is a bit short, but the scalloped lace bottom is very pretty! I recommend assistance getting in, zipped and out. Overall highly recommend!!
This shirt was just right. I wore it with black pants. I only caution you if you are big busted. You need to find the right bra. The shirt has a strip to cover you.

This shirt was beautiful, lots of looks and compliments! But keep in mind it is see-thru except for a band over the chest. Plus, that band is very short. So, i wore a tee underneath that was the same color and you could not tell at all. Other reviews said runs small so i sized up, but i actually did not find that to be true. Will rent again in an 8!

I love this top and got loads of compliments on it! I had to wear a 14 in this top though and put a tight, long cami under it as it did not adequately hold in my bust. It has a two layer satin band inside across the bust, so if you can fit into that, the top is then openwork below it. Very pretty and the sleeves and bows are super cute!

The intricate details of this top are gorgeous. I wore it to work with a black mini skirt and black opaque tights w black knee high boots and got a plethora of compliments! Sorry to see it go! But gotta get something new! Thanks RTR!

I wore this top on a saturday night with a black skirt and my stuart weitzman highland boots and received lots of compliments! It was a tad tight and I think the size 4 would have been better but the 2 worked - I was not able to lift my arms because the shirt just has fabric over your boob area and is see through everywhere else- I did not wear a bra and no one noticed.
Super tight on the bust which then creates puckering on the stomach. Such a shame.
Was very pretty, but definitely runs small and was itchy for me! My Husband loved it though, and its very pretty. I wore it with jeans and boots, for a night out.

links_Review_Title: I did not wear this cute blouse because it ran small atound the bust and ribs.
links_Review_Text: The material is beautiful and the blouse was so special but the Large ran very small.
This shirt is so beautiful and feminine. I got a lot of compliments on it and felt like a million bucks. I ended up purchasing this shirt because the details were so beautiful
Beautiful details but the shirt runs really small. Size up for comfort especially in the arms!
cute
I rented this piece for a conference and it was a lovely piece, easy to pair with and I received a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous lace, shape, details, and color
links_Review_Text: A little scratchy and the bust is super tight as well as the armpit area kinda high so it chafes a little so size up and you will be fine. Definitely worth it.
I liked the fit color and style a lot. Didn't have any particular occasion in mind and the quality was great so I bought it!!!

links_Review_Title: This is a beautiful shirt. If you are heavy in the arms and chest size up.
links_Review_Text: If you are busty the undercover in breast area may rise up.

Didn't realize how glittery this was when I ordered but I ended up liking it. The shine is woven into the material and not particles that can fall or get onto everything. Liked this for a holiday outing.
Fun sweater. Little large in shoulders. Nice length. Love the sexy cut out. Wore it for concert ( I'm a singer) and again in Napa drinking wine :) los of compliments! BF loved it!
Sexy and understated at the same time... Love it

links_Review_Title: Sexy winter/ Christmas must have on your naughty list!
links_Review_Text: I could may be wore XS, but i decided on S. It looks luxurious- festive ( elegant & not like u trying to hard) & a little bit naughty! Just everything u can wish for going out in Christmas time!
Nice, fitted turtleneck but I should've gotten a small. The cutout was too big and leaning over revealed too much. Was a glittery fabric in person.

Beautiful and unique with a sexy cutout, super stretchy fabric, and the sparkling fabric was great for a holiday party, work party, or nye. Easy to dress up or down. Got lots of compliments on that shirt!

I thought the quality and fabric were both amazing, however, I had expected this is fit a bit better. In addition, it was annoying that you had to wear a strapless bra-- no one likes wearing one on just a regular day.

I can't believe this is a "sweater" ...I wore it as a top. This is one of my favorite things I've ever rented from RTR. I wore a bra that you're able to remove the straps from, and only wore one strap...you can see the other strap through the slit. It was super cute and comfortable. Great length in general and the arm length was not too short. Love the turtle neck, but open slit in the front. Great style. LOVED IT!

links_Review_Title: Looks cheesy, like something you'd buy in a mall.
links_Review_Text: Fabric and cut do not come off as edgy or fun. It looks cheesy, and middle America mom looking for a cool outfit.
it was ok not a great feeling piece

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments! Snug fit but I sized down based on previous comments. LOVED it!
links_Review_Text: If you want a form fitting look, size down.
Nice weight, cute style fit well. I sized up
Really pretty sweater but it ended up being too small for me.

links_Review_Title: Fun statement piece that is perfect for warm weather.
links_Review_Text: The shine doesn't leave much to the imagination, but it is a very structured top that hugs in all of the right places.
True to size, the sleeves ran a little long.

links_Review_Title: Makes a bra tricky, my boobs were lopsided!
links_Review_Text: The cut out makes a bra tricky. I took one strap off but then things were a little lopsided. I must have a short neck cuz the turtle neck was very long on me.

links_Review_Title: Silver, sleek, mod, cut out, stylish!
links_Review_Text: Even huge boobs can wear, strapless bra a must. Loved the turtleneck. Love the silver slight sparkle.
Cut out is the right amount of striking/sexy!
I would gladly rent again
It ran a little big and my small chest didn't help. It was still a fun top. Very shimmery.

Wore it to work with a black top underneath since the cut was too risque. It looked surprisingly good and I received lots of compliments. Wore it out to a holiday party. Subtle sparkle and not over-the-top but also fun. TTS.
A little large but a beautiful one of a kind piece. Still haven't sent it back since I love it so much. Very "holiday."
This was ok on but not cute enough for me to feel self conscious in a strapless bra all night(I can't seem to find any good ones).
Cool sweater. A little itchy. Loved the sparkle!!!
Fits perfect - very well made!

links_Review_Title: This didn't really work for me.
links_Review_Text: Nice sweater but a little stiff and scratchy. The opening didn't really work for my body; it just looked funny. I think you need to be a little taller to wear it well.

This is a really cool top for going out in colder weather. It's very warm despite the cutout. The fabric is really thick and high quality. I went true to size and it fit pretty similarly to how it was pictured on the model. If you want a loser fit, size up. I found myself tugging and adjusting a few times because it felt a little constricting.
Overall too big. Did not wear

I wish I could have liked this on me. It was a little tight in the neck and it made it look a little gobbly even though I wear turtlenecks occasionally. I'd say wear it if you don't have any loose skin on your neck.

Loved this futuristic sweater by A.L.C.! The heavy knit fabric allowed for stretch while still running true to size, and I would recommend sizing up for backup if you want a less fitted look. This top is more metallic in person, however I loved how sparkly it was and loved cool this sweater made me feel! There was comfortable room in the bust due to the stretch of the fabric, however this sweater should definitely be worn with a strapless bra, as the bra strap would be visible in the slit above your bust. I loved the turtleneck and how this piece defined my waist. I couldn’t wait to wear it after work for dinner and drinks with my friends! A must-have statement sweater for your winter wardrobe.
this top looks shiny and lustrous online, but it is straight-up glittery in person
Fit seemed large. Should have ordered a M for sure. The opening and cut made me look much more broad-shouldered than I am. Turtle neck did nothing for me and the fabric seemed very out-of-style.

Wore this to a semi casual New Years party. I ordered a L because that's what was available and I was able to wear but it was a bit big all over, the M probably would have been perfect. I did need to adjust the front opening and deal with some riding up throughout the night, but overall I liked this and received lots of compliments. It's made of thick, nice quality material. Not overly shimmery but enough to feel like a special occasion sweater.

I wore this to dinner with dark jeans during the holiday season. My date was impressed! Fit true to size. I enjoyed being warm, yet festive. I would definitely rent again as it can be worn with jeans, black pants, or even tucked into a skirt.

Wore it to work and then consecutively on Friday and Saturday nights out. It's warm for cool weather and somehow very festive. The skin showing is eye-catching but it's still a relatively modest look. I got the small so that it wouldn't be super tight.

The halter has thick straps to form a beautiful bow in the back and for a romper... it's easy to take on/off with a low back zipper. Best romper I ever worn with the comfort and elegance you want in a vacation outfit.
I wore this on the boat and straight to dinner, it was classic and adorable !

links_Review_Title: I wore this to my post-wedding brunch.
links_Review_Text: ThiS is great little jumpsuit. The fabric is a lovely soft cotton and it is very easy to wear. It's girly with out being sappy. Fun!

Wore this for a family photo shoot. The outfit was cute however it came completely wrinkled and had to be fully pressed. There was also a stain on one of the legs but it wasn't noticeable from afar. Otherwise, it was a tad tight in the waist when sitting but overall it was a comfortable fit.

Soooo many compliments! Picture doesn't do it justice. I sized up because I knew it would be in it all day and was afraid it would be snug on my tummy too much. Looks great with a size up but would of been okay with my regular size.
Cute, very comfy!

This was an adorable jumpsuit. It zips in the back and also ties around the neck. I was able to get it on and off alone, which is nice. The material wrinkles easily. The fit was perfect for me. I am a 10/12, and the 12 fit perfectly. I followed the reviews that it ran a bit small. Jcrew generally runs small, so I normally get 12s from there and this was no different. I had a jean jacket on most of the day since it was cooler, but the cut really shows off the shoulders so if that is something you want to flaunt, this is perfect for you. The jacket kind of killed the look. I paired it with some white wedge sandals and loved the whole look. There were a few stains on the legs, but that was my only issue with this price. I may keep it to wear to a party this weekend.

links_Review_Title: Also great for work! Many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Was tempted to buy this one. So cute on.
I got this for a girls trip to Palm Springs and this was perfect. The jumpsuit is great for shorter ladies with hips. I love it!

This looked darling on but was very uncomfortable for me. I'm very long waisted and when I sat it felt too small in the stride. It pulled some in the hip area for me too but I'm very pear shaped. I wore a 10 but a 12 may have fit more comfortably. Also hard to get in and out of for bathroom trips!

links_Review_Title: Fun Alternative to a Party Dress
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a Rehearsal dinner and was so comfortable and felt special and different from everyone else wearing sun dresses, etc. would absolutely wear again

links_Review_Title: They called me a gingham SNACK
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a sunset cruise in Cape Cod and it was style perfection. Couple digs: the neck was a little wrinkly/ill fitted and the jumpsuit was not ideal for going to the bathroom in the boat. Was lucky the bow tie didn't end up in the toilet. Otherwise -- LOVED. Helped me pull off some Cape Cod realness.
Wore this to an event we went to, it fits well and I got many compliments!
Super cute, plus it has pockets! I am a little broad in my back, it was a bit snug but looked great!
I got so many compliments on this outfit - super summery and really fit nicely.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my brothers rehearsal dinner!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove. Received so many compliments!

Loved this jumpsuit. Classy and chic. But just know these things going into it: both of my sizes came rather wrinkly. They needed to be ironed.
