Which took a few Minutes, but just make sure you have an iron available. My steamer wasn't doing the trick. It is lined, so on a hot muggy day here in TX, I felt like it was a lot of fabric. But it's all lightweight. I'm 5'8" and the legs hit me mid-chin which I thought was perfect. I felt so fancy and got so many compliments! Will rent again!
I wanted to wear this on the beach so I sized up 2 sizes and it still looked good!
Fit is true to size. Very comfortable and flattering! Highly recommended. Arrived very wrinkled so I had to have it pressed before wearing, but worth it!

I am a true 8 but sized up in this cause I'm tall and really needed it to work - too big is better than too small. Glad I did cause the 10 was perfect. Literally couldn't walk to the bathroom without being stopped and complimented on this! Felt like a chic American Girl doll.
I liked the jumper but should have sized up from a 4R to a 6R. It was shorter waisted then I am and would liked the jumper to be a little more blousy.

links_Review_Title: Wore it at a friend's bachelorette party wine tasting - it was a hit!
links_Review_Text: The print and overall fit is flattering - the high waist line hugs perfectly, and the pattern is adorable with the bow to tie in the back of the neckline. The fabric, although, is very uncomfortable. Almost a starchy feeling, and very crunchy.

Wish this jumpsuit would've worked out because it's really cute but I found it to be ill-fitting: tight in the waist but the legs were super wide and the chest big (I usually don't have that issue!). So the jumpsuit had potential but didn't work for my body.
A little billowy in the rear

I really liked this jumpsuit for dinner and a play on a summer Friday. It was flattering and comfortable, and it really spoke for itself--I didn't feel like I needed jewelry or any accessories. I got a lot of compliments on it, too! My only issue was that it got SUPER wrinkly, so that's something to consider.
# vacation
Fit well but was super wrinkly-- needed steam ironing prior to each wear. Also had trouble getting the bow to sit correctly as it was so wrinkled.

links_Review_Title: Cute but not the best fit
links_Review_Text: I had to size up to a 10 when I would typically wear an 8. The fit in the bust was larger but the waist and hips were tight.
I couldn't wear this... I looked like I was dressing up for Halloween as a toddler. It was big and poofed out in the wrong areas. Not a classy look and not at all what I was expecting.

links_Review_Title: Super cute!! I got so many compliments on this piece!!
links_Review_Text: Super comfy!!

links_Review_Title: A little to tight around the waist/mid back. I definitely needed an 8
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear it, but the cut is really flattering.
Tight in torso. Not a good look, but cute in theory.
Is it super cute, but not certain it's worth the rental cost when it's about the same price directly from J.Crew. Also, the crotch and fit on the bottom is very very large.
I usually wear 00R or 00P from jcrew, this 00R was huge not in length but just had a lot of extra room on top. I couldn't wear it
Very cute jumpsuit. My only complaint is it arrives very wrinkled and the material does wrinkle pretty easy. Was able to wear a racerback bra with it.
Such a great outfit. Fit perfectly and got tons of compliments.
AMAZING piece! I looked like Grace Kelly. May need to purchase!
Couldn't wear reviews on here said ran big it did not
I ordered the smallest size, 00R, because I know that JCrew tends to run a little large anyways, this jumpsuit was MASSIVE. I felt like it fit like a size 4, rather than a 00.
This is so cute, but I have am short so it didn't work with the torso and pants part. Would recommend for long torso or tall girls. I'm 5'3" and rented an 8, my usual size for J Crew.

I got compliments every time I wore this dress on campus! the color was absolutely fabulous and the length was perfect! the fabric is also very light so it's easy to wear by itself or with some layers on top!
Rented this simple but beautiful dress for a lunch date, it was lovely and my date didn't stop complimenting me
Pros: really flattering on pear shape Con: no slit, so feels a bit constricting if you take long steps.

links_Review_Title: Super sexy but fun and flirty dress!
links_Review_Text: LOVED this dress besides the fact that the strap literally broke within 2 hours of wearing it at a dinner (whoopsies). I have a very large bust so I just sewed it back and it was fine. Wore it a few more times. This is great with sneakers for everyday or mules/block heels for night or day event! I am debating buying.

links_Review_Title: Great if you're tall, thin, and straight up and down
links_Review_Text: Rented this for every day, but would be a great brunch dress. Material is thick enough to not require a bra, but I would wear a strapless bra with it if I needed help. Could be good for a wedding too, but it's cute and versatile enough to either dress it up or dress it down
Loved this 90s glamour look. Will rent again!
Was a nice dress but didn't flatter me and fit a bit odd in the bust

I thought this dress would be a for sure fit. I wear this style of dress regularly and it's normally very flattering. It hugged my body in weird areas and was just odd. If you're going to try it I would maybe recommend sizing up.

I rented this for a post-wedding brunch and it was adorable. The color is vibrant and the fit is super comfortable. My only problem was that the back of the dress was super big at the top. I tried loosening the tie in the back, thinking maybe it was too tight and was making the material wonky, but that didn't fix the problem. It was noticeable, but luckily my hair is long so I was able to hide it. Otherwise, the dress is beautiful and if you don't have this issue, you will love it. For size reference, I am between a 0-2, 120 lbs, 5'6".
overall really liked this and would rent again
Loved this dress! Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Just the right amount of Sparkle!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit very well and it was comfortable all night! The material was beautiful with the just the right amount of sparkle for a festive evening!

links_Review_Title: Cute, comfortable, and just what I needed!
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress! I rented it for Christmas Eve church services and it was exactly what I needed. Cute and festive while still being in between too casual and too dressy. I was expecting it to be more of a swing dress, but when I tried it on I realized it was more of a fit and flare, but I actually loved that! It was super flattering and gave some shape without being too tight or revealing. I got tons of compliments and overall this was a great dress!
Rented this dress for winter vacation in Alaska. The dress is fun and very comfortable, a little bit of sparkle to glam it up. Looks great with boots in a winter wonderland! Tons of compliments!!
I rented it as a work dress and I got so many compliments but it was much dressier than expected!

links_Review_Title: AMAZING dress if you're petite--hugs hips a bit too much for me though
links_Review_Text: I REALLY wanted to like this dress--and I do, just doesn't work for my body type. I love the subtle sparkle and love the back of the dress. However, it hugs your hips and made my hips look SO wide (even with a body shaper underneath). I didn't end up wearing it. Maybe a size up would have been more forgiving?
Hard to tell in the photo but I added a sequin wrap as a belt and received so many complements. It's a very understated but elegant and comfortable dress.

links_Review_Title: This dress was sexy while still being conservative enough for the church even that I wore it to!
links_Review_Text: It was super comfortable because of the stretch and I felt that it was figure flattering.
The fit was really good and i love that i was very comfortable

links_Review_Title: Rented this dress for a winter wedding, and it was perfect. Fits great, and just enough sparkle!
links_Review_Text: I don't usually go for items that accentuate my waist for fear of over-stating my wider hips, but this dress hit in all the right spots for me. I loved the length and the flare at the bottom of the skirt, and the slit was a cute way to give the otherwise pretty modest dress just a hint of skin. It's very comfortable since it's double-lined, and the sparkle made it easy to wear, as I didn't feel like I had to wear a lot of jewelry to "dress it up". It also gave me a rare opportunity to wear my hair up in a ponytail since my shoulders were covered, which I liked. Overall was a great choice and will definitely be renting it again!
This dress has a stretchy, comfortable fabric that could allow you to size down. Love the high neck front & dip in the back. Form fitting but forgiving. Great dress!

Rented it as a backup dress and didn't end up wearing it because I liked the other dress better. However this one was comfortable and I liked the lower back. The skirt is not too tight so it is forgiving.

links_Review_Title: A night to honor President Jimmy Carter
links_Review_Text: True fit, super comfortable but tailored look
Beautiful dress but fabric is very heavy and clingy
Fit just fine just wasn't my style.
Absolutely LOVED this dress. I was worried that the waist line would hit at my widest part and look unflattering, but everything about this dress was perfect.

links_Review_Title: fast shipping and the dress was in great condition!
links_Review_Text: perfect fit & was perfect for the wedding!

links_Review_Title: AMAZING! Flattering, comfy, would order again!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress that's comfy to wear all night, but also flattering fabric and shape. So fun. Miss it already.
Wore this dress for my graduation. The fit was perfect. It was super flattering on. Received compliments all night long. Would love to rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Fun, cute, flattering dress for anytime
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress several times--out to dinner with black tights and pumps, to a brewery with bare legs and strappy black shoes, and with black tights and combat boots for running errands. It was incredibly cute, fun, comfortable with an elastic waistband, and flattering. I am 5'4" and, normally, I am a size 6; however, in this dress, I ordered a size small and it was perfect. Because of the cut of the dress, I wore a strapless bra on one occasion and with a regular bra (the bra straps were covered by a jacket) the other times. I would definitely rent this dress again.

Wore this dress for a New Years Eve event at a local bar. Was a really cute dress and so comfortable! I lived the velvet: even though it’s a LBD, it was a nice touch that made it different from the other dresses I’ve seen. Event I went to included an all-you-can eat buffet so I was also grateful for the elastic waist. Fit was perfect, true to size. Wore a strapless bra with it. The only small con was that it was very, very short, so had to wear shorts under the dress. Given it was winter, it was actually warmer so not that much of a con. Would highly recommend this dress.
This is very comfortable to wear. I paired it with a cute jacket and tights and wore to a ladies lunch in the city. The mock neck is flattering and could be dressed up for more formal occasions.
This dress is much more casual than it appears. The waist is a stretchy band that can be seen which really makes the dress less appealing for a more formal occasion
Great comfortable dress. The waistband is stretchy and the collar beautiful
I wore this on my honeymoon as a swim suit cover-up. I loved the colors, it was easy to wear and FUN!

links_Review_Title: So Nice I Rented It Twice!
links_Review_Text: This is a super dynamic dress that you can dress up with heels and accessories for a more formal affair or dress down with sneakers and a jean jacket for everyday wear. I'm an A cup and loved being able to throw it on with no bra and head out the door feeling put together. The straps are a little long and often fell off my shoulders, but no biggie.
Worn for a full day at a music festival, 96 degrees. PERFECT dress, so breezy and comfortable. A little see through so plan undergarments accordingly
Bad waistline for anyone with hips! And too much cleavage. Just didn't sit well when on.
This dress is super cute for the beach. It's hard to tell from the pictures, but it's actually a rainbow pattern. Low cut so I wore pasties instead of a bra.
I have a short torso and the straps weren't adjustable so I had to get creative. Overall I really liked wearing this dress.
Very cute flattering and fun. Definitely summery, great as a nice summer dress or for vacation! True to size

This dress is absolutely adorable! I rented it for my Spain holiday and wore it multiple times. Perfect for warm weather, fabric is light, the brights colors are so fun! The length of the dress is short, but still felt super comfortable wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but top is large
links_Review_Text: I love the colors and shape of this dress - it looked great! BUT the top kept falling down on me all day - it was super annoying. Would rent again in a smaller size for a beach day or summer event

Rented this dress for vacation in Mexico & absolutely loved it. Different from what I'd usually wear in both the style and colors of the dress which was fun. The material is very breathable and light - perfect for a hot day. I am a 26 inch waist right now and it fit great - stretchy so it hugs your body but not tight or uncomfortable as all. I am small chested and would have the straps taken up if I owned it - only drawback for my fellow itty bitties. Loved!

links_Review_Title: Super fun dress, even for tall people!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'11 so I tend to be disappointed by dresses because half of my butt cheeks are hanging out. However, I loved this dress. I didn't feel awkwardly tall in it. I felt appropriately covered. I like how it swished around my booty. Also always love a dress that I don't have to wear a bra with. So all around happy!

absolutely love this dress! wish they would have had it in a small but i made the xs work for me with shorts underneath since it was a bit on the shorter side! perfect for vacation, the colors of the dress are so cute and i got so many compliments on it!
You put on this dress and never have to touch it again. The smocked top makes it sit and fit comfortably, even with the low neck. Can dress it up or down. Great rental!

this dress fit really nicely, it was a little short so I would maybe go up a size next time, but I didn't have to wear a bra, so that was a plus! giving it four stars because the material was a little itchy but overall really cute! the colors are brighter in person :)
So colorful and unique!
Wore on vaca. Easy and light. So comfy and loved all the colors.

links_Review_Title: Girls night out. Loved that it's current and fun for spring. The straps were too long though.
links_Review_Text: #spring

links_Review_Title: Cute and flirty but not for the small chested
links_Review_Text: I have a really small chest (34A) so the straps were too big and I had to wear a bralette under the dress. I also felt the waist was a little bit too low do it wasn't as forgiving as some other fit and flare dresses. It's very thin material and brightly colored - perfect for a beach vacay.

I rented this to match a shirt I got for my little boy and wasn't sure based on the reviews. This dress is SO flattering, the perfect length, and comfy! So many compliments. At 27 and 5'9" (with a toddler) it's hard to find a dress that's both a sassy and appropriate cut - this is it! I am a O and the extra small fit perfectly, so size up if you are in between.
Loved the colors in this dress! It was light weight and easy to pack for a beach vacation, gave it 4 stars because of the sheer material, I recommend spandex underneath.
I'm in love and may have to buy! Wore this dress for a photo shoot with my girls and it was absolutely perfect in every way.
Loved this dress. Is a little see through so needs a slip, and I pinned the front a little to make it slightly less revealing (was for a baby shower).

I felt like a snack the moment I put this on (lol). I don't usually rent short dresses but this one caught my eye. I got so many compliments. The best part about this dress was that it somehow gave me cleavage (with bra) but usually that never happens because I'm small chested. I recommend! I'm 5'2 and 123lbs. I wore the small.

links_Review_Title: Runs a little big, but perfect for vacation.
links_Review_Text: The arm/shoulder straps are WAY big so I wore them off the shoulder. This lead to some worrisome almost flash moments but a fun, airy dress for warm weather vacation.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to an outside festival.
links_Review_Text: Loved the weight of this material. Cool enough to wear to a hot outdoor festival but thick enough not to be see through. Fits right in the rib cage area. I like this being larger chested. Makes your waist look small. I'm 5'7" so quite short.

links_Review_Title: Straps are long and cannot be adjusted
links_Review_Text: Wanted to wear this dress to a friends birthday dinner but didn't feel comfortable leaving the house. The straps were about a 1/2" too long and would have needed to be secured by tape or safety pins. It is also more revealing in the chest area and shorter than I would have liked. The waist line stretches which was very comfortable and flattering. If it wasn't for the straps, a size M would have fit better.
Cute day time summer dress very low cut
True to size. Fun dress that is very flattering. Straps are a little bit long and loose, but it didn't make much of a difference!

links_Review_Title: it was light and airy, perfect for a hot night
links_Review_Text: no bra needed, or a deep v bra would be okay- the straps were a little loose on me but it was great
Super cute dress but for people who are tall (I'm 5'10") it fits more like a top! Wish it had like 2 inches on the end so i could've worn it.
Did not wear. Not made for girls with a chest

links_Review_Title: Was very tight. I normally wear a large or XL and even sometimes a medium. This fit like a medium.
links_Review_Text: Was very tight. I normally wear a large or XL and even sometimes a medium. This fit like a medium.
Super fun dress! Great material. No bra needed, perfect for summer. Straps are a little long so would be good for the long torso girls
Super cute dress , if you like to show a little cleavage you will love it. Lots of compliments and great summer colors .

The straps were a little long on me and made the dress very low cut but then pulling it up made the dress too short so I ended up pinning it in the front. It's a fun summertime dress (I wore it to a baby shower) and was very comfortable!
Straps were loose - small chested
Very cute dress but I'm barely 5'4" and this dress looked more like a long shirt on me.
Absolutely fabulous, so cute and simple. Loved it and will rent again
fabric was very thin and flimsy
Loved this dress. So comfortable and flattering. The straps were a little big and I had to wear a bra because it was too big with my small boobs if I didn't.

Such a comfortable dress. Perfect for my pear-shaped body. I used booby tape because you can't wear a bra due to the low back, and taped the shoulders up because as others mentioned, they frequently fall. Gorgeous, classy dress.

I rented this dress for a wedding. It is very well made and cut just right for me - pear shaped, longer in the torso, smaller chest, and tall. I felt like it showed just the right amount of my back and I love the boatneck in the front. I don't usually go for black but I'm glad I did. I would rent this again! It's definitely not a dress for someone with a large chest because of the low back and the material, there's no way to get any support underneath without it showing.
Si pretty elegant classy sexy and super comfortable, I will totally rent again
Beautiful Aline skirt and two slits in front as well as open back

Love the backless style of this dress but I felt like it accentuated my hips so it didn't make the cut. Nice weighty material. I wear between a 6&8, the 6 fit best. The 8 was even bigger across the hips and gaped a little on the neckline.

links_Review_Title: This dress fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfectly timeless and chic. I was a bit worried about what to wear underneath, but the fabric was thick enough for me to go without any stickers!! The only con I would say is that the sleeves fit a bit weird so it fell off once or twice but nothing double stick tape can solve. I loved this dress so much, the cut, the slits, the fabric and the fit - I would definitely rent this piece again!
Great classic dress! Very stylish. You will need to have some height. I am 5'6" and it was tea length on me. Pretty sheer in the front so you will want some silicone covers probably.

Great and flattering fit, only used nipple shields since it was tight enough in the bust. It is unlined and the seams on the sides of the dress and the tag in the back were very uncomfortable and irritated me both times I wore it. Tip- the fabric loops to hang kept slipping out of the back, so I used fabric tape to secure them inside the dress.
Very comfortable dress, love the back cut and perfect for wedding!

While I didn't ultimately end up wearing this dress to the event, is is worth noting here how comfy and easy to wear it seems to be. There is a little stretch to the fabric. If you plan to wear this dress, you may want to use fashion tape to help keep the "sleeves" from moving around on your.

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable classy dress for formal wedding
links_Review_Text: I am usually a 2 or a 4. I am very petite, with little bust. The 2 fit well except the cap sleeves didn't stay well. It also was a bit long and I wished it would have come in a petite length. Other than that I got many compliments and the dress was very comfortable and I wore it for 12 hours! Dancing and all. Husband loves it on me.
It was a bit long for me. It fit a bit oddly in the shoulder area. This dress is probably better on someone that has an average to long torso. On me it looked a bit frumpy.

links_Review_Title: heavier than it looks and complicated to put on, but fits like a dream
links_Review_Text: the reviews were truthful in saying they this is a doozy of a dress to put on- there are three major components , the skirt zipper, top clasps, and the vast amount of strings to tie. but if you can muddle through , you get a beautiful dress that sits very flatteringly. I was mildly disappointed that the back wasn't more interesting - it's very "clothed" and hides the interesting details - but the front makes up. i'd want to wear this again for a vacation or formal affair
Chic effortless dress! I wore from day to night.

I rented an 8 rather than a 6 and it was a little big. This dress is definitely structured and made with a thicker material- I thought it would be light and airy, made of cotton WRONG! Despite that it was beautiful to wear and I received many complements! I would rate this dress true to size despite renting a an 8 vs. 6.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, wrinkles easy: here's how to put it on
links_Review_Text: To put it on, step into it and zip the zipper on the side. Then pull the top part up so the circle is below your chest. Put your arms through the holes in that fabric so that the clasp part that looks like a bra strap is clasped on the side of your body and not in the back. Pull the front part of the Dress up and tie the top strings up behind your neck, positioning the capelet over your shoulders. Then tie the second lot of strings together in the back. This dress is so gorgeous. Extremely heavy though and like everyone else said, wrinkles so easily that you'll only look good for about 30 minutes before the creasing begins
Rented this for my bachelorette and twirled all night wearing it! Perfect for a beach vacation

links_Review_Title: PERFECT dress for my honeymoon to Greece. Stunning cutouts that aren't skanky, but feel glamorous.
links_Review_Text: The dress was complicated to put on at first. Skirt was a bit big but hung elegantly on my hips. Didn't need a bra. Fabric was a bit heavy.

Fun dress. The wrinkles you see are from my daughter sitting on my lap. It wrinkles and creases very easily, and the wrinkles stand out. This is not a complicated dress to put on: 1- zipper on lower left side (like a skirt); 2- a top tie and middle tie in the back; 3- four vertical hook and eyes on the upper left ribcage. The hook and eyes are easier with a partner, but I was able to fasten on my own with a little bit of work. I planned to rent this for a white boat party, but after reading a review that stated it could be dressed up, I rented it for a theater outing. The material is heavy, which is what elevates it to being dressier than you'd assume from the cut of the dress. I probably won't wear it for the boat ride.

links_Review_Title: What a unique dress! Plan to take 10 mins to get it on, it's delightfully complicated
links_Review_Text: I needed an instruction booklet to put this on, and could've used some help, but once it was on, it was glorious! I felt like a goddess!
This dress is stunning and way more substantial then the photos let on. Complaints about all the straps I don't understand. It wasn't rocket science to put on. The slit is a nice touch.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful (but complex) dress for a formal affair!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a styled bridal photoshoot and I thought it was beautiful. It is very complex to put on and you will need someone to help you, but once you get it figured out, it's comfortable and feels very secure. It's hard to tell from pictures, but there's fabric that goes across the chest, so there's no risk of under-boob. You can't wear a bra with this dress and there is no padding in the chest, so I would say pasties are necessary. The material is very substantial and not at all see-through - more of a heavy, formal material than a casual, light dress. The back dips down pretty low and a lot of lower back is visible. If you are between sizes, size down, otherwise you run the risk of it being baggy and dipping down a little too low. Even when I sized down, the waist was comfortable and did not cut into my sides and create a "muffin top" or rolls in my low back.

This dress is definitely complicated but totally worth it!! Don't expect to put it on yourself, you definitely need a second set of hands but once you figure that out it's GORGEOUS!! I wore it for a black tie affair and dressed it up with jewelry and sparkly shoes. I wanted to keep it and wear it again for dinner because you can definitely dress it down. I will definitely rent this again and I am so tempted to purchase it!! It really is that AMAZING!!

The design is lovely. It felt like a high fashion piece- flattering, pleasantly complicated, heavy material that draped beautifully. Unfortunately it is white and probably very popular. It looked dingy and old- too old to wear.
I needed help figuring out how to get this dress on. This dress would not fit a tall girl. It barely covered my chest. No bra needed. The dress is heavy and wrinkles.

links_Review_Title: Tall and slender ladies should grab this dress. The lining was too tight for me.
links_Review_Text: Great dress for the more slender, narrow, tall ladies out there.

Was really excited to get this but as soon as I picked up I noticed the weight of the RTR bag. Also the shoulders fell forward making me look like a linebacker. Sad because I usually love this brand and fit!

links_Review_Title: If you're looking for a challenge, rent this dress
links_Review_Text: For the life of me I couldn't figure out how to put this on. With some help, I got it on right and it didn't even look flattering. A hassle to take off too!

links_Review_Title: This was a hit, very flattering
links_Review_Text: this dress was so flattering. I over it, received a million compliments

I rented this dress for an engagement party. The 2R fit perfectly for me, and they have 2 different clasps to make it looser/tighter around the bust area. I am 5'3'' and it hit me right at my ankles with short heels on. The material is really nice, somewhat heavy, but I was never hot due to the fun cut out's in the back! I got tons of compliments, and would totally rent it again for the right occasion!

links_Review_Title: Wasn't what I was looking for
links_Review_Text: Its a very complicated piece to put on

links_Review_Title: I have a masters degree, but couldn't figure out this dress. Too complicated for a vacation dress.
links_Review_Text: Too many ties, zippers and hooks to put together. It also showed the rolls in my lower back.

Quality semi-formal dress. Perfect for evening wedding. I'm busty, but no need for bra. I danced the night away with no worries. Comfortable and flattering. Lots of compliments. The zipper on the side gets stuck, I needed help to put on and zip up.

links_Review_Title: This dress was secure and very flattering! I got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress is tighter up top and has no give. I would suggest maybe going up a size if you have a larger chest like I do. I'm 5'3 and the dress was a little longer than tea length but did not hit the ground in a small heel.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, elegant and fun, and an easy fit!!
links_Review_Text: Perfect for a formal night out! Truth be told, his was not my original pick for this formal wedding, but I am SO glad I got this dress as a back-up. I received compliments all night long! The fit is great - I wore no bra, no shapewear, and no taping needed. I put it on and off I went. Also, no worries about wrinkles, the dress travels well, and has its own structure, so it was so easy!! This is what renting was meant to be about! There's swish in the skirt which made it fun to dance in, and on me, it was longer than midi, which for winter was fine - it meant it didn't touch the snowy/slushy ground, and that I was a little warmer. The dress photographs well too. In the photobooth, my dress popped (in a good way)! I didn't want to give this one back.

Both dresses fit but the 2 was tighter at the bust so I thought I'd be more comfortable with the 4. The colors are beautiful. I am short so the dress was long on me; almost full length. It was comfortable to sit in and dance in. This dress was different then ones I have rented in past. I let my husband pick it but I was happy with the look and the fit.
Fun dress and I got a lot of compliments! Had to go up a size due to the zipper on the side being just a little too small.

links_Review_Title: This dress is stunning. Feels as good as it looks. Felt pretty and was able to dance, sit and eat.
links_Review_Text: Just right fit in the bodice. Forgiving in the hips and rear if you have curves. Hangs beautifully. I loved it.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a prom theme party
links_Review_Text: Very flattering a line. Could've gone down to a 4. But the store only had the 6 and it was also fine.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for formal Christmas Gala
links_Review_Text: This dress is very true to size, I am almost always a size 2 regular, this fit me like a glove. I think this dress was great for a winter formal, but honestly the design makes it perfect for all seasons. I am about 5'5 had on 3 1/2 inch heels. The bottom of the dress touched my ankles. It also has a beatuiful copper thread woven in fabric, so it does have a more formal vibe to it. I was super happy with how it turned out.
Beautiful fit! So classic and elegant!!

This dress might just be one of my fav rentals ever-- high-end fabric with a subtle sheen, well constructed and falls on the body beautifully. The length might leave you slightly perplexed; I'm 5'3" and it wasn't quite floor length but not tea length either so you'll need to carefully consider the height of your footwear. Tip for wearing it: put double-sides tape on the ends of the faux belt strips to keep from readjusting it all night as it tends to flip to its backside with movement.
it didn't fit too small

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but runs slightly small.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous fabric with really vibrant blue and gold. A bit tight in the arm area....decided not to wear. I generally wear a size 6 but this was too tight.
Pretty dress. Size is more like bridal gowns- buy 2 sizes above your regular size.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a princess - lots of compliments. Classy : )
links_Review_Text: The chest runs small - the 6 would’ve fit but tight thru chest so I wore the 8 R
This dress is flattering but has holes in the knitting on top. It's more casual than I expected so it'd be great during a weekend sunny day.

This dress is fabulous!! I am 5'5.5" and the length of the dress was great. High enough above the ground that it wouldn't drag but not too high that it would look awkward. The print is really fun also! I could wear this dress all day and it would be comfortable. I'll definitely rent this again!

links_Review_Title: I love this dress! Thinking about buying it.
links_Review_Text: It was really long. I'm 5'4, wore low wedges, and it still hit the ground. It was very flowy when you walk which made it that much prettier! The top portion was sweater material. I have huge shoulders and big chest, and it fit me perfectly. May be baggy if you are small up top.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to work, and loved it.
links_Review_Text: This was one of my favorite rentals. The colors are so much prettier than the pictures show. We can't wear sleeveless at work, so I wore it with a short sleeved sweater. I sized down one size, as other reviewers recommended, and it fit perfectly. Received several compliments at work.
I liked it a lot more than I thought I would. And definitely runs big, the 12 was perfect for me and I am almost ways a 14.
Not in love with this. Thought I'd give it a try. Just didn't look good with my body type
Fantastic dress. Paired it with a mock t-neck and boots for a Fall day at work.
About 4 in too long and loose on top. It felt baggy. Pretty design, color, and material textures. I would size down if you are under 5'4.

I'm obsessed with this dress. I stalked it on RTR unlimited waiting for an occasion to wear it. Ended up ordering it to wear on a bachelorette party to wineries. It's incredibly comfortable and flattering. I was able to wear a regular bra with it. The color and patterns were so unique it's a real stand out. Compliments all day long! I really want to buy but can't justify the cost!

links_Review_Title: Very attractive - wouldn't purchase but great for RtR
links_Review_Text: Tons of compliments, great fit in the bodice for narrow shoulders/small bust but a bit too long to be worn with flats. Skirt material is thin but thankfully not see thru. Someone said this is the perfect RtR dress and I totally agree - I wouldn't buy this at the suggested retail price point, but perfect to mix in your wardrobe for 1 month.

RTR suggested a size up (from 12-14) and this was NOT necessary. Dress is true to size so my 14 was too big (and too long) and dress also has stretchy top so a size up made top huge. I had to wear with little jacket or sweater because it just hung on sides. The dress itself is very pretty-has more pink than can be seen in pictures, and the skirt flows beautifully (although at 5'6 I had to wear heels-it is long).
This dress fits absolutely true to size. It's super comfortable and fun to wear. I am 5'6" tall and it was just the right length.

links_Review_Title: Loved the differing patterns and colors. Wore to work and play!
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress, pattern and colors. The fit was kind of weird above the waist and alongside and below the chest. It has a side zipper, which sometimes bunches up or out. I wore this dress multiple times and was so sad to turn it back in. I would definitely rent it again!
Fit a bit on the large size. Cute flowy dress. Lots of compliments. 5'4" and the dress just hit the ground with flats on.

links_Review_Title: Fun pattern, comfortable, gave me a little belly?
links_Review_Text: This is a great dress that is different and interesting and completely comfortable. My only gripe was that the pattern/fit gave me/accentuated a little tummy!

To me, this dress is perfect for rent the runway. It's super cute but the sweater top isn't that well made and the skirt is rather thin. The actual cost of this item would be insane but renting it for a few days was great. I wore it to work and got lots of compliments. It was fun and I liked transitioning it from day to night.

links_Review_Title: Loveeeee it..very trendy and perfect for summer
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress. Loved the color and it is so trendy. I have a post partum belly but it did not show it that much. The top hid my bra straps well too. It's a little long for my height but perfect for someone who is 5'3" or longer. The color is very unique. And it is super comfortable
Great dress. Runs a little large on the top but great length and pretty for spring / summer
Wore with a regular bra and booties to work.m, braless with flip flops for a music festival. Super versatile, super comfy, so cute.

Perfect for a casual day. High quality material, wonderful colors (the skirt is brighter than it appears). Wore once to work, paired with denim jacket - keeping to wear again over a long holiday weekend!

links_Review_Title: Different but cool dress for everyday
links_Review_Text: Really liked this dress and got a lot of compliments. I wore a black tee underneath to make it more work appropriate. Overall a very fun and different pattern that looks great. I'm a 12/14 and did think the 14 was too big...12 would have been more fitted and I'd do that if I rented again.
Very pretty, easy to wear though I'd be scared to eat much (the skirt is nicely draped but very thin). Gorgeous knit work up top and unusual color combination. Could be dressed up or down.
This dress was extremely comfortable and flattering. Needs a strapless bra or no bra. I got a lot of compliments. I would rent again
I loved the flow of this dress. I felt like I was gliding when I wore it! I'm in between a 16-18 and the 18 was definitely too big. Will rent a 16 next time.

This gorgeous dress is sooooo comfortable and fits perfectly. It's a great length and the combination of patterns works beautifully. I wore a normal bra with pretty straps in case they showed. Strapless would probably be better......but I wore to work and wanted to be comfortable. I'm looking for other places to wear this dress again!
Light weight knitted top with flowy silk bottom. Pretty gold print that looks great with a vacation tan! Fits true to size.
Fit like a glove, flattering, comfortable, able to dress up or down. Wish I could keep it. Lots of compliments
I loved this dress! Light and flowing. Super comfy and versatile.

Brand new with tags still on it this dress is light and flowy. I tossed a jean jacket on over top and went on my way. I received so many compliments, will definitely rent again. May even consider buying!
Slightly long, but otherwise, perfect!

Very comfortable and a cut that would be flattering on anyone. The color combination is easy to work with. Can be worn with a leather moto jacket for an edgier look or more flowy fabrics to soften the vibe. I'm 5'5' and this dragged without heels. Will rent again in the spring or summer.

What a beautiful dress! Flattering fit. Complements all around. Pattern is beautiful and the texture of the bodice adds a unique component. Wore to work, to my son's school play, date night. Thinking about keeping this one.
Conflicting patterns, but very comfortable

links_Review_Title: Love this dress, comfortable for work!
links_Review_Text: The fit is amazing

I felt like I was wearing PJs to work this was so comfy. My regular size 6 was not in stock at the time I ordered this, so I sized up to 8 and it was no problem. It was a bit loose on the top for me but not noticeably baggy. I'm average height 5'5-5'6 and I would say that I couldn't wear this without heels as the length is a bit long on me. If you're not tall and hoping to wear the dress with flats, this might not be the dress. One thing to note is that the skirt is really light, so it was great for hot summer days. But as it's starting to get cool with autumn I don't think this dress will wear well as the seasons change.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but too big in the top and too thin in the skirt
links_Review_Text: Long, even for 5'11" Very pretty but too big on top (I'm 32ddd), and the bottom in very thin. I'm going to send back and try a smaller size
Wore this for a weekend getaway to wine country! It was perfect! Very flattering/ lots of compliments.
Loved the dress, but at the end of the day I got worried if it was see-through. Would check other reviews to make sure.
Wore for friend's lake rehearsal dinner. Paired with a. Jean jacket.

links_Review_Title: The material is so flowy and light!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress when I coordinated a Wedding. Perfectly elegant and easy to move around in! Loved the style!

Cons: the slip underneath was a little bit worn. But it can't be seen on the outside so that was OK. Also, the sleeves were REALLY long. I had to pin them up, but after I did that the sleeves were fine. Pros: the dress is so comfortable. The skirt is really flattering because it moves so pretty when you walk.
Many compliments on style and fit. Easy to wear, felt great and didn't have that "trying to hard" for fashion feel. Loved it.

Although this was a little long on me, it worked out quite well. It's extremely comfortable & easy to wear. I tried to capture the movement in my photos, but you need to experience to truly understand. I wore it to a trade show & got TONS of compliments as I walked around. It's subtle, but definitely makes a statement. Also looked good with knee-high boots.
It looks best if you pair it with a thin belt, really classy and comfortable.
Way too long (I'm 5'4") and it came down to my ankles. It also runs pretty small - I'm normally a size 6 and the large fit me.

links_Review_Title: Not right for this 32 year old, but would be cute on my mom. Length's a little long. Arms run long.

links_Review_Text: I'm a huge fan of this dress and I will rent again. The slip and the sheer cover are entirely separate pieces, so there's no annoying tugging. There are slits on the sides that make it easy to walk, but because of the excess fabric and flow of the dress, they're not especially noticeable and don't make the dress inappropriate for work. I felt comfortable and elegant.

Fit perfectly and loved the quality. When I walk, the hem flows out and my coworkers loved it! Could've paired with boots for a 90s look but wore with heels for the office. Reminded me of a multi-slit sheer dress my mom had when I was younger.
Fit nicely. Was not bothered by the slits in the skirts like some reviewers - did not find it too revealing.

links_Review_Title: I probably should have gone with an XS - the concept is great but ran big for me.
links_Review_Text: Love the slit - and it is tapered in the waist a little to help give it more of a shape.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, watch the side slits!
links_Review_Text: Didn't realize this dress had such high side slits until I was already at work.... Other than that, I loved this dress!

Rented this for an Orthodox day wedding. Fit all the criteria for the dress code but still fun and flirty. Since this was rented in March in Maryland and the material is very thin, I paired it with a dressier jacket and suede boots and it worked really well. Fit (XS) was perfect for me at 5'3" and a 32" bust and I liked the longer length. This dress would not work for small bustier women. Actually considered buying it because of it's versatility. Still might.

I wore this to a church event with a string of pearls and pointy pumps. Such a beautiful style and perfect fit. I am 5'6 and true tea length for me. The bottom of the dress has several slits so it has great movement as you walk. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Is fun to wear but the fit is weird
links_Review_Text: I liked this dress and got compliments on it but the slip was small and the outer shell was large. I also was not a fan of the cuffs. They close at the bottom and splay out at the end. I rolled them up because I thought they looked weird.

links_Review_Title: This was a nice dress for work
links_Review_Text: This is a good work dress. It's a little sexy with the sheerness of the outer layer, but conservative too.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress that I wore with a blazer to work. The fabric drapes perfectly in the skirt.
links_Review_Text: The fabric is light so better for warm climates.
I found this dress at the RTR store. It is comfortable and flowy. The slits in the under dress bring a note of sexy. A lovely, comfortable dress.
Beautiful and comfortable fit. Will rent again.

Wore this to a barn wedding. It was absolutely perfect for the occasion. The dress is much prettier in person and looks even better on! The yellow is amazing for spring and has gold stitching through the lace which makes it look way more elegant than it seemed online! I always love dress the population pieces and this was definitely no disappointment!
pictures do this dress no justice! Has beautiful gold details. Fits beautiful and i love that its long. Im 5'7 and i can never wear heels with long dresses! 10 STARS!

Fit awesome. Colors gorgeous. Sleeves irritated the hell out of my arms! Wore it for 10 min in the house and had to take it off- felt like something scratching my skin and was super annoying. Sent back :-(

I'm 5'7 165 lbs and 36 DD. This was really fun, comfortable and easy to wear all day. It was long enough for a low heel and has pretty good thread weaved through the yellow lace. Other than occasionally having to adjust the liner, it was great. Off the shoulder was cute but walking around you can also wear them as straps and it looks great either way. Fun dress.

links_Review_Title: Used it for my sisters bridal shower
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous yellow ...used it for my sisters Malibu Bridal Shower. I got a lot of compliments dress is better in person.

Pretty and different dress. The large fit fine but was more form fitting than I usually wear. I did wear spanx and control top underwear as well. I would have been comfortable if it had been more flattering to stomach area. Wore to my friends wedding in the mountains and it was dressy but also casual enough for the event

I was so nervous about renting a yellow dress considering I am blonde and fair skinned, but the dress was beautiful. As others have said, there is gold laced throughout and I really liked that aspect because it did allow me to dress it up. I wore this for a barn wedding in the middle of September, and even though there is a lot of material, it never got hot and was super easy to wear. I also never had to adjust the top, which is a huge plus when wearing an off the shoulder dress! The only downside was the way that the middle is cut. I almost wish it was more of an A line, because the bottom seam does really accent your stomach. Overall, I received compliments all night and would definitely recommend this dress if you are looking for a fun dress!

I rented this for a Labor Day weekend wedding in Newport, Rhode Island. I am 5'-11" and 150 pounds, straight and narrow build, very small chest. There was a little extra room in the chest, but nothing a padded bra I couldn't fix. I felt beautiful and confident, and the fabric was to die for, along with the amazing glowing yellow color!! Thank you rent the runway! I wore 2.5" nude wedge heel and magenta tassel earrings.

links_Review_Title: Pretty standout yellow but straps hurt
links_Review_Text: Another lovely dress from one of my favorite designers to rent. I wore the small which I normally do I am 5'4" the length was past the floor so heels worked for me. The straps I actually took my arms out of though because after awhile they were digging into my shoulders which made it uncomfortable although I like the look both ways. The dress drapes nicely and I would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for our last summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: Fit beautifully and got lots of compliments! I'm 5'8" and wore about 2.5in heels -- which were visible. I could have worn flats and the dress would have barely skimmed the ground, so either would have been fine.

links_Review_Title: This dress fits like a glove. Hard to believe it wasn't tailor made for me.
links_Review_Text: This dress is great. It's super comfortable and drunk proof too. I wore it through heat, several hours of dancing, and a whole night out and looked amazing doing it.

Best dress EVER!!!! I wore this dress as the maid of honor in a fiesta theme wedding and it was everything I needed it to be I received sooooo many compliments while wearing it, I was comfortable all night, and never had to fidget with the sleeves. The unique color and shape of this dress stands out amounts all the other dresses Beyond happy with this rental
This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding! The color and fit of the dress was beautiful. I’m 5’8’’ and wore flats and the SR hit the ground which I liked.

I am a busty, curvy woman. This dress was comfy and the yellow actually has a little shimmer sewn in the lace and makes you glow in the sun. I wore a pretty yellow bra and the straps showed but matched beautifully and my girls stayed up nicely. The cut was nice and high so no embarrassing cleavage at the bridal shower. The underskirt is quite short and has no give so size up if you're hippy. I wore this for 12 hours comfortably. It's long, which I liked, and wore a little wedge strappy sandal. Highly recommend.. you will feel gorgeous and get lots of complements!
I really loved this dress! I felt so beautiful and sexy during my anniversary celebration in New Orleans. My husband REALLY loved it as well so I'm putting in as a double win!!

I love this dress so much! I knew I wanted it for the wedding and it never came available on Unlimited so I ended up paying extra and renting it on Reserve- it was worth it! It was a few inches too long even with my 3 in heels, I was holding up the bottom for most of the night, especially while dancing, but it's such a beautiful dress so I didn't mind. It fit pretty tight in the belly area which I did not love. I got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: I felt like Belle from Beauty and the Beast and everyone complimented the color. #blackgirlmagic
links_Review_Text: A little tight around the bust, but super comfy. Stays up the whole time

This dress is so comfortable, flattering, easy to dance in, while also being a show stopper! It is very long though - I'm 5'8" and was in 3-4" heels and I had to pick the hem up to walk without catching my heel on the dress. Definitely something to consider.

I had fun with this dress! I love the off the shoulders and honestly didn't have to fiddle with the dress at all to keep it up or the sleeves in the right place. It's a long dress but the under layer stops mid thigh so good for hot weather. I'm 5'6 and wore two inch heels and the dress brushed the the top of the ground but didn't drag. The other size that I didn't wear had a very dirty hemline so watch out. There is a stitching line that falls right at your hips that can look unflattering at certain angles and sitting down. I loved it and it is definitely a unique piece to wear to a wedding! Lots of compliments

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for an early summer wedding
links_Review_Text: I felt like a complete princess in this dress. I rented both the XS regular and the S regular because the previous reviews said the dress ran long, and I agree. I ended up going with the XS simply because the S was too long- the fit otherwise was essentially the same. I was worried about the off the shoulder look not staying put throughout the night, but the dress didn't budge at all. The material was fairly heavy for how it looks, but I had no issues dancing or moving around in the dress all day. I would definitely rent it again!
Dress was perfect for me! I have a large chest so the large was needed to zip around my bust. I got compliments all night on this and it was super comfortable! I would buy this dress!
Wore this twice - once to a formal dinner and once just with my husband while out being tourists in San Antonio. He couldn't believe how many compliments I received! Super fun to wear!!

Based on reviews I sized down, and felt the small was a bit snug but was comfortable enough to wear to dinner and eat a full meal. I don't usually look good in yellow due to my pale skin tone, but it looked much better with a tan! Got compliments from restaurant staff who also noticed the gold detail on the lace. Breezy enough to wear on a tropical summer night!

links_Review_Title: The dress wasn't plain jane...a crowd stunner! I felt beautiful! I received compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'8" and needed the long for sure.

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress for a May wedding
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable and perfect style for an outdoor wedding in May. The ML was quite long - I’m pretty tall and the bottom of the dress brushed the ground, though I did wear flats. I liked the gold thread throughout, got lots of compliments on the dress.

Loved this dress. So many compliments. It was comfortable, and complimented all the right areas (neck line, waist, shoulders). I am 4 months pregnant too, so it accentuated my growing bump very nicely. Thinking about buying the dress and adding to my wardrobe!

links_Review_Title: Great casual chic boho feel! Color is a standout!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was perfect for an outdoor wine tasting birthday party! Dress is comfortable and roomy. Off the shoulder look was easy to wear since the sleeves were stretchy. Plenty of elastic so my arms could move easily. Fully lined and lace is heavy so was warm enough even at night. The yellow lace had gold thread trim that added a time bit of shine. Beautiful!
Dress was slightly long on me but I did wear flats. Overall fit was great though and it was very comfortable! Wish I could have kept this dress!

I am bigger in the bust & stomach (145 lbs, 36DD) and it still looked good. I was able to even get away with no bra because of the fabric falling over my chest - that’s rare! The dress was long but at 5’5” I still was able to wear flat sandals. If you are my size (I typically wear size 6 dress), I’d definitely recommend if you want a beautifully colored dress and to cover part of your arms.

This dress has caught my eye a few times and I finally had a reason to rent it. Wore this dress to my cousins outdoor wedding in Spring in Florida. It was just great and I got some compliments. There is good thread throughout so keep that in mind for your accessories. Fit great, quality was there and it was great for spring!

links_Review_Title: The color made this dress the tall of the event.
links_Review_Text: Pros: the COLOR and fit. It clings without being uncomfortably tight. Cons: It runs large. If you are tall and even a bit on the thinner side XS is the way to go.

links_Review_Title: Head turner for sure. Plus yellow is my favorite color. Wore it to a rooftop day party.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. I paired it with Sandals cuz it wasn’t long enough for anything else. Loved the fit and lots of compliments. Paired it with a black hat

I wore this dress to a dinner on vacation in the Caribbean. The dress is fitted in the waist area and so flowy and gorgeous throughout the bottom. I received many compliments and felt amazing in this festive number.

Love, love this!! But at 5'3" it was long on me... I wore wedge shoes and had a very hard time keeping it off the floor. The inner nude lining is somewhat fitted, so it made it difficult to keep this beautiful material off the ground while walking. Comfortable, and lovely!
Loved this dress!!!! Fun bright color, I got SO many compliments. Didn't fall off my shoulders. Itches a tiny bit but otherwise it was 100%!

links_Review_Title: Stands out, but in a good way!
links_Review_Text: This was actually my back up option and I'm so glad I ended up with this one instead. I got this dress for a wedding in Colombia and felt like a Latina Belle! It was modest, but fun and definitely stood out in a sea of blue and green dresses. I am normally a size 4 sometimes a size 2 depending on the material and cut so I tried the small and the extra small and ended up wearing the xs because I was hoping it was a little shorter. I couldn't wear a bra with the xs but it worked out fine. The only cons I would say were it was a tad bit long, or maybe I'm a tad short (even with heels). It was fine if I was standing still but dancing was a bit tricky. Also the lace elastic part at the top got a tiny itchy by the end of the night but didn't even leave any lines or anything. Overall loved this dress!

links_Review_Title: The most perfect tropical formal wedding pick!
links_Review_Text: Fabulous fit on the curves. Beautiful color and neckline. Recommend this dress!
I loved this dress!! It fit great and felt so comfortable. I'm 5'7" and I definitely liked the extra long even with wearing flat sandals.
Fit was perfect! Received lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, perfect for beach wedding.
links_Review_Text: This dress was gorgeous and was perfect yo wear to my son's wedding on the beach. It was a lot brighter than I thought it would be, but was still beautiful. It was flattering and felt great on.

links_Review_Title: Not really for winter, too heavy for summer, and too long for work... but quite flattering!
links_Review_Text: This dress makes me look like I have someone else's body! (Better!) It is a master of illusion, and makes your chest look larger, you look more statuesque, and your waistline look like it hasn't since high school!! But I have no idea where I can wear it. It is too spring-like for winter. I fear the double layer of knit on the bottom will be too hot for warmer weather. It is also LONG!! (I'm 5'7 and it is nearly floor length). Still... OMG!!!

Another beautiful Temperly dress. They run small and I took a chance on the medium (everything is tight post baby I'm a 6/8) and it just fit! A bit of a struggle to get on and straightened but the fabric is beautiful and sucks you in. I'm tall and I think this would be less flattering if the waist hit in the wrong place. A weird color choice but beautiful and fun, it's dresses like these that make RTR what it is I wore a nude bra and nude spanx thong to help smooth me out. The shoulders do slip

links_Review_Title: Not at all typical! Totally special dress!
links_Review_Text: Knit is so wonderful. Dress is made beautifully. Skirt flares out when you twirl. Dress is form fitting but not too tight. I should rent again.
Thinner than expected. Cute!
This dress is beautiful, but it runs small and has a very wide neck, I felt like I had to keep pulling it up. I still got lots of compliments when I wore it.

The overall actually runs small, I said large due to the fact I went larger on the size. Because all the reviews said run small. The waists runs small but the top runs larger. I had to tape the top up to be able to wear it because it was so big it wouldn't stay on well. I have 34D top. Great dress got lots of complements I loved the colors but definitely an odd fit.
This dress earned me a lot of compliments. However, it's not as stretchy as I thought it would be. As a pregnant woman, that made it slightly uncomfortable. Otherwise, it's very cute!
I wore this for Easter. It was form fitting and flattering. I could see myself wearing this again.
Loved this fabric. 2 layers of knit. Full coverage skirt and sleeves make perfect for work event

links_Review_Title: I wore this on vacation visiting museums with my family, I wore it on work meetings. It is the best.
links_Review_Text: The fabric is heavy, perfect for spring; the length is perfect for work or dates or dinner or; honestly, this I would have bought in a second.

links_Review_Title: This is the dress you wear when you want it to be spring!
links_Review_Text: Definitely reveals all the bumps and bulges so grab some shapewear. It was a little long for me both in the torso and overall length, but that didn't prevent me from happily wearing it. For daytime, I wore it with closed pumps and a black cardigan, in the evening I switched it up to black Frye engineer boots. Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Pull out your best undergarments for this one
links_Review_Text: This is a fun dress, but the knit fabric is unforgiving and will show every little thing under it. I was also afraid I would snag this on something, particularly the long skirt. Steer clear of Velcro and wood benches with this one!

This dress is a beautiful knit fabric. Quality knit, but is on the thinner side. Great for spring! I didn't end up wearing it because it just didn't hit me in the right places with my waist size and height. Would look beautiful on someone taller I think.

Runs small - I am an XS and the small was snug in the bust The top is more sheer than the bottom so wear a nude bra Pretty warm knit dress- not my favorite colors but definitely different- fun to branch out Also a little snug in the waist- I'd size up good for straight and narrow and slim bc it shows off your figure for sure
Neck is perhaps a bit low cut for work. At 5'4" this was ankle length on me. Somewhat unforgiving on the tummy bulge.

The colors were fabulous! The dress was fitted in the top and throughout the hips, but flowed down below that. I would have liked a looser fit throughout the hips and could have done without the lining which was fitted. Overall great dress for a date night or summer day

links_Review_Title: I wore this to host an event.
links_Review_Text: The dress is super long but I still looked good. It's actually ankle length not tea-length.
Very flattering heavy fabric
Form-fitting from top to mid-thigh. Length better suited for taller frames. Lightweight knit. Beautiful color and lines accentuate my curves!

links_Review_Title: How tiny it made my waist!
links_Review_Text: Get a nude bra for work.
This dress seemed tight, but once it was on it was comfortable and form fitting. It was long but it had a great flow to it.
top tight
A little tight in the bodice, a little too loose on the sleeves

A very cute dress, but the fabric is a bit harsh and the skirt is heavy. Definitely not suitable for maternity once you pop - the waistline is not very stretchy, so you have to keep it right under the breasts and it just makes everything else look weird. It also runs a bit small or maybe it feels so because it's not stretchy.
Very long. I'm 5'3 and it was down to my ankles. The length made it better for a baby shower or brunch than work.

links_Review_Title: It was a wonderful high quality knit - great color. A total hit for spring or early fall.
links_Review_Text: Fit tight through bodice but was manageable if you are wider through that area - size up!
So small the waistband would not pull over my chest. And there is no zipper.

I loved the material of this dress. Top was thin fabric and bottom came with another layer. I wore it with white sneakers but thought beige stilettos would have worked as well. I'm 5'2, 135lbs and wore a size 40. The length went all the way down to my ankles but even with flats, the dress still showed my white sneakers so I was happy with that. My only issue was the shoulder fit. Overall, nice dress!
Was so long it was dragging on the floor. Very heavy. The top/shoulders were pulled down by the sheer weight of the skirt. Sad because it's very cute.

I got SO many compliments on this dress! Literally everyone at work stopped to say how great I looked! I did wear spanx underwear to keep my tummy smooth, but I didn't think it was too tight. I would have kept it if it wasn't so expensive
I ordered a medium- could not fit this over my head- way too small. You'll need to be a size 2 or 4 to fit into the medium and tall. I'm tall but a size 8.

This dress is lovely. I would've bought it if it weren't so expensive. Such a lovely twirl on the bottom. It runs small on top. There was a terrifying moment that I didn't think it would go on and the get off. Rent it! You will love it!
Got lots and of compliments on this but keep in mind the top part is very see through so had to wear a cami under it
I love Temperley London and I know they run small in the bust. I gambled on this order and lost.

links_Review_Title: If I could keep the top from hanging crazy I would have loved it.
links_Review_Text: The material is KNIT and only the bottom half has a "slip" or lining if you would. The top half doesn't have the lining which made the top pull and slouch in a terrible way because the bottom was HEAVY which caused it to pull. Also, I would note that the model is likely above average height because this dress came all the way down to my heels.

links_Review_Title: Shape hugging fit with the best twirling bottom, but the material hurt to sit on after a while
links_Review_Text: Let me start by saying that I LOVED how this dress looked on. Its very form fitting material and if you aren't confident about your midsection, you may not like how unforgiving the shape and material is. Also sitting on it throughout the day actually hurt. I had to sit off to the sides, something about the stripes texture, still really liked it. Would rent again, but not for all day wear since it got so uncomfortable to sit on.

links_Review_Title: A stranger told me I looked like a professional Disney princess
links_Review_Text: Fabric is delicate, I wouldn't remember keeping in a hanger. Fun dress, a bit heavy so it was great for cooler spring weather.
Very long for my size 5'3".
Just didn't excite me. Nothing really wrong with it, just not my style when it showed up.
Flattering on the taller, athletic build. Heavy material though. Overall nice dress.
Runs a bit large. Had to tape it to my chest or else you can see right down it. Difficult to travel with... must have an iron
Love this top! Cute for a night out. Fits kind of large, I sized down. Pretty colors, may rent again to wear under a blazer when it gets cooler in LA.

This top is beautiful - the colors are bright and silky! I wore it to work with a cardigan and received all kinds of compliments! I'm keeping it for vacation this week!! I love it. Only one down side... after sitting at my desk for an hour, it did show wrinkles badly by lunch time!

I'm between a 4/6 and have broad shoulders but I really should have gotten a 2. It was too low cut (straps a bit too long) and too much material to be very flattering. Excuse the wrinkles. When steamed it is a beautiful shirt. Gorgeous satiny material and fun colors.
The fit was awkward- too loose around the bust area.

links_Review_Title: Returned because it was too big
links_Review_Text: No adjustable straps so bust was too baggy and low. There seemed to also just be too much fabric, it felt like I was wearing a tent. Not for short girls.
Not for me!

This dress will give you an amazing hourglass shape. I'm typically between a 6-8 and while the 6 fit, I would have preferred a little more room in the 8. The material and buttons dress it up a little and I couldn't find a jacket that worked well with it. At 5'9" it was perfect midi length but would likely be too long on shorter ladies
This dress is absolutely gorgeous I did not want to send this back!! I got so many compliments, I wore it to church. The material was so nice and well made no complaints.
Really great dress for curves. The straps are long, but I wore a blazer over mine and had no problems.

links_Review_Title: Flattering dress for a night out
links_Review_Text: Great dress, loved the cutout in the back. Only downside was that the straps were too long.. kept sliding down my shoulders. Probably wouldn't rent again.

This dress hugged me in all the right places but was still forgiving. The fabric was nice and thick but still perfect for a summer night out. I loved the gold buttons down the front and the fun back. Over this dress!!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for my engagement photos and it was great!
links_Review_Text: It fits true to size, but I have a small bust and the straps were just a tad too long. I also wished the dress were slightly more fitted at the waist which would have created more of an hourglass shape. Otherwise, overall it was a great dress.
Size up , no stretch super cute fit to dress up or down
It was as if the dress was tailored for me. Got perfectly. Straps could have been a little tighter, but it still looked great! I would definitely rent again.

It was long enough to be formal, yet playful enough with the buttons to show a little personality. The cut out in the back was nice and this dress can easily be dressed up or dressed down for a variety of occasions. It did feel a little lose so I would cinch it at the waist when i would take pictures. I don't think I would be as comfortable if I went a size down and the event I went to I had to move around a lot as an event coordinator so it was perfect!
A bit tight in the bust but overall a very cute and figure flattering dress

links_Review_Title: Loved this! Perfect for a bridesmaids luncheon. Could be dressed up or down.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable and flattering fit! Would rent again.
Luxurious

This dress was sent to me since the dress i chose as a back-up wasn't available. I wasn't even going to try it on but when i did I was surprised because I really liked it. I would have worn it but liked the other dress I ordered more.
This dress was even cuter in person!! Midi length, cute cut out in the back but I was still able to wear a strapless bra. Super cute!!!
It was a little big on me with the straps but my shoulders are narrow and I have a small chest.
I usually wear a 4 and the 2 fit perfectly. New favorite dress. Very flattering

links_Review_Title: A little snug for work wear but paired it with a sweater
links_Review_Text: Open back didn't make it appropriate for work but got a lot of compliments
great fit , comfortable. Flair at the bottom was fun without being too dramatic
Not flattering on stomach a little large up top
able to wear around town and out for the evening, very versatile

links_Review_Title: Loved this for a casual work event
links_Review_Text: This was really lovely for a "casual" summer work event. Only criticism was the strap length was too long and I spent a lot of the evening fussing with them/trying to get them to stay on my shoulders.
Really wanted to love this but it was just not right for my curves. If you are under 5"3 and have any shape this one's not for you.
I saw this dress on someone else first, and knew I had to wear it. It made me feel like a bombshell. Robust material so it holds it shape. But it's tight. Real tight.
Fit perfect! Was unable to wear a bra but worked perfectly fine without. Got several compliments on the dress.
I rented this dress for a derby party! It was great with a fascinator. Great fit, and look! Would rent again.
this dress is very well made. the fit is slightly large. the material has a little stretch.
I was excited to try this on. Unfortunately, it was an awkward fit for my body- way too loose in the waist and too tight on the butt. Couldn't wear

links_Review_Title: Little black dress with a fun twist!
links_Review_Text: Figure-flattering and comfortable. Trumpet skirt gave the illusion of curves without being a skin tight fit. Gold buttons and peekaboo cutout back gave this a fun, fashionable twist. Fit was true to size and length was perfect.

I would have bought it if it weren't so expensive. Definitely renting again, runs a teensy bit large (I'm between a 6 and an 8 and usually get 8' to be safe, but I prob could have gotten away with a 6). The straps are long and not adjustable, but I pinned them down with safety pins (as I often do). LOVED IT.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress, but is too big for me
links_Review_Text: #vacation

links_Review_Title: Strange fit and too long for work/everyday.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'8" and this felt too long, didn't find it flattering on an hourglass figure

This was a last-minute backup dress selection, as my original dress was unavailable. I was super nervous about it as I chose one size smaller than I usually wear in this designer due to my larger chest. I was happy to find the dress fit perfectly; I had no issues with the chest, waist or sleeves. I was comfortable and felt gorgeous!
Fit perfect. Was modest and classy for work but would work equally well for a party or formal event. Got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Love the fit and style of this dress
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a professional holiday party. It was festive but not too dressy. I got lots of compliments. The fit was also flattering.
December wedding for my brother-in-law wedding. It was beautiful! Fun dress for a winter occasion. I am short, so the sleeves were a little long (only con).
Wore to work and a work condensed. Beautiful and conservative. Fit true to size.
Comfortable fit, good for winter months. Wore to high tea in london and fit right in
I wore this dress to several parties and got lots of compliments. It's beautiful, but also very comfortable to wear.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous!! I got so many compliments throughout the night!!

This dress fit very well with a little give In all the right places. The arms fit great and the waist is defined. I will say it is a little on the short side. It could have been two inches longer and id rate this five stars. The color is beautiful too.
A perfect fit for my broad shoulders.

links_Review_Title: I felt great in this dress. Looked much better on then on the hanger.
links_Review_Text: This wasn't my pick but wound up being my choice. Very flattering and nice twirl. Fit to a t
So gorgeous. Pretty short, so I definitely had to wear tights for work.
I'm very short so I thought the length of the skirt and sleeves were great. There was even enough room for my 32J chest in the top! And the fabric was beyond gorgeous.
Comfortable and flattering

My usual size was unavailable when I rented this, so I sized up and added a belt to compensate for the extra room in the waist area, but it made the dress super fun. Plenty of room in the sleeves, which have no stretch. Tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress. I got lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress with tights and boots to work and then a dinner work event. It fits true to size and the fabric is gorgeous. Great length on me - I’m 5’5”. There is no stretch at all but it fit well.
Was a bit short so I wore black tights under it. Sort of scratchy on the arms because of the embroidery, but overall fit really well and was comfortable to wear all day.

This dress is probably one of favorites so far. The fit was true to size in every way. The sleeves have the right amount of give and the chest wasn't too tight at all. With the fabric being mesh for the embroidery, it's a breathable dress that can last through any kind of event.

I rented this for my 17 year old daughter for her High School Sadie Hawkins dance. She is 5'3", 130lbs, 32DD and a size 6 fit her perfectly. She said it was extremely comfortable. The sleeves have enough give and do not feel binding. The length was perfect for a modest 17yo. We added a tiny patent black belt just to break up the print and define her waistline a little more. Excellent win again for RTR!

This dress has plenty of room in the arms and bust which is so rare for me to find. I have a very large bust and my biceps are larger than average. This dress is very flattering and comfortable. I love it!!

I love this dress so much. The flowers are in between a red & pink color - the dominant shade depends on the lighting. The style is very flattering as most fit & flare dresses are. I want to say it runs small in the bust but I've recently lost weight and only noticed the tightness when I added a padded bra to fill out the dress better & it's very slight. If you're above a 38DD, as my bra makes me, be wary on that. Size up. Everywhere else fit slightly too big on me, but I'm almost positive it's because I've lost weight rather than the actual fits problem! At that awkward .5 size right now & it'll be a few more months before that's changes. All in all, I feel gorgeous & sexy in a lowkey way. 5/5 will rent again. I assume it snags easily too as my rental has a few in the embroidery parts from previous renters.

What a dress. It's beautiful and comfortable and doesn't ride up at all. I wore this to an evening wedding and couldn't have been happier with this dress. Easy to dance in and just a complete delight. Say yes to this dress!!! :)

I love this dress, it is so comfortable! Although fitted, it fits true to size and I would recommend curvier women sizing up. This style is such a beautiful dress and it is perfect for the colder months of the year. I was able to comfortably wear a standard bra with this and I would pair it with a pair of dark tights for the holidays!
Rented this for divorce court and I felt great! I'm pear shaped and it was very flattering. It helped me feel confident to kick ass in court. ;)
The material is gorgeous, but this was too short and poofy for me. Looked a little pregnant or like an overgrown babydoll. Otherwise, it is super beautiful. Might look great on the slender.
This dress was so pretty! Both the 10 and the 12 fit, but the 12 allowed for less restricted arm movement. Great for date nights or even a winter wedding!
Fit as expected, lot of compliments and very fun To wear with a leather jacket. Embroidery was beautiful. Great for large bust and hideous bras. Would rent again for the right occasion.
Really pretty dress but runs small. Especially if you're a larger cheated gal. I'm 38DD and I couldn't even get it zipped. I think I would have had to go up maybe 2 sizes.
Beautiful dress and wonderful detailing. For those with swimmers shoulders may require sizing up. Also, not for someone with a long body unless you're ok with an empire waist.
Very pretty dress but made my midsection look bigger that it is
This is a really stunning dress, which worked well at work and then to the symphony. The embroidery is gorgeous, as are the barely see through sleeves.

links_Review_Title: Was a little snug, but looked good
links_Review_Text: Comfortable even though it was snug. Waist kept riding up to my chest, so I found myslef pulling it down all night, but this was because it was a little tight. Looked good, got compliments.

The vibrant red and lace detailing in this dress are beautiful. It's very flattering! I rented this as a potential option for our engagement photos, but ended up going with a different dress. This was a close second!
This dress was delicate and intricate! It's beautiful and everyone will notice you. I felt beautiful! Appropriate length.
Was much brighter red in person than the picture.
Way to short and young for me to wear to work.
I wish the cut of the dress was more flattering to my body as the colors were super pretty. I looked like a young girl instead of a grown adult woman in this dress.
