This dress is really pretty, However I am only 5'2" and it was much to short for me to wear to the office. I rented it for a work trip so unfortunately it has to go back.
Pattern is pretty

I ordered this gown in a medium compared to the recommended small since I'm pear shaped. I'm glad I did, the small would have been too tight across my hips but it would have fit better in the chest. I wore this to emcee a pageant and it was very comfortable and I didn't have to worry about any wardrobe malfunctions. The length was perfect for my 5'3 frame with 5 inch heels.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a formal dinner and dance.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! The material is thick and super comfortable. I think the red is a little darker than what the pictures look like, but it's pretty. Just a heads up for fellow tall women, it runs a little short. I'm 5'9" and it hit at my ankles.
#militaryball
Ugh. I would buy it in different colors and wear it every day if I could. (If you're short, you'll need to wear heels with it, because it's pretty long.)

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my black tie winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: Easy to dance in, very comfortable, silt was a little higher than I planned on when I sat but that's on me for not doing a sit test in-store.
Style fit well and was cute. I chose to go with another style for the wedding I was attending, but would consider renting for another occasion. Love the leg slit!

links_Review_Title: Fun for a Gatsby themed gala
links_Review_Text: Overall nice. Zipper was really tricky. Slit was really high up. Ran small, be sure to size up!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to the Vienna opera, and it was perfect.
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit

I absolutely loved wearing this dress! It was very comfortable to wear and made me feel so elegant! The slit in the front stopped a little above the knee, which was the perfect amount of subtle sexy. I opted to wear the large because the medium was a little tight around my hips for my personal liking. I would rent this dress again in a heart beat!
The color is great. Runs a bit big. The slit is not at all too much. Great holiday rental

I originally rented this dress, but unfortunately my backup size was unavailable at the last minute, the the regular size was a tad too small. The material was beautiful though and the slit wasn't too high. Would try again!

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit. I received alot of compliments in this dress.
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit.

links_Review_Title: Cute! Just as pictured. But runs very large.
links_Review_Text: I ordered the small as my second dress, and I like things to be fitted...but I could grab so much of the fabric. I liked the look and feel of the dress, just as its pictured but it did not fit. I'm not sure if the XS would of fit either.

links_Review_Title: It was a great dress for this black tie new years eve party. I felt so special.
links_Review_Text: It was a little too long, even with my heels. I'm 5'4" and 160 lbs, usually a medium and size 8 in regular dresses, so I had to go for a large here but it fits great.

links_Review_Title: Great dress to feel pretty in
links_Review_Text: I wore this to the Christmas Eve service at my church as I play the piano. It was elegant and I received many compliments on it. I used a cardigan to dress it down slightly, but only for my preference. Other occasions, I wouldve showed off the shoulder details for sure! Definitely made me feel special. I am on the short side (5’1”). I had to hike the dress up so I wouldnt trip on it. Even in heels, it required some lifting. Also, the slit on the left leg was beautiful, but bc I had to hike it up, it made it difficult to carry and walk some times. I had to “waddle” run at one point. Overall beautiful dress. Nice satin material. Goes well with gold accents.
This dress was the perfect amount of sexy and classy for a recent wedding. Many compliments! The 6 fit like a glove. I'm 5'6.5" & 138 lbs.
Beautiful dress that is both sexy AND forgiving. It hugs you in all of the right places.
Fit true to size and felt very sexy without being too revealing. Buttons and ruffle add fun to an LBD. Would 100% recommend!
I loved it. Pretty sexy, deep v w a slit up the legs. I'm tall-5'11- and it was great length.

links_Review_Title: Fit was great, so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits like a glove, so if you prefer looser I would go a size up.
Great dress for a formal event. Fit is snug and feels a little tight after a full meal. Not too long for petite with 3 inch heels.
There isn't a single thing I would change about this dress
This dress is so sexy it's almost too much. Got tons of compliments. Wore it in Vegas and it was perfect. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Taller women may have better luck
links_Review_Text: I was excited because I love the Saloni brand. I ordered up - smart thing to do based on other reviews - I am 5'3 and usually a size 0. I ended up wearing the size 4! The straps of the dress were too long (so maybe if you were taller this wouldn't be an issue). My sister helped me pin the straps down but I wore it another time without any pinning and it felt like it was going to fall off. I wouldn't rent this again.
I was 10 weeks post partum when I wore this dress. It hid all my new rolls and made me feel sexy for the first time in months!

I loved this dress! The waist/rib cage is definitely tight like others have said, so you may want to size up. The slit on the thigh is VERY high - I didn't realize just how high it was until I put it on. This dress would probably fit best on taller women.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Winter wedding. Lots of compliments. Felt both sexy and sophisticated in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Fit is perfect. Great for a larger chest. Material is thick enough to keep the back smooth and clear of any bumps or bra lines but does not feel heavy at all. I was comfortable in this dress from start to finish.
Got a lot of compliments on this dress! The fabric is thick and it runs a bit small as I'm between a 4 and 6 and 6 just fit. Super cute and fun dress!

links_Review_Title: Sexy dress- was low cut and had a high slit. Perfect fit around waist to make it really flattering
links_Review_Text: I have a size 32DD and am 5'4. Typically wear a size 0 but listened to the comments and the 2R fit me perfectly
I usually wear a 10 not sure why I did a 12 it was too big I will definitely order this again but in a 10! Great with heals and dressy or flats for daytime. Definitely great to take on a vacation!
Loved this dress right up until the zipper popped wide open in the middle of the reception. There was plenty of room the zipper just had a snag in it so this could happen to anyone.
Classy, but sexy! Easy to move in, dance in, and pick up men in :D

links_Review_Title: Really cool design - but didn't wear
links_Review_Text: This is a sexy dress with a cool design (although my husband said it looked a bit western). Unfortunately, the straps were too long for my torso so I didn't end up wearing it.

This dress for sure shows some leg and cleavage, but it is just enough to keep it tasteful. I'm usually a size 10, and would recommend sizing up if you have a large chest. My husband loved it, and I did too.

The top was a bit loose and I couldn't wear a bra without it looking awkward, otherwise it fit perfectly. Could have maybe gone one size down due to the top. The v-neck and the slit made the dress more revealing than I would normally wear, but it was still classy enough for a formal event. The material was high quality. I would absolutely wear this dress again if I could!

links_Review_Title: Great dress. Fun to wear. Sexy slit.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable dress that could go fancy or party wear. Sexy slit was awesome. Not wild about the buttons but maybe you like them!
True to size ! Well fitted. Size 8 weigh 127 and am 5'5"

links_Review_Title: Perfect and unique for formal wedding!
links_Review_Text: When my original AND replacement dresses fell through I rushed to the Chicago RTR and rented this gorgeous dress I had been eyeing on the app. I am normally a 0: 32 bust, 25 waist, and I ended up renting the 2. As other reviewers have said, size up! A little tight around my waist as the night went on but the 4 would've been too big in the chest. I am a petite 5'2" and this dress fell right around my ankles. The slit was not a problem for me but I could see it being annoying for taller gals. This was low-cut and sexy and I'm not sure if I would wear it around family, but I felt gorgeous in it!
I really liked this dress, comfortable
I danced like a beast in it. Got so many compliments. Easy to wear a bra under. Great piece!

Amazing dress quality with a sexy leg split which is why I love this style from Saloni! I would recommend to size up in general since this does run small but also another size up for backup, especially if you are curvier in the hips since the fabric does not have any stretch. I love the length, which comes up as tea length for me at 5'6. It can be worn with a standard bra or skip the bra all together. Saloni does not disappoint yet again!

Classy dress. Great structure/quality. Too dressy for the office, and has a high leg split. Finicky fit as zero stretch. I went up from my normal size 6 to an 8 since Saloni dresses are usually tight in the waist for me. I have relatively large ribcage/waist. The waist was still just a tad too tight, and the top was a tad too loose. Length worked well for my height 5ft 7.

links_Review_Title: Sexy and Elegant, Very high slit.
links_Review_Text: Fit on top was great! Buttons looked elegant and I got a lot of compliments. No bra really needed which was nice!! Very flattering. Downside - The slit was VERY HIGH. I couldn't really sit down in it. So beware if you're going to something where you'll be sitting or traveling. The Uber rider to the event was slightly uncomfortable as I was trying to cover my legs since the slit was sooooo high.

I love Saloni, but this dress has a weird slip, and if you have hips, the dress will open up, so this is how it looks on me. I'm gonna wear it tomorrow only because it's gonna be dark, and because it's cold enough so I can wear black tights.

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing the dress
links_Review_Text: Sometimes I wear a 12. Sometimes a 10. I ordered a 12 and it was a bit big. Next time I'll order it in 10. Cute dress. Slit at side is pretty high.

links_Review_Title: Slit was way too high for me!
links_Review_Text: This was a really pretty dress but the slit was too high so I didn't wear it

I typically wear a size 4. I saw that some said it fit their normal size, and others said they sized up. I got two sizes up to an 8. I couldn't even zip it. This dress is a beautiful material, and It looked beautiful other than the fact that I couldn't zip it. It's a Cinderella dress - made for a specific person with a specific body type in mind.
A little low cut but sexy

didn't end up wearing it, but only because another dress fit the occasion better. fit great, usually wear a 6 in saloni. slightly long for me, but otherwise fit was great, very figure flattering. you will need apparel tape, deep plunge. sexy with the slit! will rent again for the right occasion!
The fit is quite tight in the rib case. I recommend sizing up.
A little tight at the waist.
This dress cinches your waist and gives you an Angelina Jolie leg. I am obsessed with this dress
The fabric was heavier so more formal than I had expected. Also slit in skirt quite high on me. Elegant though and I got lots compliments.
Cute and fit nice but it's heavy and uncomfortable for a whole day at work. Very low cut.
It's not the ideal fit. It's tight in the waist and it's very revealing in the front, but it was quite the hit!

I needed something last minute and the dress was great! I'm usually a size 2 and got both a 2 and a 4, both fit - the 4 was longer and the top would have needed a lot of tape to keep the goods secured, so I went with the 2. I didn't need any tape at all and it stayed put all evening. The fabric was stunning in person and the cut was perfect. Most Importantly even after stuffing my face, the dress was comfortable and still flattering!
Loved this dress. Definitely low cut but had no problems with keeping myself covered. I loved the way it made me feel. I wore This a black tie wedding.

The straps are wide due to the lowcut front and back so they to gape if you are not conscious of your posture. The front is VERY and I mean VERY daring for large busted girls like me. It was nothing a bandeau nubra couldn't fix though. This was a work related awards dinner so I had to have my cleavage contained. Worked great. Show stopper dress!
Dress was perfect for the wedding. It is slightly lower cute so be prepared. I had 0 issues with the dress

The dress is absolutely stunning! I received many compliments and I felt amazing in it. The base color of the dress is a beautiful slate color. The gold is brighter with light shining on it. The darker areas of the design are navy blue, not black. The dress would have been a solid 5 stars if it fit better in the chest area. I'm a 32B and wore a size 0. I tried double sided tape, which didn't help while dancing. I had on a backless plunge bra, which was a little help. Someone with broader shoulders, and a more perky chest area, would kill it in this dress. The waist area was a perfect fit, I'm petite. I still highly recommend you try it. Just have a back up just to be safe.

links_Review_Title: Great unique dress that made me feel girly and fancy at the same time
links_Review_Text: I was worried about the 6 because I'm skinny but have a post-pregnancy gut, but overall the dress fit very well, in the right places. Very low cut but I don't shy away from that. Didn't wear a bra and I wasn't too worried about any nip slips. I felt fancy and fun at the same time. Great rental for the wedding I went to, would rent again.

Cute cocktail dress I wore to my cousin's wedding. Didn't wear a bra but did use Victoria's Secret inserts to fill out the bust a little more and fashion tape to keep things secure. Fit was a little snug around the ribcage but the size 4 would have been too big in the bust. Overall would recommend.

links_Review_Title: Bottomless compliments from those of younger generations
links_Review_Text: Got a bit of a disapproving side-eye glance from a few older generations but that didn’t stop me from dancing my heart out! I used silicone pasties to cover the important bits and could have used some tape to keep the straps securely in place but it wasn’t necessary for me. This has been the most beautiful dress I’ve ever worn and truly did feel like a rockstar.

links_Review_Title: First time using RTR & I was absolutely stunned by their beautiful delivery & phenomenal service.
links_Review_Text: Dress was absolutely gorgeous !!!! I received so many compliments all night long. I was comfortable all evening and was perfect for a hot summer wedding. Compliments a large bust with support and beautiful cut. Wish I could have kept it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but boobs need LOTS of fashion tape and confidence!
links_Review_Text: This is a truly beautiful metallic dress. The navy is a deeper color so pairs well with a navy tux/suit. Just like many reviewers, I found the waistband tight while the straps way too big. I ordered a 10 and 8; and wore the 8. Also per reviewers, I ordered a lot of super sticky fashion tape and quite literally taped my entire front into the dress. The tape held me in all night but by the end was so itchy that I couldn't wait to peel off the dress. Also a note that I was first trimester pregnant (10 Weeks) in this dress and there was plenty of room in the skirt to accommodate a swelling belly (plus a night full of food). Must have a LOT of confidence to wear this dress!
This dress fit perfectly and was so much fun for our friend's wedding. Definitely a low cut, but I felt comfortable the entire night.

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments on this dress! It was perfect for a spring wedding.
links_Review_Text: As I am 5'10 many times dresses are not long enough but this one was great. The 4 was more fitted around the torso but I preferred it over the 6 because it kept the straps up. I would say if you are more busty this would be a bit more of a promiscuous dress for sure. But overall loved it!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress! The fit, the colors, the elegance. It was perfect.
links_Review_Text: It fit pretty well, except in the straps. All the reviews were right !! SUPER loose, so make sure you get some fashion tape to lock em down. Also definitely very chesty, so if you're not into showing a lot of skin then this won't be the dress for you. HOWEVER, you'll feel so so elegant in this dress. Plus you can go around saying "It's MARCHESA, dahling," which makes for extra fun.

links_Review_Title: Delivery and return were super easy !!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful and flattering for curvy figures. I rented a 6 and it was perfect. I'm 5' & 138 with a small chest. The chest is definitely revealing and I recommend nu bra or similar for a more secure feeling if you're smaller chested. I wore metallic gold shoes and they were just right!

links_Review_Title: This dress is a work of art!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress and received so many compliments! I normally wear a 2 but the fit around the rib cage is pretty narrow and the 4 fit perfectly. I didn't have issues with the straps and used a little fashion tape to secure the sides of the neckline. I wore this to a formal affair in 80 degree humid weather and it kept me cool all night. I seriously wish I could buy this dress.

links_Review_Title: Probably the best dress I have ever worn
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for a July wedding in NJ. Was comfortable, supportive (didn't need to wear a bra but did need a bit of fashion tape), and gorgeous. The gold accent in the dress is beautiful and it was easy to dance the night away with plenty of room to hide any food baby.

links_Review_Title: Great print and very unique. Loved the fit and flare style.
links_Review_Text: I was between two sizes and ended up in the smaller size (0) which was a little tight, but the size (2) was a little baggy up top and would have required tons of fashion tape. Nonetheless, I was comfortable all night and able to dance all night!

The pictures do not do this dress justice. The colors are so vibrant and beautiful. This dress was perfect for my husband's gala! I had to use a bit of tape on the top, yet I never felt like I was going to "fall out" at any point during the evening. The dress fell slightly above the knee. I really felt pretty in this dress and my husband loved it! I would highly recommend this dress, I received a lot of compliments throughout the evening. I ordered an 8 & 10, after changing a 6 to a 10. I think I could have worn either the 8 or 6. I usually wear an 8 or 10, it varies on the dress style.
Wore this to a girl's weekend in Vegas and loved how glamorous I felt. I'm usually a 4 but the 2 fit just fine.
This is a showstopper, and a pleasure to wear. The material is beautiful, feels like you're wearing art. Oh, and my boyfriend LOVED it. I would rent again.

Beautiful dress for my daughter's Winter Formal. The blue-gray color with metallic gold and silver - stunning! Short enough to suit her - long enough to make Mom happy. Dress is quite low cut in front and back. Cannot wear a bra. Used fashion tape to keep in place. Fit as expected/true to size.

links_Review_Title: Delivered on time even with bad weather and the dress fit perfectly, got tons of compliments
links_Review_Text: #Glamourous #low-key fancy

Based on previous reviews, I ordered a size 8 and a 10, when I normally wear a 10. If I could go back, I maybe would have ordered a 10 and 12 instead...I wore the 10. The fit of this dress was very strange and slightly uncomfortable for me. I wear a 36C, and I was busting out a tad more than I had hoped. The shoulder straps were tight and too far apart - they would have been falling down without tape. That being said, I used toupee tape (it really works haha!) to keep everything together. I had no mishaps! I got compliments on the dress, but I really do think smaller chested girls would enjoy this dress a little more than I did. Still, 4 stars!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a wedding. I can't even count on my 2 hands how many compliments I got!
links_Review_Text: The straps on the dress were pretty loose. I had to get a strapless, backless bra to fill the chest area so that the straps wouldn't fall down *cue nip slip disaster on the dance floor*. If your boobs are bigger than a small handful then it would fit perfectly. Other than the loose straps, the rest of the dress fit beautifully and I loved the length. Overall, if you're looking for a dress that looks AMAZING on and fits pretty well then this is your dress!

I rented this dress for a late summer wedding. It was a little snug, but I managed. I ordered a size down because of review suggestions, but ordering one up probably wouldn't have hurt. The cleavage is real, so fashion tape was a must. I received so many compliments and felt so beautiful wearing it.

The gold printed fabric is much prettier in person. If you have large breasts (I'm a 36DD), you will have a lot of cleavage in this number. Overall, this is a beautiful dress. I received lots of compliments.

Wore this dress to a friend's ~ fancy ~ holiday party and felt great! It was the perfect length, definitely tightly fitted in the waist (which I like), and is super unique. My shoulders were a little bit narrow for the straps to fit me perfectly, but I could still make it work and was comfortable the whole night. Would recommend for sure!
It was slightly snug, which helps with getting my boobs in place. I didn't have to use tape at all. I loved it!

This dress is too cute! It fit like a dream, the straps weren't too long/too tight. It flared at the perfect spot. The gold details were too beautiful! I got a million compliments and felt great in it!

This dress is gorgeous. Photos don't do it justice. I received compliments all night long. Unless you have a long torso, have plenty of fashion tape on hand to keep the straps up. I definitely plan to rent this stunner again!

links_Review_Title: Never gotten more compliments than in this dress!
links_Review_Text: The 6 was too small in the back but fit perfectly up top and the 8 fit perfectly in the back but was big in the shoulders! Needed so much fashion tape but it was very worth it. I wore it with navy shoes as the dark is more navy than pictures. I am 5’2, 140 pounds, with small shoulders but curvy shape. Have to own it with this one it is VERY low cut!
Fit like a glove ! It was a perfect length, very comfortable and Got compliments all night!

The dress is a stunner- the gold detailing looks beautiful in photos, the length was perfect (I'm 5'3 and it hit mid thigh) like others said it's very revealing in the chest area- make sure to wear pasties and tons of fashion tape! The only con was the zipper- it was so difficult to zip, I needed two people to help me because it was stuck. So sad to give back this dress- it really made feel beautiful and for a first time rental I am so happy-can't wait to rent again!!
I wore this dress to my friends wedding. It is so unique I have not worn anything quite like it. Beautiful with color combination with gold accents.

Love the dress! I would have sized down if I knew it ran larger than average. I had to tape it in areas , also the body would have been more fitted with a size down. Overall I love love loved the dress. So many people I didn't even know complimented the dress.

It fit me really well. It does show a lot of boob, so if you do not have body tape, your boobs may show when you bend down. Body tape is a must with this dress! Other than that, I received tons of compliments on this dress :)

I rented this for my senior homecoming, and it's definitely a beautiful dress!! Just if you have small boobs you need either a bra that can be hidden or fashion tape. Luckily I have a strapless push-up bra that's mostly hidden by the dress. Other than that very beautiful, and a little darker grey in person.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for an evening wedding. So many compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size. The most frustrating part of renting this dress is that this designer doesn't publish their measurements to size conversion chart. I had to guess based upon 3 other designers.
Love this dress! It was eye catching and stunning! True to size and comfortable fabric. Everyone at the event loved it and continued to compliment it. The color and design are beautiful as well
Super flattering cut and wrap around the waist. Very forgiving, stretchy, thick fabric. When I told my friends I had rented this dress for the night they insisted I needed to buy it to keep!
This dress fit like a glove! It was super comfortable. It was a simple design but that simple design was all that was necessary! The slit and how it hugged my curves gave it the ultimate wow factor.

This dress was chosen by a RTR stylist and I'm so thankful. The dress was true to size, however, it was a bit loose on the top. Thankfully I did not have anything slip and didn't need double stick tape. The dress was comfortable and made out of a nice material. As a 5'2 woman, I did wish there was a petite large. I had to wear my 2 inch heels to deal with length

I ended up not wearing this dress because I liked my first choice better and because i probably needed a slightly bigger size. I normally wear between an 8 and a 10 and this was fairly tight - i wonder if the Large would have been too big? It was beautiful and with some sweet spanx, I could have pulled it off. The slit is a little high but not horribly so. It’s a beautiful color somewhere between teal and green.

I wore this to a black tie event 2.5 months postpartum. I was worried about how my new body would fit into a gown, but this dress made me feel phenomenal! It had just the right amount of stretch to hug my curves and bigger chest. I tied the sash in front to camouflage my belly. I did have to wear a strapless bra because of how open the back was. However, if I wasn't lactating, I might have been able to go braless. I'm 5'1" and the SR was the perfect length with 4" heels. Overall, loved it!

The fabric was wrinkle free with a little stretch. I am 5'8" and the dress was long enough for me to wear a kitten heel. It was my first time using the site so I didn't know what to expect with the fit but the cut was flattering.

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments. Elegant, refined look for mid-40s woman.
links_Review_Text: The fabric is heavy, stretchy, warm and flattering. I wasn't sure about the pine green color, but it is a rich, dark green that went well with my pale skin tone. I am 5'3", 118 pounds and wore the XSP. I needed 2" heels to make the length work and a bra that was cut lower in the back and front than a typical day-to-day bra. Definitely recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: The dress came on time and was perfect !
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a winter wedding. The fit was perfect. I felt beautiful and it was also very comfortable. I am 5ft2" the petit size was perfect length.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress. One woman told me I looked like I walked out of a magazine.
links_Review_Text: It fit snuggly, but it was very comfortable. I would rent this dress again.

The deep green color and beautiful drape of this gown make it an elegant alternative to basic black. The fabric is thick and stretchy, very flattering and comfortable. I typically wear a 4 or 6, and the small long fit like a glove. At 5'8" the hem just skimmed the floor in 4" heels.
Great fit, and loved the fit.

links_Review_Title: great dress! first time using this app and I loved it. very easy to use and great selection.
links_Review_Text: this dress fit great. I am petite but I dressed it up with heels. color was beautiful very elegant for the wedding I attended.

links_Review_Title: The slit was just the right amount of sexy!
links_Review_Text: The fabric felt nice and it was flattering. I got the petite since I am 5'1 and it was the perfect length. I wore it as a bridesmaid dress and received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress is simple, elegant, and timeless!
links_Review_Text: No bra needed. A wonderful thick material. I felt like an old Hollywood star!

Got so many compliments on this dress. Fabric was stretchy (AKA forgiving) and the wrap tie at the waist was super flattering. Slit made it fun, but wasn't too high for my work party. Loved the deep green color, perfect for a Christmas event. I typically wear 6-8 ina dress, and am 5'7" so the medium long was perfect with 3-4" heels. Would definitely recommend, totally classy and elegant option!

This was absolutely gorgeous and also comfortable. The color is a dark teal- I thought it was going to be a forest green from the photos. I got a ton of compliments and felt great in it. Highly recommend.

The shoulder area was too big and darn near fell off when I sat. I think it's roomy for those with bigger chest or broader shoulders bc my 36 barely C's didn't come close to filling it. Besides that the dress was beautiful. I got lots of compliments, it photographed well and I don't think anyone noticed it was too big. I felt elegant and comfortable in a room full of CEOs.

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel beautiful
links_Review_Text: This dress hugs the body has some stretch so it worked perfectly for me. Only issue is the high slit sitting down it opens up.
Dress is a beautiful dark teal green; the fabric is stretchy so it flatters. Loved the empire waist wrap for hiding problem areas. Was perfect for a work gala; understated sexy!
Fits true to size, very flattering and photographs well! A great choice

I liked this gown. I'm not crazy about the back, seems a little outdated of a style. And the tie was a little hard to make look right. But overall I got lots of compliments and it was very comfortable and body hugging! Medium size bust is best since theres no give in the chest area.

links_Review_Title: I felt amazing in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'3" 120 lbs, I wore the XSP and it fit perfectly, and the length was great. I loved that the tie wrapped around the front. I felt confident and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Flattering on bigger chests, beautiful fabric and color
links_Review_Text: Th edress was only a tiny bit long (5'4") so to be expected. With 3 inch heels, it was fine. I loved the cut on the top- very flattering on a big chest (38ddd) with only two safety pins. I am very curvy and hour glass shaped and short, so long gowns are very hard for me to wear. But this was a good choice for me. My only insecurity was that my stomach was definitely not hidden but material was thick and with shapewear, I felt like it was fine. So good dress for plus size ladies if you like a form fitted look.
It was slightly long (so I had to wear very high heals), but it was extremely comfortable and I got a lot of compliments! I would would 100% wear again.

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding. I do not have a smooth silhouette, so shapewear was DEFINETLY required. I'm also 5'7" and opted for the long because I wore 3 inch heels, so if you plan to wear heels and are above my height, i'd recommend the long. I the XL and the XXL and while both fit, I felt I had more wiggle room in the XXL; I typically don't wear form fitting dresses( I am a size 12-14/XL in regular clothing). I received lots of compliments and felt great in the dress all night!
Snug at the base even though I’m top heavy. Beautiful color. Didn’t wear it
The cut of the dress was amazing. I got so many complements. I normally wear a 14.
It was too small so I didn't wear. Nicely made mermaid dress; not flattering for me

links_Review_Title: Roomy top made this a flop
links_Review_Text: The body fit small yet the top part was roomy. Better for someone with an ample chest and smaller hips. Pretty color and fabric tho.

This dress was a gorgeous color and lovely material however — it (the long/L) was still about 5” too short for my 6’ frame. I ordered it as a backup to another dress that thankfully worked out perfectly. I think this dress would be stunning on someone more petite, but it just wasn’t very flattering for someone tall and curvy.
It was fitted, the color was beautiful, and I could still move around in it.
It’s stretchy and comfortable, very flattering especially around the tummy area. Would highly recommend!

Didn't wear since I wanted something less formal but would rent again. Thick material. Conceals lower belly pooch with belt around waist and hanging belt. Wouldn't recommend if bloated (side pooch). Spanx recommended for more finished look. Looks more formal on than in pic. Recommend getting the petite for petites. With 3.5 inch heels, was grazing floor slightly. May want to size up. Didn't try SP but wanted to because XSR was long and snug in tum area? Didn't get a chance. Has stretch (yay!).
Used RTR for the first time. Rented the dresses for a gala with expectations being low that the dress would fit me right. It was perfect. So flattering and I received so many compliments. Thank you!
Loved everything about this dress!! So flirty and fun. The big shoulders were very Chic. Would rent again :)
Felt so cute in this dress -- was super comfy and an easy outfit to just throw on.

I absolutely LOVE this dress! Even on my DDD dress it wasn't too revealing, and I got SO MANY compliments when I wore it at work. I am between a size 6 and 8 and the 8 was a bit big on me, so I would size down if you're in between sizes.

links_Review_Title: Can't wait to wear this weekend!
links_Review_Text: Super cute! Had a little more room in the chest than needed but an adorable look. Obsessed with the sleeves.

I LOVE this dress! If you love a nice puffed shoulder detail action you'll love this. The breast area is a little low but may be because it was a little big. I wish I sized down. I had to wear a belt to cinch my wait since it was a little lost, but was the perfect touch to complete this look.
Kept getting in the way at work.

links_Review_Title: Super trendy. Only wore once though.
links_Review_Text: Shoulders were a little much for me.

links_Review_Title: Pretty floral dress with great silhouette
links_Review_Text: The puff sleeves, sweet neckline and flirtatious skirt make this a perfect summer afternoon to evening dress. I felt so sexy and so comfortable in this simple frock that is whimsically sexy.

Beautiful and very feminine look. Received compliment after compliment. Extremely flattering and also very comfortable. A little low cut where I was checking every now and then to make sure my bra wasn't sticking out but other than that it was perfect. Would definitely rent again.
Loved this dress. Great silhouette. Good mini length (not too short for tall women). Size 8 - 4US - (One could potentially size down if they are a 2/4)

links_Review_Title: Very cute dress, low v neck
links_Review_Text: Runs a bit large, I would have sized down from a 6 to 4

links_Review_Title: Do not rent if you're over 5'8
links_Review_Text: I have a curvy body type and I'm 5'10 and this dress just wasn't going to work. Sizing wise, it fit me but it's SO short, it barely covered my bum

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately, their size is too big on me.
links_Review_Text: The side puffers look like it's a size 14 dress. The details and fabric are really nice but make sure to order a size smaller

I rented a size 14 which I think is a us size 10. The arms and chest areas were too big on me, and the length was fairly short. I wore it with tights, but it would have probably been too short to wear without tights. Very light weight and very pretty print, got lots of compliments. I dressed it down with a Jean jacket and boots.

links_Review_Title: Fits perfectly, the skirt part is so cute Lightweight and comfortable material
links_Review_Text: Took a second to get used to the little poof in the shoulder but really flattering!

links_Review_Title: So cute and flirty and comfortable, all at once!
links_Review_Text: I wore this once for a daytime event (paired with wedges) and once for a more casual night time event (paired with nude heels). I received a ton of compliments. The fit is super flattering, yet comfortable. Remember it's European sizing.
Cute dress, but it was too big.

I rented this for a class reunion and I love it SO much I want to buy it! I'm hanging onto this for a while....the shoulder cut is very flattering and it's flown without being tent-like. It's a real winner.

links_Review_Title: Great quality for someone more flat chested went very low
links_Review_Text: I had to pin it up
Looked awesome, felt better. Nice style that was easy to put under an open cardigan/sweater to amp an outfit up, but also works with a nicer outfit.
So classy and sexy at the same time! Great to layer under blazers or with jeans and booties for a night out! Great staple!
Loved it
lovely blouse and super comfortable
Gorgeous fit, comfortable yet flattering. Would totally rent again!

links_Review_Title: It was too big. And too long.
links_Review_Text: Too long and too big. Maybe Small would have been better.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful shirt! too big, didn't wear
links_Review_Text: I am large chested and ordered a medium as I would normally wear however the shirt was too big. Overall beautiful and could be worn to work, out for a date night, etc.

links_Review_Title: Sexy top for a date or night out
links_Review_Text: I didn't wear this sadly, but I can't wait to rent it again! This is a nice, heavier weight fabric and the fit and style is very sexy and easy. I'm usually a Medium but I will probably consider a Small for my next rent as it could have been a little better fitted. It's flowy, so sizing down may be smart...
This was a little large on me so I did not wear it. Great length for women of a certain age -- covers everything nicely! Flattering cut and nice fabric.

links_Review_Title: Okay, but no better than cheap alternative?
links_Review_Text: Looks nice, and if you're really handling the material you can tell it's a very nice piece but from a distance I have $20 shirts that get the same job done.
I wore this to work and out over the weekend. Great cut (I'm 3 months pregnant and the fit was comfortable but still looked great!). Will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Have a lovely time at the holiday ball, and felt beautiful in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress, great quality. This dress is very form fitting and runs a bit snug, may recommend ordering a size up. I'm 155, 5'7" and the 8R fit great!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a friend's black tie wedding. It fit true to size and looked very elegant on. The amount of cleavage was sexy but not too revealing. I am 5'4" and 130 lbs for reference.

links_Review_Title: This dress is so comfortable; the fabric feels thick and of great quality. I love the neckline.
links_Review_Text: I'm shorter (5'-1.25"), with about 2.5/3 inch heels this was perfect. A flattering solid black staple for a formal affair. I ended up not wearing this dress; not because I didn't love it, but because we ended up not being able to attend the event for other reasons. Of the two dresses I received though, this is the one I would have worn to the event. In fact, I'd buy this dress if I had enough formal events to attend. Fit was true-to-size. I'm normally a size 0P and that is the size that fit me in this dress as well.

Excellent fit and quality. I usually wear an 8 in dresses and this fit just as expected. Form fitting yet still comfortable. It has bra strap snaps on the straps but I went without as I didn't need it. The regular length was great with 3 inch heels. The hem of this dress makes it very flexible and as such, a fantastic rental.

I really liked this dress because it highlighted my shoes just right. I attended a "Kicks Ball". I will say that the slight downside to the dress is that the back hits the floor and someone may step on the dress. I overall I really loved the fit. Very flattering.

I usually have a difficult time finding items that are small at the waist but still have enough space for my hips. This fit really well for me and the material was thick so it was really flattering on. Cons: a little but too long. I'm 5'5 and wore 4" heels. It was still about 1-2 inches too long
Material is the perfect weight (even in the Florida heat). Just the right amount of skin. Able to dance all night with no worries!!

The dress fit like a glove at 3 months pregnant and it is not categorized as maternity wear. I could have used some room in the bust area but I wore it without a bra and it was perfect. Everybody loved it.
Unfortunately 0 was unavailable - 2 fit well but 0 would've been even better as it would've hugged my waist a little tighter.
Runs slightly small, especially in the boobs but I managed to make it work and it held up. A slight stretch to it!
Definitely Hepburn vibes! I was happy with this dress and it complimented my jewelry well. It did drag a bit because of the style so I wore heels.

links_Review_Title: Dress hugged every curve in the best way!
This dress is so flattering and fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: Pros: nice material that felt like it sucked me in. The high/low hem would work for a range of heights (I'm short and it hit at a good spot but I could also see it working on a taller person). Very sleek and high quality. Cons: the only cons are that the straps were a little big so I had to have really good posture all night to keep them up. The zipper also is a little hard to get up sometimes
Good quality dress but at 5'11 doesn't fit well in the hips for long waisted

I would say this dress runs true to size if not a smidge small. It's absolutely gorgeous! Not a ton of give. I'm 6mo pp and still nursing, I didn't have to wear a bra and it held me in after 8hrs of not nursing/pumping. It's very low cut and shows a lot of cleavage. I'm 5'8" and wore 3in heels and the 10L hit the ground perfectly. Received a ton of compliments and a lot of looks!! Definitely would rent again
I often struggle finding things that fit just right. This one did! Lovely material that hangs beautifully. It was extremely comfortable and easy to dance in! I love dancing!!

links_Review_Title: The dress is very comfortable and easy to wear. Supports your bust without a bra.
links_Review_Text: The only con is that the underneath fabric of the dress rides up as you walk, leaving you roll-y.

links_Review_Title: The perfect fit and very flattering.
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress for the perfect fit!

Beautiful dress, nice neck, and the high low effect is stunning and dramatic unfortunately it was a little too snug for me to comfortably wear all night and breathe. The dress has a small amount of stretch, just not enough for my current size. Will definitely rent again!
The top is very fitted without much stretch but was still comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! I received so many compliments wearing it. Highly recommend!
links_Review_Text: The fabric was thick so even though the dress was form fitting, I was comfortable all night and wasn't self conscious.

The dress fit beautifully, it nicely flattered my curves, but it was too long for me. I'm 5'6.5", and with mid height heels it had a fair amount that drug behind me. I thought it detracted from the overall look of the dress, I'd recommend the regular length.

links_Review_Title: So many complements in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! The material was really nice and I got complements all night! I'm glad I got the bigger size as my backup, because I was barely able to zip it up around the ribs, but the quality of the material holds you in really nicely. You can get away without wearing a bra, since it's thick material and tight enough that it supports you (I'm actually not sure if this dress would fit someone with a bigger chest, unless you went up a few sizes or want a lot of cleavage lol). It might have been too long, I was wearing 3" heels and it still was about 2" too long in the back, but it looked fine since it's shorter in the front and wavy in the back. I just held it up while I walked or was dancing.

The best part about this dress is that you can easily wear a regular bra and spanx if you choose to. No pasties or weird undergarments. Very flattering and comfy. Pretty thick material, but not hot. I am 5'8", wore 3-inch heals and the 10L was a little long (just touched the floor). There was a few times I thought I might trip going up and down stairs. Also, not sure why the dress was so pricey, and for that reason I'm not sure if I would rent it again. But overall very pleased.
Gorgeous and so flattering! Super soft material too. Absolutely loved it.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Black Tie Gala
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a Black Tie Gala awards ceremony. I ordered a long since I am 5'10 and it fit perfectly. I was able to wear a low heel with the dress and the train of the dress swept the floor just right. I was able to wear a regular bra with the dress which hid nicely under the thick straps. The dress was a nice, thick material which felt comfortable and looked great! I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_Review_Title: Worn to the Creative Arts Emmys
links_Review_Text: I had ordered 2 dresses which were delivered late. I went to the RTR store in Santa Monica, and they hooked me up with this beautiful dress. It fit like a glove!
Size 2 was way to small at the waist, so I sized up to a 4, which is perfect at the waist but now it's to big on top. The shoulders keep falling down. Not a good fit for me.
So comfortable, so beautiful! The 4 fit like a glove but I wore the 6 for comfort and it still looked amazing!

links_Review_Title: Felt like a princess all night...
links_Review_Text: I can not say enough about this beautiful dress! The attention to detail, drape of the fabric, design, and color make this dress unforgettable! I wore it for a formal evening, but with the right accessories, it could be perfect for a more casual event...I absolutely loved wearing it and will definitely rent again!!

This dress is stunning with its detail and design. But I thought it was a light summer dress, and instead it's a heavy fabric, weighted dress that I would honestly wear if I wanted to elope. The dress screams wedding--not every day or vacation. Not even really cocktails, unless it's for your rehearsal dinner!

links_Review_Title: Cute but not flattering on larger frames
links_Review_Text: I rented this hoping to wear it to my bridal shower. The size 10 was true to size for me. The material and details on this dress are really unique, but ultimately the shape does nothing for my figure. I would wear this to a party or other event that wouldn't involve lots of pictures of me taken in it, but I'd like a more flattering look for my shower.
I rented this dress for a 1920s party and I love it so much! True to size, slit in the front l, but doesn't show too much. Might have to purchase this one
The cut of the top felt very matronly to me, while the details of the skirt felt costumey. Also, the lace of the neckline and the waist made the zipper challenging to do myself.
Got a lot of compliments. Runs slightly large but a paired it with a gold belt and worked great. Rather long so you probably have to wear heels.
Like the other descriptions say, it's very bridal. Beautiful fabric and nice fit.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to an all white 100 person dinner party.
links_Review_Text: This dress is flowy while still being fitted and showing off your figure. I went to this party with a friend not knowing anyone and someone told me they thought I was a socialite (which I am most assuredly not)! I contribute this compliment 100% to the dress. I felt so feminine and pretty in this dress that showed just the right amount without being too revealing. Would be great for any occasion as you can dress it up or down with accessories.
Gorgeous dress, heavy - well made. Could have worn it to a party but for everyday it felt a little fancy... almost bridal. If I was having my 3rd wedding in a field somewhere I would 100% wear this.

links_Review_Title: was a lot more formal than i anticipated
links_Review_Text: silky material, slit went high up the middle

Thought this might be a nice beachy sundress for a family vacation. It's beautifully designed and fit very well, but this is shiny satin fabric that screams bridal. Was too much for me but would be a gorgeous dress for a more formal occasion!

links_Review_Title: More Wedding Dress than Date Night Dress
links_Review_Text: It's very beautiful but the material is not really lace but more like a heavy silk. I didn't wear it out because it seems like a wedding dress. From the photos, I thought it was more lace and cotton.

links_Review_Title: Had received 10 compliments in the first hour
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful. It is very silky, the detailing is insane with the silk, the lace, the v neck on front and back. I should note, the areas that look like lace with skin behind, are lined with a nude fabric. No nip slips here! The waist runs super small, everywhere else true to size

This dress was much heavier and more formal than I was expecting. It's a mix of lace and silk and has many layers, including the twist in front of the stomach. Ultimately didn't wear as I didn't find it flattering and was hoping it'd be more casual.
bust had very little projection & I have a small chest.fabric isn't not breathable

links_Review_Title: gorgeous and the hostess at the restaurant my date took me to told me i "looked like a goddess"...
links_Review_Text: The slit it a bit higher than you'd think, but lovely fit overall! One I'd consider buying for sure!
Gorgeous detail that received number of compliments
This dress was a lot fancier than I expected based on photo. Not a summer sundress

links_Review_Title: Really beautiful and fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: Really nice and comfortable.

perfect for any bridal event. looks almost like a wedding dress. needed a small heel w this otherwise risked dragging and inch or so on the floor. i'm btwn 2/4 and the 4 was a touch large. packs well, falls beautifully, no bra needed. loved the way it moves when you walk. highly highly recommend

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a day time party. It fit perfectly and was incredibly comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Fit well and I loved the length.

I rented this dress for a beach vacation and totally misjudged the style. The material is beautiful but it's a heavy satin/silk with a lot of detail. I felt like I could have gotten married in this dress (a good thing if that's the event I was shopping for). It's much fancier than I expected! I found the waist to run a little small, and there is no give in the tailoring. Gorgeous dress for the right event (not the beach or weekend brunch).

links_Review_Title: Not my usual style but perfect summer dress.
links_Review_Text: This was tight in the waist so I did not wear, but would consider ordering in the correct size. I hated that I could not wear it. It would be perfect for a day at the vineyards.
Loved the slit and got so many compliments on this skirt. I wore to work with tights and then to thanksgiving dinner/party.
Fits well in the waist. Slit is higher so more for night time than work. Will definitely rent again.

The slit was perfect for me and made the skirt feel special. Definitely not a work skirt, but perfect for a nice dinner. The material feels great and moves well. The 2 wasn't too snug on the waist and I felt like I could eat without feeling the waistband cut into me
#workday #summer
Sexy

This skirt is beautiful! The slit really makes this! I received multiple compliments and felt so amazing it. True to size, the material is flattering, and flows so nicely. Just the right amount of sex appeal.
Slit goes high, but I like!!!

This skirt was so fun to wear and play with different versions of outfits. I will definitely rent again. But if you don't like showing too much leg don't rent bc it's too long on the alternate side to mask the high cut and really the essence of the skirt's design. It's really a great flirty addition to any closet.
I liked the asymmetrical hemline and the bright blue flowers in the print. Light enough it could be worn year-round.

links_Review_Title: Wore to ACL. Good for date night also. Careful his you stand in photos with the slit.
links_Review_Text: Slit comes up high would be hard to wear to work. Not flattering on legs at certain angles.

links_Review_Title: The materials was so light and flowy. Walking through a room, it felt so elegant.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. A little loose on me, but perfect for a dinner.

I wore this to a pool party and I got a ton of compliments. Was a little afraid how much leg the slit would show but it wasn't so bad. It was slightly too large, the 2 would have fit me better since it's more high waisted. Would definitely rent again!

This skirt was adorable! In life it's even better, it moves really beautifully. Fit was true to size/on the large side if anything. I've rented a Tanya Taylor dress before and had to size up, but this fit me great in my regular size. I wore it to work, and the slit doesn't go up so high that it's immodest. My only complaint was that it was a little long for me, I wish it had ended just below the knee, like it does on the model. It's less flattering at mid-calf, so I had to wear heels to lengthen my athletic legs.

I'm usually a 6/8 in skirts and went with a 6. It works and i bought the skirt but it's a bit tight in the stomach. Prob could have gone with an 8 just as easily. But if you're not thick in the middle like I am, stick with your regular size.
You can wear this to work or out at night. Super cute and classy. The slit makes it a little edgy. I've rented it twice in two months.
The skirt feels flowy and has a nice fabric. It was too big around the waist in my normal size 2, so I will be exchanging for a 0.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a broadway show in the city with a large group of women from my family.
links_Review_Text: A little loose in the waist but I liked the fit. Slit is high so not appropriate for work. I wore black booties, a silk cami, and a short black leather jacket with it.
Great for work with black tights or for a night out with bare legs. I tend to be a size 2 or sometimes a 0. I thought this ran true to size

links_Review_Title: Fits as expected, but the colors are underwhelming.
links_Review_Text: FIT: I sized up to fit my hips. I know it was a gamble, and it was just the tiniest bit loose around the waist, but overall the fit was fine. Since the slit is somewhat high, it didn't feel tight around the hips, so pear-shaped renters can feel comfortable trying this out. I'm short (5'4") so it was a little longer on me than on the model, but not by much. APPEARANCE: The colors are not as bright as in the photo. In fact, the gray flowers are darker. Still a nice skirt, but I did find it a little underwhelming.

links_Review_Title: Skirt too small and slit too high
links_Review_Text: While I have pretty wide hips, my waist is very small. I typically size down. I forgot to size down with this order and the skirt way uncomfortably tight when I zipped it up. The slit was also VERY high on the thigh. Could be great for girls straight up and down but did not flatter my pear shape body

links_Review_Title: One of my most favorite rentals
links_Review_Text: I am obsessed with this. I wore it twice. If the price goes down more I may just have to buy it. It's so fun! The slit isn't too high but still flirty. It's slightly loose on my waist but still works just fine. Love this piece
Was too big in the waist abs too tight on the hips

links_Review_Title: Easy for work. A bit larger in the waist than I would have liked, but still cute.
links_Review_Text: I'm a 24" waist and this was a little big but still wearable.

It was cute and comfy but I found it a little hard to style. None of the shirts I tried with it looked quite right. Better for brunch or a girls day than a date- my bf said it was too long and it's really not as sexy as it looks in the pic, even with the slit.
Great skirt, decided to keep it

I rented this to wear to the Waste Management Phoenix Open. Unfortunately, this ran large in the waste for me. Because of that the lips looked a little off with the ruffle and slit. May try and rent it again in a smaller size.

links_Review_Title: Loved the sexy, yet sophisticated way the skirt made me feel!
links_Review_Text: Loved how the skirt felt and the quality was amazing. I wish I could purchase but the price is still high ! :( Will be renting again!
This is a pretty skirt with a sexy detail. The material is thin though which would be ideal in colder weather. Nice skirt for a date night.

links_Review_Title: fun skirt to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a shower, super cute with a blouse or tee. The slit wasn't too high but might not be work appropriate... would depend on your body type and proportions. Fit was TTS and it didn't wrinkle too easily. Would definitely rent again!

This was a cute skirt with a nice slit that added a bit of a flirty vibe. The slit is kind of high so I wouldn't wear it to work but it was a nice weekend skirt. In the picture the material looks a bit heavier but this was a lightweight skirt with a lot of movement. I normally wear a 4 or 6 but this skirt, in a size 4 was still a bit large on my waist.

I was a bit concerned that the skirt slit would be too high to be work appropriate, but that wasn't an issue at all. Got tons of compliments. It is slightly on the snug side, so if you're in between sizes I would size up.
Fun dress! I wore this to a bachelorette party in Miami. It was perfect!
Loved this dress! It fit great.

links_Review_Title: It just made it in time for my birthday!
links_Review_Text: At first I felt that I should definitely not eat the slice of cheese pizza before heading out to celebrate my birthday, but with a little help from my friends to tie the knot in the back, I felt amazing! There was still room for a snack. Something about my 25th screamed PINK & I loved it!

I rented this for a New Year's party and loved it. Fit well and was good quality. I like that you can tie it in the back so you can make it as tight or as loose as you need. It's also pretty comfortable!
Fit perfectly loved wearing this gorgeous dress!

Felt like a million bucks, so soft, got tons of compliments! only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I had THE HARDEST time trying to pin it closed bc the neckline was too low for my liking and my bra kept showing. So I eventually went bra-less which was not ideal
Loved this dress!!! So flattering felt great in it. Highly recommend!!!

links_Review_Title: Great fit and got so many compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for this formal Christmas gala. Got so many compliments and felt comfortable and amazing in it all night. Love!!

links_Review_Title: Great Salsa dress! I went dancing in it and felt so cute!
links_Review_Text: I liked the satiny feel of the fabric and the wrap around style. I told people it was my Kylie Jenner dress:) I was happy that I ordered a medium and it wasn't too small because that happens to me sometimes. Very nice dress.

I rented this for a weekend in Las Vegas in a November. I loved this dress. The mid cut offers the perfect amount of flirty flare, but very tasteful. I felt stunning in the dress. Will definitely rent again!
This dress was drop dead gorgeous. I wore it in Vegas. I'm not sure I'd be brave enough to wear it anywhere else! Fun and flirty!

This dress I knew was going to be a hit or miss. Super cool idea however tough to pull off. You have to be a stick!!! Was renting for a college homecoming so drinking wasn't going to work in this. It was also a super staticky material so even less forgiving. I'm usually a 4 and I went with a medium which was super loose on me but a small would've been too tight. Ended up not wearing. Only rent if you plan to not drink or eat!!!!!
The color is beautiful, and it fit really well. It's definitely formfitting if you have curves. The cut out is daring and the plunge is low. The length definitely makes it a party dress.

The only complaint I had was that the tie in the back kept coming undone when I would tie it in a bow. Definitely glad I double-knotted! Otherwise this was so cute and the fabric is really special (looks less flashy in person than in photos).

links_Review_Title: Love this dress it looks amazing on.
links_Review_Text: Fits amazingly

links_Review_Title: The dress feels great, well made.
links_Review_Text: I loved the dress because it is lined so you don't feel exposed with the silk. I didn't wear it though bc it was too loose around the waist for me and there is no way to keep it in place. I might try a L for this one later on.
I loved this color and the cut of this dress. It was a little loose around the waist, but fit right everywhere else. Got a ton of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Super sexy, but still appropriate for my party in Atlantic City. Gorgeous color. I felt amazing.
links_Review_Text: Don't wear this if you don't like attention. I'm curvy and busty so I had to use fashion tape to keep the waist and bust lines perfect. I got compliments and expressed jealousy from girls 20 years younger!!! Go for it. I don't do belly shirts, this has the sexy effects without too much skin

The small didn’t fit my hips but it fit my waist. I went with the medium bc it fit my hips. Although it was a little big on my waist. It’s more fitted then on the model. I’m a size 4/6 and 5’8. Overall super cute!

links_Review_Title: Top was too large on the chest
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately could not wear this dress because the chest portion ran large while everything else was true to size. Material was very nice and Color was beautiful

links_Review_Title: Pretty color. A bit darker and more red in person than online.
links_Review_Text: Fit is true to size.

I loved this dress so much & received a lot of compliments. The fit was true to size, the material was perfect, & I was really comfortable in it. This picture makes the dress look more red than it is - it's definitely a ruby pink like in the other pictures. I highly recommend this dress & had a hard time sending it back!
I think I ordered a size too big but even so the dress felt over used and run down. I think it could have worked if I'd gotten a better size.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress and received so many compliments on it during my event
links_Review_Text: The dress is not something that I might have normally picked out, but I'm glad that I did. I paired it with over-the-knee boots at the recommendation of one of the RTR consultants at the Chicago store, and I think this really helped to complete the outfit. The fit was true to size
This color is gorgeous! Fit nicely in the waist, was a little big up too but could be easily fixed with a different bra. Wish the slit was a little more prominent.

This dress made me feel like hot stuff. Color is so vibrant, so don't wear if you don't want heads to turn. The slit is quite higher than I expected, but the ruffle helped maintain modesty. Loved the neckline and the back detail. Did wear shapewear for smoothing, because it does hug a bit. Love love loved this dress.
I liked the yellow gold color, but the fit was wider in the hips. I'm very straight and narrow so the dress was a little gappy. It would have looked better if I was able to fill it out more.

links_Review_Title: Amazing material and color would be great for someone with a big chest.
links_Review_Text: I ordered this in XXL because I was worried about it being tight in my stomach but it was huge in the busy then but I still wore it and felt amazing in it!

links_Review_Title: Bold color and fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: This dress was very flattering and hugged all the right corners. True to size and comfortable. I got many compliments and loved the class and sass of the dress. Would highly recommend for a wedding or special occasion.
This dress was the perfect color for a fall wedding. Loved the fit too!
Very flattering fit and cut. Wore for a beach wedding and reception.
Great dress. Has a lining but wasn't too warm. Could wear without a bra but did opt for spanx to keep a smooth line. Felt comfy to eat in too.
This gross fit amazing. The material is think enough to smooth out any lumps and bumps. Color is beautiful and cut is on point. Would rent again in a heart beat or I may just buy.

First of all my dress came way early, I requested it for Wednesday since the wedding was on Friday. I got it on Monday... I was super excited to try them on. I was able to get into the large but it was super tight, so I was really glad that I got a backup size. I did noticed that a seam was coming loose where the split was. I figured that they overlooked. I got tons of compliments on the dress.

The fit is very kind to those with a small waist, but it may be uncomfortable for someone who doesn't have that sort of curvature in their torso. I wore it to the wedding and felt beautiful in the color, but between the ceremony and the reception, I got brown eyeshadow on the top by the breast. It was SO noticeable, and I had to change out if it before the reception. So, if you're clumsy like me, this is not the dress for you. Very beautiful if that isn't a problem for you though!

links_Review_Title: Such a convenient and wonderful experience.
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable and flattering dress. Received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful yellow and a great design
links_Review_Text: Fits all the right curves. Such a vibrant yellow. Perfect for the month of October when it was worn. Great fabric and comfortable.
This dress fit absolutely perfect and was so comfortable. The bright yellow was complimentary and the bust fit a little snug but helped keep me in place! I would recommend this dress for any event.

This dress was amazing. The fit was great, I'm top heavy so there was no issues with loose fitting fabric. Totally recommend this to women with a larger chest. The color and fit were fantastic. I did not want to send it back!
Need a partner to zip in. Really wonderful fit, elegant, flattering, bold.

links_Review_Title: Yellow is the color is sun rays!
links_Review_Text: This dress, above all else, was comfortable! Easy to move, sit, dance in. Good amount of stretch. The slit gives major thigh action when sitting, but I didn't mind. I'm a large C or small D depending on where I get bras. I didn't wear a bra and felt supported (cleavage, there will be cleavage). I received so many compliments and the color is so fun!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, really stood out in a crowd
links_Review_Text: The dress looked great! The color is more goldenrod in person than just yellow, but it is a beautiful color, perfect to wear at a fall wedding. I wore the medium: it fit well on my hips but was slightly big on the top, but I felt comfortable wearing it and didn't feel like I would flash anyone. The zipper did get stuck in the middle, but I was able to zip up and down. The split isn't too high, is very flattering. The dress works best with heels--I tried it on with flats, didn't hang right. Got compliments; I'll be renting this dress again and renting from Rent the Runway again!

This dress is beautiful and the color is great and complimented my skin tone. However, this particular dress is not the best for my body type, which is curvy. I definitely felt a little self conscious, even with some pretty good shapewear. For the right body, it's stunning.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and color! Compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: This was my first rental from RTR and I was not disappointed. The dress ran a tad small in the bust area but I do have a large chest (38 F). I was not able to wear a bra with it (first time ever!!) but i was supported well. This was not a color I would have chosen off the bat but I'm so glad I did. I received so many compliments that evening and I loved how I felt in it. I wish I had a better picture of the full dress on me, but absolutely loved this and so did my husband ;)

I LOVED THIS DRESS!! The color was bright and vibrant - really worked well with my skin tone. I received so many compliments and requests where I got it from. Wore a strapless bra and didn't have to adjust anything as the dress fit snuggly. It was still comfortable enough to dance in and eat all the yummy wedding food. The only thing I didn't like was the zipper kept getting stuck in the middle, going over the hem. Otherwise really worth it!!!

This dress is a stunner! The color is amazing and the thicker material hides small imperfections. I have a small chest and bigger hips and the dress fit great. I did use a backless sticky bra due to the cut of the top. I would also suggest spanx if you are worried about your tummy. I could see it being a tight squeeze for larger chested girls. Overall an absolutely great rental!

This was definitely a stand-out dress!! Strangers were coming up to me all night long to complement the dress, fit and color. Color is a bold goldenrod. I'm normally between a 10-12 in pants, and with shape wear the large dress fit like a glove. I tried the XL which was looser but still okay on the hips & butt, but my 36C bust didn't fill it out at all. I still had to pinch the straps a bit to make it fit the top perfectly with the large. The slit is genius - it is high enough that you can bust a move on the dance floor, but the ruffle keeps it somewhat hidden. Couldn't be happier with my choice!
Loved the fit and cut of this dress. The light color is a bit revealing so I recommend shapewear.
Thank goodness I sized up. I'm a size 14 but needed the XXL as I have hips. It fit beautifully and the ruffle toned down the side slit

links_Review_Title: Fantastic color! Got a ton of compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely perfect for my 20 year HS reunion! Got a ton of compliments, and the color was perfect for an end of summer party! Thanks RTR for always coming thru!

links_Review_Title: Endless compliments! Such a great dress for an end of summer wedding.
links_Review_Text: I received endless compliments on this dress. It was so perfect for an early September wedding while I was still tan. However, I felt squished in the small but the medium was too big in the chest. This is the reason why I gave it four stars, because I wish there was a "smedium." I wore the size small without a bra and had to suck everything, but once dancing started, I forgot all about it. I highly recommend this dress. It was a lot of fun!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress, so many compliments on it all night.
links_Review_Text: The zipper can’t be zipped by yourself, so if you are getting dressed or undressed alone don’t order ! The material was beautiful and it fit a little small I’m usually a medium
Great fit for a curvy girl with a lot going on up top. Color is 100% Marigold

links_Review_Title: Got lots of compliments on this dress. Would rent again.
links_Review_Text: Was a little tight under the bust but overall fit well a little big and easy to dance in.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress in a stand out color
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely gorgeous! Definitely a must rent. I wore it to a summer wedding that was at an outdoor garden, and it was perfect. You will definitely stand out in this.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for an outdoor wedding
links_Review_Text: This dress fit great and was very comfortable to dance in. I wore it to a summer barn wedding and it was perfect!

I didn't end up wearing this dress, but only due to the type of event I attended (it was more black tie). This dress is killer, and the color is so fun! Also, having a larger bust, the halter style top made me feel really secure. The cut is great, small slit is really fun at the bottom, and it fit very true to size. If you want to go out of the box and rent a fun dress with a big pop of color, definitely rent this!
Perfect fit- so pretty and flattering. Amazing color!! Side slit makes it just a little sexy- and easier to dance!

Wore this gorgeous lil number to a wedding and received a ton of compliments. It does run big especially on the top I'm a 34D and the top gaped a bit. I'm usually a S/M but wore XS. The fabric is very thick which I like because it hides all the lumps & bumps.
The material on this dress is so so comfortable and yet thick, so it really fits to your body shape. You will not regret renting this one.
What a gorgeous color! Had fun dancing all nite. Gave me Barbie summertime vibes!! I would rent again for a nite out in another town!!

links_Review_Title: Wedding with friends, and I felt confident and comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Was glad I went with the extra small, I’m usually a small but it runs a tad big and the ruffle makes it very forgiving in the hips. The color was everything and so different! Received several compliments on this dress!

I loved this dress! I am 5'4", small chested and about 125lbs. This dress made me look so curvy and accentuated all the right spots. There was a slit underneath the ruffle which made walking and dancing easy. Would absolutely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable ran a bit large
links_Review_Text: This yellow dress was perfect for a semi formal wedding - you can wear a strapless bra with it and the slit doesn't come up so high so spanx are still an option. Comfortable to dance and sit in! One thing to note is I have a pretty large chest and the chest area was still big on me - I likely could've worn the small and been fine but it wasn't available and I was worried about the hips being too tight.

This hit me right at the waist of a high waist jean but I loved the look. Wore this to Post Malone and felt great in it! Not uncomfortable in the arms at all. I'm usually a 10/12 on top but glad I had the 12.
It is a crop top, as described.
Wore this when we went out in Denver! Such a cute fit and love the sequins. They are black and gold and you can make it more golf if you swipe them one way or more black the other way.

links_Review_Title: Loved this top and will definitely rent again!
links_Review_Text: So cute and fun for a night out on the town. I paired with a black leather jacket. Loved it!
Perfect for a Saints game! It is double lined, so it was a little hot for August. Thinking about purchasing it! I usually wear a 6, but the 4 worked great.

This was such a beautiful top. It was very comfortable and fit great with high waist jeans. I'm usually a 12 and got a 14 for a little more breathing room and glad I did. Was a perfect date night top. I felt glamorous! Will rent again!
Love love loved it! Super comfortable and beautiful! Would definitely rent again.

Not crazy heavy like other sequin shirts, and not constricting! I've worn other sequin shirts before and felt like I was in a sparkly prison. Not so with this shirt! I wore it dancing and was comfortable all night. Extra plus, the sequins are fun to play with! A tactile experience!

Wore out to party with the girls! Looks great with black pants or jeans! I am 5'7" and was super worried about this being too short bc it is cropped but it was perfect with high waisted jeans and leggings! Check out my styled pieces at @thelindsayabigail

links_Review_Title: Added some sparkle to my night!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to my golden birthday celebration! I am a 34 DDD and though slightly snug, it didn't feel at all right or uncomfortable. I wore it with a high-waisted skirt and got TONS of compliments. Just wish I could have kept it! Also, I'm 5'3 and it hit just below my waist. If I raised my arms, you could see my ribs. Lol
Cute top. Definitely a baby-t. Cut short. Received lots of compliments.

This top is short, which is what I wanted because I paired it with high waisted black leather pants. It's comfortable because it's lined on the inside and there's a button clasp in the back. Not too tight on the sleeves. I would definitely rent again.

I rented this for New Years Eve at a bar. I needed something not super formal but still fun and NYE appropriate and this top was perfect with a pair of black pleather leggings I own. The leggings have a high waist so they worked great with this shirt that is slightly cropped. Completely fit the bill for me and true to size!

links_Review_Title: Simple yet elegant top. Cropped enough to feel sophisticated yet fun.
links_Review_Text: True to size. Cropped.
Silk liner makes tee super comfortable to wear. I wish it were a bit longer but paired with a tight black tank or bodysuit under was perfect! Lots of compliments for a night out.

links_Review_Title: Perfect piece for the holidays. Sparkly and fun.
links_Review_Text: Love the sequins on this piece. It was a lot of fun to wear. However it was quite boxy. I had to wear it with the right accessories.￼

links_Review_Title: Cute, but small especially for ladies with large boobies. :)

links_Review_Text: I was hesitant to get a "crop top" but I loved this so much! The sequins were soft and it wasn't too short - came to top of my jeans. It was perfect! Will rent again
Was the perfect top for my clients holiday party. I received many compliments throughout the night. It is short and sits at your natural waist line so I'd recommend high waisted pants or a skirt.
I wore this several times. Will likely buy in the future! I received so many compliments on this shirt. I wore it with black skinny jeans and heels.

This top is perfect for parties or other festive occasions. As noted in other reviews, it is more of a baby tee when ordered in regular sizing so you may want to size up for more coverage. I wore a black tank top underneath to avoid too much exposure. The top also photographs beautifully.
My daughter wore this for her 16th birthday party. It is fun, a little sparkly and very flattering. We'll definitely rent again.

Sadly, was an extra item for a weekend of parties/events and didn't wear it, but LOVED the look and style. TOTALLY comfortable for such a sparkly top = will rent again because it's so pretty with black or white pants!
I didn't use because the fit is weird, makes you look bigger. Not a good choice for people with small hips because it makes you look boxy.

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up using, but cute party tee
links_Review_Text: Definitely a baby tee; had this as a back-up piece to a romper for a concert/birthday party. Liked the romper more. Fits TTS, it's lined so no scratchy sequins. Not too heavy.

I rented this for a bachelorette party and didn't end up wearing it because our plans for the evening changed, but I loved this rental and would definitely rent again. It's true to size, lined (aka not itchy!), and is really comfortable. The sequins didn't seem like they would end up scratching my arms while wearing either, but I can't confirm since I didn't wear this other than for a few minutes around my apartment. I highly recommend this top!
