links_Review_Text: The Fit was great. I did add some "polishing" in the form of spanx but it's not necessarily needed but more for my peace of mind. I wore some hot pink tassel and gold earrings but there are some many colors this dress picks up that you could wear an assortment of colors. It's true to size and great for girls with boobs and a butt!

I wore this to a Mardi Gras which made the night so much more fun! You can change the sequins based on rubbing them right or left - so have fun with it. I usually wear a small, but the XS was the perfect fit! I'm 5'0" and 112 lbs (I can't get my profile to update!) Have fun, and I hope this helps!

links_Review_Title: 80's / 90's Neon Lights Prom Themed Awards Party
links_Review_Text: I'm 4' 11", 124 lbs and chose to wear a size small because the dress is a tad bit shorter than the size medium. As a mom of three, I felt that this dress was very flattering for my curvy shape. Also, I knew I nailed the theme when my dress matched the photo backdrop perfectly (see photo attached)!
This Dress was a hit, so comfortable and warm, also more compliments than I could count. At a concert, this dress was the real star of the show.

This dress is a perfect party dress and I received many compliments while while wearing it. It was extremely comfortable and made out of a little bit stretch material so I can move freely in it all night. Because it is long sleeve I did get a little warm inside but it is also a mini dress so that helped. It wasA conversation piece as well because the sequins could go all gold or multicolored and people kept asking if they could touch the dress because it was so interesting.

This dress is my favorite of all time from RTR It is stretchy and comfortable! It is so gorgeous in person. I had so many random people complimenting me in this dress! Don't hesitate, rent this dress!!!

links_Review_Title: One of my associates was wearing a blazer made out of the same material. We looked great!
links_Review_Text: This dress is rainbow!!! It photographs gold and silver on the website, but its gold and rainbow on the reverse side of the sequins. Looked amazing, but not what I expected. For fit I'm a pear shape, the small was too tight on my butt, the medium fit but was a bit loose on top. I ended up wearing the medium and was very comfortable. Do call a friend to zip you up. I just about dislocated my arms trying to put it on by myself. Worth it though!

I bought the dress for my birthday and did a Photoshoot in it! I loved it. I got great photos, then wore it for my birthday dinner. I got so many compliments from everyone! It fits great. Stretchy, comfortable, and super cute! Not too short either!
Beautiful and fun tactile dress. Sequence goes in both directions for a different color effect. Dress is a little hot to wear but very pretty!
Wore the M as it was a work party. The S fit great just short. Loved how it doesn't wrinkle.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a night out in Vegas!
links_Review_Text: Really fun dress. Received lots of compliments all night. Only reason I gave 4 stars is because my neck was itchy all night. But I would still wear it again!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress that received tons of compliments.
links_Review_Text: This dress is super comfortable and has a little stretch to it. Received compliments all night long at my company holiday party.

links_Review_Title: Excellent dress - got compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: It is very much a body con dress. Overall it fit well enough that I could go down to the Medium.

This dress was amazing. I really enjoyed how shiny and sparkly it was in person. I didn't give it 5 stars only because it kinda hurts your bottom when you sit down on the sequins and the sleeves could've been a tad bit longer for me.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'6", 139 lbs, athletic build. The dress was snug but stretchy so it fit well (I have larger thighs, a booty, medium waist, bigger arms). It's mermaid sequin style, so if you have friends who are handsy, they want to play with the sequins. I liked the dress much better in person vs the photos. The mock turtleneck is tight, but went unnoticed the rest of the night. If you want a showstopper dress, this is it!

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. I got compliments all night long. The dress is stretchy and I probably could have pulled off a small but I wanted the extra room for my hips and behind. The medium was a great fit but a little large in the arms and waist. I really enjoyed the two way sequins, I could not stop playing with them.

I rented this for my husband's work Christmas Party (actually this was sent to me after my first dress didn't fit right). It's a thick scuba-like material under the sequins, so not itchy at all (even around the neck!). I wore spanx underneath but it was very forgiving. Lots of compliments and I felt great!
I wore this on New Year's Eve/my birthday and it was perfect! Stretchy. Warm. comfortable. Dazzling! I loved it so much I'm renting it again this year !

links_Review_Title: I felt incredible all night and received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Great fit overall and true to size

I rented this for my 50th birthday party. I felt like a shining star. I will note that although the main pic looks like camo, the sequins flip so depending how you rub them, the pattern can look totally different. You definitely need to be okay with people touching you in this dress.

The dress was fabulous. It fit perfectly and was comfy and warm. I got SO many compliments. It was actually a talking point pretty much all evening. Everyone was obsessed with the fact that it's a flip dress--so everyone had to rub my arm to watch it change from rainbow to gold! Lots of fun.
I'm 5'6 160pounds and the medium was perfect it has some give. Not to short perfect length. Received compliments all night!!!!! Want to buy or rent again. Very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Sparkles and rainbows, I'm here for it!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so fun and such a hit. I received compliments all night long! I wore this to an HRC Annual Gala & Dinner and it could not have been more perfect. As other reviews state-it's heavy/thick and very form fitting. I wore Spanx tights underneath to keep it all in place. 10/10 would recommend this dress!
This dress was gorgeous, fit wonderfully, and I received many compliments! I rented it again for NYE and I can't wait.

I have never been stopped or complimented so much for any item of clothing (and that was at the CMA Awards in a sea of sequins!). People LOVED this dress. I loved that it was comfortable. It has a ton of stretch, it's not too short, and the long sleeves are great. It's weighty - definitely better for cooler temperatures. I wore a medium (with shape wear underneath). I'm 5'2" and about 137 pounds at the time of wearing this.

links_Review_Title: walking into a party, I was stopped by the bartender shouting "OH MY GAWD, THAT DRESS!".
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a wedding reception after party. And I'm considering it for NYE. It for beautifully. I'm 5ft 2in & 120lbs. I'm curvy so the only *tiny* issue was that it bunched up a little around my midsection.

links_Review_Title: Perfect sparkle for Lady Gaga in Las Vegas!
links_Review_Text: Received compliments from strangers & had a blast in this sparkle party dress. Fit was snug for a medium, the dress is warm & pretty comfortable.

I ordered the M as my primary and the L as my backup. I opted for the L simply for comfort. On the hanger, I was afraid this dress would be too short, but once it was on the length was perfect. The sequins are GORGEOUS, and I had so many people stop me at the cocktail fundraiser we were attending to tell me it was the BEST dress of the night! For the price, you cannot go wrong with this dress, and you will feel #comfy but also look #stunning all night!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. True to size and really makes a statement.
links_Review_Text: I wore this to an engagement party. The dress was true to size and hugged all the right places.

links_Review_Title: Everyone LOVED this dress!!!! Including ME
links_Review_Text: Such a fun dress to wear!!! I was worried I would be super hot in it but I was just fine! I’m 5.8” 175lbs muscular build and it fit great! I wear an 8/10 and the L was super comfortable. Everyone wants to touch this dress so don’t wear it if you don’t get a kick out of that.
I wore this dress for NYE! It was a showstopper for sure--I felt so glamorous and received lots of compliments. It's very hip-hugging and toasty.
Had a blast in this dress ! So fun
Sexy sequins dress that was easy to wear! I got compliments all night long.

links_Review_Title: This dress is a show stopper!
links_Review_Text: I received so many compliments on this dress all night long. Very comfortable. The only thing I can say is that the color is very different from the picture. What looks black on the picture is actually multi-color sequins( red, black, blue). I would definitely rent this dress again!
Great dress! High quality and fits well.

links_Review_Title: Casino themed conference and this dress fit the bill
links_Review_Text: I loved everything about the dress! It is heavy with all the sequence but it fit like a glove! It fit true to size and was everything I wanted for my casino themed event! I got so many compliments on this dress!!! And would love to rent it again, just need to find the right occasion!

links_Review_Title: Lurve this piece! Super-fun statement... perfect for a galactic themed awards show!
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size. This dress has a lot of stretch so the medium fit fine. A large would have been perfect if it were available. Note: the gold sequins must vary from piece to piece. The dress I received didn't have as many as the dress pictured. Bust: 39" Natural Waist: 29" Hips: 39"
Super comfortable. Hugs all the right places. Attention-grabbing and sexy. All in one!

links_Review_Title: This dress was the star of two parties in one night!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to an industry awards gala and a Mardi Gras ball, both on a Saturday night. As soon as I received and opened the RTR garment bag, I knew that I made the right choice for these events. The dress was a hit! It was the star of the night. I received so many compliments on the look and fit of the dress. I'm 5'9", ordered the Medium, and it fit perfectly. My only regret is that I had to return the dress. If this dress is available for your event, do not hesitate to order it!

links_Review_Title: Very pretty dress but size up
links_Review_Text: The dress is beautiful but runs quite tight in the waist and chest. Part of it is due to UK sizing. I ended up returning the size 2/xxs (already a disconnect because an xxs is usually a 0 or a 00) for the 4. The 4 was still a little tight but comfortable. You could just see the fabric pucker a bit. If I rented again, I might go up an additional size. If you get the sizing right, the dress is flattering.

Usually wear a 2 or 0, got a 4 after reading reviews and the 4 was the perfect fit. The dress was still pretty tight on the chest so I wore it without a bra Love the vapor-wave colors. Easily pairs with jackets.
I rented this dress for every day and I loved the brightness of the colors!!

links_Review_Title: Size up at least one size.
links_Review_Text: Definitely size up. I am a true 0 and the 2 just fit me. It was tight in the ribcage when sitting. Not unbearable but ready to take it off at the end of a hot day. If you have a bigger chest or ribcage maybe go up two or more sizes. The straps were a little long but I made it work just fine. It's a gorgeous dress! Truly a work of art. Everyone complimented it. Just yes definitely size up unless you have the smallest ribcage.

Dress was true to size and arrived a few days before it was supposed to which was great! I wore this to a wedding 2 months post baby and loved the fit around the chest and the looseness around the stomach.Material flows wonderfully and is a good weight. Only con is that u must wear nude underwear as you can see on the sides of the dress if it's any other color. I received tons of compliments, especially on the colors!

This dress was so pretty and had such a nice "flow" to it. Very light and the colors were so pretty. I got a ton of compliments! It does run very small and the boning on the sides is a little uncomfortable but overall, I loved it. Would totally rent again!
Loved everything about this dress... it's comfortable, the colors are vibrant and fun. I got non stop compliments all night
Rented for a baby shower. Very pretty! Runs tight in the rib cage.
Really flattering, flowy, colorful dress. Definitely a little tight around the waist, but the size up was too loose. Wore it to a wedding on a really hot day and felt great. Love this dress!

links_Review_Title: The colors and pleats flow beautifully. 80's, but tasteful. Artsy.
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress in 0R & 2R. 2R fit perfectly, even with my small breasts. I ADORE this piece of art clothing. The length is also perfect for my height w/ heels.
It's tight in the bust area - didn't wear a bra
This dress is divine. Fits like a glove and the pattern is SO beautiful. Great for petites.
So pretty and comfortable. Got tons of compliments all night. Loved this dress!

Loved this dress! Wore it for a summer black tie wedding in the NC mountains in the pouring rain - aka it was good it wasn't completely floor length. I have a small waist but bigger hips and it was a little snug in the waist band with not much give. Colors are gorgeous! Front texture adds a lil something extra and I got lots of compliments. Would rent again!

Great dress! Pros: amazingly silky material, gorgeous colors, youthful and fun, great print and pleating detail, light for the summer Cons: snags easily due to the delicate fabric. Runs very small in the rib cage so size up! I normally wear a 6/8 and have a small midsection - the 8 was quite tight. It felt like a corset.

links_Review_Title: Compliments all day! Very fitted at bust and rib cage
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to work and then out for dinner and kept getting compliments. One woman stopped me on the street and kept complimenting me, my boss raves about it multiple times throughout the day, and my dinner companion kept raving about it until she finally just asked me for the link as she was considering buying it! I usually fit a size 2 or 4 and sized down in this case. However I would have been much more comfortable in the 4. The bust and ribcage were suuuper tight when zipped. In fact I went to work with it partially unzipped and then had someone zip it the rest of the way! Definitely a surprising hit. I wasn't sure about the colors but styled it with neutral cork sandals and a neutral (light denim) shrug

This dress is prettier in person than it is in the photos. This dress fits true to size. I am more of an apple shape and don't have much of a waist, so it was a bit tight in the ribcage for me. I have a fuller bust and did not have to wear a bra.

links_Review_Title: Colorful and comfy dress ! Great quality
links_Review_Text: The dress is AMAZing ! Love the colors - their bright but not over the top. The bottom is flowy and not form fitting. The torso ran a little small considering I have a wider ribcage. Length was almost to the floor but could still wear flats. (4'11 )

The dress was beautiful. The colors and the material. You could tell this was a designer dress. The only thing is that it was super tight around the rib area like other reviewers were mentioning. It fit like a glove for me, it barely zipped lol but it was a tad uncomfortable so when I took it off at the end of the night my body relaxed in a bit of relief.
This is a well made dress, it just didn't do anything for me, I didn't wear it
This is a high quality material and I loved the bold colors but it definitely runs small so size up!

links_Review_Title: The dress is really unique, the colors are beautiful, and the material is lightweight & flowy.
links_Review_Text: It is very fitted around the waist with no give. I normally wear a 6, which I could have squeezed into, but ended up going with the 8. The only downside of the 8 was that the straps were a bit long and kept falling down when I was on the dance floor. A strapless bra works well with this dress. Plan to wear nude-colored undergarments.
Its a beautiful dress, however it runs small so i was not able to wear it :(

The dress is ok. It's an absolutely gorgeous color and pattern but the fit is weird. The top part is VERY small and I had to size up from a typical 2-4 in dresses to an 8. When I got the 8, I finally was able to zip it up but then it was big from the ribcage down. I paired it with a jean jacket to hide the extra fabric, and still got a lot of compliments. I wish it had fit better but overall fine for a day of meetings around the office during the summer.
Fitted bodice, love the sweetheart neckline. The colors of this dress are SO pretty too. Material is really nice.
Couldn't even zip this up over my boobs (even without s bra) although it fit well in the waist so I'm not sure it would be worth sizing up. Gorgeous colors and fabric though!
Perfect fit and flattering. Gorgeous colors.
Wanted to wear this on vacation, but it runs very small around the chest, and I couldn't zip up. I wear a 4/6 on average, but I will have to rent an 8 for this to work.
Love the colors!a bit tight around the ribs. Beautiful dress overall.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but had to size up
links_Review_Text: I love the colors in this dress! The floor was a little snug in the waste but I have a slim athletic figure and don't really have a ways to begin with so I typically have to size up when a dress has a band around the waist and the fabric has no give. Hopefully the 6 will be available for my event! It's so pretty in person too.
Beautiful dress but the size six fit my size 2 daughter!! Size up!!!

Make sure you look at the sizing notes on the designers website! I ordered a size 2 which is normal for me in this type of dress and it came in and the tag said "Size 2 - XXS". So I exchanged for a size 4 which fits perfectly. Just make sure to go look at the sizing chart on the designers website before you order!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely beautiful dress, but runs small
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a birthday party. The colors are gorgeous and there is a cool, light print on the yellow and green parts. However, this dress does run small and did not fit me. I recommend sizing up. I also recommend wearing neutral undergarments as it is a bit see-through.

A little snug but otherwise fit well. Super flowy and vibrant but not see-through or anything. The waist band hit in the proper spot. Didn't love my arms being exposed but that was a me-thing. If it wasn't too hot to wear a jacket I would have worn it. Returned without wearing.
The dress is beautifully cut and is very flattering.

links_Review_Title: I may just have to buy it, I love it that much!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so fun and beautiful at the same time. I loved it!!

I almost never wear the color yellow but I absolutely loved this dress. Contemplated buying this one too! I'm almost never an xs because of my height but this fit me perfectly and not tight at all. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: Cute, fun, would rent a million times
links_Review_Text: The cutest, easy to wear dress for anything! Flowy, comfy & everyone I know complimented this dress a million times.

links_Review_Title: Stunning and fun! So many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Ordered this as my backup and absolutely loved it! Definitely runs small as I'm typically a 4-6 and the recommended size was large, but with the gathered top and full skirt, it fit just fine. This dress felt feminine with a bit of edginess- one of my favorites I've ever worn!

links_Review_Title: An amazing dress!!! so much better in person.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly and was comfy. Can be dressed up or dressed down. A total hit!!
So I liked this dress- top half was super flattering & loved the colors. The bottom was a lot of fabric- made my hips look wide. I'm wondering if I sized down maybe I would have worn.

links_Review_Title: Maybe my favorite dress I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: It's so comfy!! There's a LOT of material but it's so fun and bright.

links_Review_Title: Add a headband and you're Blair Waldorf!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so fun and perfect for a spring or summer wedding! The smocking on the bust is so comfortable without a bra (I just wore breast petals) and honestly I could have sized down because the fabric is so stretchy. I got so many compliments on the dress and because I was also wearing a velvet headband I was told I was Blair Waldorf by 4 different people ha!! I will definitely rent this dress again for a wedding. The only reason I give this 4 stars instead of 5 is that if you're not standing the perfect position, the dress can make you look bigger than you are in photos due to the excessive ruffles. But I will say, while I'm not pregnant, I did think to myself that this would be the perfect dress to hide a bump.

This dress is incredible! Snag it when it's available! It was a huge hit, tons of compliments, so flattering, comfortable, and eye-catching. I felt like a princess wearing it with the dramatic skirt. The designer hits the ruffles at all the right spots so it still flatters the body, especially with the ruched top and asymmetrical straps. I wore it so many times and right when I posted a photo with it, my inbox flooded with people wanting to know where it was from. Try it even if ruffles aren't your thing!
This is the most gorgeous dress, constant compliments and felt like a princess in wine country

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress so much!!! I felt like a woodland spirit!
links_Review_Text: If you have medium or larger cups, this dress probably won't fit well in the chest.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Everyone at work loved it!
links_Review_Text: Fits very well! True to size.

Absolutely LOVED this rental, if it wasn't $500 to buy I'd purchase today. There is a lot of fabric, but it's so flowy and beautifully made, got endless compliments all night and has a very Spanish feel. HIGHLY recommend! I'm usually a 2-4 and the MR fit well. It's one of those dresses where you could size up or down. It stretches to your body. Love love love!!!!
Such a fun dress to wear to a wedding! The fabric and fit is super comfortable. I got so many compliments all night!
Super cute- a little too voluminous on the waist so some angles made you look fat! Overall was cute flirty dress

I wore this dress to my sister's graduation and absolutely loved it! It was very comfortable. Usually I am between an XS and S; the XS fit perfectly. The dress has a lot of movement and the colors are vibrant without being obnoxious. I highly recommend this dress!
Great design and comfort, worn multiple times

This dress is perfect for a Spring wedding, Easter lunch or a bridal shower. Otherwise, it's a little too cute for me ;) I feel like the shortest ruffle tier is unnecessary and unflattering. But the material is thick and silky and it flows nicely. It was also a little longer than I prefer (at my ankles) and I'm 5'7!
Really wanted to love this. Just wasn't flattering. There's so much fabric in the skirt and the top was just my boobs not my waist. The material is really nice though. Such a shame.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite rentals ever!
links_Review_Text: Wore this out to a nice dinner with friends and was one of the most unique dresses I have ever worn! Super great quality and insanely comfortable!
Made me look pregnant via skirt volume and cut.

I wore this to a fundraiser event. While 99% of the women were in some style of black dress, I stood out in this dress- in a good way! Fun, forgiving and unique! I'm 5'3" and it was basically floor length. The straps aren't adjustable and the bodice is super stretchy, so I would size down.
This dress fit great and had the perfect amount of stretch. It had more fabric than I expected but was still flattering. Perfect for vacation or a summer wedding.
So unique and flattering!
Bra not needed unless you want definition of bust. As a D cup, my top looked smushed without a bra. Otherwise, nice rental.
So much more that I expected. It fit perfectly. Amazing material. Way more beautiful in person that in photo.
great fit and flare style - so comfortable, moves well. Really fun dress!
Loveliest dress, I received a million compliments each time I wore it! Super roomy and allowed for multiple trips to the buffet at Easter brunch. It would be super cute on a mama-to-be too!

links_Review_Title: Not a great fit at all
links_Review_Text: This dress feels more like a tent with a tight bodice. Just not flattering on a 5' 5'' frame
Fit perfectly

links_Review_Title: Love this dress!! Pockets are a bonus.
links_Review_Text: I knew to size up in Self Portrait, one size usually works out beautifully. This dress is fun, a bit edgy and sophisticated. Loved having pockets. Would rent this dress again.
This is my favorite rental so far. Structurally beautiful. Gorgeous fabric and tailoring. Looks and feels expensive. I might keep it.

This dress was great. Like most the other reviews said, it did run small so I went with the 6 even though I am normally a 4. The 6 fit perfectly. A little tough to throw your hands in the air like you just don't care on the dance floor but I made it work. Would love to wear it again.

links_Review_Title: Sexy yet conservative for work holiday party
links_Review_Text: I had to size up to a 6 due to limited sizing and knew it would be a touch too big but I made it work. Would have been perfect in a 4. This dress does show a good bit of wear but nothing that took away from the look. Absolutely loved this unique style. As always, I love styles with pockets, was very useful for a work party. SO many compliments! I wish I had more events to wear this to!
I'm not sure I've ever received so many compliments on anything I've worn. I had to go up a size, but it was so with a second rental.

links_Review_Title: Unique and classic at the same time
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Super classy but sexy. And very unique! It definitely runs small. I'm usually a 2 or 4 but I wore the 6. The top and arms were a little roomy but the bodice area is super tight. The skirt underneath is very short as well. I didn't wear anything underneath and when I was sitting it rode up a lot. But all in all this dress worked out! Loved it!
Wore this dress to a wedding and received so many compliments. The dress runs small so I went up a size based on the reviews posted before me.
Fun to wear, tons of compliments!

I typically wear a 4 and wore a 6R in this dress based on other reviews. The 6 fit perfect. I ended up getting engaged the night I wore this dress, so I might be biased, but this dress is magical. Super classy and elegant, with the right amount of sexy. Note: it is tight in the rib cage. It wasn't entirely uncomfortable, but if you like a loose fit, you may not love it.
Beautiful dress. I'm happy I read the suggestions on sizing because it definitely runs a couple sizes too big. I think the smaller size would have restricted movement in my arms.
This dress was gorgeous! No need for a bra (which is rare for me!) The dress doesn't have much stretch, but it held everything in perfectly. And it has pockets! I got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: I was complimented all night long!
links_Review_Text: While the dress was a bit snug, it was a huge confidence boost! So beautiful and well-made. It even had pockets! I picked it as a guest for a bachelorette party because it was sophisticated, interesting, and most importantly didn't pull too much attention away from the bride. Size up and dance the night away!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress, would wear again and again
links_Review_Text: Special, flattering, funky, but still beautiful. Loved this so much. Only negative is that the dress isn't constructed properly around the shoulders/upper arms and back.. there is very little room for movement

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress so much I rented twice!
links_Review_Text: I originally rented this as a backup in July. I would have worn it then but it was slightly too tight. I had another event pop up and i knew right away I would rent this again! I rented the size 2 and 4 and ended up wearing the 4. It was a perfect fit except for my broad shoulders. I really couldn't raise my arms over my head but could still move and dance. Received complements all night about how unique and stunning the dress was!

I loved this dress. It's the perfect combination of sophisticated with a hint of sexiness because of the underlay. It's not the most comfortable dress , as it's hard to raise your arms and a bit scratchy, but all in all I loved it. I would sure or size up. I'm usually a two but after reading the reviews, I ordered a four and it fit perfectly.

I rented this dress for my husband's 40th Birthday party. The dress arrived well in time. Everything about this dress was fantastic. The fabric, the colors, the fit and the style. I got so many compliments.
The fit was great. Curved in all the right places. Compliments all night long.

links_Review_Title: First time renting and now I'm hooked!
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous! I got so many compliments throughout the night. It's all about the details with this one. I'm usually a 2, sometimes 4, but i was a 4 in this dress. It was a very tight squeeze, but it contoured my body nicely and kept everything tight.
Very very tight. The seam started undoing and it seams like someone restitched it once before on the chest line. Get 2 sizes up from your normal size It's absolutely stunning but tight

Gorgeous dress. Loved it SO much. Loved all the different textures/materials/details. Perfect dress for a early spring/late winter wedding at the Art Institute in Chicago. Need to size up 2 dress sizes. Typically a size 2(ish) in dress and had to bump to a 6. Love this designer so much. Unique and different. Dress is elegant and a bit sexy w/ the cutouts.

I rented this for a charity dinner with cocktail dress code, but didn't end up going, so never wore the dress. I will definitely re t it again though, it's stunning and the fabric is heavy and feels expensive. It fits like a glove and is sexy but modest at the same time. Just one note- it's hard (for me- impossible) to zip up alone so I recommend single ladies ask a friend to join them while they're getting ready! It also definitely runs small, in between 4 and 6, rented the 6, and could have sized up.

I absolutely loved this dress! I'm so happy I finally got a chance to wear it. I had ordered it previously in my normal size 4, but couldn't zip it up around my bust. I'm so glad the size 6 worked. This was such a fun dress for my husband's birthday party. It was a perfect blend of sexy and conservative with the peekaboo lace.
Loved the look of this dress. If you want to receive compliments all day/night, get this dress! It's a showstopper.
I'm glad I went through all the reviews before I ordered, because I usually wear size 2 but size 4 fits perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, but restrictive in the arms and chest
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a formal company party and although I absolutely loved the look (and must admit, I enjoyed the compliments too -- quite a few of my coworkers recognized it or sought me out to ask about it), I could barely move my arms. As beautiful as it is, I would avoid if you plan to be dancing!

links_Review_Title: Great fabric, sexy but not over the top!
links_Review_Text: It fits very small in the rib cage area which is usually never a problem for me so that was a little strange, but the dress itself is gorgeous!

This dress was gorgeous on. Made for someone that is long and petite. I am 25, 122-125lbs and the size 4 was PERFECT. I normally am 2 or 4 in dresses but based off the reviews I got a 4 and a 6 for back up! So many questions as to where I bought the dress! I felt sexy, and elegant at the same time!

Ordered this dress for a formal birthday party. Read reviews that mentioned how small it ran but I went against them and order a 0R anyway. I'm 100lbs and my husband had to literally stuff me in it. Once I got in the dress I was fine for the evening. Loved the neckline, waist, and skirt detail and the plus was it had pockets! FYI, if you're going dancing, please be aware that you're unable to lift your arms. At the end of the night, I ripped the sleeve area :(. So if you're considering this dress make sure you order a size up and do not lift you arms. It was all worth it in the end because I felt beautiful and received so many compliments.

True to size for the most part but a little loose around the bust if you're as flat chested as I am. Very femme yet structured and beautifully made. The fishnet neckline? Yes, ma'am. Hemline was a little longer than I like. And it would've been nice to be able to raise my arms above my head but I kept all my dance moves hip-centric for the night. A small sacrifice.
This dress is pretty restricting, but that's a small price to pay for all the compliments you will receive! Loved the structure and shape of the dress. Would recommend!

As the others said, it's difficult to raise your arms any higher than your chest area. The top part is tight, also. BUT ALL OF THIS DOESN'T MATTER. It made me feel sexy and stylish. Many compliments were give !

links_Review_Title: I absolutely LOVE this dress. It's even more beautiful in person. Fits tight in the ribs/waist.
links_Review_Text: Order one or two sizes bigger than your regular size!

links_Review_Title: My first RentTheRunway. This dress is lovely! I received compliments throughout the night!
links_Review_Text: Wore 4R. The size 0 is tiny! I still had a bit of room in my waist and chest (I'm a 33A for reference and 112lbs).

This dress runs very small. I usually wear a 0-2 and I ended up wearing the 4. Pros: Beautiful detail, pockets!, unique. Cons: A little uncomfortable to sit in, cannot raise arms very high for dancing, underskirt is quite short. Although there are a few cons, this dress was gorgeous and I was very glad to have rented it.
This dress is really fitted across the rib cage so size appropriately. With that said, this dress is amazing!! It was comfortable, and held us to a night of dancing. This dress is a must!!

This dress was definitely a standout at my friend's wedding. It was comfortable and fun-- extra bonus that there's pockets! I got so many compliments and found the fit to be true to size, I could've even taken one size down and made it work. Would rent this again for sure!
Fits tight enough I didn't need a bra. Perfect blend of class, fun & skin. Loved that it had pockets!
Fitted on top, elegant, cap sleeve prohibited arms from raising above head.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous and unique, but no arm movement.
links_Review_Text: The dress is stunning in person; however, as noted by others, it was difficult to move in and I couldn't lift my arms. In fact, the top lace part was separating from the bodice at the points by the arm holes. Midi length was pretty much ankle height on me. Probably wouldn't wear again unless 2R was available, and I typically where 0P or XXS.
Great skirt, ended up just typing it instead of using the button. Could be dressed up or down, nice quality fabric. Definitely recommend!
Classic Kate Spade. Beautiful colors and pattern, easy to wear and a heavy enough fabric with enough fabric crossover to avoid mishaps. Came close to buying but would like to try one size down first
This skirt is so so beautiful and such a great statement piece. I will definitely rent again. Only negative was that it was a little bit more faded than the photos make it appear.
It's super pretty and the print is amazing, but I'm not sure the length did me any good
I didn't realize at firat that this is a wrap skirt, so heads-up that it does have a tie closure. I just love the print and the flattering cut and length.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for the office, church or fall wedding!
links_Review_Text: This skirt is lovely. I enjoyed wearing it. Since I'm short heels were a must! Of course it came pressed and looked great and expensive. The fabric is thick and didn't wrinkle too much! My only problem with this skirt is of course I wore it on the most windy day in March so it was constantly blowing open. I would totally wear this skirt again! I wore it with a black turtleneck, but I think it would be so cute with a white button down!
Great wrap skirt that folds over enough that it mitigates the audial problems of a wrap skirt/dress. Lightweight but sturdy material.
Standout skirt! True to fit and unique. I paired with a striped turtleneck and boots and got compliments all day!
This skirt is beautifully made. I wore this to work in the winter. It's a nice, thick material. It's definitely longer than what I typically wear but it was nice to try something new!
Very cute. Rented for work but will be wearing it to thanksgiving dinner as well

The background of this print is a light, baby pink. I paired it with a blazer and boots for a November event. The fabric feels thick and starched - it is not flowy at all. It held its shape beautifully and was very flattering. I'm thicker through the middle so I didn't use the button holes, just tied it instead. That was especially helpful after I hit the buffet and ate my face off. I loosened it and got another plate. Sorry not sorry!!

I was drawn to this skirt immediately because of the bold poppy pattern, and it did not disappoint. Wore it to work with a simple black top and sling back flats, and felt great all day into a dinner that evening. Got tons of compliments, probably would buy or rent again! I feel like it might run a touch small because it has not a lot of stretch—I always size up when a waist is more defined— but I had plenty of breathing room.

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments and was so comfortable!
links_Review_Text: I received so many compliments from colleagues complementing my skirt. It was a thinner material so perfect for a warmer, early fall day. Definitely not appropriate if it were any colder outside.

links_Review_Title: Nice fall print and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: This is a really nice, high quality skirt. I wore with a sweater because I am at work - but, this would be really cute with a black sleeveless knit top or with a brown or red unstructured jacket
Fit true to size. Fun skirt that can be dressed up or down. I got lots of compliments on it. It may not be the best length if you're on the shorter side.
A-line skirt that hits me mid calf. Nice material. Defiantly not worth the retail price but that's exactly why I joined unlimited :). I'll probably wear it a couple times before I send it back.
This wrap skirt was GREAT! The fit was spot on, very comfy and great material. Perfect skirt for work!
Really fun skirt. I loved the inside buttons for making sure it stayed secure. I didn't love the length and it required heels.

links_Review_Title: No give to fabric so if buttons do not line up perfectly, it doesn't fit right.

links_Review_Text: Sometimes it can split open when you are walking.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print for Spring, Summer, or Fall
links_Review_Text: Fit just right, covered my tummy yet able to show that I have a waist. Liked it so much I bought it.
Fits true to size but because of the wrap style it can be adjustable if you don't use the hidden buttons. The dress is perfect for fall and can be paired with long sleeves or a tank top.

links_Review_Title: Got compliments on the print. Overall fit was good.
links_Review_Text: Didn't love the fabric - just plain cotton and was a little tired looking. Liked it but didn't love it.
This skirt is fantastic. It fits great, isn't uncomfortable to sit in at work, and the graphic print is so cool. It looks great with a black turtleneck, making it feel very chic.
Well made and beautiful combination of colors. Was a little snug at the waist but otherwise fit well.

Lighter weight than anticipated but wore with a long sleeved body suit and received many compliments! Would rent again. Looked great with black shirt and brown heels. Bold print with easy-to-pair neutral colors
Fit as described and was very comfortable and flattering. Great for work or any other occasion!

links_Review_Title: Received 10 compliments in one day.... so I bought it!
links_Review_Text: What I love most about this skirt is the fabric - very transitional. Not too light in weight and not too heavy. Perfect for Summer to Fall. I will were now with cute espadrilles and then switch to my leather over the knee boots around October. I walked into an after work event and two ladies immediately gasped from the sight of my skirt. Then that started a RTR discussion where I gave out one of my discount codes. My husband loves the colors on the skirt. The poppies are so fun and different from anything else in my closet. I paired it with a simple black t-shirt so far but I could also swap that out for a white blouse and high heels. Don't hesitate to rent... then buy!

Fit TTS, I got this on Unlimited to change up my work wardrobe. Wore with a fitted black top and black chunky sandals. Not something I would buy and wear multiple times because it was too memorable, but it was cute and I felt appropriately covered (the flap on the wrap wasn't at risk to come open). Cotton stiffer material and quite full.
Fantastic. Flattering and colorful. Got tons of compliments from my co-workers.
Ran a bit small but great skirt.
This skirt was so cute, fit perfectly, and was the perfect amount of pop! I am thinking about buying it, I loved it so much!!!
Adorable transition skirt
Fun skirt! It is a bold pattern, and is perfect for renting rather than buying. I got a lot of compliments! I am between a 6 and an 8 - I ordered the 8, but the 6 would have fit better.
Loved the style, colors and material of this skirt. It fit very true to size for me.
It does run small so I would order up 2 sizes

True wrap skirt, made of a fabric that feels like a kitchen table cloth. Got as part of unlimited, couldn't be bothered to figure out how to hide wrap ties / hard to put together. Color and good length as pictured.
Made me have curves and hid my belly fat.

links_Review_Title: Cute skirt good for spring or fall
links_Review_Text: Cute waistline
Missing button

I had to rent this dress for a wedding and it was stunning. The top was a little large for me, but safety pins fixed everything. This dress hit all the right places and even had pockets! Would def rent again!!

links_Review_Title: Fun evening with friends and I knew I looked great.
links_Review_Text: The fabric has such a nice feel. The shape of the dress is simple but the fabric is stunning.
I loved this dress. It was a little big up top, but I was able to make modifications to make it work. It was very comfortable, plus it has pockets!

links_Review_Title: The amazing quality of the dress!! The colors were just stunning!
links_Review_Text: I was looking for something beautiful for my event and I found the perfect fit for me! I got so many compliments on my dress !! Wow, I couldn't have picked a better outfit! I felt like a princess!

Loved this dress and Compliments all night! I am 5'5 and wore a 2" heel and had to hem tape the front about 1.5" . It runs a little long but easily fixed with tape! I also had to wear a bralette as it was too much cleavage for me otherwise.

This was my first rental and I wasn't sure of my size or what would be flattering. When my first choices didn't make me feel amazing, customer service helped me select another one and overnighted it. I got lots of complements and felt comfortable and beautiful. My husband wanted to buy the dress he loved it so much

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear but it was nice dress
links_Review_Text: The other dress I ordered beat this one out by a hair. I am usually a 14 but they didn't have that size available. The 16 was pretty roomy but I could have worn it without issue. I loved the fabric- the colors and pattern are even better than the pictures. It's very lightweight but still looks expensive. I didn't get further than just trying it on, but with a little body tape I could have worn a bra with it which I love. I'll probably order this in the 14 the next time I have a formal event

I wore this for a gala event, and got a ton of compliments. The bodice was pretty snug, but the rest of the dress is very forgiving. Somewhat of a plunging neckline, but otherwise a classic dress. It has pockets, which is always a positive. I'm 5'3" and with heels I didn't have a problem with the length.

links_Review_Title: Super pretty dress, fit for a queen!
links_Review_Text: I felt like royalty in this big beautiful gown, but also a practical, sexy woman who thought to wear a dress that has pockets and a plunging neckline. I love a good brocade fabric and this one had a quality construction to it. The straps covered my bra well, and the 'regular' length worked fine in reasonable heels (no Baby-Deer status for me!). I sadly decided not to wear the dress because it was a bit overly-formal for the occasion (formal wedding); I'd love to rent again for a Gala or maybe an Awards Show Watch Party.

This dress fit perfectly and was forgiving in not needing shape wear. I wore 3 inch heels and the long fell perfectly to the floor. Any shoe lower and I would have gone for a regular. I will remember this dress for something in the future!

I'm gained a little bit more weight than I thought over the holidays, I needed a 12 L. However, this was the only size they had left on short notice. But still was good and didn't have to wear a bra. It was a little tight around the rib cage. but the fabric laid gently and the cut was beautiful.

It was just a little too big on top but with a padded bra it was fine. Fabulous dress. Absolutely gorgeous and yet super comfortable! Even had big pockets so I could carry my phone and still dance all night. Completely loved this dress - wish I had another event to wear it to.

This dress is beautiful in person. It is a bit heavier fabric and holds the structure well. I usually am 14 but sized up due to other reviews saying the bust was small. I found the 16 to fit my ribs with slight room but very large around the stomach and way too big in the chest. I was surprised other reviews said the chest was small. Would agree that the V neck is quite low, but I could still wear a bra while trying it on. Wish it worked for me!
The straps are a bit long and it is pretty cleavage forward, but overall a nice easy comfy dress

I fell in love with this dress. Wore it for a black tie wedding and I felt like a princess all night. The top of the dress ran a bit long on me so my boobs felt like they were going to get out anytime but my friends said I wasn't showing too much so it was just how I felt. I wore petite and it was perfect for me at 5'3. Highly recommend this dress to anyone!
I loved the fabric of this dress and it was very flattering. The pockets were the best part! It was very low cut and my bra kept showing, but otherwise it was great!

This dress was beautiful! The length fit perfectly on my 5'0 frame with 4" heels. Only down side was that the shoulders were a bit loose and found myself tugging to keep the dress secured in front (ultimate ended up using safety pins to secure). Works for black tie event but probably wouldn't rent again due to the deep v and it being just a little too lose on me

links_Review_Title: The dress was extremely comfortable! I’m 5’9 and wore 3” heels so the “long” was perfect for me.
links_Review_Text: The zipper was a bit stiff, but other than that, it fit really well. The front is extremely low cut, so I added black fabric with two safety pins for added coverage.

links_Review_Title: Felt like a princess! Long enough for this tall girl!
links_Review_Text: Fit great, a little big because there is no 16 W size. But the extra room just made it kore comfortable. I could not zip the 16R up. So glad I sized up to 18.

links_Review_Title: I received compliments all night! The dress kept the girls together without making me feel stuffed.
links_Review_Text: I loved the feel of the dress. It was lightweight and flowy. I was initially a bit concerned about how long it would be even after ordering the LONG option, but it was great even with the heels I wore. One of the only cons I have about the dress was the inability to wear a bra underneath. I specifically ordered a larger size than I would normally wear for a bra, but even with the bigger size, I was unable to wear one to the event. Given the snug nature of the bust, it was not a problem most of the event, but there were some near-miss nip-slip occasions especially while dancing during the reception. The design was beautiful and appropriate and I would definitely order it again!

I wore this gown to a cocktail/formal Christmas party in Daytona Beach. It was a backup style sent because my original order was not able to be shipped. I wore the smaller of the two dresses. Waist fit fine, top was a little big. I wanted to get fashion tape, but ran out of time. I wore it with a black bolero/shrug as there is a deep V in the front and back. Dress is black in my opinion, though it looks navy blue on my screen, pink/red/gold too.
Really beautiful colors, heavy material, and has pockets! Roomy in the bust if you are small chested. Comfortable to wear. Only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is it all seemed a bit worn.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely gorgeous! And it had pockets!
links_Review_Text: This dress is LONG! I'm 5'11" and I'll be honest, this dress was so long that I had to hold it up when I was going up and down stairs. Also, I was in between sizes for this dress. The 16L fit me until I got to my ribs and chest. The 18WL was too big on top, but not so bad that I wasn't able to wear it and be comfortable. It just gapped a little. Overall, this dress looks gorgeous, was super comfy to wear, and I got tons of compliments.
I got so many compliments on this dress. I sized up twice just in case- it was a little loose and low in the chest area.

This was beautiful but just didn't fit through the shoulders and chest. This will be great for broader shoulders and larger chests. I thought the waist seemed tts, and any size hips will work. I sent it back unworn but I will maybe rent for a future event in the next size down!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! Felt so stunning! LOVED this dress.
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for me. The colors, style and fit. But there was also how I felt in it. When I walked in the room I could hear people talking about how beautiful I looked. I did have to buy a new bra and tuck the shoulders a bit but that could be because my size/height ratio is still a bit off. LOVED this dress!

links_Review_Title: RTR made my formal event so easy!
links_Review_Text: Nice and full, beautiful fabric, perfect fit. Front of dress is cut lower than I thought t it would be but I just wore a little cami underneath. I loved having pockets in the dress.

I'm normally a 12 or 14R... they didn't have my size left but I really wanted to wear this dress. My mom helped me pin it and I wore it. It was waaaaay too long lol but so stunning! I got so many complements, tho the one I didn't see coming was "are you expecting?" :( I gained a lot of weight this year and with all of the extra dress, it must've made me look pregnant. Idk. Or the lady was just being mean. But I felt so beautiful in it! Beautiful color and fabric, great fit, would rent again

links_Review_Title: I felt like a princess and got compliments all nice! Pockets were the icing on the cake!!!
links_Review_Text: Fall black tie wedding.... the perfect dress and so figure flattering!!
This dress is beautiful! Kris Hugh quality fabric and stitching and has a nice weight to it. It has pockets! I was able to put it on over my head without zipping so it does run a little big

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but busty girls beware!
links_Review_Text: The overall fit was great, but this dress is very low cut (as you can see lol). B/c of the deep v-neck, it's impossible to wear a bra, so just a heads up for my fellow busty gals. The material and colors of the dress are absolutely beautiful though and I got lots of compliments. Another note, this dress runs really long. I'm 5'9" and even with heels, this dress was still a bit long. Has pockets too :)
I felt so beautiful in it. It accented my figure. I was getting compliments all night. I will definitely rent this again.

I hesitated to try this dress because it looked a tiny but boring but I'm so happy I rented it!! It is gorgeous in person! The fabric is beautiful, it fits like a glove and it has pockets! It is long - I'm 5'2" and wore 3 inch heels and it touched the ground. But it's so full that it was still easy to move in.

links_Review_Title: Worn to the EMMYs... it was a total hit!
links_Review_Text: The dress was a wonderful gown for the formal celebration. The accent color is gold, so ended up going for a gold accented necklace and bracelet. Lots of compliments on the gown!

Sorry about the dark picture--pre-event hotel room. The most beautiful thing I have ever worn, including my wedding dress! I am usually a 6 but tried on the 2 at the RTR store, and it fits like a glove.

links_Review_Title: Pretty, but too low cut & too long
links_Review_Text: Because it was sent last minute as a replacement, they only had the 12L and it was just a little too long (even though I'm fairly tall). The front was also pretty low cut, which I'm not a huge fan of, but the material was beautiful and overall good quality.

Loved the print and the fabric, Wore this to a tropical wedding and received so many compliments. Dress was on the longer side for my 5'1 petite frame even with some high heels, don't recollect seeing a petite option. I alternate between size 6 and size 8 depending on the brands- for this dress I could have gone with size 6.

links_Review_Title: Great style! Comfortable to wear! Pockets!
links_Review_Text: I'm typically a 10 in dresses but the back up size 8 saved the day. If you are small-chested you might have an issue with fit, but it was perfect for me. Shout out to Rent the Runway -- this was my first rental and a couple of days before my event I burned my forearm cooking. The company overnighted long-sleeved options for me, but there weren't many to choose from at that point. I wanted one of them to work, but they didn't fit. Anyway, I wore a big bandage on my arm and nobody commented. I am so thankful, thought, that the company cared enough to help me out.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear - didn't fit my middle
links_Review_Text: amazing fabric and has a pockets. stunning dress just a little big for me.

links_Review_Title: A gala raising funds for Mount Vernon. I received many compliments on the gown.
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful. The fabric and color are stunning. Size 12R was definitely very long for a 5 foot 1 inch woman. I had to use hem tape. I have a large bustline 36D. It was a little snug but the 14 would’ve been way too big everywhere else.

links_Review_Title: Cute, comfortable romper that easily went from day to night (AND HAS POCKETS!)
links_Review_Text: I rented this romper for just my bachelorette party, but loved it so much I wore it earlier in the day for my bridal shower as well! It was super cute for a daytime event but easily transitioned into a great piece for a night out. It is really comfortable and has pockets, which is always a win in my book. Absolutely loved it!

I rented this outfit for a cruise to Mexico. I wanted something flattering yet simple and also cool for the summer heat. This outfit ROCKED! I am very glad I went a size up only because I have thicker thighs than most girls, so I cannot usually wear rompers. This one fit perfect! I almost decided to purchase it, and I still may!
Wore this for a bachelorette brunch. Very comfortable. Would of liked it a little tighter but still fit well.
Love love love! The most perfect white romper! The fit was on point and it was comfortable. Was long enough too as I am 6ft. I definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Loved the back of the romper
links_Review_Text: Great for a white party. Fit is flattering and comfortable
Absolutely loved this romper. It's not form fitting below the waist so it's actually quite comfortable to dance around in! The back is a nice touch. Pairs well with gold jewelry! Loved it!
One of my favorite RtR pieces yer.

I LOVED this romper. It's super easy to wear. It's the first comfortable romper as usually they are hard to wear by I'm so tall. I'm 5'10" and it was perfect! Love the open back. You could dress it up with sandals and fun earrings or keep it casual. The only small annoying issue is when you sit down, the lining from the shorts is easy to see.
I had my shower at a beer bar, so I didn't want to dress too frilly. This piece is dignified, practical, and dressed up with heels or down with a jean jacket.
I like this a lot for a Saturday day outfit. I really needed the 6 to feel comfortable so I wore something else.

This fit absolutely perfectly. I am curvy and have hard time pulling off rompers but this was adorable. Will rent again for cruise. I was unable to wear bra, but thick material with lining hid everything that needed to be
Wore to a polo match in Mexico and then sightseeing. I liked it but will say I didn’t think it photographed quite as well, seemed less flattering when I saw it in photos.
Great fit, true to size. I'm busty and there's definitely cleavage but it felt like the appropriate amount for a night out. Also easy on/off for a romper (i.e. restrooms and such)
Loved this romper for my bachelorette ! I usually wear size 2-4 I'm 128 lbs 5"4'.
Perfect choice for an outdoor couples shower!
Perfect romper for my bachelorette party night out. Tall girls: it WORKS. You can wear a strapless bra without it being seen. So flattering. Sized up from a 10 to a 12.
Loved the romper fabric and design but it was a little big for a size 4.
Material is thick so perfect not to show anything. Loved the way it fit and received so many compliments! Great for a fun night out!
Hard to wear normal bra doto crossing back

I wore this one of our nights out on my bachelorette weekend in Austin and it totally fit the bill - cute style, white was bright, pockets! - however, the cons: bra is impossible to wear and this was a little loose in the top so the girls were a bit saggy, and the lining is not hemmed to the fabric so when you sit it will peek out at the bottom of the shorts.

I really liked this romper. It was flattering without being uncomfortable. The only down side is that your bra will show in the back. You can kind of get away with it with a nude bra but the wow factor of this romper is the back so it kinda ruins it if your bra is showing. Still really enjoyed wearing it though!

links_Review_Title: Rented this as an option to wear on my Bachelorette Party to the Key West. (trip is coming soon).
links_Review_Text: I didn't actually choose to keep it. Not because the piece wasn't great, but because of how I felt in it. The pictures actually don't look so bad. Yet I was just too self conscious to wear it. With my body shape and the size 8, the way the back is designed a bra can not be worn, and I just didn't feel comfortable. It would have been fine IF the my chest filled out the top a little more. I just wasn't comfortable going braless. It is a shame my booty / thighs are bigger than my chest. I really wish I could have made this 8 work, I really loved the look, and feel of the material and it has POCKETS!!!! that is always a plus in my book. But sadly I didn't feel my best or confident in it so hopefully it works better for someone else.

This fit perfectly- I am very small chested so note to others that there was no extra room in the bodice. I'm 5'8" and the length was perfect, not too short and did not ride up when sitting. I got tons of compliments. Love this romper!
I loved the fit of this romper! It was super comfortable and the back is so cute even though you can't see in my pic.
Cute romper! Would probably fit better on someone a little more lean but it was cute and comfy. Can't wear bra with it so I recommend some sort of pasty / sticky item :)
Overall this romper was okay. It was a little tight on my hourglass shape. It was awesome that I didn't have to wear a bra though! Not many compliments but I was very comfortable all night.
I went out in a casual brewery town for my bachelorette party but wanted to dress up for a big night out. This was perfect- comfy and cute and just dressy enough. Loved it!
Want this outfit

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my sister in law's 40th Birthday Party!!
links_Review_Text: Great Fit & I received several compliments

I read one of the review saying it doesn't wrinkles easy, its why i wanted it for long tour day on vacation , but it was not a case. Also it was loose at the waist on the back & no really way to fix it with pin or fashion tape. I end up not wearing it( do to weather), but wanted to leave reviews anyway, as most of the time - it helps to puck right size or avoid mistakes
Great to wear for my birthday dinner

links_Review_Title: Was a great fit I usually wear 12 but I have huge boobs so 14 wa great since boobs made romper short
links_Review_Text: I wear 34DD needed to tape my boobs since back is open some said you could wear without bra.....I couldn't......no way!!! But was amazing fit and got a tons of compliments!

I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and I LOVED it! I didn't want to send it back! Super comfy, super easy to wear. I'm tall, and i went out on a limb ordering a romper. I typically have trouble with the length of rompers, the seam usually goes up my butt, but this was perfect. I got so many compliments! The only issue was the bra situation, the fabric wasn't snug enough in the bust to go without one, and a strapless bra won't work with the way the back is cut, so I opted for a sticky bra which worked out well.

Even though we had a major flood in New Orleans the day/night of my event, still made it out for a bit and received a ton of compliments. Was so comfortable and felt fabulous! I am a tall gal and this was perfect, even for my age!

This romper is just amazing. Perfect for a summer night! You obviously can't wear a bra because of the back. It felt tight in the hips right when I put it on, but once zipped, it adjusted everywhere and fit great. The fabric doesn't crease from sitting either, which really impressed me.

Rented this for a birthday party at the beach. First time a romper fit me this well! It was a little loose around the chest but was otherwise a great fit. Wore it without a bra but might be doable with a strapless plus some fashion tape to keep the back strap hidden.

This is a great little romper for tall girls. I am 5'8" and wear a size 2, so sometimes things can be short on me. Not an issue with this little piece! It was long enough that I felt totally appropriately dressed. It is super comfortable and really flattering. The back is really cute. I would recommend!
Screams summer fun! Fit is comfortable, the cut out in the back is just sexy enough without being too revealing! I wore this at least three times this summer! Ain't no shame when it looks this good!

I rented this to wear during my bachelorette party weekend. I rented the 6 and the 8. I could have worn the 6 but I have a long torso so the 8 didn't rid up as much. I wore a stick on bra due to the back cutout. Very comfortable. Easy to get on and off. Received a lot of compliments.

Tall girls, this romper is for you! Perfect fit for my 5'11'' frame, it was not too short at all! The material is light but thick enough that I didn't need a bra. The gold zipper is beautiful, and paired nicely with gold earrings and gold clutch. Super easy to wear. I would say it's true to size, I'm between an 8 and a 10, the 10 fit well but I definitely had some room. If your small chested or have slender hips you may want to size down. Very happy with this one, will definitely be renting again.

links_Review_Title: RTR saves the day!! I got married on FB Live and I didn’t have a dress!!
links_Review_Text: Loved the eyelet pattern and the fit, but too revealing in the chest so I wore a tank underneath.

I loved this rental! I am 6ft 1in tall, and felt like the length was a perfect midi on me. So comfy and has pockets. It's a bit low cut, but worked for me. I do have a large bust (32D). Such a fun dress to wear!

links_Review_Title: Stood Out At an All White Event
links_Review_Text: Wore to Diner en Blanc event and managed to stand out at an event filled with thousands dressed in white. Received tons of compliments, felt beautiful. Caution if you are larger cup size. I'm a full B / small C and had a couple nipplegate incidents. Make sure to get the nipple covers.

This dress fit like a glove, but it was long on me (I'm 5'2"), and therefore created a silhouette I wasn't crazy about, so I ended up wearing a different dress for my rehearsal dinner. Wish it came in a petite length!

This was so perfect for a hot July bridal shower outside. So many compliments and the best part were the hidden pockets, perfect for lipgloss! Would highly recommend this to anyone looking for the perfect white dress. Fits true to size.

I ordered this dress in an 8 (which is my usual size) and a 6 just in case. I wore the 8 and it was perfect. The six was a little too tight up top..I don't have a big chest but I have a wide back and the tightness made it too close of a call showing a nipple. The 8 fit percent I'm a 36B. The best part was that it has pockets too!

links_Review_Title: The dress was made from great material. It fit well and had a deep v but was still flattering.
links_Review_Text: The bottom half is definitely see through but it still looked nice. The V was not too much and because the material was awesome there was no worry about movement or slippage.

I love the fit of the dress. Only con is that I feel like there could possibly be some slippage. I definitely recommend fashion tape if you're able to use some! Other than that I got nothing but compliments and definitely would rent this dress again!

This dress was really pretty in a preppy sweet kinda way...but the plunge in the front is extreme. I found myself kinda pulling at it all night to try to cover up a little. If you like having cleavage out, then this might be your dress but Im not talking about a little...I found it to be a bit much. So much so, that every single person in our group mentioned it to me. I did like the dress but I don't think I would rent it again. Im 5ft3in, 145lbs, size C and wore a size 6. It fit like a glove
Great fit, true to size. Has some weight so it hangs well. Deep plunge bra worked great. Lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: so cute but VERY LOW CUT.
links_Review_Text: Ordered for my bridal shower, too low cut so I used something to hold the bottom together so my boobs didn't fall out. Other than that, this dress is adorable. Pairs perfectly with a fun shoe.
Loved it! Not as poofy as it appears on the model which is what i was hoping for. Very comfy

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for our engagement pictures. Loved it!
links_Review_Text: I chose a size 8 since most of the reviews mentioned it ran large. I’m glad I went a size down. I typically wear a size 10 due to my broad shoulders. My chest is smaller so I really could have squeezed into a 6 for a tighter fit. The dress makes your hips and butt look wide but it also accentuates the waist which evens it out :-) Loved the dress, but definitely size down. If you have a small chest, you might need to go down another size.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to DEBLA 2018. Felt elegant, yet edgy. I’m shy, but felt still felt comfy with the plunge.
links_Review_Text: I’m shy, but wanted to try something a little out of my comfort zone, so I went for this deep neckline. This dress is very comfy, and it has pockets!!! I’m 5’4”, so the lace outer skirt of the dress was just above my ankles. But, the mini underneath keeps the dress feeling and looking kinda sexy and airy. I used, and recommend the gaffers tape trick to create a custom stick-on bra: https://bratag.com/boob-tape/ When done with actual gaffer’s tape (a flexible fabric tape with a gentle adhesive), it feels comfortable and doesn’t hurt when removed. I’m a 32D. The tape stayed on all night, and I felt secure. I also used a little double-sided dress tape. Wasn’t needed, but I felt more secure with it. I’d actually buy this dress (if it came in colors...and was less $$$ 😄). This, to my surprise, has been my fave rental so far 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

This is very low cut, perfect for petite women. It has a slip underneath, so if you have bigger hips it will start riding up a little bit. That being said, this is a stunning dress. The lace is a bit heavy, so I wouldn't recommend for a very hot day. I wore it to my daughter's birthday party and was complemented all day. Very happy with my rental.
Very deep cut but wore corset under that went well with dress. It is off white

links_Review_Title: Wore this for one of my bridal showers and I received so many compliments. It was perfect!
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size! I am 5’11” and it ran all the way to my calves. It was so comfortable and I didn’t have to wear a bra with it (which is always a perk). It even had pockets which were a fun surprise!

Rented this for a bridal shower. It was perfect and i think it ran a little big because I am normally a 2 but the 0 fit perfectly. I wore a bra underneath with a similar lace pattern since the neck line was a very deep V. Loved this dress and pockets were a pleasant surprise!

Lots of compliments of this unique dress. Wore it for my bridal shower. Had to go bra-less but never felt like a nip slip was going to happen. Heavier material so a little warm. But loved how it felt. Definitely low cut but classy.

links_Review_Title: I used this dress for my dressy engagement shoot look.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit great and provided some cleavage for women with a smaller chest. It was comfortable, flattering and classy. I would definitely recommend it!

I wore this for our family photos. It was so beautiful. It is low cut but is long enough that it wasn't too much. I do think it runs a bit small, especially around the ribs. Although I with it being to tight there was no worrying about any wardrobe malfunctions. Would highly recommend.
This dress was so comfortable and the neckline was to die for! It was perfect for my courthouse wedding ceremony! Would love to have this dress in my closet for future use.
I wore this to my bridal shower and got so many compliments. I was super comfortable and the fabric is thick enough so it's very flattering.

This dress was so perfect for my bridal shower in May. The fit is great and although the bust is cut very low, it wasn't as revealing as I thought it would be. I wore a size 4 and it did not feel tight at all. I wore sticky boobs and lots of fashion tape which helped to keep me tucked in and secure! Super gorgeous dress and I received many compliments.
Loved this dress! Very pretty, for tons of compliments. I wish it was a little shorter on me but I'm pretty short. It fell a little lower than half way down my calf.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for a casual date with my husband,he love it
links_Review_Text: I loved the deep v-neck and the fit was perfect

links_Review_Title: Perfect white dress for a bit of glam!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a photo shoot with my sorority sisters in Mexico and it was exactly the look I was going for. If I had purchased it, I probably would have had the top taken in a bit (I don't have much to fill it with!) but overall the fit was perfect. Got lots of compliments.
Millions of compliments. Fit perfect, I have a small chest and didn't have to wear a bra. You could wear a sticky bra or low one though.

This dress is awesome! Stretchy where it needs to be, comfortable, glamorous and very feminine. I got a TON of compliments on this dress. It's a bit more "girly" than I typically lean towards but accessories play it up or down. The skirt underneath is mid-thigh, definitely sexy if you're paying attention but the big, lace skirt is heavy so you don't feel exposed. The top had room for my ladies if they were any bigger but I didn't have to worry about double sided tape or pasties. Perfect coverage. Big fan!!

links_Review_Title: This dress was uuuuhhhmazing! Loved it.
links_Review_Text: Great dress. Fit very well and was comfortable. I'm a 36A and the size six held my boobs in well. However, when I sat down my boobs showed more than I would want. I have long hair so it wasn't too big a deal because I could cover it. Just have a girlfriend keep an eye out to make sure your nips aren't showing when you sit down. Overall I would recommend this dress! I wore it for my bachelorette party!

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments. Very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I am a size 6, always. But I was a four in this dress. Little worried about the length when I go smaller but it worked out fine.

I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner and have never gotten so many compliments! I felt beautiful and feminine all night. It fit well, though I have a smaller bust so I was never concerned about having a slip. The bottom half of the dress does not stretch, so if you happen to be fuller on your lower half make sure to order a size up for your backup! I would 100% rent this again.

I wore this dress to my bridal shower and absolutely loved it. It fit like a glove, was comfortable and I received tons of compliments. I am 5'9", a 34C/D and the overall cut was perfect (might be a bit big in the chest area for anyone with a smaller bust). Would definitely recommend this dress!
Never loved a dress more... felt so beautiful in this flattering dress for new years eve. Definitely very tight (im a size 4 and this was a size 2)... stay true to size ladies!

Rented this for my bachelorette party! Took advice of other reviewers and sized down-- normally a 10-12, did a 10 which fit comfortably and probably could have even handled an 8. It was an awesome party dress! Quite low cut-- I had previously considered renting it for my rehearsal but I think it's got a much more "party" vibe.

links_Review_Title: So much fun for my Bachelorette trip!
links_Review_Text: It was great but I could only wear it on this all girl trip because of how low the V is.
OMG RENT THIS DRESS. Did not want to return it.

Love loved this dress! The deep V is really pretty and the lace is a nice thick material. Be aware the inner layer does flare at the hips which isnt great for those who already have hips that dont lie! I wore this to wineries during my bachelorette and received endless compliments!

My sister and I were bridesmaids in my Moms wedding . My sister wore a 2 and I wore a 4. I bougtt lace babdeus as this dress cut is very low and we felt for a day wedding best to cover up. We got loads of compliments and love the pockets. I have a self portrait dress similiar vibe that i love too. Recommend this dress!
Great for someone in the busty side. Nice formal dress yet sexy.

This dress fit perfectly. It's such great quality. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding and I felt like a princess! I'm 5'10" and wore the long. With 2.5 inch heels it was a good length - I wouldn't have wanted it any shorter. I highly recommend this dress!

This was literally the perfect dress for New Year's Eve while on vacation in Aruba. Tons of compliments on the night of and also on the photos later! It runs on the long side (I'm fairly tall and originally rented the 0L but swapped for the 0R... even then wore with wedges not flats).

Really pretty color and grommet detailing. Normally things fit me true to size but this was huge. I would size down one and if you typically add extra length - might want to reconsider. I normally need the extra length but it was so long even with 5" heels. (Which I never wear). Also note that it's pretty heavy! Lots of fabric so if you get hot easily - might want to choose something else
I rented this for a wedding in Hawaii. It was beautiful and flown and perfect with the beach breeze. It was pretty long on my so had to wear heels.
Ordered it just to try and ended up loving it more than I expected. Fit great and was comfortable to wear for 12 hours and lots of dancing

links_Review_Title: This dress was incredibly fun to wear. I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Dress was great, but it is quite long. I'm a little shorty (5'2") so I did need to wear very high heels in this one.

This dress was gorgeous! I rented a 16 and 14 and ended up wearing the 16. Unfortunately the zipper does not move up the seam very well so we had to apply some Vaseline to get the zipper to zip past the thick seam on the back of the dress (along where the belt-like design is). I received many compliments throughout the night. The dress is very flowy and was almost too large in the bust, but it was fine. Toward the end of the night (and after lots of food and drink), the mid section felt a bit snug...not a lot of "give" in that area. Overall great dress for a late summer wedding!
Beautiful fabric. It's a very pretty dress but the cut makes large busts look larger. I think it will look better on women with smaller busts.

links_Review_Title: LOVED this! Most beautiful fabric! So flowy!
links_Review_Text: I got this for a formal rehearsal dinner at a destination wedding in Maine. It was gorgeous! If you have a very small chest I can see how the top may have lots of extra fabric. It was a little loose for me but was fine and I'm a 32D. It got perfect except the length. I had to wear 4 inch heels and it was still too long by 1/2 inch in the front. The back seemed ok somehow though. I would so wear this again! (And hem it) I wanted to dance but couldn't with the big heels and extra length.

This dress was amazing! Received tons of complements. So comfy and flowy, added bonus was that there was no need for a bra or spanx. I had no issues with the length that previous reviews complained about, wore 3" heels and it was totally fine.

To liven things up at work I rented this awesome ballgown. Pros: fully lined, but still lightweight enough for summer 2) gorgeous construction with the grommets 3) felt like a princess :) Cons: 1) was t as fitted as I hoped....I am small, but muscular and it was large around my rib cage and chest 2) fabric is floral but not really that attractive and much more suited to a May event. At 5'5" this was a perfect height with 4 inch heels. Not my fav rental but definitely earned me some compliments
The fit was perfect
A little large around the bust, which almost never happens for me. Too long, but I knew that when I rented it. Gorgeous material, great dress for a formal summer wedding!

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit from waist to length- beautiful fabric!
