links_Review_Text: I loved everything about this dress! The fit was perfect in the waist and length. The skirt is very full and is a great spinning dress for all of the little girls inside of us! Beautiful fabric and construction. I got tons of compliments on it and just had so much fun wearing it!
Stunning dress!
I am heavy chested, so I got a size bigger. I should have just stuck to my size lol. Lovely dress flows well. Received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments and felt so pretty.
links_Review_Text: I'm about 5'9" and wore wedge sandals and the fit was perfect. I loved the details of the straps and waist - the flow of the skirt was so elegant. The floral pattern was gorgeous!

links_Review_Title: This dress is way too long to wear and drags even in heals. Didn't wear as afraid to harm it
links_Review_Text: It is actually a little too big around the waist , I got the regular size and this dress is almost a foot too long to wear without dragging it and ruining it. I will be sending it back promptly.

links_Review_Title: I loved wearing this dress! I felt aaah-mazing.
links_Review_Text: Please plan to use heels, ladies- there is luxuriously lengthy fabric that can trail. You are swimming in beautiful fabric that goes on and on. Such a romantic piece.

I may just not be into this dress because I got the wrong size. I'm between a 6 and an 8 and I'd have been better off with the 6. For whatever reason, the Long came and that was a bad move. At 5'4" only stilts would have made me y'all enough for this dress. i had to gather the fabric several times to get it off the floor. My husband looked beautiful in it though!!
At 5'11", the 10L was the perfect fit and length. I loved the dress and received a lot of compliments. Dress runs true to size. The straps were a bit long, but not a problem for me.

I rented this dress for a summer wedding in Porto, Portugal. This was the perfect dress for the wedding . The overall fit was good but the R length was still quite long. I am 5'4". But I received a lot of compliments .

links_Review_Title: Torso a bit long for my body
links_Review_Text: This dress would have worked for me had the torso been a bit shorter. It hit too low under my armpits, thus at a not so flattering spot on my waist. It needed to be pulled up slightly, but I wasn't about to take to pinning the straps in the back. It also made my bust look larger than it is, which I wasn't a big fan of.

Don't even know where to start w/ this one! So many compliments and such beautiful fabric/pattern! Fit a wee bit tight in the ribs but this is normal for me in structured dresses- the waist down being nice and flowy helped. Beyond that it was super comfortable and easy to wear. The length was perfect w/ 3" heels (I'm 5'11" so that's rare even w/ extra length). And the bust was doable w/ DD's and a sticky bra. The feel of the material and the way it flowed was gorgeous- highly recommend!

I wore this to a Bridal Shower in South Dakota. I'm in a weird spot between a size 6 and 8. If I get this dress again, I'll go for the 6. The top portion was a little too loose. That being said, I added a Chambray shirt to make the outfit a little more casual and it was perfect! Love the fabric. Love the color.

I loved this dress. I had struggled finding the perfect wedding guest dress, and this particular dress is the reason I signed up for RTR Unlimited! It was so popular that once it became available I knew I needed to hang on to it to ensure I'd have it for the wedding. Yes, it's long. I'm 5'6", wore 4" inch heels and I was still stepping on this dress from time to time. But overall I didn't mind because I loved the way I felt in it and received compliments all night. I paired it with the Kate Spade Warm Gold Mini Sam Bag.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Incredibly beautiful! Ran a bit small, but I always have to go up one size with Badgley Mischka. I'm usually a 14, but the 16 fit perfectly. At 5'8 the length was perfect with flats, and probably would have been fine with heels as well. I was able to go braless (36D). So comfortable and photographs beautifully. I don't think I've ever gotten as many compliments on a dress as I did with this one. The grommets are amazing and give it a bit of an "edge". In a sea of black and red gowns, this one stood out. I would absolutely rent this again!

Beautiful dress that had gorgeous fabric and moved nicely. It fit perfect in the waist, but a little large in the bust. The zipper was difficult, and the dress had no give, so I'd recommend going a size up if you're between an 18 and 20.
Got nothing but compliments all night long. I felt comfortable and beautiful. I'm 5'7" and wore 3" wedges and it was the perfect length.

links_Review_Title: This was an outdoor engagement party at a vineyard.
links_Review_Text: I am tall and definitely on the curvy side. This dress hit in all the right places and was SO easy to wear. I wore flats that had a 1 inch heel. It flowed beautifully and I got a ton of compliments. The waste was a SMIDGE snug but I preferred it to the 12R which was a little big in the bust. I didn't feel uncomfortable at all. Would definitely recommend this dress.

Loved this dress! Beautiful, flowy and well made with unique grommet detailing and vibrant colors. Perfect for an outdoor wedding. It is a little long (I am 5'3), but the length worked fine with 5.5 inch heels.

Loved this dress! Got a ton of compliments. Very comfortable and easy. Wore it to a black tie wedding. I am 5'11" and the 8R was doable. I would have loved the extra length of the 8L, had it been in stock.
This dress was perfect for a spring wedding. Super comfortable, room to eat and move and tons of compliments. The dress is long - I am 5'8", wore 4" hills and the dress swept the floor.

links_Review_Title: First time renting the runway and it worked great!
links_Review_Text: I needed a dress for a formal work event that would camouflage the remaining postpartum flub. This dress was breathable even after dinner and I could wear a regular strapless bra as a bonus! It does run long as mentioned in other reviews but with three inch heels it did not drag.

links_Review_Title: This was a formal wedding for a good friend of mine.
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful. For reference, I'm 5'7" and I'm a 42DD. I can wear a dress from a 16 to a 20 depending on the fit. I also prefer my dresses to be flowing and off my stomach. This dress hit the floor on me and I did have to gather it to walk, but I think if I had worn heels, it would have been too far off the ground. It fit beautifully in the waist/stomach area though. It was actually a bit too large in the chest for me. I was afraid to order a 16 since there is not 16W and I was afraid the dress would not zip since I have a broad back. It was very big in the arms, though. I had to use fabric tape to get keep the arms from having huge gaps, so I wound up taking the sides of the dress and the front of the dress to my bra in order to keep it somewhat in place. It worked for what I needed. That said, the dress was GORGEOUS and I got so many compliments on it. This was my first RTR rental and I will definitely be renting again!

Everything is wonderful about this dress! I felt so pretty and received so many compliments. Someone even asked if I was a brand ambassador because this dress sells rent the runway! Runs true to size, I worn a regular strapless bra and it didn't show, very comfortable and very full skirt. Love, love, love!

The 14R was a little big but not so much so that it didn't look great. It is very long! I wore 4"heels and it was at the floor. I loved this dress tho! Perfect for a spring wedding! I got sooooooo many compliments...from strangers and family. Lots of fabric but it moved gorgeously. Highly recommend. Very comfortable too...wore for 13hrs no chafing just the challenge of having to take my shoes off and hold the dress up but I'd do it again :-)

links_Review_Title: I am six months pregnant and this dress fit perfectly and looked great.
links_Review_Text: A spring wedding at the beach + a six month pregnant girl = perfect! I loved this dress.
I'm long legged at 5'9 it's very long as a regular perfect fit the material is amazing great for large chest
This dress has great movement and such a romantic feel. It's also very comfortable and would be great for an all day events.

links_Review_Title: I love the color od this top!
links_Review_Text: This was a beautiful, elegant top for a photo shoot. Not the most comfortable material, but definitely bearable. I wore a tan stick-on bra.

links_Review_Title: Nice blouse for a Christmas party
links_Review_Text: I rented a 2 and 4. The 2 (my usual size) fit well in the bodice but the peplum hit at an unflattering height and added a lot of volume to my middle. The size 4 was a bit big in the bodice but the added length of going up a size really allowed the peplum to lay how it should and was much more flattering. The color can look red or fushia-ish depending on lighting. I did wear a sticky Nu Bra as the back is open and a traditional bra would show. Not the most flattering rental for my body type.
Great lace work. Beautiful detailing. Loved wearing this.
Loved this top so much I ended up buying it after renting it twice!

links_Review_Title: Very cute but didn't end up wearing
links_Review_Text: Really liked this top but it was a little too risqué for me. It's sheer in many spots and has a key hole side. Also difficult to get on and off. But so pretty

links_Review_Title: Great color helped me stand out!
links_Review_Text: Unique top, extra flair! Can be dressed up or down. Definitely size up. I'm a 36DD. Very temperamental zipper and hook & eye in the back, I needed help with both. I got a ton of compliments , very sliming. As others send this is not red, it is more magenta. It's classy but sexy. Wore his to a school function but could easily work in Vegas too!
Fit perfect-so many compliments! I loved the material and the design. The red was stunning.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Wine Tasting with the Girls!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful shirt! I love this designer because everything I have rented has fit like a glove. This shirt is backless and I didn't have to where a bra. Beware it will show your midriff, so if you are wanting something a little sexy ...go for it. But I wouldn't wear it to church. Neck is a little itchy and pulled a bit like a halter. Because the weight of my breasts. That's why only 4 stars.
Wore for a date. Actually, for two first dates. And it definitely was a hit. I had to wear a bra underneath and thankfully had a red one that worked nicely.

links_Review_Title: A showstopper, undoubtedly! Get a size up if you're busty.
links_Review_Text: No stretch. Perfect for my short trunk length.

Beautiful scarlet red sexy blouse. Sheer at the chest. I kept feeling like I needed to pull it down. Side zipper and hooks make it easy to get on and off. Very comfortable loose fit in underarm. Bra shoes in the back. Nude liner under lace. I loved this for Valentine's Day. I needed help with hooks.
I rented this for my casual birthday party & it was perfect! The color was vibrant, fit excellent, and added just enough flare to my ripped jeans and leopard heels.
Got lots of compliments on this top. Fit well. Might run ever so slightly large.

It's a lighter red than it appears in the picture, it's not as dark or scarlet red but still a pretty shade. I have a small chest so the nude underlay was not filled out taught so it was slightly wrinkled under the lace but it was negligible. Side zip is a little fickle. Overall a Super cute top and really flattering.

I rented this for a friend's annual 10th Night Party, and wore it with high-waisted wide leg pants. It is definitely MAGENTA not red, which was fine. I normally wear a 4 on top, which was the size I rented, but it wrinkled a little in some strange places (bust, shoulder blades) which made me think a 2 might have fit better. Pros: lovely lace, gorgeous, statement-y sleeves, flattering on an hourglass. Cons: odd fit, wished it had been a bit less pink.

links_Review_Title: Very flattering fit. Beautiful color & fabric
links_Review_Text: It has no give on the waist so, be sure to get the correct size. The closures on the side need to be re-secured but overall, this top is a beauty!

I wore this to a Christmas party and was happy with it. There are a lot of clasps (side and back) as stated before, but they didn't give me any issues. I wore a nude tank top under it. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Dressy and a bit sexy, but not too much
links_Review_Text: I'm usually between a 4-8 and was nervous it'd be too tight, but a 6 was near perfect. I could have probably gone with a 4, but putting it on/off would've been hard. The peplum bottom is sheer, so note that you can see the end of the black slacks and where your belly begins. Because it's a lot of embroidery, it's not too slinky.

When I first got the shirt I thought it was hideous. Anything I paired it with didn't work. I was mortified. Plus one of the buttons were broken and the zipper was hard to zip. I decided to pair the shirt with black jeans and pink shoes and it looked perfect. I didn't wear it to an occasion I wore it to a photo shoot. Chances are I won't rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Love the style and red lace!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous top! It ran a little large so the fit was slightly off but wore it anyway. My rental was missing a couple of hooks for side closure so I had to use a safety pin but it was not noticeable.

links_Review_Title: Total statement piece. Wore this for a social media interview. Perfect!
links_Review_Text: Love the material, the color and the lace. I'm a 36D and the shirt was a bit snug in that area. Waist was also very small. Also, item isn't for someone with a long torso. Anyhow, loved wearing it for a short time!

I really liked this top. it was more of a deep red instead of a hot red. It is very pretty and dressy. I usually wear 8- 10 but I got the 12 which worked in length but had a little spare room in the chest. A 10 would have been too fitted and too short, but that's for just for big busted women really. I would definitely buy a top like this if it wasn't so expensive. Very nice piece.

links_Review_Title: If you're looking for a top to make you feel special - this is it!
links_Review_Text: I wore this top out to dinner in NYC around the Holidays and I felt so beautiful in it. I would definitely rent it again!
Very pretty top. Im 133 and 5'1" and size 4 zippered up but it was so tight. I went with the size 6 which looked great. Wore to a holiday party and got a few compliments. It has a such nice detail!
This top was beautiful! It was structured around the waist with no stretch & so flowy everywhere else! It was elegant & beautiful and I am in love! I can't wait to rent again!

What a beautiful piece!! The construction and fabric is of the highest quality, and is trendy without being over the top. It is multifunctional and can be dressed up for a night on the town or dressed down for a day of shopping with friends. Fits true to size and while there are some peekaboo spots, you can wear a strapless bra with no problem.

Got so many compliments on this top and loved it but bumped it down to 4 stars because it does not match the product description or model photos. It has a side zipper with hook and eye closures down the side and on the neck as opposed to the model picture with the exposed zip up the back which I would have preferred. The hook and eye closures both kept coming undone all night (very irritating) and catching on the lace when they were undone. I was unhappy that it was different than advertised. Fit true to size. I'm anywhere between a 4-8 depending on the brand and was worried about the lace not stretching so ordered a 6 and 8 and wore the 6. Definitely needed a padded bra to fill out the cup area so the lace sat right.
I wore this to a night football game and it was perfect. I will say the color is more pink than red but that didn't matter too much. The lace detailing is beautiful.
I loved this blouse! I wore it out to dinner and drinks on vacation and it was comfortable and pretty. True to size. A little see-through in spots but I was able to wear a regular nude bra.
Wish I had take a picture. This was gorgeous!!! I almost sized up based on the reviews but I'm glad I didn't. Definitely renting this again!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous - hides problem areas and accentuates curves
links_Review_Text: This was perfect for a night out. Received lots of compliments. It hides any part of your upper body you are self-conscious about as well!
This top is a great shape - very flattering. There is no stretch, so pick your size.

links_Review_Title: I did not choose this top for my event.
links_Review_Text: The fabric was itchy and uncomfortable. It was very snug through the waist.
I loved this top so much but I have a large bust that was not able to squeeze into my normal size 10. I would think if you are a bra size D or smaller this would fit and would be absolutely stunning.
It's a very nice top. A little snug, but good quality.
I couldn't fit this over my body. It looked pretty but not true to size.
The top looks more formal when on but loved the lace
It's beautiful but the side zipper is annoying and the little clasps make it feel like the slightly wrong move could make it pop open.
Wore for a dinner date with dark wash denim and yellow pumps. Great start-of-spring piece. Marchesa tends to run a bit big, so size down if you are in between.
It was snug to slip on and it didn't fit. The snaps on the side would not close.
Great fitting top ! Got a lot of compliments, really easy to dress up or down for a night out. The fabric is a little thick, it's ideal for fall.

I was so obsessed with this shirt that I bought it. Great paired with white pants for summer and regular jeans or black pants for into fall. Others mentioned it being right around the arms but I have bigger arms and felt fine. In fact I think it slimmed me out! I have a larger chest though and they definitely squashed me a bit but I liked how it looked
The L fit me perfectly, I loved the top and the fit. Very cute for a friend's bday dinner out.
Super cute and comfy. The sleeves actually stayed where they should. Loved it for a weekend get together.

links_Review_Title: Something Different for a Business Casual Dinner in the Desert
links_Review_Text: I selected this off-the-shoulder top to wear to a conference in Palm Desert. The dinner attire was business casual and I wanted to have some fun. RTR sent this to me at our resort. Shipping was smooth and it was professionally packed and handled. This top arrived wrinkle-free and ready to wear! The top is tight. The color, length, and style were exactly what I was looking for.

links_Review_Title: A little tight in the arms
links_Review_Text: Loved this top!! Wore it out on super bowl Sunday. Got so many compliments! It didn't look tight at all but it was definitely hugging my arms very tightly. No trouble at all staying in place though because of that

links_Review_Title: Wore this to brunch with a friend!
links_Review_Text: Loved it! I was worried the arms would be too tight but they were just fine! The top was a little uncomfortable to wear for a long period of time, but I got a ton of compliments :)
Great brunch/hanging out about town shirt. My friend Kim wore it and I wore it and the fabric was flexible enough to fit both a size small and size medium typical person.

Wore this top with black bell bottoms to a Taylor Swift concert. The fabric is tight and doesn't move off the yabbos much. So even you big busted ladies, you can do it! I also didn't wear a bra. The fabric did rub on my nips a bit but not enough to cause an issue. Rent it! It's fun!

Really thick poplin kind of material so it doesn't really flow but it's still really pretty. I couldn't find pants to match and felt like black jeans were too matchy. It'd look good with light was jeans, I just don't have any. The smocking is tight so you don't need a bra if you don't want one, but it made me look totally flat, like a sports bra would.

links_Review_Title: Flattering top perfect for a concert
links_Review_Text: Was worried the off the shoulder trend was played out but I think the bells sleeves grace this top a more contemporary feeling. Loved it so much I rented in the lighter color but found this version to be a little stiffer and smaller - could have easily sized up to a M on this one but overall comfortable and flattering that the S worked

I loveeeee this top. The sleeves are SOOOO fun and I got soooo many compliments!!! So flirty!!! Not the mooost functional for eating dinner but fashion comes first. I thought it was going to be more elastic at the top but I was wrong and it is definitely more stiff. If you have a bigger chest like me I would size up so you would be more comfortable!
Wore this for a night out. The sleeves run a little tight, but I still enjoyed the rental.

links_Review_Title: Perfect Top for a Summer Night Out in the City!
links_Review_Text: Shirt is so comfortable and very forgiving as I had a baby 10 months ago. Many off the shoulder tops I find myself pulling down. This one stayed put all night. Wore this to a dance performance in NY and a dinner party after.

Dramatic bell sleeves make an of-the-moment statement on this off-the-shoulder Petersyn top printed in classic stripes. My typical size falls around an XS-S but have reading reviews recommending to size up, I rented a M. The bust area is incredibly stretchy - I personally loved not having to wear a bra with this top. This piece is perfect for date nights, vacation, and night out.

I couldn't wait to take this top off when I tried it on. Elastic part way too constricting around arms/chest. So uncomfortable. Would suit someone with a smaller rib cage than me. Would look good with slim black pants.

Loved this top..: It's fun and comfortable..: Was a bit worried that the sleeves would be tight since I have muscular arms but just enough stretch for them... The elastic gathering in front kept the girls perky so I didn't need a bra! Will definitely rent again!
It fit perfect and was very flattering on the chest. No bra needed. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Love this top so easy to wear
links_Review_Text: Easy to wear squishes your boobs a little bit but i didnt Mind

links_Review_Title: Super easy to throw on for vacation!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. The bust fits nice and snug so you do not need to wear a bra with it. The sleeves are a perfect length. I probably could have worn a small or a medium but thr medium fit me perfectly. Looked super cute with ripped jeans ans flatform shoes!

Loved this blouse. Stays in place and looks great on. Did not have to wear a bra at all. Short blouse. I did not give 5 stars because after I wore it several hours it was so tight on my skin and left large indentations on my side.

I got a lot of compliments on this top. The downside was that it was hard to wear with a strapless bra. But that might've also been because of the size of the top because it was too tight on my chest area. I can't remember if I wore a small or xtra small.

I loved this top. I wore it to work with a black t-shirt underneath to make it more work appropriate and then took it off to an event I had in the evening. Got so many compliments and got asked where I bought it several times. Even my boss complimented!
LOVED this top. the top ruched part was a surprisingly flattering fit and the bell sleeves were super fun.

This top is so cute and so fun! Typically, when I think of this style, I think of Spring/Summer, but the colors in this top make it perfect for Fall. You can wear it with a strapless bra and it's obviously very stretchy! The Large would be my size of choice, but I felt like the chest part should have been a bit bigger for it to fit right.

links_Review_Title: I looked very cute going out this weekend
links_Review_Text: The top of the shirt is stretchy but very tight fit in a good way, very cute would wear again!

I loved this top but if you big boobs , the elastic part rides up over your boobs. You have to constantly pull it down. I tried to pin it to my bra. Love the look. Maybe a bigger size would have helped. Not sure
super cute sleeves, a true dark blue and black top. but runs v small on the busy area.
i really liked this but i do think it runs a tad small. i am usually between small and medium but sized up bc i dont like things super tight at this was tight on my arms
runs small and lower cut than i thought

I had tried this on some months ago at a RTR store and loved it. When I finally rented it in the same size I guess my boobs had grown? Because I barely contained them in this top and they were smooshed flat by the elastic detail. I ended up returning without wearing.
Super cute shirt but it was a little tight on the chest and arms. I would size up next time.
Loved how this fit. Tight with thick material so I didn't need a bra

links_Review_Title: This shirt was too tight to wear, despite already ordering a size up.
links_Review_Text: Don't go for this top. It's very uncomfortable on the chest and you can't lift your arms up in it.
Wore this with jeans on vacation. Small busts might find this riding up. Need height for the best look, so wear a heel. ;)

links_Review_Title: The top knows how to smooze
links_Review_Text: This top wowed my boyfriend, the waiter, and even a random passerby. Made with genuinely good material and thoughtful design- I was over the top impressed. It was elegant and kind (after dessert too!).
The upper arms were a bit tight, so I couldn't wear this for more than a few hours. The rest of the fit was nice. Even with the flow of the waist and sleeve it was flattering.

links_Review_Title: Perfect top for a nice weekend dinner
links_Review_Text: I am obsessed with this top. It is tight in the chest and arms but I happened to love that - it kind of had a spanx effect in those areas making the top super flattering. I got a ton of compliments. I wore it during my brother's wedding weekend for a more casual dinner so it was effortless but memorable. Highly recommend! Will rent in another color soon :)
A little restrictive on the arms but other than that, a great fit
x

links_Review_Title: The perfect summer floral for the Hamptons!
links_Review_Text: This dress is super versatile-- pair it with nude heels for date night or barefoot for a walk on the beach. The fabric keeps you cool and ventilated without the slightest signs of sweat marks. This is definitely one of my fav RTR finds!

Loved that the waist had stretch and the chest area stayed in place no matter how I moved! I normally have problems in the chest area with these types of necklines because of A cups. Only con is I had to wear a bottom slip because you could see through in the daylight. Dress would of look better in heels but I was wear testing these shoes. And forgot to change them for this pic.

I loved this dress so much that I wore it to work and then took it on vacation with me for a cocktail networking event. I received compliment after compliment - it was true to size, very flattering, and the gauzy material was great for warm weather. Will rent again.
Comfy dress. Fit true to size, except wristbands were oddly tight. Lightweight, flowy material makes it an easy Spring/Summer wear.

Rented this for a derby themed event in mid fall. Great dress for the occasion but ran a little small. The check was a little tight and I am not big busted. The arm bands are tight as well which is nice to keep the sleeves in place but can be a little uncomfortable.
This dress was beautiful, however it was not made for women with a large chest.

I probably could have survived the fit for one night but found it a little tight in the shoulders (when lifting my arms) and in the scrunchy part around my ribs. Pretty dress otherwise if the coloring is right for you.
The dress needed a slip which I didn't have.
Material was thick but stretchy and very forgiving. The shirt had a thin built in bra layer which was great for girls with a larger bust. The color was also so beautiful - I was tempted to buy it!
Fun, high quality top! I'm usually a medium but this large fit perfect.

I rented this for every day work events and thought it was super cute. It's not short if you have a longer torso which is nice and it soft and stretchy fabric. I never wear ruffles or anything too feminine so this was a nice segway piece for me.
So many compliments on the color. Looks super cute tucked into high waisted though not sure I would like the fit untucked.
This top is so comfortable and easy to wear. The color are fit are great. It is a stretchy fabric so there is a bit of give. I'm glad I went with a small and not XS

I usually wear a size small in fitted tops but the small wasn't available so I got a medium. This ended up fitting perfectly! I absolutely love this top! The color is gorgeous and so on trend for spring/summer. The ruffle around the arm and the top was not overwhelming but instead it was a nice detail. Wore it with white jeans and got lots of compliments. I will definitely rent again!
I wish my hair wasn't blocking the neckline. I loved it. Was able to wear it with a bandeau bra as it had double lining. Ran true to size. I normally wear a 12 in RTR and went with the XL.

This top is very comfortable. the material is thick, but breathable and very stretchy. It is a little tight, but I think it's just the type of material... I don't know that sizing up would have made a big difference.

links_Review_Title: Cute, spring top with soft material
links_Review_Text: I loved the feminine ruffle along the edge and the baby blue color. The material is soft and stretchy and went well with jeans. Definitely recommend for a date night, girl's night out or baby shower.

links_Review_Title: Cute fit, but not my style
links_Review_Text: The shirt was cute and it fit well; however, it wasn't my style and it didn't work well with my wardrobe. I plan to return without wearing it.
This top is great! I would consider buying it. Paired it with white cropped pants for a vacation dinner. My husband never comments on what I wear but he did comment on this top!

The material is amazing on this top. very good quality. Loved that I was able to dress it up and dress it down for more than one occasion. Super cute, gorgeous color. would definitely recommend and rent again!
Love the fit and color!!! Amazing material!
This shirt is comfortable and has a lining at the top which means some might be able to go braless. I just felt like there was nothing too special about it.
Great fit. Thick fabric. Super flattering. Runs true to size

links_Review_Title: Loved this very comfortable and cute fit great
links_Review_Text: Fit was great
Very tight fitting. I bought it for work but felt uncomfortable wearing it without a jacket over it. It's very pretty but "nothing special". Beautiful blue color.

Fit is pretty tight. You can wear a full strapless bra without it showing which is nice. The color is beautiful- not too bright but not a muted baby blue either. And the ruffles aren't too big. I loved it, and I'm not a ruffles person.
Love it so much. The ruffle, the fit and the thickness of the fabric. All around awesome!
I loved the silky soft feel of this top. I wore it twice - once out to dinner and once to a party. Super cute top in cute spring color.
So comfortable and cute - fits perfectly
Fun for the spring!
Loved the pockets. Top is def low cut and I don't 100 percent trust the tiny hooks across the breast. I'm pretty flat but would not be good for a bustier sister.
I rented this for my bridal shower, and it worked great! I am usually a 2 or 4, but have a small busy and had to size down to 0 since it was a bit large on top. Very flowy around hips. Overall great!

This dress runs large, I would size down. This dress is also quite a casual material so don't think it would be fancy enough for a wedding. It's perfect for a daytime event like a shower. PS the bag is RTR too!

links_Review_Title: wish I could keep it forever!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my bridal shower and it was perfect. I received so many compliments and felt so comfortable in it. The only issue was that the top was a little large so I had to do some strategic safety pinning.

Wore this to a vineyard for a birthday party and it was definitely an eye-grabber. The cotton is heavier than I expected, but in a good way. My only complaint is that for larger chests, the low cut and stiffer fabric can be restrictive, and the interior clips to close up the low cut are still too low. Definitely get your safety pins out if you've got a larger chest and don't want your bra to be public. Also, tip: tie the sash at the side, not the back! Helps with the fit and with keeping the tie/bow in place.

This dress is fully lined and heavy cotton which unexpectedly makes this a CHOICE pick for hot summer parties. I was outside in 95+ degrees for 3 hours and you couldn't see sweat at all. Very deep V neck, and the snaps at the chest didn't stay shut for me.
I didn't expect quite so much fabric, but it was a cute dress that's true to size. It was low cut for work, so paired with a cami and jacket. Would have been perfect for an outside summer event.
I did not wear this dress after trying it on. Very low cut and strangely tight and puckering from under the bust to the waist.

Fits to size, not too low cut. Hips seemed a tad wide, so it made me look a little curvier than I am, but overall very lovely! If you are 5'4" or shorter you will need heels or the back will drag on the floor. Also tripped on stairs once with tye back!
I really liked this dress but ultimately didn't wear it as it was too low for an office party
Loved the fit. There are two hidden hooks to make sure the deep v wrap doesn't open.

I really liked this dress. It was a little low but luckily had a couple hook and eye closures nEar the chest that helped tremendously. At first I overlooked these and thought the dress was unwearable. I loved the heavy yet breathable cotton! Well made dress
I LOVED this dress. I ended up not getting a picture in it and it's a shame. It fits great, is super comfortable and a forgiving cut.
Just rented for fun. Got a lot of compliments but it was bigger in the bust

Really comfortable dress. I probably could have used a Size 8 but felt it was better to size up to be safe. The pattern was really pretty and it flowed nicely. It was a little more casual than I anticipated with a cotton type of fabric but could be dressed up with jewelry, shoes, or accessories.

Wore this on vacation and a destination wedding. So comfortable, could easily dress up or down. Def need double sided tape or a lace bra to wear underneath. Also, a friend I was traveling with lost her luggage, and was able to borrow this dress at 6 months pregnant (and looked fab)!!
I wore this to a baby shower and it was perfect. Flattering and comfortable. It was low cut so I wore a cami underneath.
The top is a little roomy, and it's a bit low cut. But, I'll wear anything with pockets, and it's a very flattering style.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! It was so comfortable and beautiful colors. It was very flattering!
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable and I received lots of compliments at work.

This dress is stinking cute on. It has pockets and great floral and lace details. There are tiny hooks in the front to keep it closed, but they are difficult to hook. It runs extremely large, particularly in the bust. I had to wear a cami under it, and the shoulders did fall a bit. I wear a 6 in most items, and the 4 was big. The 2 probably would have been the winner. Having said that, I took this dress on a cruise, and it also worked as a swim suit cover up. It is truly versatile and highly recommended.

I got this for a trip to Maine for a wedding. It was going to be a casual outfit for daytime. I could pair it with a jean jacket if it was cool and where flat sandals. Thought it would be cute. Unfortunately I couldn't take it. The top is sooooo big! There is so much extra fabric and it was like 3 inches needed to come off the straps. It was low cut and just kind of opened at the chest. Not flattering up top. The rest was super cute and I wanted it to fit so badly.
It was a little low even with the hooks, so I pinned it up a little. There was a lot of fabric, so you couldn’t tell. I received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for summer rehearsal brunch
links_Review_Text: Great color and a fit. A little low cut.

links_Review_Title: Love the dress but busty girls beware!
links_Review_Text: Dress is so beautiful and flowy! You could definitely size down with this dress, HOWEVER, if you have anything larger than a C cup, you may want to make sure you are wearing a cami underneath or have an extra pin handy. Top of dress buttons with two...teeny...tiny...clasps. It was comical how many times it went POP! (But side note - would make an AMAZING dress for a mama who's breast feeding)
So cute. SO many compliments. The top is a little big though. My bra kept showing.
The straps were a little too long for me, but the rest of the fit was great.
Definitely need a cami underneath.
Love, love, love this dress!!! And it had pockets! Perfection
too fitted, neckline too deep for a work dress

links_Review_Title: Loved everything about this dress. Lightweight, comfortable, perfect cut. And pockets too!
links_Review_Text: low-cut but perfect for my 34D chest (I do prefer showing cleavage). I guess you can use the hook & eye if you want to.
It was a little tight in the bodice but overall a nice fit!

Definitely order at least one size smaller than your usual—the bodice is really loose! Gorgeous fabric, lines, everything! Will be reordering in a different size, and expect that it will be just perfect.
Beautiful dress, easy fit, perfect for vacation

links_Review_Title: Too large and long to wear
links_Review_Text: Nice color just large and long

i'm typically a 2/4 and the 2 fit well w a little room to spare. it was very open on top so i had to wear a cami under. a smaller size may have helped , but a white cami didn't take away from the overall look as long as you pull the back down so it the back V doesnt show any of the cami. hit half an inch above the floor for me so i was able to wear flats, but this looks cuter w heeled espadrilles. fabric is very casual, looks wrinkled, worn, almost vintage. good for picnics and other casual events. very comfy, love the pockets.

I didn't wear it, but the back of the dress gapped at the top and no matter how much I wrapped and tightened it, it would still gap. It would have been too small if I sized down.. it's just an odd fit.
Sized up and it was still Narrow up top

links_Review_Title: This dress was too short, which was a bummer. The style and quality was good.
links_Review_Text: Short.

Could not have been a more perfect dress. Classy, simple. Easy to dress up. My boyfriend said he could not take his eyes off me. It felt as if the dress was perfectly tailored to fit me. would have purchased if I could afford it!
I had a 1920s gatsby party and loved this dress for it! Luckily, I ordered this fur to go over it because my top half had a hard time fitting. Other than that this dress is gorgeous!

I loved the mermaid flip sequins on this dress. It is form fitting without being too tight! I feel like it hides all of my belly flab. I'm not wearing any shape wear in the photo. I'm planning to wear this dress with a fur cap to a "roaring 20s" ball next month.

links_Review_Title: Perfect New Years Eve dress. So many compliments.
links_Review_Text: I am short, 5'2", so it would probably look better on someone a little taller due to the length but the fit was amazing and I loved it anyway.

Got soo many compliments on this dress! It was perfect for NYE. It was flattering and comfortable enough to dance in. Great quality and was not scratchy at all because the inside is a silky material. Rent this dress!!

links_Review_Title: Christmas card/ New Year's Eve potential
links_Review_Text: I didn't end up wearing this, but I loved it. I'm very curvy and it hugged every curve perfectly!

The dress fit amazing. I received so many compliments and I felt like a million bucks. I will say that I couldn't wear a bra comfortably so be cognizant if you have a larger chest. It fit very well and I totally would purchase this for my closet.

links_Review_Title: Not flattering for hourglass of large bust.
links_Review_Text: The dress is heavy and good quality however it's not flattering for hourglass shape.
I wore this dress to a gala and received compliments all night. It fit perfectly and was very flattering. I felt like a movie star!
runs true to size. no bra or stickies needed. very flattering!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and show stopping! Compliments at every turn!
links_Review_Text: I listened to the previous reviews and got a size smaller for my back up size and it fit perfect. I'm typically a 6R but the 4R made sure the bust wasn't too loose and it fit the rest of my body comfortably. I have a long torso so the strap length was perfect. I wore this to a gala I didn't want to wear a full length gown but still wanted to be elegant and it was perfect! I received so many compliments. I would highly recommend renting this dress!

Dress was not skin tight which was perfect for dancing - really beautiful dress. Constant compliments too. The top was a little too loose, but was mostly fine. No stretch, but true to size. #roomforboobs #roomforbooty
Fitted well and was comfortable to wear

Absolutely loved this rental! Not my first and definitely not my last. The sequence was so flattering on my hips and hid my pooch well. The bottom is so fun with the swing and mermaid look. Wore with nude heels. Back is super low so I didn't wear a bra, but I rarely do with dresses. I will say that the straps were a bit big and not adjustable but it wasn't anything I couldn't handle. If your hair is down you can tie the straps together in the back with a string to give you more support. I received so many compliments and loved the look of this dress.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous sequin dress for a Valentines Date
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress! I wore to a Valentines Dinner and felt great and comfy all night. I found it to run pretty big and absolutely could have sized down but it worked fine for a nice dinner. The length could easily become to long for a shorter person, but I loved it. Would definitely rent again. Check out all of my rentals on my YouTube Channel. I also talk about RTR tips and tricks. Channel Name: Pointe Boutique
I chose this dress to wear to a 1920's themed wedding and absolutely loved the fit and received compliments all night long. Highly recommend this dress!
Pretty dress but too lose on top. 34B does not fill out a size 6! Straps a little long too. Otherwise great dress.
Awesome dress! Loved the color and fit…just wish the neck line was a little higher

links_Review_Title: Cut well. Didn't love the material.
links_Review_Text: Great overall fit to the dress. Unfortunately the sequins felt a bit cheap for the event I was planning to wear it to.

I rented this for a gold themed party. Fits so well. Sequins weren't scratchy. Swishes at the bottom and makes this fun sound when you dance! Fits very well. I'm a true 4 and for great. Little bigger in the busy area than my busy size but still worked.

links_Review_Title: Wore for a disco themed party and loved how sparkly it was!
links_Review_Text: True to size but no stretch so keep that in mind if you want room to dance. I'm 34 / 5'5 / 133lbs / 34D / Curvy

links_Review_Title: Fabulous shimmer! Hangs well. Lots of compliments :)
links_Review_Text: I had to jimmy-rig the straps as they were too long for my shorter torso.
Wow wow wow. Felt like a movie star in this. I normally wear a size 6, but had to wear a size 2 in this dress. Definitely size down!

links_Review_Title: Beautifully made rose gold sequin dress
links_Review_Text: I'm usually between a 2 and a 4 and the 2 fit well. Saloni makes very high quality clothes and this was no exception. It's low cut but not inappropriate. It hugs your curves in all the right ways. However i felt like it showed off my tummy area too much. The sequins are great quality and the mermaid bottom was a nice touch - otherwise it would be difficult walking in such a body skimming dress. I received many compliments from men and women at the gala I wore it to.
Loved! Low cut, a little big at the top.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments and my red carpet photos came out phenomenally.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove, easy to walk in

A def statement dress! I was traveling and forgot my spanx lol & my stick on backless bra didn't fit so I went without. It still was amazing!!!!!! I felt so confident and happy and carefree! There's no stretch to the dress!

I rented this for the international "Night to Shine" prom for individuals with disabilities. I was in awe at just how sparkly and beautiful it was when it arrived (the pictures don't even begin to do it justice). I will say, as someone with a petite frame it wasn't as tight and tapered in the legs as I would've expected. However, it fit great through my torso and hips (straps were a little lose, but manageable). All in all, I danced the night away and received numerous compliments on my dress!

links_Review_Title: All the sparkles to compete with the NYE fireworks!!!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a fancy NYE party and felt glamorous and sexy! People kept stopping me to tell me how much they loved the dress. Comfortable except a little scratchy under the arms after wearing all night but I expected that with sequins. The dress has weight to it with all the sequins but still felt good. Loved wearing this dress!

Where can I buy this dress?! It was absolutely amazing. It runs small, so size down from what you usually wear for the backup. I am usually a 6 and wore the 4. I didn't wear a bra, but was able to wear spanks without them showing in the back. I would definitely rent this dress again if I didn't take so many pictures in it :). Rent!

I took my Christmas card photos in this dress and have never received more compliments!! If it wasn't $800 it would be a permanent fixture in my closet. I found it to fit really true to size! The one downside is the top is very low making it hard to wear with a bra. The dress was a gray length as I'm 6'. The quality is also amazing and the sequins are heavy.

I rented this party frock with my unlimited subscription. I wanted something dazzling and festive for a holiday house party and this dress sparkles the most! Pros: beautiful cut, hung perfectly, not too heavy Cons: dress ran a bit large IMO- I've been fitting 10s about 99% of the time and this was big in the boobs and straps, with a generous cut at the hips/waist. Styled as shown with a vintage Gucci clutch!

This dress is gorgeous! The bottom of the dress flows beautifully when you walk giving you a divine mermaid look! I received so many compliments when I wore it to a Thanksgiving soirée!! I'm usually a size 6 in most dresses, but went with a 4R in this and it fit great! Bust area is roomier than rest of the dress btw, so I'd recommend sizing down if you are not busty. Hope this helps! Rent rent rent!

links_Review_Title: For when you want to be classy and extra
links_Review_Text: Wore this for my dad's #gatsby birthday party. I usually wear size 12 but the 10 fit great. Got a lot of compliments.
A little costume-y, but fun for the right occasion! It fits exactly as expected. Size down for back up - it was a little big.

Runs large, I usually wear a 12 and the 10 fit perfect. Thick material and I didn't need to wear a bra. The sequins were so fun! They are the type that flip when you run your fingers over them. So many compliments. I will def rent this again for a formal occasion.

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I rented it for a "gold inspired" theme party and it was a hit! This was actually my backup dress that was sent to me after the one that I rented did not work. The dress fits true to size and the sequins are really gorgeous in person! It's definitely a sexy chic classic vibe. I was concerned about the top of the dress as I am very busty (38DDD) but I was able to wear a strapless bra and it worked! Highly recommend, pictures online don't do it justice.
Very sexy cut. I loved wearing this. It was pretty snug with very little give in the fabric but it's gorgeous on.
It was a tiny bit tight around the rib cage but otherwise comfortable to be at a 4 hour, formal seated event.

links_Review_Title: GORGEOUS! A little snug with no give.
links_Review_Text: I LOVE THIS DRESS. I wore it to a black tie gala and received SO many compliments. It is VERY form fitting with NO give— I’m a power lifter, so the dimensions were a little off, but overall SUPER great! I’m also a 36DD and had no room for a bra and had a couple close calls with a wardrobe malfunction, but it was overall a great dress!
Flattering. Fabric skimmed over my weight gain.
Mesh-type material that hugs your curves. Great fit. Not what I was expecting.
My favorite aspect was how comfortable it was. Also, very trendy. Love that it pairs well with boots +
Great dress! I felt sexy and comfortable at the same time! Wore size small, 120 pounds, 34C, 5'3".
Flattering and easy to wear. The material is very thin and informal. I will rent again in the summer or fall. I'm 5'4" 117lbs. 32 DD.

Definitely one of my go-to brands. I've rented several Fuzzi dresses and I've been beyond happy every time. I got a ton of compliments, the fabric is amazing, the design is adorable. Follow me on IG for more reviews - dolceand_banana
One of my favorites
Wore this for a corporate meeting and got a lot of compliments! It hugged everything in all the right ways and was long enough to be work appropriate.
Fits true to size but plenty of stretch. Looked great. Fabric was light and wrinkle free

links_Review_Title: Effortless chic dress for every occasion
links_Review_Text: Great for work, vacation, date night. Light weight, doesn't wrinkle. Super flattering for curvy ladies.
I love this dress. It fits true to size and is fantastic. The only reason for 4 stars is that I prefer the other pattern with the larger flowers. I typically wear a size 10 and the large is perfect.

This is definitely form fitting but very stretchy so not too tight. Excellent for us ladies with a larger chest. SO comfortable and very lightweight. Even with the high neck it was not the least bit hot. Very classy and flattering. Love the midi length. Got tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Standout, comfortable dress for Speaking gig
links_Review_Text: I had the pleasure of speaking at a conference and wore this dress with a long black jacket and heels. It is really flattering, comfortable and looks put together. I was able to take-off the jacket for the cocktail evening portion and just add some new accessories. Excellent dress and I am considering keeping it.
Love the give this dress has. Makes me feel curvy, without feeling too exposed. One of my favorites so far.

links_Review_Title: Not very flattering on athletic shape
links_Review_Text: I was so excited for this but was super disappointed. It has great reviews from others but not for me. The print is very pretty and the matri is soft, mesh-jersey like. However, there was no shape at all and looked weird in my body. Did not wear it and was an immediate send back
Fuzzi is a very forgiving fabric and cut - a go to for ease of wear and a no brained for fitting. This one wasn't special enough to get me compliments, but I liked it nonetheless.
I accidently ordered the wrong size, I wear a size medium which is why the dress was loose but I still loved it. I love the print, the material and love the way it hugs the curves of the body.
This dress was fine. It was surprisingly thin, and just a straight column. It didn't do anything for my figure.
Perfect for a night you've got a date or an event after work. Fit well and very comfortable.

This was my backup dress and ended up not choosing it for the event only because it wasn't quite formal enough. I ended up wearing it the next morning for brunch though because I didn't want to send it back without wearing! Super comfortable but still flattering and sexy. Perfect for the winter months as you can throw on thick tights and layer a cardigan/sweater.

The last 2 dresses I have ordered have been from Fuzzi. So comfortable and even better is soooo flattering! I love the way the shoulders are cut and then it's a very modest length, but the waist the way it bunches up is the best because this is my body part I like to hide. Highly recommend the dress, and even though it is thin, at least it has layers, so you don't need to worry about it being see through.

links_Review_Title: That dress that you can just throw on without even having to think about it.
links_Review_Text: I love having a dress that I don't need to well, dress. Having to hurry out of the house in the morning and spend time styling an outfit is my worst time suck. This dress fit well, hugged the right places, and didn't require any extra thought. It's 30 degrees this morning so I made the executive decision to cover my arms and legs. Easy peasy!

links_Review_Title: Nice dress, maybe for different occasion
links_Review_Text: It fits nice and feels nice. If you are larger girl like I am, this dress could easily be worn without spandex due to double layer fabric. Just was not the look I was going for for the occasion - I ordered few dresses to wear for the Florida wedding and ended up wearing different dress.
I ended up wearing this dress with a long black sweater. It's form fitting but very comfortable.

I love the cut and material of this dress. It was so slinky while not being too tight/form fitting for work. I saw there are other patterns that I'd love to rent next . Paired it with a grey cardigan and tights for cold weather and couldn't see the band of the tights.
This dress is so comfortable, the colors are beautiful and the fit is great. You can wear it with a jacket or dress it up for a night out.
This dress was so nice. The fit was awesome and sexy, but wasn’t able to wear. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Rented for a work party. Comfortable and elegant.
links_Review_Text: Flattering without being revealing. Wouldn't mind owning this one.
Wear seamless underwear! Otherwise you'll definitely have VPL. This is a SNUG fit, but it's super flattering. Loved the neckline and the sophisticated print.
Wore this dress to two parties - it was very flattering. The double layer does help it smooth out any lumps, and it was super comfortable.
Very sexy, I wore it with a blazer to work. The hem rides up, though. I had on tights and spanx but a half slip or bare legs might eliminate this issue. If you are standing still you look amazing!
Very comfortable and very sexy!

links_Review_Title: Meh...very thin mesh-like material. Not right for a business setting.
links_Review_Text: I didn't wear or even try on. It did not look like quality material or suited for a business setting. It would have been cute for s summer outdoor event.

One of the most comfortable dresses ever! I wore this to work with a charcoal grey cardigan sweater and black boots. So cute and easy to wear! I would have kept it, but it didn't look new enough for the price they wanted for it. Otherwise I would have kept!
I did not wear this - didn't realize that it was basically a full elastic sleeve and so very form-fitting. It fit, just huggier than I was expecting.
Liked this but never got around to wearing it. Too body hugging for everyday where and ended up being not so appropriate for the occasion I had in mind when I rented it.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a fall wedding
links_Review_Text: The dress was comfortable, light and very flattering - which surprised me given the material. The mock neck is high enough that it did not need a necklace, put I paired it with a simple pendant, studs, and some bracelets. If you have a bigger chest like I do, I would recommend sizing up (I normally wear a L, but went with the XL backup).
Good.

links_Review_Title: Dress is beautiful, stretchy and made me feel great!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress, super simple but definitely leaves an impression
Super flattering, sexy, stretchy and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Lot's of Compliments at Art Basal
links_Review_Text: This dress was great! Only issue is that my bra kept showing from the side. This dress worked great to transition from art show to dinner to late night party. It worked for al three and I was comfortable all day!

This dress is a KNOCKOUT!!! So comfortable, so sexy and something totally different. The print and material (sweater-ish with stretch) made me feel so gorgeous and sexy. The bottom ruffle made it flirty and hip. I paired with a jean jacket and SLAYED at our party. I ordered a large (6', 170lbs) and would get a medium next time. *The dress stretches out as the night goes by. Recommend sizing down. Will rent again!
Great fit. Just zip it up and you'll look amazing. I got lots of compliments and my husband loved the look. Fun!

links_Review_Title: It's flattering and special, but I'm not feeling it
links_Review_Text: Did not fall in love with this one - it was actually in my closet for a month and I didn't feel like wearing it anywhere. It is really pretty, flattering and easy to wear, I just didn't feel the connection ;)
Dress quality amazing. Colors amazing. Not as tight or scandalous looking as other Herve Leger dresses but super comfortable. I'm 5'3"/34B/120lbs and SMALL was the perfect fit.
Love the gorgeous print and heavy material. Amazing quality. The dress is made to fit snug. It hugged a little too much for my comfort at work, but definitely perfect for a date night!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable with a pop of color.
links_Review_Text: I am a size 12 and the large fit just fine. This dress zips in the back and has a lot of stretch and will hug your curves.

Had fun out on the town in this fitted frock! Wore an adhesive bra and paired it with both heels and boots for a more casual gathering. The tummy is tight so every bit shows. Felt bold, bright, and sexy!!

links_Review_Title: Heavy material but easy to wear
links_Review_Text: I selected this dress because RTW did not have my original dress in the back up size. I ended up wearing the other dress to the wedding, but wore this to dinner the next night. It was cute and comfortable and would recommend for less formal affair. It's heavy, so better to wear at night or in a cooler environment. I didn't find the back especially low as some other reviewers mentioned.
Fit like a glove and the colors where perfect for Mexico. Paired with cute scrappy black heels and fringe black earrings. You can't go wrong with this dress!

I rented this dress for my sister to wear to a wedding through my unlimited and it was absolutely breathtaking. We are Liberians and it was a traditional wedding so this dress fit the entire it look like an African print. The fit was great the only concern with the fit was because my sister is a lot shorter than me she could've used an extra small instead of the small other than that she was complemented all night long and looked beautiful.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, comfortable, and stylish but thicker fabric.
links_Review_Text: IIf you do not have flat tummy, the dress is not forgiving but is a beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: It was a great dress. I got tons of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Very fitted. Loved it! It was super comfortable!

I was so impressed with this dress that I wanted to buy it from RTR. If only the price was more affordable for a used dress. Nonetheless, it's an absolutely gorgeous dress. Material is heavy and fitted. You will be complimented non-stop! Perfect for a date, spring wedding or any occasion you feel confident to rock it at. Rent it!
Dress is a show stopper! Fabric is a thick material that hides flaws nicely even though the dress is very fitted. Very pleased!

links_Review_Title: Very unique dress. Emphasizes any tummy bulge.
links_Review_Text: Paired it with a jacket for a winter party. Color really pops.

I loved everything about this dress. It held everything in, but it was also super comfortable to wear. I usually wear an 8, sometimes a 6, and the M fit perfectly. The fabric is stretchy and forgiving.

links_Review_Title: Amazing! But gotta have the Bod to Rock it!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress and always wanted to try one of these dresses. I personally looked terrible in the dress as I don't have enough curves to pull this off but my best friend wore it and looked fabulous. What a fun dress!

This dress looks best on someone without any tummy at all. It is quite snug though also very comfortable. I wore it with a long black jacket and boots. It's too low cut in back and generally snug to really be a good work choice without a sweater or jacket.
Didn't fit

links_Review_Title: This is the absolute cutest dress. I got so many compliments on it. I mean to die for cute
links_Review_Text: No cons

links_Review_Title: very, very snug, sure doesn't look like a 1700 dress
links_Review_Text: could not wear for my event. I ordered an xs, 100 lbs, 5 2"

links_Review_Title: It was comfortable but not flattering to me, with my larger than desired belly.
links_Review_Text: Fit fine but showed my larger-than-desired belly.
The fit was great - felt a bit weird on the butt but fit fine! Great piece - got many compliments. Heavy material. Zips in the back - have to suck in a bit to tightly zip.
I couldn't wear it as it was much too small. I wish I'd known to size up based on the reviews. Also, the fabric was not as vibrant as shown in the pictures.

Dress has a lot of stretch and is nice "smoothing" material. Drop waist shows off your figure. Very comfortable to wear and the colors look great in photos. Party dress that can dress up or down, but definitely not for day or work.
The most comfortable Herve Leger dress I have tried. The texture is unique and it fits great.
Too tight across the bust ........
Love the pattern. Super comfortable. Can dress it up or down.
Was smaller than I was comfortable with. Didn't wear.

I rented this dress for a wedding and ultimately didn't wear it. The dress is much tighter than I'm used to and I just didn't feel comfortable wearing it. The colors are gorgeous and the fabric and construction is a great quality. While the dress was very fitted, the thicker material gave it a more upscale sexy feel.
Good for any age. Hugs curves. Great fabric.

links_Review_Title: Should've got a small but I love it. Perfect fit
links_Review_Text: Great summertime dress to wear at night at the club or to brunch during the day. Too bad I ordered too big
Really pretty colors. Looked great on my tan skin. Was very flattering and sucks everything in
I didn't like the drop waist in me

This was the first Herve Lerger dress I rented. I liked how it was colorful and not really similar to all the others. Unfortunately, it was true to brand and ran incredibly small. It was so tight I couldn't wear it. I do love the print still so I might consider sizing up to see if that is any more flattering.
Too small.

The photo doesn't do a great job of showing, but this dress is body-con tight throughout the body and has a flip at the lower hip/butt. It is definitely not a dress that hides imperfections in the torso. I didn't end up wearing it because it was too revealing for the occasion.
This dress is tight! But it does offer a little stretch. So much fun to wear, would order again.

Rented for a party, but found it was actually quite casual, and fit was long enough to wear to work. I wore it with tights and ankle booties to work with a lab coat over it. Super cute. I have worn numerous HL dresses, this one feels like a work dress.
Wore to dinner, to lunch, to weekend events. Loved it! Cute and well made. Very versatile
I wore this for a baby shower and it was so gorgeous. I felt so flirty and it was very comfortable. I sized up one size and it was perfect.

Not formal enough for a formal event but not informal enough for everyday. I tried to dress it down with a jean jacket- which was successful, but it was wayyy too hot to keep it on. But it didnt look casual enough for a day out without it on. Also the fit was not great. It was very snug when zipping it but the waistline was unflattering. My only redeeming quality is my flat stomach and the material was very baggy in that area and looked bad.

links_Review_Title: Rented this for my bachelorette in Mexico
links_Review_Text: Loved loved loved! So fun to wear!
I like the details and quality of this dress. Size 6 fit like a glove and I usually wear a size 4. The top was still a little large and I'm fuller chested.
If you have a bit of a tummy, it will show and the color is not forgiving. But it's lovely, comfy and great detail!
Such a fun dress, great colors
Fit well, very flattering. Perfect for summer weekends away. Not a flexible material so size up if in doubt.

Loved this dress! Only thing is it's hard to zip over the detail in the middle. I typically wear a 4 but have a wide back. The straps were a little long for me but had a ton of compliments and loved the look of this dress!

Cute dress, fairly tight around my rib cage though looser around the waist, so had a little give which was nice. Cute details, soft color. Straps a tiny bit long but with a Demi bra it worked (not a normal bra).

Loved the dress, but didn't go quite as planned. I'm right on the cusp of a 6/8 so based on the reviews which said to size down I ordered a 6. This would have worked out fine except when the dress was on that pretty lace around the waist is very thick and challenging to get the zipper past. The material and lace were so beautiful in person, the photos don't quite do it justice! I will rent this again, just in a size 8! For reference I'm a 29 in jeans and a 36c bust, there was actually a little room on the boob area since I went braless.

Super high quality! saw a couple of reviews that said it was small in the chest so I sized up. I ran into issues with the straps falling off my shoulders. It fit really well in the rib/waist area and the length was perfect. Super cute over all and still worked with sizing up!

links_Review_Title: Odd fabric scrunching but still very pretty.
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a Mother's Day brunch and did receive many compliments. It does bunch up around the stomach or back so I found myself fixing it time to time. It wasn't enough of an issue that would stop me from wearing it as it's a very pretty and unique dress. I would just be mindful of it. I'm 5'4 and with heels it was not too short.

This was a great fit and fabric. I do not have a hug chest and I wouldn't recommend if you do. There was no room in the chest area and was cut low. It was a really great fit and the fabric fell nicely all over. I will definitely rent again.
A little long in the body for me but was definitely a nice choice

This dress runs a tad small in the ribs, but more generous in the hips. I sized up to a 6 and it was perfect. I wore a strapless bra. It does show cleavage if you have much up top. I didn't mind bc it was a fun day to night wedding and I wore a jacket for the first part of the event. It looks very nice and was the perfect length.
I felt like this was made for me. The material is amazing and the dress is very high quality. I got a ton of compliments and felt amazing in it!
Color is beautiful. Great for a spring event!

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but very low cut
links_Review_Text: I was going to wear this for a daytime affair but decided against it because of the very low cut neck line. I thought I could wear a bra or stick one but it was very low that I didn't feel comfortable. Other people have loved this but didn't feel this was appropriate for my age. My daughter then tried it on and it was also too low cut for her. It's a really beautiful dress you just need RH right body type.

links_Review_Title: Too tight in back for me
links_Review_Text: This dress is super cute, but the 8 was too hard to zip up in back for me. If I hadn't rented at end of summer, likely would have tried the 10.

While I didn't up wearing, I plan to rent again in a size up! I debated between rating it runs small and true to size since I can be in between sizes. But since the material has no give I went with runs small. It ended being tight in a few spots. The first being the chest, it wasn't tight on my rib cage, it just squeezed my boobs in causing the buttons to pull at the openings. Then it is also fitted through the waist and given the material, it shows the shape of your lower abdomen. If in between sizes I definitely suggest going with your bigger size.
Very modern cut and style. I loved the bright yellow accent along the hem. This dress fits like a dream and is exactly as pictured. It's the perfect combination of sexy and modern. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Was tight in the wrong areas
links_Review_Text: I felt like this accentuated my lower stomach and was not flattering. Also could not zip this all the me way up. Beautiful color though and good material. May try going a size up and renting again.
It was slightly loose at the top but not bad. It was really form fitting at the hips and waist. I don't suggest eating a big meal at dinner bc it will show!

links_Review_Title: Package was wet so i could not wear dress
links_Review_Text: Really pretty just could not wear
Wore this for a dinner with my girlfriends. So flattering, great colors.

This one is "sophisticated/sexy." It appears a little conservative in the pics, but it looks and feels sexy on. The material is a bit heavier than expected, without much stretch, but runs true to size so all good. Its short (I'm 5'6"), but all around very nice. Would definitely rent again/recommend to a friend.

I was very disappointed when I tried on this dress and realized it wasn't for me. It's a beautiful color and quality but didn't compliment my figure at all. I have a small Torso so I think that played into it. Size up!
This dress was very tight through the hips. Also much more formal then it looks in the pictures.

links_Review_Title: Great fit with cute frills, feminine touch!
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a size 6, but had to size up in this dress and it was still a little snug. I loved the fit and it was very flattering. I believe someone with a bigger chest might have issues, as the chest area is a little tight. I love the way the frills at the bottom of the dress sit, and the material of the dress is of great quality.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but fun very small. Light weight dress.
links_Review_Text: Runs small.
This dress runs true to size so don't order up. Everyone in the reviews says it runs small so I ordered a 4 instead of my normal 2 and its was huge.

links_Review_Title: Great fit. Perfect for Summer Graduation event
links_Review_Text: Great fit, flare but not too much of a flair. Great scoop neck and color

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, not for small bust
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove and looked beautiful on. I'm small chested and the chest area was a combo of long straps / just too big on me so I couldn't make it work. Beautiful think fabric and details though!

I loved this dress and it came close to looking great on me. The chest area was just too small - I have a large chest (38ddd) and they just didn't fit. I think I could have worn a 14, but they don't make that size

links_Review_Title: The dress fit perfect and was a pretty color.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit great and was the perfect length.

links_Review_Title: Didn'thave the chance to wear it- too small!
links_Review_Text: Great fit, but runs small!
Beautiful dress! The blue and yellow were so unique together. A bit short, a bit tight but that's because I'm an athletic size 12 with long legs. I highly recommend for a feminine party look.

I'm 118,5'2, 32D. If I wear any small in the chest, I'd fit in a 4. The shoulders are about 1/2 in too big but I'm okay with it. I'm going to try and order the 4 to see if it fits better, but I'm happy with the 6.

Doesnt fit well. It scrunches between the top two ruffles so I would have to constantly be pulling it down for it to sit right. I have larger hips so maybe someone with a less athletic build will have better luck!

Comfortable fit with no need to accessorize! Received plenty of complements from men and women alike during the event. Had so much fun in the dress that I considered wearing it to breakfast the next morning...

links_Review_Title: Loved it! The color, the coverage and the sequence were just right.
links_Review_Text: Wore this baby to a banquet with friends. Ordered a 10 & 12 - Wore the 10 (pictured). The fit is forgiving and felt comfortable enough with the smaller size. I liked that I could wear a regular bra and zip it up alone. Decided to pair with tights, because it was January and cold outside. I would recommend this dress.
So many compliments on the dress for Mardi Gras Gala. Comfortable and great for dancing the night away!

links_Review_Title: Great sparkly shift dress with trendy sleeves
links_Review_Text: Loved this striped green sparkly dress. Rented to wear during the holidays since it's the perfect festive green. Also wore it to an Eagles tailgate since the colors were perfect!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a night out in Miami!
links_Review_Text: This dress is sexy and fun! At first I thought it looked a little boxy but it's a good length for that shape. The sequins were a little uncomfortable to sit on during dinner but I didn't notice while standing. Overall, it was a perfect date night dress.

links_Review_Title: Dynasty vibes in the most fabulous way
links_Review_Text: Perfect NYE party dress! The emerald green and stripe makes for a unique look, while the sleeves are extremely flattering. Was a tad tight along my hips, but spanx can fix anything! For a curvy girl to get into a sheath - this HAS to be good! Sad to let her go! Another outfit idea: wear with sneakers and a jean jacket!

I needed something super sparkly for New Year's eve and this dress worked out well, except when you sit down it rides up really really short so I had to wear black tights underneath. Otherwise would highly recommend just size up

links_Review_Title: Fun sparkles for the holidays, but is it a dress or a top?
links_Review_Text: This was cute and I wore it twice, but as a tunic rather than a dress. Even with tights. I was worried the control top is art would show. Might work well for a 20 something but for this 46 year old mama with 36DDs it was much more a tunic! I wore with black leggings and y'all boots NYE and with black skinny ankle pants and block heel sandals for NY day brunch. Next time I'll just rent the shirt! :)

Wear your spanx ladies! If you want to look more slender than this is not the dress. However, I'm a sucker for sparkles and I don't mind my chubby-ness. I got a million compliments during the two seperate events I wore it for.

links_Review_Title: Super fun dress! Received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress is stunning! It's comfortable and I love any dress you wear a proper bra with. I was able to move and dance all night and got so many compliments for a casino theme holiday party. It is on the short side. I'm only 5'2" but I have a long torso, so the right s were necessary. Otherwise, great dress!
Loved this dress. It was shorter than I would've liked but other than that it was perfect... comfortable and so cute!

The dress itself was beautiful. I thought it was an emerald green from other pictures but when I received it, it is more blue. The sequins did get caught on everything (hence wearing my hair up) but it was expected with any sequin dress. It is a little bit shorter which is why I wore tights. Overall I loved it. It was pretty comfortable and not itchy whatsoever. The neckline was the only thing that was uncomfortable while sitting. I could've worn the size 6 but it was too baggy.
Dress runs large!

Dress is a looser fit but the fabric is not forgiving. Loved how this dress fit on me considering I was 6 months pregnant. Decided to wear the size 2 and not the 4 because the shoulders fit better in the 2. Had lots of compliments throughout the night about how fun the sequins were!
So many compliments! My daughter and I won best dressed at moms weekend!

links_Review_Title: I absolutely love this dress if I could buy it I would. It made my pictures look amazong!
links_Review_Text: It does run a little small for a 12 but I also have a bigger bum. I still loved it though

links_Review_Title: VA-VA-VOOM! (and I needed something really outrageous)
links_Review_Text: I really liked wearing this and it was very flattering. I was at a really cool fun outrageous party with a really funky Burning Man crowd, and this was a perfect statement, very funky. The fit is what you'd expect from looking at it. Same with the sequins - - it's not the softest, most comfortable fabric, but you can tell that from looking at it!

links_Review_Title: Sparkling it up at the Roller Disco.
links_Review_Text: The PERFECT party dress! Fits like a glove! Quite short skirted, but the sequins give the dress weight and keep everything in place- even when you're falling on your face at the roller rink. My most complimented dress of 2019 by FAR. Only nit-picky cause for complaint is the stripes don't line up perfectly in the side seams. No one noticed, but if I were considering paying retail price for this piece it would definitely make me pause. (Reason number 134,355,768,656 that I love RTR.)

I had to wear a size up due to the length. It was much shorter than anticipated. I am 5'10". If you are willing to show a lot of leg, this is perfect. I received a lot of compliments and it was a great option for a jewel-toned themed event.

Wore this to a gala event. Very impressive. Lots of compliments. It was more comfortable than expected. A little snugger than I like- thought it would have more of a shift dress fit. The black tights and booties helped tone it down a bit. Major complaint is that I had to spend about an hour getting the sequins in order. Many of them were out of line and it was pretty noticeable.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a St. Patrick's Day event and got so many compliments! Loved it and so comfortable!
links_Review_Text: #stpatricksdayparty #sparkly #moviestarfeel #compliments

Excuse the makeup- I wore this for a costume party! At 9 months pregnant, dressing has become difficult. I went up 3 sizes from normal and it was perfect, very slightly stretchy. Some other reviews say it clings to your hair, and that's 100% accurate. Plan on wearing your hair up. Comfy overall and will rent again when I'm not expecting

links_Review_Title: Cute dress in an ultra flattering shape!
links_Review_Text: This straight shape really works for me. When you've got a boxy cut, and wide sleeves, you can wear a little shorter of a skirt and still be appropriate! I got so many compliments, including ones saying I was the best dressed at the party! Sequins are risky sometimes but this was a risk worth taking!
