Fit true to size, I'm a 4-6 typically and the 6 fit well. The sequins were gorgeous but I wore the dress to dinner and was sitting for a couple hours which caused the sequins to dig into my legs! I wish the lining was more protective but it's usually the case with sequins either way. Would rent and wear again just for the wow factor!

I got this for my company party and it was a hit. Comfortable and stylish! The sequins were so much fun and green jewel tones are my jam. I rented a 10 and 12 because reviews said it runs large. I am normally a 12/14, and the 10 was just a bit too small (I could have worn it but was more snug than I would have been comfortable in) -- the 12 was a little loose in the arms but overall I was comfortable in the length and fit. I would do this dress again!!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect cocktail dress to feel comfortable but look phenomenal.
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable and forgiving shape. At first I tried the smaller size and it was tight across my hips, but then I went a size up and it was perfect. Just know that with all the sequins it is a little heavy and warm, so I had no need for a layering piece.

I love the color of this dress. The sequins are super fun and perfect for a holiday party. The dress was JUST LONG ENOUGH (I'm 5'11). I wore it with black tights and felt comfortable all night; I never would have worn it without them though. The chest area was a little snug but the dress worked if I didn't wear a bra with it. Lots of compliments - and I didn't have any trouble with the sequins snagging.

links_Review_Title: So Christmasy, so much sparkle, and yet so elegant. My favorite dress this season
links_Review_Text: Long sleeves kept me warm on a winter day, short enough to be sexy, and a dark emerald sparkle for holiday fun. Very elegant. So fun to wear!

Festive and easy! Paired this with leather pants and boots for a unique holiday look. Honestly I was cold at our Christmas Eve family dinner and this combo did the trick while being surprising comfortable. It does run big in size so if you are heading into a holiday meal...it's perfect!
I wore this for a Christmas party and it was perfect! I ordered the 0 and 2 and ended up wearing the 0 because the 2 was a little too baggy. I would definitely recommend this dress!

Wore this dress to my company holiday party in NYC. Definitely stood out from the crowd and received a lot of compliments! A little short and it rode up on me a bit as I walked so would not have been comfortable wearing without pantyhose. But that is always the case with sheath or boxy dresses and my body type as I am an hourglass with thicker thighs. Would just note that there is no give through that area so definitely had to tug and shimmy a bit when pulling it on :) As noted watch the sequins as they did catch on a few things. These two small reasons are the only reasons I did not give it 5 stars. However, I waited too late to decide to rent a dress for this event so was overall pleased with it given the choices I had left! There was not an 8 available, so nothing to compare. Overall, another RTR success.

links_Review_Title: I got tons of compliments on this dress. Plus, it was super comfy!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for my work's holiday party. It was blingy but not too fancy. I had to size up to get the looser fit as shown on the model but the dress up was very comfortable. The sequins lay in one direction and aren't reversible like with mermaid fabric. Because of this, the dress is a bit delicate and special care is needed when sitting down, especially in cars. Overall, I got a lot of compliments on the dress and I felt fantastic in it so I would highly recommend it!

links_Review_Title: I absolutely loved this dress!! I felt gorgeous and am so happy that I went with this one!!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great! The only cons are that it tends to be a bit short in the back (but I still felt comfortable) and the sequins grabbed my curled hair at times. Overall, I loved this dress and would recommend it to anyone!!!

Overall I would say it fits true to size. I got the 8 and the 10 and since I am curvy, for this style of "straight lined dress" I preferred the larger version to give that more "straight" look. If you're curvy in pretty much all areas, like me, and are questioning the size, definitely go up for a backup. Wore with the slick back Kim Kardashian hairstyle, kate spade rock it cluster studs (also rented), sheer tights, and black open toed ankle strap heels and got so many compliments. Highly suggest!

I rented this dress for my 30th birthday. It was super comfortable but had the perfect amount of glamour. If you enjoy wearing a normal bra and no spanx but still looking fabulous, this is your dress. I wish I had taken better standing pics but if I was on my feet, I was dancing. Can't rave about this dress enough. I allllmost bought it.
Perfect holiday shift dress. True to size. Ordered size 2 & 4. Wore the 4.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress.
links_Review_Text: I typically wear a size 8 and after reading the reviews I knew I should go down a size because of it running larger.

links_Review_Title: Perfect holiday party dress! Received compliments all night and very comfortable to wear.
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size and even though dress wasn't form fitting, did not seem baggy. I had to be a little careful when dancing because of length and choosing not to wear tights. Overall great dress!!

links_Review_Title: It was pretty, and I got lots of compliments on the outfit!
links_Review_Text: I was worried it would be pretty short, and it wasn't (just short enough!). It's not a good choice for anyone who wants something super fitted around the waist and body, the look is sort of boxy.

I'm 5' 10" and just over 200 lbs and the size 14 fit perfect. It was comfortable for dancing and also helped keep me warm in the 30 degree temps. This would be perfect for NYE with some thick tights and booties. At my height, it is a bit short so I had to be careful when sitting down.
Amazing dress great quality too

This dress is amazing! Got tons of compliments and felt like royalty in this dress! I wore it to a wedding in New Orleans. It also travels well in a suitcase which is so convenient. Rent this and you won't regret it!!!!
The details on this dress are beautiful. Size down, runs a tad big.

Tons of compliments with this one. Comfortable and unique, quality fabric. As with a lot of dresses the zipper could get hung up when pulling over the seam, it worried me when I tried in but wound up not being a problem.

links_Review_Title: OKAY THIS DRESS IS PERFECT IN EVERY WAY
links_Review_Text: It fit like a complete glove, made me feel so confident and is super flattering. I've never gotten so many compliments in one night!
Comfortable formal dress. Elegant and has amazing detail. Just a little gloomy and heavy looking for me.

links_Review_Title: The material is really beautiful! Delicate and impeccably sewn.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. Feels like this dress was made for me! Of the pieces I ordered, this was the only one that wasn't a complete disappointment.

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I bought :)
links_Review_Text: A really pretty dress that feels unique and comfy. Is great to wear right now in the winter but I feel like I can wear it for Spring and Fall as well since it's still lighter.
The neck was a little tight and the dress was longer than expected. But I loved and would rent again.

Worn for workday. I'm 5'9" and have never had issues with long dresses, but this one is rather long! If you wear it with a pair of heels you should be good. Considering buying this lovely thing. The arms and décolletage are slightly exposed from the sheer fabric.

links_Review_Title: Made my prairie dress dreams come true
links_Review_Text: Modest but felt more romantic than prim. It doesn't have much stretch but it didn't feel constricting. Really enjoyed wearing.

Love this! Love the high neck and it was pretty comfortable too. I did wear shapewear which wasn't totally necessary, but probably isn't a bad idea for apple-shapes like me--all other body-types could skip entirely. Like other reviewers mentioned, it's a LITTLE restrictive in the shoulders but I can't imagine it being an issue unless you're planning on dancing. It was long on my 5'3" frame but I wore flat boots and was fine- just had to hike it up when using stairs. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Tight in the shoulders, not super breathable
links_Review_Text: Pros: Office-appropriate, got lots of compliments, looked cute at happy hour, easy to layer jewelry on; cut well in the waist and length for my height. Cons: SO TIGHT in the shoulders. By 8pm I was ready to rip it off. Also had to wear stickies/strapless bra! Less than ideal for work. Can't imagine being large-chested and this dress working out. It also didn't breathe well? Like sure I had a stressful day at work but by the end it felt like all my stress-sweat had been trapped in by the dress. Oh ALSO the skirt part has no slit and is a column so I had to hold it up to walk/stride comfortably. Conclusion: Would rent again for like a dinner party in the fall.

I absolutely love this feminine dress by BB Dakora! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips making it super comfortable. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a Nu Bra or strapless bra since the neckline of the dress is sheer. At 4’8”, the length hit floor length on me and was sadly too long for me to wear. The dark floral pattern paired with the sheer neckline/sleeves and ruffle details give this dress a feminie boho chic vibe. Pair with red or black heels to complete your look.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and easy to wear dress for fall/ winter (in CA)
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a dinner out with friends in SF. It fit me perfectly and was very comfortable (not too tight, nice material). The dark color makes it appropriate as a fall/ cooler weather dress even though the material is light.

Saw this in the store and wasn't sure if I'd like it. Tried it on and it ended up being the perfect maxi dress for winter! Hits above my ankles and I'm 5'9. also runs a little big. I'm normally a 4 or a 2. But they only had a 0 in store and ended up fitting perfect
A very easy dress to wear. Comfortable with a boho vibe. I paired with over the knee suede boots. Perfect for the holiday!
Tried the Prairie trend before only to feel frumpy, but this dress was surprisingly attractive due to sheer shoulders. It was ankle length on me at 5'8".
GREAT FIT

links_Review_Title: A little tight on a 32D bust but overall cute. Came to my ankles (I'm 5'7").
links_Review_Text: A little tight on a 32D bust but overall cute. Came to my ankles (I'm 5'7").

links_Review_Title: Chic Little House on the Prairie
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It's a great colder weather dress- although not because it's going to keep you warm. I work this with flat, cognac colored Frye booties. The dress hit at a good spot: wasn't too long, and also didn't look like I was prepping for a flood. Went braless with this dress and didn't see any nip outlines. Not tight around the neck either.

links_Review_Title: Wore this beautiful dress to the opera.
links_Review_Text: The length is just a bit long on me (but worn with heels it was fine), and the fabric is so nice and breathable. Really makes you feel super elegant but it's also very comfortable.
I think there was too much fabric and made me look frumpy

The sheer sleeves/neckline on this keep it from feeling dowdy. The ruffles, cuffs, zipper, and liner were all in good shape. The only thing I didn't like about this dress was that due to the seams along the ruffle at your triceps, you can't really raise/reach your arms fully without worrying about busting a seam. So it probably wouldn't be a great choice if you wanted to do a lot of dancing. You'll also need a strapless bra with it since the shoulders are sheer but there's no boning or structure that would make it easy to go bra-less.

links_Review_Title: Super cute, but that shoulder fit...
links_Review_Text: Great length and true to size. While I did receive many compliments and loved the maxi length, I have to say that the shoulder fit restricted full range of motion in the arms. If you're not planning to be active or brush your hair after getting dressed, you will be fine!

links_Review_Title: Cute but ended up not wearing it
links_Review_Text: Rented for a 70s boho wedding, but ended up not wearing it as the weather was warm and the dress is very much not breathable. It's cute though a little frumpy.
Didn't wear
Nice dress, but too long and conservative. If it's shorter, the print and color would look cute. But with the neckline and almost maxi length on me, it looks too conservative and boring.

links_Review_Title: Did not wear this to my event.
links_Review_Text: Way too tight across the shoulders and upper arms. And very, very frumpy. It might be okay in a small size on a tall person. But the color was dull and the styling dated. Reminded me of the Gunny Sacks dresses we wore in the 70s.
Cute but very long. I am 5'7" and this was almost too long for me.
I received many complements & felt effortlessly gorgeous

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress, not suitable for 3rd trimester
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress in two sizes for my baby shower. Unfortunately at 32 weeks pregnant this dress did not work, while flowy on the bottom the top just did not sit right. Because I ordered up in sizes the shoulders fit awkwardly and too large and the waist portion under my breasts was way too constrictive. I am not sure why this dress was listed for 1-3 trimesters? Disappointed! If you’re not pregnant or early on, this dress is awesome for the winter/fall.
Loved the pattern and the design, I am a bit busty and need to be able to move my arms around a lot so the high neck and long sleeve didn't leave too much room for movement. Beautiful dress.
Beautiful dress but I felt strangely claustrophobic in it. The neckline is uncomfortable and made me feel a bit suffocated
Easy dress for work.
I wore this to a concert and it added the perfect amount of sparkle! I got a lot of compliments and felt like a million bucks.
Fun take on sequins with a casual style. Fit was great, no complaints!

links_Review_Title: Great fit, kept me warm, so pretty!
links_Review_Text: Went dancing in Vegas and it was like 30° and windy outside! This jacket kept me warm and looked fabulous, perfect for a date night!!
When I first opened this up, I was disappointed, but once I put on my entire ensembles, THIS JACKET WAS THE FINAL TOUCH! it's not very sparkly, the sequins are muted.

A little basic, but like cmon. The low key sparkles on a bomber jacket for a fall day, made such a perfect outfit. It's a good transitional season coat, wore with a long sleeve shirt under and it was perfect. Will absolutely be renting again.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments at the drag LGBTQ fundraiser.
links_Review_Text: Not too heavy

Loved this jacket! Not overpowering but definitely stands out. Perfect for cooler spring night. The sequins didn't me itch as others have mentioned. Definitely will rent again to spice up an outfit. Compliments galore!! Had fun wearing it.
I wore this jacket for a concert. It was just enough bling and sparkle, but not too obnoxious. You can definitely dress up or down with this piece. Size was great and fit perfectly.
This jacket is so much fun! The sequins are smaller and not super shiny which lends to a higher quality look. I paired this with a black T-shirt and jeans. It's comfortable and not itchy. I loved it!

Used as an everyday jacket for night. I wanted a small but happy I got medium. It was perfect. Fun for dinner. I think it's more of everyday pop kind style than an event. Sequins are muted not shiny. Highly recommend for an everyday fun feel.
Understated sparkles in black. Super cute!

I rented this jacket for a Gossip Girl themed 30th Birthday. It was cold outside and this jacket definitely kept me warm. The sequins only really show up when you use the flash but in person it was a show stopper. I got tons of compliments all night. I wore the large. The medium also fit but then it gave a more cropped jacket look so I went with the large. Would definitely recommend!
Fun touch for a holiday party. The XS was good for a more fitted look.

Cute fit, cute style and I really love this! It's snaps instead of zips. Not a huge deal but just expected a zipper for some reason. The sequins aren't super crazy sparkly which to me makes it look more expensive.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Miami evenings in the winter... not toooooo sparkly
links_Review_Text: This is a great weight to carry around and warm up in the AC. It's not too sparkly.... tons and tons of little sequins, but they are flat black, so it looks sparkly in certain lighting, but not like tinsel. I wore this a number of times.
Wore this for a fall evening outdoors. Was the perfect amount of warm and really dressed up a casual outfit. Felt like the bomb in this jacket!

Very cute sequin bomber. As with most RTR items, you can tell it's quality. Probably best for a fall night. You don't want to be carrying it around or the sequins will be scratchy your arm! Fit advice: the medium seemed to fit more snugly than expected. However, there's some stretch to it. If you're down to wear it unbuttoned and you're between sizes, maybe go with the lower size due to long arms.

I rented this jacket for a casual NYE party and got tons of compliments! I'm 5'10 and the length of the body and sleeves were perfect. I wore it with a black tank and jeans but could easily dress it up.

I rented this for NYE. I'm 5'9" with really long arms and the sleeves of the XS were the perfect length. (The S was probably about 1.5" longer in both sleeves and body.) I wore it over a thin sweater and it fit perfectly. We ended up being seated outside for our dinner and I was warm enough in it (probably about 50-55 outside with heaters). I felt like I looked festive but was comfortable.
Super cute ... not a whole lot of structure or weight, but comfortable and not scratchy
This jacket is nice. The sequins are not shiny at all. They are totally matte. So if you're looking for sequins that are more subtle than flashy, you'll be comfortable in this.

links_Review_Title: Great flair for day to day
links_Review_Text: Wore it as a day to day jacket to work. Was perfectly warm for the cold mornings, and light weight to carry in the warmer afternoon.
Fit well and very comfortable. Would be perfect if it had pockets
Wore this for a birthday dinner at a nice restaurant--fits well and lined for warmth. Cute piece!
I wore this for a nye party. It was a great little jacket.
The fit is a little loose but it made for a great party top. Got lots of oohs and aahs and was very comfortable.
His is a pretty jacket. I thought it was a bit boring though. nothing spectacular

links_Review_Title: Perfect light jacket to wear on a night out
links_Review_Text: This jacket was perfect for my trip to Vegas. I wore at night with a tank top and faux leather leggings. Super comfortable and cute!
True to size and fun to wear...tons of compliments.
Doesn't look great when zipped up - more of an open blazer style which was nice

I tagged this as running small, but I wanted to clarify that it does fit and buttoned all the way for me; it was just a little tight. The sequins on this jacket catch the light in a really subtle way and offer more texture than shine. Definitely, a more versatile jacket that I initially thought!
This jacket is perfect for a night out. I rented this for a party and absolutely loved it. Great fit and it photographs super cute.

Maybe I didn't pair it correctly (white shirt with jeans), but I didn't get the overall look I was hoping for. It wasn't bad, just not the sass I wanted. I was hoping for a lot more bling and the bomber didn't deliver for me. The fit was good and comfortable.
This jacket was cool accent to my staple black jeans that I wear going out. The sequins were not overdone and added a nice flare. I would rent again
The jacket fit fine but the fabric was too itchy, I did not end up wearing it.

Nice understated sequin - not the really shimmery kind so I didnt look like a disco ball. Comfortable and cute. I might have been able to go with the small but the Medium was just fine with a black shirt and skinny jeans.
Fits great. A little.itchy but you can dress up or down
This jacket was just what I needed for a Christmas party. Just the right amount of pop and shine without being over the top. I got so many compliments!
Dressed up my somewhat casual outfit very quickly!
Large was the only one available so I gave it a shot. I would say it runs a little small. I usually wear a medium and sometimes can get away with wearing a small. This jacket fit great.
The embroidery is beautiful. It was great with skinny jeans for a GNO.
Everyone who saw me in this top said I have to buy it! I can't stop wearing it, I've had it for two weeks and worn it three times! Can dress up or down easily. Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: I got lots of compliments on this shirt
links_Review_Text: Nice fit and a good every day blouse. It would work for a special occasion also.

RTR update rental and wore many times. Big busty girls you will have plenty of room. I'm lumpy in the middle and it hid that too. Wore a nude bra with black cami as its sheer through the top and shorter cut. Great for cooler weather.
This is just so pretty and classy. Comfortable and fits true to size. Wish I owned this one.
Loved it! Is a little short.

This top was very nice. I was able to wear it to work and out to dinner and drinks with the girls afterward. I got several compliments throughout the day and felt very pretty. I would have liked more length in the torso, but it wasn't a deal breaker.

It was perfect, maybe a tad shorter then my norm but it didn't appear short on my 5'9" frame. The see through sleeves are so cool and the bell at the wrist is big but not too large to eat or drink in comfortably. The one I rented had a tiny pull in the fabric at the neck which wasn't noticeable to anyone but me so I am sending it back. Otherwise I would have purchased it had it been in perfect shape. There are 2 buttons in the back that were a little tricky doing solo but hubs was sick so managed on my own. Definitely will try this one again soon - it's a must rental!
Wore for my friend 50th Birthday and received tons of compliments. Fit perfectly. Wish I could keep it.
I wore this for a day at the North Fork wineries and dinner. It was perfect. Looks nice and fits well. Different. Got compliments from multiple people.

The lacework is sexy but the high neck is conservative. Easy to dress up (pencil skirt) or dress down (jeans) but need a high waisted bottom to avoid showing midriff when bending over / reaching. Can wear with a normal nude bra w/o straps being too visible / strapless better though. The lace does cut down a little bit low in the front if someone is STARING at your chest line when you lean over but I wore it to church and work and didn't get struck by lightning (or HR). Would rent again.
A little loose through the waist, but a fa too for girls night!
I love everything about this top! Tons of compliments!
Such a pretty top with the floral details and lacework. Very comfortable and not scratchy. Runs large.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty, feminine top, can easily be dressed up or down!!
links_Review_Text: Great top, just wore it to dinner and drinks and opted to dress it down with a pair of camo pants and black heels. It is very versatile could be very dressed up with pants or pencil skirt. I felt like it ran large, I wore the medium and was practically swimming it in! May need a camisole, the lace at the top dips kinda low in front and can show weird cleavage depending on the type of bra. Overall a great top, lace and embroidery details are beautiful. I would rent again, just a smaller size!
Runs large, It was too big overall however was too short as well and I'm only 5'3". Didn't even wear it.
Wore for a film festival with jeans and heels. Beautiful top!

links_Review_Title: It was cute but the front next line would not stay up
links_Review_Text: I got a lot of compliments on it but it was a bit itchy too
It fit me really well. I absolutely loved the details on this shirt. With necks like this, I usually feel like I am choking, but that was not the case with this shirt.

links_Review_Title: did not end up wearing due to running large on me
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a medium shirt given broad back but was swimming in this top. Recommend going a size down; also sleeves were long on me so the cuffs entirely covered my hands-- a very fun shirt with lovely embroidery details but not a fit for me

links_Review_Title: great fit and comfortable to wear.
links_Review_Text: Looks great on. Would rent again.
smart looking

This is a beautiful top! I did need to wear a black cami underneath to make it a bit more conservative up top, but other than that, it was a very nice top to wear in the fall, winter, early spring. Not a top for summer... it would be too hot!

I liked this top. Pretty detailing made it unique. The one challenge was that the mesh across my chest was a touch low cut making it a challenge to not have my bra show. I word a black bra with straps and it didn't really both me that much.

links_Review_Title: This is a lovely top. I wore it for a happy hour with friends and got many compliments. :)
links_Review_Text: Runs true to size

links_Review_Title: Super cute top! Love the details!
links_Review_Text: Very cute and very comfortable. It runs a bit big, so if you are in between sizes, definitely go with the smaller size! I wore it with jeans and I got lots of compliments on this top.
This shirt was fun to wear and I received a lot of compliments on it.

I loved the look of this top but it was short on me. I probably could have worn the small but went with the medium to get more length. I am long waisted so this is probably not a problem for everyone. I received a number of complaints but can't believe I forgot a picture.

links_Review_Title: did not get to wear it
links_Review_Text: too small
Fabric is a little scratchy but not enough to bother me all night. Not a total show stopper but another solid rental. Would recommend.

links_Review_Title: Rented for party. Wore to dinner.
links_Review_Text: Decided to wear to dinner with an old friend. Nice blouse though I worried my sleeve would wind up in my food (it didn't). Floral design is just enough.

links_Review_Title: LOVED! So perfect for work or play!
links_Review_Text: Great top! I loved the fabric, embroidering, all the little detailing. I wore with black pants to work and skinny jeans on the weekend. Very versatile style. Loose cut in the middle but I did not find it too baggy.
It was a touch scratchy when I first put it on but was actually completely fine. I thought the sleeves would be too puffy but they were totally cute.
The flower embroidery is lovely & the shirt fits loose. Easy to wear.

I wore it with black suit pants for work. Don't think my matching suit jacket would be comfortable over it since the sleeves are floppy at the wrist -- plus, it's too pretty a blouse to hide under a suit jacket. I ended up wearing a black camisole under it because the lace section on the chest part cut off just above my bra line and I didn't want to have any wardrobe malfunctions at work. I could've maybe pulled off the XS but with a bit of extra holiday weight still on my frame, I felt comfortable with the top being a bit roomier. Really feminine top - great for Valentine's Day.
fits well, lace is soft, i wore with jeans and boots to work on a casual day. Neck lace is soft, but holds its shape.
I rented this to wear to a cocktail party - ended up wearing it to a dinner, funeral and church!! Also wearing to work- It's on sale now- I'm thinking of purchasing!!

links_Review_Title: I felt sophisticated in this top.
links_Review_Text: This top is chic and flattering. It's great for a night on the town.

This was a beautiful and romantic top. It was feminine and flowy. It was a tad light and not totally warm but I loved it. I wore it with black pants, a normal beige bra with a beige cami over the bra. You couldn't see the lines at all. I wore it for a library presentation that I gave. Success!
Very cute
Comfortable fabric. Wore it with the matching pants but it works well with anything.
I have been eyeing this jacket for a while now and it was everything I hoped it would be. Will be renting again soon with the matching pants. Obsessed.

Boyfriend cut jacket in a subtle shimmering fabric was super fun for dressing up a daytime denim look. Light weight, non stretch fabric and fully lined. Oversized look fit true to size, but size down if you want a more fitted finish. Styled as shown.
The fit was perfect
Definitely an oversized fit but very comfortable and flattering. The slight metallic is very cool and a little different than most blazers. I got lots of compliments and enjoyed wearing this

links_Review_Title: A fun, unique piece for a fancier night out
links_Review_Text: Rented this blazer for a Broadway show and it was perfect. Really comfortable, the metallic look comes from metallic silver thread which I prefer over sequins or stones, and it fit as I expected. Would definitely rent again
Wore this with the matching pants. Was a stunning statement piece. Blazer is well tailored and fitted but still has an oversized look and feel. Material is a bit shinier in person. Absolutely loved!

Never seen anything with a material/texture like this blazer- so obsessed and wish I could've worn it more than once but hard to with a statement piece. Lightweight, slinky, half metallic half sparkly, super slimming, on the longer side, photographs super well (looks like a starry night in every photo). Based on reviews I definitely thought the 2 would be too small but there wasn't anything else available, but it turned out to be perfect and even slightly roomy- could've maybe even tried a size down.
Super cute and chic blazer! Fun way to keep it business but also add some fun! Very soft and comfortable to wear - I wish it had matching pants

I wish I had a better pic to share. This suit was so stylish and so comfortable. I rented it for my winter engagement party. I was worried the hips and thighs wouldn't fit as I am curvy and pants are often hit or miss for me. Honestly loved it!

This blazer has a great fit - slightly loose and oversized making it very comfortable but just fitted enough that it will still show off your figure. Great for wearing to an evening event but might be a little flashy for a work meeting. Loved the look and would rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Adds a pop of sparkle to your work wardrobe, and transitions great for happy hour of post-work party
links_Review_Text: Boy-fit blazer that is easy to pair with black dress or pants for work. Loved having a piece that added a little more personality to my work staples!
Loved wearing this and got so many compliments. I wore it with the matching pants; but would be great with jeans and heels

links_Review_Title: Wore this at an awards dinner for work and received a ton of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size, was super comfortable yet I looked very put together and polish for the semi formal dress that was required. I honestly loved this suit so much I would buy it. Wore with a silk cami underneath, strappy sandals and it was perfection. I felt super confident!
I like the idea of this blazer from the photos, but it didn't feel particularly expensive and it could have been a piece that's available at low end retailers.
I didn't like this. It was more sparkly than in the photos and ran very big.
I enjoyed wearing this dress. The sleeves added a twist to a simple dress

I really loved this dress. Wore it to a work holiday party and got tons of compliments. It's a great teal color. The fabric is stretchy and pretty thick so it feels great. I wore a strapless bra but could have gotten away with a nude color strap. I dressed it down with boots but it looked amazing in strappy heels too!
This dress was a fun way to change up my work attire. It is unique and stylish and perfect for day or nighttime. Cute dress to wear to office and fun dress to wear for cocktails!
Obsessed with this dress, so cute and flattering. Very comfortable and fits true to size, it is a tighter fitting dress because of the material. I had many compliments and would rent again for sure!

Great fit and no complaints for this beauty. The color is gorgeous and the weight makes it perfect for fall or winter. There's a bit of stretch which is nice and the dress creates a very nice silhouette. Highly recommend!

Very flattering dress. Not too loose or too tight.; not too short or too long. Looked nice and elegant for friend's baby shower that I attended. Highly recommend. My only wish would have been a brighter color.

links_Review_Title: Felt like a Schuyler sister in a perfect hourglass shape (with lots of foundational help!)
links_Review_Text: Appealing teal color and dainty stencil-like cutouts on neck, back, sleeve and hemline are very prettty. You will need a good, low-dipping strapless bra as the cutouts on the back would show any bra at your thoracic level, so I dug out my wedding gown bra and form-fitting hosiery so much that I felt like I was squeezed into a sausage casing. But it was worth it, got lots of compliments. Just be prepared to take time to get dressed with this one.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress, the perfect fit and beautiful details!
links_Review_Text: Fit snug to my curves but very flattering, sleeves with detail is more beautiful than in pictures, and the color is an amazing deep teal. I love this dress and will rent it again soon! Perfect dress for a cooler day in the office, transforms perfectly from day to night.

Fits true. Color is amazing and so is the detail on the arms and legs. I wore this for work in a professional setting. Only drawback is that it is a little short. I tried covering by wearing tights that were darker and matched the dress. Got compliments. This is a beauty.
Comfortable, beautiful color. Hit weird with my tights at the waist but still pretty

Flattering fit that flairs out right at the waist. Quality material with some stretch, but fits snug. I was able to wear a regular nude bra and it didn't show through the upper lace detail. I'm 5'7 and I thought the length was appropriate for work. Will definitely rent again.
I wore this to our Christmas service at church and it was perfect. Super flattering even while being modest. I could have worn the small but the XS was more fitted and flattering.

Loved the style of this dress. Feeling subconscious around my midsection, wore control top tights, but if it wasn't freezing out, would have gone no tights. This was the perfect cut for my petite size. As the dress was regular sized, the arms were a tiny bit long and so they sat low in the armpits. Only reason it's not 5 stars. Otherwise the material and color were perfect. Just the right amount of stretch. Really liked the detailed lacing. Would have worn this to a holiday party, but was nice for work as well.
Pretty color, lovely pointelle details dressed this up. It was a nice material and very flattering shape. I loved this!

My husband liked this dress. The color is somewhere between pine and dark teal. It's very comfortable. I would say it runs large because I normally wear a medium but the small fit well in this. Only size down if you have a narrow waist and rib cage otherwise it may feel too tight. I have average sized arms and felt there was enough room in size small sleeves.

links_Review_Title: My date's first words were, "Wow, what a dress!" He mentioned it a few times during the date, too.
links_Review_Text: I'm a size 6 jean, size 4 top. I wore a Medium - and it was too big. But I loved the looser fit and flared skirt.

links_Review_Title: Emerald green to me... size up
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a holiday party. Was worried after reading lots of reviews describing it as more of a "teal" than a green. For me it was exactly the color I was going for, an emerald green. I would not call it real. I am between XS and S but went with the DS because I didn't want the sleeve part to be loose. However as a result the torso was a little tighter than I would have liked. Next time I would go for Small. I ended up getting lots of compliments but the style was a little "younger" than I would have liked.
Love this dress. It's comfortable and the teal/dark green color is great for holidays. The cut out detail is also fun and a little edgier than lace. I got complimented on it!

links_Review_Title: Flattering, cute and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: I rented both the M and the S. The M was less tight and seemed a little long. It wasn't flattering but it was more conservative. I would not have worn it though, because it was sort of frumpy. The S was perfect. I wore it to a client dinner and felt pretty, confident and appropriately dressed. This dress is warm.

This is by far my favorite dress out of a dozen of dresses I've tried on from RTRW. At the event, many women came up to me and said it looked as if it were custom made to fit me. It hugs the waist but has some stretch. Plus the thick material hides the rolls underneath. It also doesn't wrinkle easily. I folded it and fit it into a bag to do family photos, and it came out pretty well. The beautiful green also compliments many skin tones.
Comfy, flattering, beautiful work dress and stands out.

links_Review_Title: Color is teal, not green. Dress runs a bit large. Large = 12-14. Flattering shape.
links_Review_Text: Definitely teal, not green. Dress runs a bit large. Comfortable, high-quality knits dress. I was expecting a green dress (based on the model photos), but received a teal dress. I guess I should have read the description which clearly states that the color is teal :-) I am a size 10 on top and size 8 on bottom (5'8", 154 lbs, 36C). This dress in size Large was too big on me with extra fabric at the arm pits and below the chest and with sleeves that are too loose. I should have ordered a size Medium. Therefore, I would say this dress runs a bit large. Size Large = 12 - 14.
Wore this for a special holiday dinner at a fancy resort. They had a photographer there, so we'll use this for our holiday card. Hubby approved. Fit and flare style was comfy. Needs strapless bra.
Great fit, very flattering and confortable
I loved this dress, I should have sized up..I usually fall between a 2 and 4.

links_Review_Title: liked the detail on the collar bone and sleeves. nice fabric and good fit.
links_Review_Text: liked the detail on the collar bone and sleeves. nice fabric and good fit.
This is an excellent quality dress. I rented several dresses for an upcoming event, and I liked another one more.
Fit true to size. The material was thick enough that it was comfortable to wear outside in December with no coat. Loved the color!

links_Review_Title: SO PERFECT FOR A HOLIDAY PARTY
links_Review_Text: A little tight fitting around the tummy by the nature of the fabric, but shapewear or tights help smooth things out :)
I thought this was pretty TTS. The color was very pretty as was detail of top. I wore it to work and would rent again

links_Review_Title: I am 8 months pregnant and the dress fit perfectly over my baby bump. I got lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: It had a lot of room in the belly, so it was very comfortable. The sleeves were a bit too long for me, but I don't think anyone noticed.
Medium wad a little tight but I didn't wear this as it looked toooo dressy for work. I wanted to wear it because it is flattering
Incredibly flattering, form fitting up top with a circle skirt flare. The top portion has holes as pictured, I wore a strapless bra. Stunning teal color!

links_Review_Title: Teal green dress for a late fall wedding.
links_Review_Text: Nice thick material, great for a November wedding in Wisconsin. Medium size hit perfectly at my knees (the small hit above my knees).
Fit perfectly, great color and comfortable

links_Review_Title: Very flattering dress with just enough detail to make it interesting.
links_Review_Text: This dress was actually not my first choice. I wanted to rent another dress but it wasn't available, so I chose this one last minute. I'm so glad I did! I loved this dress so much I'm considering buying it. The color was a beautiful deep green and the material was thicker but not too heavy that I was hot or uncomfortable. The dress hit in all the right places. I'm 5'6" 145lbs and hourglass shaped and the Medium hit just above the knee. The laced detail on the sleeves and neckline added just enough to make the dress interesting but still very classy. I wore spanx underneath to suck my belly in, but overall I felt the dress was very forgiving. I rented both the Small and Medium because a lot of other reviews said the dress runs large, but I found it to be very true to size and the Medium fit perfectly. I didn't even try the small because I could tell it would be too tight. So far, of the 5 rentals I've had, this one is by far my favorite! I plan to rent it again for an upcoming wedding.
Really cute but a little bit clingy and formal.
I loved this dress, the lace detail was beautiful and unique. I also found the cut to be forgiving and flattering - stomach was minimized. Will rent this one again
Forgiving

I really liked this dress. It was flattering and comfortable. I wore 3 inch heels and it was to the floor. The cut outs in the dress were sexy but the dress itself is very classy. Hugged my body in all of the right places.
The fabric was nice and thick so I didn't need to wear Spanx or a bra. Was able to move easily and the length was perfect with 4" heels. Loved this dress and would definitely rent again!

Loved this dress! I'm 138 lbs, 5'3" and curvy. The dress was a little long even with heals. I should have gone with the 6 petite. Overall, super flattering. Loved the material and got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Everyone commented and loved the dress! Especially the back.
links_Review_Text: The dress was absolutely lovely. It hugs your curves very well, while still being forgiving with small insecurities. I am normally a 4 or 6 size dress, and this was perfect with the fact that it is a little stretchy. I am 5'9" and the "long" would have been much too long for me if I had not worn 4-6 inch heels, but I did so it worked out well.

This dress has nice, thick material and was very elegant. The back cut out added a pop of sexiness too. It's form fitting, but comply. The only tricky part I had was zipping up the top- the zipper is slightly worn and was too tricky to get started without help.

links_Review_Title: Full of simplicity, yet oh so elegant!
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size and the material had a beautiful fit to it and made of a wonderful material that had a nice stretch to it that made it extremely comfortable to wear all night from sitting down at dinner to dancing the night away! I highly recommend this dress. I received tons of compliments and I believe it would fit all body types very well!
This dress is fitting but very comfortable. I love the back! I do wish it was a bit longer. I'm 5'7" and the long still didn't come to the ground with 3" heels. I wore it to a ball.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Range of sizes that would fit!
links_Review_Text: I received the 4R instead of a 2R. Normally I'm a 0-2 but it fit perfectly! Great quality and flattering.

This dress is amazing. Just the right amount of thickness to the material, but not too much The cutouts are in the perfect spot for a formal affair. It adds just a little bit of sexiness while still remaining formal. I also love that there is a slit in the back. It looks amazing and makes walking on the dress easy.

links_Review_Title: LOVE! I had a black tie gala for work and this was the PERFECT dress. So many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits great!

I rented this dress for a NYE ball. The dress is figure hugging and I got lots of compliments. I was able to wear a regular bra and spanx panties with it (my abs need more toning). I wore 4in heels with it and was able to dance the night away. The zipper on the lower half is a bit lose so make sure to use the hook at the top so the zipper doesn't get undone. Thanks, RTR!
beautiful dress, comfortable, fit perfectly

I usually wear a 2L but it was a good 2 inches shorter than the 4P. The cutouts on the 2L hit me in the ribs so it wasn't super flattering either. I went with the 4L and it was gorgeous. Tons of compliments and perfect for NYE!

links_Review_Title: The fit and fabric of this dress make it comfortable and elegant. I was so impressed.
links_Review_Text: I only wore 3 inch heels and the dress didn’t drag the floor, so I did not have to wear crazy tall heels to make the dress length work - your worst nightmare as a petite person renting a long dress.

links_Review_Title: Super flattering. Fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: My partner said I looked like I belonged in a Bond movie. Hugged curves in just the right way. Super comfortable and danced the night away!

The dress is definitely snug, but the material is so comfortable. It was a bit of a struggle getting into the dress, but once in it was great! I stuck with the smaller size due to length. The 4R was SO long and I am 5'6 and wearing four inch heels. Definitely recommend renting this!

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a winter wedding !
links_Review_Text: This dress is extremely comfortable , and perfect if u like to dance like me !!! Got many complements all nite
This dress was amazing! Went with the 2R because it was longer. The 0R fit great but was a little short and I wanted to wear heels. Can't wait to rent again!

I am 5'5" at 138 lbs with a more athletic build. This dress was a little snug, but the next size up was unavailable to rent. Other than the snugness I loved it! I got a lot of compliments and it definitely worked well for a formal event.
Felt like a million bucks in this. It's stunning. Flattering (yes black dress). And it worked great for my work holiday formal party.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable stretch and a flattering cut
links_Review_Text: Lots of compliments and was able to dance comfortably in this black stunner! Works with shapewear and any style bra. Probably my favorite rental so far!

It sucks you in in all the right places! In a lot of formal dresses I usually can't wear a bar but not with this one! I love it. I would definitely size up if you're large chested I am usually and 8 and went with the 10

This dress fits like a glove, I wore 3 inch heels and the length was perfect for me. I am on the shorter side so i was happily surprised that the length fit so perfect. However the 6R was WAY too short. I think someone had hemmed this because it was way shorter than the 4R. That was the only downside to this rental, otherwise the 4R was perfect.
I wore this to a gala, the sides are cut out, as is the back, which gives that great detail. The material is thick, but fits snug. Beautiful dress. I highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Having a nice dress for a fraction of the cost! Especially because I know I wouldn't wear it again.
links_Review_Text: I wore the size 10 because the hook was broken on the size 8. So the 10 was a little big but still a very nice dress.

The fit is perfect. Make sure to order a long if you're taller. I wore the regular (5'7) and it worked with flats. I was able to wear a racer back bra (38DD) & also wore spanx. I loved it so much I actually bought it. The fit is tight up top--you could wear without a bra, and you don't have to pull it all night. The bottom is tighter so I didn't want to wear it without spanx & show lines or fat but that's probably just me being picky. Overall 5 stars. Good quality material. Definitely recommend.

links_Review_Title: Loved it but it's so long..
links_Review_Text: The dress was so comfortable and really cute. It unfortunately was extremely long. I did get petite. But I still had to hold it up all night.. I had pretty tall heels on as well.
This dress is fantastic. Incredibly comfortable and fits amazingly. I've rented it twice now and love it every time.

The fit was true to size and I love that you can wear a regular bra with this or go without any bra. It was easy to move and dance in which I loved. I'm 5'4" and wore a 3.5" heel and my 6R skimmed the ground perfectly.

While I normally wear an 8, I felt that the 8 was riding up at the waist on the bottom half, so I did wear the back up size of 10. However, I found the 10 to be too big on the top half, although I'm probably the only one to notice. Overall, this dress was very comfortable to wear and is simple yet elegant.

Worn for a black tie wedding in the south - simple but slightly sexy was exactly what I was looking for. The material is stretchy and comfortable, form fitting but not too thin. I always love how Nicole Miller dresses fit and this was no exception. So good that the bride told me I looked like a model!

Can't say enough good things about this dress! Comfortable, flattering, and tons of compliments. I felt like a million bucks in it and you can wear a regular bra with it (huge plus). Highly recommend.
Loved this dress very slimming & easy to move in, but ended up going with the left dress for my specific occasion
Everyone complimented this dress! It was so stylish but also comfortable enough to dance all night!

It was form-fitting and fit like a glove! It was a little long but that is what happens when you are 5’2! The eye hook was bent when received it and needed to clamp it in place, but other than that the dress was beautiful! I tried to upload more pics but they were too large.
I received so many compliments on this dress! Beautiful!!! This dress is stretchy and super comfortable! I loved it!!!

Great dress! Comfortable to dance in. Got lots of compliments. Cutout is tasteful and not too exposing. The 4R is pretty long (I'm 5'2) so I wore 4 inch heels and the gown just touched the floor. Maybe go petite if you're on the shorter side!

links_Review_Title: The perfect sexy yet classy dress for a black tie wedding!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved how this dress fit! It was form fitting yet stretchy material which allowed me to get down on the dance floor.

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable! I got compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: I typically wear a 4/6 but opted for a 6 on this dress. I didn't get a replacement size and instead opted for 2 different dresses as it was a last minute swap (I ordered a blue dress originally and attire was all black , haha). I'm pretty sure I could have worn a 4 since this is super stretchy. Wore it for an August wedding in DC - the fabric is pretty thick so I was a bit hot but the slit in the back and opening helped. It does not help hide any after meal pooch as the other ladies suggested but I would rent this again. I am about 5'7" and the 6R skimmed my ankle with 2-3 inch heels. Length felt appropriate but if you're looking to sweep floor I'd suggest a long. Keep in mind you might need a slightly higher heel.

This dress was perfect for a formal wedding. The material is thick, and placement of the cutouts is really flattering. The dress as a whole was really comfortable and had just the right amount of stretch. Wish I owned it!

links_Review_Title: Really really pretty dress, well made and great fit!

links_Review_Text: The dress is more beautiful in person than in the pictures. It was not very flattering on me and I did not end up wearing the dress. It does not have any give. I should say that I could have worn the dress but had another that I could wear instead.

links_Review_Title: I want to love this dress but I don't like the see through strip on the chest.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous colors and embroidery. Fits great. Flattering back and shoulders. HATE the see through strip on the front chest though, why did they do that?! Totally ruins the dress. If I come up with a way to cover it without taking away from the dress I will wear it. Strapless bra on in pic and doesn't work. Love the dress so much otherwise I'm considering buying it and bringing to a tailor to sew in something and hide the strip of boobs hanging out.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful detail. Great for a spring wedding.
links_Review_Text: This dress was lovely. The fit is a little loose but I didn't mind, it was comfortable. One thing to be aware of is the sheer design in the cleavage area which made it hard to wear a bra if you don't want bra lines showing.

links_Review_Title: All the process was easy and quick

links_Review_Text: The dress is beautifully made and fit nicely. I wear a size 12 normally but went up due to comments about the bust tightness. I'm glad I did. This was still snug for me in the bust but overall looked amazing and many people complimented me.

It's not everyday you get to rock a marchesa dress! This fit perfectly and was absolutely beautiful! Please keep in mind the sheer panel doesn't allow for a bra but that's not an issue for me. Made me feel so elegant and got so many compliments
Overall the dress fit perfectly! It was a little lose around the waist but I prefer that especially when I need to dance at wedding! Loved this look!

This dress was absolutely beautiful and stood out in a sea of black dresses. The details are stunning. The top was a bit loose on me and I had to pin the neck in. Should have probably went down a size. All in all would totally recommend and would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Derby dress! Paired great with grey fascinator!

links_Review_Text: I am normally a 2, but this 0 fit like a glove. Super comfortable all night, and I got so many compliments on it (in person and after posting it on Instagram!) Overall, loved this dress and felt like a million bucks in it! It was a perfect near-the-beach wedding dress.

links_Review_Title: Received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: I got a 4 and it was a little large even though I'm normally not a 4.
Absolutely beautiful! I rented this dress for a Bridal Shower. It fit great and looked amazing. I received compliments all day.
The dress is lovely, exquisite detail in lace, very cute. Wore it for my anniversary dinner.

This dress is perfect. I wore it to the best of Baltimore party because my salon won and I felt amazing!! The dress was the perfect cherry on top of a beautiful evening. The embroidery is stunning!! There are parts where it's purple behind it and parts that are see through and they are so beautifully thought out and create movement within the dress. The zipper is sturdy enough to go on a backpack. The neckline and cut of the dress is perfect in every way. It's not stretchy so don't try to do splits on the dance floor but I can't dance anyway! This dress made my night!
As i feared, this dress cut in too close under the armpits for me to like it. Didn't wear but would be great on someone else.

links_Review_Title: Unique enough to stand out but won't upstage the wedding party.
links_Review_Text: This dress is everything! I was a little worried it would be too over the top of a wedding but the lace and colors aren't as intense as I was expecting. I got lots of compliments but didn't feel like I was upstaging the bride or wedding party (even if we were slightly overdressed). The ruffle at the bottom is so fun! The 6 fit perfectly! The bust was a little big, but that likely could have been fixed with a bra. The top around my neck was a little itchy.

The lace is impeccable, up through the neckline. The dress was so stunning on its own, it needed very few accessories...just wore my regular jewelry and a nude high heeled sandal. The dress is structured with no stretch or "give," so size accordingly!

This is my favorite RTR ever! I wish I could buy it. It was a bit snug in the hips as I'm pretty curvy and have gained a few pounds but the 4 was a little big on top so I went with the 2. I have a smaller waist so no fit issues there. The wedding specified "Outdoor Summer Chic" and this dress absolutely fit the bill!

links_Review_Title: This dress is beautiful! I was complemented multiple times at the wedding.
links_Review_Text: This dress runs a little roomy in the bust if you are not well endowed. It is really comfortable and you can wear a strapless with it. I feel like the sizing runs big. I had a little extra room. Overall this dress is a really good pick for a wedding or any other event that is dressy.

I love love loveddd this dress and had been wanting a reason to rent it. I was a little annoyed by the itchiness around the neck and the fact that your bra could be seen through the middle area. Overall, got many compliments and referred people to RTR!!
Loved the style. Has to suck my stomach but it worked. Work a black tube top underneath to cover the middle.
Wore this to a wedding in the woods! It was perfect! The detail is even more gorgeous in person! It fit like a glove. Love anything marchesa Notte!

links_Review_Title: It fit perfectly w/ the aesthetic of our friends' wedding, and complemented my hubby's best man duds
links_Review_Text: This dress though, was made for someone with less of a narrow-waisted pear shape. The 2 fit my waist and bust, but was NOT getting over my hips. The 4 was slightly roomy in the chest and waist, and was tight across the hips. Check the pics (both of the 4) and you'll see how the fabric bunches a little. I also found the seam connecting the flounce to be tight (again, it may have just been my hips/thighs), and needed some maneuvering to sit comfortably. Other than those notes on the fit, i wanted to mention that the lace going down the center of the bodice isn't lined. I wore a skine-toned strapless bra without feeling too exposed, but found myself shifting the dress to re-center it (again, the hips).

It is beautiful! The detail of the lace is mesmerizing . I don't want to take it off. Thinking about buying it. I'm giving it 5 stars but it is not perfect. You should be aware, I agree with other reviewers that the neck is itchy, especially after wearing for a few hours. The middle part of the chest is lace and unlined so it does show some cleavage with close inspection but was still appropriate to wear and I wore a strapless bra. The dress has not stretch. Also the hem is very fitted and can be a little tricky to lift if you need to go the bathroom. But, still, I give it 5 stars because it is just so darn beautiful.

links_Review_Title: Lovely color, no other dress like it
links_Review_Text: The fit was better than expected after reading other reviews. The neckline wasn't itchy at all for me. Dancing and sitting I was comfortable in the dress. No other guests had similar style dress or color so it definitely stood out. I love marchesa dresses in general, but I definitely recommend renting this dress.
Love love love this dress! maybe needed a bigger chest for it. The neckline is beautiful, but it was kinda of scratchy at times. Annoying but worth it for the dress!

I ordered this dress for an international wedding, and it was stunning. I was very dismayed however to find that when I tried this dress on just a few days before, it was pretty damn big and not just in length which is what I was expecting. I am a small person and well aware of that, but I usually have really good luck through RTR. Knowing I'm short, I was super prepared for it to be much longer on me than the model, but was surprised that it was very large and long in the torso, but not large in the neck. After trying on my backup dress and find out that REALLY didn't fit, I did a quick temporary costume stitch on it to make it wearable for the wedding without my boobs completely popping out. Thankful for those theatre skills. Nonetheless, in combination of the very itchy neckline that other reviews discussed, it wasn't perfect but the look was absolutely beautiful. I got a lot of compliments, and the purple was stunning. More purple in person than it appears online, and that's not a complaint. Wore for an indoor/outdoor French wedding and was relatively comfortable wearing it most of the evening other than the neckline. The length hit my shins at a desirable level that didn't remind everyone that I am aprox. 2 feet tall and still looked elegant. Absolutely beautiful, but runs large. Small people be warned.
I absolutely adored this dress: the fit, the colors, and the delicate lace. The fit is very much mermaid, so don't expect to take long walks. But you will look fabulous :)

Loved wearing this dress to a wedding. It fit true to size and I was able to wear a nude strapless bra with it. I noticed by the end of the night the seam by the knees was pretty itchy and uncomfortable. Otherwise, it was a great dress I would rent again.

I got a ton of compliments on this dress. The color is perfect for the summertime and it was easy to dance in. My only complaint is that the neck area was itchy because of the mesh material there. I probably could have used a size bigger size so that may have helped with that issue.

links_Review_Title: Perfect mix of sexy and wedding appropriate
links_Review_Text: The colors are vibrant and fun. The texture is very unique. The mesh detail over the bust creates sexy peek-a-boo cleavage. The waist cinches so it creates a very flattering silhouette. Loved the dress!! Lots of compliments*
I am 5'6, 150 and 38D. Very snug across bust. Neckline is itchy as someone else mentioned but I still wore the dress. Material does not give.. got compliments ALL NIGHT!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to my graduation. It fits great and is flattering.
links_Review_Text: True to size

This dress is so gorgeous! I'm only 5'2" so it was long on me. I think it would look better on someone taller but I still received a ton of complements. I love this dress so much, I wore it 4 times in less than 2 months: date night, Mother's Day, Birthday Party, and a night out when traveling to Scottsdale. It was also very comfortable and the detailing is exquisite. I would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to the Derby and it was a huge hit. I received many compliments throughout the day.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'5" and 117lbs and the 0 was perfect. Can't wear a bra (fyi) since the center has a subtle and sexy sheer cutout. The neck area did start to get irritating but I also wore the dress for 10hrs. Extremely happy with this dress.

links_Review_Title: This dress was stunning- I received a ton of compliments.
links_Review_Text: TTS. Fit like a glove. It was a tad, tad itchy, but otherwise it was great. I didn’t wear any undergarments.
There isn't much give, get the size you think and one bigger just in case. I got so many compliments. It was perfect for my best friends bridal shower!

I was so excited to order the dress and when it came, I rushed to try it on. It fit like it was made for me... I was so impressed! I didn't even have my Spanx on and everything fit perfectly! I really enjoyed wearing this dress and received many compliments on the color and fit!! I'm so happy I made this choice and I don't think it will disappoint if you choose it as well!

Great minds think alike and look fabulous when they do! I wore this to a derby themed fundraiser and it was so perfect someone else chose it too! I'm on the left. This dress is lovely with beautiful details and gorgeous color--I got compliments all night long! Here's the deal: this is not a dancing dress, there is no wiggle room in the waist, the bust is for a larger chested woman, you will need to go braless or wear a nude strapless bra with no details on the front as the dress is sheer in the center. A few reviews mentioned a scratchy neck. Yes, it rubbed at the end of the night but I think it's from being loose in the busy and shifting as I stood up and sat down frequently. It was not a deal breaker for me, but it was noticeable after 7 hours of wear.

links_Review_Title: All sorts of (short dress) YES but size UP
links_Review_Text: Based on other reviewer's body stats I originally tried a size 2 and could barely get it on over my head - chest area was so tight and I'm a 35B, also it was dangerously short so I sized up two sizes to a 6 and so happy I did. I can appreciate the beauty of this piece now.

People were constantly asking me where I got Thai dress from. It's really pretty and flattering on and can be dressed up or down very easily. Highly recommend. One note: the slip kept coming out a little lower than the dress so watch for that.
This was absolutely perfect for a maternity dress, probably for any stage of pregnancy. It was so feminine and fun. I will definitely order again!

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to my engagement party and it was perfect! I got so many compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'4 and the size 6 fit me perfectly. The size 4 I had gotten was too short for me. The dress is so well made and absolutely adorable!

links_Review_Title: Fun and flirt dress can be causal or fancy
links_Review_Text: I wore this with sneakers to an outside wine tour. It was perfect for the southern heat but also nice to have on a date night. Would feel a little too short with heels for my taste, but can be done if shorter height. I loved the flirty style with sneakers and would rent again. I wore a 10 so it was a little longer and more flowy
cute dress, easy to style - lots of compliments!

Really great sundress! I got a bigger size because I was worried that across the bust/shoulders was going to be too tight but I think I could have gone down a size, but it still looked good because it is a shift dress.
Love this dress. So flattering. Was a little on the shorter side so definitely be mindful if you have longer legs. Can be dressed up or worn casual.

links_Review_Title: I wish I could buy this!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful lace, detail, fit. Very feminine and flattering. I'm 5'2" and it is definitely on the shorter side. I would buy it if I could!

this dress is one of my favourite dresses i’ve rented. it’s lose but still flattering. it’s not as short as i thought it would be based on other reviews i’ve read. i always wear spanx shorts under all of my dresses anyway just in case. received a ton if compliments and my husband loved it just as much as i did!

links_Review_Title: Super cute summery dress! Comfy and lots of accessorizing options.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. Super comfy and light weight. Wore to work, was perfect for the beginning of NYC summer. Reviews said it was super short. I am 5'2" and it was perfect length and appropriate for work. Debating purchasing.
I thought this was really cute and flowy. Short which will show off your legs, it just wasn't the right fit for me at this time. Planning on renting it when I'm looking for more of a flowy style.

This dress was PERFECT for my college graduation. Though it came with a slight stain on the hem, it was barely noticeable and was BEAUTIFUL in all of my pictures. I am 5'1 and it hit mid thigh for me.

The perfect summer dress! So light and airy, but with a dressy feel! I have a larger bust and was worried that the babydoll fit may be unflattering, but it was not at all. Loved it for a petite frame!
Short, and you'll need a backless bra

links_Review_Title: Perfect cute little southern babydoll dress
links_Review_Text: i got so many compliments on this dress! so cute and comfy!!

links_Review_Title: Engagement party dress. So comfy and perfect for the occasion
links_Review_Text: Flowy and easy to wear. Very short which was a plus!
Cute, comfy, flowy

Super cute dress but I am only 5'3" and it was so short. I wore Lilly shorts underneath (which are short) and the dress barely covered the shorts. I love the sleeves and the material of the dress. If it were just a tad longer it would be my favorite rental ever!
Wore to work on a sweltering hot day and it was fine. A little short but not too short

links_Review_Title: Rented this for my bridal shower but since it was short, I wore it for the bachelorette! Super cute!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! Super short but adorable!
Very cute dress I felt very comfortable in it for a party. It did not seem to short. I normally wear a 10 and it fit me perfect arms and all. The fabric is lite. I loved it.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for Dinner En Blanc
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. I was comfortable and because I'm on the short side, it was not a baby doll dress on me. Super chic yet bohemian look, which is my style.
It's a little short and it looks a little bit like you're wearing a little girl's dress but, adorable

links_Review_Title: I wore this for my engagement party and it was absolutely perfect.
links_Review_Text: I struggle a lot with dresses as I have a pretty small frame but I'm also very large chested. This seemed like a safe choice to order without trying on (No zippers up the side or back, no buttons up the front, no plunging necklines) so I decided to take the chance and it worked out wonderfully. I listened to other reviews and downsized, which was definitely the right call. I found the shape and cut were very flattering for me and actually downplayed the areas I'm not fond of. I got so many compliments on it throughout the party and was seriously tempted to buy it by the end of the day. I ended up returning it so someone else could enjoy it, but it really was one of the highlights of the day!
This was a fun dress and very comfortable. It doesn't photograph the best though, as it's obviously very baby doll style.
Fit well and was comfortable.
I sized down to a 2 based upon the reviews and it was a little tight in the chest so broad shoulders beware of a size down. Otherwise roomy but not too baggy. I received numerous complements.
Loved the style of this dress. Runs short but I'm 5'4 so I loved the length.
Loved the baby doll style and romantic lace sleeves

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! Runs big so wore it with a belt but got so many compliments all night
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! Super cute and got so many compliments all night. I'm normally a size 4 but this was big - get a size down

Wore this to an evening HOLLYWOOD charity event among celebs. I received so many compliments on how beautiful it was. The lace detail is insane! It's cut like a babydoll dress so not fitted but kind of short. It was charming and so feminine. Perfect for a small frame! Loved it!

This is so lovely. Light as air and so feminine. Not much shape to it, so great for those days when you want something cool and loose-fitting to wear. I kept it casual with flip-flops but could easily be dressed up for an event with heels or wedges.

I rented this dress for my engagement party. It was absolutely beautiful on! I received so many compliments all night long. I am petite (5'0"), and it was the perfect length. I wore the 2 because there was more room in the shoulders/bust area, but the 0 also fit.

links_Review_Title: The length is perfect for us petite girls. The flowy and flirty fit is perfect for on the go.
links_Review_Text: Fun, flirty and flowy fit with just enough detail that you don't need much else to complete this look. Very easy to wear and feel chic while chasing your toddler and running errands.

links_Review_Title: Lining hung out of the bottoms
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my bridal shower. All in all it was a fine dress but it's like the white fabric had started to yellow and the brown lining hung out of the bottom like many of the reviews stated. I think it's time to retire this dress!

links_Review_Title: So flattering! Great for petite women
links_Review_Text: Lots of complements, great summer dress. Would rent again for a bridal shower etc

links_Review_Title: It was VERY cute and flattering
links_Review_Text: The slip was longer than the dress/shirt in some places. I wore this as a shirt with leggings as it was very short for work.

links_Review_Title: Very flattering dress. I got several compliments.
links_Review_Text: It is a tad short but is meant to fit that way IMO. Great fit and fabric.
This dress was perfect! I usually wear a size 2 but went with the 0.
Sexy & totally 80s-inspired dress for a fun night out!
Stretchy and open back perfection. I put this on for a photo shoot last minute and we all died at how well it translates. Much more subtle in photos. Drips 80's sex appeal in person.
The arms and shoulder pads really took over this dress. Maybe cute for a 90's party but a little over the top for normal wear. I'm 5'3 and 128, 24 weeks pregnant and small would be the right size.

Vibrant dress, but very tight. It made my belly poke out, even with Spanx, which made me self conscious, Sleeves, however, are quite full, which I didn't mind, but boyfriend thought they were funky. Dress was just okay.

links_Review_Title: U must be tall for this dress
links_Review_Text: Not a great fit at all. Shoulder pads are over the top and on my small frame i looked very silly. Loved the style terrible fit. Would be amazing on someone very tall.
LOOOOOOOOOOOOVE this! So flattering and trendy
I have lost weight so I should have gotten a Medium . Whatever size you are order that size. I got lots of compliments on this from strangers.

links_Review_Title: Rent the Runway saved the day! another dress was delayed for my wedding but RTR came through!!
links_Review_Text: It’s a thick material and nice construction but I think it was too much material. It might have worked if I went down a size or two but luckily this was the backup dress.

I wore this for my Bridal Shower and got so many compliments! It was a little tight across the arms and difficult to raise them above my chest without flashing everyone (eek!), but I was able to dance at the end of the night, so overall very happy!

Wore this to a vow renewal ceremony in Hawaii. Perfect for tropical party or bridal. Thick fabric (but you still need a bandeau) and it's a bit sparkly. Cut is forgiving but flattering! Fits great for the busty!
Thought this was going to be a crisp white but it's actually ivory with some shimmer going on. Not the most flattering look since it's pretty unstructured.

honestly, renting this was a total stretch for me but i'm so glad i did and am wondering why i sent it back. it was so comfortable-- the neckline is structured at the chest so it doesn't fake open, so you have limited mobility of your arms but this was so amazing. you'll love it!
This dress was so beautiful and perfect for my bridal shower! It does run big though, I would size down at least one size, even two. So comfy and easy to wear. Loved it!
I wore this 7 months pregnant and it fit over my large belly perfectly. Also obsessed with the pockets!
loved the fit and look of this dress for a beach vacation or just a summer event! it's a little on the shorter side, so keep that in mind.
Perfect when 9 months pregnant
Loved this dress and got tons of compliments. Super easy to wear
Love this dress. It can be dressed up or down. It Also has pockets which was nice. It stayed in place without riding up on my shoulders.
Fit great. Nice material. Was a great piece for a casual night out.
I rented this for vacation. The fabric has a little summer to it so it could be dressed up. It was easy and sexy. I will rent this again!

What an easy, fun and pretty dress! I wore this to an outdoor festival. The fit was just as shown on the model. Lose and flowy. It worked well with my headpiece and it was a comfortable dress that can easily be worn for a casual or classy outdoor event.
This dress ran big and I felt like it swallowed me. I expected it to be loose but it kind of felt like a tent, it even ballooned when I sat down. This style works for a lot of people, just not me.

I rented this for Diner en Blanc. I usually wear a size 8. I received the size 6 and size 8. The size 6 fit perfectly but was indecently short. Like I literally couldn't bend over in it at all. The size 8 was long enough but fit to baggy. I ended up wearing the 8 but was not pleased with the overall look. This dress is not for girls of above average or even average height. It would fit much better on shorter people.

This dress was fun and sexy. The material is a little heavy but was still OK for an outdoor summer event. I usually order size 4 or 6 from RTR; I wore the size 4 because the 6 was just too big. The shoulders did not move at all! So I was free to dance all night. My only con: It's also not as WHITE as the pictures looked & I got it for an all white party. Overall I got lots of compliments. I would definitely rent again.

Perfect pregnancy dress that can be dressed up or down. Took on vacation to Italy. It does have a sparkle too it which makes it a little dressier but with the right accessories can easily be dressed down. Super comfy but does run big. Pre-pregnancy I'm a size 4. A 6 was roomy and comfy at 24 weeks and easily could have fit for the next phase of pregnancy as well.

links_Review_Title: The process of renting this dress was so easy and the dress came neatly packaged
links_Review_Text: The dress runs big but it was beautiful on. The material is nice with a silver sheen to it. It is very roomy with pockets!

links_Review_Title: Rented this to go wedding dress shopping for my daughter.
links_Review_Text: Loved this so much I had to purchase one!! It does run large, but is just the perfect little dress!

links_Review_Title: Classy and Comfy with a nice set of Pearls
links_Review_Text: Rented this for 2 events in a City Politics Building and it was a nice cross between Sleek and Classy. It wasn't too short or tight but I feel like I could've gotten a size smaller. For my petite pear shaped frame it didn't really compliment my shape that much, but I did feel like a closely cupcake and people really loved the look!
Very comfortable. I wore spanx under because its really short when you raise your hands.

links_Review_Title: This is a beautiful white dress. I wore this dress on my birthday. I got a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: The fit is perfect. I wore size 6.
I'm usually a 6 or an 8. I wore a 4 in this dress. Well made. Wore for a white linen night. Breathes.

This dress was perfect for a hot/humid day in New England. I wore this dress to an outdoor lunch and then a helicopter ride to celebrate my bday and it worked; Perfect combination of comfort and style. This was my 2nd rental, first was a bust and didn't even get to wear the dress. I'm so happy I gave RTR a second chance!
High quality fabric. Fitted around the shoulders. Very tent like so size accordingly.
Fabric does have slight sheen in weave, but nice weight. Off the shoulder cut was a bit loose.

links_Review_Title: Fresh and bright base for a fun day dress!
links_Review_Text: A lot of extra fabric so you have almost no shape. Felt a little balloonish but very comfortable and good for movement.

links_Review_Title: This dress was cute AF for a dear friend's milestone birthday party.
links_Review_Text: No bra needed. Wear full bottom knickers if you may be dancing. I'm 5'3 and it was as short as I like to go - arms about the head and the lining shows and you may flash someone.
