The shoulders stay relatively put- I danced for hours and have no complaints. The dress has a nice shimmer to it. The fabric is substantial and luxe - this is not a flowy linen dress, it has swing but is more substantial. Would be perfection for a white party. Also perfect for someone with a baby bump. LOVED! It was about 90 degrees out and the air con was out at the venue but was fine.

Loved the little white shift dress so much!! I wore it for my 35th Birthday dinner and added some colorful heels for a "pop". I normally wear a 6/8 depending on the cut. I'm 5'2" and about 148lbs and the 6 was perfect. It is short, but not inappropriate. It's so pretty, flattering, fun, and simple.

I wore this dress for my bridal shower - I chose a size 4 (my normal size - 5'5", 135lbs, athletic build) as the size 2 was too tight in the shoulders (no elastic)! The dress was so comfortable and perfect for an event with eating and drinking. Fabric is great quality and flowiness ensures you don't get too hot!
A very cute white OTS dress. Band has no stretch but it runs true to size. The fabric has a bit of sparkle to it, which makes it a bit more formal than I expected. Can def dress up. Plus, pockets!!

Not my style as it was way to box-y for me. Wasn't flattering, just kind of hung there. The fabric has a bit of a sparkle to which is nice. The should fit fine so I don't think I could have sized down. Probably better for someone in a size 0/2

Ordered this dress to wear to a casual gala, "Sweeter in the South" I loved it! I am normally a 4, but went with the 2 bc it is a loose flowing dress. I got compliments all night! Would def rent again!
I wore this dress to my engagement party and then out to a bar after. This was such a fun dress. I went with a 2 because I felt like the 0 was a little too short for me. Would rent again!
Fit large but still cute and sassy! Loved this for engagement pics! Fun and funky but classy all at once. It has a tinge of silver sparkle so keep that in mind.
Super easy to wear can go from day to night with ease. Perfect for any beach or tropical destination.

Although I wanted another dress to work, this fit be beautifully. It was casual enough, but dressy enough to wear to an outdoor dinner party. It was a little snug around the shoulders, but not so tight that I couldn't move. Best part of the dress...IT HAS POCKETS!!! I felt very shabby chic and got plenty of compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress is everything! It was perfect for my bridal shower.
links_Review_Text: As you can tell by my title, I am in love with this dress. I received so many compliments and felt so pretty rocking it. It was a little snug across the shoulders, but everywhere else it was perfectly comfortable, flowy, and classy. If RTR ever sells this dress, call me!!

i loved wearing this dress! received lots of compliments and it was so simple with such a cool silhouette that it was easy to accessorize (big weirdly shaped earrings, lots of rings, gold slip on shoes). the material was nice and thick, the shape was loose and comfy, and i always appreciate having pockets. the biggest con was that i couldn't lift my arms too much; not a big deal for the dinner event i wore it to, but i wouldn't wear this to an occasion with dancing.

links_Review_Title: I made the front page of the local news paper in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Fit is great for girls who have curves. I always wear a small on top (size 2-6) and a medium in skirts and pants (27-28, 6) and this dress fit wonderfully.

links_Review_Title: Great dress - just what I was hoping for
links_Review_Text: This was my first experience with RTR so I wanted to play it safe, and this dress was exactly what I was hoping. There's not much of a shape to it (it cinches at the middle but isn't very tight on the top or bottom), and it's a lovely velvety material that's super comfortable. There's a slit and an open back that made it more interesting than just a plain black dress.

links_Review_Title: Wore it with combat boots and fit like a Spice Girl!
links_Review_Text: This dress is simple and sleek. The back is super sexy as is the slit up the thigh but still feels like enough coverage to be semi formal. I sang in this dress and danced. Id easily rent it again

I thought this dress was going to be way long on me because I'm only 5ft, but it hit the ground perfectly with heels. I loved the back and the straps were adjustable- I could tie it tighter or looser to make the arm bands fit. Fabric was super soft and I was comfy all night.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit for petite frame! Sexy w/ open back & slit yet covers in the right places. Classic Piece
links_Review_Text: One of those classic "little black dresses" that is timeless. Absolute all-around perfect fit (length & all) for a petite frame ! 5' feet 105 lbs ...Such a lightweight comfy wear & style. Velvet material w/ high side slit, open back an delicate straps, reveals sexy approach yet covers in all the right places. I loved this dress so much I will be purchasing. This is my order on #RTR & thanks to the success of my first choice dress fitting incredible I am officially hooked !

Rented for a mid-Nov wedding. I thought it might be too fancy but I went for it and so glad I did! The dress is gorgeous and I felt like a million bucks. It's velvet but doesn't have any sheen and looks high end. Got so many compliments and was super comfy all night. I forgot my backless bra so I went braless and it was fine, but If you have a larger bust you'll need a backless bra. I'm 5'2 and wore about 3.5" heels and the length was perfect.
Was very comfortable and stretchy

Wore this for my 30th birthday party at a bar on the lower east side. I LOVED this dress. Can't stress it enough. It's so flattering. The material is so soft and the ribbing gives it a little something different than the standard black slinky dress. The medium and large both fit, but I ended up going with the large because it was more flattering around the stomach and the open back. The tie situation in the back is a little tricky, if you have someone else there to assist that helps but you can def do it yourself anyway. Not something that bothers me, but you can't wear a normal bra with this. I didn't wear anything but otherwise you'd need the stick-on type. Considering buying this one since I got so many compliments. 10/10

I ordered this dress as a backup and when I received my dresses, although I really loved the original one I was going to wear, I tried this one on and fell in love! This fits so well and accentuates all the right places. I wore it to prom and got compliments all night. Wish I could keep it forever!!

links_Review_Title: Great for a spring formal event!
links_Review_Text: Dress was really comfortable and fit well! Lots of compliments!
This dress fit perfectly and so comfortable and cute to wear! I loved the slit and felt elegant all night long!

I love the velvet and 90's vibe from this style! Running true to size, I would recommend getting your usual size as your primary and going one size up for the backup size. The stretchy fabric allows for comfortable room in the midsection and definitely comfortable room in the hip area as well. This style is great for any cup size and can be worn with a strapless bra. This is a floor length dress so if you are around my height, 5,4, I would definitely recommend going for the regular in regards to length. Again, I am obsessed with the super soft material of this dress. I would pair this with a pair of black heels, pretty, delicate jewelry and a metallic, fun handbag.
Loved. Perfect. Back was even prettier

This dress has the perfect slit! It could be see through if wearing in a bright place, because it's rubbed and between each rib there is a semi-see through strip. Completely unnoticeable really. But I almost didn't rent this dress because someone else said it was see through. Have no fear! You would really have to be looking very closely or be standing behind the sun to see through. Easily one of my favorite rentals. Because of the velvety ribbed material you could dress this down and wear cute flats. I dressed it up with heels and a fur coat and it was a complete showstopper. Very comfortable. You can adjust the straps if you want more coverage in front. I've got a larger bust and wore it pretty loose on top. It isn't floor length, so if you're y'all, and I tend to wear heels - it will only be ankle length.

I absolutely loved the cut, open back, and velvet ribbing of this dress. Unfortunately i felt that i couldnt wear until it was dark out because it's definitely see thru! Also i imagined it would hit me as a midi dress but it was basically full length.
I thought it would be a simple black sexy dress, but I struggle to put it on. There is a strap and there is a back strap, which gets intertwined and eventually gave up.

Sorry that I don't have a photo to share. I usually wear a medium, sometimes a large because I have wide ribs, and the large here was perfect. It helps a lot that you can adjust the fit based on how tightly you tie the strap in back. The fabric is stretchy and the ribbing felt really nice. Contrary to some of the reviews, I didn't think it was too sheer. If you wear a tighter fit, maybe that becomes the issue. Overall, I loved this dress and would definitely recommend it.
I wore this dress to a gala and it was perfect! The material and style of the dress is flattering and I was comfortable all night.

This dress could not any more flattering! I am usually lacking in the curve area but this accentuated everything perfectly. This is definitely the most comfortable dress I've ever worn to a wedding. Was initially concerned with the sheerness as described by other reviewers but honestly did not notice anything since the wedding was at night. Can dress up or dress down depending on the occasion. Sad to part with it!
Great for wedding

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I bought it.
links_Review_Text: Looks amazing on. It is adjustable in size in the back and the slit on the side is amazing.
I felt like a bombshell in this dress! It fit perfectly and was super comfortable. I got so many compliments! Perfect length.
Wear a slip or something under in the sun, no issues in the evening/night

links_Review_Title: This just did not work out for me.
links_Review_Text: This was just as see through as everyone else said it was. Not a huge issue if you are sure there won't be any backlight type scenarios. The dress also did not hold its shape at all, and while the flowy bottom half is really flattering, my boobs were just too small and the top looked awful. I got both an XS and a S and both of them just didn't cut it.
It fit perfectly and look great on. Came exactly as expected and worked perfectly
The straps and fit of the chest are weird, it is see through as other users have mentioned but not too much of a problem. Did not end up wearing this one

links_Review_Title: (Have not chose if I will wear this dress yet or another one)
links_Review_Text: I love this dress a lot. Its fit on me is different than in the image because I am shorter than that model but on my body it comes down to a bit below my ankles and it looks nice when I wear heels. The slit does not go up my thigh as high as on the model too, but I still really like this dress. Just a fair warning, the top has very little structure which I am fine with but it's also hard to wear a strapless bra because of the open back. If you're down for no bra or a sticky bra, then you are good to go.

links_Review_Title: Got this dress to wear to a concert on Valentine's day, but did not wear it.
links_Review_Text: The dress itself is very pretty and fits true to size, however the fabric is thin and see through.

The fit of this dress was perfect. I am very petite and the length was just at my ankles. The velvet ribbing made this dress look super elegant. The only small critique I have is it was slightly big in the chest area since I have a small bust. Loved this dress and would highly recommend!
People said it was see-through, but i had 0 issues. Fit perfectly, especially for those who don't need a bra!

This dress was a mess coming off the hanger. The straps are little strings that cinch in the back and look like they could break at any moment. I was expecting a luxe velvet material, but the pattern is a thin striped velvet that is see-through. No way was I wearing this in public.

Material is ribbed! Can't tell that from the photo but it's ribbed velvet and the little lines in between the velvet are see through. The dress is longer than on the model. Came to my ankles and I'm 5'3". This made the dress too formal looking for just a cocktail party and more "black tie". Boob area was weird for anyone with larger than B cups cause they are kind of smooshed in that little band at the chest that's loose. The chest does not have any support, but sticks out from the body awkwardly. I wanted to love this dress but sent it back without wearing
High waisted perfection! Satin feel and perfect for the office, event, or party. Paired with a black crop top. I've also rented these in hot pink! Some of my favorite pants on RTR!
These pants are amazing. Perfect length (I'm 5'10 and wore 4 in. Heels). But I loved them, so soft and comfortable and the material is perfecr! Think enough that you can't see any lines through

Love these pants. They have a real shine to them, but the neutral color makes them easy to dress down. I paired with an off white silk top and nude pumps. One complaint- they run large and are VERY long. I'm 5'4" and even in 4" heels they scrape the ground. Would recommend sizing down

links_Review_Title: This amazing pants got a lot of attention. I wish to buy this pants some day.
links_Review_Text: Elegant, beautiful , not cheap.
Loved these pants but be careful because anything can snag them! Super cute for a work look.
The fit was true to size. Color was a bit off, I was expecting silver, but looks closer to champagne color. Very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Fun, dressy pants to wear to work or out on a date!
links_Review_Text: These pants were stylish and fun, really comfortable to wear either to work or glam it up. I should have sized up one.

links_Review_Title: Great fit for a tall woman!
links_Review_Text: I expected the 6 to be my size, as that is my usual, but the 8 fit just right. Really beautiful on. I would not recommend for someone shorter than 5'8". They were the perfect length for me at 5'9.5" which is so rare for pants to be long enough for me.
These are really beautiful pants. I kept them for over a month before returning because I loved them so much! Really, they just did not compliment my full hipped figure. Will look great on slim hips!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous long pants, but had pulling :/
links_Review_Text: These are perfect for work, dressy casual wear, or a formal event. I found them quite versatile. However, when I took them out of the bag, I noticed some pulling or abrasion. So, as much as I enjoyed wearing them casually, I couldn't wear them to a formal event due to the pulling on the pant leg. If you're tall and slim, I'd definitely recommend these. At 5'7", I enjoyed these with a 3" heel.
i got a 0R and i'm around 5'5 the pants were 6+ inches too long. dragging ALL over the floor. not as pictured. way too long

links_Review_Title: I was able to mix this piece with others in my wardrobe for casual and professional outfits.
links_Review_Text: I might select a size up. I am in between sizes and feel that a looser fit may have been better.

Love the the print of this dress and the pleated skirt! It fit true to size - maybe a little loose up top. I rented in the winter so styled it under a sweater (also rented!) for a winter appropriate look. Bonus - it was very comfy to fly in.

links_Review_Title: Great celebration with friends...celebrating a friend's holiday party.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric...interesting fit..sits lower on waist but really enjoyed it. Great with a leather jacket.
So many compliments... really one I wanted to buy. Ran a little big, I could have went with a M

This dress is really fun to wear. It's long and I wore leggings underneath because it's winter. The one issue that I had was the snap in the front. When seated you could see right into my dress at my skin if I wasn't careful. But I loved having it to wear a few times!
Great fit and pattern! Was flowing and classy enough to wear with a faux fur coat to a repeal day party. True to size, not too fitted but had a flattering silhouette.
Wore this for a family dinner and work, the dress runs quite large and loose but with a belt looks but together. Received a lot of compliments

links_Review_Title: Fantastic dress! Received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The dress was great, but too tight in the cleavage area (my fault). I wore the medium as the large was way too big. The print is amazing and I got ALOT of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Can't get better than this bold print
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! Loved the deep neckline - although it did gap a little when sitting. I'd definitely rent again, but maybe one size smaller to have the top fitted a little more snug.
Beautiful dress, a ton of compliments! The dress stands out for sure- can be dressed up or down.

Love this dress. Beautiful material. The shape of the dress is kind of funny. I wore a large but definitely could have sized down. The sleeves were a bit long (I rolled the cuffs) and the chest is a bit big as you can see from the picture. Also - the dress is not lined. I feel like if I was 4 inches taller and had a much bigger chest it would have looked better but I still love it and got a million compliments. My co workers actually stopped me in the halls to ask about this dress.
True to size added my own belt to accent the waist area- very comfortable and got a ton of compliments. Would def rent this again

links_Review_Title: Love the concept and fit TTS
links_Review_Text: I love the concept, but I didn't love where the waist fell. It's all a personal preference though!

This was a surprise hit. Runs true to size but would size up if you're between (I normally go with an 8 and the LR was a bit big but still worked). Gapes a bit at the chest (there 1 little snap) and the side zipper is quite a bit heavier than the silky material so it felt weird now and then. All that said the print is amazing and it drapes beautifully! Will definitely rent again.

The print of this dress is stunning! I love the way the skirt falls and slims the waist. It's sort of a silky material with no stretch. My only complaint is that although there's a little snap along the neckline, it still gapes open. It's fine for me but might not be great for bustier gals.
Rented this for work and I absolutely love it! It's super on trend and comfortable! Runs very true to size.
Perfect for work then happy hour! Love it so much.
Received many compliments on this dress. The print is eye catching without being overpowering. Great color palate. Easily able to dress up or down.

This dress was kind of awkward fitting but the print was cool. It was a bit baggy but then if I moved the wrong way the button securing the busy would pop open. Overall it was kind of disproportionate.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress, so many compliments and so comfortable, So I bought it!!
links_Review_Text: Fits great.

links_Review_Title: I rec'd soo many compliments on this dress! I absolutely love the pattern and cut.
links_Review_Text: Great length and overall fit! My only con would be that it is a bit low cut and if someone were real busty ( I'm not) it may be a bit much.
I love this dress! It's beautiful and comfortable. I received endless compliments. I am glad I sized up as I have a bigger chest.

Like other reviews it is tough to keep closed, but my button stayed out the whole night. I used fashion tape to keep flap closed. Dress was a tad tight in the waist after a fairly large meal. Tons of compliments. Would recommend!

Absolutely loved this dress however the snap button holding the bust together was working overtime on keeping my girls covered. I wore a bodysuit underneath so it would be work appropriate. But got multiple compliments and it transitioned into happy hour like a gem. Hemline was perfect for ankle boots. I'm 5'7.
I am 5'5" and the dress was too busy for me & big on me. There is no give in the fabric - keep this in mind when ordering..
So many compliments! It was so comfortable and easy to wear. I would love to buy it!
This dress runs super small in chest area, couldn't wear
LOVED this dress. Many compliments on pattern and length. Was not too low cut for work, especially with the snap closure.

It fits like a tailored, fitted shirt through chest and arms, finished with a pleated skirt. I'm 5'6 and t hit at perfect midi length with 3 inch heels. Moved well when walking or dancing. Soft satin fabric didn't cling or bunch. Would buy if I could.

The dress is really adorable and runs true to size everywhere but the bust. I have a large chest and wear a size 10. I rented the XL. Everything fit fine, but the wrap style of the top was completely open. The little button that holds the neckline together was not even close to closing. This will be great for small busts and pear shapes. The skirt has plenty of room for hips. Bummed it didn't work for me.

The feel and look of this dress is fabulous. I didn't initially have an occasion to wear it to when I rented it but then I wore it for a presentation and it did the job perfectly. I think this dress is great for that with a pair of flats or for a slightly more dressy night out with heels.
Great fit. I wore it three times!

This dress is very Scotch and Soda - funky! It's breathable and feels expensive. My only thought is the chest. the snap makes it not super low cut, but then there is a gaping hole. I used fashion tape -- but who wants to always be macgyvering these designer dresses! I would recommend wearing a bralette for work (less push up to expose your chest) or rent this for a night out/date where you want to show more skin. I am a 0/2 and the XS worked with room.
Was really bummed! This dress looked great and was comfortable until I tried to button the top, and was hanging on for dear life. Too bad.

Wow I love this dress. The print is super cool and interesting, and very unique. The MR size fit me perfectly, it made my waist look very small! the sleeves were also a perfect length and there is a button closure in the front that held together well. The skirt could be a tad shorter but it wont keep me from loving this dress. Perfect work to drinks dress. Stands out in a dark bar. Not good for hot weather though, would be perfect for fall/possibly winter depending on where you live.
Very form fitting. The neck is not very stretchy- but the test of the dress is. This is a great dress to hug your curves!
Perfect length and material. I had read that it ran small but it fit true to size on me. I'm an 8/10 and wore the size 2.
Somehow a regular bra worked under this-which is a big plus!! Layered nicely under a leather moto jacket.

What a fantastic dress! I'm curvy, and everything was enhanced to great effect. I wore spanx on bottom, but nothing crazy. Dress hugs all your curves, but covers so nicely. Love the length! Love the stretch! Love the neckline ... that's the killer detail! It's a more casual LBD, but it's packs a wallop on quality, fit & design.

links_Review_Title: Great for a wine tasting dinner!
links_Review_Text: Great bodycon dress. Super comfy and flattering!
Wore this dress during a vacation to south Miami Beach to dinner and clubs. Super flattering body con dress that got me a lot of complements and attention all night! Love!

It's more casual than it appears in the picture because of the ribbing. I intended to wear it to a wedding but wore it to lunch with family instead. Overall, a nice, flirty, modest dress that I would rent again.

This dress was comfortable and stylish, but there was something weird about it I can't put my finger on. It's almost like it wanted to be casual with the type of material used, but formal with the length and the cute slit in the shoulder. I tried to dress it up with heels for a rehearsal dinner, I just never felt like I was dressy enough for the situation. I struggled to put this dress on because it was so tight, by the end of the night it was so stretched out that it didn't hold me in anymore.
Compliments all night. Super comfy. Would totally rent again!

This is a true bodycon dress and it was perfect under a jacket for a concert night. Snug fit with a little stretch, I was even able to wear a regular bra even with the cutout at the shoulder. Compliments, comfort, and great length-- I would definitely rent again!
Dress was comfortable and very flattering

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, very sexy but I didn't get to wear it b/c there was a smug of makeup on the front.
links_Review_Text: Dress wasn't clean when arrived. Tight fit especially in chest but not too bad. Could have been a nice dress for my event if it was clean.

The dress is really great. I wish I could've worn it except that the size that was recommended to me was too small and I could not wear it out. I could see that it would've hugged all the right areas and been very flattering had I gotten the right size.

links_Review_Title: This is just a simple LBD with a sexy twist in the cut out on the shoulder. Love the length!
links_Review_Text: The length of this dress makes it perfectly classy---adding a belt and other accessories really pops this dress to another level. I was on the fence about buying but it's just too classic to resist!
Wound up not wearing it because it looked super unflattering with my athletic but short build.

Yes yes yes. ONLY reason I didn't wear it as I went with something a little bit warmer as it was cold out. But I LOVE good American!! Fits like a glove so flattering highly recommend for curvy girls!!

links_Review_Title: very flattering for work or for any occasion.
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit and that it stretched so it did not feel too tight.

links_Review_Title: Love the stylish cut, fitted and snug to the body.
links_Review_Text: Fits snug, order a size up

I could not wear this dress and feel comfortable eating or dancing so I did not wear it. I tried it on and although it's simple, the material is comfortable and style is cute it was too tight. I should have gone one size up. I don't like holding in my stomach for an entire event.

links_Review_Title: Definitely a very right dress. It is super cute for a fun weekend away. Would not recommend for work

links_Review_Text: I am 5'8", size 16 in most clothes. However, I have a very large bust 38F. I wore this dress in a size 4R with a pair of Assets (by Spanx) for smoothing and support. I did not need a bra because although they're naturally large, they(my breasts) sit very nice. The dress itself is a rib-knit that stretches but holds you in. The midi-length is very flattering and on the rare occasions that the dress slightly "rode up", it didn't look tawdry. I liked the dress so much that I visited the Good American site to see about buying it or others.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and sexy! Great for hot weather, light
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, stretchy, lightweight, can wear a bra with straps, and super sexy bodycon
The compression fabric in this dress was amazing, hugged in all the right places. Actually am looking into buying this dress!!
So I got this work and it fit perfect. It hugs the curves but doesn't accentuate bulges.

links_Review_Title: this is tight, but good tight, not unflattering tight, I am curvy and it looked good
links_Review_Text: super fitted but sleek and flattering
It is a tight fit. If you're at all conscious about bumps anywhere, this is not the dress for you. If you don't care, this dress is super hot and flattering.

links_Review_Title: Great dress to wear to a party. Form fitting...
links_Review_Text: I liked this dress and it was true to size.

Love Good American jeans so hard thought I'd branch out and try the dress. Bad bad move. It looks like a nylon stocking - I literally tried to unfold it. It is a very very tight dress. Unless you are stuck figure - don't bother

WOW! When I pulled this piece out it looked quite small, but once you pull it on, this is a stunning body con that hugs your curves beautifully! I would absolutely recommend this and will be renting again!
I know that I'm larger in the hip area, but this dress really seemed to run on the small side. No hiding any flaws in this dress.
An incredibly comfortable dress.

I planned to wear this during the day with flat sandals but it was a little too tight and clingy for the summer heat. It also hit below mid-calf (I'm 5"5') which was longer than I wanted. I would rent again for a night out as the cutouts were low-key sexy and the fit was slinky :)

Super flattering LBD. The ribbing is not as thick as a normal textured dress, so it's flattering without feeling cumbersome. The bodycon midi cut is ideal for this LBD and the shoulder cut outs add an extra element of dimension, making the dress far from basic.

I ordered 1 size up because it was my first time renting from this brand and would rather have something slightly loose than too tight. I probably could have gone with my regular size, but having this slightly flowy made it easy to wear. The details on this blouse are so stunning. Fabric covered buttons all the way down the front and pin tucking at the waist give the luxe details I hope for from a designer brand. Would 100% rent this again. Equally wearable with slacks for work or with jeans

links_Review_Title: Super cute and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: I wore this to work and it was really pretty yet comfortable and easy to move in. As a physical therapist I need clothes you can move freely in but appreciate being able to look nice at the same time. I received many compliments.
Great shirt for work or play. It's a loose fit but flattering. The v was not too deep either.

I wore this shirt out to a nice dinner and it was great for the occasion. Could also look great for work or every day with some jeans. It ran true to size and the XS fit well. I'd recommend sizing up if you have a larger bust. The material was lightweight and it was super comfortable.
It's short but looks cute with high waist jeans. I prefer a tunic but it get a lot of compliments when I wear this cut.

Lovely floral print with lots of feminine details including sheer sleeves, tiny buttons, stretchy waist, pleats... Loved the shirt. Pairs nice with denim bottoms. The blouse was cut lower than I wear to work.

links_Review_Title: Cute blouse for day or night.
links_Review_Text: Needed to wear a cami with it. But loved the fit and thought it was flattering.
Wore this shirt to the office, and will also wear it to dinner. It's such a cute, lightweight top, but buttoning it took forever.
Fit perfectly TTS. Wore it multiple times through the month and got so many compliments.
Fit very comfortably and was flattering.
Fit well, kind of short but I think this is how it's supposed to be. Liked the sleeves, they were stylish but not too flowy and in the way..

I fall somewhere between a 14 and a 16 in most blouses so I feel this is true to size since I had some room. It is a little low cut for work so you would definitely need to wear something underneath. Cute everyday shirt.
This was good for work. It ran a little large but not enough to look frumpy.
Super adorable and comfortable top. Got so many compliments on it at work. Will definitely rent again!
It runs a little tight through the shoulders, but I liked that it was more fitted through the body. Overall it was super cute!

Kind of hard to get in because it doesn't have a zipper and the smocking doesn't provide and stretch. The shoulders are puffy and the fit and sleeves remind me of a pilgrim blouse. Might be better on someone with a bigger chest than me? The pattern is cute and it's obviously good quality, just not my style

Really enjoyed wearing this blouse. Got several compliments at work. It's the kind of shirt I love to wear but probably wouldn't have bought in a store. The buttons down the front make it a little tough to wear if breastfeeding but it still works. A little right to get on and off through middle area because it's very slim cut right below the bust. Love this top!
This top was amazing! Definitely recommend. Is slightly cropped and short so wearing with high waisted bottoms is recommended.
Perfect for any season. Wish I could keep this top forever!
Flattered my figure and was very pretty. The larger size was too low cut in the front.

This shirt gives you shape, hangs down to cover tummy bumps if you have one, has pretty fabric and trim detail. I ordered a 12 because I'm large busted, but could probably go down a size. I will have to wear a cami with this... too low cut if you have major boobage! Will wear a few times before returning because it's comfortable!
Would def rent again, very pretty. Perfect fit and great for work or evening

The blouse is pretty and feminine, but the fit was a little odd. It is very low cut, which was ok for a night out. Wore it to work once with a cami. It was a little short, and I didn't feel it was very flattering.
This top did not work for me. I'm in between Size and went for the larger size. It was oddly loose in the chest / armpit area and much shorter than I expected.
Not flattering if you have a bigger chest. It hangs off around the waist like a bag.

links_Review_Title: Way too small, barely buttoned across the chest
links_Review_Text: Would have been cute if sizing was correct
Very pretty blouse! I was surprised that it's true to size though- usually Nicholas runs smaller. Was bigger on me but still looked nice enough to wear to work.
This was a cute and flattering work top. I wore it twice, once with a black camisole underneath and once without the camisole.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, comfortable, stylish. Light fabric great for summer at the chilly office!
links_Review_Text: Would rent again for sure!
Comfortable and cute. Wore it to the office and a dinner.
If you are tall, not flattering

Fits as advertised. The material is see through and needed a tank top underneath to meet the company dress code. It does accentuate the waist, which is flattering. The sleeves are a little fussy though.
This top is super cute. The only thing that I would call a "con", is that it literally took 5 minutes to button up.
Cute shirt, just not the most flattering for my figure. The elastic waist hit above my actual waist, just made me look a bit larger. Very comfortable and nice quality though!

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments on it from co-workers and friends - wore it to work and out at night,
links_Review_Text: It fit me well. The neckline was pretty low, so I wore a white tank top underneath it.
Great fit
The blouse is very pretty on but very short on the waist and I do not have a long torso. Would have needed to wear high waisted pants to ensure no skin showed.
I liked this shirt, except it's a little short on someone with a long torso. I had to wear a camisole to make it work appropriate.
It is so beautiful- the fabric the fit but low cut. I wish the color were different bc I would've bought it !!
Really lovely- I will rent this again one size down

links_Review_Title: So gorgeous I actually wore it to 2 events
links_Review_Text: If fits like a glove , the sequins are stunning! It's modern and sexy at the same time . No risk of looking vulgar - it has a very nice length
Such a fun sparkly piece. got compliments all day / night. I sized up because I'm pregnant but it still ran a bit large through the chest and the waist, but looked super cute with a belt
Loved everything about this dress

Rented this for a New Years Eve party and loved wearing it! Perfect for a festive occasion or theme party. The waist was big on me (I am usually size 0/2) and I ended up pinning the waist on both sides, so would recommend sizing down if you are between sizes.

links_Review_Title: This dress is so freaking perfect!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for my 24th birthday and it was a huge hit! If I didn't already have pictures in it I would wear it again and again forever. It was so flattering yet sexy!

Amazing amazing dress! Was dubious because I've always equated sequins with not being flattering but this dress is SO flattering, SO comfortable and is so much fun! Was getting complements our entire night out in Vegas. You can wear a regular bra with it, and if you need/want to wear hose the skirt is long enough to cover any sort of control top. Can't wait to rent this one again!

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a gala I attended!! Comfortable and super fun!

links_Review_Text: Loved wearing this dress. So easy to wear. So many compliments. Sequins didn't rub and the hook/eye closure at chest made me feel like I didn't have to constantly check if my bra was showing. I'm usually a 4 but RTR only had a 2 and it fit great!

Wow obsessed. I haven't rented something from Tanya Taylor that I haven't absolutely loved! This dress fits so well. I had an 8 and probably could've done a 6 but the 8 still looked great and was so comfortable!

I loved this dress! I ordered and 8 and a 10, the arms were right on the 8 but the rest fit perfectly, the arms fit on the 10 but it was a little roomy in the torso area, thankfully with the style you couldn't really notice! I felt warm, and so sparkly! I received compliments all night, I wore this for an evening out on my birthday!

links_Review_Title: Dress is a stunner. Fits true to size, sexy but not slutty. Amazing!
links_Review_Text: There is a hook if you want the v-neck to be more or less revealing. I did use the hook, but, still felt like it showed plenty of skin without being too much.
The sequins in the middle seam rubbed and left a mark on my stomach, but other than that, great dress! SHORT, but covered everything.
This dress was so fun! Flattering and comfortable. Fit tip: I rented both the 10 and 12 and ended up wearing the 12 because of the fit in the shoulders.

Fit perfectly. This was a sequined camo super 80s dress and I LOVED it! Wore it for my 50th and retirement party and went out with a bang in this number. So happy I grabbed this as a backup. Thought it would be a hit or a miss but nothing in between and it was a huge hit. Tons of compliments and people asking to borrow it!

I think I could have gone with a size 8 but fit pretty well. I have a large bust and carry weight in the middle and this dress helped camouflage all that. Received compliments all night! For sequins was pretty light and I wasn't hot!

links_Review_Title: Love this I want to buy but I ordered too big
links_Review_Text: I want to buy this dress but I might have to resend it in a size four. I used it for my dj promo photoshoot Nd to wear to the club on the weekend. Lonely sillhouette and shoulder shape.
The sequins are incredible. Really a jaw dropper.
Would buy this if I had more glam things to go to. Love the fit. Very flattering. Not too low. Just right.
I need this in my closet. I felt like a celebrity walking around all night. Not only was it comfortable it was so flattering. I loved the sleeves and cut of the front.

***this is my first review...it was that good*** wore this for a random Tuesday night date and have never received more compliments (wore with the belt). felt like a BOSS. typically I wear a 4, but depending on the designer I wear a 2, 4 or 6...this fit perfectly except it was slightly loose around my hips/waist. I tried to find a safety pin but did not find one. PSA: lighting a bit off in the second photo, tried to brighten it up a bit but didn't work like the pros do it
This dress is very figure flattering , especially if you have curves. I'm between an 8 and a 10 and this fit like a glove.

links_Review_Title: So much sparkle! Tons of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Good fit-not too showy (cleavage or too short) which is good because it already attracts the eye because of all the sparkles/sequins!

links_Review_Title: Show stopper! Perfect if you want to glam it up and stand out in a crowd.
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. I could have worn a 10 but I think the 10 would have been too short for me. The 12 was comfortable. I was a little self conscious of the front because it gets shorter where it gathers. The puff sleeves were to die for. Neck line was not too low for me. I felt amazing in this dress! Definitely recommend this one to people who want to where something glamorous and edgy. I am 5'6", 175 lbs and I wear a 36D. I am not petite but I felt amazing in this dress.

The dress was surprisingly very comfortable, lightweight and gorgeous! The sequins were soft and didn't get stuck on anything like other sequin dresses do sometimes. I sized up because the arms were a little tight and where the dress crosses in the front was a little too short in the smaller dress size. Forewarning, the cleavage area was low cut for me, there is a clip, but I used dress tape to keep it up. Overall, I was incredibly pleased with this showstopper and would absolutely rent again!

Loved the style of the dress. Kind of reminded me of an 80's retro vibe with the bolder shoulders and split skirt. I would say this dress runs true to size or large. I typically wear a 12 or 14 and the 12 fit great. This dress has no stretch though. I have bigger hips, so I was a little self conscious of the split it the front as my hips made it a little more split in the front than what I was comfortable with. It has a very thin lining, but I wore a black shaping slip underneath so I wouldn't worry about flashing everyone and it worked great! Great length in the back and I did pin the top so I didn't have too much cleavage (I am a 38 F and had plenty of room). Color is also a blue/gunmetal and silver. Gorgeous dress and would rent again!

Great quality. Got tons of compliments. Works well for curvy girls. I sized up just to make sure it worked on my hips. Probably was a little big up top, but the clasp on the chest is a nice touch. Just used a little fashion tape to keep it secure.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and perfect for New Year's Eve but neither the 10 nor 12 worked for me.
links_Review_Text: The 10 was really short, specifically in the front/middle (where you don't want it to be extra short) and the sleeves were very tight and had no give. I couldn't even get my arms in. I also got the 12 since I am in between sizes but the top half was too big in the waist and looked boxy. My first time with RTR ended up being a waste of $100. I'm 5'6' 165lbs
Amazing dress by Tanya Taylor, as usual. Neckline and skirt cut were extremely flattering. Sequins are even more impressive in person. Perfect standout dress. Endless compliments.

This dress was SUPER sparkly. I got so many compliments! It runs TTS. It was very revealing in the top so I paired with a cami. With some fashion tape & a different event it could have been made even more sexy. The only con was if you plan on sitting in it, the sequins are extremely hard and hurt your bum.

I wore this to a show in Vegas and got so many compliments! It was perfect for a night out. Not too short but still sexy. It does run big- I could have sized down to a 6 and I think it would have fit my shape better

I've rented this on more than one occasion. Love this dress! Super comfy but, sexy at the same time. Great cut, looks amazing on camera / tv / film. Breathable material. Easy to get in / out of with a size zipper.

links_Review_Title: INCREDIBLY comfortable + compliments all night = PERFECT!
links_Review_Text: Ordered 10 and 12, wore the 10. The 12 was just a bit more loose, which was only a problem in the chest because I am only a size C and it gaped a bit more than I liked. It felt a tad short for a company holiday party but I'm pretty conservative, no one else seemed to think so. However, when you sit, do be careful, that slit in the front opens right up :) Very flattering if you don't have a super defined waist, it creates one for you with the draping and the waist is forgiving if you eat a little too much over the course of the night. All in all, VERY happy with this rental!
This dress is adorable but was too casual for the event I was attending. would rent again for a vegas night out or party!

links_Review_Title: wanted to love, but not great for petites
links_Review_Text: really wanted to love this, as it is gorgeous, but not a great silhouette for a petite narrow body type. The waist on the sample I received was a little stretched out so the dress had no real shape. Really pretty thought and would slay on an hourglass body type for sure!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for the right occassion
links_Review_Text: This dress was cute and fit well, but just wasn't right for the work-related bash I was planning to wear it for. Also, the camo is very subtle.
I loved this dress but it is a really boxy fit. I'm an hourglass figure and someone said the 4 (my typical size) made me look like sponge bob squarepants.

links_Review_Title: Dress was so short in front it showed my panties. I could not wear. The top was also slouchy
links_Review_Text: Just didn't fit good at all. I put true to size. It was not small nor was it big. It showed my private area and it was slouchy

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing it - way too think of material. Too hot and heavy.
links_Review_Text: Didn't end up wearing it - way too think of material. Too hot and heavy.

links_Review_Title: I was the best dressed in the room!
links_Review_Text: This dress is pretty spectacular. I loved the fit and the sequins. I received compliments nonstop at my event. My only word of caution is it is a bit tight in the top area. I am pretty broad in my shoulders and back and had to make my husband pull my dress off me. I could not get it to go over my shoulders for the life of me! Really comfy though. Also it is a bit short just FYI. The only time that was evident was sitting and if I really bent over to pick something up.
amazing dress that is not too tight but very curve flattering all at the same time. i thought it would be too "much" but it's just the right amount of sassy

I wore this for the first night of my bachelorette party and it looked so cute! I would have given if 5 stars but the fit wasn't great. I'm a 4/6 and had to wear the large which was still a little small on my chest. There were a lot of nip slips (wear pasties!!!) as the chest part is so small. Also, I wanted to style it with one sleeve down and one up like on the model but the dress kept slipping down so it's not really functional like that. Luckily though, it photographs great ;)

I loved this dress! I wasn't sure about it when I ordered it but once I put it on I loved the way it fit. Very fun and can dress it up or make it casual. I ordered an XS but could've worn a small because the bust was very small.

I loved this dress!!! My arms aren't very thin so it was a little tight on my arms...it's also good for smaller busts, so it you have larger boobs it may not fit as well. Loved it can't wait to wear again!
Rented this dress for Ole Miss game day and got soo many compliments!! I would wear this dress every day if it were socially acceptable!
I felt so sexy in the dress. Lots of stretch and it's not too tight so even though it's short it didn't feel like "too much". Very light silky material so perfect for hot weather.
So unique and stunning. Received so many compliments. Only *slight* issue was the cups were allllllmost too small for me, but it wasn't an issue when I applied fashion tape! Loved this dress so much!
Super unique style that doesn't look as good on the hanger as on. Definitely was a little tight in the bust even after I sized up to a small but I usually need a M in FLL to combat that

I usually wear an xs and I wish I had this time. The small was a little loose in the mid section, but I still wore it and got a ton of compliments! Really cute dress. The fabric is super thin and lightweight.

This dress fit so perfect it's like it was made for me. The sleeves are meant to be worn one up and one off the shoulder although you can wear it however you want. Only thing is that the elastic in the arms was very tight and I slightly got a mini fabric burn and scar from it.
Fun dress! Felt a little weird about the sleeves at first but turned out loving the dress. Received many compliments and loved how unique it was.

links_Review_Title: Yes to black white and hearts!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a party in Hollywood. It was super cute. Agree with the reviews that the cups are small, if you're chesty they'll be out. It's also short but hey, I rented it for a party. I'm a 12/14 and it zipped fine in the back.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for an engagement party!
links_Review_Text: It was so adorable! Got a ton of compliments on it. Not good for a larger chest however. I'm a B and it was pretty small. I wore a sticky bra to help it but it was tight. If you have a larger chest, I would size up. Other than that, it was super comfortable and cute. I loved the dress!
Loved this dress so much! I wore it to dinner in NYC and a concert to follow! I got so many compliments on it! It fit great, if you have a larger chest I would size up!

This dress was so fun! I got so many compliments while wearing this. The chest area is definitely small so for people with bigger chests you definitely have to be comfortable with them being very out (isn't an issue for me since I have a small chest). The sleeves stayed in place and was very comfy. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Wore it to beach party before my wedding
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'1", weigh 116 and the XS fit me perfectly. It's lightweight, good cotton fabric and form-fitting, but not tight

I cannot believe how much I loved this dress. I rented it for my birthday thinking that I probably wouldn't like it (it's kind of ugly at a glance), but as soon as I put it on, I knew it was going to be perfect. Everyone was to wear all black and this dress not only conformed but also STOOD OUT. I got so many compliments that I felt like a celebrity in this dress. Friends and strangers alike were stopping me to tell me how much they loved! I believe I wore the XS. I'm 5'2 119 lbs. I never leave reviews but I had to for this dress. If you're even considering renting this, DO IT.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for my university graduation!
links_Review_Text: Clear that one sleeve is bigger than the other, to be worn and the other off-the-shoulder.
Love this dress. I've rented it 3 times now. Size medium is perfect for me.
Fit really well! Usually am a small but this is tight on the top so I sized up!
absolutely loved this dress--fit perfectly and would for sure rent again!
Flattering, hid my tummy and complimented my smaller chest size. Fun and cute.

Rented for my birthday! Dress was great, I want to buy it I loved it so much. Fit is pretty true to size, I wore both sleeves on my arms instead of one on the shoulder. They were the slightest bit tight but that's because of me not the dress. Easy to move in, didn't have to pull it up, which is a huge plus for me. Not as as short as I was expecting which is great. Highly recommend renting, it's the perfect party dress and I got tons of compliments.
Cute and fun unique dress. Great length for 5'8 gals... I felt like mini mouse in a good way.

i live for this dress! prob should have purchased it because once wasn't enough. the style is unique and fun. the length is very short (i am on the taller side and i wore heels) ..this dress It is not for the shy or timid. The bustier fit OK but I have very large breasts.
So cute and flirty! Fits true to size. One of my favorites from For Love and Lemons.
I was so excited for this but unfortunately it just wasn't the right fit. I wouldn't have felt comfortable in it and overall risked a wardrobe malfunction

links_Review_Title: literally such a beautiful and unique dress!
links_Review_Text: i bought this for my prom this year and i loved this dress! it was comfortable and the sleeves didn't move all night. the only (very small) issues were that the bows on the sleeves require some real skill to keep them intact (tie them really, really tight!) and that the fabric bunched up around my waist. normally, i am an xs so that is what i ordered with the s as a back size. the xs fit really well but was tight on my hips and had loose fabric in the waist. i have a smaller waist and wider hips so this is often an issue for me and did not affect my opinion or enjoyment of the dress. the one thing i would say is that the xs and the s do not have different cup sizes! the top cups are wired (luckily) and are the same size for the xs and the s. overall, a wonderful dress!

links_Review_Title: SO FREAKING CUTE!! (No matter your age)
links_Review_Text: This dress fit perfectly and was such a fun choice for my 30th bday celebrations! I wore it two nights in a row and it wasn't too wrinkled after the first night (pro for those of us who like to avoid ironing). Though the pattern and cut struck me as possibly a little too cutesy (I have nothing at all like this in my closet), the dress is very sexy and fun. I wore both sleeves down and it worked well. My only complaint was that the elastic on the sleeves was a little too tight/uncomfortable. Otherwise, I'd definitely rent again!

I'm 4'10" 102 pounds and I wore a size small!!! The length was perfect! I wore this to a concert and it stayed up all night while I was jumping around. Definitely would rent again and highly recommend. I'm obsessed with everything for love and lemons does!

This dress was so so cute. No one had anything similar and I felt so cool and chic all nightttt. I will say that the top runs small. I'm a 34DD and it was definitely a little tight. However, I was still able to dance and enjoy myself without worrying too much about a nip slip. Overall, I loved the dress and would wear again!
Totally loved this dress. Very comfortable . Many compliments . My favorite RTR dress!

links_Review_Title: Super cute dress for my birthday party! Tons of compliments! One of kind look!
links_Review_Text: Fit is true to size. Being small chested is a plus bc the cups are TINY! It’s short but not tacky short.

this dress is SO cute! the material is super soft, and it's super easy to get into if you don't have someone to help you zip it up (like me). the only downside is that it's a lot shorter than it looks, especially if you have long legs like me. another downside is i had to use double sided fashion tape to tape the cups so they wouldn't fall down, but i also have an extremely small chest! absolutely adorable and i wish i could keep it

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments on this dress
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress but my tits were hanging out, overall loved it

links_Review_Title: One of the most popular dresses I have EVER worn!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove on me, length was perfect & material is super lightweight. I'm 5'1" + 115 lbs! would DEFINITELY rent again!

links_Review_Title: Good for small breast size, but it just looks so cute, so who cares if it's fit or not hahahha
links_Review_Text: Perfect for vacation

links_Review_Title: Oh em geeeeee so fun! Love love love I might just buy it and not return muahaha
links_Review_Text: Took others' advice to heart -- glad I don't have huge boobs! On RTR you can select what bra size, so 34C was accurate without a bra.

I love this dress! It's so cute and perfect for summer - I wish I had more chances to wear it but it was too cold! I love the unique one shoulder look and the cute heart print. Would rent again and maybe buy! Fits true to size!

This dress is so fun! I ordered it for my birthday and was slightly nervous it was going to be too short due to some of the other comments (since I'm 5'11). It was the perfect length and fit so well. It is definitely true to size and I recommend renting this for any fun occasion
Great blouse for any occasion

links_Review_Title: Got soooo many compliments - tempted to purchase but will definitely keep in mind. Loved

links_Review_Text: Wore to nice dinner with black pants and heels. Received compliments. Would rent again for special occasion. Fabric is not smooth, but it has a texture to the silk fabric.
I love this top. I love that it can be dressed up or down and it fits perfectly. The material is great as well!

This is one of my favorite RTR items! It was classy yet sexy and edgy. I wore it for date nite, for my birthday dinner, for a party ... dark jeans, black pants, and stiletto booties. I wore a size 16 and it was perfect -- I've never worn this designer but it was perfect. I'm 38D and usually a 12-14 in tops. I wish I could've bought it!
Fit well, was flattering and because of the pattern and material i could get away going bra-less. Received many compliments!
So pretty!
Only complaint was it was baggy around the hips! But stayed out all day and very comfy fabric.

links_Review_Title: I turned into another human in this blouse
links_Review_Text: All of a sudden, I was unstoppable and felt like a sassy super hero. I truly felt like I could launch ten different companies the day that I wore this Peter Pilotto blouse. The fit was perfection, and the off-the-shoulder made it even sleeker. Really nice, tighter fit.

Short and sweet. Heavy quality material. Black, hunter green, black/white tweed, coral. Silk liner. Zips up the back easily. Requires a special bra. Comfortable. Very forgiving in the waist. Loose fit. I wore a size 8. My normal size is 4

This shirt was perfect. The material is very nice and light. The fit of the shirt is very figure flattering. I received a lot of complements all night long. I would suggest going one size up from your normal size.
Material was structured and flattery. Many compliments. Sexy off the shoulder detail

I've rented other items from this brand. This one was a bit more forgiving than some of the others but I ordered up because they didn't have other sizes available. It fit ok but I think I would've preferred a more fitted look. That said there is a bit of five to this fabric. I would've paired this with a pencil skirt and heels but it was cold ;) cute rent for like a cocktail or something but not for work.

I wore this to work, I have a business formal atmosphere occasionally, and this nailed it! Detailed and well made. Lightweight. Could easily dress up or down! Enjoy! I am curvy normally a size 10. Got the 14, perfect fit!!

links_Review_Title: Great fit but tag kept flipping out
links_Review_Text: I loved how this accentuates your curves. Probably need to Bobby pin the tag which kept flipping out. Quite annoying but manageable.
Excellent top. Great for large chest.

links_Review_Title: One of the most beautiful items I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous colors and overall pattern, fabric is super high quality and has an interesting texture, super gorgeous fit/style (off the should and slight balloon sleeve). This is honestly stunning and I'm still in love

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit, love this top! May purchase
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size, very flattering

links_Review_Title: It was absolutely perfect for the snappy casual look I was going for!
links_Review_Text: Fit was just as pictured on the model. Very comfortable & stylish!
Loved this shirt! I was able to wear it with a normal bra by tucking one of the straps into the shirt which made it really comfortable. Very flattering for full chest!
Loved the wire. So well made wonderful quality of fabric hard to see in photos

I had read the fit was small but it actually fit me a little large. The colts and the material are so beautiful! I had many ,many compliments and my husband thought it was very sexy because of the shoulder cut.

Wore this for Easter dinner, got so many compliments. The fit is gorgeous and the off the shoulder detail gives it something extra. It is hard to get on -- I had to have someone zip the back because I couldn't reach the top of it. Overall would love to have kept if not so pricy!

links_Review_Title: How fast my package gets deliver
links_Review_Text: Color and style was perfect. It fit tight around my breast and long on the sleeves

links_Review_Title: Love it! Received lots of compliments. Great fabric, print, and unique fit. Very Flattering.
links_Review_Text: Has a different fit which I understand why other reviews were negative. It bunches at chest and slightly below which brings your eye up and allows for space and loose flow at stomach / abdomen. The shoulder has a fun and sexy cut at back and off the shoulder. Found you could pop it onto the shoulder for a more fun day work style. Then pop-it off the shoulder for evening fun! Great details at sleeve/cuff as well. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: Never wore this because it fits funny. It is almost hard to put on and doesn't fit right.
links_Review_Text: Very hard to get into even though it zips down the back. It looks off the shoulder but it gathers funny and is very tight around the hips/stomach.

links_Review_Title: NA, couldn't wear it was too small
links_Review_Text: Too small.
Did not wear because it showed more skin than I expected. May rent again when the weather is warmer.
This top was so fun! It was a perfect fit and true to size. I loved the fun one shoulder and the color was fun for spring.
This shirt is so fun! It was slightly above the waist and comfortable! The ruffle is a statement of fun! Can be dressed up or dressed down! Definitely would rent again!
Runs small, per the reviews I sized up to medium and it fit perfectly! The ruffles are significant enough no bra is needed. Definitely to be worn with 10-11" high rise jeans. Perfect summer top!

Rented for Palm Springs and ended up wearing a ton more. I love when a shirt achieves what a dress can! Pairs great with high-waisted jeans / black pants. I've worn this brand before, and sometimes the material thins out at the edges but overall achieves a super fun / sexy look.

I rented this to wear to an awards event I was invited to. The theme of the event was pastel and it was perfect with a pair of light wash high waisted jeans and some wedges! I received SO many compliments. It fit well, exactly as I was hoping. I ordered a size down as a back up, and I'd recommend to order a size up as a backup instead. It's a little tricky to take off because even though the side has a zipper, the material does not stretch. Would definitely rent again- so fun!

I wore this on a bachelorette trip and got so many compliments. I have never worn an XL in a top so I was a little sad at first, but I just think it runs small and I'm not one to be super comfortable with a crop top so I wanted it a little big anyway. Once it was on, it looked gorgeous. The cut is perfect and the large ruffle lets you get away with not wearing a bra. The color is pretty too :)

Love Viva Aviva - their clothes are so fun! This top was super cute. I might size down to a small because the medium was a little loose in the torso but it wasn't super noticeable because of the flowy material over it. Really lightweight and a pretty pink color.
Love love love! Fit perfectly and I felt so confident
Pretty color and such a great cut! Getting the top on is a little tough because the fabric doesn't stretch at all but once it's on it's perfect!

Definitely runs small so size up one or two sizes! I have narrow shoulders and typically wear around a 6 up top and wore the large. I also have a short torso and this was still very much a crop top so be aware! I loved it though and it was great and different and a perfect vacation top.

links_Review_Title: Perfect pairing with pants for celebration dinner!
links_Review_Text: this shirt was perfect to pair with high-waisted black jeans for my birthday dinner. Very useful for beginning of fall when it's cold enough that you need pants at night. It was also tight enough I didn't need to wear a bra!! It did arrive a bit wrinkled so i steamed it, and there were some makeup stains on the inside... luckily not on the outside!

I'm 5'11.5, about 138 lbs, 32C, I have a pretty lean chest so I was able to fit in the small but got the medium just in case. I'd definitley rent this again as I love to wear crops with high waisted bottoms.
Cute, fit tts and the shirt looks really nice on. More cropped than I was expecting but I wore it anyway

Wore this twice during my rental - for an outdoor dinner and an all day eating event. With the summer humidity in New York, the closely flip hides any sweat you may get wearing this outside and everyone will love how classy and stylish it is. It does get wrinkled pretty easy - but nothing a quick ironing can't fix. However - WIND and GOING DOWN STAIRS TOO QUICKLY can leave you kinda blind. Everyone LOVED this top - BUT, too often would we be walking and this flap just smacked me in the face. It's a solid top, no stretch. Got a size M based off of other reviews and besides being a little bit baggy I thought it was perfect. Got this cool picture didn't I? Haha.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my Mom's 60th bday bar crawl
links_Review_Text: This top runs small and is very much a crop top, but it's super cute and fun! I loved this top a lot and almost purchased it! Great for summer activities/events.

links_Review_Title: Fun Summer Shirt, but Size Up
links_Review_Text: I sized up and am so glad I did. I sized up originally for length because I read that it was so cropped, but it turns out I needed the size up for the bust as well! The medium fit perfectly for me (32DD). It's a beautiful light pink and white seersucker and will look great with white, black, blue pants/shorts or just jeans. It is very cropped, but with normal high waisted jeans there's barely any skin shown!

links_Review_Title: Fun shirt you can wear anywhere.
links_Review_Text: The shirt runs small, so order the next size up. Be aware that it is cropped. I wore this shirt for the 4th of July celebrations and it worked for that casual event.
Super cute flirty top. Runs short and small so if you are not comfortable showing midriff, you'll want to skip this. Also runs small. I'm wearing a large. For reference I normally wear small/size 6.

This will get you compliments for sure. I rented to ride bikes around Palm Beach. As you can see from the picture, your stomach will be exposed. The zipper is on the side so there is no forgiveness with this fabric. The shirt will fit tightly. I really loved it!
Really fun top! It is kind of pinstriped which you can't really see in the pic. I wore this for a bachelorette party. Runs small and is cropped!

links_Review_Title: wore to the bar for a high school reunion and to dinner with friends
links_Review_Text: Loved this top, would rent again. The fabric is cool and soft and drapes nicely. The fullness of the sleeve feels special and fun. Side zip is flat and hidden. A little shorter than I anticipated, but I have a long torso. (wish I could find a better picture).

One shoulder. Ruffles. A pastel hue. This Viva Aviva top is springtime perfect. We love it with the Rose Beaded Choker by Ettika. This top has no stretch in the fabric as well as a cropped length so definitely consider sizing up and pairing with highwaisted bottoms. This VIVA AVIVA piece has light pinstripes that added just the right amount of casual to my birthday look. I paired with the Eddie Borgo O-Ring Door Knocker Earrings and the Zac Posen Eartha Mini Crossbody bag and received compliments ALL night! Would definitely recommend.
Zero stretch. I'm a size zero and the xs barely came on and off, but it worked. May want to size up if you are in between sizes.

links_Review_Title: Stylist top! (But beware it's super cropped!)
links_Review_Text: Very cute top for summer - would've looked amazing with white jeans but I don't have any that had a high enough waist!! Beware that this is super cropped - like a belly shirt almost. I wear a 4 in tops (sometimes a 6 due to my bust) ... and the M was snug everywhere on me. Overall, great top but I'd definitely recommend it to a more athletic figured woman due to the cut.
Runs small

My favorite RTR shirt so far! Wore with white skinny high waisted jeans and showed just a sliver of belly. One thing to note is that the ruffles blow around a lot in the wind. Other than that no complaints!
This top fit great, but was not expecting the length to be cropped.

links_Review_Title: Loved! Perfect for a night out
links_Review_Text: Definitely size up if short-waisted/thick in waist- I wore the Large because of the side zipper, still puckered at my waist. I wear a 34DD and wore no bra because I couldn't zip with one. If you cannot afford not to wear a bra, I wouldn't risk it if you're busty. Also, it falls short. I have an average torso, and it fell just at about my jeans with my arms down. I loved it and made it work, but I would recommend for someone with a smaller bust and longer waist.

links_Review_Title: My fav shirt of all time. Ever.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous! I wore this twice, I would buy it if it weren't so $$$. No need to wear a bra because under the ruffle is a fitted body with zipper. More cropped than I thought it would be. Fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Unique, on trend, eye catching top!
links_Review_Text: This was an adorable one shoulder cropped top with gorgeous ruffle detailing. It is hard to tell from the photos that it is slightly pinstriped. The shell underneath is quite cropped so i recommend high waisted jeans with this top. It is also a bit snug if you have a large chest, but a bra isn't necessary. I received many compliments on this top & would really like to own it!

I love this top soooooooo much!!' I would totally buy it if I were going to wear it more than once. It's so pretty and cool and chic! Totally can be dressed up or down. I wore it with jeans and white Adidas sneakers for a day filled with walking in DC. It was so perfect, I'm legit obsessed. I would recommend sizing up if you've got bigger boobs or a wide ribcage. There is absolutely NO stretch in this. I got the medium and it was perfect and I'm normally a small. GET THIS TOP!! You won't regret it. P.S. Even though it's cotton it didn't get very wrinkly and I wore it alllllllllllll day long!

This top is ADORABLE. It's so cute and fits true to size. It is fitted- not loose- and the pink ruffle drapes over a fitted bodice underneath. I wore it with high waisted jeans and it STILL showed my belly button, so the top is VERY cropped. Renter beware but if you want to rock a crop top, this is the cutest one I've ever seen! Received tons of compliments and no one had ever seen anything similar.
I wore this to a casual Birthday party, and it was a hit! All my girlfriends were envious. Definitely recommend this piece. Runs slightly small, but not enough to go up a size.

Super cute top for a family wedding party. My daughter (size 2, 5'6", age 15) wore this with white high rise jeans to have less tummy showing. We did have to fly to the party, but the top required minimal ironing to touch up even after being packed in a tight suitcase for our flight. Love this top! Will definitely rent it again and highly recommend it!

links_Review_Title: This blouse was super cute, but I would get one size bigger.
links_Review_Text: PRO: Beautiful CONS: Runs small
Runs way too small
The shirt is so cute. It has a side zipper. I am a 32DD and unfortunately it didn't fit. I would go for a M next time. All in all, great quality and really cute with jeans.

links_Review_Title: Way too small around the bust
links_Review_Text: I have no bust and couldn't even get this shirt on fully. Would have been super cute and maybe a medium would have fit better.
The shirt is very cute but the under shirt in it runs very small and makes muffin tops - it's a little cropped
This was so comfortable- it perked my bust up like crazy. Fabric is stretchy to make a very easy dress to wear.
Loved that this dress was a slip on, and sucked you in in all the right places. The color was gorgeous too. Wish I could keep it!

I wore this dress to an event I was invited to speak at Los Angeles City Hall. I'm use to wearing shorter dresses, but all the compliments everyone gave me in this dress made me feel like a model. This dress was a great choice.

The material was thick almost like scuba material and the fit was fabulous through the bust, the pleats on the skirt were fun. I am 5 foot one and it would have fit somebody who was a little taller better, it was a little long in the straps and hit me a little below mid calf, wish I could buy it and have it altered for my body, I would wear it all the time!
Loved the dress

This dress is beautiful. I wear a 10/12 (more 12 & 36 DD) and the 48 was perfect. It was a bit wider around the bottom than I like but was comfortable for eating and sitting. The color is rich magenta and the fabric felt like a high quality spandex that held everything in. I probably could've gotten away with not wearing a bra. It is flattering if you're pear shaped or have a pouch belly since it does a flattering job at hiding these areas while giving you shape. I loved the dress!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress. I felt like a million dollars.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. Wore the NuBra bra with it. Perfect length. Perfect color. #spacecoastWOTR

This dress is gorgeous in person! It's a vibrant, jewel tone magenta - not as pink as the RTR picture represents. Material is thick and like a scuba/neoprene material. The pleated bottom is feminine and so pretty. You CAN wear a normal bra with this dress but I didn't feel I needed to. It was form fitting but not tight. Got a ton of compliments and was comfortable all night. My only complaint is that there's a seam where the pleats meet the top portion of the dress and it looks like a wrinkle and/or as if you can see the top of you shapewear/underwear line. A+ dress!

This was a fun form fitting pop of color. For hippy girls like myself (big hips that is) it was comfortable and flattering. If I could do it again I would have gone without a bra. The top is quite tight and you could see the bra strap marks from the back.

Don't be scared of the reviews, this dress stretches and keeps you well supported! The fabric is thick (but not hot) and high quality. I wore it to work without a bra like many of the others suggested but for me that wasn't a good idea due to the extreme air conditioning :). Also, don't size up, just leave your hair and makeup for last. It's a squeeze going on but super comfortable once on!

Wore to a winter wedding paired with dark tights and shoes and a dark mixed fur cropped jacket. Dress is pretty plain and has a super stretchy material, so I accessorized with a statement necklace and thin belt. Tried the 48 and 50 but the 48 was nice and snug in all the right places. Dress exposes a bit of your bust. Color was an absolute standout.

links_Review_Title: pretty color - very comfortable. Front was a little longer than sides. I felt pretty.
links_Review_Text: I could have worn either the 50 or 52, but the larger was a little more comfortable. I am a size 16.

links_Review_Title: Perfect color and perfect for a work gala.
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a work gala and really enjoyed the color. I stood out in a sea of black dresses without looking overdressed. I definitely had to wear a cami because it has a deep neck line.

Loooved the dress!!! Beautiful color. Nice thick stretchy material. Fun skirt. Perfect for a day summer southern wedding. I wear a size 6 and wore a size 6 dress. It was fitted tho. Next size up was too big.

Wore this for a dress rehearsal as the maid of honor. So many compliments!! The color is definitely more of a fuchsia but luckily I had the perfect shoes to match. Thicker fabric that is slimming and sturdy enough to even go braless (though I did wear one). Also flattering in a larger bust. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress and received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I couldn't find any cons with this dress. The material is great, the color and fit are all great! And the best part is that there is no need for a bra because of the fabric being so elastic(only word I can find to describe it). Highly recommend!

The dress material is different and makes for easy travel and wearability. The color is gorgeous, but like others have said it's less bright, more fuchsia. I received many compliments at the wedding I attended. I have broader shoulders and rib cage but a small chest (no bra necessary) so I needed the larger size that was sent and I likely could have gone up one more. I definitely recommend this dress.

I got this dress for the gorgeous color and it's a little more purple/fuscia than the hot pink it looks like online but just as gorgeous in person. I LOVED this dress for how comfortable it was and the way it sucked my tummy in and enhanced my chest in all the right ways. A miracle dress in my opinion. The dress was true to size. I would definitely recommend this dress and the designer.

It fits very tight in the upper portion but has pretty good stretch. Definitely pushed me in in all the right places to give me a flattering shape. The weight of the fabric falls beautifully and makes an elegant statement! I ordered my normal size it took a second to squeeze into but I never felt like it was too tight once it was on.

I loved this dress, and I got a lot of compliments on it at the wedding! It was very comfortable (bonus: did not have to wear a bra!) and fun to wear. The skirt is great for dancing! I loved the color and the style. I have a pear-shaped body, so it accentuated all the right things for me. 10/10 would rent again!

I have never felt like a princess from wearing a dress until now. Great fitting, beautiful color that was perfect for a spring wedding! One of the first reviews mentions that the original tag said to step into the dress instead of slipping on above your head and I thoroughly recommend. The only thing that would make this better is if it had pockets. Overall -- dream dress!
Perfect for a rehearsal dinner. Super flattering. Would definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: Very alluring color and classic cut
links_Review_Text: Rented for an award show, this dress was really a standout. The color I would say is more purple than captured by camera. I naturally have a small waist and loved the fit; however, would caution there is no zipper, and the thick fabric is very fitted. As a large C-cup, my bust also felt constricted, but not a problem. It may be small for some. The length was perfect just below my knee at 5'9. Overall, I had compliments all night and felt it was perfect for the occasion.

The color and joy of this dress was just what I was hoping for at the wedding I attended. Memorable, luxurious and fun! Lots of compliments! It definitely ran smaller than expected on the top. I'm athletically built with a broad back and was glad this was a stretchy dress with no zipper. Also for once in my life the dress gave me some cleavage (oh the A cup) - ha! Wore a strapless bra with it. Such a fun dress to feel girlie in!
This is one of my fave rentals! Vibrant color, fantastic fit...and comfortable, too! Loved this dress!!

Electric color! So dynamic. I had originally planned to wear this to work, but the full skirt made it a little too dressy. This dress exudes a vintage flare.
