The top was pretty snug (not having a zipper made it a squeeze to get in and out of), but once you're in, you're in! I felt a little too busty in this, so adding the bolero top and brooch completed this vintage dream dress for a night at the theatre.
Beautiful color, great quality, fun dress with a nice shape

links_Review_Title: High quality material and beautiful structure
links_Review_Text: Pros: No bra required, comfortable, sports bra like material, beautiful structure Cons: color does not match picture, it's more of a purple-ish magenta rather than on the pink side of the spectrum.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on this dress
links_Review_Text: What an adorable cocktail dress! I got tons of compliments at my work holiday party. The color is a little different than the picture, check the reviews. Also, beware if you're super curvy! The dress is really flattering, but difficult to get over your butt (no zipper) and shows a lot of cleavage.
True to size, beautiful color, many compliments

The color and cut of this dress make it really stand out..classic simple lines but in a great material in a beautiful color. Great for someone who's bustier...a little big through the waist for me but that's typical with my body type. Would definitely wear again!
One of my favorite dresses ever! Hated returning it. LOL

Tight scuba fabric was supportive so I didn't need to wear a bra. The skirt has beautiful pleats that are very flattering. The color was fun, a magenta pink. I added my own belt. Loved this and would rent again. A little hard to get off since there's no zipper.

I normally wear size12 in non designer clothing and the largest size fit well. The neck line is a bit low but I was able to wear a normal bra. Nice thick almost scuba like fabric that holds you in in all the right places. Fabric will not wrinkle and drapes beautifully.

This dress is what dreams are made of. The color is so brilliant is really makes a statement. The fit is so flattering- fitted up to the waist and then flared out to hide any and all flaws. The material is a thicker heavier yet soft and comfy material that clings yet still flowy. Only con is the the bust part is alil revealing. #Classy #fun #chic
Great color, fabric is snug and easy to move around in. If you are top heavy might be too low

links_Review_Title: This dress was fun, colorful and super comfy!
links_Review_Text: The material is almost like a neoprene so it supports and holds up the areas it needs to while not clinging to any areas you want to draw less attention to! Great dress and color!

After a disappointing dress with inadequately short lining, I was able to get this overnighted as a backup with no problem. Thankfully, this dress was perfection! It arrived with a few hours to spare before the wedding I was attending. The fabric has a little stretch and is very comfortable! The skirt is "floofy" and can fit anyone without needing to worry about measurements (free size from waist down). The top holds you in and is easiest to wear with a sticky bra. I had a laparoscopy and was worried about my bloated mid-section and ordered up a size (US 8) and it fit perfectly. I wish I had a shorter blazer because the floofy skirt does puff out the back of a blazer (it was 38F here!). The color pops! I'd rent this dress again and even buy it if it were ever available.
Fits true to size, very flattering around the waist and perfect for any occasion. Fun to dance in.

links_Review_Title: Did not wear this- but would totally rent it again fir another event!
links_Review_Text: The picture dies NOT do this dress justice! I sounds up not wearing this- but tried it on just in case. The material is strong yet very comfortable. Color is also more vibrant than it appears. Most importantly- this dress does have a good stretch factor to it, so you won't be uncomfortable! Love this dress. Will wear next time!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for the Veuve Cliquot Polo classic!
links_Review_Text: This is the perfect summer dress for a special occasion. I received so many compliments both at the event and from the event pictures. The bow in the back doesn't lay perfectly flat, but it still looks ok.

Such a gorgeous dress with lovely colors. I got tons of compliments! It was comfortable, and fit true-to-size. For reference, my measurements are 34-25-37. The only thing that was surprising was that it was longer than I expected.

links_Review_Title: Will definitely rent this dress again. Received tons of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Dress fits true to size. I loved how it flowed.

The style and color looked so spring/summery I had to give it a try. It was cute, but felt more like a little girl's dress. It was too tight in the waist to zip so I had to keep it zipped and squeeze it on overhead.
Loved this dress. I could have sized up but this dress still fit beautifully. I got lots of compliments and enjoyed wearing. Would rent again.
Fine without bra. Love the tulle and liked overall but didn't love the bow as much as others have, plus the bow was a bit floppy because there was extra fabric in the back

Loved the length and open back feel to this dress. While it was cute and I got compliments, the waitlist would ride up making it more like an "empire waist" fit which wasn't flattering. The bow was fun at the back of the neck but it was pretty floppy. I could see where the print, length, and fit comes across as rather matronly and dated.
Great length, back bow detail adorable. Was just a tad loose for a size 6
Wearing this dress transmits you to another era :) it's romantic, unique, fun to wear. Loved it
Love the dress great for summer

The open back didn't work with any bra I have so I wore it without one and it was great! The bow is so cute, definitely need hair out of the way to show it off! The length was upper calf (I'm 5'10") and the shape was very flattering for hourglass/pear shape. Ended up wearing with flat sandals to keep the focus on the dress. Also, a mini crossbody (no pockets). Lots of compliments on this one. Very breezy for summer.
Pretty dress on the hanger, but like all of the other rentals I got this month, the bust was too small and so I could not even wear this. Sent back the same day with no luck
Just a daily dress that's pretty...

links_Review_Title: The bow detail is lady like perfection.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! Loved the bow! A strapless bra is necessary due to the cut and it was a bit big in the chest (32D). Women with smaller chests may want to size down. I could have worn a 4.
I loved it!
Tight fit on bust but I am small so it worked well.

links_Review_Title: This dress would have been gorgeous...
links_Review_Text: The fit is awful. The top part of the dress runs small and the zipper is almost impossible to zip because it gets snagged. The material is beautiful but, the cut of the dress is off.

I really liked this dress but ended up wearing something else. I tend to be a 6-8 with a small chest. The 6 was actually perfect- not tight at all. Great length for a tall person as well! The only complaint I would give is that the bow gets floppy and kinda falls, but I think some steam may help.
This dress was very pretty but I was swimming in the size 4 :( I didn't have time to get another size so I ended up not wearing it. The bow in thE back is super cute tho!

I wore for my fiancé's (very large) family reunion brunch in the Uk and felt very proper yet stylish. On the conservative side but the bow in the back makes it more of a young classic conservative as opposed to something old lady...for lack of a better word
Beautiful dress

links_Review_Title: The fabric has these glorious shimmering patches and it looks like someone painted it
links_Review_Text: The fit is stellar. I wore my beloved Thirdlove strapless bra and it was undetectable. It is so ladylike and girly and twirl worthy. My 2yr old said "Mommy is so BEEEAUTEEFUL <3" while I was modeling it for her. Love.
I tried this on and then sent it right back because it looked like an old lady dress. The only cute part was the bow in the back. I was disappointed.
I tend to prefer a little bit edgier clothes so opted for something else for the wedding. That said, this was a very flattering, classic fit

links_Review_Title: Loved the cut of the dress!
links_Review_Text: The cut of the dress was great - it's very slimming. But the dress was a bit tight on the chest and waist area so if you're on the curvier side, best to size up. The size 6 fit well enough but decided to go with the size 8 since it's easier to zip up. Overall - a great dress for a summer wedding
There is a bit extra fabric but this dress totally makes you feel fabulous. You can make it as tight as you want so definitely fits well.

The fabric and lines are beautiful and forgiving. Rented the dress for a work/ polo networking event, but also ended up wearing the back up size to a baby shower and church. Awesome dress! I'd recommend sizing down before up- the 34 (2) was perfect but the 36 was a lot of fabric.
As others said, lots of fabric! Best for taller ladies. Loved the colors, very comfortable, and with a work appropriate neckline FTW!

This dress makes it easy to feel fancy, and it is fun. The true wrap dress style made it easy to adjust but it did take me a few wears to get the wrap ties to lay how I liked them. Comfortable enough for all day wear.

A lovely wrap dress for any occasion. It's so unique that it doesn't feel like just another wrap dress. The skirt billows in a lovely way. The cotton material is quite thin, so while it looks like it would only be for cold weather, this has the ability to dip into other seasons.

The dress is very cute and the length is darling. I was nervous there would be too much material but you could pull it as snug as you wanted because it is a wrap. I probably could have sized down but was happy with this size. I received lots of compliments!

Wasn't sure about this dress at first as it sorta felt like wearing a robe and the fabric has a natural wrinkle to it, but after ironing a bit and adding a flashy necklace, I dug it. The ref and purple-ish colors in the Fant are more vibrant in person, too. I wore to work on Valentines and got several compliments.
Cute Dress for work! Not something I would have purchased on my own but enjoy wearing a new style.
Rented this dress for work. I was little worried about the length since I'm vertically challenged at 5 feet even but it was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments. I loved it
links_Review_Text: Great for bustier small waisted women. I loved the crisp navy blue and pink colors
This was super cute and comfy.

I'm petite and normally don't wear dresses with this much fabric, but the sleeves and print convinced me! Definitely more of a cold-weather dress because of the long sleeves and longer length. I tied the wrap waist pretty tight, but there was still a lot of fabric. Didn't have to pin the neckline at all which was nice.

links_Review_Title: Would like it a little shorter & tighter
links_Review_Text: I wanted to like this dress but it's just too much fabric for a short and petite person.
This dress is gorgeous! The jewel colors are rich, the fit is super flattering for a wrap dress (ties high on waist to avoid my problem middle area) and just such a showstopper. One of my fave Rtr's.

This dress is beautiful. It is a true wrap dress but doesn’t come unwrapped easily! The top wasn’t to low cut and stayed put. The skirt also stayed wrapped even in windy weather. I think this runs big. I got a 40 which equates to an American 8 and it was a little big on me. If I rent it again, I will size down.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress but a lot of volume
links_Review_Text: I love the dress but it overwhelmed my smaller frame with too much fabric. Would be perfect on a curvier/bustier woman. Would be especially flattering on a mama to be! I'd size down if you're an athletic build.
This dress is even more lovely in person. The material is very light so the dress doesn't feel heavy.
Women completed unique dress. My boyfriend thought it looked like a bathrobe! 🙄
It feels like a lot of material but I loved it. Great fit and very comfortable to wear to work.

links_Review_Title: The most compliments I have ever received on a dress.
links_Review_Text: The fact it is equal parts comfortable and beautiful are a huge plus. Frankly, would also work great as a maternity dress. I truly loved it and, if it were slightly cheaper, I would buy it for my own closet.

This wrap dress is very comfortable and flattering. The fabric is thin but crisp cotton with a slight pucker to it (like seersucker). The waist tie is quite high up. It arrived with the wrap ties very wrinkled but once I ironed them flat the bow in the front looked WAY better.

links_Review_Title: It just a a fun everyday dress
links_Review_Text: This dress is really easy to dress up or down!
I haven't worn a wrap dress in years. This dress looked great. Feminine and flirty. Can dress up or down. Good for transition from work to evening event.

This is one of those dresses where I got lots of compliments but I didn't love the dress. It wasn't super flattering on me but the dress got lots of compliments. The material was a little warm But it's also 110 degrees in my area. Not a great summer choice. Would consider renting again but not a fav.
Received many compliments for several occasions when I wore this dress!
Nice dress, a bit bulky but still flattering.
Loved this dress so much that I have worn a few times!
The dress was stiff and wouldn't move and flow.

I wear this to a conference and had no less than 10 people stop me and asked me about this dress. I got so many compliments. It's an easy dress to wear because of the wrap style. It is such a fun dress
Too big and not flattering

links_Review_Title: This dress is a striped trash bag
links_Review_Text: I loved the pictures of this dress online and was thrilled it was available to rent for work! I was thoroughly disappointed when it arrived. It was stiff and had no shape whatsoever. I was completely lost in the dress and it looked like a large trash bag on me. Sad, I wanted to love it!

links_Review_Title: Cute, but can cause a bit of a peep-show!
links_Review_Text: Very lovely dress. I'm relatively tall (5ft6-ish), and with kitten heel pumps this worked just right. I think with flats it might look a bit overwhelming. Be a bit careful when tying, if you don't have a large bust, you may want to wear a cami underneath as the extra fabric can expose the girls if you're sitting (or, in my case, slouching lol).

links_Review_Title: Looks cute but wasn't my style.
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear but seems nice!
I would rent it again.

links_Review_Title: It was perfect for my work event and I had a ton of compliments!
links_Review_Text: It's comfortable and flattering and fits great and I got SO many compliments at a work party.
I really wanted this dress to work, but it was a little big so it didn't wrap around me right, and was extremely low cut as a result

I loved this dress and will definitely rent it again! Great for tall gals. Wore with riding boots in nyc and sandals in Miami. I would suggest taking the smaller size if you're in between sizes. I'm a 6/8 with larger hips and took a 6.
Love the material unfortunately was too big.
Fit was a little large, but still worked well. Not too revealing and travels well.
I loved this dress, but it was a little loose on my small frame. I was able to tie it in such a way to give me some shape despite the looseness. It was very comfortable and very pretty!
Loved the dress but definitely runs small

links_Review_Title: The dress was very flattering and classy.
links_Review_Text: Cons was the thick stiff material. And Im not crazy about shoulder pads. But pros were that it was simple elegant and very flattering to my figure. This picture doesnt do it justice.. just size up one or 2 sizes
It took some serious shape wear layering to get this dress to zip, and even then I couldn't really move my arms in it. I had already gone up one size from reviews, but I definitely needed a 12.
The material is thick and very flattering. I received compliments all night! Great dress!
This dress was spectacular! It's so simple yet so elegant! No need for spanks as it hugs you in all the right places! Will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Love it, silt is high so watch out
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress. I felt so pretty and elegant in it, which is saying something because I hate most dresses. It’s a little snug around my waist, but I loved it. It hugged me in all the right places. I got compliments on it all night.
The dress was gorgeous! Wore it to a black tie wedding. It does run small and the slit is higher than I would have liked but it was still elegant.

My husband and I were attending our first black tie wedding, so I used Rent the Runway for the first time. I am normally a size 4 or 6, and I couldn't even zip the 4. The 6 was still tighter than I'm used to, but part of that is just because it's a tight style! The slit in the front is pretty high too (can you tell I'm not used to wearing dresses like this? :) but it made it really easy to move around. I'm 5'7", wore 2" heels, and the dress was a great length. The dress is a thicker material which makes it look really expensive. I got more compliments on this dress than anything I've worn to a wedding before.

Its hard to find a dress that is both winter-weather appropriate and also a head turner, but this dress accomplished that. The high slit and deep V-neck give you some va-voom but the material is thick enough to keep you warm. My only complaint was that the arms dont have much movement and you'll get a little nervous reaching up past 90degrees that you might soon hear a rip. Also, the shoulders have pads. I think this just added to the drama but might be a turn-off for some.
I wanted to Love it. Maybe I just ordered a big size. I ended up going to the RTR Georgetown/DC to find the perfect dress. Go there. The ladies are amazing.
I loved this dress!! It's fitted perfectly... a bit on the small side of anything. Loved everything!

The 4L was a great fit & it was long enough for 4in heels also. It was a little tight up around my chest but it fit everywhere else and it's not an uncommon problem for me. Got a lot of compliments and I felt really confident in it.

I rented this dress for my company holiday party, and loved it! Color is beautiful, cut & leg slit are flattering but not too sexy, and length is perfect (I wore 3" heels and it was just off the floor). My only issue was the chest/arms fit a little weird. I don't have a large chest, but it was definitely tight at the seam between my shoulder and chest. The material is nice and thick but has very little stretch. Arm movement is slightly restricted because of this, but it was still comfortable.

This dress is perfect for winter formal events - it brings the drama (high slit), it is warm (long sleeves), the color is rich, and it was quite comfortable. It did run a little small but I was able to still zip up in my normal size. Also I didn't have to wear a bra with it either.

links_Review_Title: This dress was horrible. Did not look anything like the picture.
links_Review_Text: The fit was horrible, the sizing was all wrong. I am returning this before the event, as I had to make other plans. There is NO way I am going to wear this dress in public.

links_Review_Title: Lovely color and warm dress for a chilly outside wedding.
links_Review_Text: The dress does run small around the hits and the shoulders. I made it would but couldn’t really raise my hands lol

The dress was very pretty, but did not fit. It ran small and the length from shoulder to under the arm was not big enough to fit correctly. The whole top did not sit right when put on. The color was gorgeous though and the cut was just like the picture. I wish it fit because it seemed like a real show stopper.

links_Review_Title: This was a fun dress for a fancy-ish winter wedding.
links_Review_Text: It runs really small--consider sizing up one or even two sizes.
This dress was not made for my body type. I could have sized up to the highest size and it would not have fit. You must be taller than average and slender to wear this dress.
Beautiful dress, high quality. Runs small so I couldn't wear it! Would recommend ordering one size up

Couldn't get this zipped. My daughter and are the same height and size (she's 17) - but post children my rib cage has never been that small again. It fit her like it was sewn for her. I couldn't get it zipped. Super sexy and classy.

links_Review_Title: I loved the dress but unfortunately it ran really small.
links_Review_Text: It had a nice heavy fabric and the color was beautiful it just ran really small. The dress didn't have any stretch to it at all. I normally wear a 14 to 16 so I ordered a 14 but I couldn't even get it passed my thighs. I would say it fit more like a size 8 or 10.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but couldn't wear the dress for her event.
links_Review_Text: My daughter got 2 sizes (8 & 10) and both ran small. She usually wears a size 8 but does have a wide back/shoulders and big boobs, so maybe she should have gotten another size up. It fit everywhere else, just couldn't get it zipped. Unfortunately, for me it was a waste of $63.
Beautiful dress. Unfortunately I was not able to wear it. My back is broad and the zipper would not go up.

This fits a little more petite than other dresses of this size. I didn't think I had that long of a torso! I do have a semi-large bust. 32 DDD. I'd suggest sizing up. Since it didn't fit I couldn't wear. Gorgeous color and fabric.

links_Review_Title: The wedding itself was beautiful but was unable to wear the dress :(
links_Review_Text: I was unable to wear this dress because of the fit - the hips and torso was fine but the shoulders were too large and the dress ended up looking very disproportionate.
Perfect top for spring. Wore to Easter.
A little inconvenient for everyday wear but perfect for a night out or party. So fun

links_Review_Title: Cute top, but not easy to move in
links_Review_Text: This top is super cute! The fabric is lightweight and not too hot. The details like the sleeves make it special. It is a bit short, I was able to tuck it in to my high waist jeans. The elastic sleeves and the off the shoulder style make it hard to move in. If you need to dance or move, it's not the best option.
Fit well, wore without a bra for better fit.
Got this top for a photo shoot. Based on other reviews, I sized up. It was perfect for me (usually a S but here wearing a M)! Such a standout piece. Highly recommend as long as you size up.
Great fit. Looks nice and super fun

links_Review_Title: Cute top for a summer event
links_Review_Text: Fit well, nice material, many compliments!
The material was light, crisp and fit perfectly. The sleeves and shoulders were not bothersome to me and stayed in place during a full day of backyard parties. The length of the shirt was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Wanted this to work, but not functional
links_Review_Text: I was a bit disappointed by this shirt for a few reasons. 1) It wrinkles very easily, 2) the sleeves are huge and you need to essentially hold them back in order to eat, and 3) the neckline doesn't easily stay off the shoulder. It's cute for a photo opp, if you can control the 3 things I mention, but I found the shirt to not be very functional.

I really liked this for a warm spring weekend in Austin. It’s lightweight and roomy without being like a tent. I sized up to the medium based on other reviews and was glad I did as the should area is really tight. The elastic part was uncomfortable to start off with and I almost didn’t wear it but it loosens throughout the day. The sleeves do have volume but are not overwhelming. If you really don’t like having to adjust your clothes this might not be the top for you but it’s very cute!

This top is a real stunner! Did the fabulous sleeves make it tough to eat dinner? Yes. But were they worth it? Hell yes. My only complaint is that the top fits a bit snugger than I'd anticipated. it makes the shoulder elastic bunch up a bit. I'm pretty narrow up top so it wasn't a huge issue, but I'd size up if you're worried about that region.

Light weight and soft fabric. But the fit rode up on the shoulders and the elastic on the arm was tight. Wore it out to dinner and kept pulling it down. Maybe would fit better with someone that has a smaller chest. Wouldn't rent again.
Comfortable and elegant! What more is there to say!

I usually wear a medium, but based on other reviews, I opted for the Large in this. It fit just fine, but it wrinkles easily when worn. It came in very wrinkled, so I did have to steam it. Did not receive a ton of compliments like some of my other items.

links_Review_Title: Sleeves a bit tight but cute
links_Review_Text: I rented this for vacation in Vegas and it was pretty cute. The elastic part of the sleeves is pretty tight and I was worried when I put it on that I would be uncomfortable all day, but it didn't really end up being an issue. It's also a little short, but I just did a french tuck in the front of my white jeans. Looks really cute in my photos!

I am usually a small but only a medium was available to rent and wow -- i cant imagine how a small would have fit. this was SO tight over my chest and on my arms. i would not be comfortable wearing it for even one evening out so i returned. i should have known since many of the other reviews say the same thing.

This top was so cute when I first put it on, but if you're planning to move around much you're going to need fashion tape. It has no elastic like other off the shoulder tops so it doesn't really stay up and bags out on the chest quite a bit if you're leaning forward. I wore it once to give it a whirl but by the end of the day I couldn't wait to take it off and send it back. Sadly I won't be renting it again...
This shirt fit very well around the arms and chest, and was extremely cute to wear. Unfortunately it was a little short on my torso, so I did not wear this.

links_Review_Title: I'VE RENTED TWICE, AND VERY HAPPY WITH BOTH TOPS, THEY LOOKED NEW,AND IT'S JUST SO EASY TO DO.
links_Review_Text: FIT GREAT, LOTS OF COMPLIMENTS, LOVED IT
Very cute. I would size up.
It was cute but a bit short and I felt like I was tugging at it all evening. I don't think a bigger size would've helped.
I love this feminine looks. Fits amazingly and is perfect for spring.
The fit was bulky and at the same time tight is strange places. The sleeves bunched with any movement and it was incredibly unflattering. Would not rent again.

links_Review_Title: Fun top with statement sleeves and an on-trend style. The fit was good and it went well with white
links_Review_Text: This top was great for eating out on vacation. would rent again
Love! Love! Love!! Just suck a simple seersucker (without the puckering in the fabric) with the most adorable pleated bell-sleeves! Paired up with white jeans- it's the perfect ensemble!!
Great fit! Sleeves are huge so tricky with dinner but loved it anyway

This blouse looked really cute with white jeans and a pair of wedges. I wore on vacation and received many compliments. The sleeves make a statement. I would size up, as the blouse is a tad tight around the shoulders and chest. Overall, a great rental.
fit nice and was flattering
Everyone from my friend's new girlfriend to my boyfriend's mom loved the top. Works for many occasions too.

links_Review_Title: Cute top for a night out or date.
links_Review_Text: Cute with white jeans.
Fun and flirty. Photographs well
This is cute top but beware of the tight sleeves and wrinkles.

I love the overall look of this top, it was just really snug in the chest on my...I ordered the L because I usually wear a 12 or a large, apparently this brand must run really small! I think if you are a 10, the large should work fine!
it was too small

links_Review_Title: Great "snappy casual" top. Perfect lunch top. Went great with white jeans and denim.
links_Review_Text: Great sleeve, I have a short waist and this hit right at the hips (I'm about 5'4). May be more of a crop on someone tall with a longer torso.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments and felt great in this shirt!
links_Review_Text: This shirt fit me great! Some commented this shirt was too short, but I am fairly short waisted so it fit me perfect. Got so many compliments on this at 2 different parties and would buy it if it was a little cheaper!
Very nice top but runs small. I would have enjoyed it more if I had worn the large even though I normally wear a small or medium.

links_Review_Title: Cute top - wish it fit better!
links_Review_Text: The other reviews were spot on - the sleeves are very uncomfortable and didn't stay in place. I didn't end up wearing this top.
This top was really fun. While the small fit, the elastic parts were a bit tight on my shoulders and forearms. Thia had just thr right amount of drama

links_Review_Title: Fun trendy top but ill fitted for me
links_Review_Text: Beautiful lightweight top that makes you feel effortless & put together but the shoulders run small

Fitted and true to size with minimal stretch. Wore to a dinner in Florida. Loved the material... satin like but not shiny. It was a chilly night so layered with a motorcycle leather jacket. Received many compliments. Overall very flattering but if you have a little pooch (like I do especially after I eat) size up.

OK, I know that Amelia and RTR are girls have recommended this dress, but I just have to weigh in. I love that you can tie the straps up top as tall as he would like them. The dress was really fun to wear, comfortable, and just the right amount of sex appeal for Palm Springs!
Unfortunately I could not wear this due to the dress being damaged. Slightly loose but in general, true to size. Very thin and light (so if it's warmer weather, it's great). Just really fun!
I wore this to my brother's beach wedding. I have never received so many compliments on my clothing. The dress is so flattering and comfortable!
This was a perfect look for my vacation in Kauai! Loved the style, but would definitely recommend sizing up. I'm normally a 4 and the 6 was borderline snug.
It was too long on my short body but the cutouts surprisingly worked on me so wasn't terrible. Absolutely beautiful and unique dress. Would look better on a taller girl.

Adore this dress and wish I owned! I love how you can adjust the straps. I was worried the bottom of my boobs would be showing through the cutouts in the dress but being able to adjust the straps made it so that wasn't an issue. I normally wear a size 0 or 2 and the 4 was the right fit for me.

links_Review_Title: Unique and fun for a wedding in Mexico!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a destination wedding in Mexico and it was a hit! It did not fit perfectly, was loose in the tummy and lower back area, I am a bit curvier on my bottom half! But with some tweaking and double sided tape I made it work and the outcome was better than I anticipated. The cutouts and vibrant pattern/colors made for a fun piece to wear to this wedding and would definitely recommend for summer or warmer climate events you may have!
I absolutely adored this dress! It's so unique and was really fun to wear. The chest part was a little large on me as I have a small bust but otherwise it fit like a glove. Got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: The colors are so beautiful for a wedding in the fall.
links_Review_Text: The fit was pretty true to size, I am 5’1 so I expected it to be long, but with platform shoes it was perfect. There was some under boob, bc I wear a 32 DD, and the under arm was loose. If you fix the ties it will be great. All in all, I loved it and got a lot of compliments
I had to iron the dress and straps upon arrival, strapless bra shoes through the cut out but overall flattering shape and fit. Got lots of compliments!

Really so happy I decided to rent this. The print is so different and really just stands out from everything you see in stores. When opening the package I knew the 4R would be better just because the 2 looked tiny! The adjustable tie straps really helped as it made the chest tighter and more secure. Really comfortable dress I don't have any complaints! Would definitely recommend.
Received a million and one compliments on this incredible dress (both in person and on the gram) 10/10 recommend

links_Review_Title: Fab prints but sizing is a little off
links_Review_Text: I went with the smaller size of my rentals. The top and bottom around the hips ran a little big while the cross cross area was super tight. It was also hard to sit down in especially in the sun for the ceremony. The dress is silky . Lastly you don't need a bra because you can tie the straps to make it tight. Looked good in pics. Wouldn't rent again but I did like it

I ordered this dress in 4 and 6. 4 was great except around the bust wouldn't zip so I had to opt for the 6 which felt a little big around the hips but I made it work. Definitely glad I got two sizes. I felt beautiful and comfortable the entire night and got more compliments then I can count! This was hands down my favorite dress I've ever worn!

I absolutely adored this dress and would have definitely purchased if not so expensive. It's a really fun unique style and the cut outs make it surprisingly sexy. If you're in between sizes maybe size up. The material is light and lost so great for outside events.

links_Review_Title: Fun and flirty dress that received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Little loose around the bust, but fit perfectly else where. Slightly awkward straps, therefore I preferred to tie them into bows and it looked fine.

This dress is light and airy. Definitely not too hot if you have to be outdoors. I am glad I went with a 6R as a back-up. If you have a larger bust, go a size up! The 4 fit perfectly on the waist, but I am a DD and it wouldn't zip around my chest. I wore a small black band around my waist because I didn't want my skin exposed for my stepdaughter's wedding. I am only 5'4", so this went to my ankles. It was perfect for her Navy and Sunflower outdoor ceremony and indoor rustic chic reception. I am taking a star off because the shipping was an issue and I had to drive two hours round-trip to get the dress because it did not arrive when it was supposed to and had I not gone to the UPS facility to retrieve it, I risked not having it for the wedding I was attending.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so beautiful and unique! It runs true to size, but I would not recommend it for someone with a larger chest. I normally wear a 4 or 6, but opted to wear the 6 since the 4 smushed my chest down so much. My only complaints with this dress were that it began to wrinkle at the lap area almost immediately upon sitting down, and about an hour into the wedding reception the seam in the back of the dress tore. I'm not sure if my dress was defective or what, because I wasn't dancing aggressively nor was the dress too tight in the slightest. Other than that, I loved this dress!

links_Review_Title: wore this for a 40th birthday party and received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly

This dress was perfect! I got so many compliments on it ! I am 5’6, about 125 pounds and fairly straight build and the 2R fit great! Everyone could not stop talking about my dress! The only draw back to it was that it was a little hard to dance in at the wedding because the dress doesn’t stretch at all, but it was so cute it didn’t matter to me! If you are worried about the size I would get your true to size and then the size up too. For me it was true to size!
A little long in the torso (a petite problem) easy to adjust ties. Comfortable fabric

*Loved* this dress. Felt fun and feminine with a modest edginess. Had been wanting to try Alice McCall for a long time, and while I had concerns about the bust situation from other reviews, thank g it worked! I am fairly narrow so even though I am roughly a 32C/D, there was some extra fabric around the bust near my underarms but my hair hid it. I would 100% recommend

links_Review_Title: Stepped out of my comfort zone with this one!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a polo match. Although this wasn't my first choice, I'm glad I went with it. The print of the dress went with the theme of the event. Florals/bright colors. Although this wasn't my first choice, I'm glad I went with it. Received a ton of compliments. The dress fit a tad bit loose in the stomach area, probably could have sized down if I wanted a tighter fit.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a summer wedding! If you want a unique dress that no one else will have- this is it ;-)
links_Review_Text: It was a little big in the hips but that wasn’t noticeable with design, and I still felt that it was very slimming. If I got a smaller size it may not have worked on the bust. The material is very light and almost silky, felt very comfortable all night.

links_Review_Title: The dress was very fun and form fitting. Beautiful colors and details.
links_Review_Text: Very form fitting, but it runs true to size! I recommend it.

This dress got alot of compliments! The pattern and cutouts truly make it unique. It's a bit large in the bust and not much adjusting to be done with the tie-up straps, so if you're smaller up top like me, be sure to wear a padded strapless. Overall, really loved!

This dress was amazing. If you have big boobs or big hips this dress is not for you! I was able to use some fashion tape and make it fit perfectly! I got a million compliments. I'm usually a 2 or 4, and i went with the 4 to have a little extra room in the hips!

This dress is true to size and an overall great fit. Im short waisted, so pulled it up a bit to show less skin. I got tons of compliments! It does wrinkle a bit when sitting, but not a big enough issue to warrant any hesitation.

links_Review_Title: An amazing dress that was sexy, fun, and flirty!
links_Review_Text: Such a great color! I wore this to a cocktail hour on a rooftop with live music. there's not much stretch is this, so if you're curvy, it's better to buy it to fit your butt/thighs/hips. the straps at the top tie so that you can adjust the fit in the breasts.

This dress is really lovely! I am usually between a 2 and 4 and the 4 fit perfectly. The straps are tied and can be adjusted but it does show some cleavage. Can be dressed up with heels/accessories for a formal event.

links_Review_Title: Made an effortless statement! Loved the fit!
links_Review_Text: Length was a bit longer but I'm short so all good!

links_Review_Title: Terrible fit for normal size C bust
links_Review_Text: This dress did not fit in the bust area so badly I had to send it back and was left scrambling for a dress to wear for a cross country wedding. I would not recommend. Fit everywhere else as a 6. I am not sure who would be a 6 who could fill this out. I am a size C bust.
A bit awkward on the boobs but I made it work. The material is light and not stretchy but very flattering overall and the patterns are unique and beautiful together.
This was the most comfortable, beautiful dress. Size up, it runs very small.

I wanted to love this dress! It's so unique. It fit like a glove and was true to size but very tight/form fitting. The shoulder ties allow you to adjust the torso but unfortunately the side cut outs hit me at an unfortunate angle on my side boob area and my fat seemed to ooze out through the sides - I find cut outs right above my waist to be flattering, and these are a few inches above. I could probably have body taped them down if I wanted.

This dress is just so cool. I loved wearing it. It is tight in the butt area but I have a bubble butt so maybe that is why? the material did not give much at all and actually ended up tearing a little bit at the slit from dancing. I want to buy it though!

links_Review_Title: cute comfy wore. can wear strapless
links_Review_Text: needed pressing, but print hides wrinkles well

links_Review_Title: Unique print that will get you compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: The dress is gorgeous and truly unique. Due to the straight cut and material (it has NO stretch) if you are a bit hippy or fuller on the bottom you may get some fabric bunching in the hip/stomach area. The cut outs were fine and forgiving for me. I am not very full in the chest so that was not an issue for me, but I could see how if you were it would be less than flattering. I could not wear a bra and did not require pasties. The straps are adjustable which helps with the placement of the cups and cutouts. My dress appeared in decent condition and wasn’t super wrinkled. Over all I love the dress, I got SOOOOOO many compliments on the style and it is unique and fun for any cocktail/formal event.

links_Review_Title: You need to be tall for this pretty dress- 5'4" doesn't give enough height for the proper flow.
links_Review_Text: The dress is gorgeous. Petite ladies need to pass on it.

This dress looks better 'on' than in photos. It's one of the most luxurious feeling fabrics I've ever felt. It's like silk sheets on your body. Lol I loved how it opened in the front as I have a 4 month old & was needing to nurse him. I also found the open back to be very sexy in as tasteful & elegant way. I could def see myself ordering this again in the future.

Fit thru waist perfectly (true to size), but was really long on my 5'3" frame and the back did a gaping, blousy thing that made the front look frumpy. I suspect if I was 3 inches taller, and more than a small-sized B cup, this dress would've been a stunner.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric, but fit is not flattering
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric but it's a strange fit. The bottom flows perfectly, but the top is so oversized that it's just not flattering.

This dress is gorgeous and is very comfortable! Make sure you have a safety pin for the chest and likely some fashion tape too. Its a thin (not see through), and is slinky so it moves around, best to have some help to keep things where they need to be!

links_Review_Title: It's a beautiful dress. My 2nd time renting it.
links_Review_Text: No cons, all pros.
Very beautiful dress. I wore with a turtleneck under it to work. It would be lovely for a date or something formal. Would rent again
This dress is MASSIVE up top. Avoid/be aware smaller chested people! Could not wear.

I rented this dress to wear on my vacation in Costa Brava, Spain for a nice dinner out but I ended up wearing it in the daytime and I've never felt more confident in my life! The weight of the fabric and the shape of the dress in combination with the way it flowed with the air was magical. I am in love with this dress!!!!!

It doesn't photograph as good as it actually looks! I love this dress so much. Not only do I feel like a matador (objectively amazing look), I also feel super chic and ready for a European vacation. Love the "pirate shirt" vibe (Seinfeld was ahead of his time!) and how it is voluminous but not overwhelming!

Was super excited to rent this one --I loved the movement and ivory color of the dress with the black ruffle detail! I wish the v-neck was just a little bit lower to be even more flattering up top, but definitely a good dress for fall or winter with a pair of tights and high boots.

I loved the drama and elegance of this piece! It's remarkable easy to wear for how much dress there is. I paired it both with knee high boots (pictured) and platform ankle boots. The ruffles and layers in the skirt move really nicely. Fits true to size.
A random man on the platform said "your outfit is really incredible ... I work in fashion" so there's that!

This dress is a STUNNER. A couple important things to note: 1) The actual dress has less black trim, it's been removed from the chest part. This is fine but just FYI. 2) This dress has an oversized fit, so size lower if you want it to be more fitted. Anyway, the fabric is gorgeous and flowy, I felt like a damn matador.
This fit large in the top but waist was ok. I can't believe this retails for over 1k the material feels very cheap. I felt like a colonial woman on the wing. Do not recommend
Gorgeous, feminine and felt beautiful!

Received so many compliments while wearing this dress but was not the biggest fan. While the dress moved really nicely the neckline was very high and made me appear stocky especially with the large sleeves. I would likely not rent again but it is perfect for day to night occasions

This dress had great potential to be really cool and different but there's so much fabric in the sleeves, it ended up looking like a costume on me. There's just too much going on, I returned it without wearing.

I was so stoked to rent this dress for everyday/work just based on the detailing alone. Normally, I stay as far away as possible from anything white (between coffee spills and pets, it's typically for the best), but I am so glad that I took a chance on this piece. It's actually slightly off-white in color rather than the stark white I was expecting, which was a pleasant surprise. The contrast ruffled details were super cute in person, too! The fit was actually very flattering, even with the oversized silhouette. The skirt is very flowy and was fun to walk around in. All in all, this is a great dress for work or everyday and I would totally rent it again for either or to wear out on a date.
Loved this jumpsuit. It runs small, mainly the torso is short so if you have a long torso or long legs (I have both), I would size 1-2 up.
This was the perfect jumpsuit for a friend's birthday dinner at a nice restaurant - followed by cocktails and dancing! I also wore it to work with a leather jacket. Super versatile and cute!
Size up for length if you're tall. This one was one of my faves!!
Pros: true to size Cons: I'm shorter so the straps were a bit large and created more cleavage than I prefer.

Loved this hot pink jumpsuit! I am short (5' 1") so I was worried the torso or length would be too long for me but it ended up fitting well! Torso was slightly long but nothing noticeable. I wore heels and it was perfect. Got so many compliments, love the hot pink color!
The fit was perfect! It is true to size and the color is amazing. The jumpsuit was comfortable and I loved the pockets.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a new kids on the block concert and got tons of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Only downside was when I had to use the bathroom. I always had to have help getting in and out of it.

links_Review_Title: fun and flirty but very chesty
links_Review_Text: good for a fun summer or spring outing a little tight in the hip and thigh area so bending down was weird. sitting is fine the straps were too long and if they were adjustable would be a would better for keep larger chests like mine in lol
got tons of compliments on this piece. It's super shape fitting so sometimes hard to bend over but it worked and looked great!

links_Review_Title: Rented to wear to a relaxed work conference to go from day to night.
links_Review_Text: True to size, fabric is a decent thickness, color is vivid, masks my pear shape, due to pant leg width can be worn with flats or heels

links_Review_Title: Fir really well. Not overly tight. Perfect amount of stretch
links_Review_Text: Received lots of compliments

Loved this hot pink jumpsuit! Fits true to size. Took this pic after 10 hours of wear. Held up well through out the day. I'd recommend this one for taller girls. I'm 5'7" with a long torso and it fit me perfect. Easy to get into. The trick is you have to step through the straps when you are putting it on. If you are trying to pull the straps over your head you are doing it wrong. For reference my measurements are 35-25-36 and the 2 was perfect.
I loved this jumpsuit! I wore it to a bridal shower & it was perfect. Also, the color is so fun!
First- the color is amazing! Second- it fit like a glove and I received a ton of compliments. Would definitely recommend renting.

I really wanted to love this jumpsuit but it just didn't fit right on me. The straps were way too long and I was fearful that my chest was going to pop out. Definitely not a good choice for smaller chests. The pockets in the front were awkwardly placed as well. It was a beautiful color and easy to move in though.
Great jumper! It was hard to get into. I wore flats with this jumper and did not need to roll up the legs. I recommend! Lots of compliments all evening.

I loved this jumpsuit! Wore it for the Mrs Tennessee America pageant! I wore it to my Orientation day!!!! (Also Placed 2nd runner up and have never dont a pageant in my life. FUN FACT) I cant decide if this was TTS ran small or was too large. Because I'm usually a 2/4 BUT, im 5'9.... and have large boobs. So, when it comes to a longer torso, it is a little small. I had to decide if I wanted to cover my top and have a those weird lines in my pelvis region.... (you know, THOSE lines) or would i rather show a lot of boob. BUT In the back it was a loose fit when it needed to fit a little more snug.... REGARDLESS it worked out well. To be safe all you tall girls out there... size up!!!!! I do know with the four my entire chest would've been exposed!!!
I've never been complimented so much on an outfit before! It was professional, yet made you stand out.

I loved this rental so much! I wore the 4R, which was a big snug and tighter on the top, but fit well everywhere else. (If it had been any tighter on the top, wouldn't have been able to zip it.) With the 6R, the leg would have been too long. Very comfortable and was a great easy outfit for a formal dinner! Love the color as well - it's beautiful!

I wore this to a babyshower and it was a hit! I received many compliments and was able to comfortably move about. I'm 5'9 so the 4R length was a bit short for my liking, however all other things were fabulous!

links_Review_Title: Loved the bright pop of color!
links_Review_Text: I love this jump suit! I rented the 2R size. I'm 5'3, slim but athletic, and small chested with a short torso. The fit on the legs was perfect! The jumpsuit hugged me comfortably in all the right places. Unfortunately, the straps were a little too long for my short torso/small chest... Nothing that double sided tape can't fix, though! The front pocket sometimes stuck out in a weird way, but again, minimal.

links_Review_Title: Loved this jumpsuit so much!! I got so many compliments on it
links_Review_Text: It was true to size. I have long legs and it was a perfect length.
Loved this so much! So fitting and perfect for spring

links_Review_Title: So comfortable! Fit me like a glove!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments and will definitely rent again!!
Truly flattering with a hint of sexy

links_Review_Title: I love the color. It's strong & memorable. And I'm a jumpsuit addict.
links_Review_Text: I wore this at this for a talk at a women in leadership event for Facebook. It was on point with the topic! I felt great. Only thing is I don't have the longest legs so I needed to fold it.

This jumpsuit was so much fun to wear! I'm 5'4 115 lbs, and wore the 2. I'm usually a 4-6 so this ran big, but sizing down was just perfect. Length was way way too long - and the straps were also - I used fashion tape to hem the pants a full 5 inches to get the cropped look - and the straps were hidden by my jean jacket! I never wear pink, but was invited to a pink ribbon fundraiser, so this was the perfect opportunity to rent something fun - I received compliments all day and would definitely rent again!
This curvy look was perfect for a party!

LOVED! Great color, nice material! The only pain was when I had to go to the bathroom-as others mentioned, you have to unzip and lift the straps over your head to get it down. Size up if you don't want it too tight, I wore a size 16 instead and I was very comfy, the straps were a little long, so I could have used some safety pins but other than that...no complaints!

I ordered the 6 because I was concerned about the length in the crotch. It fit comfortably, but it was less fitted and I probably could've worn my usual 4. The length came about 3-4 in. above my ankles. It has thick material so can get pretty warm in the sun. Oh yeah, the trick to putting this one on is to step into it with the straps behind you. Don't try putting them over your head.

links_Review_Title: Power color - statement outfit! And when you step into it the straps go behind you not in front :)
links_Review_Text: Loved this jumpsuit!!! Only ONE negative and that was the kangaroo pocket in the front - it is awkward and adds unnecessary material. I like pockets but this looks silly. Luckily you couldn't really see it depending on how I stood and you could use fashion tape to flatten it out. Other than that so many stares! The color was a bright fuschia and I was almost a little uncomfortable with the attention. The straps which some ladies that reviewed this didn't figure out - they go in the back when you step into it not the front and that is much more doable!! I am a 34B and with a push up strapless bra I felt like I had appropriate cleavage. The material is lined but not heavy and I wore it in 90 degree weather and was warm in the pants but it was worth it. I am 5'4" and length was perfect hitting right at my ankles. I'm also about 128 pounds 28 inch waist and 36 inch hips. I feel like the 4R was perfect with a fitted waist and only slightly tight getting over my hips but once in it it is very comfortable. I believe I am "short waisted" because so many jumpsuits hang way down in the crotch and this one did not - yay! My Husband really thought it was sexy and said "it was a neck turner". I would 100 percent Rent again.
Stretchy so it fits my pear shape! Love black halo

At first upon reading the other reviews I was a little bit nervous about renting it. But it fit amazing definitely shows off your curves it's good for petite people like me I'm only 5'1" it was a tad bit long but I was also wearing wedges so the pants didn't come fully down over the shoes and the straps were a tiny bit long but not much and I wore this without a bra. Actually wearing a bra it made it a lot tighter and I was perfectly comfortable going without it. It's a really fun jumpsuit and it's actually really easy to put on if you just step right into it and put the straps on kind of like a swimsuit then it's really easy and it's really easy to take off as well.
It is very difficult to put on, the straps are attached, you have to get them over your head. I almost broke my neck putting it on. It was impossible to go to the bathroom too.

links_Review_Title: I didn’t end up wearing it.
links_Review_Text: This is a beautiful jumpsuit however because of the way it crosses in the back, getting it on and off is nearly impossible! Go up a size!!
Bust runs small. Very cute though. Wish it would've fit.
Very tight around middle and hips.
I'm 5'9 and the jumpsuit barley fit in the torso. It definitely runs small. Cute color - I wish it fit, I feel like it would look really cute on someone 5'8 and under

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a beautiful Vegas wedding!
links_Review_Text: Loved the material of this dress! It was very comfortable and fit perfectly. There was even a little stretch in the fabric so the dress didn't feel tight at all. The dress is long, so my 3 inch heels were fine but 4 inch heels would have been perfect. Overall, great color, quality, and fit.

links_Review_Title: Great form, thick forgiving fabric, POCKETS, and comfortable dress.
links_Review_Text: Fun, versatile gown. Can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. This was actually a backup of a backup that I didn't expect to like but it won out!

I wore this dress for a Gala and it was great. I dressed it up with a chunky necklace and other jewelry. The dress was very comfy, great fit and pockets are a huge plus. The length was perfect for someone who is 5'3 and love the peek-a-boo leg. I would rent this dress again.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite RTRs yet!!
links_Review_Text: LOVED this dress and received so many compliments throughout the night! Perfectly flattered my waistline and has a flirty skirt to add personality. I am small chested and did have to wear dress tape under the arms to keep it "stuck", but it was a minor fix, I am 5'8 and due to the high-low skirt could have warn anything from kitten to 4" heels.

This was my first time to ever use Rent The Runway. I absolutely loved this dress. It is beyond comfortable, perfect length, sizing was wonderful and it has pockets! I loved getting to wear this dress!

links_Review_Title: This dress is absolutely gorgeous! Fit perfectly and made me feel beautiful.
links_Review_Text: A perfect fit. I'm 5'8" tall and knew I'd be wearing heels, so selected the extra-long. With my heels, the hem skimmed the floor perfectly. This dress was so beautiful, stylish and comfortable. I truly loved wearing it!

This dress was absolutely amazing. The material was high quality, it had pockets (!!!), and the slit made it easy to walk and dance in. Perfect for an outdoor winter wedding. I received tons of compliments and would definitely rent this dress again. I got both the 8 and the 6 based on the reviews and I wish I would have gotten the 6 and the 4 because the 6 was a little loose on the top.

links_Review_Title: A little too long for a petite girl.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'0 and with 3" heels this dress was still 2 " too long for me. I ended up holding the tail because a few people stepped on it. It was a great fit otherwise and was okay to wear without a bra. I really enjoyed wearing this dress.
Loved wearing this dress. Wore to a black tie wedding. Formal but comfortable and so fun to wear with the the high low hem and pockets. Runs big
Pockets are a major bonus. Length was perfect with 3 inch heels.

I struggle to find formal gowns that don't make me look like a hussie putting the girls on display so I loved this neck line and halter top. Understatedly sexy. I also liked that the slit was more than just a slit a more of a cut out to show off the shoes!

links_Review_Title: Dress That Can Be Made Your Own
links_Review_Text: This is an amazing base dress that you can really make your own. I am not a fan of my arms so I added a sheer sleeve garment underneath and everyone thought it was part of the dress. Bib necklace and booties- check. Sooo many compliments. Very plus size friendly dress. Wore a size larger than my street size - it was a little loose but nice as no Spanx needed for a change. I would definitely rent again.
I loved wearing this dress. I am usually a size 0 or size 2 and ended up wearing the 0, which was a little large in the chest. I received lots of compliments! I totally recommend renting this dress.

Dress was true to size. I'm 5' and even with heels was long on me as expected. But with it being shorter in front was very manageable. Super comfortable and loved the pockets. I received so many compliments! Probably my fav RTR dress to date!

I wanted a simple but elegant dress for a Black Tie Gala and this dress was a show stopper. Everyone had the typical long black dress so the Navy color and the modest slit to the knee really stood out in all the right ways! The flow of the skirt is amazing when you walk and the pockets are EVERYTHING!!! I'm 5'10" and 165lbs, I wore 3" heels and the dress was about an inch of the ground, perfect length, and I did not trip or step on it once!

links_Review_Title: Fantastic dress for larger sized woman
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to the USMC Birthday Ball and was comfortable all night. I normally wear 16-18 depending on the brand and wore this dress in a size 18. I'm 5'4" and got the regular length and it was just the right length without dragging on the floor. So happy I was able to have a lovely dress for the event and not have it collecting dust in the closet afterwards.
Fit TTS

links_Review_Title: Perfect formal dress. Classic and elegant.
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress. Perfect for a formal wedding. Fit perfectly. Loved the pockets. Didn't need to worry about tripping. Received so many compliments. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect and amazing.
links_Review_Text: Incredibly comfortable. Pockets were wonderful. I got lots of compliments. HIGHLY recommend. I'm a solid 4 for dresses and it fit perfectly. 5'8" and the dress landed a half inch from the floor when I wore 3.5 inch heels.

links_Review_Title: Too big, loved the pockets, very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: This dress was amazingly comfortable. It's light weight and breathable while still looking formal. The pockets are a definite perk. I am often between a 20 and 22 depending on designer. I ordered 22 because that's all they had and it was definitely to big. I think I could have done definitely a size 20 but possibly even an 18. This dress is gorgeous and comfortable but do not be afraid to get a smaller size. I have a large busy and there is plenty of room.
Wore this for a black tie wedding and it was so comfortable. The pockets are great and loved the high slit. Was a little loose in the top- I'm a 36D. Length was great- I'm 5'10
I love this dress! It was super comfortable and very flattering (I'm post partum and still getting my body back lol). It reads a touch casual for a black tie event but can be dressed up or down.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Wore with confidence!
links_Review_Text: Loved the neckline and the pockets. Dress was flowy and hid curves but still sexy and elegant. Loved the shorter section in the front which showed my sparkly silver shoes. I will rent this again!!

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect! It fit true to size with me being 5'9 I wore a 4L.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I am 5'9 and usually wear a 4L or 6L size but I wore a 4L and it fit like a glove. The slit was also very cute in pictures and made for a unique dress. This was worn to a ball and I wore light gold shoes with it. I would definitely rent in the future.

Loved that this dress could be glammed up even more with the right pair of heels... and the pockets are EVERYTHING! Heavier fabric was also a plus with this gown which allowed for just a slight give- ultra comfy!

links_Review_Title: This dress was entirely elegant with fun flairs.9
links_Review_Text: No cons really, the dress has a bit of stretch and pockets and worked well in length with heels on.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit, and POCKETS!! Really great dress for a wedding or event.
links_Review_Text: Really beautiful details on the dress. Got a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a black-tie optional wedding
links_Review_Text: This dress fit perfectly and was so easy to wear. The asymmetrical hem made it very easy to walk and dance in and keeps it from being too boring but still very classic. The pockets are awesome to keep your phone and lipstick in but don't bulk up the dress. The top was a little too big (to be expected given my small bust) but still the fit was snug and form-fitting. Highly recommend if you want a classic dress with a little flair.
Beautiful dress...very simple. It was my backup. The top was way too large for me. It was my normal size 6, but I think you would have to have a very large chest to make it work... and I don't.

links_Review_Title: Heavy enough to feel substantial but light enough to be ultra comfortable! LOVED this dress!!
links_Review_Text: PROS - Great fit that would be flattering to many different body types. Very versatile and easy to wear. Can accessorize and style in so many ways. The dress but simple, but not boring. The pockets were amazing. Love a good pocket. CONS - None.

links_Review_Title: I am 6 feet tall and the long was way too long. Too much fabric, heavy.
Loved it. Toes the Professional/Sexy line perfectly.
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress to wear to a work-related award show. It was a great fit and the fabric felt totally luxurious. Plus the pockets were great to stash a lipstick in. I was on the fence between the regular and long lengths and at '5 8" I was just on the line between the options. With three inch heels it came just a tiny bit past the floor and I think it worked pretty well. Personally I think I might prefer the regular length but I'm terrified of tripping on stairs in fancy clothes.
Bummed I didn't get a pic but this was stunning and so comfortable. Love the pockets of course. Size was dead on. Definitely needed high heels for the length of the dress.
Great dress, a little long - plan on higher heels.

links_Review_Title: A New Year's Eve wedding needs an unforgettable dress... this navy knock out was a winner!
links_Review_Text: This dress was spectacular!! The fabric felt luxurious and the pockets were exceptional. LOVE it!! I felt glamorous and chic... which is awesome for a 41 year old mom of 4. I may even order it again ;)
I added extra spot to rent this for a wedding. The 8 was a perfect fit, as designer can run big. Absolutely Gorgeous dress, I was given compliment of "stunning!"

Fit true to size, perfect length for someone who always has trouble finding a short enough dress (5’4” and with ~3 inch heels this came just above the floor). Slit in front was great, as were the pockets.

links_Review_Title: I had so many compliments on this dress, and I had the perfect accessories to match!
links_Review_Text: Pros: POCKETS! Cons: Needed to wear taller heels to avoid dragging on the floor
I ended up wearing my smaller backup size because the fit was so good. Great pockets and really flattering cut!

links_Review_Title: Wore it, loved it, husband told me to buy it.
links_Review_Text: Great dress if you are into the boho, looser fit. It was perfect for a Midwest winter wedding (chosen for style, not warmth!) but could be worn to any event in any climate. Versatile and flattering. Fit exactly as expected. You won't regret this rental!
This dress was a little short waisted on me.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with the pattern and shape.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress as a fun way to brighten things up as the days grow darker earlier as winter is approaching. But the top kept falling down throughout the day and my bra was showing at work. Had to put tape on so I would stop flashing people! That's why I gave it 3 stars. Otherwise I loved this dress.
Beautiful colors. Fit great! Came new with tags on. Comfortable and flouncy.
Very feminine. Nice fabric. Very comfortable

links_Review_Title: Flattering fit but get ready for the static
links_Review_Text: Super cute. Versatile. Great for work, date, night out. Could work for all seasons. Might buy this one !
The colors are vibrant and you can wear biker shorts underneath without lines showing (and without worrying about flashing anyone). Felt very festive.
Super comfortable but watch out for the static in winter.

The dress is stunning. The material is so glistening and soft. Unfortunately, it did cling to me, a lot. I had to keep watering it so it would separate itself from me. I really like the overall look of this dress and especially the unique print, would probably rent again!
I wore this for a family dinner, and it was comfortable but felt dressy. The bodice is a little awkward--the fabric and print fold over in an unusual way. Still, highly recommend.
I wore this for a wedding welcome party. Even though it's not a maternity dress it was great for a small bump. I have a short torso so it gapped a bit up top but I used fashion tape to make it work!
I rented this dress for a bridal shower when I was 5 months pregnant. It was very comfortable and flattering. Got tons of compliments. The length was perfect and I am short.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, runs large, not super flattering for maternity
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for two occasions and wore to neither (rehearsal dinner and my baby shower). The dress is gorgeous, flowy and lightweight. I rented the size 2 at 7.5 months pregnant and it fit great (pre-preg 5'5 120 lbs) but lost out to a dress that was a little fancier for the dinner given I was in the wedding party. Kept as a baby shower contender but at 33 weeks, just looked a little too matronly on from the side. Wish I had rented earlier in my pregnancy to avoid the tented look from the side and will consider for next summer while not pregnant!

As the title says, this dress was fine, but didn't do anything special for me. The way it hung made it appear that I had more belly than I do. Definitely a good non-maternity maternity dress. Great light material. More sheer more than I would have liked too.
This really accentuates the bump if that is your thing!
The material is high quality and it flattered my figure. It didn't show a lot of cleavage which I appreciated. I felt very feminine in it, and it ended up being the perfect dress for Easter.

Wore this at 35 weeks for my baby shower. Fit my bump perfectly but the twisted shoulders kept having to be adjusted. It was also an odd dress to get into. But other than that received so many compliments! It's a very dark navy and although the material on the hanger looked see-through it wasn't at all.

I found this dress to be extremely comfortable and it fit well over my 34 week baby bump. Pre-Pregnancy, I was a steady size 6, and the 8R of this dress worked perfectly for me in the 3rd trimester. I probably could have gotten away with a size 6 up until week 30. It's perfect for spring and definitely multi-functional - I did get a lot of wear out if it. Within my month rental period, I was able to wear it to work a few times, to church, and to a date night out to the theatre: easily dressed up or down with different shoes and cardigans. That said, it does have a few slight flaws: you have to wear a cami. It is SO low and I would have been completely hanging out if it. The the skirt isn't lined and the fabric is a bit thin. Yet, there are so many pleats that it seemed not to be too see-through (so much fabric to hold getting in and out of the car!). I'm not used to wearing longer dresses but I like that this hit me mid calf but didn't seem too frumpy. I'm sure this dress is adorable with a flat stomach also (given it's not actually maternity attire!)
Size down! Definitely better for someone with a larger chest. Cute dress but had to return as the top half was too large and hung very low on me.
Paired with leather high heel boots and leather motorcycle jacket. Flowy and beautiful. Very sheer but I wore it at night
Beautiful dress. Had to wear a bra that had some coverage but other than that this was a great dress. Especially at 6 months pregnant. I would rent again even when. It pregnant.
A little lose in the chest area which had me adjusting frequently throughout the day. For this reason did not wear more than once but was a cute and easy maternity option.
Fun dress for a night out -- a bit too low cut and loose up top for work.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a hot summer day
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a September wedding that ended up being a humid, 88 degree day. The dress lining is very light, making it a great choice to stay cool. The pleating on the dress was beautiful, and I loved the fit. It fits loosely under the chest, which make the profile look bigger, but looks great from the front. I definitely recommend!

I wore this to a bridal shower at 27 weeks pregnant. Very bump friendly, and super comfy. When I first took it out of the package I thought it might be see through, but don't panic-- when you put it on it layers and is totally fine.
Really enjoyed wearing this dress. As suggested in other reviews, I sized down. Loved the pleats. Excited to try the skirt version for work.

links_Review_Title: Love a dress I can wear with sneakers!
links_Review_Text: Small rip under the armpit when I received but you couldn't see when on. I wore a slip bc it's unlined/sheer in the sunlight. Comfy for my 5 month baby bump and easily wearable to meet friends after work.
The only thing I would change about this dress is bringing the hem down from below the breasts to the waist, so elongate the bodice. Other than that - worth the wear!
Really lovely dress. Lots of compliments. A bit loose in the waist and rib cage but it worked with the overall design just fine.

Liked the longer length & pleats. Didn't love the top section on me...had to wear a jacket to make it office appropriate. Low V at back. Didn't require a slip. Good for hot weather. Didn't wrinkle. Pretty, but not that memorable overall. Ran true to size unlike most Vince.

links_Review_Title: A pretty dress for a summer evening!
links_Review_Text: A little big at the bust and ribcage, but totally wearable. Could probably have worn a size down. Like another reviewer said, it is less formal than I anticipated, but I fortunately didn't need anything too dressy. Rented to wear to a friend's wedding, but ended up preferring the backup dress I ordered.

I rented this for a summer wedding, and it was exactly what I was looking for! It fit perfectly. I chose not to wear a bra although you could easily wear a strapless bra with it. It was light and airy and perfect for a summer wedding. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_Review_Title: Less formal than it looks in pics
links_Review_Text: Sweet summer dress! Can be worn with a low cut bra. The fit is more of an empire waist than I expected, giving the dress a more casual look than the pictures. The looser fit also makes it more forgiving, the 4 I rented could have been worn by a small-ish 6. The fabric does not wrinkle & I loved the midi length. A little sheer but I wore Spanx shorts. Wore it once with cream suede Addidas sneakers and another time with dressier sandals. Looked great both times!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful flowy dress perfect for a wedding or party!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Wore it to a rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. It was very flattering with a low cut top and a tea length, flowy skirt. I am 5'4" and about 125 lbs and pear shape. Wore a size 2 and probably could have worn a 0. Recommend getting your normal size as well as a size smaller.

Fit was perfect for me--I'd been worried about the bust in particular, but it was an ideal fit, and somehow slimming with the close-fitted back and drape of fabric (irl; the pics don't seem to do it justice). Very flowy skirt, perfect summer maxi dress and went well with a cardigan for work.
Lovely fabric, incredible fabric, worked well with huge bump! Doesn't have much give at waist though

Recommend sizing down. The overlapping/knotted fabric at the bottom of the v-neck and v-back adds a little bulk so probably more flattering if the fit is not loose, as it was on me. Great fabric, beautiful pattern, lots of skirt. Not my favorite, but probably would have liked it more in a smaller size.
Fit very awkward in the chest. I loved the flow of the skirt. It would probably look better on someone a bit taller.

The bold print and flowy quality of this dress were great! I found the arm holes a bit small which made it difficult for the straps to stay up - I found myself reaching to pull them up throughout the night. Overall, great dress!

links_Review_Title: Was listed as a maternity option but zipper wouldn't zip
It is certainly bump friendly and could work without one too. Most likely will be renting again!
links_Review_Text: Bump friendly

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing.
links_Review_Text: I rented this and it ran very true to size, however their is a stitch at the bust which is intended I am sure for modesty since this is a lower cut style. The stitch caused and odd fit of the dress itself. The back has a neat gather but it doesn't lay in a way that flattered me. I will be returning this without wearing.

links_Review_Title: The dress is exactly as it appears and was lovely for a date night.
links_Review_Text: The fit is slightly (but not overwhelmingly) large. I have a small bust, so this was where I needed a cinch.
Good fit for baby bump (32 weeks pregnant) but top ran a little small.
Super cute dress! I wore it for Father's Day dinner. It was perfect. Looked super cute and fit great and I'm 37 weeks pregnant! Loved it!
This is VERY shear. I received a lot of attention due to the fact that my assets were showing! Wear a slip or, perhaps, leggings underneath!!!
Nice loose flowy dress, easy to wear.
Loved wearing this, easy and comfortable. The pleats gather in the center a little too bulky. Slightly see through...
Good basic dress, not the most flattering because of the empire waistline, but good for work. Fits true to size, I typically wear a 4 in most brands, 6 in a few (Reformation, Mara Hoffman).

links_Review_Title: The dress was luxurious. Dressing up for a Broadway show was so much more fun with rtr!
links_Review_Text: The small for me perfectly around the waist. The neckline was definitely very revealing so I wore a black tube top underneath, just like some of the other ladies had done in the reviews. It was very comfortable. The only problem was that the shoulders kept sliding off, but that could be fixed easily with some safety pins, which I didn't think to do at the time. I wore this to a broadway show, and felt like a star. I really enjoyed wearing this!

While I got many complements on it, this dress didn't photograph very well. I felt like it was a little too tight on my stomach and wasn't flattering. It also is extremely low cut on top, I needed to use fashion tape to prevent a slip!

links_Review_Title: Overall great red dress - expect compliments!
links_Review_Text: I was nervous for the fit of this dress due to other women's reviews, but I ended up loving it! It wasn't my favorite rental, but I would still recommend it. It does show quite a bit of cleavage, so make sure you're comfortable with that. I did use dress tape just to keep it in place, but I'm not sure it's necessary. As a bonus, I did not have to wear a bra (even as a 36D). I have a wider waist and hips, so the fit was snug but not uncomfortable as long as you like form-fitting dresses. This was actually my back up dress but I'm so glad I chose it - I received an overwhelming amount of compliments both the night-of and from people who had seen the pictures I posted of us at the event! A great red dress for any formal event!
Loved it! It shows a lot of cleavage but everything else is covered up so I think it's a good balance. The color and the fabric are really gorgeous in person!

links_Review_Title: Easy dress but fitted at hips, thin fabric.
links_Review_Text: This was comfortable but too revealing for me in the tummy area so I returned it after trying it on. Smooth fabric, nice silhouette but I would have had to pin it or it would just be open. Not a fan of how the stitching wrinkles the fabric along the slit. Looks a little cheap. Tighter than I wanted at my waist and hips. Measurements in pic: 31in waist, 38 bust, 41 hip.

links_Review_Title: Cute formal dress... not for short girls!
links_Review_Text: Sry flattering dress, beautiful color... but if you are under 5'5 don't bother renting! With 3 inch heels, at 5'2" the dress covered my feet and draped on the floor. Very disappointed It didn't work out because it really is a beautiful dress.
Great dress fits well, a touch long as I am only 5'4 even with heels.
