The top of the dress was huge, I spent my evening refreshing my double-sided tape to make sure there weren't any incidents

I had a multicultural wedding to attend and this dress was a perfect blend of all the cultures involved. It was comfortable and fit in all the right places! Slit comes up when you sit but there's enough fabric to cover it up. I only had to wear tape instead of sticky boobs and never felt like the dress was ever too revealing. Overall, I have only praise for this dress!

I wore this dress to a holiday party and got a lot of compliments. I had to pin it because the front is VERY open. I was a bit uncomfortable, afraid if was going to open up at any minute. Still, I did like it.

Loved this gown and got tons of compliments throughout the night! It was very forgiving for my little pooch in the front but had just the right amount of sex appeal with the slit and plunging neckline. I'm on the busty side, so I definitely needed to wear something underneath so the cleavage wasn't too much. I wore a shaping slip underneath and it was perfect. Loved that I could still wear a regular bra too.
This is my favorite dress I've ever rented. It makes you feel beautiful. Stunning color. Only issues is that it's really low cut.
Gorgeous, but did not wear because I didn't fill out the chest portion

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! Perfect slit flair for a formal wedding!
links_Review_Text: Was true to size, no issues moving or dancing. Would suggest wearing fabric tape at the top to ensure everything stays in place!

I received SO many compliments wearing this dress. I wore it to a black tie wedding, and I stood out all night in a sea of black! It was the perfect dress. I'm 5'4 and wore two inch heels and the dress was a perfect length. I'm in between a size 6-8 and the medium was a little loose up top but otherwise fit great. Definitely invest in some pasties/backless bra.

Loved the dress, received tons of compliments. My only complaint is that it was a bit revealing in the chest, ended up getting boob tape, all of my bras would have shown otherwise. I'm short and always have issues with straps/tops being too large. I think if I was taller, it would not have been an issue. Other than that, the dress was extremely flattering and everyone loved it!
Material wrinkles somewhat easily and dress have a deep plunging neckline, especially when seated, but the overall fit was flattering and perfect for a fall wedding.
Not for a busty figure.
Ordered for a wedding but ended up being more formal than I needed. Fit true to size. Kind of low cut but I like that style.
Very tight at the waist and hips and large on the shoulders

links_Review_Title: A red dress for the American Heart Association benefit Ball.
links_Review_Text: Lots of compliments

It's ok and it happens, but this dress just couldn't cut it so I rented another one. I have small breasts and unfortunately the top was just way too big, especially compared to the bottom half which is true to size to almost too small.

This was my backup look for a wedding, and it was so pretty I wish I had something else to wear it to. I tried both the XL and XXL on, and ended up going with the XXL because the fabric was not forgiving at all. You could see what I ate for breakfast in the smaller size. The larger size had a bit of room, but still showed a bit too much detail for my liking even with that. Would have for sure needed some spanx with this ensemble.
This dress is best for someone who isn't hippy. I am, and the dress fit everywhere except the hip area. It's a shame, too, because the dress is gorgeous.
The top was loose compared to the bottom of the dress

links_Review_Title: Classy and comfortable. Got lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'10, 145 lbs. Fit well at waist, was gaping in the chest at a 32B. Would recommend double sided fashion tape at the lining if you're this size or smaller.
I ordered this as a back up and loved it on the hanger. It was too big up top for me to wear though. I'm a 5'8, size 8, 34DDD and the large was too big on the chest.

links_Review_Title: I like the dress but for a small chested person like myself the front just fell open
links_Review_Text: I am ten pounds above my normal so sized up with a medium

links_Review_Title: Got lost trying to get to the reception, but at least I looked good.
links_Review_Text: For my purposes, this dress worked out perfectly for the wedding I wore it to. Pros - the dress is very comfortable, has a nice thick fabric, and the slit wasn't too high and I didn't have to worry about flashing anyone. Cons - I was hoping to wear flats to this wedding, but the dress was a hair too long for that so I had to wear heels (I'm 5'3"). The only other thing was that since I'm a bit bustier at the moment due to breastfeeding, I had to wear a camisole underneath the dress. Not the end of the world at all, and it didn't take away from the dress, but no amount of dress tape would have worked.

I got so many compliments on this dress! The color is gorgeous in person and the fit is really graceful and modern. Perfect for a fancier party where you don't want to feel too sleeveless/exposed. I would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Love the dress, didn't great a good picture
links_Review_Text: fit was a little tight in the chest area. Biggest downfall was under good lights there was a large stain on the chest area on one side. didn't have time to get anything else to wear. I will check better next time!
This didn't fit me. Shows every roll that you have on your body

links_Review_Title: Great look but the deep V was too deep and I ended up fiddling with it the whole night
links_Review_Text: Cons: Too low cut if you have breasts Pros: Chic look

links_Review_Title: Prepare to show a lot of cleavage if your big chested.
links_Review_Text: This is a pretty dress, but the top does not cover well. If I was standing and not moving around then it was fine but if I was sitting or walking around it was falling open. I'm a 36D so I'm not sure if it would have done this on someone smaller chested like the model, but I had to keep my wrap covering my top for fear of my breast being exposed. I tried both the small and the medium and they both did this. I tried using fashion tape and that worked for a little bit but not long.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! I wore it to a gala and received tons of compliments. Comfortable and elegant.
links_Review_Text: The top was a bit big on me so I had to safety pin it. Otherwise it fit great!

links_Review_Title: I wear my friend's birthday party.
links_Review_Text: It was so gorgeous.

This was the complimentary back-up style sent to me. While I usually wear a medium, I sized down due to the looseness of the top, wanting a more fitted look. The small ended up being too small on the bottom and on top the sleeves fit weirdly and gapped in the back. Maybe for a different body type it would work. I sent it back.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous just a bit too big on me
links_Review_Text: Would wear again but a smaller size

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for our engagement shoot!
links_Review_Text: I felt so pretty in it!! I love how flattering it is even if it has ruffles. Only con i encountered was you can't really lift your arms 'cos the dress would look awkward as it would any other off the shoulder dresses. Wore 0, 2R still fits but it wasn't as flattering. Also you can get away without wearing a bra

This dress was truly amazing!!!! I had six other dresses from RTR that did not work for me, but this one was incredibly perfect! I have never felt more beautiful and feminine! I had so many people complimenting and asking where I got the dress! I would say it is true to size! I wear size 18 in real life and was so happy it fit my hourglass figure perfectly! I wore blue suede heels and the look was complete! I am 5'3" and with heels the train of the dress just touched the floor elegantly!

Words are not enough to deceive the way this dress feels once you put it on... It has a built-in bustier that helps keep everything in place at the top. Not to mention that the fabric feels and looks very luxurious. I danced salsa all night in this dress!

I was delighted with this dress. It is light and comfortable, soft and delicate, the print is interesting without being loud. It has a built-in corset that supports you and gives the dress great shape. Just be careful when taking pictures - the off-the-should ruffles can make you look like you are slouching. I couldn't have been happier with this dress otherwise. Wore it in a wedding party and danced the night away!

links_Review_Title: I received compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: I picked out this dress for my engagement party. I felt beautiful and it was so flattering on my hourglass figure. The dress has a built-in corset around the chest area and does not require a bra even for us girls with a larger chest. This dress has absolutely no stretch to it so if you are larger and the top area I would recommend going to size up to ensure you were able to zip it closed.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress for a rustic wedding
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress - perfect for a summer or early fall wedding. Built in mini-corset allows you to go braless. Material is light and so soft. Stunning!

links_Review_Title: This dress feels great and looks great.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I will be renting it again. It is smaller than expected and had two parts of the dress that rubbed under my arms and gave me red marks. Overall, I felt confident in this dress.

links_Review_Title: Great comfortable dress that gets a ton of compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress is great for those that have some extra weight in the midsection to hide like me. Very comfortable and hid all my flaws. Has built in padding and support so no separate bra was needed. I found this to run very true to size and I carry a lot of extra weight around my midsection. Highly recommend this dress. Definitely need heels if you are on the shorter side or else the dress will drag. I am 5'3". I'll definitely rent this dress again.

Beautiful, but size up if you're even remotely on the edge. I eeked into this 14, but it was a comedic tragedy. GIRL - a comedy of errors. Cut to me flapping around the apt with my head/arms stuck in the dress' boning and wishing for/dreading my boyfriend's imminent arrival home. Squeezed in to see how it would fall and cute enough that I'll size up (maybe 2) and give it a spin another time
The fit was great, I did not need a bra as there is a built in corset. The design with the frills is very forgiving!

links_Review_Title: Great fit and shape for full figured gals (like myself)
links_Review_Text: Flattering dress and fit snug in all the right places. Nice bodice and overall felt great to sit, stand, walk and dance in. Of course great compliments all night on it. It’s my third time renting from RTR and their team is awesome!! This was dress was sent to replace a dress they were unable to send to me. It worked like a charm!

I'm 5'6", 34c/d. The 4R was almost perfect, wore 4" heels and no issues with length in back. I say almost perfect since the fit was just a tad loose in stomach, bust was perfect, did not have to wear a bra with the built in support in dress. 6R was back up which I did not even try on since 4R was great.

links_Review_Title: Cute But Not For the Bigger Chested
links_Review_Text: Lots of compliments on the dress! But I couldn't zip it all the way up because of my boobs. Thankfully the ruffles covered it. Not a lot of give either but super cute!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for an outdoor wedding venue!
links_Review_Text: Great dress, good fit..inside bustle a big plus...no bra needed. The length (high -low) was perfect for either high or lower heel. I am 5'5 and went with a smaller heel because there was a lot of walking. Would look great with a stiletto as well. The quality was really great and the style was perfect to hide some body imperfections. I wore the 8, which is typically my size. I am 59 and didn't feel the dress was too youthful. Many compliments. Would rent this again, no doubt.

links_Review_Title: Made me feel pretty, my husband loved how I looked.
links_Review_Text: This is a highly structured bodice. Lots of boning, could be a little uncomfortable. BUT, the ruffles are forgiving of a tummy bulge, the off-the-shoulder look is also flattering and I like the high-low hemline, easy for dancing and not a warm as strictly long one. I got tons of compliments, from even normally not-observant male guests.

links_Review_Title: Beyond perfect for this special day ❤️💫
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit

This dress fit perfectly- sexy and flattering without showing too much. It is form fitting but very comfortable. The stays in the bodice were great and no bra was needed. The slit was perfect and made walking easy, depending on your height it may drag on the ground. I wore 3 1/2 inch heels. It was a great choice for a San Diego beach wedding!

I loved this dress! Wore for a summer black tie wedding. Honestly could have worn 8 or 10, there wasn't a big difference. It has a corset, but I chose to wear a strapless bra and it was perfectly comfortable. Straps stayed in place through lots of dancing. The ruffles were nice camouflage for the tummy area. The fabric was floaty and beautiful. I wish I owned it!

Gorgeous light dress perfect for a spring or summer event. I chose to wear this dress to a summer outdoor wedding and it felt just right for the occasion. The dress did seem to ride up (possibly due to the built-in corset) on both sizes I ordered so I chose to go with the lower size only because the larger size seemed to be too loose in the torso area. With a 3" heal it did not drag on the floor. Overall it was very comfortable and would order it again.

links_Review_Title: 12 was perfect. Dress is perfect for most occasions
links_Review_Text: Dressy enough for a wedding, cut and print can be more casual. I wore for the event the night before the wedding.

links_Review_Title: Dress that fit and didn't make me feel self conscience
links_Review_Text: Wore to brothers wedding. The 16 fit but was too tight zipper wise so went with 18 which gave me lots of breathing room but was a lil big at sides. Normally super self conscience of arms but the off the shoulder sleeve put me at ease. Compliments all night long
This dress was very slimming and flattering. The ruffles were lovely and not overbearing at all. Gorgeous silhouette

Beautiful dress, but definitely runs small so it rode up in the front and made it a little too short, and then I couldn’t zip it up all the way. I always wear an 18 or even a 16 in dresses sometimes, but this I would send back and try the 20.

links_Review_Title: This is the second time I have rented this dress (for different occasions). It's a dream! Stunning!
links_Review_Text: Fit is a bit snug at the waist, but keeps you looking lean and trim, the silk fabric - gorgeous, and the famous Badgley Mischka style and quality - impeccable! Received tons of compliments! Love this dress! I am tall, and the back low part of this dress was the perfect length with my kitten heel blush colored strapped sandals!

I absolutely loved this dress! Fits a little smaller, so I would size up, especially if your big chested like me. The dress is light and airy and stays in place without having to adjust it all night. It was very comfortable and I didn’t even need a bra due to the built in bodice. I’m tall and the length was perfect both with low heels and flats. I danced all night long and the dress stayed in place. Tons of compliments! Highly recommend! Love the multiple colors offered in this style.
I received so many compliments on this dress! It was comfortable and beautiful. Wore for my wedding day, which turned out perfectly!
Structured and a great way to highlight neckline and hide chubby arms. I'm only 5'2 but with 4 inch heels, the length was perfect.

The dress was a little long on me, but with some heels it was perfect (I'm 5'2). Hugs the chest area nicely and made my body feel shapely. Perfect for a fancy lazy dinner on vacay (without showing my gut lol).
Dress fit perfectly. Accented all the right things. Very feminine and loved the hi/low design. Wish I owned it!

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding in the spring and it was perfect! It was a unique look in a sea of black gowns, so I got tons of compliments. It's a super light fabric and the ruffles on the front hid all of my imperfections. It does run small because the top has ribbing, which is nice because it holds you in/stays put, but I am normally a 12 or 14 and the 14 was even a touch small, so definitely size up. All in all, I loved this dress!

I wore this dress to a wedding and it was actually chosen by a RTR stylist when the dress I chose became unavailable at the last minute! It fit true to size. It was a little tight around my shoulder, but I do have an athletic build. It also would probably be tight on someone with a larger chest. I am a 34b and it fit me perfect.

Rented this for my photoshoot during vacation. A bit long for my height (5'2") even with heels, but there's nothing you can't fix with a few safety pins.. Flowy, off shoulder trendy and supportive top- it was perfect dress for me.

So many compliments on this dress! The fit was perfect, the corset inside meant no bra was needed, and the material is so light and airy. Wore it outside to a wedding with 80+ degree temp and no sweat marks! Everyone loved it and asked me where I bought it ;-)

Fit pretty true to size, I got the four because the 2 was unavailable, it was a little big but not noticeable. The bodice is fitted which I liked. The dress was comfortable and easy to move around in. I wish I had more places to wear it, I wanted to keep it longer! I may rent again! Received tons of compliments!

I loved everything about this dress! It fits amazingly well. The fabric is light and springy but has a nice weight to it to keep it in place. I really hated having to return this dress. I really liked that the top has a built in slip to help it keep its shape. I am smaller in the bust, only an B cup, but somehow the silhouette didn't make it gap like some dresses do when you can fill it out. However there Is defiantly room for someone with bigger breast. I highly recommend this dress to everyone. I really think the ruffles help hid some my flaws but still showed off all my body. I got tons of complainants all day long. One down side I found with this dress is the length, it runs a bit on the longer side. I am 5'8" and still had wear 3 inch heels to keep it from dragging the ground. But please don't let that stop you from trying this dress on. I just can't express how much I really loved this dress.
#NCalWorkation

links_Review_Title: Most Beautiful Dress I've Ever Worn
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to prom- I wanted something that would be fun, flattering, but also unique. I'm not one to wear basic dresses, and this dress is original in the best possible way. I received SO many compliments and the dress fit like a glove. It was so comfortable and I didn't need to wear a bra underneath it- which is always a plus! I was so sad when I had to return it because this was one of the most beautiful dresses I've ever worn. Thanks RTR for an unforgettable night! I truly felt like a bohemian princess.

links_Review_Title: This is a gorgeous dress & I felt gorgeous in it! I would def. rent it again!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful! The design, pattern, colors, and cut are even prettier in person! I'm in between a 4 and a 6....I wore the 4 because it felt a little more flattering & was a tad bit shorter. I felt very pretty and feminine....was perfect for a Springtime wedding and I got tons of compliments!
Perfect fit, lovely print and fabric, gorgeous and flattering. Understated, soft yet eye-catching. Perfect for a wedding.

Wore this to a wedding and my growing baby bump was hidden under all the fun fabric. My only complaint (and it might be because of the bump) is that the built in corset sat at a weird place on my torso causing it to bunch up the zipper at the very bottom. Not a problem at all as there is so much going on with the dress no one noticed. I went with flats but the dress was meant for some fun heels. The sleeves were super comfortable, not cutting into my arms at all. No bra necessary with this one, and I was dancing all night!

I had to safety pin the slit together or else it would've been bra out for everyone to see. I usually wear a small top but probably could've gone a size down since there was extra material which is why it would open up without the safety pin. Once it was safety pinned, it was really cute and flattering and I got a lot of compliments!
I had no trouble with too much showing. I loved the feel and length. Love the cut. Not too snug around the neck. Will definitely rent again.
Wore it to a wedding and it was so comfortable! Only issue was that it was hard to get in and out of for bathroom breaks. Other than that, loved it! Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: This top was comfortable, yet dressed up a pair of white jeans. I received a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: It was a little short since I am long waisted. I wore a long black cami underneath. I hooked the straps of the cami with a holder.
This top brings a sexy vibe without showing too much and works on a Small breasted girl like myself!

links_Review_Title: Strangest fit ever. Nice material. Must be a huge giant to wear it.with perfect tits.

links_Review_Text: Keyhole opening s large - I needed to use fashion tape to prevent gaping
I don't have enough chest to pull this off. I love Parker, but this one didn't work for me.

I read other reviews that mentioned the need for a cami under this but it was too long from the neck to the waist. I would gap and flop open unless I was sitting/standing incredibly straight -which isn't natural. I never wore this & am sending it back. If you have a longer torso ( which I thought I had ) it probably will work for you.
Beautiful material and cut but I am Petite and it runs large. I ordered the smallest size available

links_Review_Title: Very cute top made with quality material. It was just too revealing for me.
links_Review_Text: The V-neck on this top is quite deep and opens as you move.

This top was very large for the size, especially in the bust area. I have a fairly full chest and still could not fill it out, as it was gaping at the sides. I would recommend ordering a size down and would not recommend for anyone with a small chest.

As noted for so many other renters; runs large and keyhole opens. I'm not small chested so I thought it might work, but it did not. I'm not sure how one would wear this shirt without having to pin the front.

As a petite, small chested woman there was no way this shirt would have ever fit. The opening in the front plunged down to my ribcage - and it also was sort of stretched in the front so it opened revealing my complete lack of cleavage (which is likely why this shirt didn't work for me). It was a really was a pretty shirt, stitched well with nice fabric, but it's a no for me, dawg....
Bust really large length too short
Couldn't really wear it, the keyhole and arm holes were far too large and my bra was showing no matter how I adjusted the top

links_Review_Title: Very large. Even with strapless bra..shows on sides.
links_Review_Text: Very large. Even with strapless bra..shows on sides.
Too big in bust area—would order size down
WAAYY too short. barely reached my waist. I am 5'9" but this could easily have been too short on a petite woman. Did it shrink?

links_Review_Title: Can't wear without a camisole, which ruins the keyhole
links_Review_Text: Way too open at the chest. I love my curves and am not afraid to show them, but this top leaves you fully exposed. I tried everything to make it work. Only a camisole solves it, but then that ruins the keyhole look. Returning without wearing.
Did not wear.
This was a very cute shirt, however I ordered a medium and it was too big, not form fitting.

links_Review_Title: Cut a little short all around
links_Review_Text: In the stock pictures I couldn't tell, but thought this was cut a little short on the bottom and top (as in any undergarments worn would be seen one way or another, so I did not end up wearing. They keyhole detail is made because one side wraps over the other, so there can be a bit of a gap.
This is a lovely top, material is thick. The torso for me was cut too short. Overall a great addition to any closet (especially those with shorter torsos).
had to pin it opened all night.
It was way too large to wear. Arms gaped.
I'm long waisted and this fit beautifully.

links_Review_Title: I'm not big enough for this.
links_Review_Text: Not for small chested women, you will need a bralette or something.
Great top but did not fit me, it was cut too low in front.

links_Review_Title: Nicely made, but runs very large
links_Review_Text: I love the material and the cut of the shirt, but it runs really big and the front gaped open.
Multi way bra is needed, especially if your are full busted.
Didn't end up wearing because it didn't work with my flat chest. It was good quality and cute but must have boobs to wear.

links_Review_Title: This top did NOT fit. Very awkward And big in the top.
links_Review_Text: It's way looser than it looks. You need a big chest and the right bra. Will definitely show lots of cleavage.
The open area is too loose, so it fits kind of awkwardly. Didn't end up wearing this because of that.
I like this top a lot. Not super tight but I liked the drape. It was sexy and flirty but also sophisticated.

links_Review_Title: I like the cut but needing safety pins
links_Review_Text: The flaps on the front have no security and my chest wasn't large enough to keep from exposing my bra at all times.

links_Review_Title: Good for party, tight around love handles tho
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear it as it was too tight around the love handles. Not super flattering

links_Review_Title: Perfect shirt to wear with high rise skirt or pants
links_Review_Text: I wore the shirt twice, with high rise colorful flare silk pants and once w a silk pink skirt. The material was great, and thick enough not to need a bra underneath.
Loved this top, but the keyhole can be a bit tricky if you're busty

links_Review_Title: Great fabric and style. Quality top
links_Review_Text: I wear a size 6 but I also am a 34D and this was big on me
I thought denim would be too heavy but it felt great! Wonderful fit and very unique! Loved it.
Second time ordering love the fit and very cute also looks great for any event

I rented for a trip to Japan and would highly recommend it for travel. It fits well and is fairly versatile -- I've tied it in the front and the back and also wore it open as a light summer jacket. It's got pockets which is fantastic for a dress! It's also at a good length for walking around in more conservative countries. It's on the heavier side in terms of material but I was able to walk around in humid low-high 70s weather without feeling crazy hot. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: Nice summer dress if you like feminine clothing
links_Review_Text: A little "girly" for my liking and felt like it made me look a bit bigger than I am as I'm only 5'6 but it made me look slightly stumpy. Overall a beautiful summer dress that is work appropriate.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a 4th of July class reunion. It was perfect for the event and for the weather!
links_Review_Text: Great material, flattering sleeves, easy to dress up with a few accessories.
Felt very comfortable in it and it's flattering.

links_Review_Title: Not for the long waisted or tall
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'10 so the pockets hit me right at the widest part of my hips making me look wider. I'd prefer no pockets and a firmer fabric. This is VERY stretchy. This would look fantastic on someone hourglass and about 5'6.

Super cute and comfy dress! Wore it to my brothers graduation, and was super comfy all day. The buttons and sleeves are a fun added touch, as was the tie in the back. The material was a bit heavy so it would be hot on a hot day! Highly recommend!
Really cool easy to wear denim dress. The tie lets you wear it as tight or loose as you want. Sleeves are more puffy than they look!

This dress's fabric has such a beautiful hand and weight to it. I wore a UK6 which was slightly roomy but I love an oversized fit. The tie at the waist is actually super flattering through both the waist and chest, I feel. I love the finish on the buttons as well. An overall lovely dress for work or daytime on the weekends!

I wore this half-buttoned over a pair of periwinkle blue wife legged jeans to travel in. It's the perfect travel dress in that it's comfy, stylish, and warm for the plane. Plus it took me from cold to hot climates and fit in both places.

links_Review_Title: If you want to be a stylish school teacher...
links_Review_Text: This dress has it all! Super comfortable, soft material, great color, stylish, and of course pockets! I wore this to a daytime work event where I had to run around all day and this dress allowed me to be everywhere and hold everything all while looking poised and put together. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Very cute even though sizing was off
links_Review_Text: This is a great work dress! It is flattering and very comfortable. The sleeves are aggressive but I liked them. My only complaint is sizing. I found that the top part ran TTS but the waist ran large. Not a huge deal because there is a tie, but I definitely had a lot of room in the waist, which made it slightly bulky. Could not have sized down, though, because the top fit perfectly.

Not your typical casual dress. It's thick but not as much as a heavy denim. Would be fine in all but the hottest summer climates. Looks great on and is tailored well. Lots of options for accessories given the denim look. Enjoyed wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Soft material easy to wear dress
links_Review_Text: Easy casual dress to wear on the weekend, comfortable material and didnt want to take it off.
Thick, heavy denim- very beautiful. No stretch at all, arm hole are a bit small in my option- so if you have strong muscular arms just know that.

Heavy material- maybe a bit to warm for humid summer day. Very flattering cut for hourglass figures- the side ties really help with the fit. Interesting darts on the sleeves add subtle detail to a very plain, 1950's style dress. Much nicer than I expected!
It's very comfortable
It is cute, but the fabric is a little heavy. The fit is tts.

Wasn't sure if I liked the dress when I first saw it on the hanger. I decided to give it a shot and found the dress looked great. I got a ton of compliments at work and at drinks after. I styled it with vintage white pumps and red lipstick. I think I could have sized down... the sleeves were a bit big and I wrapped the sash around my waist instead of just tying a bow. Would rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Cute but you need a waste and a big head to carry this off.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress but kind of looks boxy unless you have a small waist. I kind of have a boy body right now. Also the shoulders are bold, which is also awesome but not if you have a tiny head like I do. I looked a little kooky.
Got a lot of compliments on this one. The fabric is heavy; dress is very well made.

links_Review_Title: Retro vibes that got a lot of compliments
links_Review_Text: Cute dress. Total retro, modest vibes. Fit great. Loved the sleeves.
Lots of compliments on this dress perfect for spring

During the pandemic I had my 50th bday. I ordered it prior, but had a good time anyway. Felt glamorous in it! Didn't wear a bra but definitely wore a spandex underneath. Very good quality, comfortable.

I would highly recommend this dress. It's sexy, but not offensively so. It's very low in front, but the mesh gives some coverage, and if you're like me with no cleavage it's not really an issue anyway. No need for a bra, so that is always a plus. Very flattering and pretty for a black tie event!

This dress is AMAZING. From the front it is classy, and a little sultry. But the back is on fire! The lace and open looking back make this dress something very special! I felt beautiful and confident in this dress. And received so many compliments. I would rent this dress again and again.

Wore this dress to a military ball and it worked perfectly. The fit and quality were great. I am about 5'5", size 4ish-waist 27 bust 34D. Fit is snug-I would recommend choosing your undergarments carefully as the waist has little give. I loved that I could go braless (haven't done that since I was a teen). I was able to move comfortably. My husband loved it and I received many compliments at the event!

This gown is beautiful. I felt great in it all night. Received many compliments. The style, cut and details are very flattering. I used boob tape because of the plunging neckline and open back. I love the lace and mesh. I was very comfortable dancing the night away. Love this gown. Highly recommended.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous! I felt beautiful in it. Definitely needed to size up big time. I wear a 4-6 and had to size up to an 8. Spanx are recommended and so is a sticky bra

links_Review_Title: I had tons of compliments! It was such a beautiful gown that fit perfectly and enhanced my figure.
links_Review_Text: Great material, was afraid my DD would not fit. You can’t wear a bra with it, it’s very low but very sexy and classy.

links_Review_Title: I felt statuesque and like a princess.
links_Review_Text: The dress is really beautiful. I will start with the only "con" that made me drop it to 4 stars - the back, between the lace and the sheer panels, was itchy and got uncomfortable sometimes. That is my only complaint, but when at a formal event, having an itchy back isn't ideal. That being said, the dress is stunning. It's not too "risque" though still very sexy and sleek. I was at a non-profit gala representing my company and felt it was a very appropriate dress while still being a little sexy. I love the two-tone. What you can't see in the picture is that I wore red shoes, which gave it a nice, but subtle pop of color. My shoes were about 4" high and the dress swept the ground nicely, so this is a good potential dress for shorter women (like myself at only 5'3"). Sometimes RTR dresses are very long and even heels aren't enough, but this is a great length for us short girls.

I was worried about the dress being too long since I'm short/average but with 1.5-2" heels it was perfect. Enough revealed to be sexy, enough stays covered you can look at your coworkers without blushing. Compliments all night and even now a week afterwards. Rent it, you won't regret it.

links_Review_Title: I felt stunning in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my brother's black time wedding reception. Overall, it fit true to size and I was generally happy with it. As other reviewers warned, however, it is rather unforgiving in the mid-section and the sheer fabric is itchy (especially around the neckline and underarms). I received many compliments and felt both glamorous and sexy!

This is a *beautiful* dress. I managed to squeeze into my normal size (4R) at 16 weeks pregnant. If it had been a single day longer, it would not have worked! I'm 5'6" 128 lbs and had to wear short wedge heels. If you're my height and want to wear 3+ inch heels, go with the long. arm holes are slightly scratchy but that may have been because of my needing a slightly bigger size as well.

I rented this dress for my stepsons summer wedding. It fit perfectly. I wore a shaper underneath and it was a little difficult to zip up (I definitely would not have been able to do it alone) but once on it looked amazing! I felt great in it as well.

I wore this to formal gala in downtown Chicago. I received numerous compliments all night. It made me feel sexy and attractive. But also the netting provides a little conservative cover for the very low neckline. Would highly recommend.

This dress is stunning. I was worried about the bust being too revealing but it was actually very classy while also sexy. It held my D's up well without a bra and I've had kids so that's saying something. I rented the 4r and the 6r and really couldn't tell much of a difference except the 4r seemed to hold my top up better so I went with that one. Only issue I had was the arm holes were a little itchy and uncomfortable towards the end of the night.

I wear between a 10 and 12. I am 6ft and 175. The 10 fiiiiit but I wouldn't have any room for breathing so I went with the 12 and it was perfect. Very flattering neckline and style with lots of compliments! I paired it with a red shoe.
Absolutely stunning! Compliments all night long.

I wore this for my son's wedding, but didn't want to look to "matronly", and this dress was PERFECT! It runs small, I am a 2/4 or XS normally, but due to the bust, I ordered a 6 and 8 as a back up. The 8 fit perfect, and I did not need a bra, the snug fit held everything in place and was not too boobish. I would wear it a million more times if I didn't have so many pictures in it already.

I wore this dress to a work Gala. I'm usually a size 12L but I have a broad back so the top was a little tight especially the band around the waist. The bottom fit fine. I saw others mention the tight waist as well but it wasn't a deal breaker. I could have used the 14L for more room up top but it was not in stock. I wore 3 inch heels and the length was perfect. I loved the detail of this dress! It was very flattering and hid some imperfections. I would definitely rent again!

This dress was beautiful! Interesting enough to be unique, but still elegant and simple. I got lots of compliments, and it was more comfortable than I anticipated. The fabric isn't necessarily stretchy but it does have some give. I'm 5'10" and it was long enough to wear heels! My only complaint was that the mesh material at the neckline was scratchy, and since I didn't fill out the top very well it rubbed against my collarbones all night. Overall a great dress though!

links_Review_Title: Excellent Mother of the Groom dress!
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress to the reception of my son's wedding. Tons of compliments. The fabric is very nice and heavy. Not clingy. The ribbon waistband is a bit unforgiving and hit at a weird location on my rib cage. But with a little rearranging, it worked. The zipper is tough and got stuck at the ribbon band but my daughter was able to get it zipped. Couldn't have done it by myself. Wore a sticky, backless bra but probably could have gone braless. There was enough support. All in all this is a great dress. Would definitely rent it again
I loved this dress, it's true to the size, I felt comfortable in it, I got complements. I would definitely will rent again!
Rented this for a December wedding last year. Received so many compliments. Fit perfectly. Absolutely gorgeous dress! Even more beautiful in person.
Loved this dress. Sexy yet sophisticated. My husband said it was his favorite dress I ever wore! Wore it to a black tie wedding

links_Review_Title: Worked great! Lots of compliments from guests and bride and groom!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Unique dress. Was perfect for my PA school formal.
links_Review_Text: I ordered both the 12R and the 14R, but wore the 14. Both fit, but the 14 was more comfortable and I knew I would be in at for a long time. I really felt the 12 looked better, but went for comfort. I was able to go bra-less even at 36C due to the fitted area under the bust and the padding. The zipper was very difficult--even without a person in it. I ended up adding some graphite to the zipper and that helped some, but it was still pretty difficult.

Rented this as the maid of honor in my best friends wedding. It was PERFECT!!! So many compliments, very comfortable. Thicker material so hides all flaws. A bit strict around the torso, but my posture was great - ha! And it loosened as the night went on. Amazing RTR experience yet AGAIN!

Dress was clearly well-made and pretty. Not my favorite RTR as it didn't fit my athletic build very well. Very tight in the neck and arms even when I sized up. Also a bit short, even when wearing flats. I'm 5'8. But, maybe it was only in my head because a lot of people said they loved it.

This is a beautiful dress and I really wanted it to work out. I tried this dress in two sizes. Neither worked for me. I have a small bust and could not fill out the top. It sagged in the cups. It is snug around the middle and is very unforgiving in the mid-section.

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress. I bought three and rented this one and wore it. Glamorous!
links_Review_Text: I was mother of bride. I’m 5’5” about 140 lbs and wore the 12R. I would haha work then10 but my 34DD boobs were shoved together and it looked tacky so I went with the 12. Received soooooo many compliments!! Loved loved loved!!!

Great dress! Really beautifully made. Would rent again. The top stays put even without a bra. The lower fabric is thick w some give to it. It just fit me right in all the right places. Contrary to the dress description, you cannot wear a regular bra w this dress. My strapless didn't even work w it. Had to wear it without a bra but it was fine. The back mesh panel dips low so you cannot wear high waisted shapeware w it.

Got so many compliments and felt great overall in the dress. Because petite was unavailable, I used fashion tape to hem the bottom which worked out pretty well. Like previous reviews stated, the satin band is not stretchy and felt a bit tight but manageable.

links_Review_Title: Such a sexy and elegant dress. A million compliments. Used a very deep cut braw
links_Review_Text: Deep v neck. Flattering cut for heavy tops.

links_Review_Title: Order a size or two up if you have hips and larger chest. Loved it. Felt amazing in this dress
links_Review_Text: Order a size or two larger than your normal size. I'm a 10 and wore 14 in this brand

links_Review_Title: This was a beautiful, elegant dress and I received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I am normally a size 2-4, but I wore this dress in a 6R. I am 5'6" and the length was perfect with 4 inch heels. The zipper is a bit difficult to get up over the ribbon at the waistline. You can't wear a bra with this dress due to the sheer back, so I wore gel petals, but that may be tough for a larger chest. Overall, I loved this dress!

links_Review_Title: The dress fit great! Beautiful top and stretchy bottom made it all perfect!
links_Review_Text: #gala
So many compliments!!! My husband was like wow!! This dress made me feel incredible!! Did show off your the too part of Absolutely amazing!! I would rent it again and again!!

I got the 4L because that was the only size available, I usually wear a 2 and think that would have been a better fit. the 4 still fit ok, but the 2 would have been better. Very true to size. The long was also very long. Even with 4-inch heels, it drug on the ground. It is a very high-quality material, fully-lined, well-made dress. I thought it was all black from the photos, but the skirt is actually a deep navy and then black lace on top. I think it would have been prettier either all the same color or with a stronger contrast in colors. Definitely need a special plunge bra for this. This is not a great dress for the less endowed ladies, I felt like I needed more boob to fill it out properly.

links_Review_Title: Compliments ALL NIGHT LONG! Sexy but classy.
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit of this dress. Sucked me in but I will still comfortable enough to eat, drink and dance all night long. The bust area is fully lined so not being able to wear a bra was just fine. I was able to wear shorts spanx underneath and you could not tell.

links_Review_Title: I felt gorgeous with the beautiful details of the gown!
links_Review_Text: The gown is gorgeous! 😍 Felt so pretty wearing it. The only problem is the length of the gown, had to shorten it to 5 inches. Cause im a 5'0 foot tall. Just tape it with hem/fashion tape! 😄
The length was perfectly long...I wore adidas shoes! Little baggy up top but perfect size otherwise. By the end of the night the inside of my arms were sore from rubbing against the appliqué up top.

This item was PERFECT -- the fit, the colors, the style, the fun! The adults in our school building awed over it just as much as my fifth graders. I couldn't stop fluffing up my ruffles because I too was obsessed with it. WORTH IT!

I wore this skirt for my bridal shower and received so many compliments! It was so fun and festive! I wish I could wear it everyday! It was comfortable and sat perfectly on top of my hips. Loved it so much!

links_Review_Title: New Year's Eve must have skirt
links_Review_Text: Rented originally to wear to the nutcracker, but I got sick. Wound up wearing it for New Years! It was perfect! Received tons of compliments. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Free and Fun! Not for the shy ones
links_Review_Text: Wow. What a skirt. I wore it to an Elton John concert and it was so much fun to walk and dance in this beautiful piece. I honestly think the only way to wear this skirt is renting also the to and the earrings like I did. Haha. I'm so happy with this rental.

This skirt is amazing! We went to a drag show knowing we'd never be as beautiful as the queens (it was a travel theme) so we just went in party attire. The skirt was a hit - I even got complements from a couple Queens! I did find this skirt ran a little smaller than what I'd anticipated. I'm usually a 0/XS but was much more comfortable in the small. Luckily I got both sizes; definitely take them up on the free size up!
Wore this to a costume party! It was super fun and flattering and great colors. Ran a little big in the waist but still worked great!
Absolutely love this fun skirt!! True to size.
I'm 5'1 and this skirt looked more like a long skirt than 3/4 length. Photographs beautifully! Such a un statement piece. Could also be worn with a crop top for a more casual feel

I would never, ever have considered this skirt ordinarily, but a friend had a party where the theme was the 2019 Met Gala, which in turn had the theme of "camp." I thought it would be perfect for that and it was. It was comfortable all evening and held up to dinner, drinks, and dancing. I did take off a star because the metallic crinkle panels don't quite meet up on the side and show the flesh-toned liner.
I love rent the runway! Fashion blogger took my photograph in this dress. For more Rtr fashion please check out my insta at www.instagram.com/carolwongnyc Beautiful colours and super comfy!

links_Review_Title: I felt like a shiny cupcake paper/ space mermaid!!!
links_Review_Text: My friend and I matched in these skirts and they were so fun! The waistband was pretty tight so if things are normally tighter through your midsection I'd consider sizing up. I would definitely rent again!
So so chic, great colors and shine. A modern alternative to a tulle skirt.
Loved it! I got a lot of compliments
This piece was true to size.
The fit was perfect and the skirt was comfy. It's a nice balance between classy and sassy style which is exactly what I wanted. I'll rent this skirt again and would consider buying it.
One of my most favorite RTR items ever! Amazing skirt that can brighten any day! Follow @an.unlimited.life on Instagram to see how I styled this look!

Fun and flirty. Flattering fit and very comfortable. Can dress it up or make it more casual for work and a daytime event. One of my favorite rentals- definitely will rent again, maybe in the pink color scheme!
I rented this skirt to boost my work style! It was such a fun piece and made me feel like a princess. Definitely worth the rental!

Such fun. Work got a "French" inspired reveal party. Was just the slightest but small - but based on other reviews medium might have been too large. Was able to zip no problem just not hook. Really fun party piece.

This skirt is perfect for standing out! I wore it to an animal fundraiser, and multiple people stopped to compliment me. It is sparkly and fun! I felt like one of those cupcake tin foil things. If you have any kinda booty, it gaps a little in the layers in the back so you can see the nude slip underneath. I just didn't care about that and wore it anyway. No issue! 10/10 can't wait to rent in the other color!!!
It was perfect for my evening. I wanted to stand out and this skirt does it!

links_Review_Title: Felt like a cupcake tin and I loved it!
links_Review_Text: LOVED wearing this skirt! Wore on NYE and wish I had more places to wear this. So cute but you can see the liner in the back and it was such a blah color. Not sure what the designer was thinking but wore the skirt anyway!

The skirt is true to size. The shine and colors are spectacular. The back had an odd gap that showed the inner nude lining of the skirt, and I had to use double sided tape to make sure it looked complete rather than sewn incorrectly. Other than that, this was a great skirt!
This was SO FUN to wear. It was easy to style, and I felt so good and festive in it! Everyone was complimenting me on how lovely it was. I would totally rent this again, and in the other color!
Wore this to my office holiday party! Loved the colors and texture.
What a fun and flirty skirt. Perfect for a party. The texture is so soft and has good structure.

links_Review_Title: Fun flamingo feel! Can't wait to try the other color RTR offers in this skirt
links_Review_Text: Fun skirt that catches eyes from a mile away. Fit true to size. Because it isn't form fitting, I tried to go "sexier" on the top w a mesh/black fitted top to add a nice balance to outfit. Lots of complements !
Wore to a dinner and a following party. The colors are so bright. Many compliments. So fun and unique. I will definitely order again.

links_Review_Title: Could not have gotten more compliments. LOVED IT!
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size. It looks stiff but is not at all. Traveled well in my suitcase.
Everyone complimented on skirt. Super fun to wear

I'm obsessed with this skirt. It was fun, unique and comfortable. Received a ton of compliments all night. I am 5'3, 125lbs, athletic build with shorter legs and long torso and the small was a perfect fit for me. I wore it at my waist but you could wear it higher or lower as well.
This skirt is a showstopper - it's unique and fun and I got compliments all night.

I wore this to the Nutcracker Ballet and it was so fun, I got a ton of compliments. It was a lot lighter and thinner than I expected but that's not a bad thing. The back was a little odd where the zipper is but not enough to notice it. I'd rent it again

This skirt looks better in person than in the model; maybe it's the styling... I wore this skirt with a white top and it looked AMAZING. It is true to size, flowy and comfortable. Got so many compliments and many people asked where I got it. Wish I could own it! Definitely gonna rent this one again as well as the other color.
So many compliments on this super fun skirt for a work party. The waist was a bit tight, would definitely size up if you are high waisted or an apple.
I saw this skirt and knew I had to wear it! I wasn't sure if it was going to be too much for everyday wear, but its actually really perfect when its dressed down. The S was a little snug on me.

I wore this to the office, to a dinner, to church, and people kept coming up to me to compliment on the skirt! Most had never seen anything like this before. The skirt is actually very lightweight, but it looks like it's made out of metal (a common question from others too), which I like. If you're ok with standing out (in a good way), definitely consider this skirt!
This skirt made the rounds at a few of my holiday gatherings this year and I couldn't love it any more! It was fun, festive and versatile. Highly recommend!

I have pretty wide hips, but I thought the large would be more than okay fit wise. The skirt did fit a little small, and I don't have a large waist but the waistband was pretty tight. Since I'm curvy, the length was also shorter than I expected. All in all, I was SO excited for this skirt but unfortunately didn't fit great on me, so I would recommend to size up if you can.
Worked wonderful with a black body suit!!!!! Si many compliments!!!
This was my favorite dress. It's fits so comfortable and it zips easily.
Textured material adds interest.

This was a nice, cozy, floral dress. The shape was really nice. The colors were not quite as vibrant as I thought they would be. Was able to wear this to work and to weekend events - versatile and lovely!

links_Review_Title: Such a unique cut and style
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I've never worn anything else with a shape and fit like this dress. The sleeves and neckline are so flattering, and the length is just right. Breezy fabric, but not too thin or cheap feeling. Wish I had bought it!
I rented this for our Fourth of July show at the TV station I work for. The color showed up beautifully on TV, and the dress fit me really well. I usually wear petite sizing, but this fit great.

I really liked this dress! It's fun and casual, great for summer. My only complaint is that the neckline would ride down, and I was constantly making sure it was in place. Someone with a smaller chest probably wouldn't have this problem. Overall, fun daytime dress!
Fun pattern and detail, and super comfortable, got many compliments!
I loved this dress! It is cute and girly and I will be renting again!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for the Easter brunch hostess
links_Review_Text: Wore this on Sunday for Easter brunch at our home. I felt girly and beautiful while still staying comfortable. The dress has a great shape, length and quality . Loved it!
Beautiful dress. Very comfortable. Hit right around the knee. Perfect for daytime. The flowers were more pink than red with little pops of beige and turquoise.

Pretty cute, and fit well except too tight in the chest. I could still fit into it, but it was definitely smashing my chest! Other than that, it was a fun and flattering dress. I'm pretty tall and it was on the shorter side but not indecent.

I am definitely pear-shaped, so despite my height/weight ratio I really should have gotten a zero. Size this dress based on your "up top" size. Wonderful fit. I loved the length- short enough to be flirty but not so short I felt like I was dressing younger than my age. The colors were great as well.
I loved this dress! It was flattering and fit true to size. It is perfect for so many occasions! I paired it with booties, but it could be worn with sandals or heels as well.

Very cute dress. I was disappointed because mine arrived with a big hole in the sleeve. The shape wasn't super flattering and the waist was a little uncomfortable when sitting but all in all cute dress

links_Review_Title: Exactly what I was looking for and bump friendly!!
links_Review_Text: Though I didn't find this dress listed in the maternity section, I thought this dress would be perfect for my baby shower. Pre pregnancy I am a true size 6. Decided to size up and rent the 10 and 12. At 33 weeks pregnant the 12 fit perfect! It accommodated my bump and my much larger breasts. I got sooooo many compliments on the dress and would totally wear this again after baby as well!

links_Review_Title: 6 year anniversary celebration at the MN State Fair
links_Review_Text: I received a TON of compliments on this dress and it was perfect for a dressy/causal affair. The size was a little large of me in the bust and shoulder (I normally wear a 4, and this was a two), but beautifully made! I loved wearing it!
The dress fit true to size, but it was a little short. Nothing too bad for work though. The colors and detail were great in person.

I wore this dress to work and then out with friends on one of the hottest days of the summer. The 4 was a little too big, but it was comfortable and I got compliments on it all day -- loved the bright colors and big sleeves. I liked how it looked on, but hated how it photographed.
Print of this dress is so fun, easy to wear, lots of compliments. Perfect for summer. Classic Kate Spade.
One of my favorite rentals to date. I got so many compliments. Great fit, very comfortable and such a beautiful print. Rent it!!
I thought this dress was super cute and the fabric was substantial (not flimsy). It was very comfy even after eating a large meal at dinner! Would recommend for a dinner out/date night.

This dress is gorgeous! I wore a size up because I have a large chest and I think it would have been too tight if I wore my normal size. It felt a litttttle big but nothing noticeable. It was a little low / boobie but I would def. wear it again! I wore this to a bridal shower.

links_Review_Title: Very cute summer dress - wore to a work event.
links_Review_Text: Loved this! Very comfortable. Wore it to a work event in the city (warm temps that day) and it was very comfortable. I got a lot of compliments!

This dress is amazing on all fronts. The fabric is beautiful and it has structure yet isn't too heavy. A well made dress, for sure. The cut is flattering. It got so many compliments and felt great wearing this.
I chose this dress for a day when I had a series of live interviews on Nasdaq's Facebook page. It was comfortable and different from what anyone else was wearing at the conference.

This dress is very flattering and easy to wear, fits true to size and very wearable for bustier girls. The zipper sticks a tiny bit but I could manage it without help. Wore this for 4th of July and got many compliments
What can I say? Adorable fabric, fits like a glove, comfortable, feminine and work appropriate. Perfection.
Very fun dress that covers but also felt flirty. Wore it on two occasions and it was comfortable and flattering!

Fit was nice! I am unfamiliar with Kate Spade clothes sizing; I have a quite prodigious booty but in this I think I could've gotten into a 14. As seen in my second photo, it's a little large in the shoulders and bust, but not so large that it looks bad. Very good quality, I feel like a million bucks and can't wait to look my best at work. I think this dress is great for fellow pears!
Wish I had a better pic'. I liked this dress because it was very flattering. I didnt have to suck anything in. I would suggest double sided tape on the bust, or a demi cup bra.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my graduation. Love how the dress looked and I felt beautiful in it.
links_Review_Text: Tight in the bust (and I have a small chest) but other than that it fit like a dream.
This dress is adorable I loved it and the fit was great!

links_Review_Title: Kate Spade is Killing it This Season!
links_Review_Text: Kate Spade is having a great year. I've loved everything I've tried so far, including this one! It's so fun and flattering. The kind of dress you can really wear just about anywhere. The length is good for work or a date. The material is gorgeous, with a navy background. The scallops on the bottom align with the lace. It's quite flattering, even with the oversized sleeves. This runs a touch large, but it's nice to have wiggle room.

links_Review_Title: Love the dress for a picnic gathering
links_Review_Text: Great dress for summer

I loved this dress! The bright colors and fuller skirt were perfect for a spring day. Sometimes Kate Spade 4 is a little tight around my broader rib cage but this one was much looser than usual. The dress was comfortable and flattering.
Cute dress for work. Loved the colors and the flare on both the skirt and sleeves. Got a bunch of compliments it. Would rent again. Would be great for a night out too or a more casual event.
Great fit, lots of compliments!
Flattering and comfortable, loved the sleeves for some arm coverage, and the fabric was a great weight.

links_Review_Title: Little big, perfect for eating a ton at the rehearsal dinner
links_Review_Text: I love the style of this dress. Very, very pretty and got lots of compliments. It was a little big in the waist, but I didn't mind bc then I didn't feel like I was wearing a corset after the rehearsal dinner!
The dress runs small. I couldn't get the zipper up so I had to return it.
Very cute romper. Good quality and length, fit true to size. No back zipper, so it was a little difficult to put on and take off.
So cute and comfortable. Only con was chest snap came undone quite easily. Lots of compliments.
Wore this to thanksgiving and a party. Lots of compliments. Very comfortable.

I ordered the M because L was unavailable. The M fit, however, it was very tight in the elastic midsection, but I also don't have a small waist. It fit everywhere else, though. The fabric has NO stretch so it was a bit of a struggle to get it on, and even more to get it off. I had to have my fiancé help me take it off after trying it on and after actually wearing it. May not have had this issue if I had the L. Make sure you have something to remove deodorant stains because it's almost inevitable you'll get some on the piece while putting it on.
Great for any occasion
Loved this romper! My body isn't usually the romper type but it was so flattering! Will rent again! It was a little difficult to take off and when using the restroom.

links_Review_Title: Great romper for tall girls and big boobs!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a friend's bridal shower and it fit PERFECT! It was so comfortable, great length in the shorts and plenty of room up top! The snap comes undone easily so had to watch that. It's VERY difficult to get off and on so glad I didn't have to go to the bathroom while I was wearing it. Easily gets deodorant marks when pulling off and on so make sure you have something with you to wipe them off after you use the bathroom.

Really cute, pulled together summer look. Ran small for me. The elastic waist band felt tight and the whole number was hard to get on and off. I think a size up would have been better for me. The snap at the bust can pop if not careful. The flounce around the leg covers up the backside well. Fabric is heavy crepe, so not the coolest of fabrics.
Perhaps runs a little forgiving versus big. Could've gone with a small but I was in hot humid weather so medium was great. I loved the versatility and quality and I still haven't returned this one :)

Loved this so much. Wore for a night out dancing with friends and also for a first date. There's no zipper so be careful when you pull it on. I got deodorant lines on it both times as it was a bit difficult putting my arms in. The ruffles are understated and the shorts don't rise up. Great material. Seriously considering buying.

Very comfortable and cute! Wasn't too short or too revealing in the chest. Super versatile. Wore to work and a backyard summer barbecue. Only draw back is that it is a pain to get on and off - have to really work to pull it over your shoulders.

links_Review_Title: Great mix of proper and fun
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a First Communion Party which took place outdoors. It was proper and playful- just the right mix. The fabric is high quality and doesn't wrinkle. I'd highly recommend!
Lots of complements, so flattering, and very true to size! Loved everything about it!

links_Review_Title: Very cute and flattering for a date night. Hard to get on and off!!!!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this outfit. It's adorable for a nice date night or wedding. Very flirty and fun without being too revealing. Great to show off those legs. It makes them look great. Be warned!!! Getting this outfit on and off was very difficult. I am not being dramatic. It was a challenge. So bathroom trips were few and far between the night I wore this one. Just remember that when renting rompers. ;)

I got the small and medium and the small fit like a glove. It's a little short, but not where you think your booty is hanging out. The V in the front has a small little clasp to pin together, I wore with and without the clasp being clipped and felt fine and nothing was popping out. The small front was a little snug, but the medium for me was a little more loose than I prefer. I'd definitely recommend this and would probably rent again.

links_Review_Title: I liked this a lot, just chose to wear something else
links_Review_Text: This is a very flattering true to size romper. Would order again

links_Review_Title: runs small, and is on the shorter side
links_Review_Text: runs small, and is on the shorter side--I recommend sizing up

links_Review_Title: Great fit and even though it's casual, it felt a little glam.
links_Review_Text: Super cute for anything.
The ruffled bottom of this romper makes it something special. The material is good non wrinkly quality. Might be a tad short for those with long legs. I will definitely rent again

slightly short in the waist (it was a bit tight when I sat), this was a really fun romper that I dressed up with heels and jewelry. Has several compliments throughout the evening. It was stylish and classy.
Not for long torsos. I'm normally a 14/XL and could not get this high enough to go over my shoulders. Adorable design but just didn't work for me

links_Review_Title: Loved this! Wore it twice and wish I had more events to wear it to!
links_Review_Text: A little tough to get on / off in the shoulders, but rich material and fit well.
didn't wear
Very cute but hard to get in and out of! The material is polyester so it is a little hot inside there so keep in mind if in a very hot climate :) I wore it at night so it was perfect.
didn't wear

links_Review_Title: Awkward to get in and out of.
links_Review_Text: I tried this on and it was cute on but very awkward/hard to get off. I decided to send back instead of risk getting stuck in it!

While rompers and jumpsuits are always annoying when having to use the restroom, this one was unbearable. It's designed to fitted on top slide down easily. I felt like a I was having a fight with myself in the stall. I even drank almost no beverages this day because of that. With that aside it was adorable on and so comfortable. I would have given it 5 stars if it hadn't been so difficult to get on/off
I always wear a size 4 in Trina Turk; but this was way too small!
Very flattering and true to size. Only downside is the snap can pop so be careful about too many sudden movements. Overall, wonderful look and would rent again!!
a little shorter than I thought it would be.
Didn’t wear, very baggy.
I was in between saying runs small or fits true to size. My shoulders and back is a little more broad so when getting in this it was a little difficult but once on it was comfortable
Great fit - it was a little difficult to get on - I struggled getting my shoulders into it. But, it worked and I received loads of compliments!

This was a piece that I wore everywhere. Dressed it up, dressed it down - casual or more formal... A great piece that I probably should have bought but figured since I kept it so long I already spent so much money already in unlimited fees... not smart on my part but since the waist was tight & fabric was not stretchy, (it was a yoga session to get in & out of the romper) I was hesitant to purchase. I never thought I would've kept it this long but it did look great when it was on!!! Definitely recommend it if you can handle difficulty maneuvering the ins and outs!
Fit was a little baggy in the waist and hips. The outfit overall, though was super cute, fun, and dressy/casual. I would wear again.

I was nervous about the fit due to my longer torso. It was fine and super cute on. No pics, sorry. The only issue was getting it on and off. It was a struggle. It was also loose in the bust area, but I used two sided tape to keep me covered.
Great fit and so fun!!
I usually wear a 2 but it was too small for me.
I have a larger bust, the hook and eye closure was higher, made it look more work appropriate than date night.

Ordered a size up, and overall fit pretty well. This is a cute, simple romper for a night out. Comfortable and fairly heavy weight material. Nothing super special but was comfortable and happy with the fit.
Love the zipper, color is perfect red, Christian Siriano is a genius!

links_Review_Title: Not this wrinkly when I first put it on...but did wrinkle later. Beautiful color. Fun cut!

links_Review_Text: The fit was amazing! I was a little worried because some reviews expressed the it ran small in the mid-section. With my postpartum body that was the last thing I needed... it was perfect! I don’t want to send it back! Material is super comfortable and easy to move in.
I am just in a 6. It was suggested to size up to an 8, so I did. The 8 was still quite snug. Wearable, though. I loved the look. Wore it with pants that were also rented.
Color was on point and the style was fabulous. Tight around the waist but otherwise extremely comfortable!
I loved this top. It fit very snug but I was satisfied with how it fit. The material feels very high quality and it is comfortable to wear. Would consider buying it.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments about my outfit!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely gorgeous and very comfortable!

Tons of compliments- super flattering even after a huge meal. Loved the combo of flounce and structure. Nice, thick-yet-stretchy material. Despite being tight in the bust (36DD) didn't pancake the girls or make them look oddly shaped like a lot of tops do w/ bigger cup sizes. Gorgeous true red. Considering buying.
Really nice material and fantastic color- felt awesome on my bday!
The fit was perfect. Color was beautiful. Received many compliments. Would definitely rent again.
Great top for a nice dinner! Classy yet fun bright color!

links_Review_Title: Great too for a night out on the town!
links_Review_Text: I rented this top for a girls night out and got a lot of compliments on it. It does run small so size up a size or two. I normally wear a 0 and had originally ordered a zero but it was too small so I returned it for a size 2, which did fit but was a little tighter than I would have liked. I 4 probably would have been perfect.

While this top is very fitted through the bodice it really accentuates the waistline which i loved. It was right across my chest but I am bigger chested. Shouldn't be an issue with most ladies. I also appreciated the sleeves over the part of my arms I don't really like. Overall I loved this top and will definitely rent it again.
Loved this red top so much. I sized up based on reviews but definitely could have worn a 12 or 14. It covers the part of my arms that I am self-conscious of and is forgiving all around.
Loved this, love Christian Siriano! He's fabulous, and this top did not disappoint.

links_Review_Title: This was worn for a girls' night out for my birthday.
links_Review_Text: The fit of this shirt is fantastic for me. I am smaller on top and bigger on bottom. This was very flattering with skinny jeans and heels, but it could also be dressed up with a black pencil skirt.
It's a peplum so it is right around waist. I pulled it off but was a little snug :-) Beautiful fabric and high quality. Lots of complements.

links_Review_Title: Beautifully made, vibrant color, great for vacation in Mexico!
links_Review_Text: Definitely a tight fit. I have a small chest and usually would be a 6 in shirts but this 8 was TIGHT - definitely size up and if you're big breasted you may want to try something else. It's an absolutely beautiful shirt despite the sizing being a bit difficult.
Nice thick material makes it very flattering!
I loved this top. Size in stomach fit great but the top was a bit bigger than what I am. I probably could have safety pinned it but it still was beautiful. I enjoyed wearing this on a night out.

links_Review_Title: Love the top half of this shirt!
links_Review_Text: I really loved the top half of this shirt, but from below the chest it fit so snugly that it was bunching up. It wasn't super flattering on me, and it wasn't comfortable because of how tight it was in my mid section.

Rented this top for my 30th birthday dinner. The color is a rich, head turning red. This top does run small. I am usually a 4-6 with Rent the Runway, and I ended up wearing the size 8. Go larger with your backup size! I was able to wear a strapless bra, though the side of the top does come down low, so you may have a smidge of side-boob action going on if you have a larger cup size. The cut is perfect for my hourglass ladies. I felt sexy, classy, and confident in this top. Highly recommend, just make sure you size up!

links_Review_Title: It's a classy way to say "look at me!"
links_Review_Text: Wore this for my birthday drinks and dinner. Based on the reviews, I sized up from my regular size 2 up to a 4- definitely the right move. This fit well. It's a bit long, as other reviewers wrote, but I wouldn't have even mentioned it if I hadn't read that in other reviews. Well made- but definitely wouldn't pay anywhere near $500 for it. I enjoyed wearing it. The peplum was flattering. It wasn't uncomfortable to manage in. It was hard to zip- in fact, I've never had a rental from RTR that wasn't hard to zip- no matter what size, how loose, etc.; not sure why that is.
I received many compliments. The color is beautiful and the fit is very flattering. Love this top!!

links_Review_Title: Looking good is the best revenge
links_Review_Text: This top was fun to wear. I used a sticky bra and it worked well. Fun date day shirt or I think this could be great for a reunion or a girls night out. This was a little long in the torso on me and I have a long torso. The extra material hid ok under the ruffles, but petites may have a hard time with this fit. This is also very fitted at the waist, so that should drive your sizing here.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic color and on trend. I did not have an occasion to wear this due to the current events.
links_Review_Text: Pretty color. A little snug in the chest, but that isn't a reason not to rent it and see how it fits you.

This top has a lot of potential. It is very attractive and makes you look very slim, but is probably better suited for someone a little taller. There was a lot of bunching for me. The color is beautiful and I wish it worked.

Definitely runs small! Fitted around the midsection. Love the sleeve detail and really pretty top but be aware that it will not hide anything in the stomach area! I liked it the best with high waisted jeans.
Just alright. Wasn't in love with it

links_Review_Title: Cute top but small size was suggested and not even close to fit
links_Review_Text: I wear an 8 but a 6 was sent to I couldn't even zip it up

links_Review_Title: Perfect for date night or party!
links_Review_Text: Love this top! It's a bright red color, so it will be perfect for holiday parties! I can't wait to rent this again!
Great quality. Fit great. Felt sexy and pretty. I felt like this top was perfect for a pear shape like me.
It's very tight in the abdomen.

This is such a flattering top! I wore it to two different parties. The color and design stand out in a great way. The only downside is the zipper is difficult in some places. I would consider purchasing!
Need larger size
This top fit perfectly. I got looks and head turns from the moment we walked in. My husband kept telling me how great I looked. The color is the most perfect shade of red too. I will rent this again!
Did not wear because top was too small.
Would size up; didn't zip! But so cute.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear. Too tight for my bust next size would have been too big.
links_Review_Text: Too snug for girls with a chest.
I sized up normally an 8 and even the 10 was way too tight in the stomach and chest. It fit to zip but was not flattering

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my garden engagement photos!
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. The length was longer on me due to my height which is expected. The straps are adjustable which helped a lot!

links_Review_Title: Lots of complaints and very comfortable
links_Review_Text: Had some wear along the seams. I was a little worried to wear it to a wedding bc it's white/ivory, no problem at all though. Don't worry about that if that's what's holding you back!
Lots of compliments and a fun fit with the fitted style and flirty bottom. Great colors and quality!

links_Review_Title: Easy dress for an outdoor summer wedding
links_Review_Text: The dress fit well (as expected) and I liked the print. Straps are adjustable which is nice. I thought it sort of emphasized my hips a bit too much, but would be good on a less curvy body type. Overall happy with it!

links_Review_Title: It was my Uncle's wedding and he had just survived a major health scare.
links_Review_Text: This dress is super cute and trendy. I have a very small bust and a larger lower body and this fit me perfectly. I was a little worried that it might have too much "boob space" for me but it was perfect. Everyone loved the dress. It is form fitting and the dress is lined inside so wearing spanx might be tough under it.

One of the best dresses I've rented. Very lightweight but not see-through (there's lining under the dress). Adjustable straps are perfect for any body type. It hugs in all the right places to accentuate your curves. The seam across the middle can feel a bit restrained but not uncomfortable. The base color is creamy and the flowers are vibrant. Highly recommend it.

links_Review_Title: This dress worked perfectly for our family photos!
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress to wear for family photos while on vacation in North Dakota. I needed one piece to use to coordinate the rest of the family's outfits, and this worked perfectly. It was a great, summer pattern that went well with our backgrounds. I ordered a 4 and a 6, and like other reviewers said, the 4 was tight around the rib cage. I wasn't able to get it zipped. The 6 zipped well, but was a little loose around the hips. I ended up pinning the back to try to tighten it up around my hips to be more flattering for the photos. The ruffles around the bottom are very feminine and fun. I'd recommend this dress!

Loved this dress! I was a bit worried about the fit after reading reviews that it ran small but it was perfect for me. Great dress for a spring/summer wedding! The fabric is a silky type of material that feels great on. Highly recommend this one.

This dress was great for the graduation event that I had. The pattern was beautiful, and I got many "you look like Snow White" compliments with my dark hair. I wore two different shoes with it - the tan flats as seen in the picture, and coral-colored Mary Jane Pump heels - both went great with the dress! The dress was very comfortable, I wore it to both a lengthy graduation ceremony and graduation reception and I felt great the whole time! I first wore it without a jean jacket for the ceremony and then added it for the reception - it was great both ways (I unfortunately only have pictures with the jean jacket). It is a light fabric, so good for warm weather - but thick enough that you don't need a slip. It ran true to size and the adjustable straps were great for me - plus I liked that they were a bit thicker. Two recommendations: 1. if you have a larger bust size, I would definitely get a strapless bra. 2.
